Universe, creation|Heelal, die skepping
Use this domain for general words referring to the physical universe. Some languages may not have a single word for the universe and may have to use a phrase such as 'rain, soil, and things of the sky' or 'sky, land, and water' or a descriptive phrase such as 'everything you can see' or 'everything that exists'.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die fisiese heelal. Sommige tale kan nie &#39;n enkele woord vir die heelal en mag het om &#39;n frase soos &quot;reën, grond, en dinge van die hemel&quot; of &quot;lug, grond, water en &#39;n beskrywende of frase soos&quot; alles wat jy kan gebruik sien &quot;of&quot; alles wat bestaan.
(1) What words refer to everything we can see?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na alles wat ons kan sien nie?
universe, creation, cosmos, heaven and earth, macrocosm, everything that exists|heelal, die skepping, die kosmos, die hemel en die aarde, makrokosmos, alles wat bestaan
Sky|Sky
Use this domain for words related to the sky.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die lug.
(1) What words are used to refer to the sky?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na die hemel?
sky, firmament, canopy, vault|lug, uitspansel, sondak, kluis
(2) What words refer to the air around the earth?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die lug rondom die aarde?
air, atmosphere, airspace, stratosphere, ozone layer|lug, atmosfeer, lugruim, stratosfeer, osoonlaag
(3) What words are used to refer to the place or area beyond the sky?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na die plek of gebied buite die hemel?
heaven, space, outer space, ether, void, solar system|hemel, ruimte, die buitenste ruimte, eter, nietig, sonnestelsel
(4) What words describe something in the sky or something that happens in the sky?|(4) Watter woorde iets in die lug of iets wat gebeur in die lug te beskryf?
aerial, heavenly, atmospheric, stratospheric, celestial,|lug, hemelse, atmosferiese, stratosfeer, hemelse,
(5) What words describe the appearance of the sky?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf die voorkoms van die lug?
blue, clear, black (night), cloudy, cloud filled, brilliant, dark, night sky, foreboding, stormy, dark, star studded|blou, helder, swart (nag), bewolk, wolk, briljante, donker, nag lug, onheilspellend, stormagtige, donker, sterbelaaide
(6) What words refer to the edge of the sky where it meets the ground?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die rand van die lug waar dit aan die grond?
horizon, skyline|horison, skyline
(7) What words refer to something in the sky?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets in die lug?
heavenly body, celestial body, luminary|hemelse liggaam hemelliggaam, uitblinker
(8) What words refer to the lights that appear in the northern (or southern) sky?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die ligte wat in die noordelike (of suidelike) lug verskyn?
aurora borealis, northern lights|aurora borealis, noordelike ligte
(9) What words refer to something being in the sky?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat in die hemel?
aloft, up in the sky, up in the air,|omhoog, tot in die hemel, in die lug,
Sun|Sun
Use this domain for words related to the sun. The sun does three basic things. It moves, it gives light, and it gives heat. These three actions are involved in the meanings of most of the words in this domain. Since the sun moves below the horizon, many words refer to it setting or rising. Since the sun is above the clouds, many words refer to it moving behind the clouds and the clouds blocking its light. The sun's light and heat also produce secondary effects. The sun causes plants to grow, and it causes damage to things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die son. Die son doen drie basiese dinge. Dit beweeg, dit gee lig, en dit gee hitte. Hierdie drie aksies betrokke in die betekenis van die meeste van die woorde in hierdie gebied. Sedert die son beweeg onder die horison, baie woorde verwys na dit opstel of styg. Sedert die son bo die wolke, baie woorde verwys na dit beweeg agter die wolke en die wolke in die lig daarvan blokkeer. Lig en die son se hitte te produseer ook sekondêre effekte. Die son veroorsaak plante om te groei, en dit skade aan dinge veroorsaak.
(1) What words refer to the sun?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die son?
sun, solar, sol, daystar, our star|son, son, sol, Daystar, ons ster
(2) What words refer to how the sun moves?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na hoe die son beweeg?
rise, set, cross the sky, come up, go down, sink|styg, stel, oor die lug, kom, gaan af, wasbak
(3) What words refer to the time when the sun rises?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer die son opkom?
dawn, sunrise, sunup, daybreak, cockcrow,|dagbreek, sonsopkoms, sonop, dagbreek, Hanekraai,
(4) What words refer to the time when the sun is at its highest point?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer die son op sy hoogste punt?
noon, zenith,|middag, hoogtepunt,
(5) What words refer to the time when the sun sets?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer die son sak?
sunset, dusk, sundown, twilight, eventide,|sonsondergang, skemer, sononder, skemer aand,
(6) What words refer to when the sun is shining?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na wanneer die son skyn?
shine, sunny, bright, give light, be sunshiny, daytime,|skyn, sonnige, helder, gee lig, wees sonskyn, dag,
(7) What words refer to the sun shining through the clouds?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die son wat skyn deur die wolke?
come out, break through (the clouds), go behind (a cloud)|kom uit, breek deur (die wolke), gaan agter (&#39;n wolk)
(8) What words describe where the sun is shining?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf waar die son skyn?
sunlit, be (out) in the sun, lit by the sun, shine on, be in the sunlight, sunny (spot)|sonnig wees (uit) in die son, verlig deur die son, skyn op, in die sonlig, sonnige (spot)
(9) What words describe when or where the sun doesn't shine?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf wanneer of waar die son nie skyn nie?
shade, eclipse of the sun, sunless, shady, shadow, eclipse (v),|skaduwee, verduistering van die son, Sunless, skaduwee, skaduwee, oorskadu (v),
(10) What words refer to the light of the sun?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die lig van die son?
sunlight, ray, sunshine, beam, light, sunbeam, radiance, glow, sparkle, glisten, glare|sonlig, Ray, sonskyn, balk, lig, Sunbeam, glans, glans, skitter, blink, glans
(11) What words describe the brightness of the sun?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf die glans van die son?
bright, intense, brilliant, blinding, glaring, glistening, luminous, dim|helder, intense, briljante, verblindende, flagrante, glinsterende, lig, verdof
(12) What refer to the sun heating things?|(12) Wat verwys na die son verwarming dinge?
warm, heat, dry|warm, hitte, droë
(13) What else does the sun do?|(13) Wat doen die son doen?
looks down on|kyk af op
(14) What words describe the damage done by sunlight?|(14) Watter woorde beskryf die skade wat deur sonlig?
sunburn, sunstroke, suntan, tan, heatstroke, heat prostration, sun damage, fading from the sun, bleached by the sun|sonbrand, sonsteek, zonnebrand, tan, hittesteek, hitte uitputting, sonskade, vervaag uit die son, gebleik deur die son
(15) What do people use to protect themselves from the sun?|(15) Wat doen die mense gebruik om hulself te beskerm teen die son?
sunglasses, shade tree, suntan lotion, awning, sun umbrella, parasol, sunbonnet, hat, visor|sonbrille, koelteboom, sonbrandolie, afdak, parasol, parasol, sunbonnet, hoed, toesighouer
(16) What words are used of telling time by the sun?|(16) Watter woorde gebruik van vertel tyd deur die son?
sundial, angle of the sun, sun-clock, shoot the sun, position of the sun,|sonwyser, hoek van die son, die son klok, skiet die son, posisie van die son,
(17) What words refer to using the power of the sun?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na die gebruik van die krag van die son?
solar energy, solar power, solar panel|sonkrag, sonkrag, sonpaneel
Moon|Moon
Use this domain for words related to the moon. In your culture people may believe things about the moon. For instance in European culture people used to believe that the moon caused people to become crazy. So in English we have words like "moon-struck" and "lunatic." You should include such words in this domain.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die maan. In jou kultuur kan mense dinge oor die maan glo. Byvoorbeeld in die Europese kultuur mense gebruik om te glo dat die maan veroorsaak dat mense mal geword. So in Engels het ons woorde soos &quot;-moon getref&quot; en &quot;kranksinnige.&quot; Jy moet sulke woorde in hierdie domein te sluit.
(1) What words refer to the moon?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die maan?
moon, lunar, satellite|maan, maan, satelliet
(2) What words refer to how the moon moves?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na hoe die maan beweeg?
rise, set, sink|styg, stel, wasbak
(3) What words refer to the time when the moon rises?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer die maan opkom?
moonrise, rising of the moon,|maansopkoms, stygende van die maan,
(4) What words refer to the time when the moon sets?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer die maan stelle?
moonset, setting of the moon,|Maansondergang, die opstel van die maan,
(5) What words refer to when the moon is shining?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer die maan skyn?
moon is shining, by the light of the moon, moon is/comes out,|maan skyn, deur die lig van die maan, maan / kom uit,
(6) What words describe where the moon is shining?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf waar die maan skyn?
moonlit, be in the moonlight, lit by the moon, shine on,|maanverligte, in die maanlig, verlig deur die maan, skyn op,
(7) What words describe when or where the moon doesn't shine?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf wanneer of waar die maan nie skyn?
moonless night, eclipse of the moon, eclipse (v),|maanlose nag, verduistering van die maan, verduistering (v),
(8) What words refer to the light of the moon?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die lig van die maan?
moonlight, moonbeam, moonshine,|maanlig, Moonbeam, maanskyn,
(9) What words describe the brightness of the moon?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf die glans van die maan?
bright, pale,|helder, bleek,
(10) What words describe the appearance of the moon?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf die voorkoms van die maan?
man in the moon, harvest moon|man in die maan, oes maan
(11) What words refer to the spots on the moon?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die kolle op die maan?
lunar sea, crater,|maan see krater,
(12) What words refer to the phases of the moon?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die fases van die maan?
phase, new moon, full moon, half moon, quarter moon, crescent, sliver, moon is waxing (getting bigger), moon is waning (getting smaller), wax and wane|fase, nuwe maan, volmaan, halfmaan, kwartaal maan sekel, splinter, is die maan waks (om groter), is besig om te kwyn maan (kleiner), was en kwyn
(13) What words refer to the time it takes for the moon to go through its phases?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd wat dit neem vir die maan om te gaan deur die fases?
(lunar) month|(Maan) maand
Star|Star
Use this domain for words related to the stars and other heavenly bodies.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die sterre en ander hemelliggame.
(1) What words are used to refer to the stars?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na die sterre?
star, starry, stellar|ster sterrehemel, sterre
(2) What words describe the sky when the stars are shining?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die lug toe die sterre skyn?
starlit (sky), (sky is) ablaze with stars, starry (sky), star studded (sky), stars are shining|helder (lug), (lug is) aan die brand met die sterre, sterrehemel (lug), sterbelaaide (lug), is sterre skyn
(3) What words are used for where the stars are shining?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik vir waar die sterre skyn?
starlit, lit by the stars|helder, aangesteek deur die sterre
(4) What words are used for when or where the stars don't shine?|(4) Watter woorde word gebruik vir wanneer of waar die sterre skyn nie?
starless (sky, night)|sterrelose (lug, nag)
(5) What words refer to the light of the stars?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die lig van die sterre?
starlight|Starlight
(6) What words describe the brightness of the stars?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf die glans van die sterre?
bright, brilliant, dim, luminous|helder, briljante, dowwe, lig
(7) What words describe the appearance of the stars?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf die voorkoms van die sterre?
twinkle, wink, glittering, star shaped|vonkel, wink, glinsterende, stervormige
(8) What words refer to the study of the stars?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die studie van die sterre?
astronomy, astronomer, astrology, astrologer, stargazer, magi|astronomie, sterrekundige, astrologie, astroloog, Stargazer, towenaars
(9) What is a group of stars called?|(9) Wat is &#39;n groep van sterre genoem?
constellation, galaxy, nebula|konstellasie, sterrestelsel, nebula
Planet|Planet
Use this domain for words related to planets (large objects that circle the sun, looking like bright wandering stars in the sky), comets (objects that circle the sun, looking like a star with a tail), meteors (small objects that come from space and burn up when they hit the earth's atmosphere, causing a streak of light across the sky), and asteroids (small objects that circle the sun), planetary moons (large objects that circle the planets). Some cultures do not study the stars and will have few or no words in this domain. Others cultures that study the stars will have many words. There are only five planets that people can see in the sky--Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn. The others are only known from the scientific study of astronomy.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met planete (groot voorwerpe wat die son sirkel, soek soos helder dwaal sterre in die lug), komete (voorwerpe wat die son sirkel, lyk soos &#39;n ster met &#39;n stert), meteore (klein voorwerpe wat kom uit ruimte en verbrand wanneer hulle getref die aarde se atmosfeer, wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n streep van die lig deur die lug), en asteroïdes (klein voorwerpe wat die son sirkel), planetêre mane (groot voorwerpe wat die planete sirkel). Sommige kulture bestudeer nie die sterre en sal min of geen woorde in hierdie domein. Ander kulture wat die sterre bestudeer sal baie woorde het. Daar is net vyf planete wat mense kan sien in die lug - Mercurius, Venus, Mars, Jupiter en Saturnus. Die ander is net bekend uit die wetenskaplike studie van die sterrekunde.
(1) What words refer to a planet?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n planeet?
planet, planetary, wandering star|planeet planeet, dwaal ster
(2) What are the names of the planets?|(2) Wat is die name van die planete?
Mercury, Venus (Morning Star, Evening Star), Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto|Mercurius, Venus (Morning Star, Evening Star), Aarde, Mars, Jupiter, Saturnus, Uranus, Neptunus, Pluto
(3) What words refer to how the planets move?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hoe die planete beweeg?
revolve (around the sun), orbit,|draai (om die son), baan,
(4) What words refer to the sun and planets?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die son en planete?
solar system|sonnestelsel
(5) What words refer to comets?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na komete?
comet, tail, head|komeet, stert, hoof
(6) What do comets do?|(6) Wat doen komete doen?
appear, point, fade|verskyn, punt, vervaag
(7) What words refer to meteors?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na meteore?
meteor, shooting star, falling star, meteor trail, meteor shower|meteoriet, skiet sterre, val ster meteoriet roete, meteoriete
(8) What do meteors do?|(8) Wat doen meteore te doen?
flash across the sky, blaze a trail across the sky, strike the earth, make a crater, burn up|flits oor die lug, brand &#39;n spoor in die lug, die aarde tref, maak &#39;n krater, verbrand
(9) What words are used for when a meteor hits the earth?|(9) Watter woorde word gebruik vir wanneer &#39;n meteoriet die aarde tref?
meteorite, meteor crater|meteoriet, meteoriet krater
(10) What is a small planet called?|(10) Wat is &#39;n klein planeet genoem?
asteroid, moon|asteroïde, maan
Air|Air
Use this domain for words related to the air around us, including the air we breathe and the atmosphere around the earth.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die lug rondom ons, insluitende die lug wat ons inasem en die atmosfeer rondom die aarde.
(1) What words refer to the air we breathe?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die lug wat ons inasem?
air|lug
(2) What words refer to how much water is in the air?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na hoeveel water is in die lug?
humid, humidity, damp, dry, sticky, muggy|vogtige, humiditeit, klam, droë, taai, bedompige
(3) What words describe good air (such as when the air in a room is clean or doesn't smell bad)?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf goeie lug (soos wanneer die lug in &#39;n kamer is skoon of nie sleg ruik)?
fresh air, airy, well ventilated|vars lug, ligte, goed geventileerde
(4) What words describe bad air (such as when the air in a room is dirty, hot, smells bad, or too many people are breathing)?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf slegte lug (soos wanneer die lug in &#39;n kamer is vuil, warm, reuke slegte of te veel mense is asemhaling)?
stuffy, airless, stifling, polluted, air pollution, smog|bedompige, airless, versmorende, besoedelde, lugbesoedeling, rookmis
Blow air|Blow lug
Use this domain for words related to causing air to move.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met veroorsaak lug te beweeg.
(1) What words refer to causing air to move?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na veroorsaak lug te beweeg?
blow, fan, exhaust, expel, explode|blaas, fan, uitlaat, verdryf, ontplof
(2) What words refer to letting air blow through something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verhuring van lug blaas deur iets?
air out, ventilate|lug uit, ventileer
(3) What words refer to putting air into something (such as a tire or balloon)?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na om die lug in iets (soos &#39;n band of ballon)?
blow up, inflate, pump up, pneumatic|blaas, blaas, pomp, pneumatiese
(4) What words refer to keeping air out of something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die behoud van lug uit iets?
seal, airtight|seël, lugdigte
(5) What words refer to how much air is in something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na hoeveel lug is in iets?
air pressure, vacuum|lugdruk, vakuum
(6) What words refer to using the wind to winnow grain?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die gebruik van die wind om graan wan?
winnow|wan
(7) What tools and machines are used to create or use the wind?|(7) Wat gereedskap en masjiene word gebruik om te skep of gebruik die wind?
fan, air pump, bellows, ventilator, wind tunnel, propeller, air pipe, airshaft, vent, chimney, exhaust, funnel, windmill, sail, valve|fan, lug pomp, blaasbalk, ventilator, wind tonnel, skroef, lug pyp, airshaft, vent, skoorsteen, uitlaat, tregter, windpomp, seil, klep
Weather|Weer
Use this domain for words related to the weather.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die weer.
(1) What words refer to the weather?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die weer?
weather, weather conditions, atmospheric (conditions)|weer, weerstoestande, atmosferiese (voorwaardes)
(2) What words describe the weather when it is good?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer dit goed?
sunny, sunshine, clear (weather), good (weather), fair (weather), fine (day)|sonnige, sonskyn, duidelik (weer), &#39;n goeie (weer), billike (weer), fyn (dag)
(3) What words describe the weather when it is getting better?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer dit is beter?
clear, clear up, sun comes out,|duidelik, opklaar, son kom uit,
(4) What words describe the weather when it is bad?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer dit sleg?
bad, terrible, foul, inclement, rough, dirty sky, severe|sleg, verskriklik, vuil, gure, rowwe, vuil lug, erge
(5) What words describe the weather when it is getting worse?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer dit erger?
cloud up, deteriorate|wolk up, versleg
(6) What words describe the weather when it changes?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer dit verander?
(cold/warm/storm) front|(Koue / warm / storm) voor
(7) What words describe the weather when it stays the same?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer dit dieselfde bly?
stretch (of good weather), keep up|strek (van goeie weer), hou
(8) What words are used to describe any kind of weather?|(8) Watter woorde word gebruik om enige soort weer beskryf?
rain or shine, all weather, in all weathers|reën of sonskyn, al weer, in alle verweer
(9) What words describe the temperature?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf die temperatuur?
temperature, hot, warm, heat, cold, chilly, crisp, mild, unseasonably warm/cold, scorching, heat wave, cold spell, cold snap, frigid, freezing, be a chill in the air,|temperatuur, warm, warm, hitte, koue, koue, helder, ligte, unseasonably warm / koue, versengende hitte golf, koue, koue snap, ysige, vries, &#39;n chill in die lug,
(10) What words describe the weather when there is a lot of water in the air?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer daar &#39;n baie water in die lug?
humid, humidity, damp, sultry|vogtige, humiditeit, klam, soel
(11) What words refer to the type of weather a place normally has?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die tipe van die weer &#39;n plek het gewoonlik?
climate, dry/wet/cold/hot climate, tropical, temperate|klimaat, droë / nat / koue / warm klimaat, tropiese, gematigde
(12) What words describe something that has been exposed to the weather for a long time?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat blootgestel aan die weer vir &#39;n lang tyd beskryf?
weather-beaten, weathered|verweerde, verweerde
(13) What words refer to studying the weather?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die bestudering van die weer?
meteorology, meteorologist, weatherman|meteorologie, meteoroloog, weerman
(14) What instruments are used to study the weather?|(14) Watter instrumente word gebruik om die weer te studeer?
thermometer, barometer, weathervane|termometer, barometer, weathervane
(15) What words refer to a report about the weather?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n verslag oor die weer?
weather forecast, weather report, the weather, the outlook|weervoorspelling, weer verslag van die weer, die vooruitsigte
Wind|Wind
Use this domain for words related to the wind. Some words refer to when the wind begins and ends. The wind changes in speed, so some words refer to how fast the wind is moving. Try to rank these on a scale from very slow to very fast. These words may also be distinguished by what the wind does, since a fast wind does more things. These words may also be distinguished by how long the wind blows. Some words refer to the speed of the wind becoming faster or slower. Some words distinguish a steady wind from a wind in which the speed keeps changing. Some words refer to when the speed of the wind becomes faster for a short time. A steady wind moves in a particular direction, so there are words that include the direction of the wind. The direction of the wind may refer to the points of the compass, a neighboring geographical feature or area, or the direction in which the speaker is moving. Some words refer to a wind that moves in a small circle, making a pillar of dust or a funnel-shaped cloud. Some words refer to what the wind does, such as when it moves or damages something. People can feel the wind, so some words refer to how it feels. The wind makes noise, so there are words that refer to the sound of the wind. In some cultures there is a relation between the wind and spirits, so some words may refer to the activity of the spirits in the wind, or that the wind brings disease.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die wind. Sommige woorde verwys na wanneer die wind begin en eindig. Die wind veranderinge in spoed, so &#39;n paar woorde verwys na hoe vinnig die wind beweeg. Probeer om hierdie rang op &#39;n skaal van baie stadig om baie vinnig. Hierdie woorde kan ook onderskei word deur wat die wind nie, aangesien &#39;n vinnige wind doen meer dinge. Hierdie woorde kan ook onderskei word hoe lank die wind waai. Sommige woorde verwys na die spoed van die wind raak vinniger of stadiger. Sommige woorde onderskei &#39;n bestendige wind uit &#39;n wind wat die spoed bly maar verander. Sommige woorde verwys na wanneer die spoed van die wind raak vinniger vir &#39;n kort tyd. &#39;N bestendige wind beweeg in &#39;n bepaalde rigting, so daar is woorde wat die rigting van die wind in te sluit. Die rigting van die wind kan verwys na die punte van die kompas, &#39;n naburige geografiese kenmerk of area, of die rigting waarin die spreker beweeg. Sommige woorde verwys na &#39;n wind wat beweeg in &#39;n klein sirkel, &#39;n pilaar van stof of &#39;n tregtervormige wolk. Sommige woorde verwys na wat die wind nie, soos wanneer dit beweeg of skade iets. Mense kan voel die wind, so &#39;n paar woorde verwys na hoe dit voel. Die wind maak geraas, so daar is woorde wat verwys na die geluid van die wind. In sommige kulture is daar &#39;n verband tussen die wind en geeste, so &#39;n paar woorde kan verwys na die aktiwiteit van die geeste in die wind, of dat die wind bring siekte.
(1) What general words refer to the wind?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die wind?
wind, windy, wind current|wind, winderige, wind huidige
(2) What words describe a wind that only lasts a short time?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n wind wat net &#39;n kort tyd duur?
breath of air, puff of wind, gust, blast, flurry|asem van die lug, puff van die wind, vlaag, ontploffing, gejaagd
(3) What words describe a steady wind?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n bestendige wind?
steady wind, trade wind, monsoon winds|bestendige wind, handel wind, moesonwinde
(4) What words describe a wind that comes and goes?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n wind wat kom en gaan?
intermittent, gusty, blustery|onderbroke, rukkerige, winderige
(5) What words describe a strong wind?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n sterk wind?
heavy wind, strong wind, squall, gale, stormy wind, howling wind|swaar wind, &#39;n sterk wind, rukwind, stormsterk, stormagtige wind, huilende wind
(6) What words describe a light wind?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n ligte wind?
light wind, gentle wind, draft, draught, breeze, breezy, zephyr|ligte wind, sagte wind, konsep, ontwerp, wind, winderig, Zephyr
(7) What words describe a windstorm?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n windstorm?
windstorm, sandstorm, tempest, tempestuous|windstorm, sandstorm, storm, stormwind
(8) What words refer to a wind that moves in a circle?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n wind wat beweeg in &#39;n sirkel?
whirlwind, tornado, twister, dust devil, funnel, waterspout|storm tornado, draaier, duiwel stof, tregter, waterspout
(9) What words refer to a warm or cold wind?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n warm of koue wind?
Chinook, sirocco|Chinook, sirocco
(10) What words describe when the wind begins?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf word wanneer die wind begin?
pick up, rise, freshen, gather, blow up|haal, styg, verfrissend, versamel, blaas
(11) What words describe when the wind stops?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf word wanneer die wind tot stilstand kom?
drop, die down, calm, still|drop, sterf af, kalm, steeds
(12) What words describe the direction of the wind?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf die rigting van die wind?
north/south/east/west wind, northeaster, wind off the ocean, ocean breeze, wind from the mountains, mountain breeze, wind from the desert, updraft, downdraft, head wind, tail wind, following wind, cross breeze, windward, lee, prevailing|noord / suid / oos / wes wind, noordoostenwind, wind uit die see, see briesie, wind uit die berge, berge wind, wind uit die woestyn, opwaartse stroom, valstroom, hoof wind, stert wind, volgende wind, kruis briesie, windkant, Lee, heersende
(13) What does the wind do?|(13) Wat beteken die wind doen?
blow, knock down (things), rip, tear off, bend, puff out, billow out (sail), push (boat), raise (waves), fan flames, push snow into drifts, ventilate a house|blaas, klop (dinge), rip, skeur, buig, puff uit branders uit (seil), stoot (boot), in te samel (golwe), fan vlamme, druk die sneeu in dryf, &#39;n huis te ventileer
(14) What words describe something being blown by the wind?|(14) Watter woorde beskryf iets geblaas deur die wind?
be blown by the wind, wind blows something, blow away, waft on the breeze, flutter in the breeze, be carried by the wind, be born along on/by the wind, be picked up by the wind|word geblaas deur die wind, wind waai iets, blaas weg, sliertje op die wind, fladder in die wind, wat deur die wind gedra word, word gebore saam op / deur die wind, opgetel word deur die wind
(15) What instruments are used to measure the direction or force of the wind?|(15) Watter instrumente word gebruik om die rigting of krag van die wind te meet?
weathervane, weathercock, windsock, wind gauge|weathervane, weerhaan, windkous, windmeter
(16) What sounds does the wind make?|(16) Wat klink nie die wind maak?
whisper, sigh, moan, whistle, howl, scream, shriek|fluister, sug, kreun, fluitjie, huil, skree, gil
Cloud|Wolk
Use this domain for words related to the clouds.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die wolke.
(1) What words refer to a cloud?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n wolk?
cloud|wolk
(2) What do clouds do?|(2) Wat doen wolke doen?
rain, build, rise, gather, disperse, billow, blow, blown by the wind, move across the sky, threatening, shadow, obscure, hide (the sun)|reën, bou, styging, versamel, versprei, branders, blaas, geblaas deur die wind, beweeg deur die lug, dreig, skaduwee, onduidelik, hide (die son)
(3) What words describe different kinds of clouds?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf verskillende soorte wolke?
storm clouds, rain cloud, cumulus, thunderhead, anvil shaped, billowing, nimbus, fluffy, cirrus, wispy, vapor trail, haze, hazy, fog, foggy, mist, misty, steam, vapor, band, smog, fume, cloud of smoke|storm wolke, reën wolk cumulus, Thunderhead, aambeeld vormige, deinend, nimbus, sagte, cirrus, yl, damp roete, waas, wasige, mis, mistige, mis, mistige, stoom, stoom, band, rookmis, rook, wolk van rook
(4) What words describe how many clouds are in the sky?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf hoe baie wolke in die lug?
cloudy, cloud up, cloud cover, be clouded over, overcast, partly cloudy, scattered clouds, gray, dull, foggy|bewolk, vertroebel up, wolkbedekking, vertroebel oor, bewolkte, gedeeltelik bewolk, versprei wolke, grys, vaal, mistig
Rain|Reën

(2) What does the rain do?|(2) Wat beteken die reën doen?
rain (v), fall, pelt, splatter, drench, water (v)|reën (v), val, pels, geplas, deurdrenking, water (v)
(3) What words describe the weather when it is raining?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf die weer wanneer dit reën?
rainy, wet|reën, nat
(4) What words refer to when the rain stops?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer die reën?
stop raining|ophou reën
(5) What words describe how hard it is raining?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf hoe moeilik dit reën?
sprinkle, drizzle, light rain, shower, pour, downpour, cloudburst, rainstorm, hard/heavy/driving rain, torrential, deluge, thundershower|sprinkel, motreën, ligte reën, stort, gooi, reën, wolkbreuk, reënstorm, hard / swaar / ry reën, stort, vloed, Donderbui
(6) What words describe when it rains a lot?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf wanneer dit reën &#39;n baie?
rainy season, monsoon, the rains|reënseisoen monsoon, die reën
(7) What is a single drop of rain?|(7) Wat is &#39;n enkele druppel reën?
raindrop, drop,|reëndruppel, drop,
(8) What words refer to rain water on the ground?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die reën water op die grond?
rainwater, puddle, run-off|reënwater, plas, afloop
(9) What sound does the rain make?|(9) Wat klank nie die reën te maak?
pitter-patter, drum, drip drip|getikketak, drom, drup-drup
(10) What words refer to a rainbow?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n reënboog?
rainbow|reënboog
(11) What words refer to dew?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na dou?
dew, dewdrop, (ground is) damp with dew, moisture|dou doudruppel, (grond is) klam dou, vog
(12) What do people use to protect themselves from the rain?|(12) Wat doen die mense gebruik om hulself te beskerm teen die reën?
umbrella, raincoat, boot|sambreel, reënjas, boot
Snow, ice|Sneeu, ys

(2) What does the snow do?|(2) Wat beteken die sneeu te doen?
snow (v), fall, snowfall, drift, blow, cover (the ground), blanket (v), snow in|sneeu (v), val, sneeu, drif, blaas, dek (die grond), kombers (v), sneeu in
(3) What words refer to a piece of snow or ice?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stukkie van die ys of sneeu?
snowflake, hailstone, block of ice, ice cube|sneeuvlokkie, haelkorrel, blok ys, ysblokkie

ice, drift, snowbank, blanket, snow cover, dusting, icicle, sheet of ice, iceberg, glacier|ys, drif, sneeu hoop, kombers, sneeu bedek, afstof, icicle, vel ys, ysberg, gletser

glacier, snowcap, snowfield, avalanche|Glacier, snowcap, snowfield, stortvloed
(6) What words refer to frost (frozen dew)?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na ryp (bevrore dou)?

(7) What do people do with snow?|(7) Wat doen mense met sneeu?

(8) What do people make with snow?|(8) Wat doen die mense te maak met sneeu?
snowball, snowman, igloo|sneeubal, sneeuman, igloo
(9) What tools do people use with snow?|(9) Watter gereedskap gebruik mense met sneeu?
ice axe, snow shovel, snowplow|ys byl, sneeu graaf, Snowplow
(10) What words refer to moving on snow or ice?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg op die sneeu of ys?
ski, skate, sled, sleigh, sledge, snowshoes, skis, ice-skates, slide, slip|ski, skate, slee, slee, sleë, sneeuwschoenen, ski&#39;s, ys-skaats, skuif, glip
(11) What words refer to water turning into ice?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na water draai in ys?
freeze, frozen, ice over/up|vries, bevrore, ys oor / op
(12) What words refer to snow and ice turning into water?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die sneeu en ys draai in water?
melt, melt water, thaw, slush, turn to slush|smelt, smelt water, ontdooi, omkoopgeld, draai om omkoopgeld
(13) What words refer to frozen ground?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na bevrore grond?
permafrost|ysgrond
(14) What words describe a time when it snows?|(14) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd wanneer dit sneeu?
snowy|snowy
(15) What words describe something that has snow or ice on it?|(15) Watter woorde iets wat die sneeu of ys het op dit te beskryf?
snowy, snow covered, icy, frosty|snowy, sneeu bedek, ysige, koue

(9) What words refer to snow on a mountain?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die sneeu op &#39;n berg?

(10) What words refer to rocks at the bottom of a mountain?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die rotse aan die onderkant van &#39;n berg?

(12) What do people do to mountains?|(12) Wat doen mense om berge?

(13) What words refer to a place you can travel through the mountains?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar jy kan reis deur die berge?
pass, tunnel|slaag, tonnel
Volcano|Volcano
Use this domain for words related to volcanoes.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vulkane.
(1) What words refer to a volcano?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vulkaan?
volcano, volcanic|vulkaan, vulkaniese
(2) What are the parts of a volcano?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n vulkaan?
cone, cinder cone, core of a volcano, crater, lava flow|cone, slak cone, kern van &#39;n vulkaan, krater, lawa vloei
(3) What do volcanoes do?|(3) Wat doen vulkane doen?
erupt, eruption, spew (gas, lava, ash), explode, blow, produce a cloud, cause earthquakes, bury things (under lava, ash), smoke|uitbars, uitbarsting, spuug (gas, lawa, as), ontplof, blaas, produseer &#39;n wolk, aardbewings veroorsaak, te begrawe dinge (onder lawa, as), rook
(4) What do volcanoes produce?|(4) Wat doen vulkane te produseer?
lava, molten lava, volcanic ash, cloud of ash, ash flow, pyroclastic flow, volcanic cinder, volcanic glass (obsidian), pumice, thunder egg|lava, gesmelte lawa, vulkaniese as, wolk van as, as vloei, piroklastiese vloei, vulkaniese lava, vulkaniese glas (obsidiaan), puimsteen, donderweer eier
(5) What words refer to whether a volcano is erupting or not?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na of &#39;n vulkaan uitbars is of nie?
active, dormant, extinct|aktiewe, dormant, uitgesterf
Plain, plateau|Plain, plato
Use this domain for words referring to land that is flat.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die land wat plat.
(1) What words refer to land that is flat?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die land wat plat?
plain, plateau, prairie, steppe, savanna, tundra, heath, mesa, field, meadow, pasture, flatland, tableland, bottomland, lowland, level ground, lowlands|plain, plato, prairie, steppe, savanna, toendra, Heath, mesa, veld, wei, weiding, Flatland, gelykveld, bottomland, Laeveld vlak grond, laaglande
(2) What words describe land that is flat?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf land wat plat?
flat, level, even|plat, vlak, selfs
(3) What words a place that is not very flat?|(3) Watter woorde &#39;n plek wat nie baie plat?
uneven, dip, depression, basin, rut, rutted|ongelyke, dip, depressie, wasbak, groef, bronstig
Valley|Valley
Use this domain for words related to valleys.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dale.
(1) What types of valleys are there?|(1) Watter tipes dale is daar?
valley, ravine, gully, canyon, gulch, course, basin, channel, gorge, rift, wadi, depression|vallei, kloof, sloot, canyon, kloof, natuurlik, wasbak, kanaal, kloof, kloof, wadi, depressie
(2) What words describe valleys?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf dale?
narrow, broad, deep|smal, breed, diep
Underground|Underground
Use this domain for words referring to the area under the ground, and to holes in the ground.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die gebied onder die grond, en om gate in die grond.
(1) What words refer to the area under the surface of the earth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gebied onder die oppervlak van die aarde?
underground, below ground, subterranean, abyss, bedrock, core, mantle, stratum, subsoil|ondergrondse, onder die grond, ondergrondse, afgrond, grondslag, kern, mantel, stratum, ondergrond
(2) What words refer to natural holes in the ground?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na natuurlike gate in die grond?
hole, cave, cavern, grotto, opening, crack, depression, hollow, cavity, channel, chasm, cleft, cranny, crater, crevasse, crevice, depression, dip, mud hole, pit, sinkhole, mouth of a cave|gat, grot grot, grot, opening, crack, depressie, hol, holte, kanaal, kloof, gesplete, skeur, krater, kloof, skeur, depressie, dip, modder gat, put, sinkgat, mond van &#39;n grot
(3) What words refer to man-made holes in the ground?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na mensgemaakte gate in die grond?
conduit, culvert, ditch, foxhole, mine, pit, pothole, rut, subway, shaft, trench, trough, tunnel, well,|watervoor, duiker, sloot, Foxhole, myne, put, slaggat, groef, metro, steel, sloot, trog, tonnel, goed,
(4) What words refer to a hole made by an animal?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n gat deur &#39;n dier?
burrow, den, foxhole, lair|grawe, den, Foxhole, lêplek
(5) What words refer to water under the ground?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na water onder die grond?
aquifer, underground river|waterdraer, ondergrondse rivier
Forest, grassland, desert|Forest, grasveld, woestyn
Use this domain for words referring to an area of land that has particular types of plants growing in it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n gebied van die land wat bepaalde tipes plante groei in dit.
(1) What words refer to the types of plants that grow in an area?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die tipes plante wat groei in &#39;n gebied?
ecosystem, vegetation|ekosisteem, plantegroei
(2) What words refer to a forest or group of trees?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n bos of groep bome?
forest, forested, rain forest, grove, wood, wooded, woodland, woods, thicket, jungle, taiga, orchard|bos, beboste, reën bos, bos, hout, beboste, bos, bos, bos, oerwoud, taiga, boord
(3) What are the parts of a forest?|(3) Wat is die dele van &#39;n bos?
forest canopy, forest floor, underbrush, undergrowth, edge (of the forest), deep in the forest, backwoods, timberland|bos kap, bos vloer, onderbos, bome, rand (van die bos), diep in die bos, binneland, Timberland
(4) What words refer to a place in a forest where there are no trees?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n plek in &#39;n bos waar daar geen bome?
meadow, clearing|Meadow, skoonmaak
(5) What words refer to land covered by grass or bushes?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na grond wat deur gras of bosse?
grassland, prairie, savannah, bush, moor, moorland, brush, brake, heath, scrubby, scrubland, shrubby, steppe, tundra, veldt|grasveld, prairie, savanna, bos, moor, heide, borsel, rem, Heath, struike, kreupel hout, struikagtige, steppe, toendra, veld
(6) What words refer to land where many plants grow?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die land waar baie plante groei?
lush, dense, thick, overgrown,|welige, digte, dik, toegegroei,
(7) What words refer to land where very few plants grow?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die land waar baie min plante groei?
desert, wasteland, oasis|woestyn, woeste, oase
(8) What words refer to land where no people live?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die land waar geen mense woon?
wilderness, uninhabited, frontier, hinterland, outback|woestyn, onbewoon, grens, hinterland, Outback
Earthquake|Aardbewing
Use this domain for words related to earthquakes. In some languages earthquakes are thought of as moving somewhere. In Amele (PNG) they say "mim nen" which means 'the earthquake came down (from above)'. In Northern Embera an earthquake is a "house-shaking". They say "a house-shaking went."|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met aardbewings. In sommige tale aardbewings gedink as iewers beweeg. In Amele (PNG) sê hulle &quot;mim NEN&quot; wat beteken &#39;die aardbewing afgekom (van bo). In Noord Embera &#39;n aardbewing is &#39;n &quot;huis skud&quot;. Hulle sê: &quot;&#39;n huis-skud het.&quot;
(1) What words refer to earthquakes?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na aardbewings?
earthquake, quake, tremor, temblor, shock, seismic, upheaval|aardbewing aardbewing, tremor, aardbewing, skok, seismiese, omwenteling
(2) What do earthquakes do?|(2) Wat doen aardbewings doen?
rock (house, ground), shake (house, ground), crack (ground), knock down (things), cause (buildings) to collapse, ground splits, earth shifts|rock (huis, grond), skud (huis, grond), crack (grond), klop (dinge), oorsaak (geboue) te val, grond split, aarde skofte
(3) Where do earthquakes occur?|(3) Waar aardbewings voorkom?
earthquake fault, fault line, epicenter, fissure|aardbewing skuld, skuld lyn, middelpunt, groef
(4) What words refer to a large wave caused by an earthquake?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groot golf veroorsaak deur &#39;n aardbewing?
tidal wave, tsunami,|vloedgolf, tsoenami,
Substance, matter|Stof, materie
Use this domain for general words referring to matter--what something is made out of, or a type of solid, liquid, or gas.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na saak - wat iets is gemaak van, of &#39;n tipe van vaste stof, vloeistof, of gas.
(1) What general words refer to matter?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na saak?
substance, stuff, matter, material,|stof, stuff, saak, materiaal,
(2) What words refer to something found naturally that people could use?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets natuurlik gevind dat mense kan gebruik?
natural resources, raw materials|natuurlike hulpbronne, grondstowwe
(3) What words refer to the study of matter?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die studie van materie?
chemistry|chemie
Soil, dirt|Grond, vuil
Use this domain for words referring to soil and dirt.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na grond en vuil.
(1) What words refer to soil?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na grond?
soil, topsoil, earth, earthen, ground, loam, clay, dirt, dirty, sand, sandy|grond, bogrond, aarde, klei, grond, sand, klei, vuil, vuil, sand, sand
(2) What words describe the quality of the soil?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die gehalte van die grond?
fertile, infertile, poor, rich|vrugbare, onvrugbare, arm, ryk
(3) What words refer to a piece of dirt?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stukkie van die vuil?
clod, clump, lump (of clay), grain of sand|klont, bos, knop (klei), korrel sand
(4) What words refer to dirt mixed with water?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na vuil gemeng met water?
mud, muddy, mud puddle, mire, miry, muck, goo, ooze|modder, modderige, modder plas, modder, moerasse, muck, goo, modder
(5) What does mud do?|(5) Wat beteken modder te doen?
splatter, splash, stick, squish|geplas, splash, stok, suig
(6) What words refer to dry dirt?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na droog vuil?
dust, dust cloud, dust storm|stof, stof wolk stof storm
(7) What does dust do?|(7) Wat beteken stof doen?
raise, stir up, settle, hang in the air, fly, cling (to clothes)|samel, wek, vestig, hang in die lug vlieg, klou (klere)
(8) What words refer to the dirt on the top of the ground with grass in it?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die vuil op die top van die grond met gras in dit?
topsoil, sod|bogrond, sooi
(9) What words refer to soil being washed away by rain?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die grond weggespoel deur reën?
erode, erosion,|erodeer, erosie,
Rock|Rock
Use this domain for words referring to rock.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na rock.
(1) What general words refer to a rock?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n rots?
rock, stone, bedrock|rots, klip, rots
(2) What words refer to the size of a rock?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die grootte van &#39;n rots?
crag, rocky outcropping, boulder, rock, stone, pebble, gravel, sand, grit, powder|rots, rotsagtige outcropping, rots, rock, klip, klippie, gruis, sand, gruis, poeier
(3) What types of rocks are there?|(3) Wat tipes gesteentes is daar?
granite, sedimentary, igneous, metamorphic, pumice, shale, quartz, flint, marble, slate, chalk, sandstone|graniet, sedimentêre, stollings-, metamorfe, puimsteen, skalie, kwarts, keisteen, marmer, lei, kryt, sandsteen
(4) What words describe rocks?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf rotse?
hard, soft, sharp, smooth|hard, sag, skerp, gladde
(5) What words describe ground with lots of rocks in it?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf grond met baie van die rotse in dit?
rocky, stony|rotsagtige, klipperige
(6) What words refer to a piece of rock?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stuk van die rots?
block, slab|blok, blad

aluminum, barium, brass, bronze, chrome, chromium, copper, gold, iron, lead, lithium, magnesium, mercury, molybdenum, nickel, platinum, quicksilver, radium, silver, steel, tin, titanium, tungsten, uranium, zinc|aluminium, barium, koper, brons, chroom, chroom, koper, goud, yster, lood, litium, magnesium, kwik, molibdeen, nikkel, platinum, kwiksilwer, radium, silwer, yster, tin, titanium, wolfram, uraan, sink
(3) What words describe metal?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf metaal?
shiny, luster, malleable, rust, rusty, tarnish, corrode, golden, silvery, polished, alloy, pure, karat, solid, plated|blink, glans, smeebaar, roes, roes, ontluistering, korrodeer, goue, silwer, gepoleerde, aluminium, suiwer, karaat, soliede, oorgetrek
(4) What words refer to a piece of iron that attracts other pieces of iron?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stuk yster wat ander stukke van yster lok?
magnet, magnetic, magnetism, lodestone|magneet, magnetiese, magnetisme, magneetsteen
Mineral|Mineral
Use this domain for naturally occurring elements, compounds, and minerals--things you can find in the ground.|Gebruik hierdie domein natuurlik voorkom elemente, verbindings, en minerale - dinge wat jy kan vind in die grond.
(1) What general words refer to minerals?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na minerale?
mineral, mineral resources, element, chemical, atom, crystal, ore|minerale, minerale hulpbronne, element, chemiese, atoom, kristal, erts
(2) What types of minerals are there?|(2) Watter tipes minerale is daar?
bauxite, borax, brimstone, calcium, carbon, coal, coke, feldspar, gypsum, limestone, magnetite, mica, nitrate, peat, phosphate, phosphorus, pitch, pitchblende, potash, potassium, pyrite, salt, saltpeter, silica, soda, sulfur, talc, tar|bauxiet, boraks, swawel, kalsium, koolstof, steenkool, coke, veldspaat, gips, kalksteen, magnetiet, mika, nitraat, turf, fosfaat, fosfor, toonhoogte, pikblende, potas, kalium, piriet, sout, salpeter, silika, koeldrank, swael, talk, teer
(3) What words refer to the study of minerals?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die studie van minerale?
mineralogy, mineralogist|mineralogie, mineraloog
(4) What words refer to the formation of minerals?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die vorming van minerale?
mineralize, calcify, petrify, vitrify|mineralisen, verkalken, versteend, glas maak
Jewel|Jewel

(2) What types of jewels are there?|(2) Watter juwele is daar?
agate, amethyst, beryl, carnelian, chalcedony, chrysolite, chrysoprase, diamond, emerald, garnet, ivory, jacinth, jasper, marble, onyx, pearl, quartz, ruby, sapphire, sardonyx, topaz|agaat ametis, chrisoliet, karneool chalcedoon, chrisoliet, chrisopraas, diamant, smarag, granaat, ivoor hiasint, Jasper, marmer, oniks, pêrel, kwarts, Ruby, saffier, sardoniks, topaas
(3) What words describe jewels?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf juwele?
precious, semiprecious, facet, glitter, sparkle, lustrous|kosbaar, half, faset, glitter, skitter, glansende
Solid, liquid, gas|Vaste stof, vloeistof, gas
Use this domain for words describing the different states of matter (solid, liquid, and gas), and words for changing from one to another.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf die verskillende fases van materie (vaste stof, vloeistof, gas en), en woorde vir die verandering van die een na die ander.
(1) What words describe the states of matter?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf die fases van materie?
solid, liquid, gas|vaste stof, vloeistof, gas
(2) What words describe the states of water?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die state van water?
ice, water, steam|ys, water, stoom
(3) What words refer to solids changing into liquids?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vaste stowwe verander in vloeistowwe?
melt, melted, melt down, molten, thaw, liquefy, soften, dissolve, soluble|smelt, gesmelt, smelt, gesmelte, ontdooi, vervloei, versag, ontbind, oplosbare
(4) What words refer to liquids changing into solids?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na vloeistowwe verander in vaste stowwe?
solidify, harden, dry, bake, freeze, thicken, stiffen, set, jell, gel, clot, coagulate, coagulation, congeal, crystallize, crystallization, precipitate, precipitation, curdle|stol, verhard, droë, bak, vries, verdik, styf, stel, jel, gel, stol, stol, koagulasie, stol, kristalliseer, kristallisasie, neerslag, neerslag, skif
(5) What words refer to gases changing into liquids?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na gasse verander in vloeistowwe?
condense, condensation, dew, distill|kondenseer, kondensasie, dou, distilleer
(6) What words refer to liquids changing into gases?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na vloeistowwe verander in gasse?
boil, evaporate, evaporation, vaporize, steam|kook, verdamp, verdamping, verdamp, stoom
(7) What words refer to the temperature at which things change?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die temperatuur waarteen dinge verander?
melting point, freezing point, dew point, boiling point|smeltpunt, vriespunt, dou, kookpunt
Liquid|Liquid
Use this domain for words referring to liquids.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na vloeistowwe.
(1) What general words refer to liquid?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na vloeibare?
liquid, fluid, moisture|vloeistof, vloeistof, vog
(2) What words describe something that is liquid?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat vloeibare beskryf?
liquid (adj), molten|vloeistof (adj), gesmelte
(3) What words describe liquids?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf vloeistowwe?
liquid (state), juicy, wet|vloeistof (staat), sappige, nat
(4) What words describe a liquid that is almost solid?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vloeistof wat amper soliede?
thick, stiff, creamy, smooth, lumpy, viscid, viscous, paste, concentrated|dik, stywe, romerige, gladde, klonterig, taai, klewerige, plak, gekonsentreer
(5) What words refer to making a liquid thicker?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n vloeistof dikker?
thicken, concentrate|verdik, konsentreer
(6) What words refer to becoming thicker?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na besig dikker?
thicken, get thicker, set, congeal, clot|verdik, kry dikker, stel, stol, klont
(7) What words refer to how thick or thin a liquid is?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na hoe dik of dun &#39;n vloeistof is?
thickness, consistency, viscosity|dikte, konsekwentheid, viskositeit
(8) What words describe a liquid that is very fluid?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vloeistof wat baie vloeistof?
fluid, watery, thin, runny, diluted|vloeistof, waterige, dun, loperige, verwaterde
(9) What words refer to making a liquid thinner?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n vloeistof dunner?
dilute|verdun
(10) What words refer to the top of a liquid?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die top van &#39;n vloeistof?
surface|oppervlak
(11) What words refer to the thick part that can form on the top of a liquid?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die dik deel wat op die top van &#39;n vloeistof kan vorm?
skin, scum, crust, slime, slimy,|vel, roes, kors, slyk, slymerige,
(12) What words refer to removing the thick part on top?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die verwydering van die dik deel op die top?
skim|afgeroomde
(13) What words describe a liquid with lumps in it?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vloeistof met knoppe in dit?
lumpy, smooth|klonterig, gladde
(14) What words refer to bubbles in or on a liquid?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na borrels in of op &#39;n vloeistof?
bubble (n), bubble (v), bubbly, suds, foam|borrel (n), borrel (v), bubbly, Suds, skuim
Oil|Oil
Use this domain for words referring to oil.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na olie.
(1) What general words refer to oil?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na olie?
oil, grease, lubricant|olie, vet, smeermiddel
(2) What types of oil are there?|(2) Watter tipes olie is daar?
petroleum, petrol, gasoline, gas, diesel, kerosene, paraffin, crude oil, mineral oil, ointment, liniment, lotion, Vaseline, glycerin|petroleum, petrol, petrol, gas, diesel, keroseen, paraffien, ru-olie, minerale olie, salf, salf, lotion, Vaseline, glycerine
(3) What types of oil are made from plants and animals?|(3) Watter tipes olie is gemaak van plante en diere?
vegetable oil, cream, lard, fat, wax, tallow, beeswax, soap|groente-olie, room, spek, vet, was, vet, byewas, seep
(4) What words describe oil?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf olie?
oily, greasy, slippery, slick, slimy, smooth, lubricating, fatty, gummy, mucous, soapy|olierige, vetterige, gladde, gladde, slymerige, gladde, smeer, vetterige, Gummy, slym, seperige
(5) What words refer to some oil on something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n paar olie op iets?
drop of oil, oil slick, blob, glob, soap (v)|druppel olie, oliekol, blob, glob, seep (v)
(6) What words refer to putting oil on something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na om olie op iets?
lubricate, lubrication, lube, oil (v), anoint, rub, salve, slick, smear, grease (v)|Smeer, smering, lube, olie (v), salf, vryf, salf, gladde, smeer, vet (v)
Gas|Gas
Use this domain for words referring to gas.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na gas.
(1) What general words refer to gas?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na gas?
gas, gaseous, vapor, mist, air, fume, steam, steamy, cloud (of gas), plume (of steam)|gas, gasagtige dampe, mis, lug, rook, stoom, stomende, wolk (gas), plume (stoom)
(2) What types of gas are there?|(2) Watter gas is daar?
natural gas, oxygen, carbon dioxide, ozone, hydrogen, nitrogen, helium, neon|natuurlike gas, suurstof, koolstofdioksied, osoon, waterstof, stikstof, helium, neon
(3) What words describe gas?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf gas?
noxious (fumes), poisonous gas|skadelike (dampe), giftige gas
(4) What words refer to the production of gas?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die produksie van gas?
produce gas, give off fumes|produseer gas, dampe afgee
(5) What words refer to the movement of gas?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die beweging van gas?
spread, drift, creep along the ground, vapor trail, rise|verspreiding, drif, kruip op die grond, damp roete, aanleiding
Water|Water
Use this domain for general words referring to water.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na water.
(1) What general words refer to water?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na water?
water, H2O, moisture|water, H2O, vog
(2) What words describe something that belongs to the water or is found in water?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat behoort aan die water of in water te beskryf?
watery, aquatic, amphibious|waterige, water, amfibiese
(3) What words describe something that water cannot pass through?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat water nie kan deurgaan beskryf?
waterproof, watertight|waterdig, waterdigte
Bodies of water|Liggame van water
Use this domain for general words referring to bodies of water.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die liggame van water.
(1) What general words refer to a body of water?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n liggaam van water?
body of water, hydrosphere|liggaam van water, hidrosfeer
(2) What words describe something belonging to the water?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat aan die water te beskryf?
marine, oceanic, riverine|mariene, oseaniese, rivier-
Ocean, lake|Ocean, Lake
Use this domain for words referring to bodies of standing water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na liggame van staande water.
(1) What words refer to bodies of standing water of different sizes?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na liggame van staande water van verskillende groottes?
ocean, sea, lake, pond, pool, puddle, wallow|oseaan, see, meer, dam, swembad, plas, neerslaan
(2) What words refer to a man-made lake?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n mensgemaakte meer?
reservoir, man-made lake, catchment area|reservoir, mensgemaakte meer, opvanggebied
(3) What are the parts of bodies of water?|(3) Wat is die dele van die liggame van water?
surface, bottom, abyssal depths, abyssal plain, thermal layer, seamount, continental shelf, shallows, the depths, the deep, open sea|oppervlak, onder, abissale dieptes, abissale plain, termiese laag, onderzeese berg, kontinentale plat, vlak water, die dieptes, die diep, oop see
(4) What words refer to the study of the ocean?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die studie van die oseaan?
oceanography|oseanografie
Swamp|Moeras
Use this domain for words referring to bodies of standing water with plants growing in them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na liggame van staande water met plante groei in hulle.
(1) What words refer to shallow bodies of standing water with plants growing in them?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vlak liggame van staande water met plante groei in hulle?
swamp, swampland, wetland, marsh, marshland, bog, delta, estuary, bayou, morass|moeras, moeras, vleiland, moeras, moeras, moeras, delta, riviermonding, Bayou, moeras
(2) What words describe an area that is a swamp?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gebied wat &#39;n moeras?
swampy, marshy, boggy|moerasagtige, moerasagtige, Natte
(3) What words refer to moving through a swamp?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg deur &#39;n moeras?
get bogged down, sink|kry vasgeval, sink
River|River
Use this domain for words referring to bodies of flowing water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na liggame van vloeiende water.
(1) What words refer to rivers of different sizes?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na riviere van verskillende groottes?
river, stream, streamlet, creek, brook, brooklet, rill, rivulet|rivier, stroom, stroompie, spruit, spruit BROOKLET, vlieten, stroompie
(2) What words refer to a river when it has a lot of water?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n rivier as dit het &#39;n baie water?
flood, torrent, flash flood, freshet, swell, surge|vloed, torrent, flits vloed, zoetwater stoom, swel, oplewing
(3) What words refer to a river overflowing its banks?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n rivier sy walle?
overflow its banks, flood, deluge|oorloop sy walle, vloed, stortvloed
(4) What words refer to two rivers coming together?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na twee riviere bymekaar kom?
branch, confluence, fork, tributary|tak, samevloeiing, vurk, sytak
(5) What words refer to a part of a river that is steep?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van &#39;n rivier wat is steil?
waterfall, falls, rapids, cascade, cataract, spillway, race|waterval val, stroomversnellings, waterval, katarak, oorloop, ras
(6) What are the parts of a river?|(6) Wat is die dele van &#39;n rivier?
source, head, headwaters, mouth, upstream, downstream, bend, whirlpool, eddy, river bottom, riverbed, backwater, narrows, oxbow|bron, kop, bolope, mond, stroomop, stroomaf, buig, jacuzzi, eddy, rivier onderkant, rivierbedding dood water, vernou, Oxbow
(7) What words refer to a river when it has no water?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n rivier as dit geen water?
watercourse, dry riverbed, wash, arroyo, wadi|waterloop, droë rivierloop, wash, arroyo, wadi
(8) What words refer to a man-made river?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n mensgemaakte rivier?
canal|kanaal
(9) What words refer to a place to cross a river?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek om &#39;n rivier oor te steek?
bridge, ford|brug, Ford
(10) What words refer to something floating down a river or caught in it?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets dryf af &#39;n rivier of vasgevang in dit?
flotsam, snag, logjam|opdrifsels, INVOEGEN, opeenhoping
(11) What words refer to dirt, sand, and rocks washed down by a river?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die vuil, sand, en die rotse af deur &#39;n rivier gewas?
sandbar, delta, alluvium, alluvial, silt,|sandbank, delta, alluvium, alluviale, slik,
(12) What words refer to the area of land drained by a river?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die gebied van die land deur die rivier gedreineer?
watershed, basin|waterskeiding, wasbak
(13) What words refer to the movement of a river?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die beweging van &#39;n rivier?
current, flow|stroom, vloei
Spring, well|Spring, goed

spring up, well up, bubble up, flow out of|opstaan, goed op, borrel, vloei uit
Island, shore|Island, strand
Use this domain for words referring to land in contrast with the sea or river.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die land in teenstelling met die see of rivier.
land (and sea), dry land, mainland, continent, inland, interior, terrestrial|land (en die see), droë land, die vasteland, kontinent, binnelandse, binneland, aardse
(2) What words refer to an island?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n eiland?
island, isle, islet, archipelago, atoll, key|eiland, eiland, eiland, argipel, atol, sleutel

shore, beach, coast, coastal, coastland, seaboard, seashore, shoreline, foreshore, edge, strand, reef, coral reef, water-front, strip,|strand, see, kus, kus, kus, kus, strand, kuslyn, strandgebied, rand, strand, rif, koraalrif, water-front, strook,
(4) What words refer to a bay?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n baai?

peninsula, promontory, cape|skiereiland, Promontory, kaap

bank, riverbank, levee, sandbar, embankment|bank, rivieroewer, rivierdijk, sandbank, wal
(7) What words describe something near water?|(7) Wat woorde iets naby water te beskryf?
seaside, beachfront, lakeside, bordering|see, strand, Lakeside, aangrensend
(8) What words refer to a place where the water is shallow?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar die water is vlak?
shallows, shoal,|vlak water, troep,
Movement of water|Beweging van water
Use this domain for words referring to the way in which water and other liquids move.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die manier waarop water en ander vloeistowwe beweeg.
(1) What words refer to water moving into something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na water beweeg in iets?
fill, flow in, inflow, infuse, infusion, run into|vul, vloei in, invloei, trek, infusie, loop in
(2) What words refer to water coming out of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na water uit te kom van iets?
spray, bleed, blow, burst, discharge, drain, gush, issue, jet, pour, pouring, run, spew, spout, dribble, drip, effusion, erupt, exude, ooze, outflow, percolate, seep, spout, squirt, sweat, vomit, tap|spuit, bloei, blaas, bars, ontslag, dreineer, stroom, kwessie, jet, gooi, gooi, hardloop, spuug, spuit, dribbel, drup, effusie, uitbars, straal, straal, uitvloei, perkoleer, sypel, tuit, spuit, sweet, braaksel, tap
(3) What words refer to water breaking into drops?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na water breek in druppels?
splash, spray|splash, spuit
(4) What words refer to water forming bubbles?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na water vorming borrels?
bubble, foam, foaming, froth, whip|borrel, skuim, skuim, skuim, sweep
Flow|Vloei
Use this domain for words referring to the way water moves over a surface, such as in a river or along the ground.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die manier waarop water beweeg oor &#39;n oppervlak, soos in &#39;n rivier of op die grond.
(1) What words refer to water moving over a surface?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na water beweeg oor &#39;n oppervlak?
flow, run, stream, current, rise, fall, flood, overflow, to wind, meander, erode, split, merge, roil, surge, torrent, trickle, effluence, spread, permeate,|vloei, stroom, stroom, styg, val, vloed, oorloop, na aanleiding, meander, erodeer, verdeel, saam te smelt, troebel maak, oplewing, torrent, druppel, uitvloeisel, verspreiding, deurdring,
(2) What words refer to water moving in a river?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na water wat in &#39;n rivier?
flow, current, whirlpool|vloei, stroom, jacuzzi
(3) What words refer to water washing away dirt?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na water afwassing vuil?

(4) What words refer to water draining out of something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na water dreineer uit iets?
drain, bleed, discharge, draw off, empty, leak, ooze, strain,|dreineer, bloei, ontslag, teken af, leeg, lek, modder, stam,
Pour|Gooi
Use this domain for words referring to water coming out of something (such as a container), or causing water to come out of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na water uit te kom van iets (soos &#39;n houer), of veroorsaak dat water uit iets om te kom.
(1) What words refer to water coming out of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na water uit te kom van iets?
pour, come out, flow, drip, leak, ooze, gush, spurt, squirt|gooi, kom uit, vloei, drup, lek, modder, stroom, gulp, spuit
(2) What words refer to pouring water out of a container?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na gietende water uit &#39;n houer?
pour, tip, sprinkle, empty, spill, decant|gooi, tip, sprinkel, leeg, storting, decanteren
(3) What words refer to putting water on something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na om water op iets?
water (v), add water, put water on,|water (v), voeg water, gooi water op,
(4) What words refer to putting drops of water on something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na om druppels water op iets?
sprinkle (with water), splash (water on), spray (water on), drizzle, spatter, splatter, squirt,|sprinkel (met water), splash (water op), spuit (water op), motreën, spat, geplas, spuit,
(5) What words refer to putting lots of water on something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na om baie water op iets?
pour (out), empty (v), dump (out), douse, drench, pump,|gooi (uit), leë (v), stort (uit), te blus, deurdrenking, pomp,
(6) What words refer to putting water on something accidentally?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na om water op iets per ongeluk?
spill|storting
(7) What words refer to putting water into something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na om water in iets?
inject,|spuit,
Drip|Drip
Use this domain for words referring to drops of water and what they do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na druppels water en wat hulle doen.
(1) What is a drop of water called?|(1) Wat is &#39;n druppel water genoem?
drop (of water/blood), droplet, a drip|drop (water / bloed), druppel, &#39;n drip
(2) What do drops of water do?|(2) Wat doen druppels water doen?
drip, drip on, fall to the ground, splash on, hit, splatter, sprinkle|drup, drup op, op die grond val, spat, getref, geplas, sprinkel
(3) What is a steady dripping called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n bestendige drup genoem?
dripping (of water), steady drip, drip-drip (of water)|drup (water), bestendige drup, drup-drup (water)
Wave|Golf
Use this domain for words related to waves and what they do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die golwe en wat hulle doen.
(1) What types of waves are there?|(1) Watter tipes golwe is daar?
wave, ripple, swell, breaker, billow, surf, tidal wave, tsunami|golf, rimpeleffek, swel, breker, branders, surf, vloedgolf, tsoenami
(2) What are the parts of a wave?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n golf?
crest, trough, curl, foam|kruin, trog, krul, skuim
(3) What words describe the movement of a wave?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf die beweging van &#39;n golf?
surge, move, come roaring down on, race before the wind, wave pattern, violence of the waves, undertow, toss|oplewing, te beweeg, kom neer op brullende, ras voor die wind, golf patroon, geweld van die golwe, onderstroom, gooi
(4) What do waves do when they hit the shore?|(4) Wat doen golwe doen wanneer hulle druk op die strand?
hit the shore, break on the shore/rocks, break against, break over, crash against, crash down on, lap against, wash against the shore, gentle wash of the waves|druk op die strand, breek op die strand / rotse breek teen, breek oor, crash teen, crash neer op, skoot teen, was teen die strand, sagte wash van die golwe
(5) What words describe a wave getting bigger?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n golf om groter?
swell, mount up, pile up, rise and fall, curl|swel, klim, stapel, styg en val, krul
(6) What do waves do to things?|(6) Wat doen golwe doen om dinge?
wash up on shore, wash out to sea, wash away, erode, wear away, lift, rise and fall with the waves, rock|was op die strand kom, was na die see, weg was, erodeer, dra weg, lift, styg en daal die golwe, rock
(7) What do people do with waves?|(7) Wat doen mense met golwe?
surf, surfboard, ride the waves, dive under|surf, branderplank, ry die golwe, duik onder
(8) What sounds do waves make?|(8) Wat klanke nie golwe te maak?
crash, roar, thunder, thunderous roar, slap|crash, brul, donderweer, donderende brul, klap
Calm, rough|Kalm, rowwe
Use this domain for words describing the surface of water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf die oppervlak van die water.
(1) What words describe the surface of the water when it is calm?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf die oppervlak van die water wanneer dit kalm?
calm, becalmed, quiet, peaceful, tranquil, hardly a ripple, glassy, still, stagnant|kalm, water gelaat, stil, rustige, rustige, skaars &#39;n rimpeling, glasagtige, nog steeds, staande
(2) What words describe the surface of the water when it is rough?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die oppervlak van die water wanneer dit rof?
rough (seas), storm-tossed (sea), raging (sea), seethe, choppy|rowwe (see),-storm geteister (see), woed (see), kook, woelig
(3) What words describe the flow of a river when it is slow?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf die vloei van &#39;n rivier wanneer dit stadig?
slow moving, sluggish, smooth stretch, gentle stretch|stadig bewegende, traag, gladde stuk, sagte rek
(4) What words describe the flow of a river when it is fast?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf die vloei van &#39;n rivier wanneer dit vas?
fast-flowing, white-water (rapids), raging rapids, rough water|vinnig vloeiende, wit-water (stroomversnellings), woed stroomversnellings, rowwe water
(5) What words refer to making water rough?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van water rof?
agitate, churn, stir, whip|Roer, kansellasies, roer, sweep
Tide|Tide
Use this domain for words related to the tide.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gety.
(1) What words refer to the tide?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gety?
tide, rising tide, ebb tide, storm tide, high tide, low tide, the tide is in/out, neap tide|gety, stygende gety, eb gety, storm gety, hoogwater, laagwater, die gety is in / uit, dooiegety
(2) What does the tide do?|(2) Wat beteken die gety te doen?
rise, fall, ebb, come in, go out|styg, val, eb, kom in, gaan uit
(3) What words refer to the area along the shore that the tide covers?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die gebied langs die strand wat die gety dek?

Wet|Wet
Use this domain for words referring to when something has water on it or water has soaked into it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wanneer iets het water op dit of water geweek in dit.
(1) What words describe something that is wet?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat nat is beskryf?
wet, dank, watery, aqueous, sludgy, slush, slushy, sloppy, sweaty|nat, dank, waterige, waterige, modderig, omkoopgeld, modderig, slordige, sweterige
(2) What words describe something that is very wet?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie nat beskryf?
soaked, soaking wet, sopping wet, wringing wet, awash, dripping, sodden, soggy, saturated, waterlogged, be swimming in, drenched, doused|geweek, sopnat, sopnat, wring nat, overspoeld, drup, gekook, pap, versadig, versuip, swem in, deurdrenk, geblus
(3) What words describe something that is slightly wet?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat effens nat te beskryf?
moist, damp, a little wet, clammy, dewy|klam, nat, &#39;n bietjie nat, klam, bedauwd
(4) What words describe the ground when it is wet?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf die grond wanneer dit nat is?
muddy, boggy, marshy, swampy|modderig, Natte, moerasagtige, moerasagtige
(5) What words describe the air when there is water in it?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf die lug wanneer daar water in dit?
humid, moist, muggy, steamy, tropical|vogtige, nat, bedompige, stomende, tropiese
(6) What words describe plants when there is water in them?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf plante wanneer daar water in hulle?
green, juicy, succulent|groen, sappige, sappige
(7) What words refer to something becoming wet?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets raak nat?
get wet, get soaked, bedew|nat, kry geweek, bedauwen
(8) What words refer to making something wet?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets nat?
wet, get something wet, splash, anoint, dabble, daub, douse, spatter, spray, sprinkle|nat, kry iets nat, splash, salf, ploeteraars, smeer, te blus, spat, spuit, sprinkel
(9) What words refer to making something very wet?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets baie nat?
soak, drench, saturate, flood, swamp, deluge|week, deurweek, versadig, vloed, moeras, stortvloed
(10) What words refer to making something slightly wet?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets effens nat?
dampen, moisten, lick|demp, klam, lek
(11) What words refer to something soaking up water?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets absorbeer water?
absorb, blot, daub, soak up, sponge, sop, mop up, wipe up|absorbeer, delg, smeer, suig, spons, sop, verslind, vee up
(12) What words describe something that can soak up water?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat kan geniet water te beskryf?
absorbent, porous|absorberende, poreuse
Dry|Dry
Use this domain for words describing something that is dry.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat droog is beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is dry?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat droog is, beskryf?
dry (adj), dry as a bone, bone-dry, arid, waterless, parched, dehydrated, desiccated, dried, evaporated, sere, withered|droë (adj), droog soos &#39;n been, been-droë, dorre, waterlose, gebraaide, ontwater, droë, gedroogde, verdamp, uitgedroog, verdroog
(2) What words describe the ground when it is dry?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die grond wanneer dit droog is?
dry, dusty, thirsty,|droë, stowwerige, dors,
(3) What words describe the air when there is no water in it?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf die lug wanneer daar geen water in nie?

(4) What words refer to something becoming dry?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak droog is?
dry (v), dry out, dry up, shrivel, wither, evaporate, dehydrate, desiccate|droë (v), uitdroog, up, inkrimp nie, verdor, verdamp, dehidreer, droog
(5) What words refer to making something dry?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets droë?
dry something, sear, parch|droë iets droog, roosteren
(6) What words refer to removing water from something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die verwydering van water uit iets?

(7) What tools are used to remove water from things?|(7) Wat gereedskap word gebruik om water uit dinge verwyder?
sieve, press|sif, pers
Be in water|Wees in water
Use this domain for words referring to being in water or putting something in water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat in water of om iets in die water.
(1) What words refer to being in water?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat in water?

(3) What words refer to being under the water?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat onder die water?

(4) What words refer to putting something in water?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na om iets in die water?

(5) What words refer to putting something like food in water for a long time?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na om iets soos kos in die water vir &#39;n lang tyd?
