(6) What words refer to something falling or sinking into water?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets val of sink in water?
fall, sink, settle,|val, sink, op te los,
(7) What sound does something make when it falls into water?|(7) Wat klank nie iets te maak wanneer dit val in die water?
splash, plop|spat, plop
Solutions of water|Oplossings van water
Use this domain for words referring to a mixture of water and a substance (such as salt or sugar) that dissolves in water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n mengsel van water en &#39;n stof (soos sout of suiker) wat in water oplos.
(1) What words refer to mixing something with water?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets meng met water?
solution, mix with water|oplossing, meng met water
(2) What words refer to a substance dissolving in water?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stof in water oplos?
dissolve (in water), produce a solution|ontbind (in water), produseer &#39;n oplossing
(3) What words refer to adding more water to a solution?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van meer water om &#39;n oplossing?
dilute, be diluted, add water, water down, thin|verdun, verdun, voeg water, water af, dun
(4) What words refer to adding more of a substance to the solution?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na meer van &#39;n stof wat bydra tot die oplossing?
concentrate, be concentrated, concentration, thick|konsentreer, word gekonsentreer, konsentrasie, dik
(5) What words refer to adding air or a gas to water?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die toevoeging van die lug of &#39;n gas te drink nie?
aerate, carbonated, carbonation|belug, koolzuur, karbonering
(6) What words refer to water flowing through something and dissolving something in it?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na water vloei deur iets en iets los in dit?
leach|Leach
Water quality|Kwaliteit van die water
Use this domain for words describing the quality or condition of water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf die gehalte of toestand van die water.
(1) What words describe salt water versus fresh water?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf soutwater versus vars water?
freshwater, saltwater, seawater, saline solution, brackish|varswater, soutwater, seewater, sout oplossing, brak
(2) What words describe water for drinking?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf water vir drink?
drinking water, potable|drinkwater, drinkbare
(3) What words describe clean water?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf skoon water?
clean, clear, pure, crystal clear|skoon, helder, suiwer, helder
(4) What words describe dirty water?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf vuil water?
contaminated, dirty, muddy, silt-filled, murky, stagnant, scum|besmet, vuil, modderige,-slik gevul, donker, staande, roes
(5) What words are used of cleaning water?|(5) Watter woorde gebruik van die skoonmaak van water?
to clean up, to filter, filter, filtered, strain, to boil, boiled water, let settle|om skoon te maak, te filtreer, filter, gefiltreer, stam, kook, gekookte water, laat vestig
(6) What words are used of polluting water?|(6) Watter woorde gebruik van besoedeling water?
to pollute, pollution, polluted, contaminate, dump sewage into|om te besoedel, besoedeling, besoedelde, besoedel, stort riool in
Living things|Lewende dinge
Use this domain for general words that relate to all living things.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verband hou met alle lewende dinge.
(1) What words refer to all living things, including both plants and animals?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na alle lewende dinge, insluitend beide plante en diere?
living things, life, all life, every living thing, everything that lives and breathes, plants and animals, organic matter|lewende dinge, die lewe, al die lewe, alles wat leef, alles wat leef en asemhaal, plante en diere, organiese materiaal
(2) What words refer to something that is alive?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat lewendig is?
living thing, life form, organism,|leef, vorm van lewe, organisme,
(3) What words refer to being alive?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na om te lewe?
be alive, live|lewendig, leef
(4) What words describe something that is living?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat leef beskryf?
living, alive, animate, organic|lewende, lewendig, animeer, organiese
(5) What general words refer to the parts of all living things?|(5) Wat algemene woorde verwys na die dele van alle lewende dinge?
tissue, cell, membrane, DNA, gene, protoplasm|weefsel, sel, membraan, DNA, gene, protoplasma
(6) What words refer to the study of life?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die studie van die lewe?
biology, biologist, life science, ecology, ecologist, natural history, naturalist|biologie, bioloog, die lewe wetenskap, ekologie, ekoloog, natuurlike geskiedenis, natuurkundige
(7) What words refer to whether a plant or animal can be eaten?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na of &#39;n plant of dier geëet kan word?
edible, inedible|eetbaar, oneetbare
Dead things|Dooie dinge
Use this domain for words referring to dead things--things that were alive before, but aren't now.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na dooie dinge - dinge wat die lewe voor was, maar nou is nie.
(1) What words refer to dead things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dooie dinge?
decay, remains, compost, carrion,|verval, bly, kompos, aas,
(2) What words describe something that is dead?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat dood is, beskryf?
dead, lifeless,|dooie, lewelose,
(3) What words describe something that is not living and never has been?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie lewe en was nog nooit beskryf?
inanimate, inorganic,|lewelose, anorganiese,
(4) What words refer to a species dying out completely?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n spesie uitsterf heeltemal?
extinct, extinction, endangered species|uitgesterf, uitwissing, bedreigde spesies
(5) What words refer to plants and animals that do not exist today?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na plante en diere wat nie bestaan ​​nie vandag?
dinosaur, fossil, extinct|dinosourus, fossiel, uitgesterf
Spirits of things|Geeste van dinge
Use this domain for words referring to the spirits of things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die geeste van die dinge.
(1) What words refer to the spirits of things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die geeste van die dinge?
spirit, animal spirits,|gees, dier geeste,
(2) What words refer to talking to the spirits?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na praat met die geeste?
commune,|kommune,
(3) What words refer to worshiping spirits?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die aanbidding geeste?
animism, animistic,|animisme, animistiese,
(4) What words refer to things used to worship spirits?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na dinge wat gebruik word om die geeste te aanbid?
amulet, fetish,|amulet, fetish,
Plant|Plant
Use this domain for general words for all plants. Use a book of pictures to identify plant names and the scientific name. Languages divide plants into various domains that are not always comparable from language to language. Criterial features may be characteristics (trees and bushes are distinguished by size and number of trunks) and use (grass and weeds are distinguished by their desirability). A common distinction is between trees and non-trees, with trees described as being big, woody, and having a life expectancy of several years, while non-trees are small, non-woody, and have a life expectancy of typically not more than one year (Heine, Bernd and Karsten Legere. 1995. Swahili plants. Rudiger Koppe Verlag: Koln.). Agricultural societies will divide plants into wild and cultivated. However most plants for which there are names have some use. Therefore it does not seem helpful to divide plant names into domains for useful and non-useful plants. Since only parts of plants are eaten, edible parts of plants are listed under the domain 'Food'. Some languages may have more domains than are used in this list, others may have fewer. The classification system used here does not agree entirely with the system used by botanists. For instance botanists do not classify all the tree species together. The palm trees belong to the class Monocotyledoneae and are classified with lilies, bananas, and orchids. Apple and cherry trees belong to the class Dicotyledoneae and are classified in the rose family along with roses and blackberries. The acacia tree also belongs to the class Dicotyledoneae and is classified in the pulse family along with lupines and beans. However most folk taxonomies bring all the trees together. The scientific classification system for plants and animals is taken from: Carruth, Gorton, ed. 1989. The Volume Library, Vols. 1 and 2. The Southwestern Company: Nashville.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir alle plante. Gebruik &#39;n boek van die foto&#39;s om te plant name en die wetenskaplike naam te identifiseer. Tale verdeel plante in verskeie domeine wat nie altyd vergelykbaar van taal tot taal. Criterial funksies kan eienskappe (bome en bosse word onderskei deur die grootte en aantal stamme) en gebruik (gras en onkruid word gekenmerk deur hul wenslikheid). &#39;N gemeenskaplike onderskeid is tussen die bome en nie-bome, bome beskryf as groot, houtagtige, en met &#39;n lewensverwagting van &#39;n paar jaar, terwyl nie-bome is klein, nie-houtagtige, en het &#39;n lewensverwagting van tipies nie meer as een jaar (.. Heine, Bernd en Karsten legère 1995 Swahili plante Rudiger Koppe Verlag. Koln). Landbou verenigings sal verdeel plante in wilde en aangeplante. Maar die meeste plante waarvoor daar name het &#39;n paar gebruik. Daarom is dit nie lyk nuttig om te plant name verdeel in domeine vir nuttige en nie-nuttige plante. Aangesien slegs dele van plante geëet, is eetbare dele van plante onder die domein &#39;Food. Sommige tale kan meer domeine as word in hierdie lys het, mag ander minder het. Die klassifikasie stelsel hier gebruik nie heeltemal saamstem met die gebruik deur plantkundiges stelsel. Byvoorbeeld plantkundiges nie al die bome saam te doen klassifiseer. Die palmbome behoort tot die klas Monocotyledoneae en word geklassifiseer deur lelies, piesangs, en orgideë. Apple en kersiebome behoort tot die klas Dicotyledoneae en word geklassifiseer in die roosfamilie saam met rose en dorings. Die akasiaboom behoort ook aan die klas Dicotyledoneae en word geklassifiseer in die pols familie saam met lupine en bone. Maar die meeste mense taksonomieë bring al die bome saam. Die wetenskaplike klassifikasie stelsel vir plante en diere is geneem uit: Carruth, Gorton, ed. 1989. Die volume Biblioteek, Goedkoop. 1 en 2. Die Suidwes Maatskappy: Nashville.
(1) What words refer to all plants?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na alle plante?
plant, flora, greenery, vegetation, herbage|plant, flora, groen, plantegroei, gras
(2) What words describe types of plants?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf tipes plante?
angiosperm, annual, aquatic, biennial, bracken, brake, creeper, deciduous, edible, flower, greens, herbaceous, hybrid, leafy, legume, luscious, parasite, perennial, plankton, pulse, sedge, succulent, tropical, vegetable, vine, weed, woody, wort|angiosperm, jaarlikse, water, tweejaarlikse, Bracken, rem, rankplant, bladwisselende, eetbare, blom, setperke, kruidagtige, baster, groen, peulgewasse, sappige, parasiet, meerjarige, plankton, pols, riete, sappig, tropiese, groente, wingerdstok, onkruid, houtagtige, wort
(3) What words are used to describe plants that grow wild?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik om plante wat wild groei beskryf?
wild, uncultivated|wild, onbewerkte
(4) What words refer to cultivated plants?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na aangeplante plante?
cultivated|gekweek
(5) What words refer to a group of plants?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van plante?
bale, bouquet, bracken, brush, bunch, canopy, clump, cluster, cover, covert, corsage, crop, culture, forest, greenery, grove, growth, hassock, haystack, herbage, jungle, kelp, nosegay, orchard, scrub, sheaf, shock, shrubbery, skein, spray, stand, sward, thicket, tuft, turf, tussock, underbrush, undergrowth, vegetation, verdure, vermin|baal, rangskikking, Bracken, borsel, bos, sondak, bos, cluster, cover, geheime, corsage, gewas, kultuur, bos, groen, bos, groei, soen, hooiberg, gras, oerwoud, kelp, ruiker, boord, skrop, gerf, skok, struike, warboel, spuit, staan, grasveld, bos, klos, turf, graspol, onderbos, bome, plantegroei, Verdure, ongediertes
(6) What words refer to the study of plants?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die studie van plante?
botany, botanist, herbalist|plantkunde, botanis, kruiekundige
Tree|Tree
Use this domain for trees--flowering plants with roots, stems, and leaves, which are large and have a wooden trunk (Phylum Spermatophyta, Subdivision Angiospermae). Also include the evergreen trees (Phylum Spermatophyta, Subdivision Gymnospermae). Evergreen trees do not have flowers, but have cone like fruits (pinecones) that contain seeds. Their leaves are shaped like needles and are retained for over a year.|Gebruik hierdie domein bome - blom plante met wortels, stingels en blare, wat groot is en het &#39;n hout stam (Filum Spermatophyta, Onderverdeling Angiospermae). Ook die immergroen bome (Filum Spermatophyta, Onderverdeling Gymnospermae). Immergroen bome nie blomme nie, maar het cone soos vrugte (pinecones) wat sade bevat. Hul blare gevorm soos naalde en behou vir meer as &#39;n jaar.
(1) What general words refer to trees?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na bome?
tree, arboreal|boom boomlewende
(2) What words refer to general types of trees?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na algemene tipes bome?
broadleaf, conifer, coniferous, cycad, deciduous, evergreen, fir, fruit tree, palm, pine, timber|breëblaar, naaldhout, naald, broodboom, bladwisselende, immergroen, sipres, vrugte boom palm, denne, hout

Bush, shrub|Bush, struik
Use this domain for bushes and shrubs--plants that are smaller than trees and have several wooden trunks (Phylum Spermatophyta, Subdivision Angiospermae).|Gebruik hierdie domein bosse en struike - plante wat kleiner is as die bome en het &#39;n paar hout stamme (Filum Spermatophyta, Onderverdeling Angiospermae).
(1) What general words refer to bushes?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na bosse?
bush, bushy, shrub, hedge|Bush, golwende, struik, heining
(2) What types of bushes are there?|(2) Watter tipes bosse is daar?
poinsettia, rose bush, bougainvillea|poinsettia, roosboom, bougainvillea
Grass, herb, vine|Gras, plante, wingerdstok
Use this domain for small plants that have roots, stems, flowers, and seeds, but do not have a wooden trunk (Phylum Spermatophyta, Subdivision Angiospermae). Also include the seedless plants, such as ferns (phylum Pteridophyta, class Felicineae), horsetails (phylum Pteridophyta, class Equisetineae), and club mosses (phylum Pteridophyta, class Lycopodineae). Plants of the Pteridophyta phylum have no flowers or seeds. Ferns have large, divided, feather-like leaves, or fronds. Club mosses are small (rarely over one meter) evergreen plants with simple leaves resembling pine or hemlock needles. Sometimes they grow upright, but often trail on the ground, where they propagate by means of runners. Horsetails send up tall, vertical, jointed stalks with branches covered with scale like leaves.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir klein plante wat wortels, stingels, blomme, en sade nie, maar het nie &#39;n hout stam (Filum Spermatophyta, Onderverdeling Angiospermae). Ook die pitlose plante, soos varings (filum Pteridophyta, klas Felicineae), perdesterte (filum Pteridophyta, klas Equisetineae), en die klub mosse (filum Pteridophyta, klas Lycopodineae). Plante van die Pteridophyta filum het geen blomme of sade. Ferns het groot, verdeel, feather-soos blare, of blare. Club mosse is klein (selde meer as &#39;n meter) immergroen plante met eenvoudige blare lyk soos denne of HEMLOCK naalde. Soms groei hulle regop, maar dikwels op grond sleep, waar hulle voort deur middel van die hardlopers. Perdesterte stuur up lang, vertikale, gelede stingels met takke bedek met skaal soos blare.

(no words in English)|(Geen woorde in Engels)

(10) What plants have fruit?|(10) Wat plante het vrugte?
grape, pineapple|druiwe, pynappel
(11) What types of berries are there?|(11) Watter tipes bessies is daar?
berry, strawberry, raspberry, cranberry, blueberry|Berry, aarbei, framboos, cranberry, ys
(12) What types of bananas are there?|(12) Watter tipes piesangs is daar?
banana, plantain, cooking banana|piesang, weegbree, kook piesang
(13) What types of plants have edible roots?|(13) Watter tipes plante het eetbare wortels?
potato, carrot, sweet potato, cassava, cocoyam, taro, yam, beets, ginger|aartappel, wortel, patats, maniok, cocoyam, brood, yam, beet, gemmer
(14) What plants are eaten by animals?|(14) Watter plante deur diere geëet word?
hay, alfalfa|hooi, lusern
(15) What plants are used for making fibers, cloth or rope?|(15) Wat plante wat gebruik word vir die maak van vesel, lap of tou?
cotton, sisal|katoen, sisal
(16) What species of ferns are there?|(16) Wat spesies van varings is daar?
bracken, brake, fern, maidenhair|Bracken, rem, varing, nooienshaarvaring
(17) What species of horsetails are there?|(17) Wat spesies perdesterte is daar?
horsetail|paardestaart
(18) What species of club mosses are there?|(18) Wat spesies klub mosse is daar?
club moss|klub mos
Moss, fungus, algae|Moss, fungus, alge
Use this domain for mosses (phylum Bryophyta, class Musci), liverworts (phylum Bryophyta, class Hepaticae), fungi (phylum Thallophyta, subdivision Fungi), algae (phylum Thallophyta, subdivision Algae), and lichens. These plants do not have true roots, stems, or leaves. The mosses are small, green, flowerless plants that grow in moist environments and look like velvety or feathery growths carpeting the ground, tree trunks, and rocks. The liverworts are similar to the mosses with a flat and branching growth pattern. The algae possess green chlorophyll. They vary from one-celled organisms, which sometimes live in colonies such as pond scum, to complex organisms such as seaweed. The fungi do not possess chlorophyll and feed off of other organic material. Lichens consist of a fungus and an algae growing together. They commonly grow on trunks of trees and rocks. Some are flat and leafy, and some are moss like.|Gebruik hierdie domein mosse (filum Bryophyta, klas Musci), lewermosse (filum Bryophyta, klas Hepaticae), fungi (filum Thallophyta, onderverdeling Fungi), alge (filum Thallophyta, onderverdeling Alge), en ligene. Hierdie plante het nie ware wortels, stingels of blare. Die mosse is klein, groen, flowerless plante wat groei in klam omgewings en lyk soos fluweel of veeragtige groeisels tapyt op die grond, boomstompe, en die rotse. Die lewermosse is soortgelyk aan die mosse met &#39;n plat en vertakking groeipatroon. Die alge besit groen chlorofil. Hulle wissel van eensellige organismes, wat soms woon in kolonies soos dam roes, om komplekse organismes soos seewier. Die swamme nie besit chlorofil en voed van ander organiese materiaal. Ligene bestaan ​​uit &#39;n swam en &#39;n alge groei saam. Hulle groei algemeen op stamme van bome en rotse. Sommige is plat en groen, en sommige is mos soos.
(1) What general words refer to moss, fungus, and algae?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na Moss, swam, en alge?
phytoplankton, plankton, scum|fitoplankton, plankton, roes
(2) What general words refer to moss?|(2) Wat is die algemene woorde verwys na mos?
moss|Moss
(3) What species of moss are there?|(3) Wat spesies mos is daar?
|
(4) What general words refer to liverworts?|(4) Wat is die algemene woorde verwys na lewermosse?
liverwort|levermos
(5) What species of liverworts are there?|(5) Wat spesies van lewermosse is daar?
(6) What general words refer to algae?|(6) Watter algemene woorde verwys na alge?
algae, gulfweed, seaweed, wrack|alge, gulfweed, seewier, wrack
(7) What species of algae are there?|(7) Wat spesies van alge is daar?
diatom, sea lettuce, kelp, rockweed, Sargasso, sargassum|Kristalwier, see blaarslaai, kelp, rockweed, Sargasso, Sargassum
(8) What general words refer to fungi?|(8) Wat algemene woorde verwys na swamme?
fungus, bacteria, mold, mildew, mushroom|swam, bakterieë, vorm, heuningdou, sampioen
(9) What species of fungi are there?|(9) Wat spesies van swamme is daar?
apple scab, bloom, bread mold, button mushroom, downy mildew, dry rot, morel, penicillium, puffball, rose mildew, rust fungi, slime mold, smut, toadstool, truffle, yeast|appelskurfsiekte, blom, brood vorm, knoppie sampioen, donsskimmel, verrotting, Morel, Penicillium, puffball, het skimmel, roes fungi, slyk vorm, brand, paddastoel, truffel, gis
(10) What general words refer to lichen?|(10) Watter algemene woorde verwys na korstmos?
lichen|lichen
(11) What species of lichen are there?|(11) Wat spesies van ligene is daar?
reindeer moss|rendier mos
Parts of a plant|Dele van &#39;n plant
Use this domain for words that refer to parts of a plant. Start with general words that all plants have. Then think through each major type of plant. Finish by thinking of specific plants that are well known (usually cultivated crops) and that have words for specific parts (e.g. tassel on a corn/maize cob).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na dele van &#39;n plant. Begin met algemene woorde wat al die plante het. Dan dink deur middel van elke groot tipe plant. Afwerking deur denke van spesifieke plante wat goed bekend is (gewoonlik gewasse) en dat woorde vir spesifieke dele (bv kwas op &#39;n koring / mieliekop).
(1) What are the basic parts of all plants?|(1) Wat is die basiese dele van alle plante?
root, trunk, stalk, branch, stem, leaf|wortel, stam, steel, tak, stam, blaar
(2) What words refer to the roots?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die wortels?
root, tuber, tubercle, bulb, taproot, runner, root hairs, rootstock|wortel, knol, tuberkel, gloeilamp, penwortel, naaswenner, wortelhare, onderstok
(3) What words refer to the trunk?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die stam?
trunk, stalk, reed, bole, woody, base|stam, steel, riet, bole, houtagtige, base
(4) What words refer to the branches?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die takke?
branch, bough, limb, twig, stick, stem, fork|tak, tak, tak, stokkie, stok, stam, vurk
(5) What words refer to the leaves?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die blare?
leaf, leafy, pine needle, fern, foliage, palm frond, stem, blade, vein|blaar, groen, denne naald, varing, blare, palm Palm blad, stam, lem, trant
(6) What types of thorns are there?|(6) Watter tipes van dorings is daar?
thorn, spine, cactus needle, burr|doring, ruggraat, kaktus naald Burr
(7) What words refer to the outside of a plant?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die buitekant van &#39;n plant?
bark, burl, knot, hull, husk, shell, cork|bas, Burl, knoop, romp, doppe, dop, kurk
(8) What is the inside of a plant called?|(8) Wat is die binnekant van &#39;n plant genoem?
wood, rings, heartwood, pith, pulp, fiber|hout, ringe, kernhout, merg, pulp, vesel
(9) What words refer to the seeds?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die saad?
seed, acorn, bean, berry, cone, ear, grain, gourd, kernel, nut, pinecone, pod, rosehip, bran, chaff, cob, corncob, germ, head of grain, hull, husk, nutshell, pod, pit, rind, section, seedcase, shell, skin, stem, stone, whole(wheat)|saad, akker, boontjie, bessie, cone, oor, graan, wonderboom kern, neut, DENNENAPPE, pod, rosehip, semels, kaf, kop, kolf, kiem, hoof van graan, romp, doppe, neutedop, pod, put, skil, artikel, seedcase, dop, vel, stam, klip, geheel (koring)
(10) What words refer to the fruit?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die vrug?
fruit, peel, peeling, juice, pulp, pulpy, flesh, fleshy, core, skin, stem, seed|vrugte, skil, skil, sap, pulp, pap, vleis, vlesige, kern, vel, stam, geslag
(11) What words refer to the flowers?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die blomme?
flower, bloom, blossom, petal, stamen, pistil, nectar, pollen, spear, spike|blom, blom, blom, blom, meeldraad, stamper, nektar, stuifmeel, spies, piek
(12) What are the parts of a vine?|(12) Wat is die dele van &#39;n wingerdstok?
vine, runner, creeper|wingerdstok, naaswenner, rankplant
(13) What are the parts of grass?|(13) Wat is die dele van die gras?
stem, stalk, blade of grass, straw|stam, steel, lem van gras, strooi
(14) What are the parts of maize?|(14) Wat is die dele van mielies?
head, cob, husk, corn silk, kernel, tassel|kop, kop, doppe, mielies kant, kern, kwas
(15) What are the parts of a banana plant?|(15) Wat is die dele van &#39;n piesang plant?
stalk, leaf, flower, bunch, hand, finger|steel, blaar, blom, klomp, hand, vinger
(16) What are the parts of a coconut tree?|(16) Wat is die dele van &#39;n klapper boom?
trunk, frond, midrib, leaf, needle, nut, husk, shell, meat, milk|stam, vaar blad, hoofaar, blaar, naald, moer, doppe, dop, vleis, melk
(17) What is new growth on a plant called?|(17) Wat is die nuwe groei op &#39;n plant genoem?
shoot, sprout, bud, new growth, old growth|skiet, spruit, kiem, nuwe groei, ou groei
(18) What is a group of fruit called?|(18) Wat is &#39;n groep van vrugte genoem?
cluster of fruit, bunch of grapes, hand of bananas|groep van vrugte, druiwe, hand piesangs
(19) What liquids are produced by plants?|(19) Wat vloeistowwe word geproduseer deur plante?
sap, resin, juice, milk|sap, hars, sap, melk
(20) What are the dead parts of plants called?|(20) Wat is die dood dele van plante genoem?
dead branches, dead wood, rot, dry rot, dead leaves, dry leaves|dooie takke, dooie hout, vrot, verrotting, dooie blare, droë blare
(21) What words are used of plants when they have been cut down?|(21) Watter woorde gebruik van plante wanneer hulle afgekap?
log, stump, grass trimmings, compost, pile of leaves, straw, hay|teken, stomp, gras versierings, kompos, hoop blare, strooi, hooi
Growth of plants|Groei van plante

grow, growth, branch out, put down roots, spread, develop, extend, flourish, spring, swell, thrive, photosynthesis|groei, groei, tak uit, sit wortels, verspreiding, te ontwikkel, uit te brei, floreer, lente, swel, floreer, fotosintese

germinate, sprout, spring up, seedling|ontkiem, kiem, lente up, saailing

green, unripe, immature, mature, mellow, ripen, ripe|groen, onryp, onvolwasse, volwasse, mellow, ryp, ryp

(8) Where are dead plants put?|(8) Waar dooie plante te sit?
compost pile|kompos hoop

Animal|Animal
Use this domain for general words referring to animals.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na diere.
(1) What general words refer to all animals?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na alle diere?
animal, fauna, creature, critter, organism, wildlife|dier, fauna, wese, Blik, organisme, wild
Types of animals|Tipes diere
Use this domain for words describing types of animals. Use a book of pictures to identify each species and its scientific name. This section is organized according to the scientific, biological classification of animals. It may not correspond to the local classification of animals (folk taxonomy), which are often based on how people relate to animals (tame/wild, edible/work). Use this domain for words referring to large classes of animals that do not correspond to the scientific classification. For instance this would be the place for a word like 'flying animal', which includes birds, bats, and flying insects.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf tipes diere. Gebruik &#39;n boek van die foto&#39;s om elke spesie en sy wetenskaplike naam te identifiseer. Hierdie afdeling is georganiseer volgens die wetenskaplike, biologiese klassifikasie van diere. Dit kan nie ooreenstem met die plaaslike klassifikasie van diere (folk taksonomie), wat dikwels op grond van hoe mense verband hou met diere (mak / wilde eetbare / werk). Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die groot klasse van diere wat nie ooreenstem met die wetenskaplike klassifikasie. Byvoorbeeld sou dit die plek vir &#39;n woord soos &quot;vlieënde dier, wat voëls, vlermuise en vlieënde insekte insluit.
(1) What words refer to types of animals?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na tipes diere?
phylum, class, order, family, genus, species, chordate, vertebrate, invertebrate, crustacean, rodent, insect, arthropod, mollusk, echidna, protozoa, protozoan, protozoon, amebic, amoeba, bacteriophage, cold-blooded, warm-blooded, multicellular, single-celled, unicellular, microorganism, germ, virus, viral, purebred, hybrid, quadruped, biped, two-footed, four-footed, diurnal, nocturnal, beast, brute, vermin, varmint, albino|filum, klas, orde, familie, genus, spesie, chordaatgroepe, gewerwelde, ongewerwelde, skaaldier, knaagdier, insekte, geleedpotige, schelp, mierystervark, protosoë, oerdier, protosoon, amebic, amoeba, bakteriofaag, koelbloedige, warmbloedige, meersellige, enkelsellige, eensellige, mikro-organisme, kiem, virus, virale, suiwer, baster, viervoetige dier, tweevoetig dier, twee-been, viervoetige, daaglikse, nagtelike, dier, brute, ongediertes, misdadiger, albino
(2) What words refer to wild animals?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wilde diere?
wild (animal), untamed, feral, wildlife, beast|wilde (dier), ongetemde, wilde, wilde diere, die wilde diere
(3) What words refer to tame animals?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na diere te tem?
tame (animal), tamed, domesticated, livestock, pet|mak (dier), getem, mak, vee, troeteldier
(4) What words refer to the process of taming an animal?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die proses van &#39;n dier tem?
tame, domesticate, break (a horse)|mak, mak, break (&#39;n perd)
(5) What words refer to animals that eat certain things?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na diere wat sekere dinge te eet?
carnivore, carnivorous, meat eater, meat eating, predator, predatory, insectivore, insectivorous, herbivore, herbivorous, plant eating, omnivore, omnivorous, scavenger, parasite|karnivoor, vleisetende, vleis eter, vleis eet, roofdier, roofsugtige, insectivore, insekvretende, herbivore, plantetende, plant eet, omnivoor, omnivore, aasdier, parasiet
(6) What words refer to whether or not an animal can be eaten?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na of &#39;n dier kan geëet word?
edible, non-edible, clean, unclean, kosher|eetbare, nie-eetbare, skoon, onrein, kosher
(7) What words refer to where an animal lives?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na waar &#39;n dier lewens?
amphibian, aquatic, arboreal, barnyard, tropical|amfibiese, water, snags, Barnyard, tropiese

Hoofed animals|Hoefdiere

Rodent|Knaagdier
Use this domain for rodents--gnawing animals (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Rodentia), insect eating animals (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Insectivora), rabbits (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Lagomorpha), and hyraxes (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Hyracoidea).|Gebruik hierdie domein knaagdiere - knaag diere (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Rodentia), insekte eet diere (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Insectivora), hase (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Lagomorpha), en dassies (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Hyracoidea).

rodent|knaagdier

rat, mouse, squirrel, chipmunk, marmot, beaver, porcupine, capybara, cavy, chinchilla, coypu, gerbil, gopher, hamster, lemming, muskrat, vole, woodchuck|rat, muis, eekhoring, Munk, marmot, beaver, ystervark, capybara, cavy, chinchilla, coypu, Gerbil, gopher, hamster, lemming, muskusratten vole, woodchuck

(4) What species of rabbit are there?|(4) Wat spesies haas is daar?
rabbit, cottontail, hare, pika|haas, Cotton, haas, Pika
(5) What species of hyrax are there?|(5) Wat spesies dassie is daar?
hyrax, coney, dassy|dassie, das, dassy
Marsupial|Buideldier
Use this domain for marsupials (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Marsupialia). Marsupials carry their young in a pouch.|Gebruik hierdie domein buideldiere (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Marsupialia). Buideldiere dra hul jong in &#39;n sakkie.
(1) What general words refer to marsupials?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na buideldiere?

Anteater, aardvark|Miereneter, aardvark
Use this domain for mammals with few or no teeth--anteaters (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Edentata), pangolins (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Pholidota), aardvarks (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Tubulidentata), and platypus--mammals that lay eggs (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Monotremata).|Gebruik hierdie domein soogdiere met min of geen tande - miervreters (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Edentata), ietermagö (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, bestel Pholidota), erdvarke (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Tubulidentata), en Platypus --mammals dat eiers (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Monotremata) lê.
(1) What species of anteaters are there?|(1) Wat spesies miervreters is daar?
anteater, sloth, armadillo|miereneter, luiheid, armadillo
(2) What species of pangolin are there?|(2) Wat spesies ietermago is daar?
pangolin, scaly anteater|ietermago, skubberige miereneter
(3) What words refer to the aardvark?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die aardvark?
aardvark|aardvark
(4) What species of mammals lay eggs?|(4) Wat spesies van soogdiere eiers lê?
duckbill platypus, spiny anteater|vogelbekdier Platypus, stekelrige miereneter
Sea mammal|Seesoogdier
Use this domain for mammals that live in the sea--whales and dolphins (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Cetacea), seals (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Pinnipedia), and sea cows (phylum Chordata, class Mammalia, order Sirenia).|Gebruik hierdie domein soogdiere wat in die see lewe - walvisse en dolfyne (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Cetacea), seëls (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, bestel Pinnipedia), en die see koeie (filum Chordata, klas Mammalia, orde Sirenia ).
(1) What general words refer to sea mammals?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die see soogdiere?
cetacean, pinniped|walvisagtiges, pinniped
(2) What species of whales and dolphins are there?|(2) Wat spesies van walvisse en dolfyne is daar?
whale, sperm whale, killer whale, blue whale, right whale, dolphin, porpoise|walvis, potvis, moordenaar walvis, blou walvis, reg walvis, dolfyn, tornyn
(3) What species of seals are there?|(3) Wat spesies robbe is daar?
seal, walrus, sea lion|seël, walrus, see leeu
(4) What species of sea cow are there?|(4) Wat spesies van die see koei is daar?
sea cow, manatee|see koei, Manatee
