Insect|Insekte
Use this domain for the names of insect species (phylum Arthropoda, class Insecta). Note that insects have six legs and spiders have eight legs. However some languages may not distinguish insects from spiders and may use other characteristics to sub-divide the Arthropods.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die name van insekspesies (filum Arthropoda, klas Insecta). Let daarop dat insekte het ses bene en spinnekoppe het agt bene. Maar sommige tale mag nie insekte van spinnekoppe te onderskei, en kan ander eienskappe gebruik om sub-verdeel die geleedpotiges.
(1) What general words refer to insects?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na insekte?
insect, bug|insekte, bug
(2) What species of insects are there?|(2) Wat spesies van insekte is daar?
ant, army ant, armyworm, bedbug, bee, beetle, bluebottle fly, botfly, bristletail, bumblebee, butterfly, carpenter bee, chigger, cicada, cockroach, cricket, daddy longlegs, damselfly, deerfly, dragonfly, dung beetle, earwig, firefly, flea, fly, glowworm, gnat, grasshopper, hawkmoth, hellgramite, honeybee, hornet, horsefly, housefly, inchworm, jigger, katydid, ladybug, leafhopper, lice, locust, long-horned beetle, louse, mantis, mayfly, midge, millipede, mite, monarch butterfly, mosquito, moth, mud wasp, nit, praying mantis, roach, sawfly, scarab, silkworm, silverfish, stinkbug, swallowtail, termite, tick, tsetse fly, tumblebug, walking stick, wasp, weevil, wiggler, wriggler|mier, weermag mier, Kommandowurm, weeluis, bee, beetle, bloublasie vlieg, horzel, bristletail, hommel, skoenlapper, timmerman bye, chigger, sonbesie, kakkerlak, krieket, pappa longlegs, juffer, deerfly, naaldekoker, miskruier, oorkruiper, vuurvliegie , vlooimark, vlieg, glim worm, muggie, sprinkaan, hawkmoth, hellgramite, heuningby, perdebye, perdevlieg, huisvlieg, inchworm, biljartbok, sabel sprinkaan, skilpadbesie, bladspringers, luise, sprinkane, lang horings beetle, luis, hottentotsgot, eendag, muggie, duisendpoot, mite, monarg skoenlapper, muskiet, mot modder perdeby, neet, hottentotsgot, Roach, wesp, skarabee, sywurm, Silver, stinkbesiegetalle, swaelstert, termiet, merk, tsetsevlieg, tumblebug, kierie, perdeby, kalander, wiggler , draaier
(3) What special kinds of workers exist within an insect colony?|(3) Watter spesiale vorme van werkers bestaan ​​binne &#39;n insek kolonie?
queen (ant, bee), worker, drone (bee), soldier|koningin (mier, bee), werker, drone (SEB), soldaat
(4) What words describe insects?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf insekte?
borer, carnivorous, cosmopolitan, crawling, creeping, diurnal, dauber, flying, hopper, hopping, insectile, larva, larval, nocturnal, pest, predacious, predator, pupa, queen, segmented, stinging, two-winged, venomous, winged, wingless|stronkboorder, vleisetende, kosmopolitiese, kruip, kruip, daaglikse, kladderaar, vlieg, hopper, spring, insectile, larwe, larwe, nagtelike, plaag, predatoriese, roofdier, papie, koningin, gesegmenteer, branderige, twee vlerke, giftige, vlerke, vlerkloos
Spider|Spider
Use this domain for spiders (phylum Arthropoda, class Arachnida). Note that insects have six legs and spiders have eight legs. However some languages may not distinguish insects from spiders and may use other characteristics to sub-divide the Arthropods.|Gebruik hierdie domein spinnekoppe (filum Arthropoda, klas Arachnida). Let daarop dat insekte het ses bene en spinnekoppe het agt bene. Maar sommige tale mag nie insekte van spinnekoppe te onderskei, en kan ander eienskappe gebruik om sub-verdeel die geleedpotiges.
(1) What general words refer to spiders?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na spinnekoppe?
spider, arachnid|spinnekop, Arachnida
(2) What species of spiders are there?|(2) Wat spesies spinnekoppe is daar?
black widow, brown recluse, tarantula, wolf spider, scorpion, tick, mite|swart weduwee bruin eensaam, tarantula, wolf spin, skerpioen, merk, mite
(3) What words refer to spider webs?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na spinnerakke?
spider web, cobweb, web, spin, silk|spinnekop web, spinnerak, web, spin, kant
Small animals|Klein diere
Use this domain for the names of worms, animals with shells, and other animals that do not fit into any of the other categories.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die name van wurms, diere met skulpe, en ander diere wat nie inpas in enige van die ander kategorieë.
(1) What general words refer to small animals such as worms?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na klein diere soos wurms?
worm, shellfish|wurm, skulpvis
(2) What words refer to one-celled animals (phylum Protozoa)?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na een-gekanselleer diere (filum Protozoa)?
bacteria, germ, virus|bakterieë, kiem, virus
(3) What words refer to sponges? (phylum Porifera)?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na sponse? (Filum Porifera)?
sponge|spons
(4) What words refer to water animals with tentacles (phylum Coelenterata)?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na water diere met tentakels (filum Coelenterata)?
coral, sea anemone, Portuguese man-of-war, jellyfish, hydra, medusa|koraal, see anemone, Portugees man-van-oorlog, jellievis, hydra, medusa
(5) What words refer to flatworms (phylum Platyhelminthes)?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na platwurms (filum Platyhelminthes)?
flatworm, liver fluke, intestinal worm, tapeworm|platwurm, lewerslak, derm wurm lintwurm
(6) What words refer to roundworms (phylum Nematoda)?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na rondewurms (Nematoda filum)?
roundworm, hookworm, pinworm|rondewurm, haakwurm, naaldwurm
(7) What words refer to rotifers (phylum Rotifera)?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na rotifers (filum Rotifera)?
rotifer|rader diertjes
(8) What words refer to mollusks (phylum Mollusca)?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na molluske (filum Mollusca)?
mollusk, snail, slug, abalone, oyster, scallop, mussel, clam, nautilus, cuttlefish, octopus, squid, conch|schelp, slak, slak, perlemoen, oesters, kammossel, mossels, clam, nautilus, cuttlefish, seekat, inkvis, zeeschelp
(9) What words refer to segmented worms (phylum Annelida)?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na gesegmenteerde wurms (filum Annelida)?
segmented worm, earthworm, leech|gesegmenteerde wurm erdwurm, Leech
(10) What words refer to walking worms (phylum Onychophora)?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na loop wurms (filum Onychophora)?
velvet worm, walking worm|fluweel wurm loop wurm
(11) What words refer to crustaceans (phylum Arthropoda, class Crustacea)?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na skaaldiere (filum Arthropoda, klas Crustacea)?
crustacean, shrimp, barnacle, pill bug, lobster, crab, crawfish, crayfish|skaaldier, garnale, Barnacle, pil fout, kreef, krap, kreef, kreef
(12) What words refer to centipedes--animals with a body with many segments and two legs on each segment (phylum Arthropoda, class Chilopoda)?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na honderdpote - diere met &#39;n liggaam met baie segmente en twee bene op elke segment (filum Arthropoda, klas Chilopoda)?
centipede|centipede
(13) What words refer to millipedes--animals with a body with many segments and four legs on each segment (phylum Arthropoda, class Diplopoda)?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na duisendpote - diere met &#39;n liggaam met baie segmente en vier bene op elke segment (filum Arthropoda, klas Diplopoda)?
millipede|duisendpoot
(14) What words refer to horseshoe crabs (phylum Arthropoda, class Merostomata)?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na krappe Horseshoe (filum Arthropoda, klas Merostomata)?
horseshoe crab|shoe krap
(15) What words refer to brachiopods--animals with two shells and two arms (phylum Brachiopoda)?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na brachiopoden - diere met twee skulpe en twee arms (filum Brachiopoda)?
brachiopod, lampshell|brachiopod, lampshell
(16) What words refer to animals with spiny skins (phylum Echinodermata)?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na diere met stekelrige velle (filum Echinodermata)?
echinoderm, sea cucumber, sea urchin, sand dollar, sea star, starfish, brittle star|echinoderm, see komkommer, see-egels, sand dollar, see-ster, seesterre, bros ster
(17) What words refer to arrow worms (phylum Chaetognatha)?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na pyl wurms (filum Chaetognatha)?
arrow worm|pyl wurm
Parts of an animal|Dele van &#39;n dier
Use this domain for the parts of animals, especially those of mammals.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van diere, veral dié van soogdiere.
(1) What general words refer to the parts of an animal?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n dier?
animal body parts|dier liggaamsdele
(2) What are the parts of the head?|(2) Wat is die dele van die kop?
head, ear, eye, nose, muzzle, maw, snout, trunk (of an elephant), proboscis, mouth, tooth, fang , tusk, tongue, neck, horn, antler, dewlap,|kop, oor, oog, neus, bek, maw, snoet, romp (van &#39;n olifant), tromp, mond, tand, fang, tand, tong, nek, horing, geweier, keelvel,
(3) What are the parts of the torso?|(3) Wat is die dele van die romp?
chest, back, belly, rump, croup, tail, switch, udder, flank, brisket, teat, hindquarters,|bors, rug, maag, kruis, kruis, stert, skakelaar, uier, flank, borsstuk, speen, agterkwart,
(4) What are the parts of the legs?|(4) Wat is die dele van die bene?
foreleg, forefoot, forepaw, forelimb, hind leg, hind limb, hoof, paw, claw, hock, fetlock, haunch, pastern, shank, stifle,|voorbeen, voorvoet, voorpoot, voorarm, agterbeen, agterste ledemate, kloue, klou, klou, hak, fetlock, boud, koot, steel, te onderdruk,
(5) What are the parts of the skin and hair?|(5) Wat is die dele van die vel en hare?
fur, wool, fleece, forelock, mane, hide, skin, meat, pelt, whisker, sheepskin, goatskin, leather,|pels, wol, wol, voorlok, maanhare, verberg, vel, vleis, pels, snor, skaapvel, bokke, leer,
(6) What are the internal parts of an animal?|(6) Wat is die interne dele van &#39;n dier?
skull, second stomach (for cows, goats, sheep), spinal cord, lung, heart, small intestine, large intestine, liver, gall bladder, pancreas, kidney|skedel, tweede maag (vir beeste, bokke, skape), rugmurg, long-, hart, dunderm, dikderm, lewer, galblaas, pankreas, niere
(7) What are the parts of sea mammals?|(7) Wat is die dele van die see soogdiere?
whale flukes, flipper, blubber, baleen, blow hole,|walvis slakke, vin, huil, balein, blaas gat,
Parts of a bird|Dele van &#39;n voël
Use this domain for the parts of a bird, but not general parts that belong to all animals.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van &#39;n voël, maar nie algemene dele wat aan al die diere.
(1) What are the parts of a bird?|(1) Wat is die dele van &#39;n voël?
feather, feathered, plumage, plume, quill, down, wing, winged, wing tip, beak, bill, cockscomb (rooster's red crest), wattles (rooster's red flap of skin under beak), crop, gizzard, claw, talon, egg, eggshell, egg tooth, craw, gullet, spur,|veer, geveerde, vere, veer, pen, af, vleuel, vlerke, die vleuel tip, bek, wetsontwerp, hanekam (rooi kuif haan se), wattelbome (rooi flap van die vel onder bek haan se), gewas, spiermaag, klou, stok, eier , eierdop, eier tand, Craw, slukderm, aanspoor,
Parts of a reptile|Dele van &#39;n reptiel
Use this domain for the parts of a reptile.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van &#39;n reptiel.
(1) What are the parts of reptiles?|(1) Wat is die dele van reptiele?
scale, snakeskin, fang, rattle (of rattlesnake), coil, egg tooth,|skaal, snakeskin, fang, rammel (van ratelslang), spoel, eier tand,
(2) What are the parts of a turtle?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n skilpad?
shell|dop
(3) What words refer to a snake's poison?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na gif &#39;n slang se?
venom, venomous, poison, poisonous|gif, giftige, gif, giftige
Parts of a fish|Dele van &#39;n vis
Use this domain for the parts of a fish.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van &#39;n vis.
(1) What are the parts of fish?|(1) Wat is die dele van die vis?
scale, scaly, fin, tail fin, dorsal fin, gill, guts, slime, slimy, fishy smell|skaal, skubberige, vin, stertvin, rugvin, Gill, guts, slyk, slymerige, fishy ruik
Parts of an insect|Dele van &#39;n insek
Use this domain for the parts of an insect.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van &#39;n insek.
(1) What are the parts of insects?|(1) Wat is die dele van insekte?
head, abdomen, thorax, carapace, exoskeleton, wing, horn, stinger, sting, segment, antenna, feeler, forewing, proboscis, compound eye, spinneret,|kop, maag, bors, karapaks, eksoskelet, vleuel, horing, angel, angel, segment, antenna, voeler, voorvlerk, tromp, saamgestelde oog, spin klier,
Parts of small animals|Dele van klein diere
Use this domain for the parts of small animals.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van klein diere.
(1) What are the parts of shellfish?|(1) Wat is die dele van skulpvis?
shell, mother of pearl, mantle, foot, swimmeret,|dop, die moeder van pêrel, mantel, voet, swimmeret,
(2) What are the parts of worms?|(2) Wat is die dele van die wurms?
segment|segment
(3) What are the parts of an octopus or squid?|(3) Wat is die dele van &#39;n seekat of inkvis?
tentacle, sucker, appendage,|tentakel, sucker, aanhangsel,
Animal life cycle|Animal lewensiklus
Use this domain for words related to the life cycle of an animal.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die lewensiklus van &#39;n dier.
(1) What words refer to an animal giving birth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dier geboorte skenk?
give birth, embryo, multiply, propagate, reproduce, calve, calving, drop, kid, lambing, lay, spawn, spawning grounds, whelp|gee geboorte, embrio, vermeerder propageer, reproduseer, kalf, kalf, drop, kind, lam, lê, kuit, paai gronde, &#39;n jong
(2) What words refer to a young animal?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n jong dier?
young, puppy, cub, foal, kid, kitten, lamb, litter, chick, brood, fledgling, larva, roe|jong, hondjie, welpie, vul, kind, katjie, lam, rommel, chick, brood, jong, larwe, gemsbok
(3) What words refer to the sexual behavior of animals?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die seksuele gedrag van diere?
mate, harem, breed|mate, harem, ras
(4) What words refer to the life cycle of insects?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die lewensiklus van insekte?
cocoon, chrysalis, pupa, pupal stage, maggot, grub, larva, larval, caterpillar, nymph|kokon, Chrysalis, papie, papiestadium, luim, grub, larwe, larwe, ruspe nimf
(5) What words refer to animals such as snakes, birds, and insects shedding their skin?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na diere soos slange, voëls en insekte beurtkrag hul vel?
shed (skin), molt (feathers)|werp (vel), molt (vere)
(6) What words refer to animals growing fur, feathers, or new skin?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na diere groeiende pels, vere, of &#39;n nuwe vel?
molt, shed, down, fledge,|molt, werp, af, fledge,
Egg|Eier
Use this domain for words related to eggs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met eiers.
(1) What words refer to an egg?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n eier?
egg|eier
(2) What types of eggs are there?|(2) Watter tipes eiers is daar?
bird egg, reptile egg, insect egg|voël eier, reptiel eier, insek eier
(3) What are the parts of an egg?|(3) Wat is die dele van &#39;n eier?
shell, eggshell, yoke, white, membrane, embryo|dop, eierdop, juk, wit, membraan, embrio
(4) What is a baby bird called?|(4) Wat is &#39;n baba voël genoem?
chick, baby bird, hatchling|chick, baby voëls, uitgebroeide
(5) What do birds do to eggs?|(5) Wat doen voëls doen om eiers?
lay, sit on, incubate, roust, turn, fertilize|lê, sit op, broei, roust, draai, bemes
(6) Where do birds lay their eggs?|(6) Waar voëls lê hul eiers?
nest|nes
(7) What is a group of eggs called?|(7) Wat is &#39;n groep van eiers genoem?
clutch|koppelaar
(8) How do baby birds get out of their egg?|(8) Hoe baba voëls uit hul eier?
hatch, peck its way out of the egg|broei, pik sy pad uit die eier
(9) What words are used for opening an egg?|(9) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die opening van &#39;n eier?
crack, break, smash|kraak, breek, breek
(10) What words are used to describe a bad egg?|(10) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n slegte eier beskryf?
rotten, cracked, broken|vrot, gekraak, gebreek
Animal actions|Animal aksies
Use this domain for actions of animals.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir optrede van diere.
(1) What words refer to the ability of an animal to do something without learning it?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë van &#39;n dier om iets te doen sonder om te leer nie?
instinct, instinctive|instink, instinktiewe
(2) What words refer to animals hunting?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na diere jag?
hunt, stalk, prey|jag, steel, roof
(3) What words refer to animals sleeping during the winter?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na diere slaap gedurende die winter?
hibernate|hiberneer
(4) What do birds do?|(4) Wat doen voëls doen?
roost, (hen) gathers chicks|nes, (hen) versamel kuikens
(5) What do snakes do?|(5) Wat doen slange te doen?
strike, coil, crush (prey), sun (themselves), venom,|staking, spoel, geliefdes (prooi), son (hulself), gif,
(6) What do fish do?|(6) Wat doen die vis doen?
spawn, lay eggs|kuit, lê eiers
(7) What do insects do?|(7) Wat doen insekte doen?
sting, collect nectar|angel, versamel nektar
Animal movement|Beweging van diere
Use this domain for ways in which animals move. Only include words specific for the movement of animals. For the movement of people use the domains under Movement. It is necessary to think through how each type of animal moves, especially the important ones.|Gebruik hierdie domein maniere waarop diere beweeg. Sluit slegs woorde spesifiek vir die beweging van diere. Vir die beweging van mense gebruik die domeine onder Movement. Dit is nodig om te dink deur middel van hoe elke tipe dier beweeg, veral die belangrikste is.
(1) How do mammals move?|(1) Hoe soogdiere beweeg?
gallop, trot, hop, crawl, fly, soar|galop, draf, hop, kruip, vlieg, sweef
(2) How do cows move?|(2) Hoe koeie beweeg?
walk, trot, wander, lie down, charge|stap, draf, dwaal, lê, hef
(3) How do dogs move?|(3) Hoe honde beweeg?
trot, run, wag its tail|draf, hardloop, skud sy stert
(4) How do horses move?|(4) Hoe perde beweeg?
run, gallop, trot, canter, buck, kick, race, charge|hardloop, galop, draf, galop, bok, skop, ras, beheer
(5) How do lions move?|(5) Hoe leeus beweeg?
walk, stalk, charge, run down, prowl|loop, steel, lading, loop af, roof
(6) How do whales move?|(6) Hoe walvisse beweeg?
breach|verbreek
(7) How do birds move?|(7) Hoe voëls beweeg?
fly, flutter, soar, dive, swoop, bank, turn, (hummingbird) hover, hop, roost, hang in the air, ride the wind, alight, land|vlieg, fladder, styg, duik, ophef, bank, draai, (hummingbird) rondfladder, hop, nes, hang in die lug, ry die wind, brand, land
(8) How do snakes move?|(8) Hoe slange beweeg?
slither, glide|seil, gly
(9) How do fish move?|(9) Hoe vis beweeg?
swim, leap|swem, stap
(10) How do insects move?|(10) Hoe insekte beweeg?
fly, hover, dive-bomb, crawl|vlieg, hover, duik bom, kruip
(11) How do worms move?|(11) Hoe wurms beweeg?
crawl, inch along, creep|crawl, duim saam, kruip
(12) What words refer to the annual migration of animals?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die jaarlikse migrasie van diere?
migrate, migration, fly south|migreer, migrasie, vlieg suid
(13) What words refer to animals moving in a group?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na diere wat in &#39;n groep?
herd (v), flock (v), swarm (v), herd instinct, fly in formation, move as a herd,|kudde (v), stroom (v), swerm (v), kudde-instink, vlieg in formasie, beweeg as &#39;n trop,
(14) What words refer to animal tracks?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na dierespore?
track,|spoor,
Animal eating|Animal eet
Use this domain for words referring to animals eating. Because animals often eat in very different ways from people, many languages will have words that are specific to the way an animal eats.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na diere te eet. Omdat diere dikwels eet in baie verskillende maniere van mense, sal baie tale woorde wat spesifiek op die manier &#39;n dier eet is nie.
(1) How do mammals eat?|(1) Hoe soogdiere eet?
graze, feed, chew the cud|wei, voer, herkou
(2) How do carnivores eat?|(2) Hoe karnivore eet?
devour, gorge, tear (prey)|eet, kloof, traan (prooi)
(3) How do birds eat?|(3) Hoe voëls eet?
peck,|pik,
(4) How do snakes eat?|(4) Hoe slange te eet?
swallow|sluk
(5) How do insects eat?|(5) Hoe insekte te eet?
suck blood, bloodsucking, chew (holes in leaves)|suig bloed, bloedsuiende, kou (gate in die blare)
Animal sounds|Animal klanke
Use this domain for the sounds animals make. It is necessary to think through the sounds each type of animal makes, especially the important ones.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die klanke van diere te maak. Dit is nodig om te dink deur middel van die klanke van elke soort dier maak, veral die belangrikste is.
(1) What general words refer to the sounds of animals?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die klanke van diere?
cry, call, scream,|huil, noem, skree,
(2) What sounds do cows make?|(2) Wat klanke nie koeie te maak?
moo, low, bellow, snort|moo, lae, geloei, snuif
(3) What sounds do horses make?|(3) Wat klanke nie perde te maak?
neigh, whinny, bray (donkey),|runnik, hinniken, gebalk (donkie),
(4) What sounds do sheep make?|(4) Wat klink doen skape make?
baa, bleat|baa, balke
(5) What sounds do pigs make?|(5) Wat klanke nie varke te maak?
grunt, snort, squeal,|grunt, gesnuif, geknars,
(6) What sounds do dogs make?|(6) Wat klanke nie honde te maak?
bark, bay, howl, yap, growl, snap, snarl, whimper, whine, woof woof, yelp, yowl,|bas, baai, huil, Yap, grom, snap, warboel, gedrein, geteem, inslag inslag tjank, gemiauw,
(7) What sounds do cats make?|(7) Wat klanke nie katte te maak?
meow, mew, caterwaul, hiss, purr|miauw, mew, krollen, spot, purr
(8) What sounds do lions make?|(8) Wat klanke nie leeus te maak?
roar|brul
(9) What sounds do mice make?|(9) Wat klanke nie muise te maak?
squeak,|piep,
(10) What sounds do birds make?|(10) Wat klanke nie voëls te maak?
sing, song, cry, call, birdcall, birdsong, caw (crow), chatter, cheep, chirp, coo (dove), gaggle, gobble (turkey), honk (goose), hoot (owl), peep, quack (duck), screech, squawk, trill, trumpet, tweet, twitter, warble, whir, whistle,|sing lied, huil, noem, birdcall, voëlgeluide, CAW (kraai), babbel, gepiep, getjilp, koer (duif), snateren, vreet (Turkye), honk (gans), toet (uil), piep kwak (eend ), skree, voëls kreet, trill, trompet, tweet, Twitter, gekweel, gegons, fluitjie,
(11) What sounds do chickens make?|(11) Wat klanke nie hoenders te maak?
cackle, cluck, crow, cockle doodle doo|kekkel, kloek, kraai, onkruid doodle doo
(12) What sounds do snakes make?|(12) Wat klanke slange te maak?
hiss, rattle|spot, rammel
(13) What noises do frogs make?|(13) Wat geluide nie paddas te maak?
croak, rivet|gekwaak, klink
(14) What sounds do crocodiles make?|(14) Wat klanke nie krokodille te maak?
(15) What sounds do fish make?|(15) Wat klink doen vis make?
splash|splash
(16) What sounds do insects make?|(16) Wat klanke nie insekte te maak?
buzz, chirp, chirr, drone, whine, gnaw|buzz, getjilp, tjjrrr, dreun, geteem, knaag
Animal home|Animal huis
Use this domain for animal homes. It is necessary to think through the homes of each type of animal, especially the important ones.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir diere huise. Dit is nodig om te dink deur middel van die huise van elke tipe dier, veral die belangrikste is.
(1) What general words refer to where an animal lives?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na waar &#39;n dier lewens?
habitat, the wild|habitat, die wilde
(2) Where do mammals live?|(2) Waar soogdiere leef?
den, hole, burrow, molehill|den, gat, gat, molshoop
(3) What other places do mammals use?|(3) Watter ander plekke nie soogdiere gebruik?
wallow, hunting grounds, watering hole, pasture, range, trail|neerslaan, jagvelde, water gat, weiding, omvang, roete
(4) Where do birds live?|(4) Waar voëls leef?
nest, birds nest, perch, range|nes, voëls nes, baars, reeks
(5) Where do snakes live?|(5) Waar slange woon?
snake pit, den of vipers, snake hole|slang put, den van adders, slange gat
(6) Where do fish live (other than water, lake, and ocean)?|(6) Waar die vis lewe (behalwe water, meer, en die see)?
spawning grounds|paaigronden
(7) Where do insects live?|(7) Waar insekte leef?
anthill, ants nest, termite mound, termite hill, hive, beehive, bee's wax, honeycomb, spider web, cocoon, trail (of ants)|miershoop, miere nes termiethoop, termiet heuwel korf, was byekorf, bye se, heuningkoek, spinnerak, kokon, roete (miere)
(8) Where do spiders live?|(8) Waar spinnekoppe leef?
spider web, cobweb|spinnekop web, spinnerak
(9) Where do worms live?|(9) Waar wurms leef?
wormhole|wormgat
Animal group|Animal groep
Use this domain for words referring to groups of animals.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na groepe diere.
(1) What words refer to a group of mammals?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van soogdiere?
herd (of cattle), drove (of cattle), kennel (of dogs), pack (of dogs), pride (of lions), pod (of whales)|kudde (beeste), gery (beeste), kennel (honde), pak (honde), trots (leeus), pod (walvisse)
(2) What words refer to a group of birds?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die voëls?
flock (of birds), bevy, colony, covey, flight, flock, gaggle|stroom (voëls), skare, kolonie Covey, vlug, skape, snateren
(3) What words refer to a group of fish?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die vis?
school (of fish), shoal|skool (vis), Shoal
(4) What is a group of insects called?|(4) Wat is &#39;n groep van insekte genoem?
swarm (of insects), plague of locusts|swerm (insekte), sprinkaanplaag
(5) What is a group of small animals called?|(5) Wat is &#39;n groep van klein diere genoem?
culture|kultuur
(6) What words refer to the leader of a group of animals?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die leier van &#39;n groep van diere?
alpha male|alfa mannetjie
(7) What words refer to the followers in a group of animals?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die volgelinge in &#39;n groep van diere?
harem|harem
(8) What words refer to a group of baby animals?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die baba diere?
brood, clutch (of eggs), kit, litter (of kittens), farrow (of pigs)|brood, koppelaar (eiers), kit, rommel (van katjies), Farrow (varke)
(9) What other words relate to groups of animals?|(9) Watter ander woorde verband hou met groepe diere?
herd instinct|kudde-instink
Male and female animals|Manlike en vroulike diere
Use this domain for words referring to male and female animals. Most languages have special words for the male and female of a species only for domesticated animals. Sometimes there will be a word for the male and not the female, and vice versa (male dog, bitch). Sometimes the word for one is also used generically|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die manlike en vroulike diere. Die meeste tale het &#39;n spesiale woorde vir die manlike en vroulike van &#39;n spesie net vir huisdiere. Soms sal daar &#39;n woord vir die manlike en die vroulike nie, en omgekeerd (reun, teef) wees. Soms is die woord vir een ook generies gebruik
(cow for both female and generic).|(Koei vir beide vroulike en generiese).
(1) What words refer to a male or female animal?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n manlike of vroulike dier?
male, female, bitch, tom, tomcat, bull, bullock, cow, heifer, ram, ewe, billy goat, nanny goat, boar, sow, stallion, mare, filly, stag, buck, hart, doe, vixen, lioness, tigress, bull elephant, rooster, cock, hen, drake, peacock, peahen|manlike, vroulike, teef, Tom, tomcat, bul, bul, koei, koei, ram, ooi, Billy bok bokooi, beer, saai, hings, merrie, merrie, takbok, bok, takbok, doen, vixen, wyfie, tierwyfie, olifantbul, rooster, haan, hen, drake, pou, pauwin
Nature, environment|Natuur, omgewing
Use this domain for words referring to nature and the environment--the world around us. Include words that refer to how people damage or protect nature.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die natuur en die omgewing - die wêreld rondom ons. Sluit woorde wat verwys na hoe mense beskadig of te beskerm natuur.
(1) What words refer to the world around us?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die wêreld rondom ons?
world, nature, environment, environmental|wêreld, die natuur, omgewing, omgewing
(2) What words refer to damaging the environment?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die skade aan die omgewing?
pollute, pollution, pollutant, acid rain, smog, deforestation, global warming, greenhouse effect|besoedel, besoedeling, besoedeling, suurreën, rookmis, ontbossing, aardverwarming, kweekhuiseffek
(3) What words refer to protecting the environment?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die beskerming van die omgewing?
conserve, conservation, recycle, biodegradable|Bewaar, bewaring, herwin, biodegradeerbare
(4) What words refer to the study of the environment?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die studie van die omgewing?
ecology|ekologie
(5) What words refer to a person who studies or tries to protect the environment?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat studies of probeer om die omgewing te beskerm?
environmentalist, conservationist, ecologist, Green Party|omgewingspesialis, natuurbewaarder, ekoloog, Groen Party
Natural|Natuurlike
Use this domain for words describing something that is natural--something in the world around us, as opposed to something that has been made or changed by people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat natuurlike beskryf - iets in die wêreld rondom ons, in teenstelling met iets wat deur mense gemaak is of verander word.
(1) What words describe something that is natural?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat natuurlike beskryf?
natural, naturally, wild (animals, country), raw (materials), virgin (forest), untamed, organic|natuurlike, natuurlik, wilde (diere, land), rou (materiaal), maagd (bos), ongetemde, organiese
Person|Persoon
Use this domain for general words for a person or all mankind.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir &#39;n persoon of die hele mensdom.
(1) What words refer to a single member of the human race?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n enkele lid van die menslike ras?
person, human being, man, individual, figure|persoon, mens, man, individuele, figuur
(2) What words refer to a person when you aren't sure who the person is?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wanneer jy nie seker is wie die persoon is?
someone, somebody|iemand, iemand
(3) What words refer to more than one person?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na meer as een persoon?
people, folks, population, the public, populace,|mense, mense, bevolking, die publiek, bevolking,
(4) What words refer to the entire human race?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die hele menslike ras?
man, men, mankind, the human race, humanity, humankind,|man, mans, die mensdom, die menslike ras, die mensdom, die mensdom,
(5) What words describe something characteristic of all people?|(5) Watter woorde iets kenmerkend van alle mense beskryf?
human (adj), human nature|menslike (adj), die menslike natuur
(6) What words describe something characteristic of one person?|(6) Watter woorde iets kenmerkend van een persoon beskryf?
personal, personally,|persoonlike, persoonlik,
(7) What words refer to no person?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na geen persoon?
no one, nobody|niemand, niemand
Body|Liggaam
Use this domain for general words for the whole human body, and general words for any part of the body. Use a drawing or photo to label each part. Some words may be more general than others are and include some of the other words. For instance 'head' is more general than 'face' or 'nose'. Be sure that both general and specific parts are labeled.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir die hele menslike liggaam, en algemene woorde vir enige deel van die liggaam. Gebruik &#39;n tekening of foto om elke deel te etiketteer. Sommige woorde kan meer algemene wees as ander is en sluit &#39;n paar van die ander woorde. Byvoorbeeld &#39;hoof&#39; is meer algemeen is as &#39;gesig&#39; of &#39;neus&#39;. Maak seker dat beide algemene en spesifieke dele gemerk.
(1) What words refer to the body?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die liggaam?
body,|liggaam,
(2) What words refer to the shape of a person's body?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die vorm van die liggaam &#39;n persoon se?
build, figure, physique,|bou, figuur, liggaamsbou,
(3) What general words refer to a part of the body?|(3) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van die liggaam?
part of the body, body part, anatomy, appendage, member, orifice,|deel van die liggaam, deel van die liggaam, anatomie, aanhangsel, lid, opening,
(4) What words describe something about your body?|(4) Watter woorde iets oor jou liggaam te beskryf?
physical, physically, bodily,|fisiese, fisies, liggaamlik,
(5) What words refer to cells?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die selle?
cell, cellular, chromosome, protoplasm,|sel, sellulêre, chromosome, protoplasma,
Head|Hoof
Use this domain for the parts of the head.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van die kop.
(1) What words refer to the head?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die kop?
head|hoof
feature, scalp, back of the head, chin, temple, poll, skull, brain,|funksie, kopvel, agterkant van die kop, ken, tempel, poll, skedel, brein,
(3) What are the parts of the face?|(3) Wat is die dele van die gesig?
face, forehead, cheek, chin, cleft (in chin), dimple (in cheek), jaw,|gesig, voorkop, wange, ken, gesplete (in ken), kuiltjie (in die kies), kaak,
(4) What are the parts of the neck?|(4) Wat is die dele van die nek?
neck, nape (back of the neck), throat, Adam's apple, wrinkle, fold in skin of neck|nek, agterkop (agterkant van die nek), keel, Adam se appel, rimpel, vou in die vel van die nek
(5) What words describe the parts of a person's face?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf die dele van &#39;n persoon se gesig?
facial, thin (face), high (forehead), thick (eyebrows), long (eyelashes), beady (eyes), stubby (nose), fleshy (cheeks), narrow (mouth), double chin|gesig, dun (gesig), hoog (voorkop), dik (wenkbroue), &#39;n lang (wimpers), soortgelyk bead (oë), stomp (neus), vlesige (wange), smal (mond), dubbele ken
Eye|Oog
Use this domain for words related to the eye.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die oog.
(1) What words refer to an eye?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n oog?
eye,|oog,
(2) What are the parts of the eye?|(2) Wat is die dele van die oog?
eyebrow, brow, eyelash, lash, eyelid, lid, pupil, cornea, iris, white, eyeball, ball of the eye, corner of the eye, tear duct, retina, eye socket,|wenkbrou, voorkop, ooghaar, slag, ooglid, deksel, leerling, kornea, iris, wit, oogbal, bal van die oog, hoek van die oog, traanbuis, retina, oogkas,
(3) What words describe a person's eyes?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf n mens se oë?
bloodshot, bleary, bleary-eyed, beady eyes, thick (eyebrows), long (eyelashes), blue-eyed, cross-eyed,|bloedbelope, vaag, leepogig, kraalogies, dik (wenkbroue), &#39;n lang (wimpers), blou-oog, skeeloog,
(4) What do the eyes do?|(4) Wat doen die oë te doen?
see, cry, water,|sien, huil, water,
(5) What words refer to the eyes moving?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die oë beweeg?
look cross-eyed, roll, flicker, raise, lower, glaze,|kyk cross-eyed, roll, flikker, verhoog, laer, glans,
(6) What words refer to the eyelids moving?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die ooglede beweeg?
blink, wink, close, open, squint, open wide (in amazement), bat (eyelids), flutter,|knip, wink, naby, oop, squint, wyd oop (in verwondering), kolf (ooglede), fladder,
(7) What do people do to their eyes?|(7) Wat doen mense hul oë?
rub (your eyes), cover (your eyes)|vryf (jou oë), dek (jou oë)
(8) What do the eyes produce?|(8) Wat doen die oë te produseer?
tears,|trane,
(9) What words refer to the material that collects in the corner of the eyes while sleeping?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die materiaal wat versamel in die hoek van die oë, terwyl die slaap?
sleep, sand, matter|slaap, sand, saak
(10) What words refer to the pupil of the eye getting bigger or smaller?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die pupil van die oog om groter of kleiner?
dilate|verwyd
(11) What words describe something to do with the eyes?|(11) Watter woorde iets te doen met die oë te beskryf?
optic, retinal,|optiese, retinale,
Ear|Oor
Use this domain for words related to the ear.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die oor.
(1) What words refer to an ear?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n oor?
ear,|oor,
(2) What are the parts of the ear?|(2) Wat is die dele van die oor?
earlobe, lobe, inner ear, eardrum, tympanum, Eustachian tube, auditory nerve, canal, cochlea,|oorlob, lob, binneoor, oordrom, timpanum, Eustachius, gehoorsenuwee, kanaal, koglea,
(3) What words describe a person's ears?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf ore &#39;n persoon se?
stick out,|steek,
(4) What do the ears do?|(4) Wat doen die ore doen?
hear,|hoor,
(5) What words refer to the ears moving?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die ore beweeg?
wiggle,|wikkel,
(6) What do people do to their ears?|(6) Wat doen mense hul ore?
scratch, pick (your ear), clean, cup (put hand behind to help hearing), pierce (for earrings),|nuuts af, haal (jou oor), skoon, koppie (sit hand agter te help hoor), Pierce (vir oorbelle),
(7) What do people do to their ears so they won't hear something?|(7) Wat doen mense hul ore sodat hulle nie iets sal hoor?
plug your ears, cover your ears, stuff cotton in your ears, stick your fingers in your ears, earplugs|prop jou ore, bedek jou ore, dinge katoen in jou ore, hou jou vingers in jou ore, oorpluisies
(8) What do the ears produce?|(8) Wat doen die ore te produseer?
wax, earwax,|was, oorsmeer,
(9) What do people use to clean their ears?|(9) Wat doen die mense gebruik om hul ore skoon te maak?
Q-tip|Q-punt
(10) What words describe something to do with the ears?|(10) Watter woorde iets te doen met die ore te beskryf?
aural,|gehoor,
Nose|Neus
Use this domain for words related to the nose.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die neus.
(1) What words refer to the nose?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die neus?
nose,|neus,
(2) What are the parts of the nose?|(2) Wat is die dele van die neus?
nostril, bridge, septum, sinus, nasal passage, mucous membrane,|neusgat, brug, septum, sinus, neusholte, slymvlies,
(3) What words describe a person's nose?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf neus &#39;n persoon se?
pointed, flat, turned-up, snub-nosed, stubby, wide, long, upturned, hooked, aquiline,|daarop, plat, draai-up, stompneuzig, stomp, breed, lank, omgekeerde, krom, aquiline,
(4) What does the nose do?|(4) Wat beteken die neus te doen?
smell, breathe,|ruik, asem te haal,
(5) What words describe the way air moves through the nose?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf die manier lug beweeg deur die neus?
sneeze, sniff, sniffle, snort, snuffle, wheeze|nies, snuif, sniffle, snuif, snuiven, hijgen
(6) What words refer to the nose moving?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die neus beweeg?
nostrils flare, wrinkle your nose,|neus opvlam, rimpel jou neus,
(7) What do people do to their nose?|(7) Wat doen mense hul neus?
hold your nose, pierce (the septum), put a ring in (the nose)|hou jou neus, steek (die septum), het &#39;n ring in (die neus)
(8) What words describe something to do with the nose?|(8) Watter woorde iets te doen met die neus te beskryf?
nasal,|nasale,
Mouth|Mond
Use this domain for words related to the mouth. Do not use this domain for words referring to eating, drinking, or speaking.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die mond. Moenie hierdie domein woorde verwys na die eet, drink, of praat nie gebruik nie.
(1) What words refer to the mouth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die mond?
mouth,|mond
(2) What are the parts of the mouth?|(2) Wat is die dele van die mond?
lip, tongue, tooth, gum, uvula, palate, alveolar ridge, mouth cavity, roof, velum, throat,|lip, tong, tand, gom, kleintongetjie, verhemelte, alveolêre kam, mondholte, dak, velum, keel,
(3) What words describe a person's mouth?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf mond &#39;n persoon se?
narrow, curved, thin lips, thick lips,|smal, geboë, dun lippe, dik lippe,
(4) What do people do with their mouth?|(4) Wat doen mense met hul mond?
breathe, talk, eat, taste, clear your throat, suck, blow, kiss, gag,|asemhaal, praat, eet, smaak, duidelik jou keel, suig, blaas, soen, gag,
(5) What words refer to moving the mouth?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van die mond?
open, close, smile, purse your lips,|oop, naby, glimlag, beursie jou lippe,
(6) What words refer to yawning?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na gapende?
yawn, yawn (n),|gaap, gaap (n),
(7) What words refer to vomiting?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na braking?
vomit (v), vomit (n), regurgitate, disgorge, heave, retch, throw up,|braak (v), braaksel (n), spoeg, terug gee, afgee, braking, gooi,
(8) What do people do with their tongue?|(8) Wat doen mense met hul tong?
lick, lick your lips, stick your tongue out, click your tongue, bite your tongue,|lek, lek jou lippe, hou jou tong, kliek jou tong byt jou tong,
(9) What do people do to their mouth?|(9) Wat doen mense na hul mond?
wipe, cover, gag someone,|vee, cover, gag iemand,
(10) What words describe something to do with the mouth?|(10) Watter woorde iets te doen met die mond te beskryf?
oral, orally, labial, palatal, velar,|mondelinge, mondeling, labiale, palatale, velare,
Tooth|Tand
Use this domain for words related to the teeth.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die tande.
(1) What words refer to a tooth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tand?
tooth, incisor, canine tooth, molar, wisdom tooth, milk tooth, baby tooth,|tand, snytand, honde tand, molêre, wysheid tand, melk tand, baby tand,
(2) What are the parts of a tooth?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n tand?
enamel, root, crown, ivory,|email, wortel, kroon, ivoor
(3) What words describe a person's teeth?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf tande &#39;n persoon se?
even, crooked, decayed, white, yellow,|selfs, krom, verval, wit, geel,
(4) What do the teeth do?|(4) Wat doen die tande te doen?
bite, chew,|byt, kou,
(5) What words refer to moving the teeth against each other?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van die tande teen mekaar?
grind, gnash,|maal, piepen,
(6) What do people do to their teeth?|(6) Wat doen mense hul tande?
pick,|haal,
(7) What words describe something to do with the teeth?|(7) Wat woorde iets te doen met die tande te beskryf?
dental,|tandheelkundige,
Torso|Bolyf
Use this domain for the parts of the torso.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van die romp.
(1) What words refer to the torso?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die bolyf?
body, trunk, torso, abdomen, abdominal,|liggaam, stam, torso, abdomen, abdominale,
(2) What are the parts of the torso?|(2) Wat is die dele van die romp?
shoulder, chest, breast, bust, nipple, teat, bosom, stomach, belly, tummy, navel, belly button, back, lower back, rear end, buttock, bottom, behind, side, waist, middle, hip, girdle, groin, hollow part of hip, anus, lumbar, midriff, pectoral, pubis, thorax, thoracic,|skouer, bors, bors, bors, tepel, speen, boesem, maag, maag, maag, naeltjie, naeltjie, terug, rug, agterkant, boud, onder, agter, kant, middellyf, middel, hip, gordel, lies , hol deel van hip, anus, lumbale, middellyf, pektorale, pubis, toraks, torakale,
Limb|Limb
Use this domain for words referring to a limb--either an arm or a leg.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n ledemaat - óf &#39;n arm of &#39;n been.
(1) What words refer to a limb?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ledemaat?
limb, extremity, arms and legs|ledemaat, uiteinde, arms en bene
Arm|Arm
Use this domain for the parts of the arm.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van die arm.
(1) What words refer to the arm?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die arm?
arm|arm
(2) What are the parts of the arm?|(2) Wat is die dele van die arm?
shoulder, armpit, upper arm, elbow, funny bone (nerve in elbow), forearm, lower arm, wrist,|skouer, arm, bo-arm, elmboog, snaaks been (senuwee in elmboog), voorarm, laer arm, pols,
(3) What words refer to the hand?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die hand?
hand, right hand, left hand, heel of hand, palm, back of hand|hand, regterhand, linkerhand hak van die hand, palm, agterkant van die hand
(4) What words refer to a part of an arm when it is in a particular position?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van &#39;n arm wanneer dit in &#39;n bepaalde posisie?
crook (of the arm when it is bent), fist,|skelm (van die arm wanneer dit gebuig), vuis,
Leg|Been
Use this domain for the parts of the leg and foot.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die dele van die been en voet.
(1) What general words refer to the entire leg?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die hele been?
leg|been
(2) What are the parts of the leg?|(2) Wat is die dele van die been?
upper leg, groin, thigh, knee, kneecap, lower leg, calf, shin, ankle, 'wing', foot, heel, sole, ball of foot, the outside part of foot, instep, arch, shank,|bobeen, lies, heup, knie, knieskyf, onderbeen, kalf, shin, enkel, &quot;vlerk&quot;, voet, hak, enigste, bal van bek, die buite deel van voet wreef, boog, steel,
(3) What words refer to a part of a leg when it is in a particular position?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van &#39;n been as dit in &#39;n bepaalde posisie?
lap,|skoot,
(4) What words describe a person's legs?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf bene &#39;n persoon se?
pigeon toed, knock-kneed, bow-legged, flat-footed,|duif gelyktonige, X-bene, krom bene, platvoet,
Finger, toe|Vinger toe
Use this domain for words related to the fingers and toes.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vingers en tone.
(1) What general words refer to the fingers and toes?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die vingers en tone?
finger, toe, digit,|vinger toe, syfer,
(2) What are the names of each finger?|(2) Wat is die name van elke vinger?
thumb, index finger, forefinger, middle finger, ring finger, little finger|duim, wysvinger, wysvinger, middelvinger, ringvinger, pinkie
(3) What are the names of each toe?|(3) Wat is die name van elke toon?
big toe, first toe, middle toe, third toe, little toe|groottoon, eerste toe, middel toe, derde toe, kleintoontjie
(4) What words refer to the parts of a finger or toe?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n vinger of toon?
knuckle, fingertip, fingerprint,|kneukel, vinger, vingerafdruk,
(5) What words refer to a fingernail or toenail?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n vingernael of toonnael?
nail, fingernail, toenail|spyker, vingernael, toonnael
(6) What are the parts of a fingernail?|(6) Wat is die dele van &#39;n vingernael?
cuticle, root|kutikula, wortel
Skin|Vel
Use this domain for words related to the skin.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vel.
(1) What general words refer to the skin?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die vel?
skin, hide, dermis, epidermal, epidermis, pore|vel, weg te steek, dermis, epidermale, epidermis, porie
(2) What words refer to thick skin?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na dik vel?
callus, calloused,|eelt, vereelte,
(3) What words refer to a line in the skin?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lyn in die vel?
line, wrinkle, fold, crease,|lyn, rimpel, vou, vou,
(4) What words refer to spots on a person's skin?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na kolle op die vel &#39;n persoon se?
spot, freckle, birthmark, wart, corn, mole, blemish, blotch, scar,|spot, sproet, geboortevlek, vrat, mielies, mol, gebrek, vlek, litteken,
(5) What words refer to small sores in the skin?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na klein sere in die vel?
pimple, acne, zit, whitehead, blackhead,|puisie, aknee, sit, Whitehead, zwartkop,
(6) What words refer to the color of a person's skin?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die kleur van die vel &#39;n persoon se?
skin color, coloring, complexion, pigment,|velkleur, kleur, gelaat, pigment,
(7) What words describe the color of a person's skin?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf die kleur van die vel &#39;n persoon se?
flesh (colored), white, black, blotchy, red, bloom, blush, fair, dark, florid, glowing, sanguine, swarthy, albino,|vlees (gekleurde), wit, swart, kollerige, rooi, blom, bloos, regverdig, donker, bloeiend, gloeiende, sanguine, donker, albino,
(8) What words describe the color of a person's skin when they are sick or afraid?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf die kleur van die vel &#39;n persoon se as hulle siek is of bang?
pale, anemic, ashen, bloodless, cadaverous, deathly, flushed, ghastly, lurid, pallid, pallor, pale-faced, pale as death, pale as a ghost, pasty, sallow, wan, white as a sheet, go white, turn blue,|bleek, anemies, vaal, bloedlose, kadaweragtige, doodse, gespoel, woede, guur, bleek, bleek, bleek, bleek soos die dood, bleek as &#39;n spook, vleespastei, vaal, skop, wit soos &#39;n laken, gaan wit, beurt blou,
(9) What words describe the condition of a person's skin?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf die toestand van die vel &#39;n persoon se?
skin condition, clear, oily, dry, cracked, loose, smooth, soft, rough, flake, scale, peel, scarred,|vel toestand, duidelik, olierige, droë, gekraak, los, gladde, sagte, ruwe, vlok, skaal, skil, vers,
(10) What words describe your skin when you have been in the sun?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf jou vel wanneer jy in die son gewees het nie?
sunburn, tan, tanned, suntan, burn, blister,|sonbrand, tan, gelooi, zonnebrand, brand, blister,
(11) What words refer to the small bumps on your skin when you are cold, ill, or frightened?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die klein knoppies op jou vel wanneer jy koud, siek is, of bang is?
goose flesh, goose pimples, goose bumps,|hoendervleis, hoendervleis, hoendervleis,
Hair|Hair
Use this domain for words related to hair.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met hare.
(1) What words refer to hair?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die hare?
hair,|hare,
(2) What word refer to one hair?|(2) Watter woord verwys na een hare?
strand|strand
(3) What are the parts of a hair?|(3) Wat is die dele van &#39;n hare?
follicle, root, end, split end|follikel, wortel, einde, verdeel einde
(4) What words refer to hair on different parts of the body?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die hare op verskillende dele van die liggaam?
head hair, forelock, body hair, pubic hair|hoof hare, voorlok, liggaam hare, skaamhare
(5) What words refer to hair on the face?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die hare op die gesig?
beard, mustache, whiskers, sideburns, goatee, facial hair, peach fuzz|baard snor, baard, bakkebaarde, bokkie, gesighare, perske pluis
(6) What words describe types of hair?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf tipes hare?
kinky, curl, curly, wavy, straight, coarse, fine, thick, thin,|kinky, krul, krullerige, golwende, reguit, growwe, fyn, dik, dun,
(7) What words describe the color of hair?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf die kleur van die hare?
blond, red, auburn, chestnut, fair, dark, grizzled, mousy, ginger, sandy,|blonde, rooi, rooibruin, chestnut, regverdig, donker, bont, vaal, gemmer, sanderige,
(8) What words describe someone who has hair of a particular color?|(8) Watter woorde iemand wat haar van &#39;n bepaalde kleur het, beskryf?
blonde, brunette, redhead, towhead, redheaded, fair-haired, dark-haired, black-haired, grey-haired,|blonde, brunette, rooikop, blonde man, rooikop, blond, donker hare, swart hare, grys hare,
(9) What words describe the direction hair grows on the head?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf die rigting hare groei op die kop?
cowlick, crown|kuif, kroon
(10) What words describe someone who has lots of hair?|(10) Watter woorde iemand wat baie van die hare het, beskryf?
hairy, bearded, bushy,|harige, bebaarde, golwende,
(11) What words describe a man who has lost his hair?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n man wat sy hare verloor het?
bald, bald spot, thinning hair, receding hairline|kaal kaal plek, dunner hare, afneem haarlyn
(12) What words refer to dirt in the hair?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na vuil in die hare?
dandruff, dander,|roos, verontwaardiging,
Bone, joint|Been, gewrig
Use this domain for words related to the bones and joints.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die bene en gewrigte.
(1) What general words refer to a bone?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n been?
bone, bony,|been, benerige,
(2) What words refer to the entire set of bones?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die hele stel van bene?
skeleton, skeletal|skelet, skeletale
(3) What words refer to specific bones?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na spesifieke bene?
skull, jawbone, shoulder blade, collarbone, clavicle, backbone, rib, hip, tibia, tailbone, carpal, carpus, cranium, femur, fibula, humerus, mandible, mandibular, maxillary, metacarpus, metacarpal, metatarsus, metatarsal, parietal bone, pelvis, pelvic, radius, shinbone, spine, sternum, tarsus, ulna, vertebra, vertebral,|skedel, kakebeen, skouer lem, sleutelbeen, klavikel, ruggraat, rib, hip, tibia, stuit, karpale, carpus, skedel, femur, fibula, humerus, mandibel, mandibulêre, maksillêre, hand wortel, metakarpale, metatarsus, metatarsale, pariëtale been, pelvis, bekken, radius, scheenbeen, ruggraat, sternum, tarsus, ulna, werwel, vertebrale,
(4) What are the parts of a bone?|(4) Wat is die dele van &#39;n been?
marrow|murg
(5) What words refer to a joint between two bones?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n gesamentlike tussen twee bene?
joint, knuckle (of finger), elbow, knee, hip, coronal suture,|gesamentlike, kneukel (vinger), elmboog, knie, heup, koronale hegting,
(6) What are the parts of a joint?|(6) Wat is die dele van &#39;n gesamentlike?
cartilage, tendon, fluid sack, socket, ball|kraakbeen, tendon, vloeistof sak, socket, bal
(7) What words refer to the sounds made by popping the knuckles?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die klanke gemaak deur die knal die vingers?
to crack (your knuckles), pop|om te kraak (jou vingers), pop
Flesh|Vlees

connective tissue, fat, cartilage, gland, lymph gland, membrane, fiber, sheath, vesicle,|bindweefsel, vet, kraakbeen, klier, limf klier, membraan, vesel, skede, vesikel,

Internal organs|Interne organe

organ, internal organ, gut, gland, system, systemic, vascular system, vas, cortex, sac,|orrel, interne orgaan, derm, klier, stelsel, sistemiese vaskulêre stelsel, vas, korteks, sac,
(2) What are the names of each of the internal organs?|(2) Wat is die name van elk van die interne organe?
liver, hepatic, appendix, gall bladder, pancreas, pancreatic, spleen, lymphatic, lymph node, peritoneum,|lewer, lewer, bylaag, galblaas, pankreas, pankreas, milt, limfatiese, limfknoop, peritoneum,
(3) What are the parts of the lungs?|(3) Wat is die dele van die longe?
lung, pulmonary system, lobe, sack, diaphragm, respiratory system,|long, long stelsel, lob, sak, diafragma, respiratoriese stelsel,
(4) What are the parts of the intestines?|(4) Wat is die dele van die ingewande?
intestine, intestinal tract, gut, bowel, small intestine, large intestine, colon, transverse colon, rectum, anus|dunderm, derm, derm, derm, dunderm, dikderm, kolon, dwars kolon, rektum, anus
(5) What are the parts of the kidneys and bladder?|(5) Wat is die dele van die niere en blaas?
kidney, bladder, urethra, ureter, urinary, nephritic, renal,|nier, blaas, uretra, ureter, urinêre, nefrotiese, nier,
(6) What words refer to the glands?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die kliere?
adrenal, endocrine, pituitary, thyroid, thymus, sweat gland, salivary gland, mammary gland, hormone, hormonal,|adrenale, endokriene, pituïtêre, skildklier, thymus, sweetklier, speekselkliere, melkklier, hormoon, hormonale,
(7) What are the parts of the throat?|(7) Wat is die dele van die keel?
throat, trachea, esophagus, Adam's apple, bronchus, bronchial, windpipe, pharyngeal, pharynx, gullet, epiglottis, glottal, glottis, laryngeal, larynx,|keel, tragea, slukderm, Adam se appel, bronchus, brongiale, lugpyp, faringeale, farinks, slukderm, epiglottis, glottale, glottis, laringeale, larinks,
(8) What are the parts of the nervous system?|(8) Wat is die dele van die senuweestelsel?
brain, spinal column, spinal cord, nerve, nervous, nerve ending, synapse, synaptic, cerebellum, cerebrum, ganglion, hypothalamus, neural, neuron,|brein, rugmurg, rugmurg, senuwees, senuwee, senuwee, sinaps, sinaptiese, serebellum, serebrum, ganglion, hipotalamus, neurale, neuron,
Heart|Hart
Use this domain for functions of the heart and blood veins.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir funksies van die hart en bloed are.
(1) What are the parts of the heart?|(1) Wat is die dele van die hart?
heart, chamber, atrium, ventricle, valve, cardiac,|hart, kamer, atrium, ventrikel, klep, hart,
(2) What are the parts of the blood vessels?|(2) Wat is die dele van die bloedvate?
circulatory system, blood vessel, aorta, vein, venous, artery, arterial, capillary, jugular, pericardium, pericardial,|sirkulasiestelsel, bloedvat, aorta, trant, veneuse, slagaar, arteriële, kapillêre, jugulêre, perikardium, perikardiale,
(3) What words refer to the heart beating?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die hart klop?
beat (v), thump, throb,|klop (v), stomp, klop,
(4) What words refer to the heart beating quickly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die hart vinnig klop?
pound, race, rapid heart beat,|pond, ras, vinnige hartklop,
(5) What words refer to the heart beating in a bad way?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die hart klop in &#39;n slegte manier?
heart murmur, irregular heart beat, skip a beat,|hartgeruis, onreëlmatige hartklop, slaan &#39;n klop,
(6) What words refer to the heartbeat?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die hartklop?
beat (n), heartbeat, pulse, rhythm,|klop (n), hartklop, pols, ritme,
(7) What words refer to listening to the heart beating?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die luister na die hart klop?
take someone's pulse, listen to someone's heartbeat, feel for a pulse,|neem van iemand se pols, luister na iemand se hartklop, voel vir &#39;n pols,
(8) What words refer to the heart moving blood?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die hart beweeg bloed?
pump,|pomp,
(9) What words refer to blood moving through the veins?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na bloed beweeg deur die are?
flow, circulate, blood pressure,|vloei, sirkuleer, bloeddruk,
(10) What words refer to the heart stopping?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die hart-stop?
stop beating, heart attack,|ophou klop, hartaanval,
Stomach|Maag
Use this domain for words referring to the stomach and to the normal functions of the stomach. Do not use this domain for stomach illness.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die maag en die normale funksies van die maag. Moenie hierdie domein vir die maag siekte nie gebruik nie.
(1) What are the parts of the stomach?|(1) Wat is die dele van die maag?
stomach, tummy, digestive tract, lining,|maag, maag, spysverteringskanaal, voering,
(2) What does the stomach do?|(2) Wat beteken die maag doen?
digest (food), digestion, burp, hunger, be empty, be full, distend, fill with gas|Digest (kos), vertering, burp, honger, leeg, vol, opzwellen, vul met gas
(3) What noises does the stomach make?|(3) Wat geluide nie die maag te maak?
rumble, grumble, gurgle|rommel, mor, roggel
(4) What words refer to the contents of the stomach?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die inhoud van die maag?
contents (of the stomach), undigested food, acid, digestive juices, gas,|inhoud (van die maag), onverteerde voedsel, suur, verteringsappe, gas,
(5) What words describe something to do with the stomach?|(5) Watter woorde iets te doen met die maag te beskryf?
gastric, gastrointestinal, abdominal,|maag, maag, abdominale,

penis, scrotum, testicle, testis, foreskin, loins|penis, skrotum, testikel, testis, voorhuid, heupe

swell, enlarge, erect, erection, ejaculate, ejaculation,|swel, vergroot, regop, oprigting, ejakulasie, ejakulasie,
(4) What words refer to the liquid produced?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die vloeistof geproduseer?
semen, sperm, seminal,|semen, sperm, seminale,

reproductive, genital, sexual,|voortplanting, genitale seksuele,
Female organs|Vroulike organe
Use this domain for words related to the female reproductive organs and a woman's monthly menstrual cycle. Some of these terms may be taboo. Care must be exercised in which terms are included in the dictionary. A group of women should decide which terms are 'public' and can go in the dictionary, and which would be considered taboo, overly crude, or embarrassing. For example some societies have been afraid that their women will be taken advantage of if these terms are known.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vroulike geslagsorgane en maandelikse menstruele siklus &#39;n vrou se. Sommige van hierdie terme kan taboe wees. Sorg moet uitgeoefen in watter terme is ingesluit in die woordeboek. &#39;N Groep vroue moet besluit watter terme&#39; openbare &#39;is en kan gaan in die woordeboek, en wat oorweeg sou word taboe, té ru, of verleentheid. Byvoorbeeld sommige gemeenskappe het bang was dat hulle vroue geneem sal word as voordeel van hierdie terme is bekend.
(1) What words refer to the female organs?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vroulike organe?
breast, nipple, vagina, clitoris, uterus, womb, ovary, egg, vulva, labia majora, labia minora, vestibule, genitals, private parts,|bors, tepel, vagina, clitoris, baarmoeder, skoot, ovarium, eier, vulva, labia majora, labia minora, voorportaal, geslagsdele, private dele,
(2) What words refer to a woman's monthly menstrual cycle?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na maandelikse menstruele siklus &#39;n vrou se?
menstrual cycle|menstruele siklus
(3) What words refer to the time of bleeding?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd van bloeding?
menstruate, period, having (your) period, time of month, menstruation,|menstrueer, tydperk, met (jou) tydperk, die tyd van maand menstruasie,
(4) What words refer to the discharge?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die ontslag?
menses,|menstruasie,
(5) What materials are used by women to absorb the discharge?|(5) Watter materiaal word gebruik deur vroue om die ontslag te absorbeer?
sanitary towel, sanitary napkin, tampon, pad, menstrual cloth,|sanitêre handdoek, maandverband, tampon, pad, menstruele doek,
(6) What words describe something to do with the female organs?|(6) Watter woorde iets te doen met die vroulike organe te beskryf?
reproductive, genital, sexual, vaginal, menstrual,|voortplanting, genitale seksuele, vaginale, menstruele,
(7) What words refer to the time in a woman's life when she stops menstruating?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die tyd in die lewe van &#39;n vrou toe sy ophou menstrueer?
menopause,|menopouse,
Body functions|Liggaam funksies
Use this domain for the functions and actions of the whole body. Use the subdomains in this section  for functions, actions, secretions, and products of various parts of the body. In each domain include any special words that are used of animals.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die funksies en optrede van die hele liggaam. Gebruik subdomeinen in hierdie afdeling vir funksies, aksies, afskeidings, en die produkte van die verskillende dele van die liggaam. In elke afdeling sluit enige spesiale woorde wat gebruik word van diere.
(1) What general words refer to the functions of the body?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die funksies van die liggaam?
function|funksie
(2) What general words refer to secretions of the body?|(2) Wat is die algemene woorde verwys na afskeidings van die liggaam?
secrete, secretion, excrete, excretion, product, fluid, body fluids, discharge, flux,|skei, sekresie, skei, ekskresie, produk, vloeistof, liggaamsvloeistowwe, ontslag, vloed,
(3) What words refer to bile?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na gal?
bile, gall (fluid from the liver stored in the gall bladder)|gal, gal (vloeistof uit die lewer gestoor in die galblaas)
Breathe, breath|Asem te haal, asem
Use this domain for words related to breathing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met asemhaling.
(1) What words refer to breathing?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na asemhaling?
breathe, rise and fall (of the chest),|asem te haal, styg en daal (van die bors),
(2) What words refer to the process of breathing?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van asemhaling?
breathing, breath, respiration,|asemhaling, asem, asemhaling,
(3) What words refer to breathing in?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na asemhaling in?
breathe in, take a breath, inhale, gasp, draw breath, whiff,|inasem, neem &#39;n asem, asem, asem, teken asem, whiff,
(4) What words refer to breathing out?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na uitasem?
breathe out, exhale, blow,|uitblaas, getuig, blaas,
(5) What words refer to making noise when you breathe?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak geraas wanneer jy asemhaal?
sniff, snore, snort, sigh, hiss, sniffle, snuffle, hiccup,|snuif, snork, snuif, sug, spot, sniffle, snuiven, hik,
(6) What words refer to breathing quickly?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na vinnig asemhaal?
breathe hard, pant, huff and puff, gulp,|asemhaal hard, hyg, Huff en puff, sluk,
(7) What words refer to breathing quickly or with difficulty because of running or working hard?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na vinnig of met moeite as gevolg van hardloop of hard werk asemhaling?
breathless, out of breath, draw breath,|uitasem, uitasem, teken asem,
(8) What words refer to breathing with difficulty?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na swaar asemgehaal?
gasp, wheeze, short of breath,|asem, hyg, kort van asem,
(9) What words refer to breathing normally after running or working hard?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na asemhaling gewoonlik na hardloop of hard te werk?
get your breath back,|kry jou asem terug,
(10) What words refer to stopping yourself from breathing?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na stop jouself van asemhaling?
hold your breath,|hou jou asem,
(11) What words refer to being unable to breathe?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na nie in staat is om asem te haal?
can't breathe, choke, suffocate,|kan nie asemhaal, verstik, versmoor,
(12) What words refer to stopping breathing?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na stop asemhaling?
expire, draw your last breath, death rattle,|verval, teken jou laaste asem, roggel,
(13) What words refer to killing someone by stopping them from breathing?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die moord op iemand deur hulle te stop van asemhaling?
choke, strangle, suffocate, smother,|verstik, verwurg, versmoor, versmoor,
(14) What words refer to helping someone who has stopped breathing to breathe again?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na help iemand wat ophou asemhaal om weer asem te haal?
give artificial respiration,|gee kunsmatige asemhaling,
Cough, sneeze|Hoes, nies
Use this domain for words related to coughing, sneezing, and other actions of the mouth and nose.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met hoes, nies, en ander aksies van die mond en neus.

cough, cough (n)|hoes, hoes (N)
(2) What words refer to sneezing?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na nies?
sneeze, sneeze (n)|nies, nies (n)
(3) What words refer to burping?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na Boer?
burp, burp (n), belch, belch (n),|burp, burp (n), spoeg, spoeg (n),
(4) What words refer to hiccupping?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na hiccupping?

(1) What words refer to spitting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na spoeg?
