(2) What words refer to saliva?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na speeksel?
saliva, spit, spittle, sputum, phlegm, drool, slobber, drivel,|speeksel, spoeg, spoeg, sputum, slym, kwyl, bekwijlen, snert,
(3) What words refer to letting saliva run out of your mouth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verhuring van speeksel loop uit jou mond?
drool, slobber, drivel, dribble,|kwyl, bekwijlen, snert, dribbel,
(4) What words refer to the production of saliva?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die produksie van speeksel?
salivate, mouth waters, juices flow, salivation,|speekselafskeiding, mond water, sap vloei, speekselafskeiding,
(5) What words refer to not having any saliva in your mouth?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na nie met enige speeksel in jou mond?
mouth is dry,|mond is droog,
(6) What words refer to the sound made when spitting?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid gemaak toe spoeg?
ptui,|ptui,
Mucus|Slym
Use this domain for words related to mucus in the nose.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met slym in die neus.
(1) What does the nose produce?|(1) Wat beteken die neus te produseer?
mucus, snot, booger|slym, snot, Booger
(2) What words express how mucus drains from the nose?|(2) Watter woorde uit te druk hoe slym dreine uit die neus?
run, runny nose, be stuffed up|run, loopneus, word opgestopte
(3) What do people do with mucus?|(3) Wat doen mense met slym?
blow your nose, pick your nose, wipe your nose,|blaas jou neus, kies jou neus, vee jou neus,
(4) What do people use to blow their nose?|(4) Wat doen die mense gebruik om hul neus blaas?
handkerchief, hanky, tissue,|sakdoek, sakdoek, weefsel,
Bleed, blood|Bloei, bloed
Use this domain for words related to blood and bleeding.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met bloed en bloeding.
(1) What words refer to bleeding?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na bloeding?
to bleed, nosebleed, flow (from a wound), ooze, hemorrhage,|bloei, duizendblad, vloei (uit &#39;n wond), modder, bloeding,
(2) What words refer to bleeding quickly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na vinnig bloeding?
pour, stream from, spurt, gush,|gooi, stroom uit, gulp, stroom,
(3) What words refer to stopping bleeding?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na stop bloeding?
coagulate, staunch, to stop bleeding, to block bleeding, apply a tourniquet|koaguleer, stoere, om bloeding te stop, om bloeding te sluit, moet &#39;n toerniket
(4) What words refer to blood?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na bloed?
blood, drop of blood|bloed druppel bloed
(5) What words refer to blood when it dries?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na bloed wanneer dit droog?
clot, scab, blood stain,|klont, uitslag, bloed vlek,
(6) What words describe something that has blood on it?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat bloed het op dit te beskryf?
bloody, bloodstained, gory, gruesome,|bloedige, bebloede, gory, grusame,
(7) What words refer to a lot of blood?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n baie bloed?
pool of blood,|plas bloed,
(8) What words refer to giving blood to someone?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die bloed te gee aan iemand?
give blood, blood transfusion,|gee bloed bloedoortapping,
(9) What words refer to the type of blood a person has?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die tipe van die bloed &#39;n persoon het?
blood type,|bloedgroep,
Sweat|Sweet
Use this domain for words related to sweating.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met sweet.
(1) What words refer to sweating?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sweet?
sweat (v), perspire, be dripping with sweat, sweat like a pig,|sweet (v), sweet, wees drup sweet, sweet soos &#39;n vark,
(2) What words refer to sweat?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na sweet?
sweat (n), perspiration,|sweet (n), sweet,
(3) What words are used to describe a person beginning to sweat?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n persoon begin om te sweet beskryf?
break out in a sweat, break into a sweat, begin to sweat|breek uit in &#39;n sweet, breek in &#39;n sweet, begin om te sweet
(4) What happens to sweat?|(4) Wat gebeur met sweet?
dry,|droog,
(5) What do people do about sweat?|(5) Wat doen mense oor sweet?
bathe, use deodorant, wash clothes, wipe sweat from your forehead,|bad, gebruik deodorant, klere was, vee die sweet van jou voorkop,
(6) What words describe a person who has been sweating?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat sweet?
sweaty, drenched with sweat|sweet, papnat gesweet
(7) What words describe the smell of sweat?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf die reuk van sweet?
smell sweaty, smelly, stink, body odor, natural smell of sweat, smell of old people, smell of someone who never bathes|ruik sweet, stinkende, stink, liggaam reuk, natuurlike reuk van sweet, reuk van ou mense, reuk van iemand wat nog nooit baai
(8) What is a drop of sweat called?|(8) Wat is &#39;n druppel sweet genoem?
bead of sweat|kraal van sweet
Urinate, urine|Urineer, urine
Use this domain for words related to urination.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met urinering.
(1) What words refer to urinating?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na urineer?
urinate, pee, piss, take a piss, take a leak,|urineer, plas, piss, neem &#39;n piss, neem &#39;n lek,
(2) What words refer to urine?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na urine?
urine, pee,|urine, plas,
(3) Where do people urinate?|(3) Waar mense urineer?
urinal|urinaal
(4) What do the kidneys and bladder do?|(4) Wat doen die niere en blaas doen?
produce urine, store urine|produseer urine, store urine
(5) What words refer to a kidney stone?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n niersteen?
kidney stone, pass (a kidney stone)|niersteen, pass (&#39;n niersteen)
Defecate, feces|Ontlas, ontlasting
Use this domain for words related to defecation.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met ontlasting.
(1) What words refer to defecating?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na ontlas?
defecate, go to the bathroom, have a bowel movement, void, excrete, poop, take a crap, evacuate your bowels, purge your bowels, void,|ontlas, gaan na die badkamer, &#39;n derm beweging, leemte, skei, agterstewe, neem &#39;n crap, ontruim jou ingewande, reinig jou ingewande, nietig,
(2) What words refer to feces?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na ontlasting?
feces, manure, crap, droppings, dung, excrement, fecal, guano, pile, stool, waste, shit,|ontlasting, mis, crap, mis, mis, ontlasting, fecale ghwano, paal, stoel, afval, kak,
(3) What words refer to when the feces are liquid?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wanneer die ontlasting is vloeibare?
diarrhea, loose bowel|diaree, derm
(4) What words refer to when it is difficult to defecate?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer dit is moeilik om te ontlas?
constipation, constipated|hardlywigheid, hardlywig
(5) What words refer to cleaning after defecating?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na skoonmaak ná ontlas?
wipe (yourself, your anus),|vee (jouself, jou anus),
(6) What things do people use to clean themselves?|(6) Wat dinge wat mense gebruik om hulself skoon te maak?
toilet paper|toiletpapier
(7) What things are used for babies?|(7) Watter dinge word gebruik vir babas?
diaper, nappies|luier, doeke
(8) Where do people defecate?|(8) Waar mense ontlas?
bathroom, toilet, latrine|badkamer, toilet, latrine
(9) What words refer to the smell of feces?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die reuk van ontlasting?
fetid, malodorous, putrid,|stink, onwelriekende voos,
(10) What words are used of intestinal gas?|(10) Watter woorde gebruik van die derm gas?
gas, pass gas, break wind, fart|gas, slaag gas, breek wind, fart
Sense, perceive|Sin, sien
Use this domain for general words related to all the senses--sight, hearing, smell, taste, and feeling. Some languages may not distinguish some of these senses, and some languages may have words for other senses. There are also other senses that animals have. If your language has words for other senses, include them here.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met al die sintuie - sig, gehoor, reuk, smaak, en voel. Sommige tale kan nie onderskei sommige van hierdie sintuie, en &#39;n paar tale kan woorde vir ander sintuie het. Daar is ook ander sintuie wat diere. As jou taal het woorde vir ander sintuie, sluit hulle hier.
(1) What words refer to sensing something using one of the senses?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sensing iets met een van die sintuie?
feel, sense, perceive, notice, detect, distinguish|voel, sin, sien, kennisgewing, op te spoor, te onderskei
(2) What words refer to the ability to sense something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om iets voel?
sense, perception,|sin, persepsie,
(3) What words refer to all the senses?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na al die sintuie?
senses|sintuie
(4) What words refer to something that you sense?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat jy voel?
feeling, sensation, perception,|gevoel, sensasie, persepsie,
(5) What words describe something that can be sensed?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat kan voel beskryf?
perceptible, noticeable, detectable, distinguishable|waarneembaar, waarneembaar, waarneembaar, onderskeibaar
(6) What words describe something that cannot be sensed?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat nie kan voel beskryf?
unperceived, imperceptible, unnoticeable, undetectable, undetected, indistinguishable,|onopgemerkte, onsigbare, onmerkbaar, onopspoorbaar, ongemerk, ononderskeibaar,
(7) What words describe someone who can sense things better than other people?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat dinge beter as ander mense kan voel?
sensitive, perceptive, acute sense,|sensitief, oplettend, akute sin,
See|Sien
Use this domain for words related to seeing something (in general or without conscious choice).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets (in die algemeen of sonder bewuste keuse) sien.
(1) What words refer to seeing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets sien?
see, set eyes on, witness, see something with your own eyes, behold, notice, perceive, get an eyeful,|sien, stel oë op, getuie, iets sien met jou eie oë, kyk, kennisgewing, sien, kry &#39;n eyeful,
(2) What words refer to seeing something for a very short time?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets sien vir &#39;n baie kort tyd?
catch sight of, catch a glimpse of, get a look at,|vang oë van, &#39;n voorsmaak kry &#39;n blik op,
(3) What words refer to seeing something that you have been looking for?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat jy is op soek na sien?
spot, sight, observe,|spot, sig, waarneem,
(4) What words refer to seeing something with difficulty?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets met moeite sien?
make out, distinguish,|maak, onderskei,
(5) What words refer to the ability to see?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om te sien?
sight, sense of sight, vision, eyesight,|sig, gevoel van sig, visie, sig,
(6) What words refer to someone who sees something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat iets sien?
observer, beholder, witness, eyewitness, onlooker, spectator, viewer,|waarnemer, kyker, getuie, ooggetuie, omstander, toeskouer, kyker,
(7) What words refer to something that is seen?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat gesien?
sight, view, scene, scenery, picture, show, spectacle, vision, vista, panorama,|oë, sien, toneel, natuurskoon, prent, show, skouspel, visie, Vista, panorama,
(8) What words refer to an occasion of seeing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n geleentheid om te sien?
sight, at first sight, your first sight of,|oë, met die eerste oogopslag, jou eerste gesig van,
(9) What words describe how well a person can see?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf hoe goed kan &#39;n persoon te sien?
blind, astigmatism, clear-eyed, clear-sighted, cross-eyed, eyesight, good eyesight, poor eyesight, farsighted, lynx-eyed, myopia, myopic, nearsighted, purblind, sightless, visionless,|blind, astigmatisme, helder-eyed, helderziend, skeeloog, sig, goeie sig, swak sig, versiende, lynx-oog, miopie, bysiende, bysiende, bijziend, blinde, visionless,
(10) What words refer to doing something so that someone can't see?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen sodat iemand nie kan sien nie?
blindfold, blind, dazzle, block someone's view,|blinddoek, blindes, dazzle, blok iemand se oog,
(11) What words describe something that has to do with seeing?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met die sien beskryf?
seeing, optic, optical, visual,|sien, optiese, optiese, visuele,
Look|Kyk
Use this domain for words that refer to looking at someone or something--to see something because you want to.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na op soek na iets of iemand - om iets te sien, want jy wil.
(1) What words refer to consciously looking at something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na bewustelik op soek na iets?
look, look at, view, observe, eye (v), cast an eye on, watch, take a look at, have a look at,|kyk, kyk na, sien, waarneem, oog (v), gooi &#39;n oog op, kyk, neem &#39;n blik op, &#39;n blik op,
(2) What words refer to looking at something for a long time or in amazement?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na op soek na iets vir &#39;n lang tyd of in verwondering?
stare, gaze, gape, gawk, peer,|staar, blik, mondhoeke, gaap, peer,
(3) What words refer to looking at something for a short time?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na op soek na iets vir &#39;n kort tyd?
glance, cursory glance, look at briefly, (eyes) flicker over, take a quick look,|oogopslag, vlugtige kyk, kyk na kortliks (oë) flikker oor, neem &#39;n vinnige blik,
(4) What words refer to looking quickly at many things or a large area?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na vinnig op soek na baie dinge of &#39;n groot area?
scan, survey, reconnaissance, reconnoiter, look over, eyeball, perusal, peruse, scout, skim, sweep|scan, opname, verkenning, navorsen, kyk oor, oogbal, insae, nagaan, scout, afgeroomde, sweep
(5) What words refer to looking at many things over a period of time?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na op soek na baie dinge oor &#39;n tydperk van die tyd?
browse, look around, sight-seeing,|blaai, kyk rond, toerisme-aantreklikhede,
(6) What words describe how you look at someone if you don't trust them?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf hoe jy kyk na iemand as jy hulle nie vertrou nie?
eye, look somebody up and down,|oog, kyk iemand op en af,
(7) What words describe how you look at a woman if you are sexually attracted to her?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf hoe jy kyk na &#39;n vrou as jy seksueel aangetrokke tot haar?
leer, ogle, make eyes at, goggle, peep, admire,|leer, aanlonken, maak oë op, uitpuilend, loer, bewonder,
(8) What words describe how you look at something if you are angry or unhappy about it?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf hoe jy kyk na iets as jy kwaad of ongelukkig oor dit?
glare, scowl, frown, give a dirty look, glower,|glans, frons, frons, gee &#39;n vuil kyk, somber gesig sit,
(9) What words refer to looking hard at something because it is difficult to see?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na soek hard na iets, want dit is moeilik om te sien?
squint, peer, crane your neck,|skeel, peer, kraan jou nek,
(10) What words refer to looking at something secretly?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na op soek na iets in die geheim?
peek, peep, take a peep, sneak a look at, snoop around, spy,|loer, loer, neem &#39;n piep sluip &#39;n blik op, loer rond, spioen,
(11) What words refer to stopping looking at something and look at something else?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die stop op soek na iets en kyk na iets anders?
look away, avert your eyes|weg te kyk, te voorkom jou oë
Watch|Watch
Use this domain for words that refer to watching someone or something--to look for some time at something that is happening because you are interested in it and want to know what is happening.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na iets of iemand kyk - om te kyk vir &#39;n geruime tyd op iets wat gebeur, omdat jy belangstel in dit en wil weet wat gebeur.
(1) What words refer to watching something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets te kyk?
watch, observe, look on, see (a movie),|kyk, in ag te neem, kyk op, kyk (&#39;n fliek),
(2) What words refer to watching something continuously?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets voortdurend kyk?
not take your eyes off, stand over,|nie jou oë te neem af, staan ​​oor,
(3) What words refer to watching something so that nothing bad happens?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets sodat niks sleg gebeur kyk?
watch, keep an eye on, observation, monitor,|kyk, hou &#39;n oog op, waarneming, monitor,
(4) What words refer to secretly watching something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die geheim iets kyk?
watch, keep a watch on, surveillance, observation,|kyk, hou &#39;n horlosie op, toesig, waarneming,
(5) What words refer to someone who is watching?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat kyk?
spectator, viewer, audience, onlooker, observer, lookout,|toeskouer, kyker, gehoor, toeskouer, waarnemer, uitkyk,
(6) What words refer to watching something for a long time, but not watching it all the time?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets kyk vir &#39;n lang tyd, maar nie kyk dit al die tyd?
watch, keep an eye,|kyk, hou &#39;n oog,
(7) What words refer to always watching to see if anything bad happens?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na altyd kyk om te sien as iets sleg gebeur?
alert, watchful, vigilant, keep your eyes peeled, keep your eyes open, look out, keep a lookout for,|waarskuwing, wakker waaksaam, hou jou oë oop, hou jou oë oop, kyk uit, hou &#39;n uitkyk te wees vir,
Examine|Ondersoek
Use this domain for words referring to examining--to look carefully at something because you want to learn something about it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die ondersoek - om noukeurig te kyk na iets, want jy wil iets daaroor te leer.

(2) What words refer to examining someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die ondersoek van iemand?
examine, inspect,|ondersoek, inspekteer,

Show, let someone see|Show, laat iemand sien
Use this domain for words related to showing something to someone so that they can see it--to cause someone to see something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat iets vir iemand, sodat hulle dit kan sien - om iemand te sien iets veroorsaak.

show, expose, reveal,|wys, blootstel, openbaar,
(3) What words refer to showing something that you are proud of?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat iets wat jy trots is?
show off, flourish, parade, flaunt,|wys, floreer, parade, wapperen,
(4) What words refer to showing someone where something is?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wat iemand waar daar iets?
show, point out, point to, mark, indicate,|show, wys uit, punt, merk, dui,
(5) What words refer to showing something to a lot of people?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wat iets om &#39;n klomp mense?
show, display, put something on show, put something on display, exhibit, be on show, be on display, unveil,|show, te vertoon, sit iets op die skou, sit iets op die skerm, uitstal, wees op die skou, te sien wees, onthul,
(6) What words refer to an event when something is shown?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebeurtenis wanneer iets getoon?
show (n), exhibition, display, presentation, showing,|show (n), uitstalling, vertoon, aanbieding, vertoon,
(7) What words refer to what is shown?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na wat getoon?
display, exhibit,|vertoon, uitstal,
Visible|Sigbare
Use this domain for words related to being able to see something--words that describe something that can be seen, something that cannot be seen, something that is easy to see, or something that is difficult to see.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vermoë om iets te sien - woorde wat iets wat gesien kan word, iets wat nie gesien kan word beskryf, iets wat maklik is om te sien, of iets wat moeilik is om te sien.
(1) What words refer to being able to see something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om iets te sien?
can see, can make out, catch a glimpse of,|kan sien, kan maak uit, vang &#39;n glimp van,
(2) What words refer to not being able to see something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die nie in staat om iets te sien nie?
can't see, can't make out,|kan nie sien nie, kan dit nie maak nie,
(3) What words describe something that can be seen?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat gesien kan word, beskryf?
visible, show, in view, in sight, seen, show up, perceptible, noticeable, observable, discernible, seeable, distinguishable, perceivable,|sigbare, show, in die lig, in sig nie, gesien het, wys, waarneembaar, waarneembaar, waarneembaar, waarneembaar, seeable, onderskei, waarneembare,
(4) What words describe something that cannot be seen?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat nie gesien kan word, beskryf?
invisible, lose sight of, unseen, invisibility, imperceptible, indiscernible,|onsigbare, uit die oog verloor, onsigbare, onsigbaarheid, onsigbare, te onderskei,
(5) What words describe something that can be easily seen?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat maklik gesien kan word, beskryf?
clear, distinct, apparent, clear-cut, conspicuous, prominent, stand out, evident, glaring, manifest, obvious, patent, pronounced, unmistakable,|duidelik, duidelike, duidelik, duidelike, opvallende, prominent, staan ​​uit, duidelik, vurig, openbaar, voor die hand liggend, patent, uitgespreek, onmiskenbaar,
(6) What words describe something that cannot be easily seen?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat nie maklik gesien kan word, beskryf?
unclear, not clear, faint, blurred, blur, blurry, barely discernible, dim, inconspicuous, indistinct, obscure, unapparent,|onduidelik, nie duidelik nie, moeg, versteurde, vervaag, vaag, skaars waarneembaar, dowwe, onopvallende, onduidelike, obskure, onsigbaar,
(7) What words refer to how well something can be seen?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na hoe goed iets gesien kan word?
clarity, visibility,|duidelikheid, sigbaarheid,
(8) What words indicate that something happens where people can see it?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur waar mense dit kan sien?
in full view of, in front of, in front of someone's eyes, before someone's eyes, in the open, exposed to view, unhidden, within view,|ten aanskoue van, in die voorkant van, in die voorkant van iemand se oë, voor iemand se oë, in die oop, blootgestel te sien, unhidden binne oog,
(9) What words indicate that something happens where people cannot see it?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur waar mense nie kan sien nie?
out of sight, hidden from view, away from people's eyes,|buite sig, uit die oog, weg van mense se oë,
(10) What words refer to something blocking another thing from view?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets ander ding sluit uit die oog?
becloud, befog, block, blot out, cloak, cloud, conceal, cover, eclipse, enshroud, hide, mask, obfuscate, obscure, obstruct, occlude, screen, shroud, veil,|bewolken, Bené baie, blok, uitdelg, mantel, wolke verberg, dekking, verduistering, inbakeren, weg te steek, masker, verduisteren, onduidelik, belemmer, omsluiten, skerm, kleed, sluier,
(11) What words describe something that is blocked from view?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat geblokkeer te beskryf?
beclouded, befogged, blocked, cloaked, concealed, covered, eclipsed, enshrouded, hidden, masked, obscured, screened, shrouded, veiled|beclouded, verbluft, geblokkeer, gehul, versteekte, bedek, verduister, enshrouded, verborge, gemaskerde, vervaag, gekeur, gehul, versluier
Appear|Verskyn

disappear, vanish, disappear without a trace, vanish into thin air, go missing, go out of sight, fade away, blend into, disappear from sight, dissolve into nothing, be just gone, fade from view, retire from sight, lose sight of|verdwyn, verdwyn en word verdwyn sonder &#39;n spoor, verdwyn in die lug, verdwyn, gaan uit sig, verdwyn, meng in, verdwyn uit sig, ontbind in niks nie, wees net weg, vervaag uit die oog, tree uit die oog, uit die oog verloor van
(3) What words refer to the event of something appearing?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die geval van iets wat verskyn?
appearance,|voorkoms,
(4) What words refer to the event of something disappearing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die geval van iets te verdwyn?
disappearance,|verdwyning,
Transparent|Deursigtige
Use this domain for words that describe how well you can see through something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat beskryf hoe goed jy kan deur iets te sien.
(1) What words describe something that can be seen through?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat gesien kan word deur middel van beskryf?
transparent, clear, see-through, glassy, clear as crystal, crystal clear, show through, unclouded, crystalline, sheer, limpid, vitreous|deursigtige, helder, sien-deur, glas, helder soos kristal, kristal helder, wys deur, onbewolkt, kristallyne, pure, helder, vitreous
(2) What words describe something that light shines through but you can't see through clearly?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat lig skyn deur, maar jy kan nie sien deur duidelik?
translucent, frosted, cloudy, clouded, hazy, dim, unclear, vague, foggy, smoky, indistinct, faint, misty, muddy, shadowy, turbid,|deurskynende, kalk, bewolk, vertroebel, vaag, dowwe, onduidelik, vaag, mistig, rokerige, onduidelike, moeg, mistige, modderige, skaduagtige, troebel,
(3) What words describe something that cannot be seen through?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie gesien kan word deur middel van beskryf?
opaque, obscure, dark, darkened, impervious-to-light,|ondeursigtig, onduidelik, donker, donker, dig-lig,

Appearance|Voorkoms
Use this domain for words related to how something appears.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met hoe iets lyk.
(1) What words refer to the appearance of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die voorkoms van iets?

(2) What words refer to the appearance of someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die voorkoms van iemand?
appearance, looks, image, visage, features, countenance, profile,|voorkoms, lyk, beeld, gelaatstrekke, funksies, aangesig, profiel,
(3) What words indicate that something looks like another thing?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets lyk soos &#39;n ander ding?
look like, have the look of, have the appearance of, resemble,|lyk, het die voorkoms van, het die voorkoms van, lyk,
(4) What words indicate that something looks a particular way?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets lyk &#39;n bepaalde manier?
look (good/bad), be (dark/young) in appearance, (good/bad) looking,|kyk (goed / sleg), wees (donker / jong) in voorkoms, (goed / sleg) soek,
(5) What words indicate that a piece of clothing looks good on someone?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n stukkie van klere lyk goed op iemand?
suit, look good on, flattering|pak, lyk goed op, vleiende
(6) What words indicate that something looks good with another thing?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets goed lyk met &#39;n ander ding?
go with, set off, match, go together, complement, matching, blend in,|gaan saam met, verreken, wedstryd, gaan saam, aanvulling, wat ooreenstem, meng in,
Beautiful|Beautiful
Use this domain for words describing someone or something that is beautiful--pleasing in appearance,.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf iets of iemand wat mooi - verblydend in voorkoms ,.
(1) What words describe a woman who is beautiful?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vrou wat mooi is?
beautiful, good-looking, pretty, attractive, striking, handsome, lovely, gorgeous, stunning, ravishing, of great beauty, elegant,|mooi, mooi, mooi, aantreklik, slaan, mooi, pragtige, pragtige, pragtige, oorweldigende, van groot skoonheid, elegant,
(2) What words describe a man who is beautiful?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n man wat &#39;n pragtige?
good-looking, handsome, attractive, cute, hunky, rugged, striking, gorgeous, be a fine figure of a man, dashing,|mooi, mooi, aantreklik, oulik, hunky, ruwe, slaan, pragtig, word &#39;n boete figuur van &#39;n man, haastig,
(3) What words describe a child who is beautiful?|(3) Watter woorde &#39;n kind wat &#39;n pragtige beskryf?
beautiful, lovely, cute,|pragtige, pragtige, oulike,
(4) What words describe something that is beautiful?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat mooi beskryf?
beautiful, attractive, pretty, lovely, gorgeous, splendid, magnificent, stunning, superb, exquisite, elegant, artistic,|mooi, aantreklik, mooi, pragtige, pragtige, pragtige, pragtige, pragtige, wonderlike, pragtige, elegante, artistieke,
(5) What words describe a place that is beautiful?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek wat mooi?
beautiful, lovely, pretty, scenic, picturesque, magnificent, beauty spot, spectacular,|pragtige, pragtige, mooi, mooi, skilderagtige, pragtige, beauty spot, skouspelagtige,
(6) What words indicate that something is done in a beautiful way?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedoen word in &#39;n pragtige manier?
beautifully, prettily, attractively, exquisitely,|pragtig, fraai, aantreklik, pragtig,
(7) What words refer to the quality of being beautiful?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die pragtige?
beauty, looks, good looks,|skoonheid, voorkoms, goeie voorkoms,
(8) What words refer to making something beautiful?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets mooi?
beautify, spruce up,|verfraai, opschikken,
(9) What words describe something or someone that is neither beautiful nor ugly?|(9) Watter woorde iets of iemand wat nie mooi nie lelik beskryf?
plain, average, ordinary,|vlakte, gemiddelde, gewone,
Ugly|Ugly
Use this domain for words describing someone or something that is ugly--not pleasing in appearance.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf iets of iemand wat is lelik - nie verblydend in voorkoms.
(1) What words describe someone who is not good looking?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie &#39;n goeie soek?
not good-looking, plain, homely, not much to look at, unattractive,|nie mooi, plain, huislike, nie veel om na te kyk, onaantreklike,
(2) What words describe someone who is very ugly?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat baie lelike beskryf?
ugly, hideous, repulsive, grotesque, unsightly,|lelik, afskuwelike, afstootlik, groteske, onooglike,
(3) What words describe something that is ugly?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat is lelik beskryf?
ugly, hideous, revolting, unattractive, unsightly,|lelik, afskuwelike, oproerige, onaantreklike, onooglike,
(4) What words refer to something that is ugly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat is lelik?
eyesore, monstrosity, blot on the landscape,|gedrog, gedrog, delg op die landskap,
(5) What words indicate that something is done in an ugly way?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedoen word in &#39;n lelike manier?
rude, uncomely, uncouth, ungainly, ungraceful, unseemly,|onbeskof, onbevallig, onbeskofte, lomp, onbevallig, onbehoorlike,
(6) What words refer to the quality of being ugly?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die lelike?
ugliness,|lelike,
(7) What words refer to making something ugly?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets lelik?
contort, deface, disfigure, distort, mar, misshape,|verdraai, skend, ontsier, verdraai, mar, misshape,
(8) What words describe the face of a person who is bad?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf die gesig van &#39;n persoon wat sleg is?
contorted, cunning, hard-featured, rough,|krul, geslepe, hard-featured, ruwe,
Something used to see|Iets wat gebruik word om te sien
Use this domain for words referring to glasses and other things people use to help them see.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na bril en ander dinge wat mense gebruik om hulle te help sien.
(1) What words refer to things people use to help them see better?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dinge wat mense gebruik om hulle te help beter te sien?
lens, eyepiece, optical instrument, prism, sight, gun sight, bomb sight, scope, viewer|lens, oogstuk, optiese instrument, prisma, sig, geweer oë, bom oë, omvang, kyker
(2) What words refer to glasses?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n bril?
glasses, eyeglasses, corrective lenses, contact lens, bifocals, spectacles, specs, monocle,|bril, bril, korrektiewe lense, kontak lens, bifokale, brille, specs, oogglas,
(3) What things do people use to see small things?|(3) Watter dinge doen mense gebruik om klein dingetjies te sien?
microscope, magnifying glass, magnifier,|mikroskoop, vergrootglas, vergrootglas,
(4) What things do people use to see things far away?|(4) Wat dinge wat mense gebruik om dinge te sien ver?
telescope, binoculars, field glass,|teleskoop, verkyker, die veld glas,
(5) What things do people use to protect their eyes?|(5) Wat dinge wat mense gebruik om hul oë te beskerm?
sunglasses, dark glasses, goggles,|sonbrille, donkerbril, brille,
(6) What do these things do?|(6) Wat het hierdie dinge doen?
enlarge, reflect, focus|vergroot, weerspieël, fokus
Hear|Hoor
Use this domain for words related to hearing something (in general or without conscious choice).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die aanhoor van iets (in die algemeen of sonder bewuste keuse).
(1) What words refer to hearing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aanhoor van iets?
hear, overhear|Hoor, hoor
(2) What words refer to the ability to hear?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om te hoor?
hearing, sense of hearing,|gehoor, gevoel van verhoor,
(3) What words refer to being able to hear something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om iets te hoor?
can hear, can make out, within someone's hearing, within earshot, catch, get,|kan hoor, kan maak uit binne iemand se verhoor binne hoorafstand, vang, te kry,
(4) What words refer to not being able to hear something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die nie in staat om iets te hoor?
can't hear, not catch, can't make out, out of earshot,|kan nie hoor nie, nie te vang, kan dit nie maak nie, buite hoorafstand,
(5) What words refer to things people use to help them hear better?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na dinge wat mense gebruik om hulle te help beter hoor?
hearing aid, bug, stethoscope|gehoorapparaat, bug, stetoskoop
(6) What words describe something that has to do with hearing?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met verhoor beskryf?
aural, auditory, audio, acoustic, sound (adj),|gehoor, ouditiewe, klank, akoestiese klank (adj),
Listen|Luister
Use this domain for words related to listening--to deliberately hear something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met luister - om doelbewus iets hoor.
(1) What words refer to listening to something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die luister na iets?
listen, listen to, listen for, hear someone out, lend an ear, tune in, audit, give an ear to, heed, pay attention to, prick up your ears, be all ears, attend to, get an earful, hearken,|luister, luister na, luister, hoor iemand uit te leen &#39;n oor, tune in, oudit, gee &#39;n oor om, ag, aandag te gee aan, spits jou ore, wees almal ore, luister na, kry &#39;n earful, luister,
(2) What words refer to listen to someone when they don't know you are listening?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand te luister wanneer hulle weet nie wat jy luister?
listen in, eavesdrop, bug, tap, monitor,|luister, afluister, bug, tap, te monitor,
(3) What words refer to someone who listens?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat luister?
listener, audience, eavesdropper, auditor|luisteraar, gehoor, Eavesdropper, ouditeur
(4) What do you say when you want someone to listen to you?|(4) Wat sê jy wanneer jy wil iemand om jou te luister?
Listen. Listen up. Hear me. Your attention please. Pay attention. Lend an ear. Mark my words. Hark.|Luister. Luister. Luister na my. Jou aandag asseblief. Aandag. Leen &#39;n oor. Merk my woorde. Hark.
Sound|Klink
Use this domain for words referring to sounds.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na klanke.
(1) What words refer to something that is heard?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gehoor?
sound, noise, voice,|klank, geraas, stem,
(2) What words indicate that something sounds like another thing or sounds a particular way?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets klink soos &#39;n ander ding of klink &#39;n besondere manier?
sound like, sound of, sound (good/bad), have a (good/bad) sound, (good/bad) sounding,|klink soos, klank van, klank (goed / sleg), het &#39;n (goeie / slegte) klank, (goed / sleg) klinkende,
(3) What words refer to something or someone making a sound?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets of iemand wat &#39;n klank?
make a sound, make noise, emit, go (bang/boom), go off, sound (v), let out, articulate, articulation,|maak &#39;n geluid maak geraas, stoot, trek (bang / boom), afgaan, klank (v), laat uit, verwoord, artikulasie,
(4) What words refer to a sound that is repeated faintly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n klank wat vaagweg herhaal?
echo,|eggo,
(5) What words refer to making a sound that continues for a long time?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n klank wat steeds vir &#39;n lang tyd?
reverberate, resonate, resound, ring, roll,|weergalm, resoneer, klink, ring, roll,
(6) What words describe something that can be heard?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat gehoor kan word, beskryf?
audible, clear, loud and clear,|hoorbaar, duidelik, hard en duidelik,
(7) What words describe something that cannot be heard?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat nie gehoor kan word, beskryf?
inaudible, unheard, subsonic,|onhoorbaar, ongehoord, subsoniese,
(8) What words refer to a sound becoming loud enough so that it can be heard?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie raak hard genoeg sodat dit kan gehoor word?
become audible, reach the ear, be heard, fall on the ear,|geword hoorbaar, bereik die oor, gehoor, val op die oor,
Types of sounds|Tipes klanke
Use this domain for words referring to types of sounds.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na tipes klanke.
(1) What words refer to the quality of a sound?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gehalte van &#39;n gesonde?
tone,|toon,
(2) What words describe a good sound?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n goeie klank?
melodious, melodic, good, beautiful,|melodieuse, melodies, goeie, mooi,
(3) What words describe a bad sound?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n slegte klank?
discordant, bad, disharmony, racket, raucous, shrill, strident, grating,|vloek, slegte, disharmonie, racket, hees, skril, kras, rooster,
(4) What words refer to a repeated sound?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n herhaalde klank?
knocking, rap, clatter, patter, rattle, tap, beat, cadence, drum, rhythmic,|klop, rap, gekletter, getrippel, rammel, tap, klop, kadens, drom, ritmiese,
(5) What words refer to a continuous sound?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n deurlopende klank?
hum, monotone, steady noise|hum, monotone, bestendige geraas
(6) What words refer to a sudden sound?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n skielike geluid?
blare, blast, outburst, outcry, report,|geloei, ontploffing, uitbarsting, geskreeu, verslag,
(7) What words refer to the pitch of a sound?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die helling van &#39;n gesonde?
pitch, tone, note, frequency, inflection, intonation, modulation, overtone, tune, tonality,|toonhoogte, toon, kennis, frekwensie, infleksie, intonasie, modulasie, ondertoon, tune, tonaliteit,
(8) What words refer to a high pitched sound?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n hoë opgeslaan klank?
high, squeak, squeal, whine, peep,|hoog, piep, geknars, geteem, loer,
(9) What words refer to a low pitched sound?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lae opgeslaan klank?
low, rumble|lae, rommel
(10) What words refer to the sound of one thing hitting another?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van een ding slaan &#39;n ander?
bang, thud, crack, crash, bump, thump, boom, clack, clap, clash, clunk, jangle, knock, peal, pound, rap, tap, scrunch, slam, slap, smack,|bang, slag, kraak, crash, stamp, doef, boom, gesnap, klap, botsing, clunk, geklingel, klop, donderslag, pond, rap, tap, knauwen, slam, klap, klap,
(11) What words refer to the sound of something breaking?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van iets breek?
crack, pop, snap, crunch,|kraak, pop, snap, crunch,
(12) What words refer to the sound of two things rubbing against each other?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die klank van twee dinge te vryf teen mekaar?
scrape, creak, squeak, screech, grinding, squeal, rasp,|skraap, kraak, piep, skree, maal, geknars, rasper,
(13) What words refer to the sound of metal or glass hitting something?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van metaal of glas slaan iets?
clink, clank, clang, jingle, ring, tinkle, ding, toll, chime, chink, click,|klink, Clank, klang, jingle, ring, geklingel, ding, tol, harmonie, skrefie, kliek,
(14) What words refer to the sound of water?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van water?
splash, squelch, gurgle, plop, bubble, plunk, ripple, babble, burble, plash,|spat, smak, roggel, plop, borrel, plof, rimpeleffek, babbel, gemompel, geplons,
(15) What words refer to the sound of the wind or air?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van die wind of lug?
hiss, swish, fizz, fizzle, groan, moan, rustle, shriek, sough, wail, wheeze, whine, whisper, whistle, whiz, whoosh,|spot, swish, fizz, gesis, kerm, kla, geritsel, gil, gerug, huil, hijgen, geteem, fluister, fluitjie, gefluit, whoosh,
(16) What words refer to the sound of fire?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van &#39;n vuur?
crackle, sizzle, roar|geknetter, sis, brul
(17) What sounds do people make with their mouths other than speaking or singing?|(17) Wat klanke mense maak met ander hul monde as praat of sing?
cry, laugh, scream, shriek, whistle, click, pop, wheeze, hiss, cluck, cough, hawk, gasp, gulp, snore, snort, sniff, sob, tsk-tsk, gurgle, gargle, yodel, moan, groan, scream, ululate, yikes, yahoo|huil, lag, skree, gil, fluit, kliek, pop, hijgen, spot, kloek, hoes, smous, asem, sluk, snork, snuif, snuif, snik, tsk-tsk, roggel, gorrel, gejodel, kla, kerm, skree, ululate, Yikes, yahoo
(18) What sounds do babies make?|(18) Wat klanke nie babas te maak?
bawl, gurgle, coo, cry, squall,|bulken, roggel, koer, huil, rukwind,
(19) What words refer to the sound of thunder?|(19) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van &#39;n donderslag?
boom, crack, rumble, thunder (v),|boom, crack, rommel, donderweer (v),
(20) What words refer to the sound of a gun or bomb?|(20) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van &#39;n geweer of bom?
bang, boom, roar, rumble,|bang, boom, brul, rommel,
(21) What words refer to the sound of a machine?|(21) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van &#39;n masjien?
buzz, hum, whirr, whine, bleep, roar, tick,|buzz, hum, gegons, geteem, oproep, brul, merk,
(22) What words refer to the sound of a car horn?|(22) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van &#39;n motor horing?
honk, toot, blare, beep,|honk, toeter, geloei, beep,
(23) What words refer to the sound of a bell?|(23) Watter woorde verwys na die klank van &#39;n klok?
ring, toll, chime, buzz, peal, tinkle,|ring, tol, harmonie, buzz, donderslag, geklingel,
Loud|Loud
Use this domain for words that describe loud sounds.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat harde klanke beskryf.
(1) What words describe a loud sound?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n harde geluid?
loud, roaring, blaring, thunderous,|hard, brullende, blêrende, donderende,
(2) What words describe a loud voice?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groot stem?
loud, raucous,|hard, hees,
(3) What words describe a group of people that is loud?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groep mense wat hard?
noisy, rowdy,|lawaaierig, rumoerig,
(4) What words describe a sound that is so loud that you can't hear anything else?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n klank wat so hard dat jy niks anders kan hoor?
deafening, drown out, be deafened by,|oorverdowende, verdrink, word verdoof deur,
(5) What words describe a sound that is loud and high?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n klank wat is hard en hoog?
piercing, penetrating, ear-splitting,|piercing, indringende, oorverdowende,
(6) What words describe a sound that is loud and low?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n klank wat is hard en laag?
resounding, rumble, booming,|klinkende, rommel, bloeiende,
(7) What words refer to a loud sound?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n harde geluid?
noise, racket, roar,|geraas, racket, brul,
(8) What words refer to many sounds at the same time?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na baie geluide op dieselfde tyd?
din, clamor, hubbub, commotion, cacophony, tumult, uproar,|din, geskreeu herrie, oproer, kakofonie, rumoer oproer,
(9) What words refer to making a loud sound?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n harde geluid?
boom (v), roar, thunder, blare, at full volume, at full blast,|boom (v), brul, donderweer, geloei, op volle volume, in volle swang,
(10) What words refer to how loud something is?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na hoe hard iets?
volume,|volume,
(11) What words refer to becoming louder?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na besig harder?
get louder, sound grows, raise your voice, speak up,|kry harder, klank groei, jou stem verhef, praat,
Quiet|Stil
Use this domain for words that describe quiet sounds.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat stil klanke beskryf.
(1) What words describe a quiet sound?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n stil klank?
quiet, low, soft, muffled, faint, muted, weak,|stil, lae, sagte, gedempte, moeg, gedempte, swak,
(2) What words describe something or someone that is quiet?|(2) Watter woorde iets of iemand wat stil te beskryf?
quiet, silent,|stil, stil,
(3) What words describe a quiet voice?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n stil stem?
hushed, subdued,|teruggehou, gedemp,
(4) What words describe a place or situation that is quiet?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek of situasie wat is stil?
quiet, peace and quiet, hush,|stil, rus en vrede, stilte,
(5) What words refer to a quiet sound?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n stil klank?
whisper (n), murmur, rustle,|fluister (n), murmureer, geritsel,
(6) What words refer to making a quiet sound?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stil klank?
whisper (v), murmur, mutter,|fluister (v), murmureer, mompel
(7) What words refer to becoming quieter?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na besig stiller?
get quieter, go quiet, die down, die away, fade away, fall silent, lower your voice,|kry stiller, gaan stil, sterf af, sterf weg, verdwyn, val stil, verlaag jou stem,
(8) What words refer to making something or someone quieter?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets of iemand stiller?
quiet someone down, silence (v), hush, muffle, turn down, shut someone up,|stil iemand af, stilte (v), hush, en gedemp, draai af, sluit iemand up,
(9) What do you say when you want someone to be quiet?|(9) Wat sê jy wanneer jy wil iemand om stil te wees?
shh, shush, shut up, be quiet, keep it down, pipe down,|shh, stil wees, toegesluit, wees stil, hou dit af, pyp af,
(10) What words refer to there not being any sound?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na daar nie &#39;n geluid?
silent, silence, you could hear a pin drop,|stil, stil, kan jy &#39;n speld hoor,
(11) What words indicate that you do something without making any noise?|(11) Watter woorde aan te dui dat jy iets doen sonder om enige geraas?
without a sound, not make a sound, in silence, noiseless, soundless, quietly, silently,|sonder &#39;n geluid, nie &#39;n geluid te maak, in stilte, stil, geluidloos, stil, stil,
Taste|Smaak
Use this domain for words related to tasting something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die proe iets.
(1) What words refer to tasting something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na smaak iets?
taste, relish, savor,|smaak, geniet, geniet,
(2) What words refer to deliberately trying to taste something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na doelbewus probeer om iets te proe?
taste, have a taste, try, sample, lick, sip,|smaak, het &#39;n smaak, probeer, monster, lek, sluk,
(3) What words refer to the ability to taste?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om te proe?
sense of taste, palate, taste buds,|sin van die smaak, verhemelte, smaakknoppies,
(4) What words describe something that has to do with tasting?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met die proe beskryf?
gustatory,|gustatory,
(5) What words refer to the taste of something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die smaak van iets?
taste, flavor, tang, aftertaste, hint, savor,|smaak, geur, tang, nasmaak, wenk, geniet,
(6) What words indicate that something tastes like another thing or tastes a particular way?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets smaak soos &#39;n ander ding of smaak &#39;n bepaalde manier?
taste like, taste of, taste (good/bad), have a (good/bad) taste, (good/bad) tasting, flavored,|smaak soos smaak van, smaak (goed / sleg), het &#39;n (goeie / slegte) smaak, (goed / sleg) proe, gegeurde,
(7) What words describe something that tastes good?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat goeie smaak beskryf?
delicious, tasty, good, nice, palatable, flavorful, yummy, juicy, succulent, delectable, luscious, rich, scrumptious, fresh, ambrosial, toothsome,|heerlike, lekker, goeie, mooi, smaaklik, smaakvol, lekker, sappige, sappig, smullekker sappige, ryk, heerlike, vars, ambrosial, smaaklik,
(8) What words describe something that looks like it tastes good?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat lyk asof dit lekker smaak beskryf?
appetizing, tempting, mouth-watering, make your mouth water,|smaaklik, aanloklik, watertand-, maak jou mond water,
(9) What words describe something that tastes bad?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat sleg smaak beskryf?
disgusting, revolting, horrible, bad, off, awful, distasteful, terrible, unpalatable, unsavory, yucky,|disgusting, oproerige, verskriklik, sleg, af, verskriklik, onsmaaklik, verskriklik, onsmaaklik, onsmaaklike, yucky,
(10) What words describe something that has a strong or spicy taste?|(10) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n sterk of pittige smaak beskryf?
strong, hot, spicy, piquant, fiery, pungent, peppery|sterk, warm, pittige, pikante, vurige, skerp, driftig
(11) What words describe something that does not have a strong taste?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat nie &#39;n sterk smaak beskryf?
mild, bland, insipid, weak,|ligte, vaal, flou, swak,
(12) What words describe something that has no taste?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat geen smaak beskryf?
tasteless, have no taste, not taste of anything, flavorless,|smaakloos, het geen smaak, smaak nie van enigiets, reuk,
(13) What words describe something that has a sweet taste?|(13) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n soet smaak het, beskryf?
sweet, sugary, sickly sweet, sweeten,|soet, soet, sieklike soet, soet,
(14) What words describe something that is not sweet?|(14) Watter woorde iets wat nie soet beskryf?
unsweetened, savory, dry,|onversoete, sout, droë,
(15) What words describe something that has a sour taste?|(15) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n suur smaak het, beskryf?
sour, sharp, tart, tangy,|suur, skerp, tert, suur,
(16) What words describe something that has a bitter taste?|(16) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n bitter smaak beskryf?
bitter, acrid, astringent, bitter-tasting, caustic,|bitter, bitter, trekkend, bitter-proe, bytende,
(17) What words describe something that has a salty taste?|(17) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n sout smaak beskryf?
salty,|sout,
Smell|Reuk
Use this domain for words related to smelling something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets ruik.
(1) What words refer to smelling something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets ruik?
smell, scent (v), get a whiff of, catch a whiff of,|reuk, geur (v), kry &#39;n whiff van, vang &#39;n whiff van,
(2) What words refer to deliberately trying to smell something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na doelbewus probeer om iets ruik?
smell, sniff, snuff, savor,|reuk, snuif, snuif, geniet,
(3) What words refer to the ability to smell?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om te ruik?
sense of smell, a good nose,|sin van die reuk, &#39;n goeie neus,
(4) What words describe something that has to do with smelling?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met die reuk beskryf?
olfactory,|olfaktoriese,
(5) What words refer to the smell of something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die reuk van iets?
smell, odor, scent, whiff, fume, essence, aroma, bouquet, fragrance,|reuk, geur, reuk, reuk, rook, wese, aroma, rangskikking, geur,
(6) What words indicate that something smells like another thing or smells a particular way?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets ruik soos &#39;n ander ding of ruik &#39;n bepaalde manier?
smell like, smell of, smell (good/bad), have a (good/bad) smell, (good/bad) smelling, give off a smell,|ruik soos, reuk van, reuk (goed / sleg), het &#39;n (goeie / slegte) reuk, (goed / sleg) ruik, gee &#39;n reuk,
(7) What words refer to smelling good?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na ruik goed?
smell good, smell nice,|ruik goed, ruik lekker,
(8) What words refer to smelling bad?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na ruik sleg?
smell bad, smell, stink, reek, stink the place up,|sleg ruik, ruik, stink, stank, stink die plek up,
(9) What words describe something that smells good?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat goeie ruik beskryf?
fragrant, aromatic, sweet-smelling, fresh, perfumed, delectable, delicious, nice, scented, wonderful,|geurige, aromatiese, geurige, vars, omgeurd, heerlike, lekker, lekker, geurige, wonderlike,
(10) What words describe something that smells bad?|(10) Watter woorde iets wat sleg ruik beskryf?
smelly, stinking, acrid, body odor, awful, fetid, foul, foul-smelling, fusty, malodorous, moldy, musty, noisome, pungent, putrid, rancid, rank, reeking, rotten,|stinkende, stinkende, wrang, liggaam reuk, verskriklik, stink, vuil, stinkende, kelder, onwelriekende muwwe, muwwe, kwaai, skerp, voos, galsterige, rang, reeking, vrot,
(11) What words refer to a good smell?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie reuk?
scent, perfume, fragrance, aroma, bouquet,|reuk, parfuum, geur, aroma, rangskikking,
(12) What words refer to a bad smell?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n slegte reuk?
smell (n), odor, stench, stink, reek, halitosis,|reuk (n), reuk, stank, stink, ruik, halitose,
(13) What words do people use to say that something smells bad?|(13) Watter woorde gebruik mense om te sê dat daar iets ruik sleg?
phew, PU, yuck|Sjoe, PU, ​​bah
(14) What words describe something that can be smelled easily?|(14) Watter woorde iets wat maklik kan ruik beskryf?
strong, powerful, pungent, heady, redolent,|sterk, kragtige, skerp, roekeloos, geurig,
(15) What words describe something that cannot be smelled easily?|(15) Watter woorde iets wat nie maklik kan ruik beskryf?
faint,|moeg,
(16) What words describe something that has no smell?|(16) Watter woorde iets wat geen reuk het, beskryf?
odorless, inodorous, inodorousness, scentless,|reukloos, reukloos, inodorousness, sonder reuk,
(17) What words refer to something beginning to smell?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na iets begin te ruik?
start to smell,|begin te ruik,
(18) What words refer to something not smelling any longer?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat nie langer ruik?
lose its smell,|verloor sy reuk,
(19) What words refer to a smell spreading?|(19) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n reuk versprei?
waft, dissipate,|sliertje, ontbind,
(20) What words refer to getting rid of a smell?|(20) Watter woorde verwys om ontslae te raak van &#39;n reuk?
get rid of that smell, air out a room, deodorize, mask a scent|ontslae te raak van daardie reuk, lug uit &#39;n kamer, ontsmetten, masker n reuk
(21) What things do people use to get rid of or cover up a bad smell?|(21) Watter dinge doen mense gebruik om ontslae te raak van of bedek &#39;n slegte reuk?
perfume, deodorant, deodorizer, incense, scent, air-freshener,|parfuum, deodorant, reukverdrijvend, wierook, reuk, air-freshener,
(22) What words refer to holding your nose so you don't smell something?|(22) Watter woorde verwys na hou jou neus so jy hoef nie iets ruik?
hold your nose,|hou jou neus,
Sense of touch|Tassintuig
Use this domain for words related to the sense of touch--to feel something with your skin, to feel hot or cold, to feel tired or rested.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die tassintuig - iets met jou vel voel, voel warm of koud, te moeg voel of rus.
(1) What words refer to feeling something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets voel?
feel,|voel,
(2) What words refer to deliberately trying to feel something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na doelbewus probeer om iets te voel?
feel, touch, palpate,|voel, raak, palpeer,
(3) What words refer to feeling something with your whole body?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets met jou hele liggaam voel?
feel (hot/cold/tired/sick), experience, come over all,|voel (warm / koue / moeg / siek), ondervinding, kom oor almal
(4) What words refer to the ability to feel?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die vermoë om te voel?
feeling, sense of touch, sense of feeling|gevoel, tassintuig, sin van gevoel
(5) What words refer to a feeling?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n gevoel?
feeling, sensation,|gevoel, sensasie,
(6) What words describe something that has to do with feeling?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met die gevoel te beskryf?
tactile,|tasbare,
(7) What words refer to the way something feels?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die manier waarop iets voel?
feel (n), texture,|voel (n), tekstuur,
(8) What words indicate that something feels like another thing or feels a particular way?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets voel soos &#39;n ander ding of voel &#39;n besondere manier?
feel like, feel of, feel (good/bad), have a (good/bad) feel, (tired) feeling,|voel, voel, voel (goed / sleg), het &#39;n (goeie / slegte) voel, (moeg) gevoel,
(9) What words refer to feeling good?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel goed?
comfortable,|gemaklik,
(10) What words refer to feeling bad?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na slegte gevoel?
uncomfortable,|ongemaklik,
(11) What words describe something that feels good?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat goeie voel beskryf?
soothing, pleasurable, sensuous,|strelende, aangename, sensuele,
(12) What words describe something that feels bad?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat sleg voel beskryf?
irritating, itchy, prickly, scratchy, ticklish, tingly,|irriterend, jeuk, stekelrige, krapperig, kielierig, tingly,
(13) What words refer to a good feeling?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie gevoel?
pleasure, comfort,|plesier, troos,
(14) What words refer to a bad feeling?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n slegte gevoel?
pain, itch, irritation, tickle,|pyn, jeuk, irritasie, kielie,
(15) What words do people use to say that something feels bad?|(15) Watter woorde gebruik mense om te sê dat daar iets voel sleg?
ouch,|eina,
(16) What words describe something that can be felt?|(16) Watter woorde iets wat gevoel kan beskryf?
touchable, tangible, palpable,|tasbare, tasbare, tasbaar,
(17) What words describe something that cannot be felt?|(17) Watter woorde iets wat nie gevoel word kan beskryf?
unfelt, intangible,|ongevoeld, ontasbare,
(18) What words refer to feeling things more than most people?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel dinge meer as wat die meeste mense?
sensitive, feel the (heat/cold)|sensitiewe, voel die (hitte / koue)
(19) What words refer to not being able to feel anything?|(19) Watter woorde verwys na die nie in staat om iets te voel?
be numb, have no feeling, can't feel anything, be insensitive (to pain), go to sleep, go dead, go numb, lose feeling,|wees afgestomp, het geen gevoel nie, kan nie voel niks, wees onsensitief (om pyn), gaan slaap, gaan dood, gaan gevoelloos, gevoel verloor,
(20) What words refer to causing a person not to feel anything?|(20) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat veroorsaak dat om niks voel?
anesthetize, numb (an area), deaden,|verdoof, gevoelloos (&#39;n area), verdoof,
Comfortable|Gemaklik
Use this domain for words related to feeling comfortable--to feel good in your body because there is nothing around you that makes you feel bad. This includes comfortable clothes, chair, bed, temperature, or journey.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gevoel gemaklik - om goed te voel in jou liggaam, want daar is niks om jou wat maak jy voel sleg. Dit sluit gemaklike klere, stoel, bed, temperatuur, of reis.
(1) What words refer to feeling comfortable?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na gemaklik voel?
comfortable, comfort, comfy, in comfort, snug|gemaklik, troos, gemaklike, in die troos, knus
(2) What words describe something that makes you feel comfortable?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat maak jy gemaklik voel beskryf?
comfortable, cozy, snug, smooth, luxurious|gemaklike, knus, gladde, luukse
(3) What words refer to something that makes you feel comfortable?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat maak jy gemaklik voel?
comfort, luxury,|troos, luukse,
(4) What words refer to a comfortable feeling?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gemaklike gevoel?
comfort,|troos,
(5) What words refer to making yourself comfortable?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak jouself gemaklik?
make yourself comfortable, settle down, snuggle|maak jouself gemaklik, gaan sit, hobbelen
(6) What words refer to not feeling comfortable?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na nie gemaklik voel?
uncomfortable, discomfort|ongemaklik, ongemak
(7) What words describe something that makes you feel uncomfortable?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat jou ongemaklik laat voel beskryf?
uncomfortable, rough, bumpy|ongemaklik, ruwe, stamperige
(8) What words refer to living without things that make you feel comfortable?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na lewe sonder dinge wat jy gemaklik voel?
rough it, austere, austerity, Spartan|rowwe dit sober, soberheid, Spartan
Body condition|Kondisie
Use this domain for general words related to the condition of the body.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met die toestand van die liggaam.
(1) What general words refer to the condition of the body?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die toestand van die liggaam?
condition, state, shape (as in 'to be in shape')|toestand, staat, vorm (soos in &#39;te wees in die vorm&#39;)
Strong|Sterk
Use this domain for words that related to being strong, such as being able to lift a heavy object or being able to work hard.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verband hou met hulle sterk, soos in staat is om &#39;n swaar voorwerp op te hef of in staat is om hard te werk.
(1) What words describe a person who is strong?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n sterk?
strong, powerful, muscular, well-built, strapping, steely,|sterk, kragtige, gespierde, goed gebou, strapping, Steely,
(2) What words describe someone who is strong and fat?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat sterk en vet beskryf?
stocky, burly, brawny, beefy, hefty,|bonkige, fris, gespierd, vlezig, stewige,
(3) What words describe someone who is strong and thin?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat sterk en dun beskryf?
wiry, sinewy,|taai, seningrige,
(4) What words describe someone who is strong and healthy?|(4) Watter woorde iemand wat sterk en gesond te beskryf?
sturdy, robust, hardy, tough, resilient,|stewige, sterk, geharde, taai, sterk,
(5) What words refer to a person's strength?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se krag?
strength, power, brawn, force, might, energy, vigor, toughness,|krag, krag, Brawn, krag, mag, energie, krag, taaiheid,
(6) What words describe someone who can work or run for a long time?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat kan werk of hardloop vir &#39;n lang tyd?
fit, physically fit, athletic,|fiks, fiks, atletiek,
(7) What words refer to being able to work or run for a long time?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die vermoë om te werk of hardloop vir &#39;n lang tyd?
be in shape, be in good condition, keep fit, stay in shape, keep in shape,|wees in die vorm, in &#39;n goeie toestand is, fiks, bly in die vorm, in stand te hou nie,
(8) What words refer to the ability to work or run for a long time?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om te werk of hardloop vir &#39;n lang tyd?
stamina, staying power, endurance, physical fitness,|stamina, uithouvermoë, volharding, fisieke fiksheid,
(9) What words refer to a person who is strong?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n sterk?
strong man, he-man, athlete,|sterk man, hy-man, atleet,
(10) What words refer to making someone stronger?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iemand sterker?
strengthen, bolster,|versterk, versterk,
(11) What words describe someone who does many things quickly?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat baie dinge vinnig doen?
energetic, full of energy, have lots of energy, active, vigorous,|energiek, vol energie, het baie van die energie, aktief, energiek,
Weak|Swak
Use this domain for words related to being weak.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat swak.

weak, puny, weedy, impotent,|swak, nietige, weedy magteloos,

vulnerable, defenseless, powerless,|kwesbaar, weerloos, magteloos,

weakness, infirmity, disability, vulnerability,|swakheid, swakheid, gestremdheid, kwesbaarheid,
(5) What words describe someone who cannot work or run for a long time?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie kan werk nie of hardloop vir &#39;n lang tyd?
unfit, not be in shape, be out of condition, be out of shape,|ongeskik, nie in die vorm wees van toestand, buite vorm,
(6) What words refer to a person who is weak?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat swak is?
weakling, wimp, invalid, weed,|swakkeling, wimp, ongeldig, onkruid,
(7) What words refer to making someone weaker?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iemand swakker?
weaken, debilitate, enfeeble|verswak, verzwakken, verzwakken
Energetic|Energieke
