energetic, vigorous, be full of energy, bursting with energy, dynamic, hyperactive, tireless, boisterous,|energieke, kragtige, vol wees van energie, propvol energie, dinamiese, hiperaktief, onvermoeide, uitbundige,
(2) What words describe someone who is energetic and happy?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat energieke en gelukkig te beskryf?
lively, vivacious, animated, be full of beans, bright and breezy, be a live wire, feel alive,|lewendig, vurig, geanimeerde, vol wees van bone, helder en winderig, word &#39;n lewendige draad, voel lewendig,
(3) What words describe energetic activity or behavior?|(3) Watter woorde energieke aktiwiteit of gedrag beskryf?
energetic, vigorous, tireless, lively, animated,|energieke, kragtige, onvermoeide, lewendig, geanimeerde,
(4) What words refer to the strength or ability to be energetic?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die krag of vermoë energieke te wees?
energy, vigor, get-up-and-go, vitality, vim and vigor, oomph,|energie, krag, kry-up-and-go, vitaliteit, vim en krag, oemf,
Tired|Moeg
Use this domain for words related to being tired.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met moeg.
(1) What words describe someone who is tired?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat moeg is beskryf?
tired, exhausted, tired out, worn out, weary, shattered, drained, beat, dead beat, be dead on your feet, be ready to drop, bushed, pooped, tuckered out, knackered, run down, spent, dog-tired, haggard,|moeg, uitgeput, moeg, uitgeput, moeg, verpletter, gedreineer, klop, doodmoeg, dood wees op jou voete, wees gereed om te daal, bekaf, pooped, tuckered uit, uitgeput, loop af, het, hond-moeg, Haggard,
(2) What words describe someone who is tired and doesn't want to work?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat moeg is en wil nie werk nie?
lethargic, sluggish, languid,|lomerig, traag, slap,
(3) What words refer to being tired and wanting to sleep?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na moeg en wil om te slaap?
sleepy, drowsy, half-asleep, can hardly keep your eyes open,|slaperig, lomerig, half aan die slaap, kan skaars jou oë oop te hou,
(4) What words refer to becoming tired?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na moeg?
get tired, tire, flag, run out of steam, burn out,|moeg, moeg, vlag, hardloop uit stoom, brand uit,
(5) What words refer to something making someone tired?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand moeg?
tire out, wear out, exhaust, tire, do someone in, it nearly killed me, take it out of, weary, fatigue, drain, tax, wear someone down, work someone to death,|band uit, dra nie, uitlaat, band, iemand doen, is dit byna vermoor my, neem dit uit, moeg, moegheid, dreineer, belasting, dra iemand af, werk iemand aan die dood,
(6) What words describe something that makes someone tired?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat iemand moeg maak, beskryf?
tiring, exhausting, wearing, boring, draining, grueling, taxing, tedious, wearisome, wearying,|uitputtend, uitputtend, dra, vervelig, dreineer, uitmergelende, belasting, vervelige, vermoeiend, vermoeiende,
(7) What words refer to the condition of being tired?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die toestand van moeg?
tiredness, exhaustion, fatigue, weariness, lethargy, jet-lag, sluggishness,|moegheid, uitputting, moegheid, moegheid, lusteloosheid, jet-lag, traagheid,
(8) What do people do when they are tired?|(8) Wat doen die mense doen wanneer hulle moeg is?
yawn, sigh, drag, droop, drop, faint, flag, pant, puff, stretch, wilt, wind down,|gaap, sug, sleep, moedeloos, drop, moeg, vlag, hyg, pofadders, rek, verwelk, wind af,
Rest|Rest
Use this domain for words related to resting.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met rus.
(1) What words refer to resting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na rus?
rest, take a rest, have a rest, lie down, put your feet up, relax, laze, take it easy, chill out, take a break, catch your breath, take a breather, take a respite, take a sabbatical, take it easy, unwind, take a vacation, recharge your batteries, repose, at ease, get your breath back, sit back,|rus, neem &#39;n rus, het &#39;n res, lê, sit jou voete op, ontspan, ontspan, neem dit maklik, chill uit, neem &#39;n breek, vang jou asem, neem &#39;n blaaskans, neem &#39;n rus, neem &#39;n sabbatsverlof neem dit maklik, ontspan, neem &#39;n vakansie, herlaai jou batterye, rus, op sy gemak, kry jou asem terug, sit terug,
(2) What words describe a person who has rested?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat gerus het?
(feel) rested, energetic, have a lot of energy, refreshed, restored,|(Gevoel) gerus, energiek, het &#39;n baie energie, verfris, herstel,
(3) What words refer to a time when someone rests?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd wanneer iemand rus?
rest, relaxation, break, tea/coffee break, siesta, time off, time out, holiday, respite, sabbatical, leisure time,|rus, ontspanning, breek, tee / koffie breek, siesta, tyd af, tyd uit, vakansie, rus, sabbatsverlof, vrye tyd,
(4) Where do workers rest?|(4) Waar werkers rus?
break room, lunchroom, in the shade,|breek kamer, lunchroom, in die skaduwee,
(5) What words describe a situation that helps someone rest?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n situasie wat help om iemand te rus?
restful, relaxing,|ontspannende,
Healthy|Gesonde
Use this domain for words related to a person being healthy--not sick.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n gesonde - nie siek.
(1) What words describe a person who is healthy?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat gesond is?
healthy, well, fine, in good health, able-bodied, hale, sound, whole,|gesonde, goed, goed, in goeie gesondheid, weerbaar, hale, klank, geheel,
(2) What words describe someone who is healthy and doesn't get sick?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat gesond is en nie siek?
robust, have a strong constitution,|robuuste, het &#39;n sterk konstitusie,
(3) What words describe someone who looks healthy?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat gesonde lyk te beskryf?
glowing, be the picture of health, healthy-looking,|gloeiende, is die prentjie van gesondheid, gesonde soek,
(4) What words refer to the state of being healthy?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van gesonde?
health, bloom, fitness,|gesondheid, bloei, fiksheid,
(5) What words refer to a person's physical condition?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se fisiese toestand?
health, wellbeing, condition, physiology,|gesondheid, welsyn, toestand, fisiologie,
(6) What words describe something that makes you healthy?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat maak jy gesond?
healthy, be good for you, be good for your health, do you good, beneficial,|gesonde, wees goed vir jou, wees goed vir jou gesondheid, jou goed doen, voordelig,
(7) What words describe food that makes you healthy?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf kos wat maak jy gesond?
wholesome, nutritious, nourishing, healthful,|gesonde, voedsame, voedsame, gesonde,
Sick|Siek
Use this domain for words describing a person who is sick.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat siek is.
(1) What words refer to being sick?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na siek?
be sick, be ill, not be well, be in a bad way, do poorly,|word siek, siek, nie goed wees nie, in &#39;n slegte manier, doen swak,
(2) What words refer to being sick with a disease?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na siek met &#39;n siekte?
have (a disease), suffer from, be sick with, infected with, stricken with, have an attack of,|het (&#39;n siekte), ly, wees siek, besmet is met, geteisterde met, het &#39;n aanval van,
(3) What words refer to being a little sick?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n bietjie siek nie?
off color, under the weather, run down, not feel yourself, not be yourself,|af kleur, onder die weer, loop af, voel nie jouself, jouself te wees nie,
(4) What words refer to being very sick?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wat baie siek is?
bedridden, decline, failing, life is ebbing, sinking (fast), seriously ill, critically ill, terminally ill, be fatal,|bedlêend, afname, by gebreke, die lewe is eb, sink (vinnig), ernstig siek is, krities siek is, terminaal siek is, noodlottig wees,
(5) What words refer to feeling sick?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel siek nie?
feel ill, not feel well, feel rough, feel funny, feel sick, feel sick to your stomach, groggy, feel faint,|siek voel, voel nie goed voel grof, voel snaaks, siek voel, voel siek om jou maag, deurmekaar, voel moeg,
(6) What words describe a person who is sick?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat siek is?
ill, sick, unwell, infirm, look like death warmed over, unhealthy, ailing, diseased, incapacitated, indisposed, laid up,|siek, siek, siek, swak, lyk soos die dood warm oor, ongesonde, sieklike, siek, onbevoeg, ongesteld, gelê het,
(7) What words describe someone who is often sick?|(7) Wat woorde iemand wat dikwels siek beskryf?
sickly, delicate, be in poor health, be prone to, hypochondriac,|sieklike, delikate, in swak gesondheid, geneig wees om, hipokondriese,
(8) What words refer to becoming sick?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na siek word?
get sick, become ill, fall ill, be taken ill, sicken, become sick, catch (a disease), come down with, contract,|siek, siek, siek, siek word, siek, siek, vang (&#39;n siekte), kom af met, kontrak,
(9) What words refer to a person who is sick?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat siek is?
patient, sufferer, invalid, the sick,|pasiënt, lyer, ongeldig, die siekes,
(10) What words refer to a time when many people are sick from the same disease?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd wanneer baie mense is siek van dieselfde siekte?
epidemic, plague, outbreak, pestilence,|epidemie, plaag, uitbreek, pes,
Recover from sickness|Herstel van siekte
Use this domain for words referring to recovering from sickness or injury.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die herstel van siekte of besering.
(1) What words refer to recovering?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die herstel?
recover, get better, make a slow/quick/complete recovery, get well, feel better, improve, be on the mend, respond to treatment, regain your health, gain strength, make good progress,|herstel, beter, maak &#39;n stadige / vinnige / volkome herstel, kry goed, voel beter, te verbeter, op die herstel, te reageer op behandeling, te herwin jou gesondheid, kry krag, maak goeie vordering,
(2) What words refer to recovering from a disease?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die herstel van &#39;n siekte?
recover from, get over, shake off,|herstel van, kry oor, skud,
(3) What words refer to no longer being very sick?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na nie meer wat baie siek is?
out of danger,|buite gevaar,
(4) What words refer to spending time resting in order to recover?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die besteding van tyd rus om te herstel?
recuperate, convalesce,|herstel, herstellende,
(5) What words refer to being healthy after being sick?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na om gesond nadat hy siek?
be better, be well, be fully recovered, be cured, be over something, be back on your feet, be up and about, be fit, be healed, be well again, be fine, be back to normal, be restored to health, be whole again,|word beter, goed, word ten volle herstel, genees, wees oor iets, terug op jou voete, wees en oor, fiks gesond te word, word weer goed, goed wees, terug na normaal, herstel van gesondheid wees weer heel,
(6) What words refer to feeling good enough to do something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na goed genoeg gevoel om iets te doen?
feel up to,|voel tot,
(7) What words refer to a disease going away?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte gaan weg?
go away, clear up,|weg te gaan, opklaar,
(8) What words refer to an injury healing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n besering genesing?
heal, mend,|genees, herstel,
Disease|Siekte
Use this domain for general words for disease and for words referring to specific diseases.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir die siekte en woorde wat verwys na spesifieke siektes.
(1) What words refer to a disease?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte?
illness, disease, complaint, condition, ailment, disorder, infection, bug, sickness, malady, infirmity, affliction, contagion, debility, indisposition, fever, syndrome, malaise,|siekte, klagte, toestand, siekte, versteuring, infeksie, bug, siekte, kwaal, siekte, ellende, besmetting, swakheid, ongesteldheid, koors, sindroom, malaise,
(2) What words refer to a disease that lasts a short time?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte wat &#39;n kort tyd duur?
attack, a bout of, a touch of,|aanval, &#39;n bout van, &#39;n tikkie van,
(3) What words describe a type of disease?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tipe van die siekte?
acute, chronic, bacterial, complication, critical, curable, degenerative, genetic, morbid, nervous, neuromuscular, psychosomatic, virus, wasting,|akute, chroniese, bakteriële, komplikasie, kritiese, genees, degeneratiewe, genetiese, morbiede, senuwee, neuromuskulêre, psigosomatiese, virus, mors,
(4) What words describe a disease that kills people?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n siekte wat mense doodmaak?
terminal, fatal, incurable,|terminale, fatale, ongeneeslike,
(5) What words describe a disease that people can get easily?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n siekte wat mense maklik kan kry?
infectious, contagious, catching,|aansteeklike, aansteeklike, vang,
(6) What words refer to a disease spreading to other people?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte na ander mense?
spread, epidemic, outbreak, plague,|verspreiding, epidemie, uitbreek, plaag,
(7) What are the names of particular diseases?|(7) Wat is die name van spesifieke siektes?
allergy, allergic, amoeba, appendicitis, cholera, colic, colicky, colitis, cyst, diabetes, diabetic, diphtheria, distemper, dropsy, dysentery, elephantiasis, encephalitis, fibrosis, fistula, flux, hypertension, gallstone, goiter, heatstroke, hernia, herpes zoster, hemophilia, hemorrhoid, hives, hookworm, kidney stone, lockjaw, lumbago, malaria, meningitis, mononucleosis, mumps, phlebitis, piles, plague, polio, poliomyelitis, psoriasis, rabid, rabies, rubella, sclerosis, sunstroke, tetanus, typhoid, typhus, yellow fever, airsick, carsick, seasick,|allergie, allergiese, amoeba, blindedermontsteking, cholera, koliek, koliekagtige, kolitis, sist, diabetes, diabetiese, witseerkeel, hondesiekte, watersug, disenterie, olifant, enkefalitis, fibrose, fistel, vloed, hoë bloeddruk, galsteen, goiter, hittesteek, breuk, herpes zoster, hemofilie, aambei, korwe, haakwurm, nier klip, tetanus, spit, malaria, meningitis, mononucleosis, pampoentjies, flebitis, hope, plaag, polio, polio, psoriase, hondsdol, hondsdolheid, rubella, sklerose, sonsteek, tetanus, tifus, tifus, geelkoors, lucht siek, karsiek, seesiek,
(8) What words refer to a disease of the brain or mind?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte van die brein of gedagte?
Alzheimer's, amnesia, stroke, depression, schizophrenia, shock, stress,|Alzheimer se geheueverlies, beroerte, depressie, skisofrenie, skok, spanning,
(9) What words refer to epilepsy?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na epilepsie?
epilepsy, epileptic, epileptic seizure, have a seizure, fit,|epilepsie, epileptiese, epileptiese aanval, het &#39;n beslaglegging, fiks,
(10) What words refer to a disease of the eyes?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte van die oë?
eye disease, glaucoma, red eyes, pinkeye, cataract, conjunctivitis, sty,|oog siekte, gloukoom, rooi oë, pinkeye, katarak, konjunktivitis, hok,
(11) What words refer to a disease of the nose and throat?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte van die neus en keel?
cough, whooping cough, cold, sore throat, influenza, flu, chill,|hoes, kinkhoes, koue, seer keel, griep, griep, chill,
(12) What words refer to a disease of the lungs?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte van die longe?
respiratory disease, tuberculosis, angina, asthma, asthmatic, pneumonia, emphysema, grippe, hay fever, bronchitis,|respiratoriese siekte, tuberkulose, angina, asma, asma, longontsteking, emfiseem, grippe, hooikoors, brongitis,
(13) What words refer to a disease of the heart?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte van die hart?
heart attack, heart failure, coronary, arteriosclerosis, cardiovascular, fibrillation, hardening of the arteries, thrombosis, heart murmur, weak heart, heart condition,|hartaanval, hartversaking, koronêre, arteriosklerose, kardiovaskulêre, fibrillasie, verharding van die are, trombose, hartgeruis, swak hart, hart toestand,
(14) What words refer to a disease of the liver?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte van die lewer?
liver disease, hepatitis, jaundice, cirrhosis,|lewersiekte, hepatitis, geelsug, sirrose,
(15) What words refer to sexually transmitted  disease?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na seksueel oordraagbare siekte?
venereal disease, AIDS, gonorrhea, syphilis, herpes|geslagsiekte, vigs, gonorree, sifilis, herpes
(16) What words refer to a disease of the bones and joints?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n siekte van die bene en gewrigte?
arthritis, arthritic, stiffness of the joints, rheumatic, rheumatism, backache,|artritis, artritiese, styfheid van die gewrigte, rumatiese, rumatiek, rugpyn,
(17) What words refer to cancer?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na kanker?
cancer, cancerous, tumor, skin cancer, leukemia, lung cancer, liver cancer, malignancy, malignant, benign,|kanker, kanker, tumor, velkanker, leukemie, longkanker, lewer kanker, kanker, kwaadaardige, goed,
Malnutrition, starvation|Wanvoeding, hongersnood
Use this domain for words related to not having enough food.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met nie genoeg kos.
(1) What words refer to the condition produced by not having enough food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand wat deur nie genoeg kos?
malnutrition, kwashiorkor, anemia, dystrophy, deficiency, anorexia,|wanvoeding, kwasjiorkor, anemie, spierdistrofie, tekort, anoreksie,
(2) What words refer to dying from lack of food?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na sterf van &#39;n gebrek aan voedsel?
starve, starvation, waste away,|honger, hongersnood, wegkwyn,
(3) What words describe someone who doesn't have enough food?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie genoeg kos?
starving, malnourished, anemic, emaciated,|honger, ondervoed, anemies, uitgeteer,
Skin disease|Vel siekte
Use this domain for words related to skin diseases such as leprosy, boils, and rashes.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vel siektes soos melaatsheid, kook, en uitslag.
(1) What words refer to a sore in the skin?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n seer in die vel?
boil, infection, sore, open sore, scab, rash, ulcer, abscess, bunion, growth, tumor, bruise, gangrene, inflammation, pox, lesion, canker, corn, eruption, blister, bedsore, cold sore,|kook, infeksie, seer, oop seer, brandsiekte, uitslag, maagseer, abses, knokkel, groei, tumor, kneusings, gangreen, inflammasie, pokke, letsel, kanker, mielies, uitbarsting, blister, bedsore, koue seer,
(2) What are the names of specific skin diseases?|(2) Wat is die name van spesifieke vel siektes?
leprosy, chickenpox, smallpox, measles, German measles, scabies, ringworm, (itching of foot due to worms), dermatitis, eczema, fungus, shingles,|melaatsheid, waterpokkies, waterpokkies, masels, Duitse masels, scabies, omlope, (jeuk van bek weens wurms), dermatitis, ekseem, swam, gordelroos,
(3) What words refer to having an infection?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat &#39;n infeksie?
have an infection, be infected, infect, get infected, break out, develop an infection,|het &#39;n infeksie, besmet, besmet, besmet, breek uit, &#39;n infeksie ontwikkel,
(4) What words refer to an infection becoming worse?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n infeksie vererger?
spread, turn gangrenous, fester, peel, break,|verspreiding, draai gangreen, sweer, skil, breek,
(5) What words refer to a small sore in the skin?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n klein seer in die vel?
(6) What words refer to pus?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na etter?
pus, pustule,|etter, blaartje,
(7) What does pus do?|(7) Wat beteken etter doen?
ooze, run,|modder, hardloop,
(8) What words refer to a person with a skin disease?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon met &#39;n vel siekte?
leper|melaatse
Stomach illness|Maag siekte
Use this domain for words related to stomach illness.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die maag siekte.
(1) What words refer to being sick in your stomach?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na siek in jou maag?
have an upset stomach, have a stomach-ache, tummy-ache, be sick to your stomach,|het &#39;n omgekrapte maag, het &#39;n maagpyn, maag-pyn, wees siek om jou maag,
(2) What types of stomach illness are there?|(2) Watter tipes maag siekte is daar?
vomiting, morning sickness, indigestion, diarrhea, dysentery, constipation, constipated, ulcer, ulcerate, ulcerated, intestinal obstruction, worms,|braking, oggendnaarheid, slegte spysvertering, diarree, disenterie, hardlywigheid, hardlywig, maagseer, verzweren, zweer vorming, derm obstruksie, wurms,
(3) What words refer to vomiting?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na braking?
be sick, throw up, vomit, puke, barf, bring up, regurgitate, spew,|wees siekes, braak,, kots, barf, laat optrek, spoeg, spuug,
(4) What words refer to vomiting without bringing anything up?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na braking sonder om iets te bring?
retch, heave, gag,|kokhalzen, afgee, gag,
(5) What are the symptoms of stomach illness?|(5) Wat is die simptome van die maag siekte?
gas, belching, cramps,|gas, winde opbreek, krampe,
(6) What words describe how you feel when your stomach is sick?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf hoe jy voel wanneer jou maag is siek?
feel sick, queasy, nausea, be going to be sick, nauseated, nauseous,|siek voel, kieskeurig, naarheid, gaan siek naar, naar te wees,
(7) What words refer to something making your stomach feel sick?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat jou maag voel siek nie?
nauseate, give you an upset stomach, make you sick to your stomach,|walgen, gee jou &#39;n omgekrapte maag, maak jou siek om jou maag,
Tooth decay|Tandbederf
Use this domain for words related to tooth decay.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met tandbederf.
(1) What words are used to describe a tooth that has gone bad?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n tand te sleg gegaan het, beskryf?
tooth decay, cavity, loose, rotten, gingivitis,|tandbederf, holte, los, vrot, gingivitis,
(2) What words refer to the pain caused by a bad tooth?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die pyn wat veroorsaak word deur &#39;n slegte tand?
toothache|tandpyn
(3) What words refer to losing a tooth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verlies van &#39;n tand?
lose a tooth, knock out, missing,|verloor &#39;n tand, klop, ontbreek,
(4) What words refer to removing a tooth?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die verwydering van &#39;n tand?
extract a tooth, pull a tooth, have a tooth out, extraction,|uittreksel van &#39;n tand, trek &#39;n tand, &#39;n tand uit, onttrekking,
(5) What words refer to fixing a tooth?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die vasstelling van &#39;n tand?
fill, filling, drill, cap, root canal,|vul, vul, boor, pet, wortelkanaalbehandeling,
(6) What words refer to false teeth?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na vals tande?
false teeth, dentures,|vals tande, tande,
(7) What words refer to a person who treats bad teeth?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat slegte tande behandel?
dentist, oral surgeon, dentistry,|tandarts, mondchirurg, tandheelkunde,
Injure|Beseer
Use this domain for words related to injuring someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met beseer iemand.
(1) What words refer to injuring someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beseer iemand?
injure, harm, hurt, wound, abuse, violate, electrocute, electrocution, mistreat, mistreatment, inflict injury,|beseer, skade, pyn, wonde, misbruik, skend, doodskok, elektriese skok, mishandel, mishandeling, veroorsaak besering,
(2) What words refer to injuring a part of your body?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na beseer &#39;n deel van jou liggaam?
injure, damage, hurt, impair,|beseer, skade, beseer, benadeel,
(3) What words refer to injuring a bone or joint?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n been beseer of gesamentlike?
break, fracture, dislocate, crack, hamstring, jam, sprain, stub, twist, wrench, do your back in, put out your back,|breek, fraktuur, verrekken, crack, dyspier, konfyt, verstuiting, stomp, draai, wrench, doen jou terug in, sit jou terug,
(4) What words refer to injuring a muscle?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n spier beseer?
pull, strain, tear, cramp, spasm, convulsion,|trek, stam, traan, krampe, spasma, stuiptrekkings,
(5) What words refer to being injured by being cut?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na beseer deur gesny?
cut, bayonet, buffet, butt, chop, claw, clout, club, gash, jab, knife, lacerate, maul, savage, slice, spear, stab, traumatize, scratch, scrape, graze, mutilate,|sny, bajonet, buffet, boude, kap, klou, invloed, klub, sny, steek, mes, ingeskeur, losgemaal, wrede, sny, spies steek, trauma, kras, skraap, wei, skend,
(6) What words refer to being injured by being hit?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na beseer deur getref?
hit, bash, batter, beat up, belt, black eye, bludgeon, bruise, crush, concussion, cudgel, cuff, hammer, horsewhip, kick, knee, knock, lash, pelt, pummel, punch, slap, smack, smash, squash, stone, strike, thwack, whip,|treffer, bash, beslag, klop, gordel, swart oog, knuppel, kneusings, geliefdes, harsingskudding, knuppel, cuff, hamer, karwats, skop, knie, klop, slag, pels, moker, pons, klap, klap, smash, muurbal, klip, staking, dreun, sweep,
(7) What words refer to being injured by being burned?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na beseer deur dit verbrand?
burn, first/second/third degree burn, boil, scald,|brand, eerste / tweede / derde graad brandwonde, kook, brandwond,
(8) What words refer to being injured?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na beseer?
be injured, sustain an injury, be bleeding, be hurt, get hurt, be wounded, suffer harm,|beseer, in stand te hou &#39;n besering, word bloeding, seerkry, seerkry, word gewond, ly skade,
(9) What words refer to someone who has been injured?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat beseer?
casualty, victim, the injured, the wounded,|ongevalle, die slagoffer, die beseerde, die gewonde,
(10) What words refer to a person wounded in war?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon gewond in die oorlog?
wounded in action, purple heart,|gewond in aksie, pers hart
(11) What words describe someone who has been injured?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat beseer?
injured, harmed, wounded,|beseer, benadeel, gewond,
(12) What words describe a part of your body that has been injured?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n deel van jou liggaam wat beseer is?
injured, hurt, impaired, damaged,|beseer, seer, benadeel, beskadig,
(13) What words refer to an injury?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n besering?
injury, accident, bruise, cut, impairment, wound, slash, puncture, stab, sprain, tear/pull a muscle, shock, concussion, bump, break a bone, fracture, dislocate a bone, dislocation, sprain, put out an eye, nose bleed, scar, sting, bite, sore, blister, contusion, frostbite, heatstroke, sunstroke, sunburn, burn, welt, drug overdose,|besering, ongeluk, kneusings, sny, gestremdheid, wond, streep, lek, steek, verstuiting, traan / trek &#39;n spier, skok, harsingskudding, stamp, breek &#39;n been, fraktuur, verrekken &#39;n been, ontwrigting, verstuiting, steek &#39;n oog , neus bloei, litteken, angel, byt, seer, blister, kontusie, bevroren, hittesteek, sonsteek, sonbrand, brand, welt, oordosis dwelms,
(14) What words describe the seriousness of an injury?|(14) Watter woorde beskryf die erns van &#39;n besering?
crippling, serious (injury), minor (injury), bad (accident), deep (wound), bad (sprain), third degree (burn), compound (fracture), critical, critically, fatal, fatally, sore (finger)|verlammende, ernstige (besering), klein (besering), slegte (ongeluk), diep (wond), slegte (verstuiting), derde graad (brand), saamgestelde (fraktuur), kritiese, krities, dodelik, noodlottig, seer (vinger)
(15) What words describe someone who is not injured?|(15) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie beseer nie?
unharmed, unhurt, unscathed, come to no harm, no harm done, without a scratch, in one piece, walk away from|ongedeerd, ongedeerd, ongedeerd, kom geen skade, geen skade gedoen het, sonder &#39;n skrapie, in een stuk, loop weg van
(16) What words describe something that can injure someone?|(16) Watter woorde iets wat iemand kan beseer beskryf?
dangerous, harmful,|gevaarlik, skadelik,
(17) What words describe something that cannot injure someone?|(17) Watter woorde iets wat nie iemand kan beseer beskryf?
harmless,|skadeloos,
Amputate|Amputeer
Use this domain for words related to amputating or losing a limb or other part of your body.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die afsit of verlies van &#39;n ledemaat of ander deel van jou liggaam.
(1) What words refer to the condition of having lost a limb?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van &#39;n ledemaat verloor?
be an amputee, disfigured,|wees ledemate verloor, vermink,
(2) What words refer to the event or process that results in losing a limb?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gebeurtenis of proses wat lei tot die verlies van &#39;n ledemaat?
amputate, amputation, lose a limb, sever, mutilate|amputeer, amputasie, verloor &#39;n ledemaat, verbreek, skend
(3) What words refer to a person who has lost a limb?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n ledemaat verloor het?
amputee|Amputee
(4) What things are used by a person who has lost a limb?|(4) Watter dinge word deur &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n ledemaat verloor het?
artificial limb, wooden leg, peg leg, prosthesis|kunsledemaat, hout been houtbeen, prostese
Poison|Gif
Use this domain for words referring to poison--something that is bad for your body if you eat it, it gets on you, or an animal injects it into you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na gif - iets wat sleg is vir jou liggaam is as jy dit eet, raak dit aan jou, of &#39;n dier spuit dit in jou.
(1) What general words refer to poison?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na gif?
poison, toxin,|gif, toksien,
(2) What types of animal poisons are there?|(2) Watter tipes diere gifstowwe is daar?
snakebite, bee sting, venom|slangbyt, bysteek, gif
(3) What types of plant poisons are there?|(3) Watter plant gifstowwe is daar?
poison ivy, hemlock,|gif klimop, wilde-als,
(4) What types of poison are eaten or drunk?|(4) Watter tipes gif geëet of gedrink?
food poisoning, arsenic, cyanide|voedselvergiftiging, arseen, sianied
(5) What types of poison affect the skin?|(5) Watter tipes gif invloed op die vel?
toxic substance, insecticide|giftige stof, insekdoder
(6) What words describe something that is poisonous?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat giftig is beskryf?
harmful, poisonous, toxic, noxious,|skadelike, giftige, giftige, skadelike,
(7) What words refer to giving someone poison?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die gee van iemand gif?
poison (v),|gif (v),
(8) What words refer to an animal putting poison into a person?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n dier om gif in &#39;n persoon?
bite, sting, inject,|byt, steek, spuit,
(9) What words refer to treating snakebite?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die behandeling van slangbyt?
treat for (snakebite), snakebite treatment, cut vein, suck poison out, snakebite kit|behandel vir (slangbyt), slangbyt behandeling, trant sny, suig die gif uit slangbytstel
(10) What words refer to treating poison that is eaten or drunk?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die behandeling van gif wat geëet of gedrink?
antidote, administer (the antidote)|teenmiddel, administreer (die teenmiddel)
Disabled|Gestremde
Use this domain for general words for being disabled--to be injured or born with a condition, so that some part of your body does not work.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir die feit dat gestremdes - te beseer of gebore met &#39;n toestand, sodat &#39;n deel van jou liggaam nie werk nie.

be disabled, have special needs, be crippled, be lame, be paralyzed, have a withered arm|versper, het spesiale behoeftes, vermink, lam, verlam, het &#39;n verdorde arm

disable, handicap (v), cripple, paralyze, maim, mutilate, disfigure,|skakel, gestremdheid (v), kreupel, verlam, vermink, vermink, ontsier,
(3) What words refer to the condition of being disabled?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van &#39;n afgeskakel?
disability, handicap (n), disfigurement, mutilation, paralysis, palsy,|gestremdheid, gestremdheid (n), skending, verminking, verlamming, gestremdheid,

the disabled, people with disabilities, the handicapped, cripple (n), lame (n), paraplegic (legs only), quadriplegic (all four limbs), paralytic,|gestremdes, mense met gestremdhede, gestremdes, kreupel (n), lam (n), parapleeg (slegs bene), kwadrupleeg (al vier ledemate), verlamde
(5) What words describe someone who has been disabled?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat gestremd?
disabled, handicapped, crippled, paralyzed, partially paralyzed, totally paralyzed, maimed, disfigured, mutilated, lame,|gestremdes, gestremdes, kreupel, verlam, gedeeltelik verlam, heeltemal verlam, vermink, vermink, vermink, lam,

crutch, cane, wheelchair, walker, stretcher, pallet,|kruk, kierie, rolstoel, ontsien, draagbaar, pallet,

Symptom of disease|Simptoom van die siekte
Use this domain for words for symptoms of disease--something that happens to you when you get sick, something that shows that you are sick.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde vir die simptome van die siekte - iets wat met jou gebeur wanneer jy siek, iets wat toon dat jy siek is.
(1) What words refer to a symptom?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n simptoom?
symptom, sign, indication, evidence, warning, pathology,|simptoom, teken, aanduiding, bewyse, waarskuwing, patologie,
(2) What types of symptoms are there?|(2) Watter simptome is daar?
shock, delirious, numb,|skok, delirium, gevoelloos,
(3) What words refer to feeling weak?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel swak?
weak, weakened, feel tired, no energy, debilitate, enervate,|swak, verswak, voel moeg, geen energie, strem, slap,
(4) What words refer to the skin changing color due to illness?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die vel kleur verander weens siekte?
pale, flushed, red, dark (circles under the eyes), spot, rash,|bleek, gespoel, rooi, donker (kringe onder die oë), spot, uitslag,
(5) What words refer to itching when the skin is irritated?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na jeuk wanneer die vel is geïrriteerd?
itch, have an itch, scratch, be irritated|jeuk, het &#39;n jeuk, krap, wees geïrriteerd
(6) What words refer to coughing?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na hoes?
cough, sneeze, clear throat, hack|hoes, nies, helder keel, hack
(7) What words refer to muscles cramping from pain?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na spiere krampe van pyn?
cramp, be bent over (with pain), doubled up (with pain), spasm,|kramp, gebuig oor (pyn), verdubbel (met pyn), spasma,
(8) What words refer to the body shaking due to illness?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die liggaam skud weens siekte?
convulsion, chills, fit,|stuiptrekkings, kouekoors, fiks,
(9) What words refer to feeling dizzy or faint?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel duiselig of flou?
dizzy, dizziness, feel faint,|duiselig, duiseligheid, voel moeg,
Pain|Pyn
Use this domain for words related to pain|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die pyn
(1) What words refer to pain?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na pyn?
pain, ache, hurt (n), misery, suffering, sufferings, soreness,|pyn, pyn, seer (n), ellende, lyding, swaarkry, pyn,
(2) What words refer to being in pain?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat in pyn?
be in pain, be in agony, feel pain, have a pain in, suffer, hurt (vi), bear pain, endure, agonize, feel bad, feel miserable, suffer,|in pyn, in angs, pyn voel, het &#39;n pyn in, ly seer (vi), beer pyn, verduur, angstig, voel sleg, voel ongelukkig, ly,
(3) What words refer to a part of your body hurting?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van jou liggaam seer?
hurt, ache, be agony, sting,|seer, pyn, angs wees, angel,
(4) What words describe a part of your body that is in pain?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n deel van jou liggaam wat in pyn?
painful, aching, sore (adj), stiff, tender,|pynlik, seer, seer (adj), styf, tender,
(5) What words refer to pain in a particular part of your body?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na pyn in &#39;n bepaalde deel van jou liggaam?
backache, earache, headache, migraine, stomachache, toothache, labor pains, sore throat,|rugpyn, oorpyn, hoofpyn, migraine, maagpyn, tandpyn, geboortepyne, seer keel,
(6) What words refer to a mild pain?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ligte pyn?
discomfort, feel uncomfortable, mild, hurts a little bit, itch, prickle, smart, sting, stinging, tingle, tingling, stitch, twinge, dull,|ongemak, ongemaklik voel, ligte, seer &#39;n bietjie, jeuk, angel, smart, angel, branderige, tuit, jeuk, steek, steek, dof,
(7) What words refer to a bad pain?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n slegte pyn?
agony, agonize, agonizing, anguish, burn, hurts a lot, really hurts, acute, racked with pain, horrible, excruciating, torment, raw pain,|angs, angstig, pynlike, angs, brand, seer &#39;n baie, baie seer, akute, geteister met pyn, verskriklik, helse, marteling, rou pyn,
(8) What words describe pain increasing?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf pyn toenemende?
increase, grow, rise|verhoog, te groei, styg
(9) What words describe pain decreasing?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf pyn te verminder?
subside, go away, fade|bedaar, weg te gaan, vervaag
(10) What words refer to a pain that increases and decreases repeatedly?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n pyn wat verhoog en herhaaldelik afneem?
throb, throbbing,|klop, kloppende,
(11) What words refer to a pain that lasts a short time?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n pyn wat &#39;n kort tyd duur?
attack, sharp, pang, piercing, prick, shooting, stab, stabbing, throes, paroxysm, wrenching pain,|aanval, skerp, pang, piercing, prik, skiet, deurboor, steek, kloue, paroksisme, skokkende pyn,
(12) What words refer to causing pain?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na pyn te veroorsaak?
hurt, inflict pain, torture, afflict, torment,|seer, veroorsaak pyn, marteling, teister, marteling,
(13) What words refer to something causing pain?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat pyn?
hurt, painful, cause pain, sting, irritate,|seer, pynlik, pyn veroorsaak, angel, irriteer,
(14) What words refer to relieving pain?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na die verligting van pyn?
relieve, relief, soothe, treat, alleviate, painkiller, anesthetize, anesthetic,|verlig, verligting, streel, te behandel, te verlig, pynstiller, verdoof, narkose,
(15) What words refer to making noise because you are in pain?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na die maak geraas, want jy is in pyn?
cry out, scream, howl, yell, shriek, groan, moan, weep,|uitroep, skree, huil, skreeu, gil, sug, kreun, huil,
(16) What words refer to moving because you are in pain?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing omdat jy in pyn?
writhe in pain, double up, contorted with pain, convulse, convulsion, cramp, cramps, wince,|krul in pyn, verdubbel, krul van pyn, stuip, stuiptrekkings, krampe, krampe, haspel,
(17) What do you say when you are hurt?|(17) Wat sê jy wanneer jy seergekry?
Ow! Ouch!|Oe! Ouch!
(18) What words refer to not causing pain?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na nie veroorsaak pyn?
not hurt, painless, not feel a thing,|nie seergekry nie, pynloos, voel nie &#39;n ding,
Fever|Fever
Use this domain for words related to having a fever.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n koors.
(1) What words refer to having a fever?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n koors?
fever, feverish, temperature, have a fever/temperature, run a temperature, be hot, be burning up,|koors, koorsig, temperatuur, het &#39;n koors / temperatuur, hardloop &#39;n temperatuur, warm, word brand,
(2) What words refer to a fever increasing?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n koors toenemende?
rise|styg
(3) What words refer to a fever decreasing?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n koors te verminder?
fall, break|val, breek
(4) What are the symptoms of having a fever?|(4) Wat is die simptome van &#39;n koors?
shiver, shake, have the shakes, chills|bewe, skud, het die skud, kouekoors
(5) What words refer to measuring someone's fever?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die meting van iemand se koors?
take someone's temperature,|neem temperatuur iemand se,
(6) What instruments are used for measuring a fever?|(6) Watter instrumente word gebruik vir die meet van &#39;n koors?

Swell|Deining
Use this domain for words related to swelling of the body.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met swelling van die liggaam.
(1) What words refer to swelling?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na swelling?

(2) What words refer to swelling in a particular part of the body?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na swelling in &#39;n bepaalde deel van die liggaam?
swollen abdomen, swollen muscle, hernia, swelling in groin|geswelde buik, geswelde spiere, breuk, swelling in lies
(3) What words describe something that has swollen?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat geswel beskryf?
swollen, puffy, inflamed,|geswel, opgeblase, ontsteek,
(4) What words refer to swelling increasing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na swelling toenemende?
swell up, get swollen|swel, kry geswel
(5) What words refer to swelling decreasing?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na swelling te verminder?
relieve swelling, reduce swelling, go down|verlig swelling, verminder swelling, gaan af
Lose consciousness|Bewussyn verloor
Use this domain for words related to losing consciousness, including fainting, being knocked out, and anesthesia.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verlies van bewussyn, insluitend flou, word uitgeslaan, en narkose.
(1) What words refer to being conscious?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na bewus?
be conscious, consciousness, awake|bewus wees, bewussyn, ontwaak
(2) What words refer to losing consciousness?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verlies van bewussyn?
lose consciousness, go unconscious, faint, pass out, swoon, be knocked out, go into a coma, collapse,|bewussyn verloor, gaan bewusteloos, moeg, slaag nie, beswyming, word uitgeslaan, gaan in &#39;n koma, ineenstorting,
(3) What words refer to the state of being unconscious?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van bewusteloos?
be unconscious, fainted, passed out, coma, be in a coma, be out, insensible|word bewusteloos, was gedaan geslaag het, koma, in &#39;n koma, buite, gevoelloos
(4) What words refer to something causing someone to lose consciousness?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om sy bewussyn verloor?
knock out, put out, put under (anesthesia), stupefy,|klop, sit uit, sit onder (narkose), Bedwelm,
(5) What words refer to regaining consciousness?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na sy bewussyn herwin?
regain consciousness, come to, come out of the coma|bewussyn herwin, kom, kom uit die koma
(6) What words refer to causing a person to regain consciousness?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat veroorsaak dat bewussyn herwin?
bring someone around, resuscitate|bring iemand rond, te laat herleef
(7) What words refer to a person who deals with loss of consciousness?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat handel oor die verlies van bewussyn?
anesthesiologist|anesthesist
(8) What causes someone to lose consciousness?|(8) Wat veroorsaak iemand om sy bewussyn verloor?
hit on head, be sick, be in pain, anesthesia|getref op die kop, wees siek wees in pyn, narkose
(9) What happens or what symptoms occur when someone begins to lose consciousness?|(9) Wat gebeur of wat simptome voorkom wanneer iemand begin bewussyn verloor?
feel faint, feel dizzy, stagger, become incoherent|voel moeg voel duiselig, waggel, word onsamehangende
(10) What are the symptoms of being unconscious?|(10) Wat is die simptome van wat bewusteloos?
be unresponsive, be like dead|wees nie reageer, soos dooie
Dazed, confused|Verdwaas, verward
Use this domain for words that describe the state of the mind when a person's mind is not working well or when he is not thinking very well.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat die toestand van die gees te beskryf wanneer &#39;n persoon se gedagtes is nie goed werk of wanneer hy nie baie goed dink.
(1) What words refer to being dazed or confused?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat verdwaas of verward?
be dazed, confused, disoriented, unsure, out of it, befuddled, bewildered, spaced out, incoherent, dull (minded), stupor,|word verdwaas, verward, war, onseker, uit dit uit, benewel, verward gespasieer uit, onsamehangende, dowwe (minded), diepe slaap,
(2) What words are used to express a slight case of these conditions?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n effense geval van hierdie omstandighede uit te druk?
slightly disoriented, a bit confused, a little out of it|effens gedisoriënteerd, &#39;n bietjie verwar, &#39;n bietjie uit dit
(3) What words are used to express an extreme case of these conditions?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n uiterste geval van hierdie omstandighede uit te druk?
really confused, totally out of it, shocked|regtig verward, heeltemal uit dit uit, geskok
(4) What words describe a person's mind is working well?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf gedagte &#39;n persoon se goed werk?
think clearly, be clear headed, be sharp (mentally)|dink duidelik, word duidelik leiding wees skerp (geestelik)
(5) What words refer to causing someone to be dazed or confused?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak word verdwaas of verward?
daze, confuse, disorient, befuddle, shock, stupefy|daze, verwar, disorienteer, bedwelmen, skok, Bedwelm
Vision, hallucination|Visie, hallusinasies
Use this domain for words related to having a vision--when a person sees something that isn't there because something unusual has happened to their mind. Include unusual, abnormal, and paranormal states of consciousness, visions, hallucinations, and spiritually induced trances.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n visie - wanneer &#39;n persoon sien iets wat nie daar is nie, want iets ongewoon gebeur het hul gees. Sluit ongewone, abnormale, en paranormale state van bewussyn, visioene, hallusinasies en geestelik geïnduseerde trances.
(1) What words refer to an unusual state of consciousness?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ongewone toestand van bewussyn?
vision, trance, hallucination|visie, trance, hallusinasie
(2) What words refer to beginning an unusual state of consciousness?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die begin &#39;n ongewone toestand van bewussyn?
go into a trance|gaan in &#39;n beswyming
(3) What words refer to the state of being in an unusual state of consciousness?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van &#39;n ongewone toestand van bewussyn?
be in a trance, have a vision, hallucinate|wees in &#39;n beswyming, het &#39;n visie, hallusineer
(4) What words refer to one person causing another to be in an unusual state of consciousness?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n ander te wees in &#39;n ongewone toestand van bewussyn?
hypnotize|Hypnotize
(5) What words describe regaining normal consciousness?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf herwin normale bewussyn?
come out of the trance|kom uit die beswyming
(6) What people deal with unusual states of consciousness?|(6) Wat mense met ongewone toestande van bewussyn?
exorcist|exorcist
(7) What causes someone to be in an unusual state of consciousness?|(7) Wat veroorsaak iemand om te wees in &#39;n ongewone toestand van bewussyn?
be possessed by a spirit, drugs|besit word deur &#39;n gees, dwelms
Treat disease|Behandel siekte
Use this domain for words related to the treatment of disease and injury.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die behandeling van die siekte en besering.
(1) What words refer to treating someone who is sick or injured?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die behandeling van iemand wat siek is of beseer?
give someone treatment, treat, treatment, medical treatment, therapy, therapeutic, medical procedure, rehabilitation, medical aid, first aid, go to the aid of,|gee iemand behandeling, te behandel, behandeling, mediese behandeling, terapie, terapeutiese, mediese prosedure, rehabilitasie, mediese fonds, noodhulp, gaan na die hulp van,
(2) What words refer to taking care of someone who is sick?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die sorg van iemand wat siek?
care for (a patient), nurse (a patient), nurse back to health, look after, hospice care|sorg vir (&#39;n pasiënt), verpleegster (&#39;n pasiënt), verpleegster terug na gesondheid, kyk na, hospice sorg
(3) What words refer to treating a disease?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die behandeling van &#39;n siekte?
treat a disease, arrest (the spread of a disease),|&#39;n siekte te behandel, arrestasie (die verspreiding van &#39;n siekte),
(4) What words refer to a particular type of treatment?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n spesifieke tipe van behandeling?
resuscitate, acupuncture, blood transfusion,|herleef, akupunktuur, bloedoortapping,
(5) What words refer to treating a wound?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die behandeling van &#39;n wond?
clean/cleanse a wound, bandage, Band-Aid, compress, dress (a wound), dressing, tourniquet,|skoon / reinig &#39;n wond, blinddoek, Band-Aid, compress, rok (&#39;n wond), aantrek, toerniket,
(6) What words refer to treating a broken bone?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die behandeling van &#39;n gebreekte been?
set a bone, reduce a dislocation, cast, splint, crutches, cane, plaster, sling, brace,|stel &#39;n been, verminder &#39;n ontwrigting, cast, spalk, krukke, suikerriet, gips, slinger, stut,
(7) What words refer to surgery?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na chirurgie?
surgery, surgical, operate, operation, perform an operation, have an operation, major surgery, minor surgery, operating theater, operating table, amputate, implant, transplant, inoperable, incision, stitch, suture, sew up, scalpel,|chirurgie, chirurgiese, bedryf, bedryf, voer &#39;n operasie, het &#39;n operasie, &#39;n groot operasie, klein operasie, operasiesaal, operasietafel, amputeer, inplanting, oorplanting, in onbruik, insnyding, steek, hegting, naaldwerk up, scalpel,
(8) What words refer to treating pain?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die behandeling van pyn?
alleviate, ease, anesthesia, anesthetic, general anesthesia, local anesthesia, anesthetize,|verlig, gemak, narkose, verdowing, narkose, plaaslike narkose, verdoof,
(9) What words refer to  things are done to treat disease?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na dinge gedoen om die siekte te behandel?
radiation, scan,|bestraling, scan,
(10) What words refer to trying to find out what is wrong with a sick person?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om uit te vind wat verkeerd is met &#39;n siek persoon is?
diagnose, prognosis, draw/take a sample, examine a patient, take an x-ray, do a test, test for, lab report, take someone's temperature, take someone's blood pressure, take someone's pulse, check-up, take a sample, specimen,|diagnoseer, prognose, teken / neem &#39;n monster, te ondersoek van &#39;n pasiënt, neem &#39;n x-straal, doen &#39;n toets, toets vir, laboratorium verslag neem die temperatuur iemand se neem bloed iemand se druk, neem iemand se pols, check-up, neem &#39;n monster , monster,
(11) What words refer to telling a sick person what to do in order to get well?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na vertel van &#39;n siek persoon wat om te doen ten einde goed te kry?
prescribe, prescription,|voorskryf, voorskrif,
(12) What words refer to curing someone?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na genesing iemand?
cure, make someone better, heal, fix, healing, rehabilitate,|genesing, maak iemand beter, genees, op te los, genesing, rehabiliteer,
(13) What words refer to something that cures someone?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand genees?
cure (n), remedy, antidote, curative,|genesing (n), middel, teenmiddel, kuratiewe,
(14) What equipment is used to treat illness?|(14) Watter toerusting gebruik word om te behandel siekte?
stethoscope, blood pressure cuff, scalpel, catheter, forceps, needle, syringe, IV, x-ray machine, x-ray,|stetoskoop, bloeddruk cuff, scalpel, kateter, tang, naald, spuit, IV, X-straal-masjien, X-strale,
(15) What words refer to preventing disease?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na die voorkoming van die siekte?
hygiene, immunization, immunize, inoculate, inoculation, vaccinate, vaccination|higiëne, immunisering, immuniseer, inent, inenting, ent, inenting
Doctor, nurse|Dokter, verpleegster
Use this domain for words referring to people who habitually take care of the sick and injured, such as those who do it for a living.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na mense wat gewoonlik sorg vir die siekes en beseerdes, soos diegene wat vir &#39;n lewe doen.

specialist, consultant, allergist, anesthesiologist, anesthesiology, cardiologist, cardiology, chiropractor, chiropractic, dermatologist, dermatology, endocrinologist, endocrinology, epidemiology, gastroenterologist, gastroenterology, gynecologist, gynecology, hematology, histology, homeopathist, homeopathy, immunologist, immunology, neonatologist, neonatology, nephrologist, nephrology, neurologist, neurology, obstetrician, obstetrics, oncologist, oncology, ophthalmologist, orthopedist, orthopedic surgeon, orthopedics, pediatrician, pediatrics, plastic surgeon, podiatry, proctologist, radiation oncologist, radiologist, radiology, radiotherapy, rheumatologist, rheumatology, surgeon, surgery, urologist|, konsultant, allergist, anesthesist, anesthesiologie, kardioloog, kardiologie, chiropraktisyn, chiropraktiese, dermatoloog, vel, endokrinoloog, endokrinologie, epidemiologie, gastroënteroloog, gastroënterologie, ginekoloog, ginekologie, hematologie, histologie, homeopathist, homeopatie, immuno, immunologie, neonatologist, neonatologie, nefroloog, nefrologie, neuroloog, neurologie, verloskundige, verloskunde, onkoloog, onkologie, oogarts, ortopeed, ortopediese chirurg, ortopedie, pediater, kindergeneeskunde, plastiese chirurg, voetheelkunde, proctologist, bestralingsonkoloog, radioloog, radiologie, radioterapie, Rumatoloog, reumatologie , chirurg, chirurgie, uroloog
(3) What words refer to a doctor who treats mental illness?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dokter wat geestelike siekte behandel?
psychiatrist, shrink, analyst, psychiatry, psychologist, psychoanalyst, psychoanalysis, psychotherapist, psychotherapy,|psigiater, krimp, ontleder, psigiatrie, sielkundige, psigoanalis, psigoanalise, psigoterapeut, psigoterapie,

(5) What words refer to someone who helps a doctor?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat &#39;n dokter help?

(6) What words refer to someone who give emergency treatment to someone who has been injured?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat noodbehandeling aan iemand wat beseer gee?

(7) What words refer to a doctor who treats animals?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n dokter wat diere behandel?

(8) What words refer to a person who pretends to be a doctor?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat voorgee om &#39;n dokter te wees?

(10) What words refer to going to a doctor?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na gaan &#39;n dokter?

Medicine|Medisyne

tablet, pill, capsule, potion, syrup, tonic,|tablet, pil, kapsule, doepa, stroop, tonikum,
(5) What words refer to medicine that is injected under the skin?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na medisyne wat ingespuit onder die vel?

(6) What words refer to giving medicine?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die gee van medisyne?

(7) What words refer to taking medicine?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die neem van medisyne?
take something for, drink, swallow,|neem iets vir drink, sluk,
(8) What words refer to some medicine that is given at one time?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na sommige medisyne wat gegee word aan &#39;n tyd?
dose, dosage, course of medicine, overdose,|dosis, dosis, loop van medisyne, oordosis,
(9) What words refer to the equipment used to store and administer medicine?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die gebruik om te slaan en te administreer medisyne toerusting?

(10) What words refer to the written instructions a doctor gives about how much medicine to take?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die geskrewe instruksies n dokter gee oor hoeveel medisyne te neem?

Medicinal plants|Medisinale plante

Hospital|Hospitaal

ward, unit, operating room, operating theater, emergency room, casualty department, accident and emergency, lab, x-ray room, nurses' station, intensive care, surgery, waiting room, mortuary, morgue,|wyk, eenheid, operasie kamer, operasiesaal, nood kamer, ongevalle-afdeling, en noodgeval, laboratorium, X-straal-kamer, stasie verpleegsters, intensiewe sorg, chirurgie, wagkamer, lykshuis, lykshuis,

Traditional medicine|Tradisionele medisyne
Use this domain for words related to traditional medicine. There may be no distinction in terminology between 'modern medicine' and 'traditional medicine.' In that case this domain should be ignored. (Our purpose here is not to judge the value of traditional medicine, but to collect and describe the words used for it.)|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met tradisionele medisyne. Daar kan geen onderskeid in terme tussen &#39;n moderne medisyne &quot;en&quot; tradisionele medisyne. &quot; In daardie geval moet hierdie domein geïgnoreer word nie. (Ons doel hier is nie om die waarde van tradisionele medisyne te oordeel nie, maar om die woorde wat gebruik word vir dit in te samel en te beskryf.)
(1) What words refer to the practice of traditional medicine?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die praktyk van tradisionele medisyne?
traditional medicine, natural medicine|tradisionele medisyne, natuurlike medisyne
(2) What words refer to the types of treatment?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die tipes behandeling?
acupuncture,|akupunktuur,
(3) What words refer to a person who practices traditional medicine?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat tradisionele medisyne beoefen?
medicine man, herbalist, shaman,|medisyne man, kruiekundige, shaman,
(4) What words refer to the medicine used in traditional medicine?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die medisyne gebruik in tradisionele medisyne?
potion, herb|doepa, plante
Mental illness|Geestesongesteldheid
Use this domain for words related to being mentally ill or disabled.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met geestelik siek of gestremd.
(1) What words describe someone who is mentally ill?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat geestelik siek beskryf?
mentally ill, insane, mad, crazy, disturbed, mentally disabled, crackbrained, crazed, demonized, demon possessed, feeble minded, melancholic, neurotic, obsessive, paranoid, preoccupied, psychopathic, psychotic, retarded, catatonic,|geestelik siek, mal, mal, versteur, verstandelik gestremdes, crackbrained, waansinnige, gedemoniseer, besetene, swak minded, melancholiese, neurotiese, obsessiewe, paranoïes, besig, psigopatiese, psigotiese, vertraagde, katatoniese,
(2) What words describe an old person who has become mentally ill?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n ou persoon wat geestelik siek geword het?
senile, confused, his mind is wandering, lose your marbles,|seniele, verward, sy gedagtes dwaal, verloor jou albasters,
(3) What words refer to mental illness?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na geestelike siekte?
mental illness, madness, insanity, dementia, demon possession, fixation, hypochondria, lunacy, mania, melancholia, neurosis, obsession, paranoia, psychosis, schizophrenia, senility|geestelike siekte, waansin, kranksinnigheid, swaksinnigheid, duiwelbesetenheid, fiksasie, hypochondria, waansin, manie, melankolie, neurose, obsessie, paranoia, psigose, skisofrenie, seniliteit
(4) What words refer to becoming mentally ill?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na besig geestelik siek?
have a nervous breakdown, crack up, go mad, go insane, go crazy, go senile, develop a psychosis|&#39;n senuwee-ineenstorting, kraak, gaan mal, gaan stapelgek, gaan mal, gaan seniele, ontwikkel &#39;n psigose
(5) What words refer to something that causes mental illness?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat geestelike siekte veroorsaak?
brain injury, mental trauma, shock,|breinbesering, geestelike trauma, skok,
(6) What words refer to partial or total mental disability?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na gedeeltelike of totale verstandelike gestremdheid?
mild retardation, severe retardation, vegetable,|ligte gestremdheid, erge gestremdheid, groente,
(7) What words refer to a mentally ill person?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n geestesongestelde persoon?
madman, crazy man, hypochondriac, idiot, lunatic, maniac, possessed man, psychopath, schizophrenic, retard,|besetene, mal man, hipokondriese, idioot, kranksinnige, maniac, besit man, psigopaat, skisofreen, retard,
(8) What words refer to someone who cares for mentally ill people?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat omgee vir verstandelik siek mense?
psychologist, psychiatrist, exorcist,|sielkundige, psigiater, exorcist,
(9) What words refer to a hospital for mentally ill people?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n hospitaal vir verstandelik siek mense?
insane asylum,|stapelgek asiel
(10) What words refer to someone who is normal and not mentally ill?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat is normaal en nie geestelik siek?
sane, sanity, of sound mind,|sane, gesonde verstand, van gesonde verstand,
Life|Life
Use this domain for general words referring to being alive and to a person's lifetime.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na om te lewe en om &#39;n persoon se leeftyd.
(1) What words refer to being alive?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om te lewe?
be alive, live, life, stay alive, be going strong,|lewend, live, die lewe, die lewe te bly, word baie sterk,
(2) What words describe someone who is alive?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat die lewe beskryf?
living, alive, animate (adj),|lewende, lewendig, animeer (adj),
(3) What words refer to the process a person goes through from birth to death?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die proses &#39;n persoon gaan deur van geboorte tot die dood?
life, life cycle, cycle of life|lewe, lewensiklus, siklus van die lewe
(4) What words refer to the time when a person is alive?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer &#39;n persoon is in die lewe?
life, lifetime, days, lifespan, life expectancy,|lewe, lewe, dae, leeftyd, lewensverwagting,
(5) What words refer to causing someone to be alive?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om die lewe te wees?
animate (v), bring to life, give life to, give breath to, breathe life into, vivify|animate (v), bring aan die lewe, lewe te gee aan, gee asem, asem lewe in, bezielen
(6) What words refer to bringing a dead person back to life?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die totstandkoming van &#39;n dooie persoon terug na die lewe?
resurrect, resurrection, resuscitate, revive, rise again, rise from the dead, regenerate, bring back to life|wek, opstanding, te laat herleef, te laat herleef, weer opstaan, opstaan ​​uit die dood, regenereer, terug te bring na die lewe
(7) What words refer to keeping someone alive?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die behoud van iemand lewe?
keep alive, life support, preserve, sustain, subsist on,|die lewe bly, die lewe ondersteuning, te bewaar, te behou, oorleef op,
(8) What words refer to living longer than someone else?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na lewende langer as iemand anders?
outlive, survive,|oorleef, oorleef,
(9) What words refer to having a particular kind of life?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n bepaalde soort van die lewe?
a good/bad/hard life, a life of crime/poverty, a miserable/lonely existence, lead a good/bad/hard life, live well/happily,|&#39;n goeie / slegte / harde lewe, &#39;n lewe van misdaad / armoede, &#39;n miserabele / eensame bestaan, lei &#39;n goeie / slegte / harde lewe, leef goed / gelukkig,
(10) What words refer to the kind of life a person lives?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die aard van die lewe &#39;n persoon leef?
way of life, lifestyle,|manier van lewe, lewenstyl,
(11) What words indicate that something is true of your whole life?|(11) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets waar is jou hele lewe?
all your life, for life, lifelong,|al jou lewe, vir die lewe, lewenslange,
Marriage|Huwelik
Use this domain for words related to the state of being married.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die toestand van die wat getroud is.
(1) What words refer to marrying someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na trou iemand?
marry, marriage, get married, tie the knot, get hitched, join together, unite, wed, marry into,|trou, die huwelik, trou, bind die knoop, raak gehaak, kom saam, verenig, wed, trou in,
(2) What words refer to the state of being married?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van hulle getroud?
married, marriage, matrimony, wedlock, hitched, bonds of marriage, married life,|getroud, huwelik, die huwelik, huwelik, gehaak, bande van die huwelik, getroude lewe,
(3) What words refer to being married to someone?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat getroud is met iemand?
be married to,|vroue word,
(4) What words refer to people who are married?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na mense wat getroud is?
couple, husband, wife, spouse, partner, mate, matron, matronly, consort,|paartjie, man, vrou, eggenoot, vennoot, mate, matrone, moederlike, metgesel,
(5) What words are used of the relationship between a husband and wife?|(5) Watter woorde gebruik van die verhouding tussen &#39;n man en vrou?
wedded bliss, care for spouse, love, marriage relationship|onherroeplik bliss, sorg vir gade, liefde, huwelik
(6) What words refer to marrying again after being widowed or divorced?|(6) Watter woorde verwys weer trou nadat weduwee of geskeide?
remarry, remarriage,|hertrou, hertrou,
(7) What words refer to marrying more than one person?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na trou meer as een persoon?
bigamy, bigamist, bigamous, concubinage, concubine, harem, polygamist, polygamous, polygamy,|bigamie, bigamist, bigamiese, buite echtelijk samenwonen, byvrou harem, veelwywer, poligame, poligamie,
(8) What words refer to marrying only one person?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na trou net een persoon?
monogamous, monogamy,|vaste, monogamie,
(9) What words refer to marrying someone from another tribe or race?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na trou iemand uit &#39;n ander stam of ras?
inter-racial marriage, miscegenation,|inter-rassige huwelik, verbastering,
(10) What words refer to living with someone without being married?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na wat met iemand sonder om getroud?
live with, cohabit, cohabitation, common-law marriage,|leef met, saam te woon, kohabitasie, gemenereg huwelik,
(11) What words refer to marrying a close relative?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na trou met &#39;n naby familielid?
incest, intermarry,|bloedskande, ondertrou,
(12) What words refer to marrying your brother's widow?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na trou jou broer se weduwee?
levirate marriage|levirat huwelik
(13) What words describe something having to do with marriage?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat te doen het met die huwelik?
married, marital, matrimonial, conjugal, nuptial, connubial,|getroud, huweliksprobleme, huwelik, huwelik, huwelik, echtelijk,
Arrange a marriage|Reël &#39;n huwelik
Use this domain for all the words related to arranging a marriage. Cultures vary widely in their practices. In some cultures marriages are arranged by the parents. In other cultures a man must seek a wife for himself. Some cultures allow either practice or a combination of the two. So some of the questions below may be inappropriate to your culture.|Gebruik hierdie domein al die woorde in verband met die reël van &#39;n huwelik. Kulture wissel in hul praktyke. In sommige kulture huwelike gereël deur die ouers. In ander kulture moet &#39;n man &#39;n vrou vir homself soek. Sommige kulture toelaat óf praktyk of &#39;n kombinasie van die twee. So &#39;n paar van die vrae hieronder kan onvanpas om jou kultuur te wees.
(1) What words refer to the process of arranging a marriage?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van die reël van &#39;n huwelik?
arrange a marriage, arranged marriage, marriage negotiations, match, espousals, marry off,|reël vir &#39;n huwelik, huwelik, die huwelik onderhandelinge wedstryd troudag trou af,
(2) What words refer to asking someone to marry you?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na vra iemand om jou te trou?
ask someone to marry you, propose, pop the question, proposal,|vra iemand om jou te trou, voor te stel, pop die vraag voorstel,
(3) What words refer to formally agreeing to get married?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na formeel te stem om te trou?
get engaged, engagement, set a date,|kry besig, betrokkenheid, &#39;n datum,
(4) What words refer to an announcement of a proposed marriage?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n aankondiging van &#39;n voorgenome huwelik?
wedding announcement, announce your engagement, banns,|troue aankondiging, kondig jou betrokkenheid, gebooie,
(5) What words refer to the state of being engaged to be married?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van besig om te trou?
engaged, engagement, betrothed, betrothal, espoused, promised,|betrokke, betrokkenheid, verloof, verlowing, verloof, beloof,
(6) What words refer to the people who are engaged to be married?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die mense wat betrokke is om te trou?
fiancé, fiancée, engaged couple, bride-to-be, husband-to-be,|verloofde, verloofde, verloofde paartjie, bruid-te-wees, die man-te-wees,
(7) What words refer to a person who helps with the negotiations?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat help met die onderhandelinge?
matchmaker, go-between|Match, go-tussen
(8) What words refer to a gift or payment given to your future spouse or their family?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n geskenk of betaling aan jou toekomstige eggenoot of hul familie?
engagement ring, bride price, dowry|verloofring, bruid prys, bruidskat
(9) What words refer to a man trying to get a woman to marry him?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n man probeer om &#39;n vrou te kry om met hom te trou?
court, courtship, woo, suit, suitor, date, flirt,|hof, hofmakery, woo, pak, minnaar, datum, flirt,
(10) What words refer to the age at which a person can get married?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die ouderdom waarop &#39;n persoon kan trou?
marriageable age, coming out party, eligible, nubile,|hubare ouderdom, uit te kom party, in aanmerking kom, hubare,
(11) What words refer to marrying secretly?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na trou geheim?
elope,|wegloop,
Wedding|Wedding
Use this domain for words related to the wedding ceremony.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die seremonie.
(1) What words refer to a wedding ceremony?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n troue?
wedding, ceremony, service, nuptials, church wedding, civil service,|troue, seremonie, diens, huwelik, kerk troue, staatsdiens,
(2) What words refer to getting married secretly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die geheim om getroud?
elope, elopement,|wegloop, ontvoering,
(3) What are the parts of a wedding ceremony?|(3) Wat is die dele van &#39;n troue?
procession, give (the bride) away, speech, wedding vows, pronouncement, reception, toast,|optog, gee (die bruid) weg, spraak, huweliksbeloftes, uitspraak, ontvangs, roosterbrood,
(4) What words refer to the people who are getting married?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die mense wat trou is?
bride, bridal, groom, bridegroom, couple, bride and groom,|bruid, bruid, bruidegom, bruidegom, paartjie, bruid en bruidegom,
(5) What other people are involved in a wedding?|(5) Wat ander mense betrokke is in &#39;n huwelik?
best man, maid of honor, groomsman, bridesmaid, wedding party, guest|beste man, meisie van eer, stal kneg, bridesmaid, troue party, gas
(6) What words refer to performing a wedding ceremony?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die uitvoering van &#39;n troue?
marry (the couple), perform the wedding,|trou (die egpaar), voer die troue,
(7) What words refer to the person who performs a wedding ceremony?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die persoon wat &#39;n troue voer?
minister, justice of the peace,|minister, vrederegter,
(8) What special clothes are worn at a wedding?|(8) Wat spesiale klere gedra word by &#39;n troue?
wedding gown, veil|trourok, sluier
(9) What things are used in a wedding?|(9) Watter dinge word gebruik in &#39;n huwelik?
wedding ring, wedding cake, bride's bouquet,|trouring, troukoek, bruid se ruiker,
(10) What words refer to the time immediately after the wedding?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd onmiddellik na die troue?
honeymoon, wedding night, consummation (of the marriage),|honeymoon, troue nag voleinding (van die huwelik),
(11) What words refer to the husband and wife after the wedding?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die man en vrou na die troue?
newlyweds, honeymooner, man and wife,|pasgetroudes, honeymooner, man en vrou,
(12) What words refer to the day of a wedding which is celebrated every year?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die dag van &#39;n troue wat elke jaar gevier?
wedding anniversary,|huweliksherdenking,

maid, maiden, maidenhood, maidenly, old maid, spinster, spinsterhood, virgin,|slavin meisie, meisie jaar, maagdelike, oujongnooi, oujongnooi, spinsterhood, maagd,
