Divorce|Egskeiding
Use this domain for words related to divorce--to legally end your marriage.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met egskeiding - wettig die einde van jou huwelik.
(1) What words refer to divorcing your wife or husband?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na skei jou vrou of man?
get divorced, divorce (v), get a divorce, end in divorce, dissolution, dissolve,|skei, skei (v), kry &#39;n egskeiding, eindig in egskeiding, ontbinding, ontbind,
(2) What words refer to a divorce?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n egskeiding?
divorce (n), divorcement,|egskeiding (n), divorcement,
(3) What words refer to a person who has been divorced?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat geskei?
divorcee, ex-husband, ex-wife, my ex,|geskeide, eks-man, eks-vrou, my ex,
(4) What words describe someone who has been divorced?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat skei?
divorced, estranged,|geskei, vervreem,
(5) What words refer to a judge ending a marriage?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n regter beëindiging van &#39;n huwelik?
grant a divorce, annul, annulment,|gee &#39;n egskeiding, nietig te verklaar, nietigverklaring,
(6) What words refer to the legal process of divorcing your wife or husband?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die wetlike proses van skei jou vrou of man?
certificate of divorce, writ of divorce, divorce papers, divorce court|sertifikaat van egskeiding, lasbrief van egskeiding, egskeiding vraestelle, egskeidingshof
(7) What words refer to leaving your husband or wife?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die verlaat jou man of vrou?
leave (your spouse), walk out on, leave (your spouse) for another man/woman,|verlaat (jou gade), loop uit op, laat (jou gade) vir &#39;n ander man / vrou,
(8) What words refer to when a husband and wife no longer live together?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer &#39;n man en vrou nie meer saam te leef?
separate, separation, estrange, split up, break up (a marriage), live apart,|aparte, skeiding, Estrange, verdeel, breek (&#39;n huwelik), afgesien lewe,
(9) What words indicate who keeps the children?|(9) Watter woorde dui aan wie die kinders hou?
get custody, alimony,|kry bewaring, onderhoud,
Romantic love|Romantiese liefde
Use this domain for words related to romantic love.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met romantiese liefde.
(1) What words refer to loving someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand lief?
love, be in love,|lief te hê, in liefde te wees,
(2) What words refer to starting to love someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na begin om iemand lief te hê?
fall in love, love at first sight, be swept off your feet, be interested in, fancy,|val in die liefde, die liefde met die eerste oogopslag, gevee jou voete af, belangstel in, fancy,
(3) What words refer loving someone very much?|(3) Wat woorde verwys liefdevolle iemand baie?
be madly in love, be head over heels in love, infatuated, have a crush on, be mad about, be crazy about, be besotted,|wees soos &#39;n besetene in liefde, wees halsoorkop verlief, verlief, het &#39;n crush op, wees mal oor wees mal oor, word bedwelmend,
(4) What words refer to the feeling of love?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van liefde?
love, passion, romance,|liefde, passie, romanse,
(5) What words describe something someone says or does when they love someone?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat iemand sê of doen wanneer hulle lief is vir iemand?
passionate, romantic,|passievol, romanties,
(6) What words refer to someone you love?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat jy lief te hê?
lovers, the one you love, the love of your life,|minnaars, die een wat jy lief is, die liefde van jou lewe,
(7) What words refer to doing something with someone you love?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets met iemand wat jy liefhet doen?
date, go out with, see someone, ask out, ask someone for a date,|datum, gaan uit met, sien iemand, vra uit, vra iemand vir &#39;n datum,
(8) What do people call someone that they love?|(8) Wat doen die mense bel iemand wat hulle lief te hê?
love, dear, honey, darling, dearest, sweetheart,|liefde, liewe, heuning, liefling, liefste, liefling,
(9) What words refer to problems between people who love each other?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na probleme tussen mense wat mekaar liefhet?
hurt someone, break someone's heart, grow apart, break up,|seer iemand breek iemand se hart, groei uitmekaar, breek,
(10) What words refer to loving each other again after having problems?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na liefdevolle mekaar weer na probleme?
make up, get back together,|maak, bymekaar te kry terug
Sexual relations|Seksuele verhoudings
Use this domain for words related to sexual relations and having sex. Be careful that your domain label does not use a taboo word.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met seksuele verhoudings en seks. Wees versigtig dat jou domein etiket nie &#39;n taboe woord gebruik nie.
(1) What general words refer to sexual relations?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na seksuele verhoudings?
sex, intercourse, sexual relations, conjugal rights, marital rights, union,|seks, seks, seksuele verhoudings, huweliksregte, huweliksprobleme regte, unie,
(2) What words refer to having sex with someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na seks met iemand?
have sex with, have intercourse, make love, sleep with, go to bed with, lovemaking, coition, coitus, copulation, coupling, impregnate, mate, unite,|het seks met, omgang, liefde maak, slaap met, gaan slaap met, liefdespel, coition, coitus, kopulasie, skakel, bevrug, mate, verenig,
(3) What words refer to affection and sexual stimulation?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na liefde en seksuele stimulasie?
stimulate, kiss, fondle, arousal, caress, climax, erection, eroticism, libido, mount, snog, pet, hug, embrace, cuddle, hold hands,|stimuleer, soen, aaien, opwekking, vertroetel, klimaks, oprigting, erotiek, libido, die berg, snog, troeteldier, drukkie, omhels, cuddle, hou hande,
(4) What words refer to orgasm?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na orgasme?
orgasm, climax, ejaculate, ejaculation, come, semen, sperm,|orgasme, klimaks, ejakuleer, ejakulasie, kom, semen, sperm,
(5) What words describe something having to do with sex?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met seks te beskryf?
carnal, erotic, genital, heterosexual, phallic, sexual, sexuality, sexually, venereal,|vleeslike, erotiese, genitale, heteroseksuele, falliese, seksuele, seksualiteit, seksueel, geslagsiektes,
(6) What words describe someone who wants to have sex?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat wil om seks te hê?
amorous, aroused, in the mood, turned on,|verliefde, geprikkel, in die bui, aangeskakel,
(7) What words refer to something used to increase sexual pleasure?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word om seksuele plesier te verhoog?
aphrodisiac,|aphrodisiac,
(8) What words refer to two people who are having sex?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na twee mense wat seks het?
lovers,|minnaars,
(9) What words describe a person who has difficulty having sex?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat sukkel om seks het?
impotence, impotent, frigid, frigidity,|impotensie, impotent, ysige, kilheid,
(10) What words refer to being friends, but not having sex?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na synde vriende, maar nie seks?
platonic, be just good friends,|platoniese, net goeie vriende,
Virginity|Maagdelikheid
Use this domain for words related to being a virgin--a person who has never had sex.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n maagd - &#39;n persoon wat nog nooit seks gehad het.
(1) What words refer to a person who has never had sex?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat nog nooit seks gehad het?
virgin, virginity, celibate,|maagd, maagdelikheid, selibaat,
(2) What words refer to maintaining your virginity?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die handhawing van jou maagdelikheid?
abstain (from sex), abstinence, restraint, celibacy, chastity, continence, honor, purity, virtue,|onthou (van seks), onthouding, selfbeheersing, selibaatheid, kuisheid, kontinensie, eer, reinheid, deugsaamheid,
(3) What words refer to no longer being a virgin?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na nie meer as &#39;n maagd?
lose your virginity, become sexually active, have sex for the first time|jou maagdelikheid verloor, seksueel aktief raak, seks het vir die eerste keer
Attract sexually|Trek seksueel
Use this domain for words related to attracting someone sexually--to cause someone to want to have sex with you, and for words related to being sexually attracted to someone--to want to have sex with someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iemand te lok seksueel - veroorsaak iemand wil om seks te hê met jou, en vir woorde in verband met seksueel aangetrokke tot iemand - te wil om seks te hê met iemand.
(1) What words refer to attracting someone sexually?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand lok seksueel?
attract, be attractive to, appeal to, tempt, seduce, draw, lure, act sexy, excite, turn someone on, titillate, flirt, flirtatious,|lok, aanloklik wees vir, &#39;n beroep op, versoek, verlei, te teken, lok, tree sexy, opgewonde, draai iemand, prikkel, flirt, flirterend,
(2) What words refer to being sexually attracted to someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na seksueel aangetrokke tot iemand?
be attracted to, fancy, be interested in, want, lust after, take a fancy to,|aangetrokke tot, fancy, belangstel in, wil, begeerte na, neem &#39;n fancy,
(3) What words refer to wanting to have sex?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wil om seks te hê?
sex drive, desire, lust (v), want someone, lustful, libido, horny, randy,|seksdrang, begeerte, wellus (v), wil iemand, wellustige, libido, horny, Randy,
(4) What words refer to the feeling of being sexually attracted?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel van seksueel aangetrokke?
attraction, lust (n), passion,|aantrekkingskrag, wellus (n), passie,
(5) What words describe someone who is sexually attractive?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat seksueel aantreklik te beskryf?
sexy, attractive, desirable, voluptuous, sultry, alluring, luscious, appealing, beautiful, allure, sensual, sensuous, good-looking, glamorous, seductive, handsome, tempting, irresistible, enticing,|sexy, aantreklik, wenslik, wulpse, soel, aanloklike, sappige, aantreklik, mooi, skoonheid, sensuele, sensuele, mooi, glansryke, verleidelike, mooi, aanloklik, onweerstaanbaar, aanloklike,
(6) What words describe something someone does to attract someone?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat iemand doen om iemand te lok?
sexy, provocative, seductive, suggestive, sensual, be a turn-on, erotic,|sexy, uitdagend, verleidelike, suggestief, sensuele, &#39;n beurt-on, erotiese,
(7) What words refer to a quality a person has that makes them attractive?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n kwaliteit &#39;n persoon het wat maak hulle aantreklik?
looks, sex appeal, beauty, attraction, appeal, the lure of, charm, attractiveness, prettiness, sensuality,|lyk, seks appèl, skoonheid, aantreklikheid, aantrekkingskrag, die lok van, sjarme, aantreklikheid, mooiheid sensualiteit,
(8) What words describe someone who is not attractive?|(8) Watter woorde iemand wat nie aantreklik beskryf?
unattractive, be a turn-off, sexless,|onaantreklike, word &#39;n afdraai, sekslose,
Sexual immorality|Onsedelikheid
Use this domain for words referring to illicit sexual relations.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na onwettige seksuele verhoudings.
(1) What general words refer to sexual immorality?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na seksuele immoraliteit?
immorality, illicit relations, sexual sin, lasciviousness, licentiousness, obscenity,|onsedelikheid, onwettige verhoudings, seksuele sonde, losbandigheid, losbandigheid, obsceniteiten,
(2) What words refer to someone who is sexually immoral?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat seksueel immoreel?
sex maniac, dirty old man, lecherous, nymphomaniac, sex fiend, libertine,|seksmaniak, vuil ou man, geil, nimfomaan, seks monster, losbandige,
(3) What words describe someone who is sexual immoral?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat seksuele immoreel beskryf?
bawdry, erotic, immoral, kinky, licentious, lustful, sensuous, voluptuous, indecent, obscene,|uitslaan, erotiese, immoreel, kinky, losbandige, wellustige, sensuele, wulpse, onsedelike, onwelvoeglike,
(4) What words refer to sex before marriage?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na seks voor die huwelik?
fornicate, fornication, deflower (a virgin),|egbreek, hoerery, onteren (&#39;n maagd),
(5) What words refer to sexual offenses within a marriage?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na seksuele misdrywe binne &#39;n huwelik?
abuse,|misbruik,
(6) What words refer to sex with a person you are not married to?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na seks met &#39;n persoon wat jy is nie getroud met?
commit adultery, adultery, be unfaithful, cheat on, two-time, sow wild oats, infidelity,|egbreek pleeg, ontrou, oneerlik, twee keer, saai wilde hawer, ongeloof,
(7) What words refer to a person who commits adultery?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat egbreuk pleeg?
adulterer, adulteress, sexual partner, lover, mistress,|egbreker, egbreekster, seksuele vennoot, minnaar, minnares,
(8) What words refer to tempting someone to have sex outside of marriage?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na aanloklik iemand om seks te hê buite die huwelik?
seduce, get someone into bed, seductive, seduction, make advances, make a pass at, sexual harassment,|verlei, iemand kry in die bed, verleidelike, verleiding, maak vooruitgang, maak &#39;n slaag op, seksuele teistering,
(9) What words refer to an ongoing relationship outside of marriage?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n voortgesette verhouding buite die huwelik?
affair, relationship, be together, romance,|saak, verhouding, wees saam, romanse,
(10) What words refer to a single time of adultery?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n enkele tyd van owerspel?
one night stand|een nag staan
(11) What words refer to having sex with many people?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na seks met baie mense?
sleep around, promiscuous, promiscuity,|slaap rond, promisku, losbandigheid,
(12) What words refer to a prostitute?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n prostituut?
prostitute, hooker, call-girl, harlot, whore, rent boy,|prostituut, haker, bel-girl, hoer, hoer, huur seuntjie,
(13) What words refer to what prostitutes do?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na wat prostitute te doen?
prostitute (oneself), prostitution, solicit sex, sell (oneself)|prostituut (jouself), prostitusie, werf seks, verkoop (jouself)
(14) What words refer to having sex by yourself?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na seks deur jouself?
masturbate, masturbation,|masturbeer, masturbasie,
(15) What words describe books and movies that are about sex?|(15) Watter woorde beskryf boeke en flieks wat oor seks?
erotic, pornographic, pornography, porn, adult, blue, dirty, steamy, raunchy, X-rated,|erotiese, pornografiese, pornografie, porno, volwasse, blou, vuil, stomende, slonsig, X-gegradeerde,
(16) What words refer to sex between close relatives?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na seks tussen naasbestaandes?
have an incestuous relationship, incest|het &#39;n bloedskendige verhouding, bloedskande
(17) What words refer to forcing a woman to have sex?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vrou dwing om seks te hê?
rape, rapist, force, sexually assault,|verkragting, verkragter, krag, seksueel aanranding,
(18) What words refer to sex between two people of the same sex?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na seks tussen twee mense van dieselfde geslag?
homosexual, gay, lesbian, homo, homosexuality, lesbianism, pervert, perverted, bisexual, sodomy, sexual orientation,|homoseksuele, gay, lesbiese, homo, homoseksualiteit, lesbianisme, verdraai, verdraai, biseksueel, sodomie, seksuele oriëntasie,
(19) What words refer to having sex with a child?|(19) Watter woorde verwys na seks met &#39;n kind?
abuse, sexual abuse, molest, molestation, pedophile, pederast, pederasty,|mishandeling, seksuele misbruik, molesteer, molestering, pedofiel, pederast, pederastie,
(20) What words refer to sex with an animal?|(20) Watter woorde verwys na seks met &#39;n dier?
bestial, bestiality|onbeskofte, bestialiteit
Birth|Geboorte
Use this domain for words related to giving birth and being born.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die bevalling en gebore.
(1) What words refer to a mother giving birth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n moeder wat geboorte skenk?
have a baby, give birth, become a mother, bear a child, deliver, hatch,|&#39;n baba, gee geboorte, &#39;n ma, &#39;n kind in te lewer, broei,
(2) What words refer to a baby being born?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n baba gebore word?
be born, birth, arrive, arrival, come along, come into the world,|gebore, geboorte, daar aankom, aankoms, kom saam, in die wêreld gekom,
(3) What words refer to the event of giving birth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die geval van die bevalling?
birth, childbirth, birthing, childbed, parturition, nativity,|geboorte, geboorte, geboorte, kraam, geboorte, nativity,
(4) What are the steps or stages in giving birth?|(4) Wat is die stappe of stadiums in die bevalling?
labor, birth, first breath, tie the umbilical cord, cut the umbilical cord,|arbeid, geboorte, eerste asem, bind die naelstring, sny die naelstring,
(5) What words refer to what is done for the baby?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wat gedoen word vir die baba?
wash (the baby), anoint, swaddle (wrap in cloth),|wash (die baba), salf, omzwachtelen (wrap in lap),
(6) What words describe something to do with birth?|(6) Watter woorde iets te doen met die geboorte beskryf?
maternity, postnatal,|swangerskap, nageboortelike,
(7) What words refer to the entire process of producing a baby?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die hele proses van die vervaardiging van &#39;n baba?
reproduce, breed, reproduction,|reproduseer, ras, voortplanting,
(8) What words refer to having your first baby?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na wat jou eerste baba?
start a family,|begin &#39;n familie,
Pregnancy|Swangerskap
Use this domain for words related to being pregnant.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met swangerskap.
(1) What words refer to a man causing a woman to become pregnant?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n man wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n vrou swanger word?
beget, begetting, begotten, impregnate, get (her) pregnant, father (v) a child, procreate, procreation, reproduce, sire, engender, generate,|verwek, verwek, gebore, bevrug, kry (haar) swanger is, die vader (v) &#39;n kind, voortplant, voortplanting, reproduseer, vaar, kweek, genereer,
(2) What words refer to a woman becoming pregnant?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vrou swanger raak?
conceive, conception, become pregnant|swanger, bevrugting, swanger raak
(3) What words refer to a woman being pregnant?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vrou swanger?
be pregnant, be going to have a baby, be having a baby, be expecting, bear, carry, carry to term,|swanger, gaan na &#39;n baba te hê, word &#39;n baba, word verwag, beer, voer, voer aan term,
(4) What words describe a woman who is pregnant?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vrou wat swanger is?
pregnant, big as a house, expectant, expecting,|swanger is, groot soos &#39;n huis, verwagtende, verwag,
(5) What words refer to the time period when a woman is pregnant?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die tydperk wanneer &#39;n vrou swanger is?
pregnancy, gestation period, term, full term, trimester, antenatal, prenatal,|swangerskap, draagtyd, termyn, volle termyn, trimester, voorgeboorte, prenatale,
(6) What words refer to what a baby does?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na wat &#39;n baba doen?
kick, turn, drop,|skop, draai, drop,
(7) What words refer to the part from the father and the part from the mother that make a baby?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die deel van die vader en die deel van die moeder wat &#39;n baba te maak?
egg, sperm, gamete, ovum, gene,|eier, sperm, gameet, ovum, gene,
Fetus|Fetus
Use this domain for words related to a fetus--a baby that has not been born yet.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n fetus - &#39;n baba wat nie nog gebore.
(1) What words refer to an unborn baby?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ongebore baba?
unborn child, unborn baby, fetus, embryo,|ongebore kind, ongebore baba, fetus, embrio,
(2) What words refer to the parts that surround a baby and connect it to its mother's womb?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die dele wat &#39;n baba omring en verbind dit aan sy moeder se skoot?
umbilical cord, placenta, placental, sack, fluid, afterbirth,|naelstring, plasenta, plasentale, sak, vloeistof, nageboorte,
Miscarriage|Miskraam
Use this domain for words related to the prevention or termination of a pregnancy, and for words related to killing babies.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die voorkoming of beëindiging van &#39;n swangerskap, en vir woorde in verband met die moord op babas.
(1) What words refer to preventing pregnancy?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die voorkoming van swangerskap?
birth control, family planning, contraception, sterilize, sterilization, vasectomy,|geboorte beheer, gesinsbeplanning, voorbehoeding, steriliseer, sterilisasie, vasektomie,
(2) What things are used to prevent pregnancy?|(2) Watter dinge word gebruik om swangerskap te voorkom?
contraceptive, condom, the pill,|kontraseptiewe, kondoom, die pil,
(3) What words refer to a baby dying before birth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n baba sterf voor geboorte?
lose the baby, miscarry, have a miscarriage, stillborn, stillbirth|verloor die baba, miskraam, het &#39;n miskraam, doodgebore, stilgeboorte
(4) What words refer to killing a baby before birth?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die moord op &#39;n baba voor geboorte?
abortion, abort, have an abortion, terminate a pregnancy,|aborsie, aborteer, &#39;n aborsie, &#39;n swangerskap te beëindig,
(5) What words refer to killing a baby after birth?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die moord op &#39;n baba na geboorte?
infanticide|kindermoord
Labor and birth pains|Arbeid en geboorte pyne
Use this domain for words related to labor and birth pains.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met arbeid en geboorte pyne.
(1) What general words refer to the process leading up to birth?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die proses wat gelei het tot geboorte?
labor|arbeid
(2) What words refer to the feelings a woman has when she thinks she is beginning to go into labor?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoelens &#39;n vrou het toe sy dink sy is besig in kraam te gaan?
false labor, early labor|valse arbeid, vroeë kraam
(3) What are the signs that a woman is going into labor?|(3) Wat is die tekens dat &#39;n vrou gaan in kraam?
break the waters|breek die waters
(4) What words refer to the contractions of the muscles of the uterus?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die sametrekkings van die spiere van die baarmoeder?
contraction, push, bear down|inkrimping, stoot, dra af
(5) What words refer to labor pains?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na kraampyne?
labor pains, birth pain, birth pangs, throe,|kraampyne, geboorte pyn, geboortepyne, dood geveg,
(6) What do women do while suffering birth pains?|(6) Wat doen vroue doen terwyl ly smarte?
groan, cry out|sug, skreeu
Help to give birth|Help om geboorte te gee
Use this domain for words related to helping a woman to give birth.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n vrou te help om geboorte te gee.

(2) What words refer to a doctor operating on a woman to deliver a baby?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dokter wat op &#39;n vrou met &#39;n baba te red nie?
Caesarean,|Keisersnee,
(3) What words refer to a person who helps to give birth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat help om geboorte te gee?

(4) What materials and instruments are used by obstetricians and midwives?|(4) Wat materiaal en instrumente word gebruik deur verloskundiges en vroedvroue?
knife, clamp, forceps, incubator,|mes, klem, tang, broeikas,

Baby|Baby
Use this domain for words related to a baby.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n baba.

(5) What sounds do babies make?|(5) Wat klanke nie babas te maak?

Care for a baby|Sorg vir &#39;n baba
Use this domain for words related to caring for a baby.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die versorging van &#39;n baba.
(1) What words refer to caring for a baby?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die versorging van &#39;n baba?

(2) What words refer to feeding a baby?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die voeding van &#39;n baba?

(3) What things are used to feed a baby?|(3) Watter dinge word gebruik om &#39;n baba te voed?

(4) What words refer to holding a baby?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die hou van &#39;n baba?

(5) What words refer to comforting a baby when it is crying?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n baba te troos wanneer dit roep?

(6) What words refer to carrying a baby?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die uitvoering van &#39;n baba?
carry in arms, carry on back|dra in die arms, voer op die rug
(7) What things are used to carry a baby?|(7) Watter dinge word gebruik om &#39;n baba te dra?
baby carriage, pram, stroller, backpack, car seat, carrycot,|baba vervoer, stootwaentjie, buggy, rugsak, motor sitplek, drabed,
(8) Where are babies put?|(8) Waar babas sit?
crib, cradle, playpen,|krip, wieg, speelplek,
(9) What words refer to a baby urinating or defecating?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n baba urineer of ontlas?
wet, urinate, defecate, potty,|nat, urineer, ontlas, potjie,
(10) What words refer to cleaning a baby?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die skoonmaak van &#39;n baba?
change someone's diaper, diaper, nappy, bathe, baby powder, baby lotion,|verander iemand se luier, luier, luier, bad, baba poeier, baba lotion,
(11) What toys are given to a baby?|(11) Wat speelgoed gegee om &#39;n baba?
rattle, pacifier, dummy,|ratel, fopspeen, domkop,
(12) What words refer to protecting a baby?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die beskerming van &#39;n baba?
amulet, evil eye,|amulet, afguns,
Child|Kind
Use this domain for words related to a child.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n kind.
(1) What words refer to a child (from birth to puberty)?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kind (van geboorte tot puberteit)?
child, children, kid, youngster, boy, girl, brat, small fry, imp, infant, juvenile, minor, offspring, progeny, schoolchild, squirt, tad, urchin, weanling,|kind, kinders, kind, jongeling, seun, meisie, brat, klein braai, imp, kind, jong, klein nakomeling, skoolkind, spuit, bietjie, urchin, Zuigelingen,
(2) What words refer to the time period when a person is a child?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die tydperk wanneer &#39;n persoon &#39;n kind?
childhood|kinderjare
(3) What words describe a child?|(3) Watter woorde &#39;n kind te beskryf?
young, little, small, underage,|jong, klein, klein, minderjarige,
(4) What words describe something to do with children?|(4) Watter woorde iets te doen met kinders te beskryf?
child (adj), childish, juvenile,|kind (adj), kinderagtige, onvolwasse,
Rear a child|Agter &#39;n kind
Use this domain for words related to rearing a child--to take care of someone while they are a child so that their needs are met and they become a good person.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n kind grootmaak - om te sorg van iemand te neem terwyl hulle &#39;n kind sodat hul behoeftes voldoen word en hulle &#39;n goeie mens.
(1) What general words refer to rearing a child?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n kind grootmaak?
bring up, raise, rear, have custody, parent (v) a child, mother (v) a child, child-rearing,|bring, in te samel, agter, het bewaring, ouer (v) &#39;n kind, ma (v) &#39;n kind, kind-grootmaak,
(2) What words refer to caring for a child's needs?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die versorging van &#39;n kind se behoeftes?
care for, take care of,|sorg vir, sorg,
(3) What words refer to teaching and training a child?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na onderrig en opleiding van &#39;n kind?
teach, train, upbringing,|leer, trein, opvoeding,
(4) What words refer to disciplining a child?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n kind te dissiplineer?
discipline, correct|dissipline, korrekte
(5) What words refer to rearing a child well?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n kind grootmaak ook?
well brought up,|goed opgevoed,
(6) What words refer to not rearing a child well?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kind goed nie grootmaak?
neglect, abuse, spoil, deprive,|verwaarlosing, misbruik, te bederf, te ontneem,
(7) What words refer to rearing a child who is not your own?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n kind wat nie jou eie is grootmaak?
adopt, foster, guardian,|neem, Foster, voog,
(8) What words refer to taking care of a child while their parents are doing something else?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die versorging van &#39;n kind, terwyl hul ouers iets anders doen?
look after, mind (a child), keep an eye on, baby-sit, sit, take care of, childcare,|kyk na, verstand (&#39;n kind), hou &#39;n oog op, baby-sit, sit, sorg, kindersorg,
(9) What words refer to someone who cares for a child?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat omgee vir &#39;n kind?
nurse, nursemaid, guardian, nanny, babysitter, sitter, child minder,|verpleegster, kinderoppasser, voog, nanny, oppas, sitter, kinderoppasser,
(10) What words refer to a place where children are cared for?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar kinders versorg?
nursery, crèche, childcare facility,|kwekery, crèche, kindersorg fasiliteit,

childbearing years,|swangerskap jaar,

full-grown, fully grown, grown, grown-up (adj), mature,|volgroeide, volgroeide, gegroei, gegroei-up (adj), volwasse,
(7) What words describe something that has to do with adults rather than children?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat te doen het met volwassenes eerder as kinders te beskryf?
adult (adj), grown-up (adj), mature (adj),|volwasse (adj), gegroei-up (adj), volwasse (adj),

age (v), get old, grow old, mature, be getting on, aging, not be as young as you were,|ouderdom (v) kry oud, oud, volwasse, kry op, veroudering, nie so jonk as jy wees,

(8) What words refer to being old but still able to do things?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na oud, maar nog steeds in staat wees om dinge te doen?

(9) What problems do the elderly have?|(9) Watter probleme nie die bejaardes het?
senile, senility, declining health, aging process,|seniele, seniliteit, dalende gesondheid, veroudering proses,
(10) What words refer to caring for an old person?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die versorging van &#39;n ou persoon?
elder care, retirement center, old folks home, nursing home,|ouderling sorg, aftree sentrum, ou mense huis, ouetehuis,
(11) What words describe something to do with old people?|(11) Watter woorde iets te doen met ou mense beskryf?

Die|Sterf
Use this domain for words related to dying.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dood.
(1) What general words refer to dying?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na sterf?
die, expire,|sterf, verval,
(2) What words refer to dying as a result of illness or old age?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na sterf as gevolg van siekte of ouderdom?
pass away, pass on, go, kick the bucket, snuff it,|verbygaan, slaag op, gaan skop die emmer, snuif dit,
(3) What words refer to dying as a result of an accident or violence?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na sterf as gevolg van &#39;n ongeluk of geweld?
be killed, accidental death, death by misadventure, violent death, lose your life, perish, suffer heavy losses,|doodgemaak word, toevallige dood, dood deur ramp, gewelddadige dood, verloor jou lewe, vergaan, ly swaar verliese,
(4) What euphemisms and idioms are used to refer to death?|(4) Wat eufemismes en idiome gebruik word om te verwys na die dood?
go to your reward, be wasted, fall asleep, croak, depart, breathe your last, defunct, grim reaper|gaan na jou beloning, vermors word, aan die slaap raak, gekwaak, vertrek, asem jou laaste, ontbinde, grimmige maaier
(5) What words are used to describe the manner in which someone dies?|(5) Watter woorde word gebruik om die wyse waarop iemand sterf beskryf?
drop dead, keel over, slow death, sudden death, painful death, excruciating death, gruesome death, horrible death, die quietly, die peacefully, die with boots on, die fighting, fade away, succumb (to illness), drown, drowning, asphyxiate, suffocate, choke to death, sacrifice, succumb (to a disease), suffocate, suffocation, starvation, starve, starve to death, burn to death, freeze to death,|dood neerslaan, omkap, stadige dood, skielike dood, pynlike dood, pynlike dood, grusame dood, aaklige dood sterf rustig, vreedsaam sterf, sterf met stewels op, sterf veg, verdwyn, swig (siekte), verdrink, verdrink , versmoor, versmoor, verstik dood, opoffering, swig (&#39;n siekte), versmoor, versmoring, hongersnood, honger, honger dood, brand tot die dood, vries tot die dood,
(6) What words refer to dying when you are still young?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na sterf wanneer jy nog jonk?
die young, be cut off in your prime, untimely death,|jonk sterf, uitgeroei word in jou eerste, ontydige dood,
(7) What words refer to dying to save someone?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na sterf aan iemand te red?
die for, give your life, lay down your life, martyr,|sterf vir, gee jou lewe, lê jou lewe, martelaar,
(8) What words describe someone who is almost dead?|(8) Watter woorde iemand wat byna dood beskryf?
dying, be close to death, about to die, on death's doorstep, be at death's door, have one foot in the grave,|sterf, naby aan die dood, om te sterf, op voorstoep se dood, by dood se deur, een voet in die graf,
(9) What words refer to the event of dying?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die geval van die dood?
death, demise, mortality,|dood ondergang, sterftes,
(10) What words refer to someone who has died?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat gesterf het?
deceased, dead person, goner, dearly departed, casualty, fatality, the dead,|oorlede is, dooie persoon, verwoestend man, duur vertrek, ongevalle, sterfte, die dood,
(11) What words describe someone who is dead?|(11) Watter woorde iemand wat dood is, beskryf?
dead, deceased, stone-dead, dead as a doornail, late, lifeless,|dood, gestorwe, klip-dood morsdood, laat, lewelose,
(12) What words refer to the number of people who die from the same cause?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die aantal mense wat sterf as gevolg van dieselfde rede?
death toll, fatalities, loss of life,|dodetal, sterftes, verlies van die lewe,
(13) What words refer to losing someone in death?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iemand in die dood verloor?
lose (someone), loss, bereaved, be widowed, be orphaned,|verloor (iemand), verlies, beroof, word weduwee, wees gelaat,
(14) What words describe an illness or wound that will cause the person to die?|(14) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n siekte of wond wat sal veroorsaak dat die persoon om te sterf?
fatal, terminal,|dodelike, terminale,
Kill|Doodmaak
Use this domain for words related to killing someone--to cause someone to die.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die moord op iemand - te veroorsaak iemand om te sterf.
(1) What general words refer to killing someone?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die moord op iemand?
kill, murder, assassinate, bump off, do away with, finish someone off, take someone's life, dispatch, dispose, finish, eliminate, liquidate, commit murder, waste, zap, slay, snuff, send to Davy Jones locker, lynch, silence, terminate,|doodmaak, moord, vermoor, stamp af, weg te doen met, klaar iemand af, neem iemand se lewe, gestuur, vervreem, afwerking, uit te skakel, te likwideer, moord pleeg, afval, zap, slag, snuif, stuur Davy Jones locker, Lynch, stilte, beëindig,
(2) What words describe the manner of killing someone?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die wyse van die moord op iemand?
shoot, gun down, blow someone away, stab, stab someone to death, butcher, behead, decapitate, beat someone to death, asphyxiate, choke, garrote, strangle, suffocate, throttle, smother, stifle, crucify, drown, electrocute, hang, hanging, poison, stone, starve,|skiet, geweer af, blaas iemand weg, steek, steek iemand tot die dood, slagter, onthoof, onthoof, klop iemand aan die dood, versmoor, verstik, GARROTE, verwurg, versmoor, smoor, versmoor, onderdruk, kruisig, verdrink, doodskok, hang , hang, gif, klip, honger,
(3) What words refer to the act of killing someone?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die daad van doodmaak iemand?
murder (n), homicide, killing, assassination, foul play, capital crime, beheading, bloodshed, butchery, crucifixion, decapitation, electrocution, fratricide, immolation, infanticide, liquidation, manslaughter, martyrdom, matricide, patricide, regicide, shooting, slaying, strangulation, smothering, suffocation, terrorism,|moord (n), moord, moord, moord, vuilspel, die hoofstad misdaad, onthoofding, bloedvergieting, slaghuis, kruisiging, onthoofding, elektriese skok, broedermoord, opoffering, kindermoord, likwidasie, strafbare manslag, marteling, moeder moord, verraaier, koning moord, skiet, doodmaak , verwurging, versmoor, versmoring, terrorisme,
(4) What words refer to the government killing someone because they committed a crime?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die regering doodmaak iemand omdat hulle &#39;n misdaad gepleeg het?
execute, put someone to death, sentence someone to death, capital punishment, the death penalty, capital offence, capital crime, punishable by death, execution, condemned, be on death row,|uit te voer, het iemand aan die dood, vonnis iemand tot die dood, die doodstraf, die doodstraf, halsmisdryf, kapitaal misdaad, strafbaar met die dood, uitvoering, veroordeel, op die dood ry,
(5) What words refer to killing many people?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die moord op baie mense?
massacre, slaughter, exterminate, annihilate, wipe out, bloody,|slagting, slag uit te wis, vernietig, uit te wis, bloedige,
(6) What words refer to the killing of many people?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die dood van baie mense?
massacre (n), slaughter, carnage, genocide, mass murder, ethnic cleansing, annihilation, blood-bath, extermination, holocaust, pogrom,|slagting (n), slagting, slagting, volksmoord, massa moord, etniese suiwering, uitwissing, bloedbad, vernietiging, holocaust, pogrom,
(7) What words refer to killing yourself?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die moord op jouself?
kill yourself, commit suicide, take your own life, end it all, suicide, suicidal, be a suicide, do away with yourself,|doodmaak jouself, selfmoord pleeg, neem jou eie lewe, eindig dit alles, selfmoord, selfmoord, &#39;n selfmoord, weg te doen met jouself,
(8) What words refer to trying to kill someone?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na probeer om iemand dood te maak?
attempted murder, attempt on someone's life,|poging tot moord, poging iemand se lewe,
(9) What words refer to someone who kills another person?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat &#39;n ander persoon dood?
murderer, killer, assassin, hitman, slayer, executioner, hangman, liquidator, murderess, slaughterer, slayer, terrorist, strangler,|moordenaar moordenaar, rower, Hitman, doodslag begaan het laksman, hangman, likwidateur, moordenares, slagter, doodslag begaan, terroriste, worger,
(10) What words describe someone who wants to kill someone?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat wil om iemand te dood?
homicidal, murderous,|moord, moorddadige,
(11) What words refer to the person who was killed?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die persoon wat vermoor is?
martyr, murdered man/woman, victim, fatality,|martelaar, vermoor man / vrou, die slagoffer, sterfte,
(12) What words refer to a person killed in war?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon dood in die oorlog?
killed in action, casualty, casualty of war, civilian casualty, collateral damage,|dood in aksie, ongevalle, slagoffer van die oorlog, burgerlike ongevalle, kollaterale skade,
(13) What words refer to something used to kill someone?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word om iemand dood te maak?
murder weapon,|moordwapen,
(14) What words describe something that can kill someone?|(14) Watter woorde iets wat iemand kan doodmaak beskryf?
fatal, killer, mortal, lethal, deadly, poisonous, toxic,|dodelike moordenaar, sterflike, dodelike, dodelike, giftige, giftige,
(15) What words refer to something such as an accident or disease killing someone?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na iets soos &#39;n ongeluk of siekte doodmaak iemand?
kill, kill off, cause death, be a killer, destroy, decimate, wipe out,|dood te maak, dood te maak, dood veroorsaak, &#39;n moordenaar, vernietig, decimeren, uit te wis,
(16) What words refer to doing something that might result in your death?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat kan lei tot die dood van jou doen?
risk your life,|waag jou lewe,
(17) What words refer to doing something that results in your death?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat lei tot jou dood te doen?
cost you your life,|jou jou lewe kos,
(18) What words refer to killing an animal?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na die moord op &#39;n dier?
slaughter, destroy, put down, put away, put something out of it misery,|slagting, vernietig, sit, sit weg, sit iets uit dit ellende,
Corpse|Corpse
Use this domain for words referring to a corpse--the body of a person who has died.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n lyk - die liggaam van &#39;n persoon wat gesterf het.
(1) What words refer to a dead body?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dooie liggaam?
body, dead body, corpse, cadaver, stiff, carcass, carrion, mummy,|liggaam, dooie lyk, kadawer, styf, karkas, aas, mamma,
(2) What words refer to a dead body decaying?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dooie liggaam vervalle?
decay, decompose, rot, return to dust, eaten by worms, corrupt, putrid, putrefy,|verval, ontbind, vrot, terug te keer na die stof, deur wurms, korrupte, voos, verrot,
(3) What words refer to a body after it has decayed?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n liggaam nadat dit verval het?
remains, bones, skeleton,|bly, bene, skelet,
Funeral|Begrafnis
Use this domain for words related to a funeral and other things that are done after a person dies.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n begrafnis en ander dinge wat gedoen word na &#39;n persoon sterf.
(1) What words refer to a funeral?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n begrafnis?
funeral, wake, graveside service, burial service, last rites|begrafnis, wakker, graf diens, begrafnis diens, laaste rites
(2) What words refer to holding a funeral?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die hou van &#39;n begrafnis?
perform a funeral, hold a memorial service,|voer &#39;n begrafnis, hou &#39;n gedenkdiens,
(3) What words refer to notifying people that someone has died?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na kennis te stel mense dat iemand gesterf het?
death notice, send death notice,|sterfkennis, stuur sterfkennis,
(4) What words refer to something someone says about a dead person?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat iemand sê oor &#39;n dooie persoon?
obituary, eulogy, epitaph,|rou, huldeblyk, grafskrif,
(5) What are the parts or stages of a funeral?|(5) Wat is die dele of fases van &#39;n begrafnis?
eulogy, dirge, fire a salute, lower the flag, half mast, play taps, toll the bell|huldeblyk, treurlied, brand &#39;n saluut, verlaag die vlag, die helfte van mas, speel krane, tol die klok
(6) What words refer to something that is made or done to remind people of the person who died?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gemaak of gedoen word om mense van die persoon wat gesterf het herinner?
memorial, monument, in memory of,|gedenkteken, monument, in die geheue van,
Mourn|Treur
Use this domain for words related to mourning a death--to feel bad because someone died and to show this feeling in various ways. Include whatever cultural practices are used.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met rou &#39;n dood - om te voel sleg, want iemand sterf en om hierdie gevoel op verskeie maniere te wys. Sluit alles kulturele praktyke gebruik word.
(1) What words refer to mourning a death?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dood rou?
grieve, be in mourning, mourn, lament, bemoan, mourning, lamentation, grief, sorrow,|treur, in rou, treur, klaag Beklaag, rou, geklaag, hartseer, hartseer,
(2) What noises do people make to show they are mourning?|(2) Wat geluide mense maak om te wys hulle is rou?
bewail, crying, groan, moan, sigh, wail, weep,|ween huil, sug, kreun, sug, huil, huil,
(3) What special music is played?|(3) Watter spesiale musiek gespeel?
death chant, dirge, funeral march,|dood chant, treurlied, dodemars,
(4) What words refer to someone who is mourning?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat rou?
mourner,|treur,
(5) What special clothes are worn?|(5) Wat spesiale klere gedra word?
dress in black, funeral clothes, black veil|rok in swart, begrafnis klere, swart sluier
(6) What do people do to show they are mourning?|(6) Wat doen mense om te wys hulle is rou?
beat their breast, tear their clothes, shave their head, put ashes on their head|klop hul bors, skeur hulle hul klere, skeer hul kop, sit as op hul hoof
Bury|Begrawe
Use this domain for words related to disposing of a dead body. Different cultures have practices other than burying a body in the ground. Include words for all practices used by the culture.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die afhandeling van &#39;n dooie liggaam. Verskillende kulture het buiten begrawe &#39;n liggaam in die grond praktyke. Sluit woorde vir al gebruik deur die kultuur praktyke.
(1) What words refer to burying a dead body?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dooie liggaam begrawe?
bury, burial, inter, interment, lay to rest, entomb|begrawe, begrafnis, inter, begrafnis, lê om te rus, aarde bestel
(2) What steps are involved in preparing a body for burial?|(2) watter stappe betrokke in die voorbereiding van &#39;n liggaam vir die begrafnis?
burial arrangements, wash (the body), wrap, anoint|begrafnis reëlings, was (die liggaam), wrap, salf
(3) What words refer to a person who prepares a body for burial?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n liggaam berei vir die begrafnis?
embalmer, undertaker, mortician, gravedigger, funeral director,|balsem, begrafnisondernemer, begrafnisondernemer, grafgrawer, begrafnis direkteur,
(4) Where are bodies prepared for burial?|(4) Waar liggame voorberei vir die begrafnis?
morgue, mortuary, crematorium,|lykshuis, lykshuis, krematorium,
(5) What is used to protect a body?|(5) Wat word gebruik om &#39;n liggaam te beskerm?
grave clothes, shroud, coffin, casket, sarcophagus, urn|graf klere, bos kis, kis, sarkofaag, urn
(6) What is used to carry a body?|(6) Wat word gebruik om &#39;n liggaam te dra?
pall, bier, hearse|sluier, bier, lykswa
(7) What words refer to burning a body?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die brand &#39;n liggaam?
cremate, cremation, pyre, ashes|veras, verassing, brandstapel, as
(8) What words refer to leaving a body outside?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na wat &#39;n liggaam buite?
expose (a body), funeral platform, left to rot|blootstel (liggaam), begrafnis platform, van links na vrot
(9) What words refer to preserving a dead body?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die behoud van &#39;n dooie liggaam?
embalm, mummify, mummy,|balsem, mummificeren, mamma,
Grave|Graf
Use this domain for words related to a grave--the place where a dead body is put.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n graf - die plek waar &#39;n dooie liggaam sit.
(1) What words refer to the place where a body is placed?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die plek waar &#39;n liggaam geplaas word?
grave, tomb, burial plot, sepulcher, vault, crypt, barrow,|graf, graf, begrafnis plot, graf, kluis, grafkelder, barrow,
(2) What words refer to a place where many bodies are buried?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar baie liggame begrawe?
cemetery, churchyard, graveyard, mausoleum, mass grave, burial ground, charnel house,|begraafplaas kerkhof, begraafplaas, mausoleum, massagraf, begraafplaas, soortgelyk huis,
(3) What words refer to a marker of a grave?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n merker van &#39;n graf?
grave marker, gravestone, headstone, tombstone, slab, memorial, monument, epitaph|graf merker, grafsteen, grafsteen, grafsteen, blad, gedenkteken, monument, grafskrif
Inherit|Erwe
Use this domain for words related to inheriting something from your parents after they die.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met erf iets van jou ouers nadat hulle sterf.
(1) What words refer to inheriting something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na erfgename iets?
inherit, receive an inheritance, succeed to,|erwe, ontvang &#39;n erfenis, slaag om,
(2) What words refer to someone who inherits something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat iets erf?
heir, heiress, beneficiary,|erfgenaam erfgenaam, begunstigde,
(3) What words refer to something that is inherited?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat geërf?
inheritance, estate, legacy,|erfenis, boedel, erfenis,
(4) What words refer to a will?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n testament?
will, last will and testament, probate|sal, testament, probate
(5) What words refer to the process of making a will?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die proses van die maak van &#39;n testament?
make a will, draw up a will, plan your estate, estate planning, testate, intestate,|maak &#39;n wil is, &#39;n testament opstel, beplan jou boedel, boedelbeplanning, testate, intestate,
(6) What words refer to someone who makes a will?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat &#39;n testament maak?
testator,|testateur,
(7) What words refer to giving something to someone in your will?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets vir iemand te gee in jou testament?
leave, bequeath, will (v), hand down,|verlaat, bemaak, sal (v), oorhandig af,
(8) What words refer to the person who distributes the property?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die persoon wat die eiendom versprei?
executor,|eksekuteur,
(9) What words refer to the right to inherit something?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die reg om iets te beërwe?
birthright,|geboortereg,
Life after death|Lewe na die dood
Use this domain for words related to life after death.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die lewe ná die dood.
(1) What words refer to life after death?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die lewe na die dood?
life after death, afterlife, immortality, the life beyond, life beyond the grave,|lewe na die dood, die hiernamaals, onsterflikheid, die lewe buite, die lewe anderkant die graf,
(2) What words refer to person after they die?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat na hulle sterf?
ghost, spirit,|spook, gees,
(3) What words refer to the place where dead people are?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die plek waar die dooie mense is?
netherworld, heaven, hell,|Netherworld, die hemel, die hel,
(4) What words refer to caring for the spirit of a dead person?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die versorging van die gees van &#39;n dooie persoon?
offer a sacrifice, pray for the dead, keep someone's memory alive,|bied &#39;n offer, bid vir die dood nie, te hou geheue iemand se lewe,
(5) What words refer to not living on after death?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na bly nie op na die dood?
oblivion, end of existence, finality of death,|vergetelheid, die einde van die bestaan, finaliteit van die dood,
Language and thought|Taal en denke
Use this domain for general words referring to mental and verbal activity. This domain is primarily for grouping many related domains. Therefore there may be no general word in a language to cover such a broad area of meaning.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die geestelike en verbale aktiwiteit. Dit domein is hoofsaaklik vir die groepering baie verwante domeine. Daarom is daar geen algemene woord in &#39;n taal so &#39;n wye gebied van betekenis dek mag wees.
(1) What general words refer to mental and verbal activity?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die geestelike en verbale aktiwiteit?
psychology, life of the soul|sielkunde, die lewe van die siel
Soul, spirit|Siel, gees
Use this domain for general words related to the immaterial, non-physical part of a person, as opposed to the body.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met die immaterieel, nie-fisiese deel van &#39;n persoon, in teenstelling met die liggaam.
(1) What words refer to the immaterial part of a person?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die onstoflike deel van &#39;n persoon?
soul, spirit, spiritual, psyche, psychological, psychology, internal makeup, inside, inward, conscious self, consciousness, ego, essence, humanity, id, self, subconscious, superego, unconscious,|siel, gees, geestelike, psige, sielkundige, sielkunde, interne make-up, binne, innerlike, bewuste self, bewussyn, ego, wese, die mensdom, id, self, onderbewussyn, superego, bewusteloos,
(2) What words refer to the part of a person that thinks and knows?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die deel van &#39;n persoon wat dink en weet?
mind, intellect, mental faculty, reason, reasoning, sense, thinking, thought, thoughts,|gedagte, intellek, geestelike fakulteit, rede, redenasie, sin, denke, denke, gedagtes,
(3) What words refer to the part of a person that wants and decides?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die deel van &#39;n persoon wat wil en besluit?
will, volition|sal, beweging
(4) What words refer to the part of a person that feels?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die deel van &#39;n persoon wat voel?
heart, breast, emotions, emotional makeup, feeling, feelings, sensitivity, gut,|hart, bors, emosies, emosionele make-up, gevoel, gevoelens, sensitiwiteit, derm,
(5) What words refer to the part of a person that affects his behavior?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die deel van &#39;n persoon wat sy gedrag beïnvloed?
personality, character, conscience, disposition, nature, tendency,|persoonlikheid, karakter, gewete, ingesteldheid, die natuur, die neiging,
Personality|Persoonlikheid
Use this domain for words that describe a person's personality (the way he usually thinks, talks, and how he acts with other people).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat &#39;n persoon se persoonlikheid beskryf (die manier waarop hy gewoonlik dink, praat, en hoe hy optree met ander mense).
(1) What general words refer to a person's personality?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se?
personality, manner, character,|persoonlikheid, wyse, karakter,
(2) What words describe personality traits?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf persoonlikheidseienskappe?
introvert, extrovert, outgoing, shy, quiet, sociable, talkative, vivacious, intense, easy-going, down-to-earth, homespun, melancholic, phlegmatic, choleric, sanguine, logical, emotional, unemotional, impulsive, cool-headed, even keeled, flamboyant|introvert, ekstrovert, uitgaande, skaam, stil, gesellig, spraaksaam, lewenslustige, intense, maklik gaan, down-to-earth, grof, melancholiese, nugter, prikkelbaar, sanguine, logiese, emosionele, emosieloos, impulsief, hoof koel, selfs kiel, flambojante
Mental state|Geestelike toestand
Use this domain for words referring to a person's mental state.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se geestelike toestand.
(1) What general words refer to a person's mental state?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se geestelike toestand?
mental state, mental condition, conscious state|geestelike toestand, geestelike toestand, bewuste toestand
Alert|Alert
Use this domain for words referring to a mental state when the mind is working hard.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n geestelike toestand wanneer die verstand harde werk.
(1) What words refer to an alert mental state?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n waarskuwing geestelike toestand?
be on your guard, beware, take heed, be on the lookout, watch,|wees op julle hoede, pasop, in ag neem, op die uitkyk wees, kyk,
(2) What words describe someone who is alert?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat wakker is beskryf?
alert, watchful, vigilant, keep your eyes peeled, aware, clear headed, coherent, wary, mindful, responsive, sensitive,|waarskuwing, wakker waaksaam, hou jou oë oop, bewus, duidelik onder leiding, samehangend, versigtig, bewus, reageer, sensitief,
(3) What words describe someone who is not alert?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat nie bewus beskryf?
unaware, mindless, unmindful, bored, disregard, flighty, heedless, oblivious,|onbewus, sinnelose, veronagsaam, verveeld, ignoreer, loskop, agt mense, onbewus,
Notice|Kennisgewing
Use this domain for words related to noticing something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die merk iets.
(1) What words refer to noticing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die merk van iets?
notice, spot, become aware, detect, note, perceive, observe, conscious of, catch someone's eye, take note,|kennisgewing, spot, bewus, op te spoor, noot, sien, waarneem, bewus van, vang iemand se oog, neem kennis,
(2) What words describe someone who is good at noticing things?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat goed by die merk dinge?
observant, perceptive, eagle-eyed, have eyes like a hawk, have eyes in the back of your head, powers of observation|oplettend, oplettend, arend-oë, oë soos &#39;n smous, het oë in die agterkant van jou kop, magte van waarneming
(3) What words refer to not noticing something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na nie iets merk?
not notice, miss, overlook, fail to notice, escape someone's notice, unnoticed, go unnoticed|nie agterkom, mis, mis te kyk, versuim om op te let, ontsnap iemand se kennisgewing, ongesiens, gaan ongesiens
(4) What words describe someone who is not good at noticing things?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie goed in die merk van die dinge?
unobservant, unperceptive, oblivious, can't see the forest for the trees, got your head in the clouds|onoplettend, ontvanklik, onbewus, kan nie sien die bos vir die bome, het jou kop in die wolke
(5) What words refer to trying to get someone to notice something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na probeer om iemand iets sien kry?
call attention to, bring something to someone's attention, point out|noem aandag aan, bring iets om iemand se aandag daarop te wys
(6) What words refer to trying to get someone to not notice something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om iemand iets nie agterkom nie?
distract,|lei,
Attention|Aandag
(1) What words refer to paying attention?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na aandag?
pay attention, keep your mind on, take note, attentive, devote attention to,|aandag, hou jou gedagtes op, neem, luister, wy aandag aan,
(2) What words refer to paying a lot of attention to something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die betaling van &#39;n baie aandag aan iets?
pay close attention, concentrate, concentration, give something your undivided attention,|aandag skenk, te konsentreer, konsentrasie, gee iets jou onverdeelde aandag,
(3) What words refer to paying attention to something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na aandag aan iets?
pay attention to, devote attention to, turn your attention to, focus on, concentrate on, give something/someone your undivided attention, attend to,|aandag te gee aan, wy aandag aan, draai jou aandag aan, fokus op, konsentreer op, gee iets / iemand jou onverdeelde aandag, aandag te gee aan,
(4) What words refer to paying too much attention to something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die betaling van te veel aandag aan iets?
be engrossed in, be wrapped up in, be absorbed in, be immersed in, immerse yourself in, preoccupied,|word verdiep in, word toegedraai in, geabsorbeer in, gedompel in, verdiep jouself in, besig,
(5) What words refer to stop paying attention?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na stop aandag?
turn off, switch off,|afskakel, skakel,
(6) What words refer to not paying attention?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na nie aandag?
not pay attention, daydream, be miles away, your mind wanders, inattentive, pay very little attention, mind is elsewhere, ignore, take no notice, goes in one ear and out the other,|nie aandag, dagdroom, wees myl weg, jou gedagtes dwaal, onoplettend, betaal baie min aandag, verstand is elders, te ignoreer, neem geen kennis, gaan in die een oor en uit die ander,
(7) What words refer to making someone pay attention to you?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iemand aandag te gee aan jou?
get attention, attract attention, draw attention to yourself,|aandag kry, aandag te trek, trek aandag aan jouself,
(8) What words refer to making someone pay attention to something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iemand aandag te gee aan iets?
draw attention to, call attention to, bring something to someone's attention, point out, focus attention on, highlight,|aandag te vestig op, bel die aandag op, bring iets om iemand se aandag, wys uit, aandag te fokus op, hoogtepunt,
(9) What words refer to receiving a lot of attention from people?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die ontvangs van &#39;n baie aandag van mense?
get attention, attract attention, attention, be the center of attention, be the focus of attention,|aandag kry, aandag, aandag te trek, is die middelpunt van die aandag, wees die fokus van die aandag,
(10) What words refer to trying to stop someone from paying attention to something?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om iemand uit te betaal aandag aan iets te stop?
distract someone's attention, divert attention, distracted, distraction, diversion,|lei iemand se aandag af te lei aandag afgelei, afleiding, afleiding,
(11) What words refer to trying to prevent people from paying attention to you?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om te verhoed dat mense aandag te skenk aan jou?
not want to draw attention to yourself, keep a low profile, low key,|nie wil aandag te vestig op jouself, hou &#39;n lae profiel, lae sleutel,
(12) What words refer to paying attention to more than one thing?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na aandag aan meer as een ding?
attention is divided,|aandag is verdeel,
Ignore|Ignoreer
Use this domain for words related to ignoring someone--to not look at, listen to, or talk to someone because you think they are not important or you don't like them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die ignoreer iemand - om nie te kyk, luister, of praat met iemand omdat jy dink hulle is nie belangrik of jy nie hou nie.
(1) What words refer to ignoring someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na ignoreer iemand?
ignore, not pay any attention to, pay no attention to, not take any notice of, take no notice of, don't mind me/her/them, shrug off, not want to know, take someone for granted, avoid, refuse to acknowledge, don't greet|ignoreer, nie aandag te betaal, betaal geen aandag aan, geen kennis van neem, neem geen kennis van, moet my nie omgee / haar / hulle afgesit, nie wil weet, neem iemand aanvaar, te vermy, te weier om te erken, nie te groet
(2) What words refer to ignoring something someone says to you?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand vir jou sê ignoreer?
ignore, disregard, not take any notice of, not listen to, fall on deaf ears,|ignoreer, ignoreer, geen kennis neem, nie luister na, op dowe ore val,
(3) What words refer to ignoring something bad that is happening?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets sleg wat gebeur ignoreer?
overlook, let it pass, turn a blind eye, shut your eyes to, close your eyes, bury your head in the sand,|vergeet, laat dit gebeur, draai &#39;n blinde oog, sluit jou oë, jou oë toemaak, begrawe jou kop in die sand,
(4) What words refer to ignoring someone by rudely pretending not to see them?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na ignoreer iemand deur ongeskik voorgee nie om hulle te sien?
pretend not to notice, pretend not to see, look right through, snub, cut someone dead, shut out,|voorgee om op te let, voorgee om nie te sien, kyk reg deur, stompe, sny iemand dood is, uit te sluit,
(5) What words refer to a person in authority ignoring what is good for the people under them?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon in gesag ignoreer wat goed is vir die mense onder hulle is?
trample on, trample underfoot, ride roughshod over,|vertrap, voete vertrap, ry voete oor,
Think|Dink
Use this domain for words related to thinking, thought processes, and kinds of thinking.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met denke, denke, en vorme van denke.
(1) What general words refer to thinking?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na denke?
think,|dink,
(2) What words refer to thinking something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na te dink iets?
think (that), have a thought, come to, come to mind, enter your mind, enter your head, cross your mind, hit on, occur to, present itself, spring to mind, strike, wonder,|dink (dit), het &#39;n gedagte, kom, na vore kom, gee jy jou verstand, gee jy jou kop, kruis jou gedagtes, druk op, plaasvind om, bied self, lente gedagte, staking, wonder,
(3) What words refer to a single thought?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n enkele gedagte?
thought, concept, consideration, fact, idea, image, notion, opinion, sentiment, syllogism,|denke, konsep, oorweging, feit, idee, beeld, idee, mening, sentiment, sillogisme,
Mind|Mind
Use this domain for general words referring to the mind--the part of a person that thinks.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die gedagte - die deel van &#39;n persoon wat dink.
(1) What words refer to the mind?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gedagte?
mind, intellect, intelligence, reason, understanding, brain, head|gedagte, intellek, intelligensie, rede, begrip, brein, hoof
Think about|Dink oor
Use this domain for words related to thinking about something for some time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met denke oor iets vir &#39;n geruime tyd.
(1) What words refer to thinking about something for a period of time?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na te dink oor iets vir &#39;n tydperk van die tyd?
think about, brood, cogitate, consider, give consideration to, contemplate, meditate, muse, mull over, occupy your mind, ponder, reconsider, reflect, reflection, ruminate, speculate, study, weigh, wonder, go around in your mind, do some thinking, keep your mind on, have something on your mind, deduce, deduction, induction, inductive, logic, apply yourself, pay attention, bethink, conclude, observe, process, reason, theorize,|dink oor, brood, redeneer, oorweeg, gee ag, dink, mediteer, muse, redeneer oor, beset jou gedagtes, bepeins, heroorweeg, weerspieël, refleksie, herkou, spekuleer, studeerkamer, weeg, wonder, gaan rond in jou gedagtes, sommige denke, hou jou gedagtes op, het iets op jou verstand, aflei, aftrekking, induksie, induktiewe, logika, van toepassing jouself, aandag, hulle dink, sluit, neem, te verwerk, rede, teoretiseer,
(2) What words refer to thinking carefully?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na versigtig dink?
attend, attention, beware, careful, caution, cautious, concentrate, concentration, concern, concerned, consider, consideration, foresight, guard, intentional, interest, occupy, precaution, provident, prudent, purposeful, refuse, regard, tend, think thoroughly, give thought, thoughtful, think hard,|woon, aandag, pasop, versigtig, versigtig, versigtig, konsentreer, konsentrasie, kommer, betref, oorweeg, oorweging, versiendheid, wag, opsetlike, rente, beset, voorsorgmaatreël, voorsorg-, verstandig, doelgerigte, weier, verband, geneig, dink deeglik Gee gedagte, bedagsaam, dink hard,
(3) What words refer to not thinking carefully?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na nie versigtig dink?
careless, casual, dismiss, disregard, incautious, neglect, overlook, shrug, wing it|sorgelose, gemaklik, te ontslaan, ignoreer, onversigtige, verwaarlosing, ignoreer, skouers, die vleuel dit
(4) What words refer to thinking about what is good for someone?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na te dink oor wat goed is vir iemand?
be concerned about, care about|bekommerd wees oor, omgee
(5) What words refer to thinking before making a decision?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na denke voordat &#39;n besluit?
think about, look at, think over, consider, think something out, think twice, think of, take into consideration, take into account,|dink oor, kyk na, dink oor, oorweeg, dink iets uit, twee keer dink, dink, in ag te neem, in ag neem,
(6) What words refer to a series of thoughts?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n reeks van gedagtes?
line of thought, line of thinking, train of thought, reasoning,|lyn van denke, lyn van denke, met die trein van denke, redenering,
(7) What words refer to thinking about something again?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na te dink oor iets weer?
think again, reconsider, change your mind, on second thought, on reflection|dink weer, heroorweeg, verander jou gedagtes op die tweede gedagte, by nabetragting
(8) What words refer to the thoughts a person is thinking at a particular time?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die gedagtes &#39;n persoon dink op &#39;n spesifieke tyd?
thinking,|dink,
(9) What words refer to thinking about many things?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na te dink oor baie dinge?
mind is full|gedagte is vol
(10) What words refer to the way a person thinks about something?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die manier waarop &#39;n mens dink oor iets?
attitude, logic, outlook, perspective, thoughtful, view|houding, logika, vooruitsigte, perspektief, bedagsaam, view
(11) What words describe the way a person thinks?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf die manier waarop &#39;n mens dink?
clear, cogent, concise, observant,|duidelik, oortuigende, bondige, oplettend,
(12) What words refer to trying not to think about something?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om nie te dink oor iets?
ignore, try to forget, put out of your mind, empty your mind|ignoreer, probeer om te vergeet, het van jou verstand, leë jou gedagtes
(13) What words refer to stopping thinking about something?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na stop denke oor iets?
drop (a line of thought), distract, distraction, take your mind off|drop (&#39;n lyn van denke), lei, afleiding, neem jou gedagtes af
(14) What words refer to failing to think about what you are doing?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na die versuim om te dink oor wat jy doen?
unthinking, unintentional, thoughtless, mindless|onnadenkende, onbedoelde, onbesonne, breinlose
(15) What words refer to a person who thinks a lot?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n baie dink?
thinker, brain, intellectual, philosopher,|denker, brein, intellektuele, filosoof,
Imagine|Verbeel
Use this domain for imagining things--to think about something that does not exist, or to think about something happening that has never happened.|Gebruik hierdie domein verbeel - om te dink oor iets wat nie bestaan ​​nie, of om te dink oor iets gebeur wat nooit gebeur het nie.
(1) What words refer to imagining things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na verbeel?
imagine, conceive of, dream up, envisage, hypothesize, invent, picture (in your mind), form a picture, make up, see, suppose, think of, think up, visualize,|dink, swanger van, droom is, beoog, veronderstel, bedink, foto (in jou gedagtes), vorm &#39;n prentjie, maak, sien, dink, dink, dink up, visualiseer,
(2) What words refer to imagining something that you would like to do?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na verbeel iets wat jy graag wil doen?
daydream (v), dream about, dream of, fantasize, live in a fantasy world,|dagdroom (v), droom, droom van, fantaseer, leef in &#39;n fantasie wêreld,
(3) What words refer to imagining things that do not exist?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na verbeel dinge wat nie bestaan ​​nie?
imagine, be in the mind, be in your mind, be seeing things, hallucinate,|dink, in die verstand, wees in julle verstand, wees om dinge te sien, hallusineer,
(4) What words refer to the ability to imagine?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die vermoë om te dink?
imagination, vivid imagination, fertile imagination, creativity, inventiveness, vision,|verbeelding, aanskoulike verbeelding, vrugbare verbeelding, kreatiwiteit, vindingrykheid, visie,
(5) What words refer to a person who imagines?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat meen?
creative genius, dreamer, visionary,|kreatiewe genie, dromer, visioenêre,
(6) What words describe someone who imagines?|(6) Watter woorde iemand wat verbeel beskryf?
imaginative, creative (person),|verbeeldingryke, kreatiewe (persoon),
(7) What words refer to something that someone imagines?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat iemand meen?
image, conception, conceptualization, creation, daydream (n), dream, fancy, flight of fancy, fantasy, fiction, figment of your imagination, hallucination, hypothesis, invention, make believe, picture, unreality, vision, visualization,|beeld, bevrugting, konseptualisering, skepping, dagdroom (n), droom, fancy, vlug van fancy, fantasie, fiksie, verdichtsel van jou verbeelding, hallusinasie, hipotese, uitvinding, maak glo, prent, onwerklikheid, visie, visualisering,
(8) What words describe something that someone has imagined?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat iemand het gedink beskryf?
imaginary, abstract, conceptual, creative (thought), fanciful, fictional, hypothetical, unreal, nonexistent, doesn't exist,|denkbeeldige, abstrakte, konseptuele, skeppende (denke), denkbeeldig, fiktiewe, denkbeeldige, onwerklik, nie bestaan ​​nie, nie bestaan ​​nie,
(9) What words describe someone who does not imagine?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie dink?
unimaginative, uncreative,|verbeeldingloos, onkreatief,
(10) What words describe something that cannot be imagined?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat nie kan verbeel?
unimaginable, inconceivable,|ondenkbaar, ondenkbaar,
Intelligent|Intelligente
Use this domain for words that describe a person who thinks well.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat &#39;n persoon wat goed dink beskryf.
(1) What words describe someone who thinks well?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat goed dink beskryf?
intelligent, brainy, bright, brilliant, capable, clever, crafty, discerning, educated, ingenious, insightful, keen, knowledgeable, learned, literate, perceptive, philosophical, profound, rational, scholarly, sharp, shrewd, sly, smart, sophisticated, sound, wily, have a lot of sense, have a high IQ,|intelligent, verstandig, helder, briljante, bekwame, slim, slim, oordeelkundige, opgevoed, vernuftige, insiggewende, skerp, kundige, geleer, geletterd, oplettend, filosofiese, diepgaande, rasionele, wetenskaplike, skerp, slim, slinkse, smart, gesofistikeerd, klank, uitgeslape, het &#39;n baie sin, het &#39;n hoë IK,
(2) What words describe an intelligent child?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n intelligente kind?
bright, gifted, precocious, prodigy, whiz kid|helder, begaafde, vir altyd, wonderkind, gefluit kind
(3) What words describe someone who can think quickly?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat kan vinnig dink?
quick, sharp, whiz, be quick on the uptake, be on the ball, think on your feet|vinnige, skerp, gefluit, vinnig wees op die opname, word op die bal, dink op jou voete
(4) What words describe someone who is intelligent, well-educated, and thinks a lot?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat intelligent, goed opgeleide, en dink &#39;n baie?
intellectual, academic, learned, brains, intelligentsia|intellektuele, akademiese, geleer, brein, intelligentsia
(5) What words describe someone who makes good decisions?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat goeie besluite maak, beskryf?
wise, sagacious, prudent, sensible, good sense, sound judgment|wys, intelligent, verstandig, nugter, goeie sin, gesonde oordeel
(6) What words refer to the ability to think well?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om goed te dink?
ability, capacity, circumspection, cleverness, competence, cunning, discernment, discretion, discrimination, insight, intelligence, IQ, judgment, knowledge, philosophy, profundity, prudence, rationality, reasoning, sagacity, sanity, sense, sensibility, shrewdness, smarts, sophistication, understanding, wisdom, wit|vermoë, kapasiteit, omsigtigheid, slim, bekwaamheid, geslepe, onderskeiding, diskresie, diskriminasie, insig, intelligensie, IK, oordeel, kennis, filosofie, diepte, omsigtigheid, rasionaliteit, denke, spitsvondigheid, gesonde verstand, sin, aanvoeling, geslepenheid, intelligensie, gesofistikeerdheid, begrip, wysheid, humor
(7) What words refer to a person who thinks well?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat goed dink?
academician, genius, highbrow, illuminati, intellectual, literati, magus, philosopher, priest, prodigy, sage, scholar, scholastic, thinker, able thinker, wise man,|Academie, genie, hoogmoedig, Illuminati, intellektuele, letterkundiges, Towenaar, filosoof, priester, wonderkind, salie, geleerde, skolastiese, denker, kan denker, wyse man,
Stupid|Stupid

asinine, blind, brainless, crass, crazy, daft, delirious, demented, dense, dim, dizzy, doltish, dull, dull-witted, dumb, fanatical, fatuous, foolish, harebrained, idiotic, inane, ingenuous, insane, insensitive, irrational, lumpish, moronic, naive, nonsensical, obtuse, retarded, senile, senseless, silly, simple, slow, slow-witted, stupid, thick, thickheaded, undiscerning, unimaginative, unperceptive, unsound, witless, lacking in intelligence, mentally lazy,|asinine, blindes, breinlose, kras, gek, daft, delirium, waansinnige, digte, dowwe, duiselig, sukkel achtig, dof, dof van begrip, stom, fanatiese, sot, dom, harebrained, idiotiese, ligsinnig, naïef, gek, onsensitief, irrasionele, traag, moronic, naïef, onsinnige, stomp, vertraagde, seniele, sinnelose, dom, eenvoudig, stadig, stadig van begrip, stupid, dik, thickheaded, sonder onderscheidingsvermogen, verbeeldingloos, ontvanklik, ongesonde, stupide, ontbreek in intelligensie, geestelik lui ,

foolish, shortsighted, unwise|dwase, kortsigtig, onwyse
