(5) What words refer to a person who does not think well?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat nie goed dink?
airhead, blockhead, dolt, donkey, dullard, dumbbell, dummy, dunce, dupe, fanatic, fool, idiot, imbecile, moron, numskull, scatterbrain, sucker,|airhead, domkop, uilskuiken, donkie, suffer, Halter, domkop, esel, bedrieg, fanatiese, dwaas, idioot, imbesiel, moroon, domkop, Scatterbrain, sucker,
Logical|Logiese
Use this domain for words describing logical thinking.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf logiese denke.
(1) What words describe thinking that is logical?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf dink dit is logies?
logical, sound, rational, reasonable, well thought out, well-founded, make sense, hang together, coherent, add up|logiese, klank, rasionele, redelike, weldeurdagte, goed gegrond is, sin maak, hang saam, samehangend, voeg
(2) What words refer to a logical way of thinking?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n logiese manier van dink?
logic, reasoning|logika, redenasie
(3) What words describe thinking that is not logical?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf denke wat nie logies?
illogical, irrational, make no sense, not hold water, not stand up, not add up|onlogies, irrasioneel, maak nie sin nie, nie water hou nie opstaan ​​nie voeg
Instinct|Instink
Use this domain for words related to instinct--to know something without being told, to know what to do without taught how to do it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met instink - iets weet sonder om vertel, om te weet wat om te doen sonder geleer hoe om dit te doen.
(1) What words refer to a natural ability to know what to do?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n natuurlike vermoë om te weet wat om te doen?
instinct, instinctive, intuition, intuitive, sixth sense, gut feeling, just seem to know|instink, instinktiewe, intuïsie, intuïtief, sesde sintuig, gevoel, net lyk om te weet
Learn|Leer
Use this domain for words referring to learning something, acquiring information, gaining knowledge (whether done intentionally or unintentionally), or discovering the answer to some question.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die leer iets, die verkryging van inligting, die verkryging van kennis (hetsy doelbewus of onopsetlik gedoen), of die ontdekking van die antwoord op &#39;n vraag.
(1) What words refer to learning something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die leer iets?
learn, acquaint, acquire, ascertain, conclude, dawn on, deduce, determine, discover, examine, experience, figure out, find, get (the answer), glean, grasp (mentally), gain (knowledge/understanding), look something up, master, obtain, perceive, pick someone's brain, pick up (a subject), question (v), realize, recognize, reflect, study, get an education,|leer, te vergewis, te verkry, te bepaal, sluit, dagbreek op, af te lei, te bepaal, te ontdek, ondersoek, ervaring, uit te vind, vind, te kry (die antwoord), optel, begrip (geestelik), wins (kennis / begrip), kyk iets up, meester, te verkry, sien, pluk iemand se brein, haal (&#39;n onderwerp), vraag (v), besef, herken, te weerspieël, studie, kry &#39;n opvoeding,
(2) What words refer to learning something no one else knows or something that is secret?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die leer iets wat niemand anders weet of iets wat geheim?
discover, discovery, find out about|ontdek, ontdekking, vind uit oor
(3) What words refer to someone who is learning?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat leer?
amateur, disciple, layman, student,|amateur, dissipel, leek, student,
(4) What words describe someone who is learning?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat leer?
ignorant, uneducated, unlearned|onkundig, onopgevoede, afgeleer
(5) What words refer to someone who has learned?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat geleer het?
graduate, teacher, scholar,|gegradueerde, onderwyser, navorser,
(6) What words describe someone who has learned?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat geleer het?
instructed, learned, well-taught,|opdrag, geleer, goed geleer,
(7) What words refer to what is learned?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na wat geleer?
learning, answer, solution, information, conclusion, discovery, discipline, education, initiation, instruction, training,|leer, antwoord, oplossing, inligting, gevolgtrekking, ontdekking, dissipline, onderwys, inisiasie, onderrig, opleiding,
Study|Studie
Use this domain for words referring to studying--to try to learn something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die bestudering - om te probeer om iets te leer.
(1) What words refer to studying something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets studeer?
study, analyze, check, concern yourself with, consider, determine, examine, experiment (v), follow,  inquire into, investigate, learn, look into/for, look something up, probe, prowl, seek, search, research, study, test, trace, track, trail, try to find out about,|studie, te analiseer, te gaan, raak vertroud met, oorweeg, te bepaal, ondersoek, eksperiment (v) volg, ondersoek instel na, te ondersoek, te leer, te kyk na / vir, kyk iets op, ondersoek, roof, soek, soek, navorsing, studie , toets, spoor, spoor, spoor, probeer om uit te vind oor,
(2) What words refer to the process of trying to learn something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van probeer om iets te leer?
evaluation, examination, experiment (n), investigation, inquiry, quest, study, search|evaluering, ondersoek, eksperiment (N), ondersoek, ondersoek, soeke, studie, soek
(3) What words refer to the subject that is being studied?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die onderwerp wat bestudeer word?
subject, topic, question|onderwerp, tema, vraag
(4) What words refer to studying something a second time?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die studie van iets wat &#39;n tweede keer?
review, revise (British)|hersiening, hersien (Britse)
(5) What words refer to a person who studies something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat iets bestudeer?
astronomer, biologist, botanist, detective, investigator, linguist, mathematician, operative, reconnoiterer, scientist, scout, spy, undercover agent, zoologist|sterrekundige, bioloog, plantkundige, speurder, ondersoeker, taalkundige, wiskundige, koöperatiewe, reconnoiterer, wetenskaplike, scout, spioen, geheime agent, dierkundige
(6) What words describe someone who likes to study?|(6) Watter woorde iemand wat daarvan hou om te studeer, beskryf?
studious, inquisitive,|leergierige, nuuskierig,
Check|Check
Use this domain for words referring to checking something--when you think something is true or correct, but you aren't sure, you do something to find out if it is true or correct.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die beheer van iets - wanneer jy dink iets is waar of korrek, maar jy is nie seker nie, jy iets doen om uit te vind of dit waar is of korrek.

Evaluate, test|Evalueer, te toets
Use this domain for words referring to the process of determining the truth or falsehood of something, or for determining the nature or value of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die proses van die bepaling van die waarheid of valsheid van iets, of vir die bepaling van die aard of waarde van iets.
(1) What words refer to the process of determining the truth of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van die bepaling van die waarheid van iets?
adjudge, adjudicate, assay, assess, assessment, calculate, consider, decide, decision, determine, discern, estimate, evaluate, evaluation, examine, gauge, judge, judgment, judicious, question, regard, render, scrupulous, seek (truth), size, taste, test, testing, view|adjudge, beoordeel, assay, evalueer, assessering, bereken, te oorweeg, te besluit, besluit, bepaal, te onderskei, te skat, te evalueer, evaluering, ondersoek, meet, regter, die oordeel, oordeelkundige, vraag verband lewer, deurdagte, soek (waarheid) , grootte, smaak, toets, toets, view
(2) What words refer to the process of determining the value of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van die bepaling van die waarde van iets?
appraisal, appraise, evaluate, weigh (the merits of)|waardasie, beoordeel, evalueer, te weeg (die meriete van)
(3) What words refer to choosing which of two or more things is better?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die keuse van watter van twee of meer dinge is beter?
differentiate, differentiation, discriminate, distinguish, rank, rate, rating, separate, hold in esteem,  hold up,|onderskei, differensiasie, diskrimineer, te onderskei, rang, tempo, gradering, aparte, hou in agting, hou,
(4) What words refer to the thing that is thought better?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die ding wat beter is gedink?
choice,|keuse,
(5) What words refer to thinking something is not as good as something else?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na te dink iets is nie so goed soos iets anders?
discount, disregard, devalue, dismiss|afslag, miskenning, devalueer, ontslaan
(6) What words refer to the difference between two things?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die verskil tussen twee dinge?
difference, distinction, distinctions,|verskil, verskil, onderskeidings,
(7) What words refer to judging wrongly?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die oordeel verkeerdelik?
indiscriminate, miscalculate, misjudge, overestimate, uncritical,|onoordeelkundige, misrekenen, misgis, oorskat, onkritiese,
(8) What words refer to a person who evaluates?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat evalueer?
referee, tester,|skeidsregter, tester,
(9) What words refer to a report of an evaluation?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n verslag van &#39;n evaluering?
report, reputation, reward,|verslag, reputasie, beloning,
(10) What words refer to being evaluated as better than before?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na geëvalueer as beter as voorheen?

Known, unknown|Bekend, onbekend

apparent, evident, obvious|duidelik, duidelik, duidelik

Opinion|Mening
Use this domain for situations in which a question or issues are being debated, more than one option is possible, and a person chooses to think in one way about the question or issue.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir situasies waarin &#39;n vraag of kwessies gedebatteer, meer as een opsie is moontlik, en &#39;n persoon kies om te dink in een manier oor die vraag of kwessie.

Believe|Glo
Use this domain for words referring to believing that something is true.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die geloof dat iets waar is.
(1) What words refer to believing that something is true?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die geloof dat iets waar is?
believe, faith, trust, accept, confidence, give credence to, consider, count on, rely on, reliance, depend on, dependence, swear by, take for granted, bet on, bank on, buy, take at face value, store, stock, take someone's word for it, cling to, be convinced, be dogmatic, follow, heed, receive, think something is true|glo, geloof, vertroue, aanvaar, selfvertroue, gee geloofwaardigheid aan, oorweeg, reken op, staatmaak op, afhanklikheid, afhang, afhanklikheid, sweer by, as vanselfsprekend aanvaar, wed op, bank op, koop, op sigwaarde, store , voorraad, neem die woord iemand se vir dit, klou aan, oortuig wees dogmatiese volg, ag, te ontvang, dink iets is waar
(2) What words refer to believing that someone is truthful?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die geloof dat iemand die waarheid praat?
believe in, have confidence in, have faith in, put your trust in, take your word for, pin your hopes on, give the benefit of the doubt|glo in, het vertroue in, het die geloof in, sit jou vertroue in, neem jou woord vir, pen jou hoop op, gee die voordeel van die twyfel
(3) What words describe something or someone that can be believed?|(3) Watter woorde iets of iemand wat kan geglo beskryf?
believable, convincing, indubitable, undeniable, indisputable, incontrovertible, credible, trustworthy, faithful, dependable, to be depended on, probable, persuasive, plausible, authoritative, reliable, have a ring of truth, sounds right, certain, convincing, sure|geloofwaardig, oortuigend, ontwyfelbare, onmiskenbaar, onweerlegbare, onweerlegbare, geloofwaardige, betroubare, getroue, betroubare, word afhanklik, waarskynlik, oortuigend, geloofwaardige, gesaghebbende, betroubare, het &#39;n ring van die waarheid, klink reg, sekere, oortuigend, seker
(4) What words refer to putting too much faith in something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na om te veel geloof in iets?
presumption, credulous, gullible, superstitious, unquestioning|vermoede, goedgelowige, liggelowige, bygelowige, onvoorwaardelike
(5) What words refer to believing something that other people do not believe?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets te glo dat ander mense glo nie?
belief, superstition, old wives' tale|geloof, bygeloof, ou vroue &#39;n verhaal
(6) What words refer to believing something that is not true?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets te glo wat nie waar is?
illusion, fallacy, myth, delusion, mistaken belief, misconception, live in a fantasy world, swallow|illusie, dwaling, mite, dwaling, verkeerde oortuiging, wanopvatting, leef in &#39;n fantasie wêreld, sluk
(7) What words refer to a person who believes?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat glo?
believer, follower|gelowige volgeling
(8) What words refer to something that a person believes?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat &#39;n persoon glo?
belief|geloof
(9) What words refer to the reason a person believes something?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die rede &#39;n persoon glo iets?

Trust|Trust
Use this domain for words referring to trusting someone--believing that someone is honest and will not do something bad to you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na vertrou iemand - glo dat iemand eerlik en sal iets sleg nie aan julle doen.

(5) What words refer to not trusting someone?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat nie vertrou?

(6) What words refer to the feeling that you cannot trust someone?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel dat jy nie iemand kan vertrou?
distrust, mistrust, suspicion,|wantroue, wantroue, agterdog,
(7) What words describe someone who cannot be trusted?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie vertrou kan word?

distrustful, mistrustful,|wantrouig, agterdogtig,

Doubt|Twyfel
Use this domain for words related to doubt--not being sure if something is true or not.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met twyfel - nie seker of iets waar is of nie.
(1) What words are used of being unsure of the truth of something?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik om onseker van die waarheid van iets?
doubt, doubt the truth of, have doubts, debate in your mind, be skeptical, mistrust, suspect, harbor suspicions, take with a grain of salt|twyfel, twyfel die waarheid van, twyfel, te debatteer in julle verstand, wees skepties, wantroue, verdagte, hawe vermoedens, neem met &#39;n korrel sout
(2) What words are used of doubtful thoughts?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik van twyfelagtige gedagtes?
doubt, suspicion, skepticism|twyfel, agterdog, skeptisisme
(3) What words refer to a person who doubts?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat twyfel?
doubter, skeptic, agnostic|twyfelaar, skeptikus, agnostikus
(4) What words refer to a person that you doubt?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat jy getwyfel?
suspicious character,|verdagte karakter,
Agree with someone|Stem saam met iemand
Use this domain for when two people agree on something, think the same way about something, or agree on a decision.|Gebruik hierdie domein wanneer twee mense saamstem oor iets, dink dieselfde oor iets, of eens op &#39;n besluit.
(1) What words refer to when two people agree?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wanneer twee mense saam?
agree, agreement, concur, accede, think the same, think alike, hold the same view, be of the same mind, be of like mind, like-minded, be in accord, be of one accord, be united, be in the same place, be together on something, be with someone, coincide in our thinking,|saamstem, ooreenkoms, gelyktydige, tree, dink dieselfde, dieselfde dink, hou die dieselfde siening, wees eensgesind wees van dieselfde denke, eensgesinde, word in ooreenstemming wees van eendragtig verenig, in die dieselfde plek wees saam oor iets, wees met iemand, saamval in ons denke,
(2) What words refer to two people coming to agreement?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na twee mense kom om &#39;n ooreenkoms?
come to an agreement, come together, ratify a treaty|kom tot &#39;n ooreenkoms, kom saam, &#39;n verdrag te bekragtig
(3) What words refer to the act or state of agreeing?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die handeling of toestand van stem?
agreement, like-mindedness, cooperation, unity, concord, be in congruity,|ooreenkoms, soos-gees, samewerking, eenheid, kongruensie, in congruity,
(4) What words refer to a written document expressing agreement?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n geskrewe dokument uitdrukking ooreenkoms?
written agreement, peace accord, peace treaty|skriftelike ooreenkoms, vredesverdrag, vredesverdrag
(5) What words refer to a gesture expressing agreement?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n gebaar uitdrukking ooreenkoms?
shake hands, shake on it, kiss, holding hands, bow, nod in agreement|skud hande, skud dit, soen, hou hande, buig, knik in ooreenkoms
(6) What words refer to changing your thinking so that you agree with someone else?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die verandering van jou denke sodat jy saam met iemand anders?
accede, accession, accept, acquiesce, acquiescence, give assent, consent, yield, grant a point,|tree, toetreding, te aanvaar, berus, berusting, gee instemming, toestemming, opbrengs, gee &#39;n punt,
(7) What words refer to two people compromising?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na twee mense in gevaar?
compromise|kompromie
Disagree|Verskil
Use this domain for when two people disagree about something.|Gebruik hierdie domein wanneer twee mense nie saamstem oor iets.
(1) What words refer to when two people disagree?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wanneer twee mense nie saamstem nie?
disagree, disagreement, think differently, dissent, dissenting, contest (v),|verskil, verskil, dink anders, verdeeldheid, afkeurende, wedstryd (v),
Protest|Protes
Use this domain for words related to protesting--to say publicly that you do not like something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met protes - om in die openbaar te sê dat jy nie hou van iets.
(1) What words refer to protesting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na protes?
protest (v), object to, remonstrate, speak out against,|protes (v), beswaar, luidkeels, uit te spreek teen,
(2) What words refer to many people protesting?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na baie mense protes?
storm of protest, outcry against, outcry over, public outcry, boycott,|storm van protes, protes teen, verontwaardiging oor, openbare protes, boikot,
(3) What words refer to someone who protests?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat protesteer?
protester, demonstrator, dissident, marcher, objector,|betoger, betoger, dissident, marcherer, beswaarmaker,
(4) What words refer to something someone protests about?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat iemand protes oor?
protest (n), objection, remonstrance,|protesteer (n), beswaar, vermaning,
(5) What words refer to many people protesting in a group?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na baie mense protes in &#39;n groep?
protest, demonstrate, march, boycott, riot, in protest,|protes, demonstreer, Maart, boikot, oproer, in protes,
(6) What words refer to when many people protest in a group?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na wanneer baie mense protesteer in &#39;n groep?
protest (n), demonstration, march, rally, riot, unrest, civil disobedience, peaceful demonstration, placard,|protes (n), demonstrasie, optog, rally, oproer, onrus, burgerlike ongehoorsaamheid, vreedsame betoging, plakkaat,
(7) What words describe something done in protest?|(7) Wat woorde iets gedoen uit protes beskryf?
protest (adj),|protes (adj),
(8) What do people do when they are protesting against something?|(8) Wat doen die mense doen wanneer hulle protes teen iets?
boo (v), boo (n), booing,|boo (v), boo (n), uitjouery,
(9) What do people say when they are protesting against something?|(9) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle protes teen iets?
Down with (someone/something)! No more (something)!|Saam met (iemand / iets)! Nie meer (iets)!
Philosophy|Filosofie
Use this domain for words referring to a set of beliefs about truth.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n stel oortuigings oor die waarheid.
(1) What words refer to a set of beliefs about truth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stel oortuigings oor die waarheid?
philosophy, orientation, frame of reference, worldview|filosofie, argitektuur, verwysingsraamwerk, wêreldbeskouing
(2) What words refer to a person who attempts to define a set of beliefs?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat poog om &#39;n stel oortuigings te definieer?
philosopher, sage|filosoof, salie
(3) What words refer to a group of philosophers?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep filosowe?
Epicurean, Stoic, school (of thought)|Epikuréďese, Stoïsynse, skool (van denke)
Attitude|Houding
Use this domain for words referring to a person's attitude--the way you think and feel about something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se houding - die manier waarop jy dink en voel oor iets.
(1) What words refer to a person's opinions and feelings about something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na menings en gevoelens &#39;n persoon se oor iets?
attitude, mentality, way of thinking, outlook, worldview|houding, mentaliteit, manier van dink, vooruitsigte, wêreldbeskouing
Extreme belief|Uiterste geloof
Use this domain for words referring to an extreme belief--something that you believe, that most people think is not good.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n uiterste geloof - iets wat jy glo, dat die meeste mense dink, is nie goed nie.
(1) What words describe strong opinions and beliefs, which most people regard as extreme?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf sterk menings en oortuigings, wat die meeste mense beskou as die uiterste?
extreme, hard-line, far-left, far-right, idealistic, out in left field|uiterste, harde, ver-links, ver-regs, idealistiese, in die linker veld
(2) What words refer to a person who holds extreme beliefs?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat uiterste oortuigings hou?
extremist, hardliner, leftist, idealist, fanatic, zealot|ekstremistiese, hardliner, linkse, idealis, fanatiese, dweper
Change your mind|Verander jou gedagtes
Use this domain for words related to changing your mind--to change what you think about something, or change your plans or decisions.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verandering van jou gees - om te verander wat jy dink oor iets, of verander jou planne of besluite te neem.
(1) What words refer to changing a decision?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verandering van &#39;n besluit?
change plans, change your mind, rethink, have second thoughts, backtrack, U-turn|planne te verander, verander jou gedagtes, dink, het tweede gedagtes, Track, U-draai
(2) What words describe a person who is willing to change his mind?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat bereid is om sy gedagtes te verander?
open, open-minded|oop, oop
(3) What words refer to changing your mind many times?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verandering van jou gedagtes baie keer?
vacillate, go back and forth between, waver|aarsel, heen en weer tussen getwyfel
(4) What words describe a person who keeps changing his mind?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat hou die verandering van sy verstand?
fickle|wisselvallige
(5) What words refer to refusing to change your mind?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die weiering om jou gedagtes te verander?
stand firm, stand your ground, stick to your guns|staan ​​vas, staan ​​jou grond, hou by jou gewere
(6) What words describe a person who refuses to change his mind?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat weier om sy gedagtes te verander?
closed, close minded, rigid, inflexible, entrenched, reactionary, diehard, intransigent, have fixed ideas, stick in the mud|geslote, naby minded, stewige, onbuigsaam, verskans, reaksionêre, diehard, onversetlike, het vaste idees, hou in die modder
Approve of something|Goedkeur van iets
Use this domain for words related to approving of doing something--to think that doing something is good.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die goedkeuring van iets doen - om te dink dat om iets te doen, is goed.
(1) What words refer to approving of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die goedkeuring van iets?
approve, meet with someone's approval, agree with, believe in, condone, endorse, be for, be in favor of, okay (v), give it your okay, pass, sanction, subscribe, sustain, think something is right, uphold, value (v), think something is right,|goedkeur, ontmoet met goedkeuring iemand se stem saam met, glo in kondoneer, onderskryf, vir, ten gunste van, okay (v), gee dit jou okay, slaag, straf, skryf, onderhou, dink iets reg is, te handhaaf, waarde (v), dink iets reg is,
(2) What words refer to approving of something very much?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die goedkeuring van iets baie?
be all for, be all in favor of, be a great believer in, be an advocate of|wees al vir, almal ten gunste van &#39;n groot gelowige in, &#39;n voorstander van wees
(3) What words refer to someone's approval?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand se goedkeuring?
approval, approbation, advocacy, endorsement, sanction,|goedkeuring, approbasie, voorspraak, endossement, straf,
(4) What words describe something that someone approves of?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat iemand goedkeur beskryf?
admirable, creditable, estimable, honorable, meritorious,|bewonderenswaardig, geloofwaardige, waardig, eerbare, verdienstelike,
(5) What words refer to not approving of something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na nie goedkeuring van iets?
not approve, condemn, critical, critique, deprecate, disapprove of, disapproving, disqualify, frown on, invalidate, reject, take a dim view of, have a low opinion of, think badly of,|goedkeur nie, veroordeel, kritiese, te kritiseer, afkeuren, afkeur, afgekeur, diskwalifiseer, frons op, ongeldig, verwerp, neem &#39;n dowwe lig van, het &#39;n lae opinie van, dink erg van,
(6) What words refer to someone's disapproval?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand se afkeuring?
disapproval, disapprobation, disfavor, rejection,|afkeuring, blaam, ongenade, verwerping,
(7) What words describe something that someone does not approve of?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat iemand nie goedkeur beskryf?
abominable, blameworthy, deplorable, despicable, detestable, dishonorable, execrable, lamentable, reprehensible, unsatisfactory,|gruwelik blaamwaardig, betreurenswaardig, veragtelike, afskuwelike, skandelik, afskuwelike, droewige, verwerplik, onbevredigend is,
(8) What words refer to saying that you disapprove of something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na sê dat jy afkeur van iets?
voice your disapproval, express your disapproval, register your disapproval, condemn, denounce, deplore,|stem u afkeuring, druk jou afkeuring, registreer jou afkeuring, veroordeel, veroordeel, betreur,
(9) What words refer to looking at someone in a disapproving way?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na op soek na iemand in &#39;n afkeurende manier?
give someone a disapproving look, give someone a dirty look, frown, look askance,|gee iemand &#39;n afkeurende blik gee iemand &#39;n vuil kyk, frons, kyk skeef,
(10) What words describe something said in a disapproving way?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf iets gesê in &#39;n afkeurende manier?
disapproving, derogatory, pejorative,|afkeurende, neerhalende, ongunstig,
(11) What words refer to when people start to disapprove of something?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na wanneer mense begin om afkeur van iets?
fall into disrepute,|val in oneer,
Remember|Onthou
Use this domain for words referring to remembering something you know.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na onthou iets wat jy weet.
(1) What words refer to remembering something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na onthou iets?
remember, recall, remind oneself, call to mind, bring to mind, think of, recognize, recognition, recollect, review, come (back) to, mindful, heed, think, in retrospect,|onthou, onthou, jouself te herinner, te roep om gedagte, bring gedagte, dink, herken, erkenning, onthou, hersien, kom (terug) na, gedagtig, ag, dink, in retrospek,
(2) What words refer to memorizing something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die memorisering iets?
memorize, commit to memory|memoriseer, te verbind tot geheue
(3) What words refer to causing someone to think of or remember something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te dink of onthou iets?
remind, bring up, prompt, jog someone's memory, jog your mind,|herinner, bring, vinnige, draf geheue iemand se draf jou gedagtes,
(4) What words refer to something that reminds a person of something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat &#39;n mens van iets herinner?
reminder, note, memo, memorandum, cue, souvenir, memorial, remembrance,|herinnering, noot, memo, memorandum, wit, souvenir, gedenkteken, herinnering,
(5) What words refer to remembering things that happened in the past?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na onthou dinge wat gebeur het in die verlede?
reminisce, recall, think back on|onthou, onthou, dink weer op
(6) What words refer to the things a person remembers?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die dinge wat &#39;n mens onthou?
memory, recollection,|geheue, herinnering,
(7) What words refer to remembering to do something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na onthou om iets te doen?
heed, mind, mindful, respond,|Pas, verstand, gedagtig, reageer,
(8) What words refer to remembering something good?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na onthou iets goed?
cherish (a memory/thought), treasure|koester (a geheue / gedagte), skat
(9) What words refer to remembering something bad?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na onthou iets sleg?
regret, rue the day|spyt, berou die dag
Forget|Vergeet
Use this domain for words referring to forgetting something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets vergeet.
(1) What words refer to not remembering something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na nie iets om te onthou?
forget, didn't think of it, overlook, draw a blank, escape me, slip my mind, fly right out of your mind, lose your train of thought, lose track of,|vergeet nie dink, oor die hoof, trek &#39;n leë, ontsnap my glip my gedagtes, vlieg reg uit jou gedagtes, verloor jou trein van denke, die spoor van verloor nie,
(2) What words refer to failing to remember to do something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die versuim om te onthou om iets te doen?
neglect, omit, let something pass, slip, unmindful, miss|verwaarlosing, weg te laat, laat iets pass, glip, veronagsaam, mis
(3) What words describe someone who has trouble remembering?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat moeilikheid onthou het, beskryf?
forgetful, absentminded|Vergeet, absentminded
(4) What words refer to forgetting many things because of a head injury?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na vergeet baie dinge as gevolg van &#39;n kop besering?
amnesia|geheueverlies
Recognize|Erken
Use this domain for words referring to recognizing something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die erkenning van iets.
(1) What words refer to recognizing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die erkenning van iets?
distinguish, identify, know, place, realize, recognize, recognition, pick out, tell, not mistake|onderskei, te identifiseer, te ken, plek, besef, herken, erkenning, haal uit, sê, nie te verwar
(2) What words describe something that you can recognize?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat jy kan erken beskryf?
recognizable, familiar, unmistakable|herkenbaar, bekende, onmiskenbaar
(3) What words describe something that you can't recognize?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat jy nie kan erken beskryf?
unrecognizable, unfamiliar, strange, changed beyond all recognition|onherkenbaar, onbekende, vreemde, verander bo alle erkenning
Memorize|Memoriseer
Use this domain for words referring to memorizing something--to think hard about something so that you will not forget it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die memorisering iets - om hard te dink oor iets sodat jy sal dit nie vergeet nie.
(1) What words refer to memorizing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die memorisering iets?
memorize, commit to memory, make a mental note, record, remember, store,|memoriseer, te verbind tot geheue, maak &#39;n nota, rekord, onthou, winkel,
Remind|Herinner
Use this domain for words referring to reminding someone about something--to make someone remember something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na herinner iemand oor iets - om iemand te onthou iets.
(1) What words refer to reminding someone of something they must do or something they should know?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na herinner iemand van iets wat hulle moet doen, of iets wat hulle moet weet?
remind, jog someone's memory, refresh someone's memory, prompt, be a reminder, reminder,|herinner, draf geheue iemand se verfris geheue iemand se, vinnige, &#39;n herinnering, herinnering,
(2) What words refer to reminding someone of a person or something that happened in the past?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na herinner iemand van &#39;n persoon of iets wat in die verlede gebeur?
remind, be a reminder, bring back memories, take someone back, drag up, rake up, evoke, evocative, make someone think of,|herinner, &#39;n herinnering, terug te bring herinneringe, neem iemand terug, sleep op, hark up, wek, suggestief, maak iemand dink,
Expect|Verwag
Use this domain for words referring to thinking about the future.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na te dink oor die toekoms.
(1) What words refer to how a person thinks about the future?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na hoe &#39;n mens dink oor die toekoms?
expect, feel satisfied, feel dissatisfied, expect with certainty, expect uncertainly, be looking at, anticipate, await, suspense|verwag, tevrede voel, voel ontevrede, verwag met sekerheid verwag onseker, kyk na, verwag, moet wag, spanning
(2) What words refer to something that may happen in the future?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat kan gebeur in die toekoms?
expectation, prospect, possibility|verwagting, vooruitsig, moontlikheid
(3) What words refer to an expectation happening?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n verwagting gebeur?
come true, come about, be fulfilled, materialize|uitkom, kom oor, vervul, realiseer
(4) What words refer to an expectation not happening?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n verwagting nie gebeur?
not come true, fail to materialize|nie uitkom, versuim het om te realiseer
Hope|Hoop
Use this domain for words related to hoping that something will happen--to want something good to happen in the future.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die hoop dat iets sal gebeur - iets goed gebeur in die toekoms wil hê.
(1) What words refer to hoping that something good will happen in the future?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die hoop dat iets goeds sal gebeur in die toekoms?
hope, look forward to, anticipate, eagerly await, bide, desire, dream, be optimistic, wish for, fulfill hope,|hoop, sien uit daarna om, verwag, wag gretig, albei, begeerte, droom, wees optimisties, wens vir, vervul hoop,
(2) What words refer to something good that may happen in the future?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets goeds wat kan gebeur in die toekoms?
hope (n), wish (n)|hoop (n), wens (n)
Hopeless|Hopeloos
Use this domain for words related to feeling hopeless--to thinking that nothing good will happen in the future.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gevoel hopeloos - om te dink dat daar niks goeds sal gebeur in die toekoms.
(1) What words refer to feeling hopeless?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na hopeloos voel?
hopeless, lose hope, cynical, cynicism, despair, fatalistic, fatalism, pessimistic, pessimism|hopeloos, hoop verloor, sinies, sinisme, wanhoop, fatalistiese, fatalisme, pessimisties, pessimisme
Predict|Voorspel
Use this domain for words referring to predicting the future--saying what you think will happen.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die voorspelling van die toekoms - sê wat jy dink sal gebeur.
(1) What words refer to predicting what you think will happen in the future?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die voorspelling van wat jy dink sal gebeur in die toekoms?
claim, forecast, foretell, predict, prognosticate, prophesy,|eis, voorspelling, voorspel, voorspel, wyse op, profeteer,
Tendency|Neiging
Use this domain for words indicating that the speaker thinks that something tends to be a certain way.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat die spreker dink dat daar iets is geneig om &#39;n sekere manier te wees.
(1) What words indicate that the speaker thinks that something tends to be a certain way?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat die spreker dink dat daar iets is geneig om &#39;n sekere manier wees?
tend, have a tendency, lean a certain way, apt to, prone to, proclivity, predilection, bent, bias, leaning, penchant, inclination, propensity, susceptibility, likelihood, liable to, trend, drift, conducive to, leads in the direction of, dispose, incline toward, gravitate toward, likely|geneig, het &#39;n neiging, leun &#39;n sekere manier, bekwaam om te, geneig is om, neiging, voorliefde, gebuig, vooroordeel, leun, voorliefde, neiging, geneigdheid, vatbaarheid, waarskynlikheid, aanspreeklik, tendens, drywing, wat bevorderlik is vir, lei in die rigting van die wegdoen, neig na, swaartekrag na, waarskynlik
Want|Wil
Use this domain for words related to wanting something or wanting to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wil iets of wil om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to wanting something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wil iets?
want, desire, wish, long for, yearn, crave, hunger, thirst, be attracted to, fancy, have a fancy for, intent on|wil, begeerte, wens lank, smag, koester, honger, dors, aangetrokke tot, fancy, het &#39;n fancy vir, die opset op
(2) What words refer to wanting to do something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wil om iets te doen?
want to, wish you could, aspire to, feel like, hope you can, interested in, raring to, have an urge to,|wil, wens jy kon, streef daarna om, voel, hoop jy kan, wat belangstel in, slaggereed om, het &#39;n drang om,
(3) What words refer to something someone wants?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand wil hê?
want (n), desire (n), wish (n), longing, yearning, craving, mania, obsession,|wil (n), begeerte (n), wens (n), verlange, hunkering, drang, manie, obsessie,
(4) What words describe something that people want?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat mense wil beskryf?
desirable,|wenslik,
(5) What words describe something that people don't want?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat mense nie wil beskryf?
unwanted, undesirable,|ongewenste, ongewenste,
Decide, plan|Besluit, beplan
Use this domain for words related to deciding to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die besluit om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to deciding to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die besluit om iets te doen?
decide, decide on, decide against, choose, plan, conclude that, determine your course, strategize|besluit, besluit op besluit teen, kies, plan, aflei dat, bepaal jou natuurlik strategize
(2) What words refer to what is decided?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat besluit?
decision, choice, plan, course, strategy|besluit, keuse, plan, natuurlik, strategie
Purpose, goal|Doel, doelwit
Use this domain for words referring to a goal--something that you want to do or something that you want to happen.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n doel - iets wat jy wil doen of iets wat jy wil hê moet gebeur.
(1) What words refer to the purpose of what you are doing?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die doel van wat jy doen?
purpose, goal, aim (n), design (n), desire (n), destination, end, function, idea, intent, intention, object, objective, plan, the point, proposal, reason, target, use (n),|doel, doel, doel (n), ontwerp (N), begeerte (n), bestemming, einde, funksie, idee, voorneme, voorneme, voorwerp, objektiewe, plan, die punt, voorstel, rede, teiken, gebruik (N) ,
(2) What words refer to the purpose of something someone says?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die doel van iets of iemand sê?
point, implication, mean, be driving at, be trying to say,|punt, implikasie, beteken, ry op, probeer om te sê,
(3) What words refer to the purpose of something like a machine or tool?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die doel van iets soos &#39;n masjien of instrument?
function, use,|funksie, gebruik,
(4) What words indicate the purpose of something?|(4) Watter woorde dui die doel van iets?
for, be for, for the sake of, serve to, so, so that, to, toward, with a view to, with the aim of,|Want vir, ter wille van die, dien, so, sodat, na, na, met die oog op, met die doel om,
(5) What words indicate that something is done or made for a particular purpose?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedoen word of vir &#39;n spesifieke doel?
be meant to do something, supposed to do something, be intended to do something, be designed to do something,|word bedoel om iets te doen, veronderstel om iets te doen, word bedoel om iets te doen, word ontwerp om iets te doen,
(6) What words refer to trying to reach a goal?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om &#39;n doel te bereik?
to strive toward a goal, press on, aim for, endeavor, head for, try to accomplish,|om te streef na &#39;n doel, druk op, mik vir, strewe, hoof vir, probeer om te bereik,
(7) What words refer to reaching a goal?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die bereiking van &#39;n doel?
reach, attain, surpass|bereik, te bereik, oortref
(8) What words refer to failing to reach a goal?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die versuim om &#39;n doel te bereik?
fail to reach, miss, fall short of|versuim om te bereik, mis, val kort van die
(9) What words refer to not having any purpose?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na nie met enige doel?
purposeless, without purpose, lack a goal, aimless, drifting, no direction,|doellose, sonder doel, &#39;n gebrek aan &#39;n doel, doellose, dryf, geen rigting,
Choose|Kies
Use this domain for words related to choosing something--to want one thing (or person) from a group of things, or to choose to do one thing from several possible things you could do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die keuse van iets - een ding (of persoon) wil van &#39;n groep van die dinge, of om te kies om een ​​ding te doen van verskeie moontlike dinge wat jy kan doen.
(1) What words refer to choosing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets keuse?
choose, select, prefer, decide on, pick, designate, elect, favor, opt for, specify, vote, would rather have|kies, kies, verkies, besluit op, pluk, aanwys, verkies, guns, kies vir, spesifiseer, stem, sou eerder
(2) What words refer to the thing that is chosen?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die ding wat gekies word?
choice, selection, preference, decision|keuse, seleksie, voorkeur, besluit
(3) What words refer to the things that could be chosen?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die dinge wat kan gekies word?
alternative, option, selection, candidate|alternatiewe opsie, seleksie, kandidaat
Cast lots|Lot gewerp
Use this domain for words referring to casting lots--to make a decision by chance.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die lot te werp - om &#39;n besluit deur die kans te maak.
(1) What is the general term for making a decision by chance?|(1) Wat is die algemene term vir &#39;n besluit deur die kans?
cast lots [in English and many languages there isn't a generic term; 'cast lots' is archaic]|gewerp [in Engels en baie tale is daar nie &#39;n generiese term; &#39;Gewerp&#39; is argaïes]
(2) What methods are used for making a decision by chance?|(2) Watter metodes word gebruik vir die maak van &#39;n besluit deur die kans?
roll a die, flip a coin, draw straws, pick names out of a hat, rock-paper-scissors, pick a card (out of a deck), count off, decide who goes first|rol van &#39;n dobbelsteentjie Flip a Coin, teken strooitjies, name te kies uit &#39;n hoed, rock-papier-skêr, haal &#39;n kaart (uit &#39;n pak), tel af, besluit wie eerste gaan
(3) What kind of decisions are made by these methods?|(3) Watter soort besluite word gemaak deur hierdie metodes?
deciding who goes first in a game, deciding who dies (e.g. who gets the life preserver), deciding who is guilty|besluit wie eerste gaan in &#39;n wedstryd, besluit wat sterf (bv wat die reddingsboei kry), besluit wat skuldig is aan
(4) What do people say when a decision has been made?|(4) Wat sê die mense toe &#39;n besluit geneem is?
X team has won the toss. OK, John goes first. I win. The Lord's will be done. It is the will of the gods. The gods have spoken.|X-span het die loot gewen het. OK, John gaan eerste. Ek wen. Die Here se wil sal geskied. Dit is die wil van die gode. Die gode het gepraat.
(5) What is the validating principle behind these methods?|(5) Wat is die bekragtiging van beginsel agter hierdie metodes?
fate, chance, God's will, social consensus|lot, kans, God se wil, sosiale konsensus
Intend|Plan
Use this domain for words related to intending to do something--to do something intentionally and not by accident.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met voornemens is om iets te doen - om opsetlik en nie iets te doen deur &#39;n ongeluk.
(1) What words refer to intending to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na voorneme is om iets te doen?
intend, aim, expect, mean to do something, plan, purpose, resolve, be set on,|beoog, doel, verwag, beteken om iets te doen, plan, doel, los, ingestel word op,
(2) What words refer to what is intended?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat bedoel is?
intent, intention, impulse, aim, purpose, resolution|bedoeling, voorneme, impuls, doel, doel, resolusie
(3) What words describe something that someone intended to do?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat iemand bedoel om te doen, beskryf?
intentional, intentionally, on purpose, because I wanted to|opsetlike, opsetlik, doelbewus, want ek wou
Deliberately|Doelbewus
Use this domain for words related to doing something deliberately--to intend to do something, as opposed to doing something accidentally.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets te doen doelbewus - om van plan is om iets te doen, eerder as om iets te doen ongeluk.
(1) What words refer to doing something deliberately?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen doelbewus?
deliberately, on purpose, intentionally, pointedly, make a point of, knowingly, consciously, willfully, mean to do something|doelbewus, met &#39;n doel, opsetlik, opvallend, maak &#39;n punt van, willens en wetens, bewustelik, opsetlik, beteken om iets te doen
(2) What words describe something that is done deliberately?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat doelbewus gedoen beskryf?
deliberate, intentional, conscious, calculated, premeditated|doelbewuste, opsetlike, doelbewuste, bereken, voorbedagte
(3) What words refer to not doing something deliberately?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na nie iets doelbewus doen?
accidentally, by accident, by mistake, unintentionally, not mean to do something, inadvertently, unconsciously|ongeluk, deur &#39;n ongeluk, per ongeluk, sonder opset, nie bedoel om iets te doen, per ongeluk, onbewustelik
(4) What words describe something that is not done deliberately?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat nie doelbewus gedoen beskryf?
accidental, unintentional, unconscious, involuntary|toevallige, onbedoelde, bewusteloos, onwillekeurige
Determined|Bepaal
Use this domain for words related to being determined to do something--deciding to do something and not letting anything stop you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat vasbeslote om iets te doen - besluit om iets te doen en niks laat stop jy.
(1) What words refer to being determined to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na bepaal word om iets te doen?
determined, aspire, be intent on, be set on, set your mind on, be resolved, mean business, purposefully, tenacious, put yourself into,|bepaal, streef, die voorneme, ingestel word op, rig jou gedagtes op, word opgelos, bedoel besigheid, doelgerig, taai, sit jouself in,
(2) What words describe a person who is determined?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat bepaal word?
determined, adamant, committed, driven, hard headed, inexorable, inflexible, obdurate, persevering, pertinacious, single-minded, steadfast, strong-willed, stubborn, tenacious,  uncompromising,|bepaal, vasbeslote, gepleeg het, gedryf, hard hoof, onverbiddelike, onbuigsaam, verstok, volhard, hardnekkige, single-minded, standvastig, sterk-wou, hardkoppig, taai, onwrikbare,
(3) What words describe a person's behavior that is determined?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf n persoon se gedrag wat bepaal word?
stubborn, steadfast, resolute, dogged, wholehearted,|hardkoppig, standvastig, vasberade, geteister, heelhartige,
(4) What words refer to being so determined that you are even willing to do something bad?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die feit dat so vasbeslote dat jy is selfs bereid om iets sleg te doen?
go to any lengths, be hell-bent on, whatever the cost, ruthless, stop at nothing|gaan na enige lengtes, wees hel gebuig oor, ongeag die koste, genadeloos, stop by niks
(5) What words refer to the quality of being determined?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die gehalte van die bepaal word?
determination, ambition, commitment, drive, endurance, perseverance, pertinacity, resolve, spirit, fighting spirit, steadfastness, stick-to-itiveness, tenacity, will, willpower,|bepaling, ambisie, toewyding, ry, uithouvermoë, volharding, volharding, los, gees, veggees, standvastigheid, hou-tot-itiveness, volharding, sal, wilskrag,
(6) What words refer to becoming more determined?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na meer vasbeslote?
stiffen your resolve, set your mind on, commit,|verhard julle los, stel jou gedagtes op, pleeg,
(7) What words refer to persevering in a task?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na volhard in &#39;n taak?
persevere, give it your best, keep on, hang in there, endure, persist, plod, plug,|volhard, gee dit jou beste, hou op, hang in there, verduur, voortduur, gezwoeg, plug,
(8) What words refer to not being determined?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na nie bepaal?
apathetic, indifference, indifferent, listless, lethargic, neutral, nonchalant, uncaring,|apaties, onverskilligheid, onverskillig, lusteloos, lomerig, neutraal, nonchalant, hartelose,
Stubborn|Hardnekkige
Use this domain for words related to being stubborn--to be unwilling to change a decision; to be unwilling to do something someone wants you to do; or to do what you want to do, even though other people do not want you to do it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met hardkoppig - onwillig om &#39;n besluit te verander om te wees; onwillig om iets of iemand te kan doen wil hê jy moet doen; of om te doen wat jy wil doen, selfs al is die ander mense wil nie hê jy om dit te doen.
(1) What words describe someone who is stubborn?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat hardkoppig beskryf?
stubborn, adamant, bull-headed, conservative, dogged, enduring, hardened, hardheaded, headstrong, immovable, impenitent, incorrigible, indomitable, inflexible, intractable, mulish, obdurate, obstinate, persistent, pig-headed, recalcitrant, relentless, stiff-necked, strong-willed, stubborn, as stubborn as a mule, tenacious, unbending, uncompromising, ungovernable, unmanageable, unrepentant, unyielding, willful,|hardkoppig, vasbeslote, onbesuisd, konserwatiewe, geteister, blywende, geharde, hardkoppig, roekeloos, onbeweeglik, onbekeerlike, onverbeterlike, ontembaar, onbuigsaam, onregeerbaar, weerspannig, verstok, verstok, volgehoue, halsstarrige, weerspannige, meedoënlose, stiff- nek, &#39;n sterk-wou, hardkoppig, as hardkoppig as &#39;n muil, taai, onbuigbare, onwrikbare, onregeerbaar, onbeheerbaar, onbekeerlike, onwrikbare, opsetlike,
(2) What words refer to a stubborn person?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n hardnekkige persoon?
stubborn fool, mule, bulldog,|hardnekkige dwaas, muile, bulldog,
(3) What words refer to being stubborn?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hardkoppig?
refuse to obey/listen, won't listen to reason, stick to your guns,|weier om te gehoorsaam / luister nie, sal nie na rede luister nie, hou by jou gewere,
(4) What words refer to the quality of being stubborn?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die hardnekkige?
stubbornness, inflexibility, obstinacy, tenacity, stick-to-itiveness|hardkoppigheid, onbuigsaamheid, koppigheid, volharding, hou-tot-itiveness
Lust|Lust
Use this domain for words related to lusting for something--to want something bad or forbidden.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met lus bevang vir iets - iets sleg of verbode wil.
(1) What words refer to lusting for something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na begerige vir iets?

Request|Versoek
Use this domain for words related to requesting something--to ask for something, or ask someone to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die versoek om iets - om te vra vir iets, of iemand vra om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to saying something in order to acquire something from the other person?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets om iets van die ander persoon verkry sê?
request, make a request, ask for something, ask somebody to do something, appeal, make an appeal, petition, requisition, solicit, apply, consult,|versoek, &#39;n versoek, vra vir iets, vra iemand om iets te doen, appèl, maak &#39;n appèl, petisie, rekwisisie, werf, toe te pas, te raadpleeg,
(2) What words refer to what is said when someone makes a request?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word wanneer iemand &#39;n versoek maak?
appeal (n), petition (n), request (n), solicitation, question|appèl (n), petisie (n), versoek (n), werwing, vraag
(3) What words refer to a person who makes a request?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n versoek maak?
petitioner, suppliant|ster, smekeling
(4) What special words do people use when they want to make a polite request?|(4) Watter spesiale woorde nie mense gebruik wanneer hulle wil &#39;n beleefde versoek?
please, if you wouldn't mind, would you mind?|asseblief, as jy nie sou omgee, sal jy omgee?
(5) What words refer to asking for something when you are desperate to get it?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na vra vir iets wanneer jy desperaat om dit te kry is?
implore, plead, beseech, entreat, importune|smeek, pleit, smeek, smeek, lastig
(6) What words refer to what is said when a person pleads?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word wanneer &#39;n persoon pleit?
plea, entreaty|pleidooi, smeking
(7) What words describe a person who pleads?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat pleit?
importunate|opdringerige
Agree to do something|Instem om iets te doen
Use this domain for words related to agreeing to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met stem om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to agreeing to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die stem om iets te doen?
agree to do something, accept, approve a plan, consent to, give your consent, grant someone's request, jump at the chance, jump at the opportunity, OK something, give your OK, say yes, give something the thumbs up, take on,|instem om iets te doen, te aanvaar, &#39;n plan, toestemming om, gee jou toestemming te keur, versoek iemand se verleen, spring op die kans, spring op die geleentheid, OK iets, gee jou OK, sê ja, gee iets wat die thumbs up, neem op ,
(2) What words refer to the act of agreeing to do something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die daad van stem om iets te doen?
agreement, consent,|ooreenkoms, toestemming,
(3) What do people say when they agree to do something?|(3) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle saamstem om iets te doen?
All right, Yes you can, Sure, Of course, Help yourself, Be my guest,|Alle reg, Ja, jy kan, Sure, natuurlik, Help jouself, wees my gas,
(4) What words indicate that you are doing something that someone has asked you to do?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat jy iets wat iemand jou vra om te doen doen?
at someone's request, at the request of,|op versoek van iemand se, op die versoek van,
(5) What words refer to agreeing to do something after first refusing?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die stem om iets te doen na eerste weiering?
give in, bow to, accede to,|gee, buig, nader aan,
Refuse to do something|Weier om iets te doen
Use this domain for words related to refusing to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die weiering om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to refusing to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die weiering om iets te doen?
refuse, refusal, flatly refuse, refuse point-blank, not agree to, will not, say no, decline, shake your head, turn down, dig your heels in, slam the door in someone's face, draw the line at, have none of|weier, weiering, botweg weier botweg weier, nie eens te word, sal nie, sê nee, agteruitgang, skud jou kop, draai af, grawe jou hakke in, klap die deur in iemand se gesig, trek die lyn op, het geen van
(2) What do people say when they refuse to do something?|(2) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle weier om iets te doen?
not likely, nothing doing, no way, and that's that|waarskynlik nie, doen niks, geen manier, en dit is dat
(3) What words refer to refusing to give something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die weiering om iets te gee?
refuse, deny, withhold|vullis, ontken, weerhou
Intercede|Voorbidding
Use this domain for words related to interceding for someone--to say something to someone because you want them to do something good for someone else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met intree vir iemand - om iets vir iemand te sê nie, want jy wil hê hulle moet iets goed vir iemand anders te doen.
(1) What words refer to requesting that someone do something for someone else?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die versoek dat iemand iets te doen vir iemand anders?
intercede, intercession, intercessory, intervene on behalf of, interpose, mediate|intree, voorbidding intersessie, op te tree namens, tussen plekke, bemiddel
(2) What words refer to a person who intercedes?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat intree?
intercessor, go-between, intermediary, mediator, peacemaker|bemiddelaar, go-tussen, tussenganger, bemiddelaar, vredemaker
Willing|Bereid
Use this domain for words related to being willing to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat bereid is om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to being willing to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat bereid is om iets te doen?
willing, acquiescent, agreeable, compliant, disposed, fain, free, game, kindly, morale, offer, readily, ready, ungrudging, volition, volitional, voluntary, volunteer, will, willful|gewillig, gunstige, aangenaam, voldoen nie, van die hand gesit, Fain, gratis, spel, vriendelik, moraal, aanbod, geredelik, gereed, harte gegee, wilskrag, wils kragtig, vrywillige, vrywilliger, sal, opsetlike
(2) What words refer to being unwilling to do something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na onwillig om iets te doen?
