Influence|Invloed
Use this domain for words related to influencing someone--to do something because you want someone to change his thinking.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met beïnvloed iemand - om iets te doen omdat jy wil iemand om sy denke te verander.
(1) What words refer to influencing someone to change his thinking or decision?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand te beïnvloed om sy denke of besluit verander?
influence, sway, bias, pull strings, work on, affect, impact, make an impression on, prejudice, bribe, bring into line, lead by the nose|invloed, swaai, vooroordeel, trek snare, werk, raak, impak, maak &#39;n indruk op, vooroordeel, omkoopgeld, bring in lyn, gelei deur die neus
(2) What words refer to your ability to change another's mind or decision?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na jou vermoë om &#39;n ander se gedagtes of besluit verander?
have influence, be influential, carry weight, have a hold on|het invloed, wees invloedryke, dra gewig, het &#39;n houvas op
(3) What words refer to the influence you have on another's mind or decision?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die invloed wat jy op &#39;n ander se gedagtes of besluit?
influence, impact, weight, pressure, power, sway, control, leverage, pull|invloed, impak, gewig, druk, krag, mag, beheer, hefboom, trek
(4) What words describe a person who has influence?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat invloed het?
influential|invloedryke
Suggest|Stel
Use this domain for words referring to suggesting something--saying that something might be good.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets wat daarop dui - sê dat iets goed kan wees.
(1) What words refer to suggesting something to someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na suggereer iets vir iemand?
suggest, make a suggestion, float, recommend, propose, propound, submit|stel, maak &#39;n voorstel, float, beveel aan, stel voor: Gee voorlê
(2) What words refer to formally suggesting something to a person in authority?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na formeel iets aan &#39;n persoon in gesag suggereer?
propose, recommend, put forward, put something before someone, submit, present,|stel, beveel aan, na vore gebring, sit iets voordat iemand voorlê, teenwoordig is,
(3) What words do people use when suggesting something?|(3) Watter woorde mense gebruik wanneer suggereer iets?
I suggest, can I suggest, can I make a suggestion, let's, how about, what about, why don't you, you could always, we may as well, we might as well,|Ek stel voor, ek kan raai, kan ek &#39;n voorstel, laat, hoe, wat oor, waarom doen jy nie, kan jy altyd ons kan so goed, ons kan net so goed,
(4) What words refer to suggesting someone for a job?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat daarop dui vir &#39;n werk?
suggest, recommend, nominate, propose, put someone's name forward,|stel, beveel aan, benoem, stel voor, sit iemand se naam vorentoe,
(5) What words refer to something that someone suggests?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat iemand suggereer?
suggestion, proposal, recommendation, proposition, submission|voorstel, voorstel, aanbeveling, voorstel, voorlegging
Advise|Adviseer
Use this domain for words referring to giving someone advice or counsel, for instance recommending a wise course of action.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die gee van iemand advies of raad, byvoorbeeld beveel &#39;n wyse plan van aksie.
(1) What words refer to giving someone advice?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gee van iemand raad?
advise, say someone should do something, give advice, recommend, urge, offer advice, advocate, commend, counsel, present, promote, propose, recommend a course of action, guide, instruct, submit, make a motion, exhort,|adviseer, sê as iemand iets te doen, gee raad, beveel aan, drang, bied advies, advokaat, beveel, raad, hede, te bevorder, stel voor, &#39;n plan van aksie, gids, onderrig, indien nie, maak &#39;n beweging, vermaan,
(2) What words do people use when giving advice?|(2) Watter woorde mense gebruik wanneer die gee van advies?
if I were you, you should do something, you ought to, you'd be better off, take my advice, take it from me, you'd be well advised to do something, on no account, you'd better, I would,|as ek jy was, moet jy iets doen, jy behoort te, sou jy beter af wees, neem my advies, neem dit van my, jy wil ook aangeraai word om iets te doen, op geen rekening, jy beter, ek sou,
(3) What words refer to asking for advice?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vra vir advies?
ask someone's advice, seek advice, consult, ask for advice, request advice, turn to for advice,|vra raad iemand se raad vra, raadpleeg, vra vir raad, vra raad, draai om vir raad,
(4) What words refer to doing what someone advises?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na doen wat iemand beveel?
take someone's advice, follow someone's advice, listen to advice, act on someone's advice, accept advice, adopt,|neem advies iemand se raad volg iemand se, luister na raad, tree op advies van iemand se aanvaar advies, neem,
(5) What words refer to the advice that a person gives?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die raad wat &#39;n persoon gee?
advice, tip, recommendation, guidance, counseling, counsel, instructions, idea, proposal, charge,|advies, tip, aanbeveling, leiding, berading, raad, instruksies, idee, voorstel, vra,
(6) What words refer to someone who gives advice?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat raad gee?
advisor, counselor, consultant, guru, mentor, coach,|adviseur, berader, konsultant, guru, mentor, afrigter,
(7) What words refer to a group of people who give advice?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep mense wat raad gee?
council, board, committee, advisory (board),|raad, raad, komitee, raadgewende (raad),
(8) What words refer to needing advice?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die behoefte advies?
need advice, don't know what to do,|advies nodig, weet nie wat om te doen nie,
(9) What words refer to not knowing what to advise?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na wat nie weet wat om te adviseer?
don't know what to tell you|weet nie wat om te sê
(10) What words refer to not accepting advice?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die nie aanvaar advies?
refuse advice, ignore advice|weier advies, raad te ignoreer
(11) What words refer to giving advice when the person doesn't want it?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die gee van advies wanneer die persoon nie wil hê?
meddle, kibitz, kibitzer,|meng, kibitz, kibitzer,
(12) What words describe good or bad advice?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf goeie of slegte raad?
good, wise, bad, bum steer, advisable, helpful, constructive, positive,|goeie, wyse, sleg, bum stuur, raadsaam, hulpvaardig, konstruktiewe, positiewe,
Persuade|Oorreed
Use this domain for words related to persuading someone--to try to get someone to do something or to change his thinking.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met oorreed iemand - om te probeer om iemand om iets te doen of om sy denke te verander te kry.
(1) What words refer to trying to persuade someone to change his thinking or decision?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om iemand te oorreed om sy denke of besluit verander?
advocate, promote, persuade, convince, encourage, encouragement, urge, sway|advokaat, te bevorder, te oorreed, oortuig, moedig, aanmoediging, drang, mag
(2) What words describe a person who can persuade others?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat ander kan oortuig?
convincing, persuasive|oortuigend, oortuigende
(3) What words refer to someone being persuaded to change his thinking or decision?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat oortuig om sy denke of besluit verander?
come around to (someone's) view, see it (someone's) way, be won over|kom om te (iemand se) mening, dit sien (iemand se) manier, word gewen
(4) What words refer to persuading someone not to do something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na oorreed iemand nie om iets te doen?
dissuade|weerhou
Insist|Dring
Use this domain for words related to insisting--to say strongly or repeatedly that someone must do something, because the other person does not want to do it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dring - te sterk of herhaaldelik sê dat iemand iets moet doen, want die ander persoon nie wil hê om dit te doen.
(1) What words refer to insisting that someone do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na aan te dring dat iemand iets te doen?
insist, be insistent, at someone's insistence, put your foot down, demand, be adamant, won't take no for an answer, won't hear of, maintain, be resolute|aandring, word aanhoudend, by iemand se aandrang, sit jou voet neer, vraag, wees vasberade, sal nie nee vir &#39;n antwoord nie, sal nie hoor, in stand te hou, wees vasberade
(2) What words describe a person who insists?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat daarop aandring?
insistent, importunate, resolute|aanhoudend, lastig, vasberade
Compel|Dwing
Use this domain for words related to compelling someone to do something--to cause or force someone to do something that they do not want to do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dwingende iemand om iets te doen - om te veroorsaak of iemand te dwing om iets wat hulle nie wil doen nie.
(1) What words refer to forcing someone to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dwing iemand om iets te doen?
compel, blackmail, browbeat, bully (v), coerce, constrain, drive, force someone to do something, use force, force something on, insist, impel, impose your will on, make someone do something, oblige, press, pressure, put pressure on, push, use strong-arm tactics, use strong-arm methods, under duress, be breathing down someone's neck,|dwing, afpersing, donder, boelie (v), dwing, dwing, ry, iemand te dwing om iets te doen, geweld gebruik, iets te dwing op, aandring, voortdrĳven, dwing jou wil op, maak iemand iets te doen, dwing, druk, druk, druk op, stoot, gebruik &#39;n sterk-arm taktiek, gebruik &#39;n sterk-arm metodes, onder dwang, wees blaas iemand se nek,
(2) What words refer to a situation forcing someone to do something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n situasie dwing iemand om iets te doen?
force, make someone do something, drive, compel someone to do something, leave someone with no choice, leave someone with no option, be condemned to,|krag, maak iemand iets te doen, ry, dwing iemand om iets te doen, iemand verlaat met geen keuse nie, iemand verlaat met geen ander keuse, word veroordeel tot,
(3) What words refer to forcing someone to accept something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na dwing iemand om iets te aanvaar?
force something on, impose, inflict something on,|iets op te dwing, op te lê, veroorsaak iets,
(4) What words refer to the act of forcing someone to do something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die daad van dwing iemand om iets te doen?
compulsion,|dwang,
(5) What words describe something that someone is forced to do?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat iemand gedwing word om te doen, beskryf?
forcible (eviction), forcibly, compulsory (education),|kragdadige (uitsetting), geweld, verpligte (onderwys),
(6) What words refer to something someone does in order to force someone to do something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand doen om iemand te dwing om iets te doen?
coercion, pressure, high-pressure tactics, strong-arm tactics,|dwang, druk, hoë-druk taktiek, sterk-arm taktiek,
(7) What words refer to someone who forces people to do things?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat mense dwing om dinge te doen?
bully,|boelie,
(8) What words describe someone who forces people to do things?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat mense dwing om dinge te doen?
bossy, coercive, pushy|baasspelerig, dwang, opdringerig
Control|Beheer
Use this domain for words related to controlling someone--to force someone to do what you want them to do by ordering them to do it, or by doing something so that they have no choice. Also use this domain for words related to controlling something, for instance to control a machine, so that it does what you want it to do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die beheer van iemand - om iemand te dwing om te doen wat jy wil hê hulle moet doen deur die bestel van hulle om dit te doen, of deur iets te doen sodat hulle geen keuse nie. Gebruik ook hierdie domein vir woorde in verband met die beheer van iets, byvoorbeeld om &#39;n masjien te beheer, sodat dit doen wat jy wil om dit te doen.
(1) What words refer to controlling someone or something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die beheer van iemand of iets?
control, be in control, manipulate, pull strings, call the shots, be in the driver's seat, steer, regulate, govern, dominate, monopolize, have a monopoly, have a stranglehold, have a hold over, wrap someone around your finger, hold sway, be the boss, be domineering, oppress, keep someone down, repress, walk all over|beheer, in beheer te wees, te manipuleer, trek snare, bel die skote, in die bestuurder se sitplek, stuur, te reguleer, te regeer, oorheers, monopoliseer, het &#39;n monopolie, het &#39;n wurggreep, het &#39;n hou oor, draai iemand rondom jou vinger, hou swaai, is die baas, wees dominerende, onderdruk, hou iemand af, onderdruk, loop oor
(2) What words refer to being under someone's control?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat onder iemand se beheer?
be under someone's control, be in someone's power, be under someone's spell, be at someone's mercy, be a doormat|onder iemand se beheer, in iemand se krag, onder iemand se spel, by iemand se genade, &#39;n deurmat
Warn|Waarsku
Use this domain for words related to warning someone--saying something to someone so that he will not do something bad.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die waarskuwing iemand - sê iets vir iemand so dat hy nie iets sleg sal doen.
(1) What words refer to warning someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die waarskuwing iemand?
warn, forewarn, admonish, advise against, discourage someone from doing something, dissuade,|waarsku, waarsku, vermaan, te adviseer teen, om iets te doen ontmoedig iemand weerhou,
(2) What words refer to what is said when someone is warning someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word wanneer iemand waarsku iemand?
warning, admonition, alarm, alert, caution, caveat, discouragement, forewarning|waarskuwing, vermaning, alarm, waarskuwing, versigtigheid, caveat, moedeloosheid, forewarning
(3) What words describe something that should not be done?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie gedoen moet word, beskryf?
inadvisable,|onraadsaam,
(4) What words refer to something that makes a sound to warn people?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat &#39;n klank om mense te waarsku maak?
alarm, bell, buzzer,|alarm, klok, sirene,
Threaten|Dreig
Use this domain for words related to threatening someone--to say that you will do something bad to someone if they don't do what you want them to do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dreig iemand - om te sê dat jy iets sleg sal doen om iemand as hulle nie doen wat jy wil hê hulle moet doen.
(1) What words refer to threatening someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dreig iemand?
threaten, menace, intimidate, terrorize, frighten, cow, bully, browbeat, blackmail, extort, warn|dreig, bedreiging, intimideer, te terroriseer, skrik, koei, boelie, donder, afpersing, ontwringen, waarsku
(2) What words refer to the act of threatening or to what is said?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die daad van dreigende of wat gesê?
threat, menace, intimidation, terrorism, blackmail, extortion, warning|bedreiging, gevaar, intimidasie, terrorisme, afpersing, afpersing, waarskuwing
(3) What words describe a person who threatens?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat dreig?
threatening, menacing, intimidating, bullying|dreigend, dreigende, intimiderend, boelies
(4) What words refer to a person who threatens?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat dreig?
bully, terrorist, blackmailer, extortionist|boelie, terroriste, afperser, afperser
Ask permission|Vra toestemming
Use this domain for words related to asking permission to do something. This domain is part of a scenario: You have authority over me. I want to do something. I ask you for permission to do it. You give permission or refuse permission. I obey you or disobey you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vra toestemming om iets te doen. Dit domein is deel van &#39;n scenario: Jy het gesag oor my. Ek wil om iets te doen. Ek vra jou toestemming om dit te doen. Jy gee toestemming of toestemming weier. Ek gehoorsaam of ongehoorsaam jou.
(1) What words refer to asking permission to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vra toestemming om iets te doen?
ask, ask someone's permission|vra, vra toestemming iemand se
(2) What words do people use when they are asking permission to do something?|(2) Watter woorde mense gebruik wanneer hulle vra toestemming om iets te doen?
can I, may I, do you mind if, would you mind if, is it all right if,|Ek kan nie, kan ek, het jy omgee as, sal jy omgee as, is dit reg as,
Give permission|Toestemming gee
Use this domain for words related to giving someone permission to do something. This domain is about a scenario: You have authority over me. I want to do something. I ask you for permission to do it. You give permission or refuse permission.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gee iemand toestemming om iets te doen. Dit domein is oor &#39;n scenario: Jy het gesag oor my. Ek wil om iets te doen. Ek vra jou toestemming om dit te doen. Jy gee toestemming of toestemming weier.
(1) What words refer to giving someone permission to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gee van iemand toestemming om iets te doen?
give permission, agree to, allow, authorize, consent to, give your consent, grant permission, let, permit, say someone can do something, not stand in someone's way, sanction, suffer, give someone the go-ahead, okay something, give someone the green light, give leave,|toestemming gee, instem om, toe te laat, magtig, toestemming om, gee jou toestemming, toestemming, laat, permit, sê iemand kan iets doen, staan ​​nie in iemand se manier, straf, ly aan iemand gee die groen lig, okay iets, gee iemand die groen lig gee verlof,
(2) What words do people use when they give someone permission?|(2) Watter woorde mense gebruik wanneer hulle gee iemand toestemming?
go ahead, be my guest, feel free, help yourself,|gaan voort, wees my gas, voel vry, help jouself,
(3) What words refer to being allowed to do something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hulle toegelaat word om iets te doen?
get permission, can, be allowed, be free to do something, may,|kry toestemming, kan toegelaat word, vry wees om iets te doen, kan,
(4) What words refer to allowing something to happen by not making any effort to prevent it?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na toelaat iets om te gebeur deur nie enige poging om dit te verhoed?
let, allow, not stand in someone's way, unchecked,|laat, te laat, staan ​​nie in iemand se manier, ongemerk,
(5) What words refer to allowing someone to do whatever they want?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na toelaat om iemand te doen wat hulle wil?
give someone complete freedom, give someone a free hand, give someone carte blanche, give someone the run of,|gee iemand volledige vryheid, gee iemand &#39;n vrye hand, gee iemand carte blanche gee iemand die loop van,
(6) What words refer to permission to do something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na toestemming om iets te doen?
permission, authorization, consent, clearance, someone's say-so, license, green light, the okay, the go-ahead,|toestemming, magtiging, toestemming, goedkeuring, iemand sê-so, lisensie, groen lig, die okay, die go-ahead,
(7) What words refer to an official document that gives someone permission to do something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n amptelike dokument wat iemand toestemming om iets te doen gee?
permit, license, warrant,|permit, lisensie, lasbrief,
(8) What words refer to giving someone permission to do something that is not usually allowed?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die gee van iemand toestemming om iets wat nie gewoonlik toegelaat te doen?
bend the rules, make an exception, concession, excuse, exempt, waive,|buig die reëls, maak &#39;n uitsondering, toegewing, verskoning, vrygestel, afstand te doen,
(9) What words describe something that people are allowed to do?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat mense toegelaat word om te doen, beskryf?
be allowed, allowable, permissible, acceptable,|toegelaat word, toelaatbaar, toelaatbaar is, aanvaarbaar is,
Refuse permission|Toestemming weier
Use this domain for words related to refusing to permit someone to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die weiering om iemand om iets te doen laat.
(1) What words refer to refusing to give someone permission to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die weiering om iemand toestemming om iets te doen?
refuse permission, deny permission, forbid, prohibit,|toestemming weier, toestemming weier, verbied, verbied,
Exempt|Vrygestel
Use this domain for words related to being exempt from a law or obligation.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat vrygestel van &#39;n wet of verpligting.
(1) What words refer to being exempt from a law or obligation?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na synde vrygestel van &#39;n wet of verpligting?
exempt, free, not bound by, not answerable to, immune from prosecution, privileged, excused|vrygestel, gratis, nie gebind deur, nie skuldig aan, immuun teen vervolging, bevoorregte, verskoon
Prevent|Voorkom
Use this domain for words related to preventing someone from doing something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die voorkoming van iemand om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to preventing someone from doing something.|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die voorkoming van iemand om iets te doen.
prevent someone from, keep someone from, avert, avoid, check, frustrate, nip in the bud, obviate, pre-empt, pre-emption, prevention, prohibit, stave off, stop, stopping, constrain, impose, hinder, impede, limit, overcome, prevail,|iemand uit te voorkom, hou iemand uit, voorkom, vermy, gaan, belemmer nip in die kiem, ondervang, pre te spring, voorkoopreg, voorkoming, verbied, verhoed, stop, stop, dwing, op te lê, verhinder, belemmer, limiet, te oorkom, oorweldig,
(2) What words refer to something that prevents someone from doing something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand om iets te doen verhoed?
check, constraint, impediment, limitation, restriction,|kyk, beperking, belemmering, beperking,,
Free to do what you want|Vry om te doen wat jy wil hê
Use this domain for words related to freedom--when you can do the things that you want to do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vryheid - wanneer jy die dinge wat jy wil doen kan doen.
(1) What words refer to being free to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vry om iets te doen?
free, freely, be at liberty to do something|vry, vry, vry wees om iets te doen
(2) What words describe a person who is free?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat vry?
free, freedman, liberated, freeborn, freeman|gratis, vrygemaakte, bevry, vrygebore, vryman
(3) What words describe an activity that is free?|(3) Watter woorde &#39;n aktiwiteit wat vry is beskryf?
free, open, open-ended, unrestricted|vry, oop, oop, onbeperkte
(4) What words refer to the state or right to be free?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die staat of reg om vry te wees?
freedom, liberty, autonomy, latitude, license, scope,|vryheid, vryheid, outonomie, breedte, lisensie, omvang,
(5) What words refer to becoming free?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na besig vry?
gain your freedom, gain your liberty, win your freedom|kry jou vryheid, kry jou vryheid, wen jou vryheid
(6) What words refer to freeing someone?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na bevry iemand?
free someone, set free, liberate, emancipate|free iemand bevry, bevry, bevry
Offer|Aanbod
Use this domain for words related to offering to do something for someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die aanbied van om iets vir iemand te doen.
(1) What words refer to offering to do something for someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aanbied om iets vir iemand te doen?
offer to do something (for someone), volunteer, come forward, let me, proffer, tender, make an overture,|aanbod om iets te doen (vir iemand), vrywilliger, kom vorentoe, laat my, proffer, tender, maak &#39;n ouverture,
(2) What words refer to offering to give something to someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die aanbied om iets aan iemand te gee?
offer someone something, offer something to someone,|bied iemand iets, iets wat aan iemand,
(3) What words refer to holding something out to someone so that they can take it if they want it?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die hou van iets uit iemand sodat hulle dit kan doen indien hulle dit wil hê?
offer, hold something out,|aanbod, hou iets uit,
(4) What words refer to offering someone money for something you want?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die aanbied van iemand geld vir iets wat jy wil hê?
offer someone (money) for something, make an offer, bid,|bied iemand (geld) vir iets, maak &#39;n aanbod, bod,
(5) What words refer to the act of offering something to someone?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die Wet van iets wat aan iemand?
offer,|aanbod,
(6) What words refer to what is offered?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na wat aangebied word?
bid,|bod,
(7) What words refer to taking back an offer?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na terug te neem &#39;n aanbod?
take back an offer, withdraw an offer,|terug te neem &#39;n aanbod, &#39;n aanbod te onttrek,
(8) What expressions do people use when they are offering something?|(8) Wat uitdrukkings mense gebruik wanneer hulle bied iets?
Would you like...? Can I...? Shall I...? Have a/some.... Help yourself to....|Wil jy ...? Kan ek ...? Sal Ek ...? Het jy &#39;n / n paar .... Help jouself om ....
Accept|Aanvaar
Use this domain for words referring to accepting something such as an offer, invitation, or request.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets soos &#39;n aanbod, uitnodiging, of versoek aanvaar.
(1) What words refer to accepting an offer?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aanvaarding van &#39;n aanbod?

(2) What words refer to the act of accepting an offer?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die daad van aanvaarding van &#39;n aanbod?
acceptance,|aanvaarding,
Reject|Verwerp
Use this domain for words referring to rejecting something such as an offer, invitation, or request.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die verwerping iets soos &#39;n aanbod, uitnodiging of versoek.

reject, not accept, refuse, decline, turn down, take a rain check, have nothing to do with, turn up your nose at, throw out, say no to, veto, vote against, give something the thumbs down, dismiss, rebuff|verwerp, nie aanvaar nie, te weier, verval, draai, neem &#39;n reën tjek, het niks te doen met, draai jou neus op, gooi uit, sê nee vir, veto, stem teen, gee iets wat die duime af, ontslaan, afjak
(2) What words refer to the act of rejecting an offer?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die daad van &#39;n aanbod te verwerp?
refusal, rejection,|weiering, verwerping,
Emotion|Emosie
Use this domain for general words related to feelings and emotions.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met gevoelens en emosies.
feel, experience,|voel, ervaring,
(2) What words refer to the part of a person that enables him to feel emotions?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die deel van &#39;n persoon wat hom in staat stel om emosies te voel?
feelings, emotions, heart|gevoelens, emosies, hart
(3) What words refer to a feeling?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gevoel?
feeling, emotion, sentiment,|gevoel, emosie, sentiment,
(4) What words describe a feeling?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gevoel?
heart-felt, strong, powerful, deep, shallow, passing,|hart-gevoel, sterk, kragtige, diep, vlak, verby,
(5) What words refer to feeling something very strongly?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets voel baie sterk?
be gripped by,|word aangegryp deur,
(6) What words refer to a strong feeling?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n sterk gevoel?
strong feeling, strong emotion, passion,|sterk gevoel, &#39;n sterk emosie, passie,
(7) What words describe someone who has strong emotions?|(7) Wat woorde iemand wat sterk emosies te beskryf?
emotional, sensitive, sentimental, passionate, intense, intensity,|emosionele, sensitiewe, sentimentele, passievol, intense, intensiteit,
(8) What words refer to feeling something for a long time?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets voel vir &#39;n lang tyd?
attitude, mood, state of mind, frame of mind, spirits, morale,|houding, bui, gemoedstoestand, raam van die gees, geeste, moraal,
(9) What words refer to causing someone to feel something?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat iets voel?
make you feel, stimulate, stir, arouse, raise, touch,|maak dat jy voel, te stimuleer, roer, wek, verhoog, touch,
(10) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel something?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om iets te voel?
stimulation,|stimulasie,
(11) What words describe something that causes someone to feel something?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om iets te voel beskryf?
stimulating, rousing, touching, emotional,|stimulerend, opruiende, raak, emosionele,
(12) What words refer to doing something to show a feeling?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen om &#39;n gevoel te wys?
emote, express, show, act out, display,|emote, uit te druk, show, tree uit, te vertoon,
(13) What words describe someone who does not show many emotions?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie baie emosies wys?
unemotional, dispassionate, unfeeling, insensitive, unsentimental,|emosieloos, objektiewe, gevoelloos, ongevoelig, unsentimental,
(14) What words refer to controlling your feelings?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na die beheer van jou gevoelens?
control yourself, self-control, restrain yourself, restraint, contain yourself, keep your temper,|beheer jouself, selfbeheersing, in toom te hou jouself, selfbeheersing, bevat jouself, hou jou humeur,
(15) What words describe a person whose emotions are so strong that they lose control?|(15) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wie se emosies is so sterk dat hulle beheer verloor?
hysterical, have hysterics, go to pieces, fall apart, break down, have an emotional breakdown, go berserk, snap, crack, crack up, give in to, get carried away, have a fit,|histeries, het histeries, gaan na stukke, uitmekaar val, af te breek, het &#39;n emosionele ineenstorting, gaan Berserk, snap, kraak, kraak, gee aan, kry weggevoer, het &#39;n pas,
(16) What words refer to controlling your feelings again after losing control?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na die beheer van jou gevoelens weer na die verlies van beheer?
snap out of it, get a grip on yourself, pull yourself together,|snap uit dit uit, kry &#39;n greep op jouself, ruk jouself,
Feel good|Voel goed
Use this domain for general words related to positive emotions.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met positiewe emosies.
(1) What words refer to feeling good?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel goed?
feel good, feel up,|goed voel, voel up,
(2) What words refer to good feelings?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na goeie gevoelens?
good feelings, positive emotions, good attitude,|goeie gevoelens, positiewe emosies, goeie gesindheid,
(3) What words describe someone who feels good?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat goeie voel beskryf?
up, high,|up, hoog,
(4) What words refer to feeling very good?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel baie goed?
exhilarated,|opgewonde,
(5) What words refer to feeling good for a long time?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel goed vir &#39;n lang tyd?
happy,|gelukkig,
(6) What words refer to causing someone to feel good?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om goed te voel?
cheer, hearten, entertain, brighten your day,|moed, bemoedigen, vermaak, op te kikker jou dag,
(7) What words describe something that causes someone to feel good?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om goed te voel beskryf?
cheerful (thought),|vrolike (denke),
Like, love|Soos, liefde
Use this domain for words related to liking something or someone, or liking to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die hou van iets of iemand, of hou om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to liking something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na smaak iets?
like, have a liking for, adore, enjoy, be fond of, proud of someone, fancy something, have a fancy for, take a fancy to, care for, have affection for, admire, look up to, think highly of, approve, pleased, admire, appeals to you, be to your liking, go down well, savor (v), luxuriate, be happy with, feel good toward, feel good about,|soos, het &#39;n sagte plekkie vir, te vereer, te geniet, wees lief vir, trots iemand, fancy iets het &#39;n fancy vir, neem &#39;n fancy, sorg vir, het liefde vir, te bewonder, kyk op na, dink baie van, goed te keur , bly, te bewonder, &#39;n beroep op julle, wees na jou smaak, goed gaan af, geniet (v), gemak, tevrede wees met goeie rigting voel, goed oor voel,
(2) What words refer to liking someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na smaak iemand?
like, be fond of, be attached to, have a soft spot for, see something in someone, a man/woman after your own heart|soos, wees lief vir, aangeheg word aan, het &#39;n sagte plekkie vir, iets sien in iemand, &#39;n man / vrou na jou eie hart
(3) What words refer to the feeling of liking something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van smaak iets?
liking, admiration, adoration, affection, approval, enjoyment, fondness for, pleasure, pride, affinity,|smaak, bewondering, verering, liefde, goedkeuring, genot, liefde vir, plesier, trots, affiniteit,
(4) What words refer to liking something very much?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na smaak iets baie?
love, adore, delight, enthusiastic about, enthusiasm for, be mad about, be crazy about, be attached to, have a passion for|liefde, vereer, vreugde, entoesiasties oor, entoesiasme vir wees mal oor wees mal oor, aangeheg word aan, het &#39;n passie vir
(5) What words describe something that is liked?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat graag?
likable, lovable, lovely, tasteful, admirable, delightful, charming, endearing, engaging, pleasing, pleasurable, enjoyable, nice, likes and dislikes, love of your life, passion|aangenaam, lief, pragtige, smaakvolle, admirable, pragtige, pragtige, innemend, innemende, aangenaam, aangename, lekker, lekker, en afkeure, liefde van jou lewe, passie
(6) What words refer to a person who likes something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat iets hou?
admirer, fan, (art)-lover, lover of, enthusiast, devotee|bewonderaar, fan, (art) -lover, liefhebber van, entoesias, aanhanger
(7) What words describe someone who likes something?|(7) Wat woorde iemand wat iets hou beskryf?
adoring, affectionate,|Aanbidding, liefdevolle,
(8) What words refer to liking something and wanting to have it?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na smaak iets en wil om dit te hê?
aspire, hanker for, have a hankering for, long for, relish (n), relish (v), covet, crave, desire (v), desire (n), fancy (v), pine for, want (v), yearn,|Aspire, begeerte vir, het &#39;n hunkering na, lank, smoor (n), smoor (v), beywer, koester, begeerte (v), begeerte (n), fancy (v), denne vir, wil (v), smag,
(9) What words refer to something causing someone to like a person or thing?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om &#39;n persoon of ding wil?
beguile, bewitch, charm, dazzle, delight, enchant, enthrall, fascinate, gladden, gratify, impress, please, thrill, tickle, wow,|verlei, betoveren, sjarme, dazzle, vreugde, betower, slaaf, fassineer, verbly, bevredig, te beïndruk, asseblief, opwinding, kielie, wow,
(10) What words refer to something that causes someone to like a person or thing?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om &#39;n persoon of ding wil?
charm, enchantress,|sjarme, bekoorster,
(11) What words describe something that causes someone to like a person or thing?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om &#39;n persoon of ding wil beskryf?
beguiling, bewitching, charming, dazzling, delightful, enchanting, enthralling, fascinating, gratifying, impressive, pleasing, thrilling,|verlok, betowerende, sjarme, skitterende, pragtige, pragtige, boeiende, interessante, verblydend, indrukwekkende, aangenaam, opwindende,
Enjoy doing something|Geniet om iets te doen
Use this domain for words related to enjoying doing something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die geniet om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to enjoying something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na geniet iets?
like, enjoy, love, be fond of, get a lot of pleasure out of, savor, with relish, exhilarate,|soos, geniet, liefde, wees lief vir, kry &#39;n baie plesier uit, geur, met smaak, opvrolijken,
(2) What words refer to feeling happy when you are doing something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel gelukkig wanneer jy iets doen?
enjoy yourself, have a good time, have fun, have the time of your life, have a whale of a time, have a blast, be in your element, live it up, let your hair down,|geniet jouself, het &#39;n goeie tyd, het baie pret, het die tyd van jou lewe, het &#39;n walvis van &#39;n tyd, het &#39;n ontploffing, in jou element, leef dit op, laat jou hare af,
(3) What words refer to the feeling you get when you enjoy doing something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel wat jy kry wanneer jy geniet om iets te doen?
enjoyment, pleasure, ecstasy, exhilaration, satisfaction,|genot, plesier, ecstasy, opwinding, tevredenheid,
(4) What words describe someone who enjoys doing something?|(4) Watter woorde iemand wat iets doen geniet beskryf?
keen, avid, great,|gretig, geesdriftige, groot,
(5) What words refer to causing someone to enjoy himself?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om homself te geniet?
amuse, entertain,|amuse, vermaak,
(6) What words refer to something that causes someone to enjoys something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand iets geniet?
amusement, entertainment,|vermaak, vermaak,
(7) What words describe something that people enjoy doing?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat mense geniet om te doen, beskryf?
enjoyable, fun, good fun, great fun, pleasurable, pleasure, be a delight, the joys of, the delights of, be a blast, be a good laugh, satisfying, amusing, entertaining, treat,|lekker, pret, goeie pret, groot pret, aangenaam, plesier, &#39;n vreugde, die vreugde van die genot van, &#39;n ontploffing, word &#39;n goeie lag, bevredigende amusant, onderhoudend, te behandel,
(8) What words describe someone that other people enjoy being with?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat ander mense geniet om saam met?
be good company, fun, be a good laugh,|goeie maatskappy, pret, &#39;n goeie lag,
(9) What words refer to enjoying something bad?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na geniet iets sleg?
revel in, get a kick out of, take delight in, relish, gloat, take pleasure in, delight in, wallow in,|verlustig in, kry &#39;n kick uit, neem vreugde in, geniet, spog, neem plesier in, vreugde in, neerslaan in,
(10) What words refer to doing something just because you enjoy it?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen net omdat jy dit geniet?
for fun, for a laugh, for the hell of it,|vir die pret, vir &#39;n lag, vir die hel daarvan,
(11) What words refer to enjoying being praised?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na geniet word geprys?
bask in, lap something up,|koester in, skoot iets op,
(12) What words describe someone who is only interested in enjoying themselves?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat in hulself geniet slegs geïnteresseerd?
self-indulgent, hedonist,|self-welwillend, hedonis,
(13) What words refer to something you do to enjoy yourself?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat jy doen om jouself te geniet?
recreation, leisure,|ontspanning, ontspanning,
(14) What words refer to someone who does not want other people to enjoy themselves?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat nie wil hê ander mense om hulself te geniet?
spoilsport,|pretbederwer,
Self-esteem|Selfbeeld
Use this domain for words related to feeling good about yourself.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met goed oor jouself voel.
(1) What words refer to feeling good about yourself?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na goed oor jouself voel?
feel good about yourself,|goed voel oor jouself,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of self-esteem?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van eiewaarde?
pride, self-esteem, self-respect,|trots, selfbeeld, selfrespek,
(3) What words describe someone who feels good about himself?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat goed oor homself voel beskryf?
proud,|trots,
(4) What words refer to feeling very good about yourself?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na voel baie goed oor jouself?
(5) What words refer to causing someone to feel good about himself?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om goed oor homself voel?
build up, encourage, bolster, boost, congratulate,|opbou, bemoedig, versterk, verhoog, geluk,
(6) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel good about himself?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om goed oor homself voel?
encouragement, boost, congratulations,|aanmoediging, hupstoot, baie geluk,
(7) What words describe something that causes someone to feel good about himself?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om goed oor homself voel beskryf?
encouraging|bemoedigende
Prefer|Verkies
Use this domain for words related to preferring one thing over another--to like something more than something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met verkies een ding oor &#39;n ander - om iets meer as iets anders wil.
(1) What words refer to preferring something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na verkies iets?
prefer, preferably, in preference to, favor, like something better, like this more than that, have a preference, give me something any day!, be partial to|verkies, verkieslik, met voorkeur aan, guns, soos iets beter, soos hierdie meer as dit, het &#39;n voorkeur, gee my iets enige dag !, gedeeltelike te wees
(2) What words refer to preferring to do something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na verkies om iets te doen?
prefer to do something, prefer doing something, would prefer to do something, would rather do something, would sooner do something, be in favor of doing something,|verkies om iets te doen, verkies om iets te doen, sou verkies om iets te doen, sal eerder iets te doen, sal iets vroeër te doen, ten gunste van iets doen,
(3) What words refer to wanting someone to do something more than something else?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat wil om iets meer as iets anders doen?
would prefer, would rather,|sou verkies, sou eerder,
(4) What words describe something that you prefer?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat jy verkies beskryf?
preferable, preferred, favored,|verkieslik, verkies, bevoordeel,
(5) What words refer to something you like more than any others?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat jy meer as enige ander hou?
favorite (n), favorite (adj), first choice, preference, number one,|gunsteling (n), gunsteling (adj), die eerste keuse, voorkeur, nommer een,
(6) What words refer to someone who is liked more than others?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat meer as ander is hou?
favorite (n), teacher's pet, favored,|gunsteling (n), troeteldier onderwyser se gunsteling,
(7) What words refer to unfairly favoring one person over another?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na onregverdig bevoordeel een persoon oor &#39;n ander?
favoritism, bias, biased|begunstiging, partydigheid, vooroordeel
(8) What words refer to not unfairly favoring one person over another?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na nie onbillik bevoordeel een persoon oor &#39;n ander?
unbiased, impartial, impartially, impartiality,|onbevooroordeelde, onpartydige, onpartydig, onpartydigheid,
Popular|Gewilde
Use this domain for words describing something that many people like.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat baie mense graag beskryf.
(1) What words describe someone that many people like?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat baie mense soos beskryf?
popular, well-liked, be in favor,|gewild, goed-graag, ten gunste,
(2) What words describe something that many people like?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie mense soos beskryf?
popular, be in demand, sought-after, be big, best-seller, blockbuster, hit|gewild, in aanvraag, gesogte, wees groot, die beste verkoper, blockbuster, getref
(3) What words refer to how popular something is?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hoe gewild iets?
popularity,|gewildheid,
(4) What words refer to making something popular?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets gewild?
popularize,|populariseer,
(5) What words describe someone or something that is not popular?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat nie gewild iemand of beskryf?
unpopular, be out of favor, go out of favor with, there's no demand for|ongewild wees uit die guns, gaan uit die guns met, daar is geen aanvraag vir
Fashionable|Mode
(1) What words describe something that is fashionable?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat modieus beskryf?
fashionable, be in fashion, be the fashion, in, be the in thing, chic, cult, designer, be the latest thing, be all the rage, trendy, be in vogue,|modieus, in die mode, is die mode, in, is die in ding, chic, kultus, ontwerper, is die nuutste ding wees al die woede, modieus, in die mode,
(2) What words describe someone who has fashionable things?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat modieus dinge beskryf?
fashionable, trendy,|mode, modieus,
(3) What words refer to something becoming fashionable?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak mode?
come into fashion, come in, make a comeback,|kom in die mode, kom in, maak &#39;n comeback,
(4) What words refer to making something fashionable?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets mode?
set the fashion, set the trend, bring in,|stel die mode, het die tendens, bring,
(5) What words refer to something that is fashionable?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat is die mode?
fashion, trend, vogue, the latest thing,|mode, tendens, mode, die jongste ding,
(6) What words refer to something that is fashionable for a short time?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat is die mode vir &#39;n kort tyd?
fad, craze,|gier, rage,
(7) What words refer to the business of making fashionable things?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die sake van die maak van die mode dinge?
fashion,|mode,
(8) What words describe something that is not fashionable?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat nie die mode beskryf?
be out of fashion, out, unfashionable, old-fashioned,|wees uit die mode uit, mode, outydse,
(9) What words refer to something becoming unfashionable?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak mode?
go out, date,|gaan uit, datum,
Contentment|Tevredenheid
Use this domain for words related to feeling contented.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel tevrede.
(1) What words refer to feeling good about your present conditions?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie oor jou huidige omstandighede voel?
be content, be happy with your lot, feel satisfied|word inhoud, gelukkig wees met jou lot, tevrede voel
(2) What words describe when a person feels bad about his conditions or situation?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf wanneer &#39;n persoon voel sleg oor sy omstandighede of situasie?
discontent, discontented, dissatisfied, dissatisfaction, discontent,|ontevredenheid, ontevrede, ontevrede, ontevredenheid, ontevredenheid,
(3) What words refer to not being satisfied?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na nie tevrede?
be displeased with, be unhappy with, not happy, dissatisfied, discontented, disgruntled,|wees ontevrede met, ongelukkig met, nie gelukkig nie, ontevrede, ontevrede, ontevrede,
Happy for|Bly vir
Use this domain for words related to feeling happy for someone--to feel good because something good happened to someone. The opposite is jealousy and envy.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gelukkige vir iemand voel - om goed te voel omdat iets goed gebeur met iemand. Die teenoorgestelde is jaloesie en afguns.
(1) What words refer to feeling good about someone's good fortune?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie oor iemand se geluk voel?
be happy for, rejoice with, be glad for|gelukkig wees vir, juig met, bly wees
(2) What words refer to expressing your joy about someone's good fortune?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die uitdrukking van jou vreugde oor iemand se geluk?
cheer for, applaud, congratulate|moed vir, jubel, gelukwens
Pleased with|Tevrede met
Use this domain for words related to feeling pleased with someone--to feel good because someone did something good.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met tevrede met iemand voel - om goed te voel omdat iemand het iets goed.
(1) What words refer to being pleased with someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na synde tevrede met iemand?
be pleased with, happy with, satisfied with, approve of, delight in, be favorable toward, impressed with, thrilled with, tickled with, respect,|tevrede wees met, gelukkig met, tevrede met, goedkeur, vreugde in, gunstig teenoor, beïndruk met, opgewonde oor, kielie met, respek,
Happy|Gelukkig
Use this domain for words related to feeling happy--to feel good when something good happens (such as receiving a gift, hearing good news, or watching something good happening).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gelukkige gevoel - om goed te voel wanneer iets gebeur goeie (soos &#39;n geskenk ontvang, hoor goeie nuus, of iets goeds gebeur kyk).
(1) What words refer to feeling happy?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na gelukkige gevoel?
rejoice, feel good, be in a good mood|bly, goed voel, in &#39;n goeie bui
(2) What words refer to the feeling of happiness?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van geluk?
happiness, bliss, cheerfulness, contentment, delight, elation, euphoria, gladness, good feelings, joy, mirth, pleasure, satisfaction|geluk, geluk, vreugde, tevredenheid, vreugde, vreugde, euforie, vrolikheid, goeie gevoelens, vreugde, vreugde, plesier, tevredenheid
(3) What words describe someone who feels happy?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat gelukkig voel beskryf?
happy, happily, cheerful, cheerfully, chipper, content, contented, contentedly, glad, gladly, jaunty, merry, mirthful, pleased, satisfied|gelukkig, gelukkig, vrolik, vrolik, canter, inhoud, tevrede, tevrede, bly, graag, vrolik, vrolik, lustig, bly tevrede
(4) What words refer to feeling very happy?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na voel baie gelukkig?
exult, delight in, ecstasy, be on top of the world, be over the moon, rapture,|juig verlustig in, ecstasy, op die top van die wêreld moet wees oor die maan, wegraping,
(5) What words describe a person who is very happy?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat baie gelukkig?
blissfully happy, overjoyed, delighted, ecstatic, elated, exultant, joyful, jubilant, radiant, thrilled|salig gelukkig, verheug, verheug, ekstase, opgewonde, jubelende, vreugdevolle, jubelende, stralende, opgewonde
(6) What words describe a person who usually feels happy?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat gewoonlik voel gelukkig?
happy, cheerful, contented, jolly, jovial, have a happy/cheerful/sunny disposition|gelukkig, vrolik, tevrede, jolly, joviale, het &#39;n gelukkige / vrolike / sonnige geaardheid
(7) What words describe a person who feels good while doing something?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n goeie voel terwyl iets te doen?
enjoy, take pleasure in, be fond of doing|geniet, neem plesier in, wees lief vir doen
(8) What words refer to feeling good about someone's behavior?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na goed oor iemand se gedrag voel?
be pleased with|tevrede wees met
(9) What words describe how a person feels when something good happens to someone else?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf hoe &#39;n persoon voel wanneer iets goed gebeur met iemand anders?
feel happy for, rejoice with|voel gelukkig vir, juig met
(10) What words refer to feeling good when something bad happens to someone?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel goed wanneer iets sleg gebeur aan iemand?
exultant, glee, gleeful, gloat|jubelende, blydskap, verheugend, spog
(11) What words refer to causing someone to feel happy?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om gelukkig voel?
make someone happy, cheer someone up, comfort, console, delight, gladden, please, satisfy, put someone in a good mood, make someone's day, raise someone's spirits, lift someone's spirits|maak iemand gelukkig, beur iemand up, troos, troos, vreugde, verbly, asseblief, bevredig, sit iemand in &#39;n goeie bui, maak iemand se dag, geeste iemand se verhoog, lig geeste iemand se
(12) What words refer to feeling happy again after feeling sad?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na gelukkige gevoel weer na hartseer voel?
brighten up, cheer up, perk up, be cheered, be heartened, take heart|opvrolijken, beur, opdirken, word toegejuig, word bemoedig, neem die hart
(13) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel happy?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand gelukkig voel?
delight, joy, happy ending|vreugde, blydskap, gelukkige einde
(14) What words describe something that causes someone to feel happy?|(14) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om gelukkig voel beskryf?
happy, cheering, cheerful (thought), heartening, heartwarming, pleasing, satisfying|gelukkig, juig, vrolike (denke), verblydend, hart verwarmende, aangenaam, tevrede
(15) What words describe a time period when you feel happy?|(15) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tydperk wanneer jy voel gelukkig?
happy, blissful, delightful (time), idyllic, joyous (occasion), pleasant|gelukkig, salig, pragtige (tyd), idilliese, vreugdevolle (geleentheid), aangename
Relaxed|Ontspanne
Use this domain for words related to feeling relaxed--to feel good when you are not working and nothing bad is happening.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met ontspanne voel - om goed te voel wanneer jy nie werk nie en niks sleg gebeur.
(1) What words refer to feeling relaxed?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na ontspanne voel?
relax, rest, unbend, unwind, feel at home, feel at ease, be at ease, take it easy, take things easy, make yourself at home, loosen up, let your hair down, let yourself go,|ontspan, rus, plooi, ontspan, voel by die huis, op jou gemak voel, wees gerus, neem dit maklik, neem dinge maklik, maak jouself by die huis, los te maak, laat jou hare af, laat gaan,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of relaxation?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van ontspanning?
relaxation, comfort,|ontspanning, troos,
(3) What words describe someone who feels relaxed?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat ontspanne voel?
relaxed, at ease, calm, comfortable, laid-back, uninhibited|ontspanne, op sy gemak, kalm, gemaklike, rustige, ongeremd
(4) What words refer to causing someone to feel relaxed?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om ontspanne voel?
relax someone, put someone at ease, make someone feel at home,|ontspan iemand, sit iemand op sy gemak, maak iemand by die huis voel,
(5) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel relaxed?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om ontspanne voel?
sedative, relaxant,|kalmeermiddel, spierverslapper,
(6) What words describe something that causes someone to feel relaxed?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om ontspanne voel beskryf?
relaxing,|ontspannende,
Calm|Kalm
Use this domain for words related to feeling calm.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel kalm.
(1) What words refer to feeling calm?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel kalm?
feel calm, be at peace,|voel kalm, in vrede,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of calm?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van kalmte?
calm (n), composure, presence of mind, equanimity, peace, placidity, poise, repose, serenity, tranquility,|kalm (n), kalmte, teenwoordigheid van gees, kalmte, vrede, kalmte, houding, rus, kalmte, rustigheid,
(3) What words describe someone who feels calm?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat kalm voel beskryf?
calm (adj), calmly, collected, composed, cool, dispassionate, peaceful, phlegmatic, quiescent, sedate, serene, staid, steady, tranquil, unruffled, not fazed,|kalm (adj), kalm, versamel, saamgestel, koel, objektiewe, vreedsame, flegmatiese, statiese, besadigde, rustige, sober, bestendige, rustige, onverstoord, nie van stryk gebring,
(4) What words refer to causing someone to feel calm?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om kalm te voel?
calm someone, calm someone down, soothe,|kalmeer iemand, kalm iemand af, streel,
(5) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel calm?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om kalm voel?
calming influence, tranquilizer,|kalmerende invloed, tranquilizer,
(6) What words describe something that causes someone to feel calm?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om kalm voel beskryf?
calming,|kalm,
(7) What words refer to remaining calm in a difficult situation?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na kalm bly in &#39;n moeilike situasie?
keep your cool, keep your head, keep a stiff upper lip, maintain your composure, imperturbable, untroubled,|hou jou koel, hou jou kop, hou &#39;n stywe bolip, in stand te hou jou kalmte, onverstoorbare, ongestoord,
(8) What words describe a person who is usually calm?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat gewoonlik kalm?
placid, even-tempered, laid-back|kalm, selfs-tempered, laid-back
(9) What words describe a calm place?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n rustige plek?
calm, quiet, peaceful|kalm, stil, vreedsame
(10) What words refer to becoming calm?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na besig kalm?
calm down, cool down, cool off, compose yourself, steady your nerves, relax, quiet down,|kalmeer, afkoel, af te koel, komponeer jouself, bestendige jou senuwees, ontspan, stil af,
(11) What do you say to someone when you want them to be calm?|(11) Wat sê jy vir iemand wanneer jy wil hê hulle moet kalm wees?
Cool it. Take it easy. Calm down.|Koel dit. Neem dit maklik. Kalmeer.
Surprise|Surprise
Use this domain for words related to feeling surprised--to feel something when something unexpected, unusual, or amazing happens.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel verras - iets voel wanneer iets onverwags, ongewoon, of ongelooflike gebeur.
(1) What words refer to feeling surprised?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel verbaas?
be surprised, wonder, be in awe,|verbaas wees, wonder, in verwondering,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of surprise?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van verrassing?
surprise (n), amazement, astonishment, awe (n), incredulity,|verrassing (n), verwondering, verbasing, verwondering (n), incredulity,
(3) What words describe someone who feels surprised?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat verras voel?
surprised, amazed, astonished, incredulous, startled, flabbergasted,|verbaas, verstom, verstom, ongelowig, geskrik, stomgeslaan,
(4) What words refer to causing someone to feel surprised?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te voel verbaas?
surprise (v), surprise (n), amaze, astonish, astound, awe (v), inspire awe, flabbergast, floor, startle,|verrassing (v), verrassing (n), verbaas, verbazen, verstom, verstom (v), inspireer ontsag, sy stuk, vloer, skrik,
(5) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel surprised?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om te voel verbaas?
surprise (n),|verrassing (n),
(6) What words describe something that causes someone to feel surprised?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om te voel verbaas beskryf?
surprising, startling, amazing, astonishing, incredible, wonderful, awe-inspiring, awesome, unexpected,|verbasend nie, ontstellend, amazing, verstommende, ongelooflike, wonderlike, inspirerende, awesome, onverwags,
(7) What do you say when you are surprised?|(7) Wat sê jy wanneer jy verbaas?
Wow!|Wow!
Interested|Belangstellende
Use this domain for words related to feeling interested.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gevoel belangstel.
(1) What words refer to feeling interested in something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel wat belangstel in iets?
be interested in, show interest, express interest, find something interesting, take an interest in, be curious about,|belangstel in, toon belangstelling, druk rente, iets interessant vind, neem &#39;n belangstelling in, wees nuuskierig oor,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of interest?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van belang?
interest, curiosity,|belangstelling, nuuskierigheid,
(3) What words describe someone who feels interested?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat belangstel voel beskryf?
interested, curious,|belangstel, nuuskierig,
(4) What words refer to causing someone to feel interested?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te voel belangstel?
interest, get someone interested, entertain, stimulate, stir, appeal to, attract someone's interest, attract someone's attention, interestingly, hold your attention, rekindle interest, revive interest,|rente, iemand kry wat belangstel, vermaak, stimuleer, roer, &#39;n beroep op rente iemand se trek, iemand se aandag te trek, interessant, hou jou aandag, wakker belangstelling, laat herleef belang,
(5) What words refer to something that is interesting?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat interessant is?
interest, curio, attraction, entertainment,|rente, curio, aantrekkingskrag, vermaak,
(6) What words describe someone that is interesting?|(6) Watter woorde iemand wat interessant beskryf?
interesting, colorful, a character, entertainer,|interessante, kleurvolle, &#39;n karakter, verhoogkunstenaar,
(7) What words describe something that is interesting?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat interessant is beskryf?
interesting, be of interest, entertaining, lively, stimulating, stimulation, unusual, have character,|interessant, word van belang, vermaak, lewendig, stimulerend, stimulasie, ongewone, het karakter,
(8) What words describe a time when something interesting is happening?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd wanneer iets interessant gebeur?
interesting, eventful, colorful, never a dull moment,|interessant, gevoel, kleurvolle, nooit &#39;n vervelige oomblik,
(9) What words refer to becoming more interested in something?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na meer belangstel in iets?
get interested, become interested, get into,|kry belangstel, belangstel geword, kry in,
(10) What words refer to becoming less interested in something?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na hoe minder belangstel in iets?
lose interest,|verloor belangstelling,
(11) What words refer to making something more interesting?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets meer interessant?
make something more interesting, liven up, jazz up, add variety,|maak iets meer interessant, verlevendiging, jazz up, voeg verskeidenheid,
(12) What words refer to doing something often because you are interested in it?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen dikwels nie omdat jy belangstel in dit?
follow (a sport), be into, take something up,|volg (a sport), wees in, neem iets op,
(13) What words refer to something you do because you are interested in it?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat jy doen omdat jy belangstel in dit?
hobby, interest, recreation,|stokperdjie, belangstelling, ontspanning,
Excited|Opgewonde
Use this domain for words related to feeling excited--to feel good when something good has happening or is about to happen.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel opgewonde - om goed wanneer iets goed het gebeur of gaan gebeur voel.

(7) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel excited?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om opgewonde voel?
sensation|sensasie
(8) What words describe something that causes someone to feel excited?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om opgewonde voel beskryf?
exciting, thrilling, sensational, sensation, exhilarating, heady, dramatic, nail biting, action-packed|opwindend, spannend, sensasionele, sensasie, opwindend, roekeloos, dramatiese, naelbyt, aksie-verpak

do something for kicks, do something for the thrill of it|iets vir kicks te doen, iets te doen vir die opwinding van dit
(10) What words describe an exciting experience?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n opwindende ervaring?
thrill, adventure, excitement|opwinding, avontuur, opwinding
(11) What words refer to the most exciting part of something?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die mees opwindende deel van iets?

excitable|prikkelbare
(13) What words refer to becoming more excited?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na meer opgewonde?
get excited, excitement rose, go mad, go wild, go crazy, reach a climax, reach a fever pitch|opgewonde, opwinding rose, gaan mal, gaan wild, gaan mal, bereik &#39;n klimaks, bereik &#39;n koors plek
(14) What words refer to becoming less excited?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na hoe minder opgewonde?
calm down,|kalmeer,
(15) What words describe a person who does not feel excited?|(15) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat nie voel opgewonde?
calm, unexcited,|kalm, unexcited,

(9) What words refer to not feeling enthusiastic?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na nie entoesiasties voel?
not enthusiastic, unenthusiastic, lack of enthusiasm, half-hearted, lukewarm, muted, your heart's not in it,|nie entoesiasties, unenthusiastic, gebrek aan entoesiasme, halfhartig, lou, gedempte, jou hart is nie in dit,
Obsessed|Obsessie
Use this domain for words related to feeling obsessed--to be very interested in something for a long time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel obsessie - baie belangstel in iets vir &#39;n lang tyd wees.

be obsessed with, be fascinated by, can't get something out of your mind, have a thing about, have an unhealthy interest in, have a one-track mind,|word &#39;n obsessie met, word gefassineer deur, kan nie iets uit jou gedagtes te kry, het &#39;n ding oor, het &#39;n ongesonde belangstelling in, het &#39;n een-track gedagte,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of obsession?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van obsessie?
fascination, obsession, mania, fixation, fetish, preoccupation,|bekoring, obsessie, manie, fiksasie, fetish, beheptheid,
(3) What words describe someone who feels obsessed?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat &#39;n obsessie voel?
obsessed, absorbed, captivated, engrossed, enthralled, fascinated, intrigued, mesmerized, spellbound, be all ears,|obsessie, geabsorbeer, betower, verdiep, in vervoering, gefassineer, geboei, betower, vasgenael, wees almal ore,

obsess, captivate, fascinate, intrigue,|obsessief, boei, fassineer, intriges,
(5) What words describe something that causes someone to be obsessed?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om &#39;n obsessie beskryf?
fascinating, intriguing, irresistible, absorbing, riveting, gripping, compelling, couldn't put it down,|fassinerend, intrige, onweerstaanbaar, absorbeer, klink, aangrypende, dwingende, kon dit nie neersit nie,
Attract|Trek
Use this domain for words related to attracting someone's attention to something. In a typical situation, a person sees something with an interesting quality. The person moves closer, pays close attention to the thing, and possibly does something to it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verkryging van iemand se aandag aan iets. In &#39;n tipiese situasie, &#39;n persoon sien iets met &#39;n interessante gehalte. Die persoon beweeg nader, baie aandag aan die saak, en moontlik iets om dit te.
(1) What words refer to something attracting someone's interest?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets lok belangstelling iemand se?
attract, tempt, seduce, pull, draw, bring in, lure, appeal to|lok, versoek, verlei, trek, trek, bring, lok, &#39;n beroep op
(2) What words describe something that has qualities that make people interested in it?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat eienskappe wat mense wat belangstel in dit te maak het, beskryf?
attractive, tempting, appealing, irresistible, enticing, alluring, seductive|aantreklike, aanloklik, aantreklik, onweerstaanbaar, aanloklike, aanloklike, verleidelike
(3) What words refer to something that is attractive?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat aantreklik?
attraction, lure (n), temptation,|aantrekkingskrag, lok (n), versoeking,
(4) What words refer to the quality of something that is attractive?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gehalte van iets wat is aantreklik?
appeal (n), the lure of, charm, pull (n), draw (n)|appèl (n), die lok van, sjarme, trek (n), teken (n)
Indifferent|Onverskillig
Use this domain for words related to feeling indifferent about something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met onverskillig oor iets voel.
(1) What words refer to feeling indifferent?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na onverskillig voel?
not care, shrug it off, be on the fence, middle-of-the-road,|nie om nie, dit afmaak, word op die heining, middel-van-die-pad,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of indifference?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van onverskilligheid?
indifference, neutrality, apathy, unconcern, lack of concern,|onverskilligheid, neutraliteit, apatie, onverskilligheid, gebrek aan kommer,
(3) What words describe someone who feels indifferent?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat onverskillig voel beskryf?
indifferent, neutral, apathetic, unconcerned, unmoved, blasé, careless, lackadaisical, half-hearted, casual, offhand, nonchalant, gaily|onverskillig, neutraal, apaties, besorg, onbewoë, blasé, sorgelose, sentimenteel, halfhartig, gemaklik, onvoorbereid, nonchalant, vrolik
(4) What words refer to feeling very indifferent?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na voel baie onverskillig?
not give a damn, couldn't care less, be past caring, for all I care,|nie &#39;n damn, kon nie minder omgee, wees afgelope omgee, vir al wat ek omgee,
(5) What words indicate that you don't care, because you will be happy no matter what happens?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat jy nie omgee nie, want jy maak nie saak wat gebeur gelukkig sal wees?
don't mind, not be fussy, it doesn't bother me,|nie omgee nie, nie kieskeurig wees, beteken dit nie pla my,
(6) What words indicate that you used to care, but don't anymore because you are hurt or angry?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat jy gebruik om te sorg, maar nie meer nie omdat jy beseer is of kwaad?
be past caring, for all I care, not give a damn, couldn't care less|wees afgelope omgee, vir al wat ek omgee, nie &#39;n damn, kon nie minder omgee
(7) What words indicate that you don't care about someone else's problem?|(7) Wat woorde aan te dui dat jy nie omgee oor iemand anders se probleem?
not my problem, not my concern, that's your problem, (that's just) tough|nie my probleem, nie my kommer, dit is jou probleem, (dit is net) taai
(8) What expressions do people use when they don't care?|(8) Wat uitdrukkings mense gebruik wanneer hulle nie omgee?
(9) What words refer to not being aware of other people's feelings?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na nie bewus te wees van ander mense se gevoelens?
insensitive|onsensitief
Uninterested, bored|Onbelangstellend, verveeld
Use this domain for words related to feeling uninterested or bored--when someone is not interested in something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met geïnteresseerd of verveeld voel - wanneer iemand nie belangstel in iets.
(1) What words refer to feeling uninterested in something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na geïnteresseerd in iets voel?
not be interested, lack interest, be bored (with), be fed up with, be tired of, don't care (about), can't be bothered, your heart's not in it, be cool towards, show no interest, express no interest, leave someone cold,|nie belangstel, gebrek rente, verveeld (met), word gevoed met, moeg van, nie omgee (ongeveer), kan nie gepla word, jou hart is nie in dit, cool wees teenoor, toon geen belangstelling druk geen belangstelling, laat iemand koue,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of being uninterested?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van nie geïnteresseerd?
disinterest, lack of interest, boredom, apathy,|lou, gebrek aan belangstelling, verveling, apatie,
(3) What words describe someone who feels uninterested?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie geïnteresseerd voel?
uninterested, disinterested, apathetic, bored, dull, lethargic, uncaring, unconcerned, unenthusiastic, half-hearted, lukewarm,|onbelangstellend, onpartydige, apaties, verveeld, vervelig, traag, hartelose, besorg, unenthusiastic, halfhartig, lou,
(4) What words refer to feeling very uninterested?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na voel baie geïnteresseerd?
could care less, couldn't care less, be bored to tears, be bored stiff, be bored out of your mind, someone's eyes glaze over,|kon sorg minder, kon nie minder omgee, verveeld tot trane, styf verveeld, verveeld van jou verstand, iemand se oë glasuur oor,
(5) What words describe someone who is not interested in anything?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat nie belangstel in enigiets te beskryf?
bored, bored to tears, bored stiff|verveeld tot trane, verveeld
(6) What words refer to causing someone to feel uninterested?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om geïnteresseerd voel?
bore (v), put you to sleep|gebaar (v), sit jy aan die slaap
(7) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel uninterested?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om geïnteresseerd voel?
monotony, tedium,|eentonigheid, verveling,
(8) What words refer to a person who is uninteresting?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat oninteressant?
bore (n),|gebaar (n),
(9) What words describe something that is uninteresting?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat oninteressant beskryf?
uninteresting, not very interesting, boring, dull, tedious, uneventful, unexciting, humdrum, monotonous, repetitive, long-winded,|oninteressant, nie baie interessant, vervelig, vervelig, vervelig, rustig, onopwindend, sleur, eentonige, herhalende, langasem,
(10) What words describe a place that is uninteresting|(10) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek wat oninteressant
dead, one-horse town, nothing ever happens, drab, featureless, dreary|dooie, een-perd dorp, niks ooit gebeur, vaal, eentonige, vervelige
(11) What words refer to trying to find something that is interesting because you are bored?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om iets wat is interessant, want jy verveeld vind?
relieve the boredom|verlig die verveling
(12) What words refer to something becoming uninteresting?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak vervelig?
the novelty wears off, lose interest, get tired of,|die nuwigheid dra af, verloor belangstelling, moeg,

feel confident, sure of yourself, think positively, secure in yourself|voel vol vertroue, seker van jouself, dink positief, veilig in jouself

(5) What words refer to causing someone to feel confident?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te voel vol vertroue?

(8) What words refer to feeling more confident?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel meer selfvertroue?

(9) What words refer to feeling less confident?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel minder vertroue?

(10) What words describe someone who is not confident?|(10) Watter woorde iemand wat nie vertroue beskryf?

Sad|Sad

(16) What words describe something that you wish had not happened?|(16) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat jy wil het nie gebeur nie?
unfortunate, regrettable,|jammer, jammer,

Disappointed|Teleurgesteld
Use this domain for words related to feeling disappointed--to feel bad because something did not happen that you wanted to happen or someone did not do something that you wanted them to do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel teleurgesteld - sleg te voel omdat iets het nie gebeur nie wat jy wou hê om te gebeur of iemand het iets wat jy wou hê hulle moet doen nie.
(1) What words refer to feeling disappointed?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na teleurgesteld voel?
be disappointed, feel let down, feel blue, feel forlorn, not realize your hopes, have your hopes dashed, your heart sank, look blue,|teleurgesteld wees nie, voel die steek laat, voel blou, voel hopeloos, nie besef jou hoop, het jou hoop beskaam, jou hart gesink, kyk blou,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of disappointment?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van teleurstelling?
disappointment, frustration, letdown, bitter pill to swallow, forlorn hope, unfulfilled hopes,|teleurstelling, frustrasie, teleurstelling, bitter pil om te sluk, hopeloos hoop, onvervulde verwagtinge,
(3) What words describe someone who feels disappointed?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat teleurgesteld voel?
disappointed, crushed, disconcerted, discouraged, deflated, disillusioned, disenchanted, dispirited, frustrated,|teleurgesteld, gekneus, ontstel, ontmoedig, afgeblaas, ontnugter, ontnugterde, moedeloos, gefrustreerd,
(4) What words refer to feeling very disappointed?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na voel baie teleurgesteld?
crushed, bitterly disappointed,|gebreek, bitter teleurgesteld,
(5) What words refer to causing someone to feel disappointed?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om teleurgesteld?
disappoint, dash someone's hopes, demoralize, devastate, discourage, dishearten, disillusion, dissatisfy, jilt, let someone down, frustrate,|teleurstel nie, stamp nie hoop iemand se demoraliseer, verwoes ontmoedig, mismoedig, ontnugtering, bevredigen, coquette, laat iemand af, belemmer
(6) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel disappointed?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om te voel teleurgesteld?
disappointment, anticlimax, bitter pill to swallow, blow, letdown, discouragement, frustration,|teleurstelling, antiklimaks, bitter pil om te sluk, blaas, teleurstelling, moedeloosheid, frustrasie,
(7) What words describe something that causes someone to feel disappointed?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om teleurgesteld te beskryf?
disappointing, be a disappointment, be an anticlimax, be a letdown, not live up to expectations, not all it's cracked up to be, discouraging, disheartening, frustrating, not up to par,|teleurstellend, &#39;n teleurstelling wees &#39;n antiklimaks, &#39;n teleurstelling, nie aan die verwagtinge, nie al is dit gekraak het om te wees, te ontmoedig, teleurstellend, frustrerend, nie tot par,
Lonely|Lonely

feel lonely, feel alone, feel isolated, feel abandoned, miss someone|eensaam voel, voel alleen, geïsoleerd voel, voel verlate, mis iemand
