Upset|Ontsteld
Use this domain for word related to feeling upset--to feel very bad because someone has done something bad to you or because something bad has happened to you, so that your thinking and behavior is affected.|Gebruik hierdie domein woord wat verband hou met die gevoel ontsteld - baie sleg te voel omdat iemand iets sleg aan jou gedoen of omdat iets sleg met jou gebeur het, sodat jou denke en gedrag word beïnvloed.
(1) What words refer to feeling upset about something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na ontsteld oor iets voel?
be upset, hurt, distressed, troubled,|ontsteld wees, seer, ontsteld,,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of being upset?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van ontstel?
agitation, distress, uproar,|roering, angs, oproer,
(3) What words describe someone who feels upset?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat ontsteld voel?
upset, agitated,|ontsteld, geroer,
(4) What words refer to feeling very upset?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel baie ontsteld?
deeply hurt, deeply distressed, distraught, be in a state, be in an uproar, emotions in an uproar, torment, tormented,|diep seergemaak, benoud, ontstelde, in &#39;n toestand, in &#39;n oproer, emosies in &#39;n oproer, marteling, gepynig,
(5) What words refer to becoming upset?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na besig ontsteld?
get upset, get worked up, take something to heart,|ontsteld, kry gewerk het, neem iets aan die hart,
(6) What words refer to causing someone to feel upset?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om ontsteld voel?
upset someone, agitate, churn me up inside, discomfit, discompose, disconcert, distract, distress, disturb, hurt, hurt someone's feelings, perturb, pressure (v), rattle, stir, unsettle,|ontstel iemand, roer, kansellasies my binnekant, verwar, verwarring, geslaan, lei, nood, versteur, seer, seer iemand se gevoelens, beroering, druk (v), rammel, roer, ontwrig,
(7) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel upset?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om ontsteld voel?
agitation, distraction, pressure, trauma, traumatic experience, turbulence, turmoil,|opwinding, afleiding, druk, trauma, traumatiese ervaring, turbulensie, onrus,
(8) What words describe something that causes someone to feel upset?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om ontsteld voel beskryf?
upsetting, distressing, harrowing, painful, traumatic,|ontstellend, ontstellende, hartverskeurende, pynlike, traumatiese,
(9) What words describe someone who gets upset easily?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat raak maklik ontsteld?
sensitive,|sensitief,
Shock|Skok

shocking, horrible, horrifying, shattering,|skokkend, verskriklik, verskriklik verpletterende,
Jealous|Jaloers
Use this domain for words related to feeling jealous--to feel bad when someone does well, has something good, receives something good, or something good happens to them, because you want what they have. Also use this domain for words for when a husband (or wife) is jealous because he thinks his wife loves someone else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met jaloers voel - voel sleg wanneer iemand doen goed, het iets goeds, iets goeds ontvang of iets goed met hulle gebeur, omdat jy wil hê wat hulle het. Gebruik ook hierdie domein woorde vir wanneer &#39;n man (of vrou) is jaloers omdat hy dink sy vrou lief iemand anders.

be jealous, feel jealous, jealously, envy (v), begrudge, turn green, covet,|word jaloers, jaloers, jaloers, afguns (v), gun, groen, beywer,

jealousy, envy (n), covetousness, resentment, sour grapes,|jaloesie, afguns (n), hebsug, wrok, suur druiwe,
(3) What words describe someone who feels jealous?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat jaloers voel beskryf?
jealous, possessive, envious, green with envy, covetous, jaundiced, resentful, bitter,|jaloers, besitlik, jaloers, groen van jaloesie, geldgieriges, geelsug, gegrief, bitter,
(4) What words refer to feeling very jealous?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel baie jaloers?
bitterly jealous,|bitterlik jaloers,
(5) What words refer to causing someone to feel jealous?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om jaloers voel?
make someone jealous, arouse jealousy,|maak iemand jaloers, wek jaloesie,
(6) What words refer to not feeling jealous?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na nie jaloers voel?
not begrudge,|gun,

Annoyed|Vererg

annoyance, exasperation, frustration, irritation,|ergernis, wanhoop, frustrasie, irritasie,
(3) What words describe someone who feels annoyed?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat vererg voel?
annoyed, frustrated, hacked off, irritated, jaded, ticked off,|vererg, gefrustreerd, afgekap, geïrriteerd, verveeld, afgemerk,
(4) What words refer to feeling very annoyed?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na voel baie vererg?
exasperated,|bitter,
(5) What words refer to causing someone to feel annoyed?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om vererg voel?
annoy, antagonize, bug, exacerbate, exasperate, frustrate, gall, harass, hassle, irritate, nag, needle, nettle, pester, piss someone off, much to my annoyance, it ticks me off, it hacks me off, get on your nerves, get under your skin, drive you crazy, drive you nuts, drive you up the wall,|irriteer, antagoniseer, bug, vererger, moedeloos, frustreer, gal, teister, moeite, irriteer, nag, naald, brandnetel, teister, piss iemand af, tot my ergernis, dit bosluise my af, dit hacks my af, kry op jou senuwees, kry onder jou vel, ry jy mal, jy ry neute, ry jy die muur,
(6) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel annoyed?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om vererg voel?
annoyance, exasperation, frustration, irritation, nuisance, pain in the neck, pain in the ass, pain in the butt, pest,|ergernis, wanhoop, frustrasie, irritasie, ergernis, pyn in die nek, pyn in die gat, pyn in die boude, plaag,
(7) What words describe something that causes someone to feel annoyed?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om vererg voel beskryf?
annoying, exasperating, frustrating, irritating, galling, nettlesome, stupid, bloody, be a drag,|irriterende, exasperating, frustrerend, irriterend, irritatie, netelige, dom, bloedige, &#39;n sleep,
Afraid|Bang
Use this domain for words related to fear--to feel bad because you think something bad might happen to you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vrees - om te voel sleg omdat jy dink iets sleg kan gebeur nie.
(1) What words refer to feeling afraid?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na bang voel?
feel afraid, be afraid, fear (v), for fear of, have a horror of,|voel bang, bang wees, vrees (v), uit vrees vir, het &#39;n gruwel van,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of fear?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van vrees?
fear (n), fright, alarm, foreboding, horror, panic (n), terror, trepidation,|vrees (n), skrik, alarm, onheilspellend, horror, paniek (n), terreur, bewing,
(3) What words describe someone who feels afraid?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat bang voel beskryf?
afraid, fearful, frightened, alarmed, panicky, quaking, scared, skittish, weak-kneed,|bang, bang, bang, bekommerd, paniekerig, skrik, bang, onrustig, swak knieë,
(4) What words refer to feeling very afraid?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel baie bang?
terrified, terror, panic, panic-stricken, petrified, scared stiff, scared out of your wits, scared to death,|bang, terreur, paniek, paniekbevange, versteende, doodbang, bang uit jou verstand, bang vir die dood,
(5) What words refer to feeling suddenly afraid because of something that happens?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel skielik bang as gevolg van iets wat gebeur?
get a fright, panic (v), go white as a sheet, nearly jump out of your skin,|skrik, paniek (v), gaan wit soos &#39;n laken, byna spring uit jou vel,
(6) What words refer to feeling afraid for a long time?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na bang voel vir &#39;n lang tyd?
phobia, have a phobia about, live in fear, dread (n), dread (v),|fobie, &#39;n fobie oor, leef in vrees, vrees (n), gevreesde (v),
(7) What words refer to causing someone to feel afraid?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te voel bang?
frighten, give someone a fright, frighten the life out of someone, alarm (v), cow (v), give someone the creeps, daunt, intimidate, petrify, rattle (v), scare, spook, startle, terrify, terrorize, unnerve, make your hair stand on end, make your blood run cold,|skrik, gee iemand skrik, skrik die lewe uit iemand, alarm (v), koei (v), gee iemand die ritteltits, ontmoedigen, intimideer, versteend, ratel (v), bang, spook, skrik, skrik, terroriseer, ontsenu, maak jou hare staan ​​op die einde, maak jou bloed loop koud,
(8) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel afraid?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om te voel bang?
scare (n), terror, horror, alarmist,|bang (n), terreur, horror, paniek saai,
(9) What words describe something that causes someone to feel afraid?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om te voel bang beskryf?
frightening, frightful, alarming, blood-curdling, chilling, creepy, dreadful, eerie, fearsome, forbidding, hair-raising, scary, spine-chilling, spooky, terrifying,|skrikwekkend, verskriklik, kommerwekkend, bloedstollende, verkoeling, creepy, vreeslik, onheilspellend, vreesaanjaende, verbied, hare-verhoging, skrikwekkend, ysingwekkende, spooky, skrikwekkende,
(10) What words describe someone who is easily frightened?|(10) Watter woorde iemand wat maklik bang beskryf?
scare easily, timid, be of a nervous disposition,|skrik maklik, skugter, wees van &#39;n senuwee ingesteldheid,
(11) What words describe someone who is not afraid?|(11) Watter woorde iemand wat nie bang is beskryf?
brave, bravely, bravery, courage, courageous, courageously, fearless, fearlessly, unafraid,|dapper, dapper, dapperheid, moed, dapper, dapper, onverskrokke, vreesloos, bang,
(12) What are the signs that someone is afraid?|(12) Wat is die tekens dat iemand bang?
tremble, quail, quake, shake, shiver, shudder, heart pounds, teeth chatter, be paralyzed with fear, freeze, cower, crouch, cringe, jump, flinch, wince, shrink, slink, stampede, turn tail, turn white, blanch, cry out, goose-flesh, goose-pimples, goose-bumps,|bewe, kwartels, aardbewing, skud, bewe, sidder, hart pond, tande chatter, verlam met vrees, vries, bewe, hurk, vleien, spring, Flinch, haspel, krimp, sluip, stormloop, draai stert, draai wit, blansjeer , roep uit, hoendervleis, hoendervleis, gans-knoppe,
Worried|Bekommerd
Use this domain for words related to feeling worried--to feel bad because you think something bad might happen.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel bekommerd - om te voel sleg omdat jy dink iets sleg kan gebeur.
(1) What words refer to feeling worried?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel bekommerd?
worry (v), feel worried, be worried, feel anxious, be anxious, be afraid, feel afraid, feel scared, feel unsure, agonize over, wonder what is going to happen, uneasy, fret, brood, lose sleep, not like the look of, not like the sound of,|bekommernis (v), voel bekommerd, bekommerd, angstig voel, angstig, bang wees, voel bang, voel bang, onseker voel, angstig oor, wonder wat gaan gebeur, ongemaklike, vertoorn, brood, slaap verloor, hou nie die voorkoms van, nie soos die geluid van,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of worry?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van bekommernis?
worry, anxiety, concern, stress, strain, anguish, uncertainty, lack of confidence, apprehension, dismay,|bekommernis, angs, kommer, stres, spanning, angs, onsekerheid, gebrek aan selfvertroue, vrees, ontsteltenis,
(3) What words describe someone who feels worried?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat bekommerd voel?
worried, anxious, anxiously, apprehensive, bothered, concerned, dismayed, disturbed, strained, troubled, uneasy, unsettled,|bekommerd, angstig, angstig, bekommerd, gepla, betref, verskrik versteur, gespanne, ontsteld, onrustig, onafgehandelde,
(4) What words refer to being a little worried?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n bietjie bekommerd?
feel a little worried, slightly worried, a bit anxious, not so sure|voel &#39;n bietjie bekommerd, effens bekommerd, &#39;n bietjie angstig, nie so seker
(5) What words refer to being very worried?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wat baie bekommerd?
anxiety attack, really worried, really scared, really wondering, despair, despairing, desperate, desperation, be worried sick, be at your wits' end, frantic, frantically,|angs aanval, baie bekommerd, regtig bang, regtig wonder, wanhoop, wanhopige, desperate, desperaatheid, word siek bekommerd wees raadop, woes, waansinnig,
(6) What words refer to being worried all the time?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na wat bekommerd al die tyd?
have a lot on your mind, be under a strain, preoccupied, stressed out,|het &#39;n baie van jou verstand, wees onder &#39;n stam, besig, beklemtoon,
(7) What words refer to being worried when there is nothing to worry about?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na om bekommerd wanneer daar is niks om te bekommer oor?
paranoid, paranoia,|paranoïes, paranoia,
(8) What words refer to causing someone to feel worried?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te voel bekommerd?
worry someone, alarm (v), bother, concern (v), cause someone concern, disturb, trouble (v), bother, prey on your mind, cause concern, be a cause for concern, weigh on your mind, disquiet,|bekommer iemand, alarm (v), pla, kommer (v), veroorsaak iemand kommer, versteur, moeilikheid (v), pla, prooi op jou verstand, kommer veroorsaak, &#39;n bron van kommer, weeg op jou verstand, onrus,
(9) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel worried?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om te voel bekommerd?
worry (n), alarm (n), burden, concern (n), trouble (n), care, stresses and strains, hang-up, complex, weight,|bekommernis (n), alarm (n), las, kommer (n), die moeilikheid (n), sorg, spanning en stamme, hang-up, komplekse, gewig,
(10) What words describe something that causes someone to feel worried?|(10) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om te voel bekommerd te beskryf?
worrying, worrisome, alarming, anxious, bothersome, disturbing, nerve-racking, stressful, tense, niggling, alarmist,|kommerwekkend, kommerwekkende, kommerwekkend, angstig, lastige, ontstellend, senuwee-racking, stresvolle, gespanne, lastige, paniek saai,
(11) What words refer to someone who worries a lot?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat &#39;n baie bekommerd?
be a worrier, worrywart, neurotic, hypochondriac,|&#39;n pieker, worrywart, neurotiese, hipokondriese,
(12) What words refer to not being worried?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na nie bekommerd?
not worried, unworried, not concerned, unconcerned, unperturbed, not lose sleep over, don't care, without a care in the world, carefree, philosophical,|nie bekommerd, onbekommerde, nie betrokke, koud, onverstoord, verloor nie slaap oor, nie sorg nie, sonder &#39;n sorg in die wêreld, vol selfvertroue, filosofiese,
(13) What words refer to not being worried about something that you were worried about before?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na nie bekommerd oor iets wat jy is bekommerd oor voor was?
relief, relieved, be a weight off your mind, relax,|verligting, verlig, word &#39;n gewig van jou gedagtes, ontspan,
(14) What words refer to helping someone stop worrying?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na iemand help ophou bekommer?
reassure, reassuring, reassurance, put your mind at rest, put someone at their ease, put someone out of their misery,|gerusstel, gerus, gerusstelling, sit jou gedagtes op rus, sit iemand op hul gemak, sit iemand uit hul ellende,
(15) What do people say when they don't want someone to worry?|(15) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle nie wil hê dat iemand te bekommer?
Don't worry. There's nothing to worry about. Rest assured. Never mind.|Moenie bekommerd wees nie. Daar is niks te bekommer nie. Wees verseker. Never mind.
(16) What do people say when they don't need to worry anymore?|(16) Wat sê die mense as hulle nie nodig het om meer te bekommer?
Thank God! Thank goodness! What a relief!|Dankie God! Dankie tog! Wat &#39;n verligting!
(17) What do people do when they are worried?|(17) Wat doen die mense doen wanneer hulle bekommerd is?
wring your hands, bite your lip,|wring jou hande, byt jou lip,
Nervous|Senuweeagtig
Use this domain for words related to feeling nervous--to be worried and frightened that something bad may happen, so that you are unable to relax.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met senuweeagtig voel - bekommerd te wees en bang dat iets sleg kan gebeur, sodat jy nie in staat is om te ontspan is.
(1) What words refer to feeling nervous?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na senuweeagtig voel?
be nervous, be on edge, have butterflies (in your stomach), be on pins and needles,|wees senuweeagtig, wees op die rand, het skoenlappers (in jou maag), op naalde en spelde,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of being nervous?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van senuweeagtig?
nerves, nervousness, tension, unease, stage fright,|senuwees, senuweeagtigheid, spanning, ongemak, plankenkoorts,
(3) What words describe someone who feels nervous?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat senuweeagtig voel beskryf?
nervous, apprehensive, edgy, fidgety, flustered, ill at ease, jittery, restless, tense, uneasy, uneasily, uptight|senuweeagtig, bekommerd, edgy, kriewelrig, verbouereerd, ongemaklik, gejaagd, rusteloos, gespanne, ongemaklike, ongemaklik, uptight
(4) What words refer to feeling very nervous?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel baie senuweeagtig?
agitated, be a bundle of nerves, excited, have the jitters, be jittery, jumpy,  nervous wreck, panicky, be in a state,|geroer, &#39;n bondel senuwees, opgewonde, het die jitters, wees gejaagd, spring, senuwee wrak, paniekerig, in &#39;n toestand,
(5) What words describe someone who is often nervous?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat dikwels senuweeagtig beskryf?
nervous, high-strung, of a nervous disposition,|senuweeagtig, hoë-gespan, van &#39;n senuwee ingesteldheid,
(6) What words refer to causing someone to feel nervous?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om senuweeagtig voel?
make someone nervous, fluster, unsettle, unnerve, psych out, put someone on edge,|maak iemand senuweeagtig, verwarring, ontwrig, ontsenu, psych uit, sit iemand op die rand,
(7) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel nervous?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om senuweeagtig voel?
strain,|stam,
(8) What words describe something that causes someone to feel nervous?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om senuweeagtig voel beskryf?
tense, strained, uneasy, nail biting, charged, nerve-racking|gespanne, gespanne, ongemaklike, naelbyt, aangekla word, senutergend
(9) What words refer to causing someone to not feel nervous?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te voel nie senuweeagtig?
reassure, reassuring, reassurance, reassuringly,|gerusstel, gerus, gerusstelling, gerusstellend,
Shy, timid|Skaam, skugter
Use this domain for words related to feeling shy--to feel bad (afraid) when you are with people because you think they might think something bad about you if you say or do something (for instance, being afraid to talk, feeling inadequate to do what is required in a social situation, or not feeling as good as other people).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gevoel skaam - te sleg voel (bang) wanneer jy met mense omdat jy dink hulle kan iets sleg te dink oor jou as jy sê of doen iets (byvoorbeeld bang om te praat, onvoldoende is om te voel doen wat nodig is in &#39;n sosiale situasie, of nie voel so goed soos ander mense).
(1) What words refer to feeling shy?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na skaam voel?
be shy, feel shy,|skaam wees, voel skaam,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of shyness?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van skaamte?
shyness, inhibition|bedeesd, inhibisie
(3) What words describe someone who feels shy?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat skaam voel beskryf?
shy, timid, uncomfortable, bashful, coy, diffident, reserved, withdrawn, introverted, inhibited|skaam, skugter, ongemaklik, skaam, skugter, bedeesd, voorbehou, onttrek, introvert, geïnhibeer
(4) What words refer to causing someone to feel shy?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om skaam te voel?
inhibit, intimidate, make you feel uncomfortable,|inhibeer, te intimideer, maak dat jy ongemaklik voel,
(5) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel shy?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om skaam te voel?
intimidation,|intimidasie,
(6) What words describe something that causes someone to feel shy?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om skaam te voel beskryf?
inhibiting, intimidating, uncomfortable,|inhiberende, intimiderend, ongemaklik,
(7) What words refer to not being shy?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na nie skaam?
come out of your shell, come out of yourself, open up|kom uit jou dop, kom uit jouself, oopmaak
(8) What words refer to helping someone to not be shy?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iemand om te help nie skaam te wees?
bring someone out of their shell, bring someone out, put someone at ease,|bring iemand uit hul dop, bring iemand uit, sit iemand op sy gemak,
Confused|Verward
Use this domain for words related to feeling confused--to be worried and uncertain about what something means or what to do.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gevoel verwar - bekommerd en onseker is oor wat iets beteken of wat om te doen om te wees.
(1) What words refer to feeling confused?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na verward voel?
be confused, be in a muddle,|verwar word, word in &#39;n warboel,
(2) What words refer to the feeling of being confused?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel van verward?
confusion, bewilderment, mystification, perplexity,|verwarring, verwarring, mystificatie, verwarring,
(3) What words describe someone who feels confused?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat verward voel?
confused, baffled, befuddled, bemused, mystified, perplexed, puzzled, stupefied, unsure,|verward, stomheid geslaan, benewel, onrustig, mystified, verleë, verward, verdoof, onseker,
(4) What words describe someone who is very confused?|(4) Watter woorde iemand wat baie verward beskryf?
bewildered, mixed-up|verward, deurmekaar
(5) What words refer to causing someone to feel confused?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om verward voel?

(6) What words refer to something that causes someone to feel confused?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om verward voel?
distraction, puzzle (n), mystery,|afleiding, legkaart (n), geheim,
(7) What words describe something that causes someone to feel confused?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat veroorsaak iemand om verward voel beskryf?
confusing, puzzling, bewildering, baffling|verwarrend, verwarrend, verwarrende, baffling
(8) What words refer to confusing one thing for another?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na verwarrend een ding vir &#39;n ander?
confuse, mix someone up with, mix people up, get something mixed up with, get things mixed up,|verwar, meng iemand met, meng mense op, kry iets gemeng met, kry dinge deurmekaar,
Communication|Kommunikasie
Use this domain for general words referring to communication of all kinds.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die kommunikasie van alle soorte.

communicate, communication|kommunikeer, kommunikasie
Say|Sê
Use this domain for words related to saying something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets sê.
(1) What words refer to saying something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets sê?
say, speak, talk, tell, state, express, declare, proclaim, inform, pronounce, remark on, make a remark|sê, praat, praat, sê, staat, uit te druk, te verklaar, te verkondig, in te lig, te spreek, opmerking oor, maak &#39;n opmerking
(2) What words refer to something that is said?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gesê word?
saying, quote, declaration, tale, speech, profession, remark, statement|sê, haal, verklaring, verhaal, spraak, beroep, opmerking, verklaring
(3) What words refer to how something is said?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hoe iets gesê?
pronunciation|uitspraak
Voice|Voice
Use this domain for words referring to a person's voice and the way it sounds--the kind of sound a person makes when they speak or sing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se stem en die manier waarop dit klink - die soort van klank &#39;n persoon maak wanneer hulle praat of sing.
(1) What words refer to a person's voice?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se stem?
voice|stem
(2) What words describe the quality of a person's voice?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die gehalte van &#39;n persoon se stem?
soft, harsh, loud, quiet,|sagte, harde, harde, stil,
(3) What words describe a sound or voice that is high on the musical scale?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n klank of stem wat hoog op die musikale skaal?
high, high-pitched, piercing, shrill, squeaky, tinny,|hoë, hoë-frekwensie, piercing, skril, pieperig, blikkerige,
(4) What words describe a sound or voice that is low on the musical scale?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n klank of stem wat laag op die musikale skaal?
low, deep, bass, rich, resonant,|lae, diep, bass, ryk, resonante,
(5) What words describe a voice that is rough?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n stem wat is grof?
rough, throaty, husky, gruff, hoarse,|rof, kenmerkende diep, hees, growwe, hees,
Shout|Skree
Use this domain for words related to shouting--to speak loudly.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met skree - om hard praat.
(1) What words refer to speaking loudly?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na hard praat?
shout, speak loudly, yell, scream, talk in a loud voice, holler, call out, project your voice, aloud, exclaim, exclamation, vociferate,|geroep, praat hard, gil, skree, praat in &#39;n groot stem Holler, roep, projek jou stem, hardop uitroep, uitroepteken, razen,
Speak quietly|Praat saggies
Use this domain for words that describe a person speaking quietly.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat &#39;n persoon rustig praat beskryf.
(1) What words refer to speaking quietly?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na rustig praat?
speak quietly, talk softly, whisper, murmur, mumble,|praat rustig, praat saggies, fluister, murmureer, gemompel,
(2) What words refer to speaking without making any sound?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na praat sonder om enige klank?
mouth the words,|mond die woorde,
(3) What words do you use when you want someone to speak quietly?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik jy wanneer jy iemand wil rustig praat?
tone it down,|toon dit af,
Speak a lot|Praat &#39;n baie
Use this domain for words related to speaking a lot.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n baie praat.
(1) What words refer to speaking a lot?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n baie praat?
speak a lot, talkative, loquacious, verbose,|spreek &#39;n baie, spraaksaam, kwetterend, verbose,
(2) What words refer to speaking for a long time?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die woord vir &#39;n lang tyd?
loquacious, verbose, wordy, run on, longwinded, compendious, interminable,|kwetterend, verbose, langdradig, loop op, langdradige, beknopt, eindelose,
Speak little|Praat bietjie
Use this domain for words related to speaking a little, either because you do not like to talk, or you think you should not talk.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n bietjie praat, hetsy omdat jy nie wil praat nie, of wat jy dink jy moet praat nie.
(1) What words refer to speaking a little?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n bietjie praat?
speak little, taciturn, shy, man of few words, uncommunicative, reticent, hold your tongue|praat min, stil, skaam, man van min woorde, geslote, terughoudend, hou jou tong
(2) What words refer to saying something in a short time?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets sê in &#39;n kort tyd?
brevity, brief, concise, curt, pithy, succinct, synopsis, synoptic, terse,|bondigheid, kort, bondige, kortaf, pittig, bondige, samevatting, sinoptiese, kernagtige,
Say nothing|Sê niks
Use this domain for words related to being silent--to say nothing for some time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met stil - niks vir &#39;n geruime tyd te sê.
(1) What words refer to not talking?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na praat nie?
keep silent, keep quiet, say nothing, zip your lip, shut up, refrain from talking|swyg, hou stil, niks om te sê, rits jou lip, toegesluit, weerhou van praat
(2) What words describe someone who is silent?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat stil te beskryf?
silent, quiet, close-mouthed, mum, mute, speechless, wordless|stil, stil, naby-mond, ma, stom, sprakeloos, woordlose
(3) What words refer to stopping someone from talking?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na stop iemand uit te praat?
gag, hush, muffle, silence (v),|gag, hush, en gedemp, stilte (v),
(4) What words refer to a time when everyone is silent?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd wanneer almal is stil?
silence|stilte
Speech style|Toespraak styl
Use this domain for words describing the way a person talks in a particular social situation.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf die manier waarop &#39;n persoon in &#39;n bepaalde sosiale situasie praat.
(1) What words refer to your style of speaking?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na jou styl van praat?
style, register, formal, informal, colloquial, humorously, seriously, pronunciation|styl, register, formele, informele, omgangstaal, humor, ernstig, uitspraak
Speak well|Goed te praat
Use this domain for words related to speaking well.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met goed praat.
(1) What words refer to speaking well?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na goed praat?
speak well, be eloquent, be a good speaker, be an excellent speaker, be fluent, speak clearly, articulate,|goed praat, wees welsprekende, &#39;n goeie spreker, &#39;n uitstekende spreker, vlot, duidelik praat, verwoord,
Speak poorly|Praat swak
Use this domain for words related to speaking poorly.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met swak praat.
(1) What words refer to not being able to speak correctly?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die nie in staat om korrek te praat?
slow of speech, not fluent, poor speaker, stutter, stammer, have a speech impediment|stadig van spraak, nie vlot, swak spreker, stutter, gestamel, het &#39;n spraakgebrek
(2) What words refer to speaking so that people can't understand you?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na praat sodat mense wat jy nie kan verstaan ​​nie?
speak incoherently, speak irrational, say nonsense, speak gibberish, No one could understand him. I can't understand you. I can't understand a word you are saying.|onsamehangend praat, praat irrasionele, sê nonsens praat brabbeltaal, kon niemand hom verstaan. Ek kan jou nie verstaan ​​nie. Ek kan nie &#39;n woord verstaan ​​wat jy sê.
(3) What words refer to making a mistake when speaking?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n fout maak wanneer praat?
stumble, misspeak, gaff, speak ungrammatically|struikel, misspeak, gaffel, spreek ungrammatically
(4) What words are used for speaking inappropriately?|(4) Watter woorde word gebruik vir onvanpas praat?
speak inappropriately, be rude, crude, socially unacceptable, filthy speech, out of place, not fit for mixed company, shocking speech|spreek onvanpas, onbeskof wees, ru, sosiaal onaanvaarbaar, vuil spraak, uit plek, nie geskik vir gemengde geselskap, skokkende toespraak
(5) What words refer to not knowing what to say?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wat nie weet wat om te sê?
not know what to say, be speechless, tongue-tied, cat's got your tongue|weet nie wat om te sê, wees sprakeloos sprakeloos, kat se het jou tong
(6) What words refer to speaking too long?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na te lank praat?
speak for too long, go over the time allotted, be long winded, speak forever|praat vir te lank, gaan oor die tyd voor, word lang asem, praat vir ewig
(7) What words refer to when a person wants to speak but hesitates?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer &#39;n persoon wil praat, maar aarsel?
hesitate, pause, false start|huiwer, breek, valse begin
(8) What words describe something that has been said so often that people think it is stupid?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat so dikwels gesê dat mense dink dit is dom beskryf?
trite, over-used, stale, banal, be wearing thin, threadbare, clichéd, corny, hackneyed, shopworn, stereotyped, commonplace|banaal, oor-gebruik, verjaar, banale, dra dun, verslete, afgesaagde, corny, geykte, shopworn, stereotipe, alledaags
Talk about a subject|Praat oor &#39;n onderwerp
Use this domain for words related to talking about a subject.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met praat oor &#39;n onderwerp.
(1) What words refer to talking about a subject?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na praat oor &#39;n onderwerp?
talk about, dwell on, discuss, address, treat, cover,|praat, woon op, bespreek, adres, behandel, cover,
(2) What words refer to the thing being talked about?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die ding gepraat oor?
subject, topic, theme, issue, question, matter, business, thing,|onderwerp, onderwerp, tema, onderwerp, vraag, kwessie, besigheid, ding,
(3) What words refer to a part of a subject?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van &#39;n onderwerp?
point, aspect,|punt, aspek,
(4) What words refer to starting to talk about something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na begin om te praat oor iets?
bring up, raise, broach, introduce, launch into,|bring, in te samel, te benader, stel, van stapel te stuur in,
(5) What words refer to starting to talk about a different subject?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na begin om te praat oor &#39;n ander onderwerp?
change topics, switch topics, turn to, get onto,|verander onderwerpe, skakel onderwerpe, draai om, kry op,
(6) What words refer to talking about the subject you are supposed to be talking about?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na praat oor die onderwerp wat jy veronderstel is om te praat?
get to the point, stick to the point, to the point,|kry tot op die punt, vashou aan die punt, tot op die punt,
(7) What words refer to starting to talk about something else instead of what you are supposed to be talking about?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na begin om te praat oor iets anders in plaas van wat jy veronderstel is om te praat?
get off the subject, digress, get sidetracked, stray from, ramble, lose the thread, where was I?|af te kry die onderwerp, digress, sylyn beland, verdwaalde uit, loop, verloor die draad, waar was ek?
Announce|Kondig
Use this domain for words related to announcing something--communicating something to many people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets aankondiging - kommunikeer iets vir baie mense.
(1) What words refer announcing something?|(1) Wat woorde verwys aankondiging iets?
announce, declare, proclaim, publicize, publish, broadcast, make something public, make known, promote, advertise, inform, post|kondig, te verklaar, te verkondig, te publiseer, te publiseer, uitsaai, iets maak publiek, maak bekend, te bevorder, adverteer, inlig, post
(2) What words refer to what is announced?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat aangekondig?
announcement, publicity, propaganda|aankondiging, publisiteit, propaganda
(3) What words describe something that has been communicated to many people?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat gekommunikeer baie mense beskryf?
well publicized|goed gepubliseerde
Describe|Beskryf
Use this domain for words related to describing something--to say some things about something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets beskryf - &#39;n paar dinge sê oor iets.
(1) What words refer to describing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets beskryf?
describe, give a description of, portray, depict, paint a picture, characterize, define, redefine, represent, treat|beskryf, gee &#39;n beskrywing van, uitbeeld, beeld, verf &#39;n prentjie, karakteriseer, te definieer, te herdefinieer, verteenwoordig, te behandel
(2) What words refer to describing an event?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die beskrywing van &#39;n gebeurtenis?
describe, talk about, write about, give an account of, tell of|beskryf, praat, skryf, gee &#39;n rekening van, vertel
(3) What words refer to what you say when you describe something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat jy sê wanneer jy iets te beskryf?
description, descriptive, portrayal, profile, account, report, commentary, characterization, definition, redefinition, depiction, representation,|beskrywing, beskrywende, uitbeelding, profiel, rekening, verslag, kommentaar, karakterisering, definisie, herdefiniëring, uitbeelding, voorstelling,
Explain|Verduidelik
Use this domain for words related to explaining something--to help someone to understand something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets verduidelik - om te help om iemand iets om te verstaan.
(1) What words refer to explaining something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets verduidelik?
explain, throw light on, shed light on, enlighten, elucidate, by way of explanation,|verduidelik, gooi lig op, werp lig op, verlig, toe te lig by wyse van verduideliking,
(2) What words do people use when they start to explain something?|(2) Watter woorde mense gebruik wanneer hulle begin om iets te verduidelik?
in other words, let me explain, that is, to put it another way, put it like this, put it this way, let me rephrase that,|Met ander woorde, laat ek verduidelik, dit is, om dit &#39;n ander manier, sit dit soos hierdie, sit dit op hierdie manier, laat my herformuleer dat
(3) What words refer to explaining how something works or how to do something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat verduidelik hoe iets werk of hoe om iets te doen?
tell, explain, demonstrate, give instructions,|vertel, verduidelik, demonstreer, gee instruksies,
(4) What words refer to explaining something difficult using simple language?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets verduidelik moeilike gebruik van eenvoudige taal?
simplify, demystify,|vereenvoudig, demystify,
(5) What words refer to explaining something completely?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets heeltemal verduidelik?
set out,|uiteengesit,
(6) What words refer to what you say when you explain something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na wat jy sê wanneer jy iets verduidelik?
explanation, account, instructions, directions,|verduideliking, rekening, instruksies, aanwysings,
Mention|Melding
Use this domain for words related to mentioning something--to talk about something but without saying much about it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vermelding iets - om te praat oor iets, maar sonder om te sê nie veel oor nie.
(1) What words refer to mentioning something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na noem iets?
mention, refer to, allude to, touch on, say briefly,|noem, verwys na, verwys na, raak, sê kortliks
Introduce|Stel
Use this domain for words related to introducing a new subject--to start talking or writing about something new for the first time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die bekendstelling van &#39;n nuwe onderwerp - om te begin praat of skryf oor iets nuuts vir die eerste keer.
(1) What words refer to talking about something for the first time?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na praat oor iets vir die eerste keer?
introduce, lead into, bring up, raise, broach a subject,|stel, lei na, laat optrek, verhoog, benader &#39;n onderwerp,
(2) What words refer to what is said when you introduce something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word wanneer jy iets stel?
introduction, lead-in, introductory|inleiding, lei-in, inleidende
Repeat|Herhaal
Use this domain for words related to repeating something--saying something a second time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die herhaling van iets - iets sê &#39;n tweede keer.
(1) What words refer to saying something a second time?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets te sê &#39;n tweede keer?
repeat, repeat yourself, say again, iterate, recapitulate, reiterate, reaffirm|herhaal, herhaal jouself, sê weer, Itereer, saam vat, herhaal, bevestig
(2) What words refer to saying something many times?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat baie keer sê?
say it over and over, keep saying|sê dit oor en oor, sê hou
(3) What words refer to repeating an important part of a speech?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die herhaling van &#39;n belangrike deel van &#39;n toespraak?
go over, recap, review|gaan oor, herhaling, hersiening
(4) What words refer to repeating what someone else said?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die herhaling van wat iemand anders gesê het?
repeat, quote, echo, parrot, regurgitate|herhaal, haal, eggo, papegaai, spoeg
(5) What words refer to what is said a second time?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wat gesê word &#39;n tweede keer?
repetition, recapitulation|herhaling, herhaling
(6) What do you say when you want someone to repeat something?|(6) Wat sê jy wanneer jy iemand wil iets herhaal?
Summarize|Som
Use this domain for words referring to summarizing what you have said or what someone else has said.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die opsomming wat jy gesê het, of wat iemand anders gesê het.
(1) What words refer to repeating what someone has said, but saying it in fewer words?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die herhaling van wat iemand gesê het nie, maar sê dit in minder woorde?
summarize, summary, review, recap|op te som, opsomming, oorsig, herhaling
(2) What words refer to a brief description of the major points or features of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kort beskrywing van die belangrikste punte of kenmerke van iets?
summarize, summary, synopsis, overview|op te som, opsomming, opsomming, oorsig
Emphasize|Beklemtoon
Use this domain for words related to emphasizing something--to say something in a way that other people know that you think this thing is important.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets te beklemtoon - om iets op &#39;n manier sê dat ander mense weet wat jy dink hierdie ding is belangrik.
(1) What words refer to the placing of importance on something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die op iets plasing van belang?
emphasize, stress|beklemtoon, stres
(2) What words refer to the importance placed on something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die belangrikheid geplaas op iets?
emphasis, stress, importance|klem, stres, belang
(3) What words describe something that is emphasized?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat beklemtoon word beskryf?
important, stand out, be conspicuous, be prominent|belangrik is, staan ​​uit, wees opvallend, wees prominente
Be about, subject|Wees oor, onderhewig
Use this domain for words that express the idea that something (said, written, thought, or made) depicts or is about a subject, or that something is logically related to some topic. Also use this domain for words that mark the topic or subject of what is being thought about, talked about, or written about. Verbs of thinking, knowing, or speaking (including other types of expression) can take a 'topic' role. We can think of a 'topic' as the main idea. Use this domain also for the important thing in a picture.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat die idee dat iets (sê, geskryf, gedink, of gemaak) druk beeld of is oor &#39;n onderwerp, of dat iets logies verwant aan sekere onderwerp. Gebruik ook hierdie domein vir woorde wat die onderwerp of onderwerp van wat gedink het oor merk, het gepraat oor, of geskryf oor. Werkwoorde van dink, wetende of praat (insluitend ander vorme van uitdrukking) kan &#39;n &#39;onderwerp &#39;n rol te neem. Ons kan dink aan &#39;n &#39;onderwerp&#39; as die hoof idee. Gebruik hierdie domein ook vir die belangrikste ding in &#39;n foto.
(1) What words refer to being about something or someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na synde oor iets of iemand?
be about something, concern, deal with, be concerned with, center on, focus on, address, cover, depict, discuss, dwell on, present, portray, treat,|wees oor iets, kommer, hanteer, bekommerd te wees met, sentrum op, fokus op, adres, cover, uitbeeld, bespreek, woon op, hede uitbeeld, te behandel,
(2) What words indicate what something is about?|(2) Watter woorde dui wat iets is?
about, on, concerning, on the subject of, regarding, re, with regard to, in, of,|oor, op, oor, oor die onderwerp van, rakende, re, met betrekking tot, in, van,
(3) What words refer to the thing something is about?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die ding iets oor?
True|True
Use this domain for words that indicate if something is true, if it agrees with reality, or if it is not true.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui of iets waar is, as dit ooreenstem met die werklikheid, of as dit nie waar is nie.
(1) What words indicate that a statement agrees with reality?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n verklaring is dit eens met die werklikheid?
true, truth, accurate, in fact, right, correct|waar, waarheid, akkuraat, in werklikheid, regs, korrek
(2) What words indicate that something is not true?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets nie waar is nie?
untrue, false, falsehood, wrong, error, inaccurate, incorrect, mistake|onwaar, vals, leuens, verkeerd, fout, onakkurate, verkeerde, fout
Tell the truth|Vertel die waarheid
Use this domain for words related to telling the truth.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die waarheid.
(1) What words refer to telling the truth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die waarheid?
tell the truth, speak the truth, be honest, be open, be up front, play fair, level with, lay/put your cards on the table, testify, witness, reveal,|vertel die waarheid, die waarheid praat, wees eerlik, oop, wees aan die voorkant, speel regverdig, vlak, lê / sit jou kaarte op die tafel, getuig, getuig, te openbaar,
(2) What words describe a person who tells the truth?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat die waarheid vertel?
honest, truthful, sincere, straight, open, scrupulous, upright,|eerlike, opregte, opregte, reguit, oop, deurdagte, regop,
(3) What words refer to telling the truth without hiding anything?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die waarheid sonder om iets te verberg vertel?
honest, to be honest, in all honesty, frank, candid, direct, straightforward, tell someone straight,|eerlike, om eerlik te wees, in alle eerlikheid, eerlik, openhartige, direkte, reguit, vertel iemand reguit,
(4) What words refer to telling the truth without caring how other people feel?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die waarheid sonder omgee hoe ander mense voel vertel?
forthright, blunt, outspoken, bald, speak your mind, not beat about the bush, make no bones about, not mince your words, call a spade a spade, pull no punches,|reguit, stomp, uitgesproke, kaal, praat jou verstand, nie doekies, maak geen geheim nie jou doekies, roep &#39;n graaf &#39;n graaf, trek geen stoot,
(5) What words refer to the quality of telling the truth?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die gehalte van die waarheid?
honesty, integrity, truthfulness, scruples,|eerlikheid, integriteit, eerlikheid, gewete,
Tell a lie|Vertel &#39;n leuen
Use this domain for words related to lying--to say something that is not true.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die leuen - iets wat nie waar is nie te sê nie.
(1) What words refer to saying something that is not true?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat nie waar is nie te sê?
lie, tell a lie, pervert truth, deceive, tell tales, perjure, make up|leuen vertel &#39;n leuen, verdraai die waarheid, mislei, verhale te vertel, perjure, maak
(2) What words refer to a lie?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n leuen?
lie, falsehood, fib, white lie, half-truth, perjury, propaganda|leuen, leuens, fib, wit leuen, halwe waarheid, meineed, propaganda
(3) What words refer to someone who lies?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat lê?
liar|leuenaar
Contradict|Weerspreek
Use this domain for words related to contradicting someone--to say that something someone has said is not true.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met weerspreek iemand - om te sê dat iets wat iemand gesê het, is nie waar nie.
(1) What words refer to contradicting what someone has said?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na weerspreek wat iemand gesê het?
contradict, speak in opposition to, disagree with, speak against, deny, dispute, argue against|weerspreek, praat in die opposisie te, nie saamstem met, praat teen, ontken, geskil, argumenteer teen
Expose falsehood|Bloot leuens
Use this domain for words related to exposing falsehood--to do something to show that someone has told a lie.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die blootstelling van die leuen - om iets te doen om te wys dat iemand &#39;n leuen vertel het.
(1) What words refer to exposing falsehood?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die blootstelling van leuens?
testify, expose falsehood, catch in a lie, contradict, enlighten, substantiate, provide evidence, call a liar|getuig, bloot &#39;n leuen, vang in &#39;n leuen, weerspreek, verlig, te staaf, voorsien bewyse, noem &#39;n leuenaar
Real|Real
Use this domain for words that indicate if something is real.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui of iets real.
(1) What words describe something that is real?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat werklik beskryf?
real, actual, genuine,|werklike, werklike, ware,
(2) What words describe something that is real and not imagined?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat is werklik en nie gedink beskryf?
actual, concrete, fact, factual, nonfiction, real, reality, true|werklike, konkrete, trouens, feitelike, nie-fiksie, real, realiteit, ware
(3) What words describe something that is not real?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie werklik beskryf?
unreal, artificial, imaginary, phony, pretend,|onwerklik, kunsmatige, denkbeeldige, valse, voorgee,
Exaggerate|Oordryf
Use this domain for words referring to exaggerating--reporting information but saying something untrue that makes the information seem bigger or more important than it really is.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na oordryf - verslagdoening inligting, maar iets sê onwaar dat die inligting laat lyk groter of meer belangrik as wat dit werklik is.
(1) What words refer to exaggerating?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na oordryf?
exaggerate, stretch the truth, inflate your story, distort, overemphasize, overstate, overemphasize, overrate, overdo, make too much of, blow something out of proportion, lay it on thick, dramatize, be melodramatic, be overly dramatic|oordryf, die waarheid te rek, opblaas jou storie, verdraai, overemphasize, dryf, overemphasize, oorskat, oordoen, te veel van te maak, blaas iets uit proporsie, lê dit op dik, dramatiseer, wees melodramatiese, té dramatiese
(2) What words refer to what is said when you exaggerate?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word wanneer jy oordryf?
exaggeration, overstatement|oordrywing, oordrewe
(3) What words describe an exaggerated statement?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n oordrewe stelling?
exaggerated, extravagant, melodramatic|oordrewe, oordadige, melodramatiese
Speak with others|Praat met ander
Use this domain for words referring to carrying on a conversation with other people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die beoefening van &#39;n gesprek met ander mense.
(1) What words refer to carrying on a conversation with other people?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die beoefening van &#39;n gesprek met ander mense?
speak with, converse, carry on a conversation, talk with, talk to, chat, discuss|spreek, omgekeerde, voer op &#39;n gesprek, praat met, praat met, gesels, bespreek
(2) What words refer to an event or time period when people talk to each other?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebeurtenis of tydperk wanneer mense met mekaar praat?
conversation, discussion|gesprek, gesprek
(3) What words refer to what is talked about?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat gepraat oor?
topic (of conversation)|onderwerp (van die gesprek)
(4) What words modify the length of time?|(4) Watter woorde verander die lengte van die tyd?
long (conversation, talk), brief (conversation)|lank (gesprek, praat), kort (gesprek)
Call|Call
Use this domain for words related to calling someone--to say something loud because you want someone who is far away to listen to you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die roeping iemand - onder luide iets te sê nie omdat jy iemand wat ver weg na jou luister wil.
(1) What words refer to calling someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die roeping van iemand?
call, holler at, yell to, yell at, get someone's attention|noem, Holler by, skreeu om, gil op, kry iemand se aandag
(2) What words refer to calling someone on the telephone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die roeping van iemand op die telefoon?
call, phone (v)|oproep, telefoon (v)
Contact|Kontak
Use this domain for words related to contacting someone--to communicate with someone who is far away from you using some communication device such as a telephone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die kontak iemand - om te kommunikeer met iemand wat deur &#39;n paar kommunikasie toestel ver van jou soos &#39;n telefoon.

get in touch with, contact, make contact with, approach, get onto,|kry in voeling met, kontak, maak kontak met, benadering, kry op,
(2) What words refer to regularly contacting someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys gereeld kontak iemand?
be in contact, keep in touch, stay in touch, keep in contact, communicate,|in kontak, hou in aanraking, bly in kontak, in kontak te hou, te kommunikeer,
(3) What words refer to succeeding in contacting someone?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na sukses in kontak iemand?
get hold of, get through, reach,|in die hande kry, kry deur, bereik,
(4) What words refer to the process by which people contact each other?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die proses waardeur mense mekaar kontak?
communication, contact,|kommunikasie, kontak,
(5) What words refer to no longer communicating with someone?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na nie meer kommunikeer met iemand?
lose touch, lose contact,|verloor touch, kontak verloor,
Greet|Groet
Use this domain for words related to greeting someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met groet iemand.
(1) What words refer to greeting someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na groet iemand?
greet, say hello|groet, groet
(2) What words describe a greeting?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groet?
greet warmly, warm greeting, cool reception, enthusiastic greeting|groet hartlik, warm groet, koel ontvangs, entoesiastiese groet
(3) What gestures typically accompany a greeting?|(3) Wat gebare tipies vergesel &#39;n groet?
shake hands, bow, salute, give a hug, give a kiss, wave hello|skud hande, buig, saluut, gee &#39;n drukkie gee &#39;n soen, zwaaien
(4) What words refer to a refusal to greet someone?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n weiering om iemand te groet?
refuse to greet, snub, ignore|weier om te groet, stompe, ignoreer
(5) What words and expressions are used when greeting someone?|(5) Watter woorde en uitdrukkings word gebruik wanneer iemand groet?
Say farewell|Afskeid

(1) What words refer to saying farewell?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na afskeid?

(2) What words and expressions are used when saying farewell?|(2) Watter woorde en uitdrukkings word gebruik wanneer afskeid?
Goodbye. See you later. Have a good day.|Totsiens. Sien julle later. Het jy &#39;n goeie dag.
Speak in unison|Praat in harmonie
Use this domain for words related to speaking in unison--to say something at the same time as someone else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die spreek in harmonie - iets op dieselfde tyd as iemand anders sê.

Ask|Vra
Use this domain for words related to asking a question.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n vraag vra.
(1) What words refer to saying something in order to get information?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets sê om inligting te kry?
ask, question, inquire, interrogate, interview|vra die vraag, vra, te ondervra, onderhoud
(2) What words refer to what is said?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word?
question, inquiry, interrogation, interview|vraag, ondersoek, ondervraging, onderhoud
(3) What words describe someone who asks a lot of questions?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat &#39;n baie vrae vra beskryf?

Answer|Antwoord
Use this domain for words related to answering a question.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n vraag beantwoord.
(1) What words refer to answering a question?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vraag beantwoord?
answer, give an answer, reply, get back to, respond, acknowledge|beantwoord, gee &#39;n antwoord, antwoord, terug te kry om, reageer, erken
(2) What words refer to what is said in answer?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word in antwoord?
answer, response, reply, acknowledgment, rebuttal, rejoinder, return, echo, feedback, immediate response, answer by return mail|antwoord, reaksie, antwoord, erkenning, weerlegging, repliek, kom terug, eggo, terugvoer, onmiddellike reaksie, antwoord deur e-pos terug
(3) What words refer to a humorous answer?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n humoristiese antwoord?
snappy comeback, retort, repartee|pittig comeback, retort, gevat
(4) What words describe an answer?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n antwoord?
carefully worded, careful, well thought through, off the cuff, off hand, wise, stupid, thoughtless, foolish|versigtig bewoorde, versigtig, goed deurdink, uit die vuis, off hand, wyse, dom, ondeurdagte, dwase
(5) What words refer to the time it takes to answer?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd wat dit neem om te antwoord?
take a long time to answer, take your time to answer, quick reply, response time|neem &#39;n lang tyd om te antwoord, neem jou tyd om te antwoord, vinnige antwoord, reaksie tyd
(6) What words refer to not having an answer or not knowing what to answer?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na nie met &#39;n antwoord of nie weet wat om te antwoord?
have no answer, lack answer, not know what to answer, don't know how to answer, don't know what to say, don't have an answer, can't answer|het geen antwoord nie, gebrek antwoord nie geweet wat om te antwoord, weet nie hoe om te antwoord, weet nie wat om te sê nie, nie &#39;n antwoord het nie, kan nie antwoord
Disclose|Openbaar
Use this domain for words that refer to discovering and revealing unknown information.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na die ontdekking en die onthulling van onbekende inligting.
(1) What words refer to discovering information?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die ontdekking van inligting?

(3) What words describe something that is not hidden?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie weggesteek beskryf?
open, openly, in the open, for all to see|oop, openlik, in die oop, vir almal om te sien

Use this domain for words referring to debating--for two or more people to discuss some issue and try to persuade the other person to accept one's view.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na debattering - vir twee of meer mense om te bespreek en probeer om die ander persoon te oorreed om &#39;n mens se siening aanvaar.

Demonstrate|Demonstreer

demonstrate, show, show how, substantiate, prove, give proof, verify, authenticate, confirm, corroborate, give evidence, establish, make good|demonstreer, show, wys hoe, staaf, bewys, bewys lewer, te verifieer, te kontroleer, te bevestig, te staaf, te gee bewyse, vestig, maak &#39;n goeie
(2) What words refer to an event when you demonstrate something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebeurtenis as jy iets te demonstreer?
demonstration,|demonstrasie,

Boast|Roem

Criticize|Kritiseer
Use this domain for words related to criticizing someone or something--to say that something is bad, especially something that someone did.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die kritiek iets of iemand - om te sê dat daar iets is sleg, veral iets wat iemand gedoen het.
(1) What words refer to criticizing someone or something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die kritiek iets of iemand?
criticize, be critical, be a critic of, critique, accuse, attack, launch into an attack on, badmouth, belittle, blame, carp, cavil, censure, cite, charge, decry, denounce, deprecate, deride, disparage, gibe, harangue, judge, lay into, mock, rake someone over the coals, recriminate, reprehend, reproach, ridicule, scoff, speak evil of, tear down (someone), voice your disapproval,|kritiseer, krities te wees, word &#39;n kritikus van, te kritiseer, te beskuldig, aanval, begin in &#39;n aanval op, badmouth, verkleineer, blaam, karp, vitterij, sensuur, noem, beheer, afbreek, veroordeel, afkeuren, spot, verkleineer, skimp, sweep, regter, lê in, spot, hark iemand oor die kole, slaan nie, berispen, smaad, bespotting, spot, spreek kwaad van, afbreek (iemand), Voice jou afkeuring,
(2) What words refer to strongly criticizing someone or something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na sterk kritiek iets of iemand?
slam, pan, tear to shreds, pillory, do a hatchet job on, blast, castigate, condemn, damn, excoriate, execrate,|slam, pan, traan aan flarde, kaak, doen &#39;n strydbyl werk op, ontploffing, gispen, veroordeel, damn, vel afreken, vervloek,
(3) What words refer to criticizing someone in an unfair way?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die kritiek iemand in &#39;n onregverdige manier?
find fault with, pick holes in, knock, run down, denigrate, put down, get at,|fout vind met, pluk gate in, klop, loop af, denigrerend, sit, kry op,
(4) What words refer to something someone says when criticizing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat iemand sê wanneer kritiseer?
criticism, critique (n), accusation, attack (n), belittlement, castigation, censure, charge, condemnation, denigration, denouncement, denunciation, deprecation, derision, disapproval, disparagement, excoriation, execration, faultfinding, gibe (n), harangue (n), judgment, malediction, put-down, recrimination, reprehension, ridicule (n), slur,|kritiek, kritiek (n), beskuldiging, aanval (n), verkleinering, kastyding, sensuur, lading, veroordeling, swartsmeerdery, aanklacht, veroordeling, afkeuring, lag afkeuring, miskenning, excoriation, voorwerp van verwensing, foutopsporing, skimp (n), op te sweep (n), oordeel, vervloeking, sit-down, beskuldiging, blaam, bespotting (n), klad,
(5) What words describe something someone says when criticizing?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat iemand sê wanneer kritiseer?
critical (remark/essay), belittling, deprecatory, disparaging, scathing,|kritiese (opmerking / essay), verkleinering, afkeurend, neerhalende, striemende,
(6) What words refer to a person who often criticizes other people?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat dikwels kritiseer ander mense?
critic,|kritikus,
(7) What words describe someone who often criticizes other people?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat dikwels kritiseer ander mense?
critical, captious, censorious, hypercritical, judgmental,|kritiese, spitsvondig, vitterig, overcritisch, veroordelend,
(8) What words refer to being criticized by someone else?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na gekritiseer deur iemand anders?
receive criticism, come in for criticism, be under attack, come under attack, get a lot of flak, take a lot of flak, be open to criticism,|ontvang kritiek, kom in vir kritiek, onder aanval, kom onder aanval, kry &#39;n baie kritiek, neem &#39;n baie kritiek, oop wees vir kritiek,
(9) What words refer to someone who is criticized?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat gekritiseer?
target,|teiken,
(10) What words refer to not criticizing someone?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na nie kritiseer iemand?
don't blame, can't blame,|blameer nie, kan nie blameer nie,
Blame|Blaam
Use this domain for words related to blaming someone for something--to say that someone did something, and because of this something bad happened.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die skuld iemand vir iets - om te sê dat iemand iets gedoen het, en as gevolg van hierdie iets sleg gebeur het.
(1) What words refer to blaming someone for something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na blameer iemand vir iets?
blame someone for something, blame something on someone, say something is somebody's fault, put the blame on, lay the blame on, apportion blame, hold someone responsible,|blameer iemand vir iets, blameer iets op iemand, sê iets fout iemand se, sit die blaam op, lê die blaam op, verdeel skuld, hou iemand verantwoordelik,
(2) What words refer to blaming yourself for something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na blameer jouself vir iets?
blame yourself, reproach yourself,|blameer jouself, verwyt jouself,
(3) What words refer to being blamed for something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die skuld vir iets?
get the blame, get blamed for, take the blame, take the rap, carry the can, take the fall,|kry die skuld, kry die skuld vir, neem die blaam, neem die rap, dra die kan, neem die val,
(4) What words refer to someone who is unfairly blamed for something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat onregverdig die skuld vir iets?
scapegoat, fall guy,|sondebok, val man,
(5) What words refer to blaming someone else for something that is your fault?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand anders te blameer vir iets wat jou skuld?
shift the blame, pass the buck,|skuif die blaam, slaag die bok,
(6) What words refer to saying that someone is not to blame for something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na sê dat iemand nie te blameer vir iets?
exonerate, give someone the benefit of the doubt,|skoonmaak, gee iemand die voordeel van die twyfel,
(7) What words refer to people blaming each other for something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na mense blameer mekaar vir iets?
recriminations,|verwyte,
(8) What words refer to feeling bad about someone because you think they are to blame for something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na slegte gevoel oor iemand omdat jy dink hulle is te blameer vir iets?
reproach (n),|verwyt (n),
Insult|Belediging
Use this domain for words related to insulting someone--to say that someone is bad.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met beledig iemand - om te sê dat iemand is sleg.
(1) What words refer to insulting someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beledig iemand?
insult (v), insult (n), offend, offense, rebuke, criticize, curse, speak evil of|belediging (v), belediging (n), aanstoot, oortreding, bestraf, kritiseer, vloek, spreek kwaad van die
Mock|Mock
Use this domain for words referring to mocking someone--doing or saying something to make people laugh at someone because you don't like them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na gespot iemand - doen of sê iets om mense te laat lag iemand omdat jy nie hou van hulle.
(1) What words refer to mocking someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na gespot iemand?
mock, mockery, make fun of, tease, taunt, ridicule, scorn, sneer, sarcasm, deride, derision, jeer, laugh at, snicker, snigger, poke fun at, play a trick on, satirize, satire, parody, caricature, lampoon, make a fool of, roast|spot, bespotting, spot, terg, spot, bespotting, spot, ginnegappen, sarkasme, spot, spot geword het, hoon, lag, gehinnik, laggie, spot, speel &#39;n trick op, spot dryf, satire, parodie, karikatuur, pamflet, maak &#39;n gek van, gebraai
(2) What words describe something that is said or done to mock someone?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat gesê of gedoen om iemand te spot beskryf?
derisive, mock (adj), sarcastic, cutting, satirical, burlesque|spottend, mock (adj), sarkasties, sny, satiriese, burleske
(3) What words refer to someone who is being mocked?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat gespot?
laughingstock, fool, target, butt, buffoon, fall guy|belagging, dwaas, teiken, boude, nar, val man
(4) What words refer to doing something that causes someone to mock you?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat iemand om jou te spot doen?
be ridiculous, make a fool of yourself|belaglik, maak &#39;n gek van jouself
Gossip|Gossip
Use this domain for words related to gossip--to say something bad about a person who is not with you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met skinder - iets sleg oor &#39;n persoon wat nie saam met julle te sê nie.
(1) What words refer to gossiping?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na skinder?
gossip, talk about someone behind their back, bitch about, slag off, bad-mouth, start a whispering campaign, tattle, stab in the back, tell tales, start a rumor, spread rumors, spread an evil report, slander|skinder, praat oor iemand agter hulle rug, teef oor, slag af, slegte-mond, begin &#39;n fluister-veldtog, gesnap, steek in die rug, verhale te vertel, begin &#39;n gerug versprei gerugte versprei &#39;n slegte gerug, laster
(2) What words refer to what is said in gossip?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word in skinder?
gossip, rumor, tale, report, juicy detail, hearsay, scandal, slander, second hand story|skinder, gerug, verhaal, verslag, sappige detail, hoorsê, skandaal, laster, tweedehandse storie
(3) What words refer to someone who gossips?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat skinder?
gossip, busybody, talebearer, tattler, tattletale, chatterer, slanderer|skinder, moeial, kwaadstoker, babbelaar, babbelaar, babbelaar, lasteraar
(4) What do rumors do?|(4) Wat doen gerugte doen?
circulate, float, go around, be all over town, get spread|sirkuleer, vlot, gaan rondom, wees oor die hele dorp, kry versprei
Complain|Kla
Use this domain for words related to complaining--to say that you don't like something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kla - om te sê dat jy nie hou van iets.

complain, beef, blame, fuss, grouch, grouse, growl, murmur, mutter, object, protest, squawk, wail, yap, make a complaint, lodge a complaint, file a complaint, take it up with, take the matter up with, make a fuss, kick up a fuss, air your grievances, yammer,|kla, beesvleis, skuld, ophef, Grouch, hoen, grom, murmureer, mompel, voorwerp, protes, voëls kreet, huil, Yap, maak &#39;n klagte, &#39;n klag, &#39;n klagte, neem dit met, neem die saak met , maak &#39;n bohaai, skop &#39;n bohaai, lug jou griewe, Yammer,
(2) What words refer to complaining all the time?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na kla die hele tyd?
bitch, gripe (v), grumble, moan, nag (v), whine, go on about,|teef, gryp (v), mor, kla, nag (v), geteem, gaan oor,
(3) What words refer to someone who complains?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat kla?
complainer, fusspot, grumbler, misery, nag (n),|klager, fusspot, klakous, ellende, nag (n),
(4) What words describe someone who complains?|(4) Watter woorde iemand wat kla beskryf?

(5) What words refer to something someone says when complaining?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat iemand sê wanneer kla?
complaint, complaining, grumbling, protest, whining,|klagte, kla, mor, protes, huil,
(6) What words refer to something that someone complains about?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand kla oor?

plaintive, whiny|klagend, whiny
Promise|Promise
Use this domain for words related to promising to do something--to say that you will do something in the future.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die belofte om iets te doen - om te sê dat jy iets in die toekoms sal doen.

(3) What words refer to doing what you promised?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na doen wat jy belowe het?

(4) What words refer to not doing what you promised?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na nie doen wat jy belowe het?
break, renege on, go back on promise,|breek, renege op, gaan terug op die belofte,
(5) What words refer to asking someone to do what he promised?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand vra om te doen wat Hy beloof het?

(6) What words refer to allowing someone to not do what he promised?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na toelaat om iemand te doen nie wat hy belowe het?
release someone from a promise,|vry iemand uit &#39;n belofte,
Make speech|Maak toespraak
Use this domain for words related to making a speech--to talk for a long time to many people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die maak van &#39;n toespraak - om te praat vir &#39;n lang tyd vir baie mense.
(1) What words refer to making a speech?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n toespraak?
make a speech, give a speech, preach, sermonize, teach, lecture (v), give a talk on, address (v), orate, public speaking|maak &#39;n toespraak, gee &#39;n toespraak, preek, preken, onderrig (v), gee &#39;n praatjie oor, adres (v), oreren, openbare redevoering
(2) What words refer to the person making the speech?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die persoon wat die toespraak?
speaker, preacher, teacher, lecturer|spreker, prediker, onderwyser, dosent
(3) What words refer to the people listening to the speech?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die mense luister na die toespraak?
audience|gehoor
(4) What words refer to what is said?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wat gesê word?
speech, sermon, lecture (n), talk (n), address (n), oration, homily|spraak, preek, lesing (n), praat (n), adres (n), toegespreek, zeden preek
(5) What words refer to the parts of a speech?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n toespraak?
introduction, body of a speech, point, make a point, conclusion, concluding remarks,|inleiding, liggaam van &#39;n toespraak, punt, maak &#39;n punt, gevolgtrekking, slotopmerkings,
(6) What words refer to knowing or learning how to give a good speech?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die wete of leer hoe om &#39;n goeie toespraak te gee?
oratory, homiletics|oratorium, homiletiek
(7) What words describe a speaker who talks for a long time?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n spreker wat vir &#39;n lang tyd praat?
long winded|langasem
Report|Verslag

Figurative|Figuurlike
Use this domain for words referring to figurative speech--saying something that is not meant to be understood literally (according to the normal meaning of each word), or saying something that compares one thing to another.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na beeldspraak - sê iets wat nie bedoel is om letterlik verstaan ​​(volgens die normale betekenis van elke woord), of iets wat een ding vergelyk na &#39;n ander te sê.
(1) What words refer to figurative speech?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beeldspraak?
figurative, not literal, metaphorical, figure of speech, colorful language|figuurlik, nie letterlik, metaforiese, figuur van spraak, kleurvolle taal
(2) What words refer to particular types of figures of speech?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na spesifieke tipes stylfigure?
metaphor, simile, comparison|metafoor, vergelyking, vergelyking
Admit|Erken
Use this domain for words referring to admitting something--saying that you have done wrong, or that your beliefs were wrong|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die toelating van iets - sê dat jy verkeerd gedoen het nie, of dat jou oortuigings verkeerd
(1) What words refer to admitting something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die toelating van iets?
admit, confess, acknowledge|erken, bely, erken
(2) What words refer to refusing to admit something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die weiering om iets te erken?
deny, disavow, disclaim|ontken, verloën, ontken
Language|Taal
Use this domain for words referring to a language.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n taal.
(1) What words refer to a language?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n taal?

(4) What words refer to the language used to talk about a particular subject?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die taal wat gebruik word om te praat oor &#39;n spesifieke onderwerp?

(6) What words are used to talk about language?|(6) Watter woorde gebruik om te praat oor die taal?
linguistics, linguistic, metalanguage, vocabulary, dictionary, grammar, syntax, morphology, phonology, phonetics, sounds, semantics, meaning, pragmatics, rhetoric, pronunciation|linguistiek, taalkundige, metataal, woordeskat, woordeboek, grammatika, sintaksis, morfologie, fonologie, fonetiek, klanke, semantiek, betekenis, pragmatiek, retoriek, uitspraak
Word|Word
Use this domain for words that refer to words and groups of words.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na woorde en groepe woorde.
(1) What words refer to a word?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n woord?
word, term, verbal,|woord, term, verbale,
(2) What words refer to words that are similar in meaning?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na woorde wat soortgelyk in betekenis is?
synonym, synonymous, derivative, antonym, opposite of,|sinoniem, sinoniem, afgeleide, antoniem, teenoorgestelde van,
(3) What words refer to words that are similar in sound?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na woorde wat dieselfde klink, is?
homograph, homonym, homophone, homophonous, rhyme,|homo graaf, homoniem, homofone, homofone, rym,
(4) What words refer to the way a word should be said?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die manier waarop &#39;n woord moet gesê?
pronunciation, pronounce, stress, tone, vocalization,|uitspraak, spreek, stres, toon, vocalisatie,
(5) What words refer to the way a word should be written?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die manier waarop &#39;n woord geskryf moet word?
spelling, spell, misspell|spelling, spel, spelfoute
(6) What words refer to a new word?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n nuwe woord?
coin a term, coinage, neologism,|munt &#39;n termyn, munt, neologisme,
(7) What words refer to an old word?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n ou woord?
archaic, archaism,|argaïes, argaïsme,
(8) What words refer to the history of a word?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die geskiedenis van &#39;n woord?
etymology, derivation, etymon,|etimologie, afleiding, eetimone,
(9) What words refer to special words?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na spesiale woorde?
acronym, anagram,|akroniem, anagram,
(10) What words refer to special words that are used to talk about a particular area of life?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na spesiale woorde wat gebruik word om te praat oor &#39;n bepaalde gebied van die lewe?
terminology, jargon, technical term, specialized vocabulary,|terminologie, jargon, tegniese term, gespesialiseerde woordeskat,
(11) What words refer to all the words of a language?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na al die woorde van &#39;n taal?
vocabulary, lexicon, dictionary, glossary,|woordeskat, leksikon, woordeboek, woordelys,
(12) What words refer to a short form of a word?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kort vorm van &#39;n woord?
abbreviation, abbreviate, be short for, for short, stand for, contraction,|afkorting, afkort, wees kort vir, vir &#39;n kort, staan, inkrimping,
(13) What words refer to a section of speech?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n artikel van spraak?
phrase, clause, sentence, utterance, discourse, formation, locution,|frase, sin, woord, diskoers, vorming, spreek wyse,
(14) What words refer to a section of writing?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n artikel te skryf?
paragraph, text, section, chapter, point, construction, document, passage, portion,|paragraaf, teks, artikel, hoofstuk, punt, konstruksie, dokument, gang, gedeelte,
(15) What words refer to a group of words that express a particular meaning?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep woorde wat &#39;n spesifieke betekenis uit te druk?
adage, aphorism, byword, cliché, dictum, epigram, expression, idiom, motto, phrase, proverb, saying, slogan, watchword,|spreekwoord, aforisme, spot cliché, dictum, epigram, uitdrukking, idioom, leuse, frase spreekwoord sê, slagspreuk, wagwoord,
(16) What words refer to two words that are often used together?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na twee woorde wat dikwels saam gebruik?
collocate, collocate (v),|collocate, collocate (v),

motto, slogan, catchphrase,|leuse, slagspreuk, catchphrase,

(5) What words describe a saying?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gesegde?

(6) What words do people use to begin a saying?|(6) Watter woorde mense gebruik om &#39;n woord te begin?

Riddle|Riddle

(1) What words are used for short sayings or questions that have a meaning that someone has to figure out?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik vir &#39;n kort woorde of vrae wat &#39;n betekenis wat iemand het om uit te vind nie?

recite|opsê
(5) What words refer to a part of a poem?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van &#39;n gedig?
line, stanza, verse|lyn, strofe, vers
(6) What words refer to the features of a poem?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die kenmerke van &#39;n gedig?
rhyme, rhythm|rym, ritme
History|Geskiedenis

historian, archaeologist|historikus, argeoloog
