Foolish talk|Dwase praatjies
Use this domain for words related to foolish talk--something someone says that other people think is silly or stupid.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dwase praatjies - iets wat iemand sê dat ander mense dink is dom of dom.
(1) What words refer to foolish talk?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na onsinnige praatjies?
foolish talk, foolishness, babble, balderdash, bilge, blather, chit-chat, drivel, falderal, gossipy, hooey, humbug, idle talk, joking, nonsense, prate, prattle, stupidity, twaddle|dwase praatjies, dwaasheid, babbel, onzin, vuil, kletsen, Chit-chat, snert, snuisterij, pratend, hooey, larie, onsinnige praatjies, grap, nonsens, gebabbel, gesnap, onnoselheid, geklets
(2) What words describe foolish talk?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf dwase praatjies?
foolish, meaningless, silly, stupid,|dwase, betekenisloos, dom, dom,
(3) What words refer to a person who says foolish things?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat dwase dinge sê?
babbler, fool,|praatjiesmaker, dwaas,
Obscenity|Obsceniteiten
Use this domain for obscene words related to sex, defecation, death, damnation, and other taboo or offensive subjects. It is important to check the appropriateness of including obscene words in the dictionary. It should be the choice of the speakers of the language whether a word should be included or excluded. Obscene words included in the dictionary should be clearly marked as such. Obscenity is often used to heighten the emotion of an expression, and is often used when someone is angry. Obscenity is often associated with sex or defecation. Cursing is often associated with God, religion, or the afterlife. Insults often involve equating a person with an animal that is associated with an undesirable characteristic, questioning someone's parentage/legitimacy, questioning someone's character, or questioning someone's intelligence/sanity.|Gebruik hierdie domein onwelvoeglike woorde in verband met seks, ontlasting, dood, oordeel, en ander taboe of offensief vakke. Dit is belangrik om die toepaslikheid van insluitende onwelvoeglike woorde in die woordeboek na te gaan. Dit moet die keuse van die sprekers van die taal of &#39;n woord moet ingesluit of uitgesluit wees. Onwelvoeglike woorde in die woordeboek moet duidelik gemerk word as sulks. Obsceniteiten word dikwels gebruik om die emosie van &#39;n uitdrukking te verhoog, en word dikwels gebruik wanneer iemand kwaad. Obsceniteiten word dikwels geassosieer met seks of ontlasting. Vloek word dikwels geassosieer met God, godsdiens, of die hiernamaals. Beledigings behels dikwels gelyk is &#39;n persoon met &#39;n dier wat verband hou met &#39;n ongewenste eienskap, bevraagteken iemand se ouerskap / legitimiteit bevraagteken karakter iemand se of bevraagteken iemand se intelligensie / gesonde verstand.
(1) What words refer to speech that is considered offensive or improper?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na spraak wat aanstootlik of onbehoorlike beskou?
bad language, strong language, swear word, four letter word, curse, obscenities, profanity, swearing, unprintable,|kru taal, sterk taal, vloekwoord, vier letter woord, vloek, lelike, vloek, vloek, ondrukbare,
(2) What words refer to using obscenity?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gebruik van obseniteit?
swear, curse, cuss,|sweer, vloek, vloek,
(3) What words are used in an obscene way?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik in &#39;n onwelvoeglike manier?
damn, damn it, God damn, Hell, shit, screw, fuck, bastard, son of a bitch, bitch,|damn, damn dit, God damn, Hel, kak, skroef, fok, bliksem, seun van &#39;n teef, teef,
(4) What words describe speech or actions that are obscene?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf toespraak of aksies wat onwelvoeglike?
obscene, coarse, crude, dirty, filthy, improper, indecent, lewd, naughty, profane, risqué, rude, saucy, suggestive, vulgar,|obseen, growwe, ruwe, vuil, onbehoorlike, onfatsoenlike, ontugtige, stout, onheilige, gewaagde, onbeskof, stuitige, suggestief, vulgêr,
(5) What words describe someone who uses obscenities a lot?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat &#39;n baie lelike gebruik beskryf?
foul-mouthed,|vuil bekken,
Sign, symbol|Teken, simbool

Gesture|Gebaar

(2) What words refer to a gesture?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebaar?
gesture (n), sign (n), signal|gebaar (n), teken (n), sein
Point at|Punt
Use this domain for words related to pointing at something--to move a part of your body toward something so that people will look at it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat dui op iets - &#39;n deel van jou liggaam beweeg na iets so dat mense sal kyk na dit.

indicate, point to, point at, point out, signal that, gesture towards|dui aan, wys, punt, wys uit, sein dat, gebare teenoor
Facial expression|Gesigsuitdrukking
Use this domain for facial expressions--ways in which people move the parts of their faces to show feeling or communicate something.|Gebruik hierdie domein gesigsuitdrukkings - maniere waarop mense beweeg die dele van hulle gesigte om gevoel te wys of te kommunikeer iets.
(1) What words refer to a facial expression?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gesigsuitdrukking?
expression, look, face, countenance, facial expression, the look on someone's face,|uitdrukking, kyk, gesig, aangesig, gesigsuitdrukking, die uitdrukking op iemand se gesig,
(2) What words refer to an expression using the eyes?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n uitdrukking met behulp van die oë?
stare, glare, roll your eyes, wink, blink, lift your eyes, raise your eyebrows, narrow your eyebrows, wrinkle your brow,|staar, glans, rol jou oë, wink, knip, lig jou oë, verhoog jou wenkbroue, smal jou wenkbroue, rimpel jou aangesig,
(3) What words refer to an expression using the mouth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n uitdrukking met behulp van die mond?
lick your lips, smack your lips, kiss, purse your lips,|lek jou lippe, smack jou lippe, soen, beursie jou lippe,
(4) What words refer to making an expression on your face?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n uitdrukking op jou gesig?
make a face, get an expression on your face, have an expression on your face, give someone (an expression)|maak &#39;n gesig, kry &#39;n uitdrukking op jou gesig, het &#39;n uitdrukking op jou gesig, gee iemand (&#39;n uitdrukking)
(5) What words refer to making a particular expression?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n bepaalde uitdrukking?
frown (in disapproval or worry), gape, grimace (in pain), pout, scowl, snarl, start,|frons (in afkeuring of bekommernis), mondhoeke, grynslag (in pyn), steenbolk, frons, warboel, begin,
(6) What words refer to smiling?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na glimlag?
smile, grin, beam, be all smiles, force a smile, smirk, leer, sneer, wide grin, big smile, half smile, slight smile|glimlag, glimlag, balk, almal glimlag, &#39;n glimlag, smirk, leer, ginnegappen, wye glimlag, &#39;n groot glimlag, half glimlag, effense glimlag dwing
(7) What words refer to starting to smile?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na begin om te glimlag?
break into a smile, someone's face lights up,|breek in &#39;n glimlag, iemand se gesig verhelder,
(8) What words describe a face that shows a lot of feeling?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gesig wat &#39;n baie gevoel toon?
expressive, animated,|ekspressiewe, geanimeerde,
(9) What words describe a face that shows no feeling?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gesig wat geen gevoel toon?
expressionless, impassive, blank, deadpan, inscrutable, poker-faced,|uitdrukkingloos gevoelloos, leeg, deadpan, onpeilbaar, poker-faced,
(10) What words describe an expression that shows a particular feeling?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n uitdrukking wat &#39;n bepaalde gevoel toon?
cheerful, solemn, horrified, pained, wry,|vrolik, plegtige, met afgryse vervul, angs, wrang,
Laugh|Laugh
Use this domain for words related to the expression of good feelings, including laughing--the sounds a person makes when he is enjoying himself or thinks something is funny.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die uitdrukking van &#39;n goeie gevoelens, insluitend lag - die klanke &#39;n persoon maak wanneer hy homself geniet of dink iets is snaaks.
(1) What general words refer to laughing?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die lag?
laugh, laughter, laugh at (something), have a laugh|lag, lag, lag (iets), het &#39;n lag
(2) What words describe the way a person laughs?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die manier waarop &#39;n persoon lag?
laugh aloud, laugh out loud, chortle, heehaw, guffaw, cackle, yuck it up, squeal with laughter, canned laughter|lag hardop lag hardop, chortle, gelacht, luidkeels lag, kekkel, bah dit op, geknars van die lag, geblikte lag
(3) What words refer to laughing a little or quietly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die lag &#39;n bietjie of stil?
laugh silently, chuckle, giggle, ripple of laughter, titter, twitter,|lag saggies, giggel, giggel, rimpeleffek van die lag, gegiechel, Twitter,
(4) What words refer to laughing a lot or loudly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n baie lag of hard?
roar with laughter, laugh uproariously, howl with laughter, shriek with laughter, hearty laugh, peals of laughter, laugh helplessly, laugh your head off, laugh hysterically, have hysterics, roll in the aisle, almost die laughing, double up, convulsed with laughter, split your sides|brul van die lag, lag uitbundig, huil van die lag, gil van die lag, hartlike lag, stemme en gelag, lag hulpeloos, lag jou kop af, lag histeries, het histeries, rol in die paadjie, byna sterf lag, verdubbel, skud met lag, verdeel jou sye
(5) What words refer to laughing for a long time?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die lag vir &#39;n lang tyd?
can't stop laughing, have the giggles, fall over/about laughing, have a good laugh, laugh till the tears roll down your cheeks|kan nie ophou lag, het die giggel, val oor / lag, het &#39;n goeie lag, lag totdat die trane rol af jou wange
(6) What words refer to laughing at someone because they did something wrong?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na lag iemand omdat hulle iets verkeerd gedoen het?
laugh at, mock, titter, snicker, snigger|lag, spot, gegiechel, gehinnik, laggie
(7) What words refer to beginning to laugh?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na begin om te lag?
start laughing, burst out laughing, burst of laughter, dissolve into laughter|begin lag, lag, bars van die lag, los van die lag
(8) What words refer to causing someone to laugh?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om te lag?
make someone laugh, amuse, crack someone up, have someone in hysterics, have someone in stitches, tickle, ticklish|maak iemand lag, vermaak, kraak iemand up, het iemand in histeries, het iemand in steke, kielie, kielierig
(9) What words describe someone or something that causes people to laugh?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf iemand of iets wat mense laat lag?
laughable, amusing, comic, comical, absurd, facetious, humor, humorous, sense of humor|lagwekkend, snaaks, komiese, komiese, absurd, snaaks, humor, humoristiese, sin vir humor
(10) What words refer to the sound of a person makes when he is laughing?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van &#39;n persoon maak wanneer hy lag?
ho ho ho, ha ha ha|ho ho ho, ha ha ha
(11) What words refer to trying not to laugh?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om nie te lag?
(try to/can't) keep a straight face, stifle a laugh|(Probeer / kan nie) hou &#39;n reguit gesig, onderdruk &#39;n lag
(12) What words refer to smiling?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na glimlag?
smile, smile at, grin, wide grin, big smile, half smile, slight smile, smirk, crack a smile, beam|glimlag, glimlag, glimlag, glimlag breed, groot glimlag, half glimlag, effense glimlag, smirk, kraak &#39;n glimlag, straal
(13) What other ways do people show they feel good?|(13) Watter ander maniere mense wys dat hulle goed voel?
clap, applaud, applause, cheer, jump up and down, jump for joy, dance for joy, shout for joy, make merry, revel, weep for joy, ululate|klap, jubel, applous, moed, spring op en af, spring van vreugde, dans van blydskap gejuig vrolik, Revel, huil van blydskap ululate
(14) What do people say when they are happy?|(14) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle gelukkig?
Hurrah! Hooray! Yeah! Three cheers! Hallelujah! Yippee! Yahoo!|Hoera! Hoera! Ja! Drie hoera! Hallelujah! Jippie! Yahoo!
Cry, tear|Cry, traan
Use this domain for words related to crying--when water forms in the eyes because of sadness or pain.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met huil - wanneer water vorms in die oë as gevolg van hartseer of pyn.
(1) What words refer to crying?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na huil?
cry, weep, be in tears, tearful, have tears in your eyes, weeping, weepy, squall,|huil, huil, wees in trane, huilerig, het trane in jou oë, huil, huilerig, rukwind,
(2) What words refer to crying a lot?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n baie huil?
cry your eyes out, tears roll down your cheeks, eyes full of tears, eyes are brimming with tears, cry your heart out, cry yourself to sleep,|huil jou oë uit, trane rol af jou wange, oë vol trane, is oë vol trane, huil jou hart uit, huil jouself aan die slaap,
(3) What words refer to crying in a noisy way?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat roep in &#39;n lawaaierige pad?
sob, bawl, howl, wail,|snik, bulken, huil, huil,
(4) What words refer to crying in an annoying way?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wat roep in &#39;n irriterende manier?
snivel, sniffle, whimper, blubber, blub, crybaby,|neus verkoudheid, sniffle, gedrein, huil, Blub, huil balk,
(5) What words refer to starting to cry?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na begin om te huil?
start to cry, start crying, burst into tears, break down, turn on the waterworks, get teary,|begin om te huil, huil, het in trane uitgebars, breek, draai op die waterwerke, kry tranerig,
(6) What words refer to almost crying?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na byna huil?
be close to tears, have a lump in your throat, fight back tears, choke back the tears,|naby aan trane, het &#39;n knop in jou keel, veg terug trane verstik die trane,
(7) What words refer to crying because something gets in your eyes?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na huil omdat iets in jou oë kry?
cry, your eyes water,|huil, jou oë water,
(8) What words refer to making someone cry?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iemand roep?
make someone cry, reduce someone to tears, bring tears to someone's eyes, tearful, tearjerker,|maak iemand huil, iemand verminder tot trane, bring trane na iemand se oë, huilerig, smartlap,
(9) What words refer to a tear?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n traan?
tear, teardrop,|traan, traan,
(10) What do tears do?|(10) Wat doen trane doen?
fall, run (down the face), streak,|val, hardloop (af in die gesig), streep,
(11) What do people do to tears?|(11) Wat doen mense tot trane?
wipe away, dry|afvee, droë
(12) What do people say to stop someone from crying?|(12) Wat sê die mense om iemand te verhoed huil?
don't cry, there there,|moenie huil nie, daar is daar,

list, reel off|lys, katrol af
Letter|Brief
Use this domain for words referring to letter--a written message that is sent to someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na brief - &#39;n geskrewe boodskap dat iemand gestuur word.
(1) What words refer to a letter?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n brief?
letter, note, memo, correspondence, epistle,|brief, noot, memo, korrespondensie, brief,
(2) What words refer to letters that are delivered to you?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na briewe wat gelewer word aan jou?
mail (n), post,|pos (n), post,
(3) What words refer to sending a letter?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n brief?
send, mail (v), post,|stuur e-pos (v), post,
(4) What words refer to someone who delivers a letter?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat &#39;n brief lewer?
postman,|posman,
(5) What words refer to the government agency that delivers letters?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die regering agentskap wat briewe lewer?
post office, postal service,|poskantoor, posdiens,
Interpreting messages|Interpretasie van boodskappe
Use this domain for words referring to interpreting something someone says--to try to understand the meaning of something someone says and express it in other words.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die interpretasie van iets wat iemand sê - om te probeer om die betekenis van iets of iemand sê verstaan ​​en druk dit in ander woorde.
(1) What words refer to interpreting something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die interpretasie van iets?
interpret, understand, translate|interpreteer, verstaan, vertaal
Meaning|Beteken
Use this domain for words related to the meaning of something that is said.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die betekenis van iets wat gesê word.
(1) What words refer to the meaning of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die betekenis van iets?
meaning, definition, semantics, sense, interpretation|betekenis, definisie, semantiek, sin, interpretasie
(2) How do you say that something means something?|(2) Hoe kan jy sê dat iets beteken iets?
mean (something), have the meaning,|beteken (iets), die betekenis,
(3) What words describe something that has two meanings?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat twee betekenisse het, beskryf?
ambiguous, double meaning, doubletalk,|dubbelsinnig, dubbel betekenis, doubletalk,
Meaningless|Betekenisloos
Use this domain for words describing something that is meaningless--something someone says that doesn't mean anything.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat betekenisloos beskryf - iets wat iemand sê dit beteken nie dat enigiets.
(1) What words describe something that has no meaning?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat geen betekenis het, beskryf?
meaningless, absurd, lack meaning, ridiculous, senseless, nonsensical, without rhyme or reason, unintelligible, inane|betekenisloos, absurd, gebrek betekenis, belaglik, sinnelose, onsinnig, sonder rym of rede, onverstaanbaar, ligsinnig
(2) What words refer to saying something that has no meaning?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat geen betekenis het gesê?
jabber, babble|jabber, babble
(3) What words refer to something that has no meaning?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat geen betekenis het?
nonsense, gibberish, babble, drivel, hocus-pocus, mumbo-jumbo, gobbledygook|nonsens, brabbeltaal, babbel, snert, hocus pocus-, afgod, codes
Unintelligible|Onverstaanbaar
Use this domain for words related to being unintelligible--to say something that someone cannot understand.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat onverstaanbaar - iets wat iemand kan nie verstaan ​​sê.
(1) What words describe speech that someone cannot understand?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf toespraak dat iemand nie kan verstaan ​​nie?
unintelligible, foreign|onverstaanbaar, buitelandse
(2) What words describe speech that a person cannot hear well enough to understand?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf toespraak wat &#39;n persoon nie goed genoeg is om te verstaan ​​kan hoor?
unintelligible, indistinct, garbled|onverstaanbaar, onduidelike, deurmekaar
Show, indicate|Show, dui
Use this domain for words referring to showing or indicating something--if something (such as an object, something said, or something that happens) shows something, it makes people think of something or understand something (e.g. When his face turns red, it indicates he is angry.)|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat aandui of iets - as iets (soos &#39;n voorwerp, iets gesê, of iets wat gebeur) toon iets, dit maak mense dink van iets of iets te verstaan ​​(bv Wanneer sy gesig rooi, dit dui hy is kwaad.)
(1) What words refer to something showing that something is true?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat wys dat iets waar is?
show, be a sign, mean, indicate, reveal, make it clear, demonstrate, betray, be evidence, reflect, illustrate, bear witness to, tell|show, &#39;n teken, beteken, dui aan, toon, maak dit duidelik, demonstreer, verraai, wees getuienis, weerspieël, illustreer, getuig, vertel
(2) What words refer to something showing that something might be true?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat wys dat iets waar kan wees?
suggest, point to, imply, give the impression|stel, punt, impliseer, gee die indruk
(3) What words refer to something showing that something has a good quality?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat wys dat iets &#39;n goeie gehalte?
be a tribute to, say a lot for, reflect well on, be a testimony to|&#39;n huldeblyk aan, sê baie vir, dink goed op, wees tot &#39;n getuienis
(4) What words refer to something showing that something has a bad quality?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat wys dat iets het &#39;n slegte kwaliteit?
be a reflection on, be a comment on, be a symptom of, be symptomatic of, be an indictment of, not say much for, reflect badly on, make a mockery of, sign of the times|&#39;n besinning oor, &#39;n kommentaar op, wees &#39;n simptoom van, wees simptomaties van, wees &#39;n aanklag van, nie veel vir sê, reflekteer sleg op, maak &#39;n bespotting van, teken van die tye
(5) What words refer to something showing that something is going to happen?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat wys dat iets gaan gebeur?
mean, herald, bode well, bode ill, spell|bedoel, Herald, voorspel niks goeds, voorspel siek spel
(6) What words refer to a sign that shows that something is true?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n teken wat wys dat iets waar is?
sign, indication, indicator, evidence, mark, trace, manifestation, symptom, omen, telltale, be a giveaway,|teken, aanduiding, aanwyser, bewyse, merk, spoor, manifestasie, simptoom, teken, prater, &#39;n bonus,

Relationships|Verhoudings

(1) What words refer to beginning a relationship?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die begin van &#39;n verhouding?
get acquainted, get to know, start a relationship, develop a relationship, form an association, form a partnership|kennis te maak, ken, begin &#39;n verhouding, &#39;n verhouding te ontwikkel, vorm &#39;n vereniging, &#39;n vennootskap
(2) What words refer to the process of relating to other people?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van met betrekking tot ander mense?
relate to, associate with, affiliate with, participate with, partner with, fellowship with, interact with, be acquainted with, work with, collaborate, have a relationship, going together, going out, going steady|verband hou met, assosieer met, affilieer met deel met, saam met, gemeenskap met, interaksie met, vertroud te wees met, werk met, saam, &#39;n verhouding, saam gaan, gaan uit, gaan bestendige
(3) What words refer to the relationship itself?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verhouding self?
affiliation, alliance, bonding, relationship, relation, association, comradeship, participation, partnership, interaction, fellowship, interpersonal relationship,|affiliasie, alliansie, binding, verhouding, verhouding, vereniging, kameraadskap, deelname, vennootskap, interaksie, gemeenskap, interpersoonlike verhouding,
(4) What words refer to a person in a relationship?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon in &#39;n verhouding?
associate (n), comrade, participant, partner, friend, coworker, colleague, acquaintance, ally, collaborator, fellow (student), age mate, affiliate|assosieer (n), kameraad, deelnemer, vennoot, vriend, kollega, kollega, bekendes bondgenoot, medewerker, mede (student), ouderdom mate, affiliate
(5) What words refer to a group of people who have a relationship?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep mense wat &#39;n verhouding?
pair, partnership, association, fellowship,|paar, vennootskap, vereniging, genootskap,
(6) What words describe a group of people who have a relationship?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groep mense wat &#39;n verhouding?
allied, bonded, related, friendly, affiliated, associated,|geallieerde, gebind, verwante, vriendelik, geaffilieer, verbonde,
Friend|Vriend
Use this domain for words related to friendship.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vriendskap.
(1) What words are used to describe the formation of a friendship?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om die vorming van &#39;n vriendskap te beskryf?
build a friendship, become friends, befriend, be friendly|bou &#39;n vriendskap, vriende geword, bevriend, vriendelik
(2) What words are used to refer to the state of being friends?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na die toestand van vriende?
be friends with, going together, going out, going steady|vriende wees met, gaan saam, uit te gaan, gaan bestendige
(3) What words are used to refer to the friendship itself?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na die vriendskap self?
friendship|vriendskap
(4) What words are used to refer to a person who is a friend?|(4) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n vriend?
friend, pal, buddy, amigo, soul mate, mate, girlfriend, boyfriend, companion|vriend, pal, buddy, vriend, sielsgenoot, mate, vriendin, kêrel, metgesel
(5) What are the outward signs of friendship?|(5) Wat is die uiterlike tekens van vriendskap?
hold hands, be together, do things together, share, give gifts, show affection|hou hande, wees saam dinge te doen saam, deel, gee geskenke, wys liefde
(6) What words describe a friendship?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vriendskap?
intimate, intimacy, close, deep, long-standing, old friend, improper|intieme, intimiteit, naby, diep, lang, ou vriend, onbehoorlike
(7) What words describe a friendship that has gone bad?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vriendskap wat slegte gegaan het?
broken relationship, break up, strained relationship, misunderstanding, co-dependency|gebroke verhouding, breek, gespanne verhouding, misverstand, mede-afhanklikheid
Girlfriend, boyfriend|Vriendin, kêrel
Use this domain for words referring to a girlfriend or boyfriend.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n vriendin of kêrel.
(1) What words refer to a girlfriend or boyfriend?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vriendin of vriend?
girlfriend, boyfriend, partner, lover, mistress, old flame|vriendin, kêrel, vennoot, minnaar, minnares, ou vlam
Types of people|Soorte mense
Use this domain for words referring to different types of people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na verskillende soorte mense.
(1) What words refer to male and female people?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die manlike en vroulike mense?
man, woman, boy, girl|man, vrou, seun, meisie
(2) What words refer to people of different ages?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na mense van verskillende ouderdomme?
baby, child, youth, adult, elder|baba, kind, die jeug, volwassenes, ouderling
(3) What words refer to people of different races?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na mense van verskillende rasse?
yellow, brown, Asian, black, African, white, Caucasian, red, American Indian, Indian|geel, bruin, Asiatiese, swart, Afrikaanse, wit, Engels, rooi, Amerikaanse Indiaans Indiese
(4) What words refer to a person whose parents are from two different races?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wie se ouers van twee verskillende rasse?
half-breed,|half-ras,
(5) What words refer to a person whose parents are from the same race?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wie se ouers van dieselfde ras?
full-blooded,|volbloed,
(6) What words refer to a person who belongs to your group?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat aan jou groep behoort?
one of us, one of our own, one of ours, insider, friend|een van ons, een van ons eie, een van ons s&#39;n, insider, vriend
(7) What words refer to a person who does not belong to your group?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat nie behoort aan jou groep?
foreigner, stranger, enemy, foe|buitelander, vreemdeling, vyand, vyand
Working relationship|Werksverhouding
Use this domain for words related to a relationship between people who work together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n verhouding tussen mense wat saamwerk.
(1) What words refer to a relationship between people who work together?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n verhouding tussen mense wat saamwerk?
working relationship, affiliation, association, partnership|werksverhouding, affiliasie, vereniging, vennootskap
(2) What words refer to beginning a working relationship?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die begin &#39;n werksverhouding?
form an association, form a partnership|vorm &#39;n vereniging, &#39;n vennootskap
(3) What words refer to the process of relating to other people at work?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van met betrekking tot ander mense by die werk?
affiliate with, partner with, work with, work together, collaborate|affilieer met vennoot, werk, saam te werk, saam
(4) What words refer to a person you work with?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat jy werk?
associate (n), partner, coworker, colleague, collaborator, fellow worker, affiliate|assosieer (n), vennoot, kollega, kollega, medewerker, medewerker, affiliate
(5) What words refer to a group of people who work together?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep mense wat saamwerk?
partnership, association, office, working group|vennootskap, vereniging, kantoor, werkgroep
Know someone|Weet iemand
Use this domain for words referring to knowing someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die wete iemand.
(1) What words refer to knowing someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die wete iemand?
know someone|weet iemand
(2) What words refer to knowing someone, but not knowing him well?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die wete iemand nie, maar hom nie goed om te weet?
know someone by sight, be acquainted with, be acquaintances, don't know well, we've met,|weet iemand deur die gesig, vertroud te wees met, wees kennisse, nie goed ken, het ons ontmoet het,
(3) What words refer to starting to know someone after you have met them?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na begin om iemand weet nadat jy hulle ontmoet het?
get to know, get acquainted,|ken, kry vertroud,
(4) What words refer to someone you know, who is not a friend?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat jy ken, wat nie &#39;n vriend?
acquaintance, casual acquaintance|bekendes toevallige kennismaking
(5) What words refer to knowing about someone, whom you have not met?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die wete oor iemand, wat jy nie het?
know someone's name, know of someone, have heard the name, have heard of someone, have heard about someone|weet iemand se naam, weet van iemand wat die naam gehoor het, het gehoor van iemand gehoor het oor iemand
Meet for the first time|Ontmoet vir die eerste keer
Use this domain for words related to meeting someone for the first time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vergadering van iemand vir die eerste keer.
(1) What words refer to meeting someone for the first time?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vergadering van iemand vir die eerste keer?
meet (for the first time), introduce someone, introduce oneself, introduce each other, be introduced|voldoen (vir die eerste keer), stel iemand jouself stel, stel mekaar, word bekendgestel
Neighbor|Naaste
Use this domain for words referring to a neighbor--someone who lives nearby.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n buurman - iemand wat naby woon.
(1) What words refer to someone who lives nearby?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat naby woon?
neighbor, neighbor, next door neighbor|naaste buurman, buurman
(2) What words describe a good neighbor?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n goeie buurman?
good neighbor, neighborly|goeie buurman, naasteliefde
(3) What words indicate that someone lives nearby?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iemand naby woon?
be neighbors, live next to each other, live near each other, live in the same neighborhood, live on the same street, live nearby|wees bure, leef langs mekaar, woon naby mekaar, leef in dieselfde buurt, woon op dieselfde straat, woon nabygeleë
(4) What words refer to the area around your house?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gebied rondom jou huis?
neighborhood, community, our street, our area, subdivision, housing development, compound, apartment complex, district, vicinity, environs|omgewing, gemeenskap, ons straat, ons omgewing, onderverdeling, behuisingsontwikkeling, saamgestelde, &#39;n woonstel kompleks, distrik, omgewing, omgewing
Social class|Sosiale klas
Use this domain for words related to social class.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met sosiale klas.
(1) What words refer to social class?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sosiale klas?
class, caste, background, status, social standing, strata|klas, kaste, agtergrond, status, sosiale stand, strata
(2) What words refer to a person belonging to a higher class?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat aan &#39;n hoër klas?
upper class, aristocracy, privileged, elite, titled, posh, your betters, rich,|boonste klas, aristokrasie, bevoorregte, elite, getiteld, nabygeleë, jou meerderes, ryk,
(3) What words refer to a person belonging to the middle class?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat aan die middelklas?
middle-class, bourgeois, the bourgeoisie, white-collar|middel-klas, bourgeois, die bourgeoisie, witboordjie-
(4) What words refer to a person belonging to a lower class?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat aan &#39;n laer klas?
working class, lower class, the masses, blue-collar, humble, popular, underclass, your inferiors, poor,|werkersklas, laer klas, die massas, blou-kraag, nederige, gewild, onderklas, jou minderes, swak,
(5) What words refer to a person belonging to the same class as you?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat aan dieselfde klas as jy?
peer|eweknie
(6) What words refer to moving into a higher social class?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg in &#39;n hoër sosiale klas?
move up in the world, upwardly mobile, social climber|beweeg in die wêreld, opwaarts selfoon, sosiale klimmer
(7) What words describe a society that is not divided into classes?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n samelewing wat nie verdeel in klasse?
classless|klaslose
Unity|Unity
Use this domain for words related to unity--when a group of people agree with each other and are not fighting.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die eenheid - wanneer &#39;n groep mense saam met mekaar en baklei nie.
(1) What words refer to the unity of a social group?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die eenheid van &#39;n sosiale groep?
unity, oneness, integration, unification|eenheid, eenheid, integrasie, eenwording
(2) What words refer to unifying a social group or more than one social group?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die vereniging van &#39;n sosiale groep of meer as een sosiale groep?
unite, unify, join, merge, blend, fuse, consolidate|verenig, te verenig, aan te sluit, saam te smelt, versnit, lont, te konsolideer
(3) What words describe a group that is united?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groep wat verenig is?
united, unified, cohesive, joined, combined, connected, undivided, one in spirit, one in purpose, single-minded|verenigde, verenigde, samehangende, aangesluit, gekombineer, verbind, onverdeelde, een in gees, een in doel, doelgerigte
(4) What words describe a person, force, or influence that unifies a group?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon, krag, of invloed wat &#39;n groep verenig?
unifying, uniting|verenigende, verenig
Disunity|Onenigheid
Use this domain for words related to disunity--when a group of people do not agree with each other and are fighting.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met onenigheid - wanneer &#39;n groep mense nie saamstem met mekaar en veg.
(1) What words refer to the disunity of a social group?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die onenigheid van &#39;n sosiale groep?
disunity, division, discord, dissidence, dissonance, friction, incompatibility, variance, dissension, dissent|onenigheid, verdeeldheid, onenigheid, onenigheid, dissonansie, wrywing, onverenigbaarheid, variansie, verdeeldheid, verdeeldheid
(2) What words refer to dividing a social group or more than one social group?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n sosiale groep of meer as een sosiale groep verdeel?
divide, sow dissention, set at odds, pit against, part company with, have a falling out, differ, clash, disagree|verdeel, saai onenigheid, stel op die kans, put teen deel maatskappy met, het &#39;n uitval, verskil, bots, verskil
(3) What words describe a group that is disunited?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groep wat verdeeld?
disunited, divided, divided in spirit, going in different directions, discordant, out of tune, on bad terms, dissenting, factious, at odds, at cross purposes, up in arms, embroiled, torn|verdeeld, verdeel, verdeel in die gees, gaan in verskillende rigtings, afwyk, uit tune, op slegte terme, afkeurende, eiesinnig, haaks, op kruis doeleindes, in die arms, gewikkel, geskeur
(4) What words describe a person, force, or influence that divides a group?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon, krag, of invloed wat &#39;n groep verdeel?
divisive, disruptive|verdelende, ontwrigtende
Unfriendly|Onvriendelike
Use this domain for words related to being antisocial--when someone does not want to talk to other people or be friends with them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat antisosiale - wanneer iemand nie wil ander mense te praat of vriende met hulle.
(1) What words describe someone who is unfriendly?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat onvriendelik beskryf?
unfriendly, cold, inhospitable, hostile, antagonistic, give someone the cold shoulder,|onvriendelike, koue, onherbergsame, vyandig, antagonistiese, gee iemand die koue skouer,
(2) What words describe someone who does not like to be friendly and wants to be alone?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie graag vriendelik wees en wil om alleen te wees?
antisocial, standoffish, distant, aloof, dour, reserved|antisosiale, afsydig, ver, afsydig, dour, voorbehou
(3) What words describe a relationship that is unfriendly?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n verhouding wat onvriendelike?
unfriendly, cool, strained, frosty, turn sour|onvriendelike, koel, gespanne, koue, suur
(4) What words describe a place or situation where people are unfriendly?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek of situasie waar mense onvriendelik?
unfriendly, unwelcoming, inhospitable, impersonal, forbidding|onvriendelike, onnodige, onherbergsame, onpersoonlik, verbied
Set self apart|Stel self uitmekaar
Use this domain for words related to setting yourself apart from other people and not relating to them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die opstel van jouself afgesien van ander mense en nie met betrekking tot hulle.
(1) What words refer to setting oneself apart from others and not relating to them?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die opstel van jouself afgesien van ander en nie met betrekking tot hulle?
isolate, set self apart, remove, disengage, estrange, reserve, withdraw, quit, resign|isoleer, stel self uitmekaar, te verwyder, ontkoppel, Estrange, reservaat, onttrek, ophou, bedank
Alone|Alleen
Use this domain for words related to being alone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die alleen.
(1) What words describe a person who is alone?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat alleen?
alone, on your own, by yourself, unaccompanied, marooned, isolated|alleen, op jou eie, deur jouself, sonder begeleiding, marooned, geïsoleerde
(2) What words refer to doing something alone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets alleen te doen?
all by yourself, single-handed, solo, in isolation, self-made|al deur jouself, eiehandig, solo, in isolasie, self gemaak
(3) What words describe someone who spends a lot of time alone?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat &#39;n baie van die tyd alleen spandeer beskryf?
solitary, loner, recluse, keep to yourself|eensame, alleenloper, kluisenaar, hou jouself
(4) What words refer to the state of being alone?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van alleen?
solitude, isolation, solitary confinement, privacy|eensaamheid, isolasie, afsondering, privaatheid
(5) What words describe someone who is alone and unhappy?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat alleen en ongelukkig beskryf?
lonely, lonesome|eensaam, eensaam
(6) What words refer to feeling lonely because someone you love is not there?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na voel eensaam omdat iemand wat jy lief is nie daar nie?
miss, want to see someone, feel lonesome, long for someone|mis, iemand wil sien, voel eensaam, &#39;n lang vir iemand
Independent person|Onafhanklike persoon
Use this domain for words describing an independent person--someone who does things without other people's help.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n onafhanklike persoon - iemand wat dinge doen sonder om ander mense se hulp.
(1) What words describe a person who does things without other people's help?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat dinge doen sonder om ander mense se hulp?
independent, self-reliant, self-sufficient, individualist|onafhanklike, selfstandige, selfonderhoudend, individualisties
Private, public|Private, openbare
Use this domain for words describing something that is private--something that only concerns you, and for words describing something that is public--something that concerns many people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat private beskryf - iets wat net oor jou en woorde iets wat openbare beskryf - iets wat baie mense oor.
(1) What words describe something that only concerns you?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat net gaan oor wat jy beskryf?
private, secret, personal, innermost|private, geheime, persoonlike, innerlike
Begin a relationship|Begin &#39;n verhouding
Use this domain for words related to beginning a relationship.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die begin van &#39;n verhouding.
begin a relationship, join, affiliate, associate, enlist, enroll, enter, establish, fall in with, sign up, worm your way in, hit it off,|begin &#39;n verhouding, aan te sluit, vennoot, assosieer, verkry, skryf, tik, vestig, val in met, inteken, wurm jou pad in, druk dit af,
End a relationship|Einde van &#39;n verhouding
Use this domain for words related to ending a relationship.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die beëindiging van &#39;n verhouding.
(1) What words refer to ending a relationship?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die beëindiging van &#39;n verhouding?
leave, walk out, desert, break up|verlaat, loop uit, woestyn, breek
(2) What words describe a friendship that has become bad?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vriendskap wat slegte geword?
Show affection|Wys liefde
Use this domain for words related to showing affection.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met liefde te toon.
(1) What words refer to showing affection to someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na liefde te toon aan iemand?
show affection, kiss, embrace, hug, hold hands, public display of affection|wys liefde, soen, omhels, drukkie, hou hande, openbare vertoon van liefde
Kinship|Verwantskap
Use this domain for general words for family relationships, not for specific terms.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir familie verhoudings, nie vir spesifieke terme.
(1) What words are used to indicate that two people are related?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat twee mense is wat verband hou?
be related (to someone),|verband (iemand),
(2) What words refer to the relationship among members of a family?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verhouding tussen die lede van &#39;n gesin?
kinship, relationship, close relation,|verwantskap, verhouding, noue verhouding,
(3) What words refer to a member of your family or larger kin group?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lid van jou familie of naasbestaandes groter groep?
relative, in-law, kinsman, relation, distant relation, distantly related, extended family, folk, house, household, kin, kindred, kinfolk, kinsman, kinswoman,|familielid, in-law, losser, verhouding, verlangse familielid, verlangs verwant, uitgebreide familie, folk, huis, huishouding, naasbestaandes, familie, kinfolk, losser, vertroueling,
(4) What words refer to groups of people who are related by kinship?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na groepe mense wat verwant is deur verwantskap?
family, clan, tribe, nation|familie, stam, stam, volk
(5) What words refer to a single generation?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n enkele generasie?
generation|geslag
(6) What words refer to talking to someone in order to discover how you are related to them?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na praat met iemand om te ontdek hoe jy is verwant aan hulle?
(none in English)|(Niemand in Engels)
Related by birth|Verwante deur geboorte
Use this domain for words referring to being related by birth--when one of your ancestors and one of someone else's ancestors are the same person.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat verwant is deur geboorte - wanneer een van jou voorvaders en een van die voorvaders iemand anders se is dieselfde persoon.
(1) What words refer to being related by birth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat verwant is deur geboorte?
related by blood, be descended from, descent, direct line, lineal descent, consanguine,|verwant deur bloed, word afstammelinge van, afkoms, direkte lyn, regstreekse afkoms, consanguine,
(2) What words refer to someone who is related to you by birth?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat aan jou verwant is deur geboorte?
blood relation,|bloedverwant,
(3) What words refer to a listing of your ancestors?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lys van jou ouers?
genealogy, lineage, pedigree, family tree,|genealogie, geslag, stamboom, stamboom
(4) What words refer to inheriting physical traits from your ancestors?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na erfgename fisiese eienskappe van jou voorvaders?
genetics, inherit, heredity, run in the family, pass on, take after, bad blood, genes, breeding|genetika, beërf, oorerwing, hardloop in die familie, slaag op, neem nadat, slegte bloed, gene, teling
Grandfather, grandmother|Oupa, ouma
Use this domain for words referring to grandparents and ancestors.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na grootouers en ouers.
(1) What words refer to the parents of your parents?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die ouers van jou ouers?
grandparent, grandfather, grandmother|grootouer, oupa, ouma
(2) What words refer to your ancestors?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na jou voorvaders?
ancestor, forefather, forbearer, patriarch, matriarch, progenitor, background, origins|voorvader, voorvader, forbearer, patriarg, matriarg, stamvader, agtergrond, oorsprong
(3) What words describe something having to do with your ancestors?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met jou voorvaders te beskryf?
ancestral, ancestry,|voorvaderlike, afkoms,
Father, mother|Pa, ma
Use this domain for words related to parents.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die ouers.
(1) What words refer to your parents?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na jou ouers?
parent, folks,|ouer, mense,
(2) What words refer to your father?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na jou vader bring?
father, dad, old man, pa, papa, sire,|pa, pa, ou man, pa, oupa, vader,
(3) What words do you use when talking to your father?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik jy wanneer dit aan jou pa?
Dad, Father, Daddy, Pop,|Pa, Vader, Daddy, Pop,
(4) What words refer to your mother?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na jou ma?
mother, mom, mum, ma, mama|moeder, ma, ma, ma, mamma
(5) What words do you use when talking to your mother?|(5) Watter woorde gebruik jy wanneer dit aan jou ma?
Mom, Mum, Mother, Mommy, Mummy,|Mamma, Mamma, Moeder, Mamma, Mamma,
(6) What words refer to the state of being a parent?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van &#39;n ouer?
fatherhood, motherhood, parenthood,|vaderskap, moederskap, ouerskap,
(7) What words describe something having to do with your parents?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat te doen het met jou ouers te beskryf?
parental, paternal, maternal, fatherly, motherly, parentage|ouerlike, vaderlike, die moeder, vaderlike, moederlike, ouerskap
(8) If your father has more than one wife, what do you call his other wives?|(8) As jou vader het meer as een vrou, wat dink jy sy ander vroue noem?
father's wife, second wife|vrou se pa, tweede vrou
(9) If your father dies and your mother remarries, what do you call your mother's second husband?|(9) As jou pa sterf en jou moeder weer trou, doen wat jy tweede man se jou ma bel?
stepfather|stiefpa
(10) If your mother dies and your father remarries, what do you call your father's second wife?|(10) As jou ma sterf en jou pa weer trou, doen wat jy se tweede vrou van jou vader noem?
stepmother|stiefma
Brother, sister|Broer, suster
Use this domain for words related to siblings.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met broers en susters.
(1) What words refer to the children of your father and mother?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die kinders van jou vader en moeder?

stepbrother, stepsister|stiefbroer, stiefsuster

Widow, widower|Weduwee wewenaar

(2) What words refer to a part of an organization?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van &#39;n organisasie?
department, committee|departement, komitee
(3) What words refer to starting an organization?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die begin van &#39;n organisasie?
form, organize|vorm, organiseer
Join an organization|Sluit &#39;n organisasie
Use this domain for words related to joining an organization.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die aansluiting by &#39;n organisasie.
(1) What words refer to joining a group?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aansluiting by &#39;n groep?
join a group, affiliate, associate, enlist, enroll, enter, sign up|aansluit by &#39;n groep, filiaal, geassosieerde, inroep, inskryf, inskryf, inteken
Leave an organization|Laat &#39;n organisasie
Use this domain for words related to leaving an organization.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verlaat van &#39;n organisasie.
(1) What words refer to leaving a group?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep verlaat?
leave, excuse oneself|verlaat, jouself verskoon
(2) What words refer to everyone leaving?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na almal verlaat?
disperse, break up, scatter|versprei, breek, strooi
(3) What words refer to resigning from a group?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na bedank uit &#39;n groep?
resign from a group, quit|bedank uit &#39;n groep, ophou
Belong to an organization|Behoort aan &#39;n organisasie
Use this domain for words related to belonging to an organization.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat aan &#39;n organisasie.
(1) What words refer to belonging to a group?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat aan &#39;n groep?
belong to a group, be a member, belong in something, be on something,|behoort aan &#39;n groep, &#39;n lid, behoort in iets, wees op iets,
(2) What words refer to someone who belongs to a group?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat aan &#39;n groep behoort?
member, membership, insider, one of us|lid, lidmaatskap, insider, een van ons
(3) What words refer to one organization belonging to another organization?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n organisasie wat aan &#39;n ander organisasie?
be affiliated with, affiliation,|word geaffilieer met, affiliasie,

Music|Musiek
Use this domain for words related to music.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met musiek.
(1) What general words refer to music?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na musiek?
music, musical|musiek, musikale
(2) What styles of music are there?|(2) Wat musiekstyle is daar?
style, pop, rock, country western, jazz, folk music, classical, longhair, modern, popular, chamber music, march, symphony, opera, ballet, musical, dance number, canned music|styl, pop, rock, country westelike, jazz, folk musiek, klassieke, langharig, moderne, populêre, kamermusiek, Maart, simfonie, opera, ballet, musiek, dans nommer, geblikte musiek
(3) What words refer to a piece of music?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stukkie van die musiek?
piece of music, music piece, song, number, selection, encore|stuk musiek, musiek stuk, lied, nommer, keuring, encore
(4) What words refer to part of a piece of music?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na deel van &#39;n stukkie van die musiek?
movement, introduction, bar, finale|beweging, inleiding, bar, finale
(5) What words refer to a piece of music meant to be played or sung by one person?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n stuk musiek bedoel om gespeel of gesing deur een persoon?
solo|solo
(6) What words refer to a piece of music meant to be played or sung by two, three, or more people?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stuk musiek bedoel om gespeel of gesing deur twee, drie of meer mense?
duet, trio, quartet, quintet|duet, trio, kwartet, kwintet
(7) What words describe the sounds of music?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf die klanke van musiek?
scale, tune, melody, melodic, harmony, chord, pitch, soft, pianissimo, loud, forte, crescendo, rhythm, rhythmic, beat, time|skaal, tune, melodie, melodies, harmonie, koord, toonhoogte, sagte, pianissimo, hard, forte, crescendo, ritme, ritmiese, beat, tyd
Compose music|Komponeer musiek
Use this domain for words related to composing music.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die saamstel van musiek.
(1) What words refer to composing music?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na komponeer musiek?
compose, write, arrange|komponeer, skryf, reël
(2) What words refer to a person who composes music?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat musiek komponeer?
composer, writer, arranger|komponis, skrywer, verwerker
(3) What words refer to a piece of music that a person has composed?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stukkie van die musiek wat &#39;n persoon het bestaan?
composition, arrangement, score|samestelling, reëling, telling
(4) What words refer to the symbols used to write music?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die simbole wat gebruik word om musiek te skryf?
music, notation, key, staff, bar, note, quarter note, half note, whole note, sharp, flat, scale|musiek, notasie, sleutel, personeel, bar, noot, kwartnoot, half noot, die hele noot, skerp, plat, skaal
Play music|Speel musiek
Use this domain for words related to playing music.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die speel van musiek.
(1) What words are used of playing music?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik van die speel van musiek?
play music/a piece, perform, hold a concert, make music, read music, play by ear, improvise|speel musiek / &#39;n stuk, uit te voer, hou &#39;n konsert, musiek maak, lees musiek, speel deur die gehoor, improviseer
(2) What is a musical event called?|(2) Wat is &#39;n musikale gebeurtenis genoem?
concert, performance, rendition, recital, revue,|konsert, prestasie, vertolking, voordrag, revue,
(3) What equipment is used in playing music?|(3) Watter toerusting gebruik word in die speel van musiek?
musical instrument, music stand, riser, baton|musiekinstrument, musiek staan, riser, leiding
(4) Where is music played?|(4) Waar is die musiek gespeel?
concert hall, opera house, music hall, auditorium, band stand, choir loft, orchestra pit|konsertsaal, opera huis, music hall, auditorium, groep staan, koor loft, orkesput
(5) What words refer to adjusting an instrument so that it plays correctly?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die aanpassing van &#39;n instrument sodat dit korrek speel?
tune, in tune, out of tune, sharp, flat, warm up|tune, in harmonie, uit tune, skerp, plat, opwarm
(6) What words refer to a machine used to record and play back music?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n masjien wat gebruik word om aan te teken en speel musiek?
phonograph, record player, tape deck, boom box|fonograaf, rekord-speler, tape deck, boom box
(7) What words describe someone who likes to listen to music?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat daarvan hou om na musiek te luister?
music lover, critic|musiek liefhebber, kritikus
(8) What words describe how a person plays music?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf hoe &#39;n persoon speel musiek?
performance, execution, touch, expression, fingering, keep time|prestasie, uitvoering, touch, uitdrukking, gryp, hou tyd
Sing|Sing
Use this domain for words related to singing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met sang.
(1) What words refer to singing?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sang?
sing, serenade, yodel, chant, croon, burst into song, wail, warble|sing, serenade, gejodel, chant, Croon, bars in lied, huil, gekweel
(2) What words refer to singing without using words?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na sang sonder die gebruik van woorde?
hum, whistle|hum, fluit
(3) What words refer to a person who sings?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat sing?
singer, vocalist, soloist, minstrel|sanger, sanger, solis, siterspeler
(4) What words refer to a group of people singing together?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep mense om saam te sing?
choir, chorale, singing group, duet, trio, ensemble|koor, koraal, sanggroep, duet, trio, ensemble
(5) What words refer to something that is sung?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat gesing word?
song, singing, tune, melody|lied, sing, tune, melodie
(6) What types of songs are there?|(6) Watter songs is daar?
lullaby, hymn, psalm, carol, national anthem, lament, ballad, funeral dirge|lullaby, gesang, psalm, Carol, volkslied, klaag, ballade, begrafnis treurlied
(7) What words refer to a part of a song?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van &#39;n lied?
verse, chorus, theme, note, melody, harmony|vers, koor, tema, kennis, melodie, harmonie
(8) What words describe how well a person sings?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf hoe goed &#39;n persoon sing?
beautiful singing voice, can't carry a tune in a bucket, sing on/off key|pragtige sang stem kan &#39;n deuntjie nie dra in &#39;n emmer, sing op / af sleutel
(9) What words describe how high or low a person sings?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf hoe hoog of laag &#39;n persoon sing?
soprano, alto, baritone, bass|sopraan, alt, bariton, bas
(10) What words describe whether or not people are singing the same thing together?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf of mense saam sing dieselfde ding?
sing in unison, sing in harmony, sing the melody/harmony, keep time|sing in harmonie sing in harmonie, sing die melodie / harmonie, hou tyd

Musical instrument|Musiekinstrument
Use this domain for words referring to musical instruments and people who play a particular instrument.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na musiekinstrumente en mense wat &#39;n bepaalde instrument te speel.
(1) What is the general term for musical instrument?|(1) Wat is die algemene term vir musiekinstrument?
musical instrument, band instrument|musiekinstrument, orkes instrument
(2) What are the types of instruments that have strings that you pluck?|(2) Wat is die aard van die instrumente wat snare wat jy ruk het?
stringed instrument, strings, piano, harp, guitar, banjo, violin, fiddle, viola, cello, bass fiddle|snaar instrument, snare, klavier, harp, kitaar, banjo, viool, viool, altviool, tjello, bas viool
(3) What are the types of instruments that you hit?|(3) Wat is die aard van die instrumente wat jy getref?
percussion instruments, drum, snare drum, bass drum, tympani, cymbal, bell, xylophone, marimba, rattle, castanet, bangle, jingle|slaginstrumente, drom, snaartrom, bas drom, tympani, simbaal, klok, xilofoon, marimba, rammel, Castanet, bangle, jingle
(4) What are the types of instruments that you blow into?|(4) Wat is die aard van die instrumente wat jy blaas in?
wind instruments, winds, reeds, organ, flute, clarinet, oboe, brass instruments, horn, trumpet, cornet, bugle, trombone, French horn, baritone horn, tuba, harmonica, bagpipes, pipe|wind instrumente, winde, riete, orrel, fluit, klarinet, hobo, koperblasers, horing, trompet, horing, beuel, tromboon, Franse horing, bariton horing, tuba, mondfluitjie, doedelsakke, pyp
(5) What words refer to playing a musical instrument?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die speel van &#39;n musiekinstrument?
play, pluck, fiddle, blast, beat|speel, ruk, viool, ontploffing, klop
(6) What words refer to a person who plays a musical instrument?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n musiekinstrument speel?
instrumentalist, player, pianist, violinist, drummer, trumpeter, flutist|instrumentalis, speler, pianis, violis, tromspeler, trompetspeler, fluit
(7) What words describe the sound made by a musical instrument?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf die klank gemaak deur &#39;n musikale instrument?
blast (of a trumpet), blare, crash (of a cymbal), timbre,|ontploffing (van &#39;n trompet), geloei, crash (van &#39;n simbaal), timbre,
(8) What words refer to the parts of musical instruments?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van musiekinstrumente?
mouthpiece, bell, key, keyboard, drumstick, reed, bow, string, fret, pick, organ pipe|mondstuk, klok, sleutel, klawerbord, boudjie, riet, boog, string, vertoorn, pluk, orrel pyp

(7) What words indicate that a drama has a particular actor in it?|(7) Wat woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n drama het &#39;n besondere akteur in dit?

(8) What words refer to a person who writes plays?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat speel skryf?

(9) What are the parts of a drama?|(9) Wat is die dele van &#39;n drama?

(10) What words refer to a place where a drama is performed?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar &#39;n drama word uitgevoer?
theater, cinema, stage, set, on location|teater, teater, stadium stel, op die plek

prop, scenery, backdrop, curtain|stut, natuurskoon, agtergrond, gordyne
(12) What words refer to acting with too much emotion?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na wat met te veel emosie?
overact, ham it up,|oor dryf, Gam dit op,

Game|Game
Use this domain for words referring to games. Some languages do not make a distinction between "Games" and "Sports."|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na speletjies. Sommige tale het nie &#39;n onderskeid tussen &quot;Games&quot; en maak &#39;Sports. &quot;
(1) What words refer to a game?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n spel?
game|spel
(2) What types of games are there?|(2) watter tipe speletjies is daar?
card game, gambling game, board game|card game, dobbelspel, bordspel
(3) What are the names of specific board games?|(3) Wat is die name van spesifieke bordspeletjies?
bingo, blackjack, bridge, cards, checkers, chess, charades, craps, dice, dominoes, gin, hearts, jacks, lotto, mahjongg, marbles, Monopoly, Parcheesi, poker, roulette, solitaire,|bingo, blackjack, brug, kaarte, Checkers, skaak, Charades, craps, dobbelstene, domino&#39;s, jenewer, harte, jacks, Lotto, Mahjongg, albasters, Monopoly, Parcheesi, poker, roulette, solitaire,
(4) What are the names of specific children's games?|(4) Wat is die name van die spel se spesifieke kinders?
catch, hide-and-seek, hopscotch, leapfrog, mumblety-peg, tag,|vang, verberg-en-soek, eenbeentjie, Leapfrog, mumblety-pen, etiket,
(5) What are the parts of games?|(5) Wat is die dele van die spel?
piece, game piece, playing piece, die, dice, card, pack of cards, board|stuk, spel stuk, speel stuk, sterf, dobbelstene, kaart, pak kaarte, raad
(6) What words refer to playing a game?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n wedstryd speel?
play,|speel,
(7) What words refer to the people who play games?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die mense wat speel?
player, contestant, team members, captain, star|speler, deelnemer, spanlede, kaptein, ster
(8) What words refer to play against someone?|(8) Wat woorde verwys om te speel teen iemand?
play against, be against, versus,|speel teen, teen, teenoor,
(9) What words refer to the people you play against?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die mense wat jy speel teen?
opponent, opposition, rival,|opponent, opposisie, teenstander,
Card game|Kaart spel
Use this domain for words related to a particular game. The example words are from the card games. If you do not play card games in your culture, you can rename this domain and use it for one of your games. Add other domains for each of your games.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n spesifieke spel. Die voorbeeld woorde is uit die kaart gespeel. As jy nie card games speel in jou kultuur, kan jy hierdie domein naam en gebruik dit vir een van jou speletjies. Voeg ander gebiede vir elk van jou speletjies.

card game, poker,|card game, poker,
(2) What is one game called?|(2) Wat is een wedstryd genoem?
hand|hand
(3) What is a group of games called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n groep van speletjies genoem?
(4) What is a player called?|(4) Wat is &#39;n speler genoem?
player,|speler,
(5) What is each side called?|(5) Wat is elke kant genoem?
partners,|vennote,
(6) What events make up the game?|(6) Watter gebeure te maak van die spel?
shuffle cards, deal cards, play, lead, follow suit, trump, call, take a trick,|shuffle kaarte, deal kaarte, speel, lood, volg pak, troef, bel, neem &#39;n truuk,

Sports|Sport
Use this domain for words related to sports.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met sport.
(1) What words refer to sports?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sport?

(2) What words refer to specific sports?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na spesifieke sport?
football, soccer, basketball, tennis, track, track and field, ping pong, badminton, baseball, hockey, ice hockey, boxing, wrestling, running, cricket, golf,  gymnastics, race,|sokker, sokker, basketbal, tennis, spoor, baan en veld, tafeltennis, pluimbal, bofbal, hokkie, yshokkie, boks, stoei, hardloop, krieket, gholf, gimnastiek, ras,

sports event, sporting event, game, match, bout|sportbyeenkoms, sportgebeurtenis, spel, match, bout
(4) What words refer to a group of sports events?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van sportbyeenkomste?
series, Olympics, tournament, tourney, meet, double-header, triple-header, season|reeks, Olimpiese Spele, toernooi, toernooi, ontmoet, dubbel-kop, drie-kop, seisoen
(5) What are the parts of a sports events?|(5) Wat is die dele van &#39;n sport gebeure?
starting bell/buzzer, first quarter, second quarter, first half, half time, final bell/buzzer|begin klok / sirene, eerste kwartaal, tweede kwartaal, eerste helfte, helfte van die tyd, finale klok / sirene
(6) What is a person called who participates in sports?|(6) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat deelneem aan sport?
athlete, player, starting line up, substitute, bench, coach, captain, referee, trainer, professional, amateur|atleet, speler, begin line-up, plaasvervanger, bank, afrigter, kaptein, skeidsregter, afrigter, professionele, amateur
(7) What is a group of players called?|(7) Wat is &#39;n groep van spelers genoem?
team, club|span, klub
(8) What is a group of teams called?|(8) Wat is &#39;n groep van die spanne genoem?
league, conference, association|liga, konferensie, assosiasie

(12) What do athletes do?|(12) Wat doen atlete doen?
play, compete, competition, struggle, engage in a sport/contest, participate, exercise, physical exercise, train, training, calisthenics, warm up, workout, break the rules, pull ahead|speel, meeding, kompetisie, stryd, betrokke te raak in &#39;n sport / wedstryd, deel te neem, oefening, oefening, met die trein, opleiding, gimnastiek, opwarm, oefensessie, breek die reëls, trek vooruit
(13) What words refer to the goal of a sport?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die doel van &#39;n sport?
goal, score,|doel, telling,
(14) What words are used of the outcome of a game?|(14) Watter woorde gebruik van die uitslag van &#39;n wedstryd?
win, lose, tie, defeat, become champion, win the prize, finish the race, finish well, winner, loser|wen, verloor, das, nederlaag, geword kampioen, wen die prys, die wedloop voltooi, klaar goed, wenner, verloorder
(15) What are the winners and losers called?|(15) Wat is die wenners en verloorders genoem?
winner, champion, loser, first place winner, second place, runner up, second runner up|wenner, kampioen, verloorder, eerste plek wenner, tweede plek, naaswenner, tweede naaswenner
(16) What awards are given to the winner?|(16) Wat toekennings word gegee aan die wenner?
prize, cup, trophy, wreath, flowers, medal, gold medal, silver medal, bronze medal, blue ribbon, prize money, champion's belt, applause, cheers, plaudits, kudos, fame|prys, koppie, trofee, krans, blomme, medalje, goue medalje, silwer medalje, brons medalje, blou lint, prysgeld, gordel kampioen se applous, Cheers, plaudits, roem, roem
(17) What equipment is used in sports?|(17) Watter toerusting gebruik word in sport?

(18) What is the place called where sports are played?|(18) Wat is die plek genoem waar sport gespeel?

(20) What is the person called who enforces the rules?|(20) Wat is die persoon genoem wat die reëls afdwing?
referee, to referee, referee's whistle, umpire, to umpire, official, commissioner, timekeeper, to keep time, call time, stop play, to rule|skeidsregter, om skeidsregter, fluitjie blaser se skeidsregter, om die skeidsregter, beampte, kommissaris, tydhouer, tot tyd te hou, noem tyd, stop speel, om te heers
(21) What is a person called who watches sports?|(21) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat sport horlosies?
fan, crowd, cheerleaders, pep club|fan, skare, rasieleiers, Pep klub
(22) What do fans do?|(22) Wat doen fans doen?
root, yell, cheer, shout encouragement, support their team, boo the referee|wortel, gil, moed, skree aanmoediging, ondersteuning van hul span, boo die skeidsregter

commentator, announcer, sportscaster, reporter|kommentator, omroeper, sportscaster, verslaggewer

(2) What words refer to the way a person behaves?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die manier waarop &#39;n persoon optree?
behavior, antics, conduct, character, manner, demeanor, characteristic, air, bearing, behavior, carriage, comportment, course, custom, dealing, deportment, doings, etiquette, existence, life, manners, mien, trait, way of life, the way someone acts,|gedrag, gedrag, gedrag, karakter, wyse, houding, kenmerk, lug, dra, gedrag, vervoer, comportment, natuurlik, persoonlike, hantering, wandel, handelinge, etiket, bestaan, die lewe, maniere, mien, eienskap, manier van lewe, die manier waarop iemand optree,
Good, moral|Goeie, morele
Use this domain for words related to being good or moral in behavior.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met goed of morele gedrag.
(1) What words describe someone who is good?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat goed beskryf?
good, moral, blameless, decent, ethical, excellent, fine, high-minded, holy, honorable, just, pure, righteous, saintly, sanctified, upstanding, virtuous, worthy,|goeie, morele, onberispelik, ordentlike, etiese, &#39;n uitstekende, fyn, hoë-minded, heilig, eerbare, net, suiwer, regverdige, heilige, geheilig trotse, deugsame, waardig,
(2) What words refer to a good person?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie mens?
saint,|heilige,
(3) What words refer to the quality of being good?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die goeie?
goodness, morality, holiness, purity, righteousness, sanctification, virtue,|goedheid, moraliteit, heiligheid, reinheid, geregtigheid heiligmaking, deugsaamheid,
(4) What words refer to doing something good?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets goeds doen?
do good, be good, behave, behave yourself, be on your best behavior,|doen goed, wees goed, optree, tree jouself, wees op jou beste gedrag,
(5) What words refer to something someone does that is good?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets of iemand nie wat goed is?
good deed, good behavior,|goeie daad, goeie gedrag,
(6) What words describe something someone does that is good?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat iemand nie wat goed is?
good, ethical, fine, right, righteous, worthy,|goeie, etiese, fyn, regs, regverdige, waardig,
(7) What words refer to becoming good?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na besig goed?
improve, develop, reform,|verbeter, te ontwikkel, hervorming,
Bad, immoral|Bad, immoreel
Use this domain for words related to being bad or immoral in behavior, and for words describing a bad person.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die feit dat slegte of immorele gedrag, en vir woorde beskryf &#39;n slegte mens nie.
(1) What words describe someone who is bad?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat sleg is te beskryf?
bad, base, carnal, corrupt, dangerous, decadent, degenerate, depraved, dishonorable, evil, felonious, foul, heinous, immoral, improper, impure, iniquitous, low-minded, low, miscreant, nasty, nefarious, no good, reprobate (adj), sinful, sinister, terrible, unethical, unholy, unjust, unrighteous, vile, villainous, wicked,|sleg, basis, vleeslike, korrupte, gevaarlike, dekadente, ontaard, verdorwe, skandelik, bose, misdadig, vuil, afskuwelike, immoreel, onbehoorlike, onsuiwer, onregverdige, lae-minded, lae, ongelowige, nare, afstootlike, nie &#39;n goeie, onbetroubaar (adj), sondige, sinistere, vreeslike, onetiese, onheilige, onregverdiges, onregverdiges, vuil, gemeen, goddelose,
(2) What words describe someone who is very bad?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat baie sleg beskryf?
twisted, sick, perverted, depraved, terrible,|gedraai, siek, verdraaide, verdorwe, verskriklik,
(3) What words refer to a bad person?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n slegte mens?
miscreant, reprobate (n), scoundrel, sinner, black sheep, villain, knave,|ongelowige, onbetroubaar (n), skelm, sondaar, swart skape, skurk, boef,
(4) What words refer to someone who is very bad?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat baie sleg?
monster, pervert,|monster, verdraai,
(5) What words refer to doing something bad?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets sleg doen?
sin (v), behave badly, misbehave, do wrong, be up to something, get into, indulge in, commit, stoop|sonde (v), tree erg, wangedra, verkeerd te doen, word tot iets kry in, geniet in, pleeg, stoep
(6) What words refer to the quality of being bad?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die slegte?
sinfulness, depravity, evil (n), iniquity,|sondigheid, verdorwenheid, bose (n), ongeregtigheid,
(7) What words refer to something someone does that is bad?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets of iemand nie wat sleg is?
sin (n), misbehavior,|sonde (n), wangedrag,
(8) What words describe something someone does that is bad?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat iemand doen wat sleg is?
bad, blameworthy, sinful, wrong,|sleg, blaamwaardig, sondige, verkeerde,
(9) What words describe someone who plans to do something bad?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat beplan om iets sleg te doen?
calculating, scheming,|berekening, scheming,
(10) What words describe a place where bad people often go?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek waar slegte mense dikwels gaan?
seedy, sleazy, haunt, den of iniquity,|verwaarloosde, sleazy, spook, den van ongeregtigheid,
(11) What words refer to someone becoming bad?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iemand besig sleg?
go bad, go wrong, turn to crime, fall, fall into sin,|gaan sleg, verkeerd gaan, draai om misdaad, val, val in die sonde,
(12) What words refer to one person causing another person to be bad?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n ander persoon sleg te wees?
tempt, corrupt, pervert, turn,|versoek, korrupte, verdraai, draai,
Meet a standard|Ontmoet &#39;n standaard
Use this domain for words related to meeting a standard.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vergadering &#39;n standaard.
(1) What words refer to being acceptable?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na synde aanvaarbaar?
meet a standard, be acceptable, be perfect, be normal|ontmoet &#39;n standaard, aanvaarbaar wees, perfek wees nie, wees normale
(2) What words refer to acceptable behavior?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na aanvaarbare gedrag?

(3) What words describe the behavior of someone who acts acceptably?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf die gedrag van iemand wat aanvaarbaar optree?
acceptable, satisfactory, normal, pleasing, polite, well mannered|aanvaarbaar is, bevredigend, normale, aangenaam, beleefd, goed gemanierd
Below standard|Onder standaard

(2) What words refer to unacceptable behavior?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na onaanvaarbare gedrag?
act unacceptably, dissatisfactory, abnormal, unpleasing, unpleasantly, be impolite, ill mannered|tree onaanvaarbaar, gebevredigend, abnormale, behaag, onaangenaam, wees onbeskof, swak gemanierd

unacceptable, dissatisfactory, abnormal, unpleasing, impolite, ill mannered, rude|onaanvaarbaar, gebevredigend, abnormale, behaag, onbeskof, swak gemanierd, onbeskof

Reputation|Reputasie

reputation, standing, image, name, character,|reputasie, staan, beeld, naam, karakter,

(3) What words refer to having a good reputation?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie reputasie?
have a good reputation, have a reputation for, be of good repute, be well thought of, have a good name,|het &#39;n goeie reputasie, het &#39;n reputasie vir, hou goeie reputasie, goed gedink, het &#39;n goeie naam,
(4) What words refer to a good reputation?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n goeie reputasie?
good reputation, prestige, stature,|n goeie reputasie, prestige, statuur,
(5) What words refer to hurting someone's reputation?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die seer iemand se reputasie?
harm someone's reputation, damage someone's reputation, give someone a bad name, bring someone into disrepute, discredit, bring discredit on,|benadeel iemand se reputasie, beskadig iemand se reputasie, gee iemand &#39;n slegte naam, bring iemand in oneer, minag, bring diskrediteer op,
(6) What words refer to having a bad reputation?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n slegte reputasie?
have a bad reputation, be of evil repute, be poorly thought of, have a bad name|het &#39;n slegte reputasie, wees van die bose aansien, word swak gedink, het &#39;n slegte naam
Patient|Pasiënt
Use this domain for words related to being patient--if you are patient, you don't get angry or do anything bad even though something bad happens to you for a long time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met geduld - as jy geduldig is, het jy nie kwaad of enigiets doen slegte al iets sleg met jou gebeur vir &#39;n lang tyd.
(1) What words describe someone who is patient?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat geduldig is?
patient, persevering, accommodating,|pasiënt, volhard, te akkommodeer,
(2) What words refer to being patient?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na geduld?
be patient, bear, endure, persevere, patiently, persist, plod, plug, tolerate,|wees geduldig, beer, verduur, volhard, geduldig, voortduur, gezwoeg, plug, duld nie,
(3) What words refer to the quality of being patient?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die pasiënt?
patience, constancy, endurance, steadfastness,|geduld, standvastigheid, uithouvermoë, volharding,
(4) What words describe a situation that a person can endure?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n situasie wat &#39;n persoon kan verduur?
bearable, endurable, tolerable,|draaglik, durende, verdraagliker,
Impatient|Ongeduldig
Use this domain for words related to being impatient--if you are impatient, you get angry or do something bad when something bad happens to you for a long time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met ongeduldig - as jy ongeduldig is, kwaad jy kry of iets sleg doen wanneer iets sleg met jou gebeur vir &#39;n lang tyd.

impatient, intolerant,|ongeduldig, onverdraagsaam,

impatience, intolerance,|ongeduld, onverdraagsaamheid,
(4) What words describe a situation that makes a person feel impatient?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n situasie wat maak &#39;n mens voel ongeduldig?
intolerable,|ondraaglik,
Bad-tempered|Humeurige
Use this domain for words related to being bad-tempered--to behave in an angry, unfriendly way.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die feit dat slegte-tempered - om op te tree in &#39;n woedende, onvriendelike manier.
(1) What words describe a person who is often bad-tempered?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat dikwels humeurige?
bad-tempered, grumpy, grouchy, disagreeable, cantankerous, uptight,|humeurige, knorrig, knorrig, onaangename, brommerig, uptight,
