be in a bad mood, be in a huff, be in one of his bad moods, got out of bed on the wrong side, got out on the wrong side of the bed|wees in &#39;n slegte bui, in &#39;n vlaag van woede, in een van sy slegte buie, het uit die bed aan die verkeerde kant, het uit aan die verkeerde kant van die bed
(3) What words describe someone who refuses to talk because they are angry?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat weier om te praat, want hulle is kwaad?
sullen, surly, sulky, sulk, be in a sulk, give someone the silent treatment,|nors, stuurs, verbitterd, pruil, in &#39;n pruil, gee iemand die stille behandeling,
(4) What words describe someone who is easily annoyed by unimportant things?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat maklik vererg deur onbelangrike dinge?
irritable, crotchety, petulant, fractious,|prikkelbare, grillig, dartel, lastig,

short-tempered, quick-tempered, have a short fuse, temper,|kort-tempered, driftig, het &#39;n kort lont, humeur,
(6) What words refer to someone who is bad-tempered?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat humeurige?
grouch,|Grouch,
Admire someone|Bewonder iemand
Use this domain for words related to admiring someone--to feel good about someone because you think that he is a good person.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met bewonder iemand - om goed oor iemand voel omdat jy dink dat hy &#39;n goeie mens.

idolize, revere, worship, put someone on a pedestal, hero-worship,|vergoden, REVERE, aanbidding, sit iemand op &#39;n voetstuk, heldeverering,

estimation, opinion, regard,|skatting, mening, verband,
(4) What words refer to the thought or feeling that someone is good?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gedagte of gevoel dat iemand is goed?
admiration, adulation, esteem (n), respect,|bewondering, adulation, agting (n), respek,
(5) What words refer to a person who is admired?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat bewonder?
idol, hero, heroine,|idol, held, heldin,
(6) What words describe someone who is admired?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat bewonder?
admirable, estimable, honorable, idolized,|bewonderenswaardig, waardig, eerbare, verafgod,
Despise someone|Verag iemand
Use this domain for words related to despising someone--to feel bad about someone because you think they are not as good as you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met verag iemand - sleg te voel oor iemand omdat jy dink hulle is nie so goed soos jy.
(1) What words refer to despising someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na verag iemand?
despise, disdain, disregard, rebuff, reject, repudiate, scoff, scorn, shun, slight, sneer at, snub, spurn, be contemptuous of, hold in contempt, feel contempt for, feel superior, think someone is worthless, think poorly of, feel superior to, look down on, spit on, be cliquish, turn up your nose at,|verag, minagting, ignoreer, afjak, verwerp, verwerp, bespot, spot, vermy, gering, ginnegappen by, stompe, verag, wees minag, minag, voel minagting vir, voel beter, dink dat iemand is waardeloos, dink swak van , voel beter, kyk neer op, spoeg op, wees cliquish, draai jou neus op,
(2) What words describe someone who despises someone?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat iemand minag beskryf?
contemptuous, disdainful, disrespectful, haughty, scornful, snobbish, superior,|minagtende, minagtende, respek, hoogmoedig, spotters, snobisties, &#39;n beter,
(3) What words refer to a person who despises someone?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat iemand minag?
scoffer,|spotter,
(4) What words refer to the feeling of despising someone?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel van verag iemand?
contempt, disdain, disregard, disrespect, hate, irreverence,|minagting, minagting, miskenning, disrespek, haat, oneerbiedigheid,
(5) What words refer to something you do that shows you despise someone?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat jy wat wys jy iemand verag?
rebuff (n), slight (n), snub (n),|afjak (n), effense (n), stompe (n),
(6) What words describe something someone does to show they despise someone?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat iemand doen om te wys hulle iemand verag?
withering (look), derisive (laugh),|aftakeling (kyk), spottend (lag),
(7) What words describe someone who is despised?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat verag?
contemptible, despicable, pitiable, pitiful, despised,|veragtelik, afskuwelike en beklaenswaardig en medelye veragte,
Humble|Nederige
Use this domain for words related to being humble--to not think that you are better than other people, or to not think that you are better than you really are, and to not talk or act as if you were better than other people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met nederig - om nie te dink dat jy beter is as ander mense, of om nie te dink dat jy beter is as jy werklik is, en om nie te praat of optree asof jy beter as ander mense was.
(1) What words describe someone who is humble?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat nederig te beskryf?
humble, lowly, meek, mild, modest, self-deprecating, self-effacing, simple, timid, timorous, unassuming, unpretentious|nederig, nederig, sagmoedig, mild, beskeie, self-deprecating, beskeie, eenvoudige, skugter, bedeesde, beskeie, beskeie
(2) What words refer to doing something humble?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets nederige doen?
be humble, humbly, condescend,|nederig, nederig, verwerdig,
(3) What words refer to the quality of being humble?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die nederige?
humility, humbleness, condescension, debasement, lowliness, modesty, self-abasement, self-deprecation, timidity,|nederigheid, nederigheid, neerbuiging, vernedering, nederigheid, beskeidenheid, self-vernedering, self-afkeuring, bedeesd,
(4) What words describe something someone does that is humble?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat iemand nie wat nederig?
humble,|nederig,
(5) What words refer to becoming humble?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na besig nederige?
humble yourself,|nederig,
(6) What words refer to one person causing another to be humble?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n ander om nederig te wees?
to humble someone, humiliate, debase,|nederig iemand verneder, verneder,
(7) What words refer to being too humble?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die feit dat te nederige?
put yourself down, run yourself down, sell yourself short, underestimate yourself,|jouself af, hardloop jouself af, verkoop jouself kort, onderskat jouself,
Proud|Trotse
Use this domain for words referring to being proud--to think that something or someone is very good and to feel very good about them, especially to think and feel very good about yourself--to think that you are better than others, to think that you are better than you really are, or to talk and act as if you were better than other people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na trots - om te dink dat iets of iemand is baie goed en voel baie goed oor hulle, veral om te dink en voel baie goed oor jouself - om te dink dat jy is beter as ander, om te dink dat jy beter as jy werklik is, of om te praat en op te tree asof jy beter as ander mense was.
(1) What words refer to being proud of something or someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na trots van iets of iemand?
be proud of, be pleased with, be delighted with, be thrilled with, take pride in, pride yourself on,|trots wees, tevrede wees met, wees verheug oor, wees opgewonde oor, is trots op, trots jouself op,
(2) What words refer to being proud of yourself?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na trots van jouself?
be proud of yourself, be full of yourself, fancy yourself, let something go to your head,|Wees trots op jouself, vol wees van jouself, fancy jouself, laat iets na jou kop,
(3) What words refer to being satisfied with yourself?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na tevrede is met jouself?
self-satisfied, smug, pleased with yourself, complacent,|self-tevrede, selfvoldane, tevrede met jouself, selfvoldaan,
(4) What words refer to thinking you are more important than you really are?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na te dink jy is meer belangrik as jy werklik is?
self-important, pompous, jumped up, have delusions of grandeur, get too big for your boots/britches,|self-belangrik, luisterryk, opgespring, het grootheidswaan, kry te groot vir jou skoene / broeke,
(5) What words refer to thinking you are better than other people?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na te dink jy is beter as ander mense?
snobbish, snobby, haughty, snooty, snotty, superior, stuck-up, class-conscious,|snobisties snobby, hoogmoedig, veragtelik, snotterig, &#39;n beter, vas-up, klas-bewuste,
(6) What words describe someone who is proud?|(6) Watter woorde iemand wat trots is beskryf?
proud, aloof, arrogant, bigheaded, boastful, brash, conceited, contemptuous, egocentric, egotistic, egotistical, hoity-toity, imperious, inflated, lofty, ostentatious, pretentious, prideful, proud hearted, puffed up, self-aggrandizing, self-confident, uppity, vain,|trots, afsydig, arrogant, bigheaded, grootpraters, parmantige, verwaand, minagtende, egosentriese, egoïstische, selfsugtig, aanstellerig, heerssugtige, opgeblase, verhewe, blufferig, pretensieus, trotse, trots van hart, opgeblase, self-aggrandizing, self- vertroue, aanmatigend, tevergeefs,
(7) What words refer to behaving in a proud way toward other people?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na optree in &#39;n trotse wyse teenoor ander mense?
look down on, look down your nose at, be beneath you, think you're too good for,|kyk neer op, kyk af jou neus op, wees onder jou, jy dink te goed vir is,
(8) What words refer to the quality of being proud?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die gehalte van trots?
pride, sense of achievement, aloofness, arrogance, audacity, conceit, egotism, flashiness, haughtiness, hauteur, loftiness, ostentation, pretension, self-importance, self-respect, self-will, showiness, snobbery, snobbishness, vanity,|trots, gevoel van prestasie, afsydigheid, arrogansie, vermetelheid, verbeelding, egoïsme, flashiness, hoogmoed, aanmatiging, hoogheid praal, pretensie, self-belang, selfrespek, self-wil, showiness, snobisme, snobisme, nietigheid,
(9) What words refer to a proud person?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n trotse persoon?
snob, prig,|snob, dief,
(10) What words refer to something or someone you are proud of?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets of iemand wat jy trots is?
be someone's pride and joy, be the pride of, be a credit to,|iemand se trots en vreugde, wees die trots van, &#39;n krediet aan,
(11) What words refer to something making someone proud?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand trots?
go to your head,|gaan na jou kop,
(12) What words refer to stopping someone from behaving proudly by criticizing them?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na stop iemand uit gedra met trots deur kritiek op hulle?
put someone in their place, wipe the smile off someone's face, cut someone down to size,|sit iemand in hul plek, vee die glimlag van iemand se gesig, sny iemand af van die grootte,
Show off|Wys
Use this domain for words referring to showing off--to behave in a way that attracts people's attention because you want them to admire you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat uit - om op te tree op &#39;n manier wat mense se aandag trek, omdat jy wil hê hulle aan jou bewonder.

Love|Lief
Use this domain for words related to loving someone--to feel good about someone, want good things to happen to them, and want to do good things for them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met liefdevolle iemand - om goed oor iemand voel, wil goeie dinge gebeur met hulle, en wil goeie dinge vir hulle doen.

(5) What do people say when they don't care?|(5) Wat sê die mense as hulle nie omgee?

(6) What do people say when they don't care what happens, because they would be happy with whatever happens?|(6) Wat sê die mense as hulle nie omgee wat gebeur nie, omdat hulle tevrede is met wat ook al gebeur sou wees?
not mind, not be fussy, it doesn't matter to me, it doesn't bother me, I'm easy, suit yourself, have no objection,|nie omgee nie, nie kieskeurig wees, dit maak nie saak vir my, dit pla my nie, ek is maklik, pas jouself, het geen beswaar,

Provide for, support|Voorsiening te maak vir, ondersteuning
Use this domain for words referring to providing someone with what they need to live each day, such as providing for an elderly parent who can no longer earn what they need.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die verskaffing van iemand met wat hulle nodig het om elke dag te leef, soos wat voorsiening maak vir &#39;n bejaarde ouer wat nie meer kan verdien wat hulle nodig het.

(3) What words refer to a person who provides?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat?

(4) What words refer to what is provided?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na wat verskaf?
provisions, support (n), supply (n)|bepalings, ondersteuning (n), supply (n)
Care for|Sorg vir
Use this domain for words related to caring for someone--to do something good for someone, because they need something and cannot do it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die versorging van iemand - om iets goed vir iemand te doen, omdat hulle iets nodig het en kan dit nie doen nie.
(1) What words refer to caring for someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na omgee vir iemand?
care for, take care of, meet someone's needs|sorg vir, sorg, behoeftes voldoen iemand se
(2) What is a person called who takes care of another?|(2) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat sorg van &#39;n ander?
caregiver|versorger
Entrust to the care of|Toevertrou aan die sorg van
Use this domain for words related to entrusting something to the care of someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets vertrou aan die sorg van iemand.
(1) What words refer to giving something to someone for him to take care of?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om iets aan iemand vir hom om te sorg?
entrust to the care of, assign, commend, commit, trust with|toevertrou aan die sorg van, toewys, beveel, pleeg, trust met
Meddle|Meng
Use this domain for words referring to meddling--involving oneself in something that does not concern oneself, such as someone else's business or affairs, or a fight between other people.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na inmenging - wat homself in iets wat jouself nie aangaan, soos iemand anders se besigheid of sake, of &#39;n stryd tussen ander mense.
(1) What words refer to meddling in someone's affairs?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na inmenging in sake iemand se?
meddle, bother, butt in, eavesdrop, encroach, infringe, interfere, intervene, intrude, pry, snoop, tamper|meng, pla, boude in, afluister, inbreuk, inbreuk, inmeng, gryp, inbreuk, sjkroewedraaier, snoop, peuter
(2) What words refer to a person who meddles?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat meddles?
busybody, eavesdropper, interloper, intruder, meddler, snoop|moeial, Eavesdropper, indringer, indringer, bemoeial, snoop
Spoil|Bederf
Use this domain for words referring to spoiling something that is happening, such as an event, work, relationship, or feeling, by doing something that makes it less attractive, less enjoyable, or less effective--to do something bad to something that is happening, so that people can't do what they were doing or don't enjoy it as much.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na bederf iets wat gebeur, soos &#39;n gebeurtenis, werk, verhouding, of gevoel, deur iets wat dit minder aantreklik, minder aangenaam, of minder doeltreffend maak doen - om iets sleg doen om iets wat gebeur, sodat mense nie kan doen wat hulle doen of nie geniet dit soveel.
(1) What words refer to spoiling the quality of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na bederf die gehalte van iets?
spoil, impair, mar, detract from|buit, benadeel, mar, afbreuk aan
(2) What words refer to spoiling someone's work?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na bederf iemand se werk?
spoil, mess up, undermine, sabotage, throw a wrench in the works, pour cold water on,|buit, gemors, ondermyn, sabotasie, gooi &#39;n sleutel in die werke, gooi koue water op,
(3) What words refer to spoiling a relationship?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n verhouding bederf?
spoil, sour, poison,|buit, suur, gif,
(4) What words refer to spoiling an event?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n gebeurtenis bederf?
spoil, mar, put a damper on, cast a shadow over,|buit, mar, sit &#39;n demper op, gooi &#39;n skaduwee oor,
(5) What words refer to spoiling a person's reputation?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na bederf n persoon se reputasie?
spoil, damage, damaging, discredit, harm, tarnish, be tainted,|buit, skade, skade aan, minag, seer, ontluistering, besmet,
(6) What words refer to completely spoiling something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na heeltemal bederf iets?
ruin, destroy, wreck, screw up, spoil everything,|ondergang, vernietig, wrak, skroef, bederf alles,
(7) What words refer to someone who spoils people's enjoyment of an event?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat bederf mense se genot van &#39;n gebeurtenis?
wet blanket, spoilsport, killjoy,|nat kombers, pretbederwer, killjoy,
(8) What words describe something that has not been spoiled?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat nie bederf beskryf?
unspoiled, unblemished,|ongerepte, onbevlekte,

Self-controlled|Eie beheer
Use this domain for words referring to self-control--deciding not to do something that you want to do, because you think it would be bad to do it; or deciding to do something, because you know it is good.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na self-beheer - besluit om nie iets wat jy wil doen, omdat jy dink dit sleg om dit te doen sou wees nie; of besluit om iets te doen nie, want jy weet dit is goed.
(1) What words describe someone who is self-controlled?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat self-beheerde?

ascetic, conformist, moderate, puritan, stoic,|asketiese, conformist, matige, puritein, stoïsch,
(3) What words refer to being self-controlled?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na synde self-beheerde?
abstain, behave, behave yourself, constrain, contain yourself, control yourself, discipline yourself, forbear, forgo, restrain yourself, say no, tolerate,|onthou, op te tree, gedra jou, dwing, bevat jouself, beheer jouself, dissipline jouself, laat staan, af te sien, in toom te hou jouself, sê nee, duld nie,
(4) What words refer to the quality of being self-controlled?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die self-beheer word?
self-control, abnegation, abstention, abstinence, asceticism, constraint, discipline, equanimity, forbearance, moderation, poise, reserve, restraint, self-denial, self-discipline, sobriety, stoicism, sufferance, temperance, tolerance, toleration,|selfbeheersing, afswering, onthouding, onthouding, asketisme, beperking, dissipline, kalmte, verdraagsaamheid, matigheid, houding, reservaat, selfbeheersing, self-ontkenning, self-dissipline, nugterheid, stoïsisme, lyding, selfbeheersing, verdraagsaamheid, verdraagsaamheid,
(5) What words refer to controlling your feelings?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die beheer van jou gevoelens?
keep your temper, calm and collected, composed, composure, forbearing, unexcitable, long-suffering, poised, reserved, staid, steady, unexcited,|hou jou humeur, kalm en beheersd, saamgestel, kalmte, hou, unexcitable, lankmoedigheid, gereed, voorbehou, sober, bestendige, unexcited,
(6) What words refer to controlling your eating?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die beheer van jou eetgewoontes?
put a knife to your throat,|sit &#39;n mes op jou keel,

Mistake|Mistake
Use this domain for words referring to mistakes--something bad that someone does by accident.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na foute - iets sleg dat iemand nie deur &#39;n ongeluk.
(1) What words refer to a mistake?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n fout?
mistake, error, slip, mix-up, slip-up, oversight, aberration,|fout, fout, glip, meng-up, glip-up, toesig, afwyking,
(2) What words refer to a mistake in writing or speaking?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n fout in die skryf of praat?
mistake, misprint, spelling mistake, slip of the tongue, error, typographical error, typo,|fout misdruk, spelfout, glip van die tong, fout, tipografiese fout, tikfout,
(3) What words refer to a serious mistake in judgment or planning?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ernstige fout in die gereg of beplanning?
mistake, miscalculation, misjudgment, error of judgment, be a bad move, blunder, bad tactics, muddle, confusion, mess something up, make a mess of something,|fout, misrekening, verkeerde oordeel, oordeelsfout, &#39;n slegte skuif, flater, slegte taktiek, warboel, verwarring, gemors iets op, maak &#39;n gemors van iets,
(4) What words refer to an embarrassing mistake?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n verleentheid fout?
put your foot in it, faux pas, gaffe, boo-boo, indiscretion,|sit jou voet in dit, faux pas, flater, boo-boo, onkuisheid,
(5) What words refer to making a mistake?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n fout maak?
make a mistake, make an error, mistake something, go wrong, get something wrong, blunder, goof, goof up, slip up, misjudge, bungle,|&#39;n fout maak, maak &#39;n fout, fout iets verkeerd gaan, kry iets verkeerd, flater, domkop, domkop up, glip op, misgis, verbroddelen,
(6) What words describe something done by mistake?|(6) Watter woorde iets gedoen deur die fout beskryf?
by mistake, mistaken, mistakenly, in error, erroneously,|per ongeluk, verkeerd, verkeerdelik, in die fout, verkeerdelik,
(7) What words refer to mistaking one thing or person for another?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na twyfel een ding of persoon vir &#39;n ander?
mistake something, confuse, mix someone up with, get something mixed up, muddle,|fout iets te verwar, meng iemand met, kry iets deurmekaar, warboel,
(8) What words refer to causing someone to make a mistake?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n fout maak?
trip someone up, catch someone out,|reis iemand up, vang iemand uit,
(9) What do you say when you make a mistake?|(9) Wat sê jy wanneer jy &#39;n fout maak?
oops,|oops,
Polite|Beleefd

(3) What words refer to being very polite?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat baie beleefd?
correct, formal, stiff,|korrekte, formele, styf,
(4) What words refer to the quality of being polite?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gehalte van hoflik?
politeness, etiquette, formality, manners, courtesy, tact,|beleefdheid, etiket, formaliteit, maniere, hoflikheid, takt,
(5) What words describe a child who is polite?|(5) Watter woorde &#39;n kind wat beleefd beskryf?
good, well-behaved, well-brought up|goeie, goed gedra, goed opgevoed

savior, defender, deliverer, liberator, rescuer, protector, guardian|Verlosser, verdediger, redder, bevryder, redder, beskermer, voog

lucky, fortunate, some people have all the luck, lead a charmed life, not know you're born, it's all right for some,|gelukkig, gelukkig, &#39;n paar mense het al die geluk, lei &#39;n beswering lewe, nie weet dat jy gebore is, dit is alles reg vir &#39;n paar,

luck, a run of good luck,|geluk, &#39;n lopie van goeie geluk,
(5) What words describe something that makes you lucky?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat jy gelukkig maak, beskryf?
lucky (charm/number/day),|gelukkig (sjarme / nommer / dag),
(6) What words indicate that something bad did not happen as a result of luck?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets sleg nie gebeur het nie as gevolg van geluk?
luckily, fortunately, happily,|gelukkig, gelukkig, gelukkig,
(7) What words refer to something that seems unlucky but turns out to be good?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat ongelukkig lyk, maar blyk om goed te wees?
blessing in disguise,|seën in vermomming,
(8) What do people say when they hope someone will be lucky?|(8) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle hoop dat iemand sal gelukkig wees?

(9) What do people say to try to prevent bad luck?|(9) Wat sê die mense om te probeer om te verhoed dat slegte geluk?

(5) What words refer to a person who rebels?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat die rebelle?
rebel, activist, agitator, anarchist, belligerent, conspirator, extremist, guerrilla, insurgent, liberationist, militant, mutineer, rabble-rouser, radical, rebel, revolutionary, revolutionist, terrorist|rebel, aktivis, roerder, anarchist, hardkoppig, samesweerder, ekstremistiese, guerrilla, oproerig, liberationist, militante, muiteling, gespuis-Rouser, radikale, rebelleer, revolusionêre, revolutionist, terroriste
(6) What words describe a rebel?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n rebel?
rebellious, revolutionary, defiant, mutinous, radical|opstandige, revolusionêre, uitdagend, oproerig, radikale
(7) What words describe a revolution?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n rewolusie?
violent, peaceful|gewelddadige, vreedsame
(8) What is the leader of a rebellion called?|(8) Wat is die leier van &#39;n rebellie genoem?
leader of a rebellion, rebel leader, revolutionary leader|leier van &#39;n rebellie, rebelleleier, revolusionêre leier
(9) What does the leader of a rebellion do?|(9) Wat beteken die leier van &#39;n rebellie te doen?
lead a rebellion, organize a rebellion,|lei &#39;n opstand te organiseer &#39;n rebellie,
(10) What do the authorities do to stop a rebellion?|(10) Wat doen die owerhede doen om &#39;n rebellie te stop?
put down, suppress,|sit, onderdruk,

Ruler|Regeerder
Use this domain for words related to the ruler of a country.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vors van &#39;n land.
(1) What is the person called who is the highest ruler in the country?|(1) Wat is die persoon genoem wat die hoogste rang in die land?
ruler, highest ruler, supreme authority, head of state, leader of the country, emperor, king, president, premier, chancellor, prime minister, Caesar, pharaoh, chief, paramount chief, chieftain, chief of state|liniaal, hoogste gebieder, oppergesag, hoof van die staat, die leier van die land, keiser, koning, president, premier, kanselier, eerste minister, Caesar, Farao, die hoof, opperhoof, hoofman, hoof van die staat
(2) What words refer to the position or office of the ruler?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die posisie of kantoor van die liniaal?
throne, kingship, presidency, premiership, chieftaincy, chieftainship, position, office|troon koningskap presidentskap, premierskap, kapteinskap, hoofmanskap, posisie, kantoor
(3) What words describe something having to do with the ruler?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met die vors beskryf?
royal, regal, imperial, kingly, presidential, majestic|koninklike koninklike, keiser, koninklike, presidensiële, majestueuse
(4) What words refer to the house of the ruler?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die huis van die owerste?
palace, castle, White House, number 10 Downing Street,|paleis, kasteel, White House, nommer 10 Downing Street,
(5) What words refer to the symbols of the ruler?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die simbole van die liniaal?
throne, crown, diadem, scepter, royal robes, presidential seal,|troon, kroon, tulband, septer, koninklike klere, presidensiële seël,
(6) What special words and phrases are used when talking to the ruler?|(6) Watter spesiale woorde en frases gebruik wanneer dit aan die vors?
your majesty, live forever|U Majesteit, vir ewig te lewe
(7) What words refer to when a ruler begins to rule?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer &#39;n leier begin regeer?
take the throne, crown (v), swear in, take the oath of office,|neem die troon, kroon (v), sweer in, neem die ampseed,
(8) What words refer to when a ruler stops ruling?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer &#39;n vors stop regerende?
abdicate, resign, overthrow, leave office,|abdikeer, bedank, omverwerping, laat kantoor,

(4) What words are used to describe things related to the king's family?|(4) Watter woorde word gebruik om dinge wat verband hou met die familie van die koning se beskryf?

(2) What is a person called who is imprisoned?|(2) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat in die tronk?
prisoner, jailbird, captive, felon, convict, inmate, prisoner of war|gevangene, tronkvoël, gevange, misdadiger, weerlê, inwoner, &#39;n gevangene van die oorlog
(3) Where are people imprisoned?|(3) Waar is die mense in die tronk?
prison, brig, can, concentration camp, correctional institution, death camp, dungeon, house of correction, jail, jailhouse, county jail, joint, pen, penal colony, penitentiary, federal penitentiary, pound, reformatory, slammer, stockade,|gevangenis, brig, kan, konsentrasie kamp, ​​korrektiewe instelling, dood kamp, ​​put, huis van regstelling, die tronk, Jailhouse, county tronk, gesamentlike, pen, strafkolonie, gevangenis, die federale gevangenis, pond, verbeteringskool, Slammer, palissade,
(4) What are the parts of a prison?|(4) Wat is die dele van &#39;n gevangenis?
cell, cellblock, bars, stocks, death row, solitary confinement, cooler,|sel, cellblock, bars, aandele, die dood ry, eensame opsluiting, koeler,
(5) Who are the staff of a prison?|(5) Wie is die personeel van &#39;n gevangenis?
prison warden, prison guard, jailer, keeper, turnkey, warder|tronkbewaarder, gevangenis bewaak, tronkbewaarder, oppasser, turnkey, bewaarder
(6) What words refer to the action of restraining a prisoner?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die optrede van die matigende n gevangene?
restrain, control, to handcuff, tie up, put in chains, to bind, put in the stocks, to gag|toom, beheer, te boei, saamvat, sit in kettings, te bind, sit in die blok te gag
(7) What means are used to restrain prisoners?|(7) Wat beteken word gebruik om gevangenes in toom te hou?
restraints, handcuffs, chains, bonds, stocks, gag|beperkinge, boeie, kettings, bande, aandele, gag
(8) What words are used of escaping from prison?|(8) Watter woorde gebruik om te ontsnap uit die tronk?
escape, break out of jail, jailbreak, escapee, escaped prisoner, be on the run|ontsnap, breek uit die tronk, jailbreak, escapee, ontsnap gevangene wees op die vlug
(9) What words refer to the process of serving a sentence?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van &#39;n vonnis?
serve your sentence|dien jou vonnis
(10) What words refer to the process of completing a sentence?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van die voltooiing van &#39;n sin?
complete your sentence, serve out the sentence, fulfill your sentence|voltooi jou sin dien die vonnis, vervul jou vonnis
(11) What words refer to the action of releasing a person from prison?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die optrede van die vrystelling van &#39;n persoon uit die tronk?
release, let go, let out of prison, set free|vrylating, laat gaan, laat uit die tronk, bevry
Execute|Voer
Use this domain for words related to executing someone for a crime.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die uitvoering van iemand vir &#39;n misdaad.
(1) What words refer to executing someone for a crime?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die uitvoering van iemand vir &#39;n misdaad?
execute, behead, hang, crucify, burn at the stake, impale, execution,|uit te voer, onthoof, hang, kruisig, brand op die brandstapel, deurboor, uitvoering,
(2) What words refer to someone who executes a criminal?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat &#39;n kriminele voer?
executioner, firing squad, hangman,|laksman, vuurpeloton, hangman,
(3) What things are used to execute someone?|(3) Watter dinge word gebruik om iemand uit te voer?
gas chamber, electric chair, gallows, gibbet, guillotine, lethal injection, noose, scaffold, cross, stake, sword,|gaskamer, elektriese stoel, galg, galg, guillotine, dodelike inspuiting, strop, steier, kruis, die spel is, swaard,
Ostracize|Dood verklaar

outcast, pariah|uitgeworpene, paria
Pardon, release|Vergeef release

Atone, restitution|Versoening, restitusie
Use this domain for words referring to atoning for a past sin--doing something to make up for something bad you did, or giving something to pay for  something bad you did.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na versoening vir &#39;n verlede sonde - om iets te doen om op te maak vir iets sleg jy gedoen het, of om iets te betaal vir iets sleg jy gedoen het.

atone, expiate, make up for, make amends, compensate, repay, pay for, pay your debt to society,|versoening, versoen, maak vir, goed maak, vergoed, terug te betaal, betaal, betaal jou skuld aan die samelewing,
(2) What words refer to something a person does to atone for a sin?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat &#39;n mens doen om versoening vir sonde?
penance, amends,|boetedoening, wysig,
(3) What words refer to something a person gives to atone for a sin?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat &#39;n mens gee om versoening vir sonde?
restitution, compensation, damages, reparations, indemnity,|restitusie, vergoeding, skadevergoeding, kompensasie, vrywaring,
(4) What words refer to the act of atoning for a sin?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die daad van versoening vir &#39;n sonde?
atonement, expiation, reparation, redress,|versoening, versoening, herstel, herstel,

Unfair|Onregverdige
Use this domain for words related to being unfair.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met onregverdig.

Deserve|Verdien
Use this domain for words related to deserving something--if you do something, either good or bad, something can happen to you as a result of what you did. For instance you can receive a reward for doing good, or a punishment for doing wrong. If what happened to you is like what you did, people can think it is right that this thing happened to you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwant aan verdienstelike iets - as jy iets, hetsy goed of sleg te doen, kan iets gebeur met jou as &#39;n gevolg van wat jy gedoen het. Jy kan byvoorbeeld &#39;n beloning vir die doen van goeie of &#39;n straf vir verkeerd doen te ontvang. As wat met jou gebeur soos wat jy gedoen het, kan mense dink dit is reg dat hierdie ding met jou gebeur het.
(1) What words refer to deserving what you receive?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na verdienstelike wat jy ontvang?
deserve, merit, be owed, be yours by right, have earned,|verdien, meriete, wees verskuldig, joune deur regs, verdien,
(2) What words indicate that someone deserves the problems they are having?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iemand die probleme wat hulle met verdien?
deserve, had it coming, get what you deserve, serve someone right, get your just deserts, get what was coming to you, your punishment fits the crime,|verdien, het dit kom, kry wat jy verdien, dien iemand reg, kry jou verdiende loon kry wat na julle toe kom, jou straf pas by die misdaad,
(3) What words describe something that someone deserves?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat iemand verdien beskryf?
well-deserved, well-earned, fitting, appropriate,|welverdiende, welverdiende, toebehore, toepaslike,
Discriminate, be unfair|Diskrimineer onregverdig wees
Use this domain for words related to being unfair to someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met onregverdig om iemand.

unfairness, discrimination, bias, prejudice|onregverdigheid, diskriminasie, partydigheid, vooroordeel
(3) What words refer to one person causing another to be unfair?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n ander om onregverdig wees?
bias someone against, prejudice someone against|vooroordeel iemand teen, vooroordeel iemand teen

Oppress|Onderdruk
Use this domain for words related to oppressing someone or a particular group of people--when a person uses his power or authority to harm others who are innocent.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met onderdruk of iemand &#39;n bepaalde groep mense - wanneer &#39;n persoon gebruik sy mag of gesag om ander wat onskuldige benadeel.

oppression, harassment, persecution, tyranny|onderdrukking, teistering, vervolging, tirannie

oppressor, persecutor, bully, slave driver, tyrant, dictator|verdrukker vervolger boelie, slaaf bestuurder, tiran, diktator

Conflict|Konflik
Use this domain for general words referring to conflict between people, including quarreling, fighting, and war. The words in this domain should be very general, rather than referring to specific kinds of conflict.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die konflik tussen mense, insluitend twis, stryd, en oorlog. Die woorde in hierdie domein moet baie algemene wees, eerder as na spesifieke soorte konflik.
(1) What general words refer to conflict between people?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na konflik tussen mense?
conflict, strife,|konflik, twis,
Hostility|Vyandigheid
The words in this domain describe a situation in which people disagree about something so strongly that they might start fighting. But these words imply that they have not started fighting yet.|Die woorde in hierdie domein te beskryf &#39;n situasie waarin mense nie saamstem oor iets so sterk dat hulle veg kan begin. Maar hierdie woorde impliseer dat hulle nog nie begin nog veg.
(1) What words refer to hostility between people?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vyandigheid tussen mense?
conflict, antagonism, discord, disharmony, friction, hostility, ill feeling, rivalry, strife, tension, sit on a powder key, cold war, phony war,|konflik, antagonisme, onmin, disharmonie, wrywing, vyandigheid, siek gevoel, wedywering, twis, spanning, sit op &#39;n poeier sleutel, koue oorlog, valse oorlog
(2) What words describe someone who is hostile?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat vyandig beskryf?
hostile, aggressive, combative, contentious, discordant,|vyandig, aggressief, dapper, omstrede, afwyk,
Oppose|Teenstaan
Use this domain for words referring to opposing something that you think is wrong.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na opponerende iets wat jy dink is verkeerd.
(1) What words refer to opposing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na opponerende iets?
oppose, be opposed to, be against, anti-|teenstaan ​​word in teenstelling met, teen, anti
(2) What words refer to something someone does to show he is opposed to something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand doen om te wys hy is gekant teen iets?
objection, opposition, hostility, antagonism,|beswaar, opposisie, vyandigheid, antagonisme,
(3) What words refer to saying that you are opposed to something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na sê dat jy is gekant teen iets?
object to, voice opposition to, express opposition to, raise objections,|beswaar, stem die opposisie aan, uitdruklike opposisie te, verhoog besware,
(4) What words refer to someone who opposes something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat iets teen?
opponent, the opposition, enemy, foe,|opponent, die opposisie, die vyand, vyand,
(5) What words describe someone who opposes something?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat iets teen beskryf?
opposing, hostile, antagonistic, opposing,|opponerende, vyandig, antagonistiese opponerende,
Fight|Stryd
Use this domain for words referring to fighting someone. The words in this domain describe a situation in which two people or groups of people fight each other over something or in order to reach some goal. A fight can use words, various kinds of weapons, or other actions. For fights that only use words use the domain|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die stryd teen iemand. Die woorde in hierdie domein te beskryf &#39;n situasie waarin twee mense of groepe van mense veg mekaar oor iets of om &#39;n doelwit te bereik. &#39;N stryd kan woorde, die verskillende soorte van wapens, of ander aksies te gebruik. Vir gevegte wat net gebruik woorde gebruik die domein
'Quarrel'.|&#39;Ruzie.
(1) What words refer to enemies fighting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vyande veg?
fight, have a fight, get into a fight, fighting, battle, brawl, bully, clash, come to blows, confront, duel, engage (the enemy), face (an enemy), feud, jostle, joust, oppose, scuffle, set-to, spar, skirmish, squabble, strive, struggle, tussle, war, wrestle, be in the fray, go on the warpath,|stryd, &#39;n stryd, in &#39;n stryd, veg, veg, geraas, boelie, botsing, kom waai, konfronteer, tweestryd, betrokke te raak (die vyand), gesig (&#39;n vyand), vete, stoot, toernooi, teen, onderonsie , stel om te, Spar, skermutseling, gekibbel, twis stryd, stryd, oorlog, stoei, in die geveg, gaan op die oorlogspad,
(2) What words refer to a fight?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n geveg?
affray, altercation, battle (n), bout, combat, conflict, contest, crisis, duel (n), feud (n), gunfight, row, shootout, showdown, skirmish, spat, squabble, strife, struggle (n), tiff, war (n),|baklei sien, twis, stryd (n), bout, te bestry, konflik, wedstryd, krisis, tweestryd (n), vete (n), skietgeveg, ry, skietery, konfrontasie, skermutseling, gespoeg, gekibbel, twis, stryd (n), tiff, oorlog (n),
(3) What words refer to a fight between a few people?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stryd tussen &#39;n paar mense?
fight (n), brawl (n), fracas, fray, free-for-all, melee, scrap, scuffle (n),|veg (n), geraas (n), skermutseling, geveg, free-for-all, nabygeveg, afval, onderonsie (n),
(4) What words refer to a fight between many people?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n stryd tussen baie mense?
fighting, battle, clash (n), confrontation,|veg, veg, botsing (n), konfrontasie,
(5) What words refer to a fight that neither side can win?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n stryd wat nie kant kan wen?
stalemate, standoff,|dooiepunt, nekslag,
(6) What words refer to someone causing a fight?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat &#39;n stryd?
arouse, challenge, embroil, fan the flames, goad, incite, instigate, provoke, rally, rouse, spur, stir up,|wek, uitdaging, war, fan die vlamme, angel, aanhits, aanstig, lok, tydren, reveille, Spur, wek,
(7) What words refer to someone who is fighting?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veg?
fighter, hooligan,|vegter, hooligans,

Fight against something bad|Veg teen iets sleg

(2) What words refer to fighting against someone who is trying to do something bad?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na gevegte teen iemand wat probeer om iets sleg te doen?
fight, fight against, fight back, put up a fight, resist, resistance, put up a resistance, meet with resistance, stand up to, make a stand, take a stand, hold out against, hold your ground, not be moved, be unyielding, not give in, defend your ground, oppose, opposing, opposition, react, withstand|veg, veg teen, veg terug, sit &#39;n stryd, weerstand, weerstand, sit &#39;n weerstand, ontmoet met weerstand, staan ​​op om, maak &#39;n stand, neem standpunt, uit te hou teen, hou jou grond, nie geskuif, word onwrikbare, gee nie in jou grond te verdedig, teen opponerende, opposisie, reageer, te weerstaan
(3) What words refer to the process of fighting against something bad?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van die stryd teen iets sleg?
fight (n) against, struggle against, battle against, campaign against, crusade against,|veg (n) teen, stryd teen, stryd teen, veldtog teen, kruistog teen,
Attack|Aanval
Use this domain for words referring to attacking someone--to begin fighting someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die aanval het iemand - om te begin veg iemand.
(1) What words refer to attacking someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aanvalle van iemand?
attack, lead an attack, the attack fell on, assault, assail, charge, come at, drive, force your way, go for, lay into, make a run on, rush, sail into, set upon, strike, confront, penetrate defenses, be on the offense|aanval, lei &#39;n aanval, die aanval het op, aanranding, oorweldig, lading, kom op, ry, dwing jou pad, gaan vir, lê in, maak &#39;n draai op, haas, vaar in, sit op, staking, konfronteer, dring verdediging, op die oortreding
(2) What words refer to attacking in war?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die aanval in die oorlog?
attack, invade, storm, raid, besiege, bombard,|aanval, val, storm, aanval, beleër, bombardeer,
(3) What words refer to surrounding an enemy?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na omliggende &#39;n vyand?
surround, encircle, envelope, encirclement, encircling movement, envelopment,|omsingel, koevert, omsingeling, omring beweging, omhulsel,
(4) What words refer to an attack?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n aanval?
attack (n), assault, charge (n), onrush, rush (n), strike (n),|aanval (n), aanranding, lading (n), toeloop, jaag (n), staking (n),
(5) What words refer to an attack in war?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n aanval in die oorlog?
attack (n), assault (n), foray, invasion, incursion, strike (n), push, raid (n), offense, offensive, onset, onslaught, aggression, ambush (n), sally, siege, sortie,  penetration,|aanval (n), aanranding (n), inval, inval, inval, staking (n), stoot, aanval (n), oortreding, offensief, aanvang, aanslag, aggressie, hinderlaag (n), Sally, beleg, sortie, penetrasie ,
(6) What words refer to a person or group that attacks?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon of groep wat aanvalle?
attacker, attacking force, aggressor, assailant, invader, invasion force,|aanvaller, aanvallende krag aggressor, aanvaller, indringer, inval van krag is,
(7) What words refer to the person or place that is attacked?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die persoon of plek wat aangeval?
victim, target, be under attack|slagoffer, teiken, wees onder aanval
(8) What words describe a person or place that is easy to attack?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon of plek wat maklik is om te val?
vulnerable, sitting duck, be an easy target, open to attack|kwesbaar, sit eend, wees &#39;n maklike teiken, oop te val
(9) What words refer to starting to fight?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na begin om te veg?
launch an attack, mount an attack, start a fight, pick a fight, be spoiling for a fight, looking for a fight, challenge (someone to fight),|&#39;n aanval, die berg &#39;n aanval, begin &#39;n stryd, kies &#39;n stryd, word bederf vir &#39;n stryd, op soek na &#39;n stryd, uitdaging (iemand om te veg),
(10) What words describe an attack that was not caused by an earlier action?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n aanval wat nie veroorsaak is deur &#39;n vroeëre optrede?
unprovoked,|moedswillige,
(11) What words refer to attacking someone who has attacked you?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die aanvalle van iemand wat jou aangeval het?
counter-attack, hit back, retaliate, strike back,|teenaanval, het teruggeslaan, terugslaan, slaan terug,
Ambush|Hinderlaag
Use this domain for words related to ambushing someone--to attacking someone without warning.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met ambushing iemand - aanvallende iemand sonder waarskuwing.
(1) What words refer to ambushing someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na ambushing iemand?
ambush, ambuscade, bushwhack, jump, lie in wait for, mug, pounce, strike, turn on, waylay,|hinderlaag ambuscade, bushwhack, spring, loer, beker, bespring, staking, draai op, loer,
(2) What words refer to an ambush?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lokval?
ambush (n), mugging, strike (n), sneak attack, surprise attack,|hinderlaag (n), agressie, staking (n), sluip aanval, verrassing aanval,
(3) What words refer to a person who ambushes someone?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat iemand hinderlae?
ambusher, bushwhacker,|ambusher, bushwhacker,
Defend|Verdedig
Use this domain for words related to defending someone from attack.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verdedigende iemand uit die aanval.
(1) What words refer to defending yourself from attack?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verdediging van jouself van die aanval?
defend, fight back, hit back at, put up a fight, struggle against, resist, self-defense,|verdedig, veg terug, slaan terug by, sit &#39;n stryd, stryd teen weerstaan, self-verdediging,
(2) What words refer to defending someone from attack?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verdediging van iemand uit die aanval?
defend, come to someone's defense, in defense of, in someone's defense, guard, protect, safeguard, shield, stand up for, stick up for,|verdedig, kom verdediging iemand se verdediging van, in iemand se verdediging, wag, te beskerm, te beskerm, skild, staan ​​op vir, hou vir,
(3) What words refer to successfully defending yourself or someone?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na jouself of iemand suksesvol verdedig?
beat back, beat off, drive off, hold out against, fend off, fight off, fling back, repel, repulse,|klop terug, klop af, ry af, uit te hou teen, afweer, beveg, veeg terug, stoot, stoot,
(4) What words refer to defense?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die verdediging?
defense, resistance,|verdediging, weerstand,
(5) What words refer to a person who defends?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat verdedig?
defender, guard, sentinel, lookout, watchman|verdediger, wag, sentinel, uitkyk, wag
(6) What words describe someone who cannot defend himself?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie kan homself te verdedig?
defenseless|weerloos
(7) What words describe something you do or use to defend yourself?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat jy doen of gebruik om jouself te verdedig beskryf?
defensive, protective,|verdedigende, beskermende,
(8) What words refer to a place easier to defend?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n plek makliker om te verdedig?
fortify, entrench, dig in,|versterk, te verskans, grawe in,
Revenge|Wraak
Use this domain for words related to revenge--to do something bad to someone because they did something bad to you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wraak - om iets sleg te doen om iemand omdat hulle iets sleg aan jou gedoen het.
(1) What words refer to getting revenge?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om wraak?
revenge, get revenge, take revenge, in revenge, avenge, get back at, get even with, pay back, repay, requite, retaliate, in retaliation, retribution, wreak vengeance, I'll get you for this, be out to get,|wraak te kry wraak neem wraak, wraak, wreek, terug te kry op, kry selfs met, terug te betaal, terug te betaal, vergelde, baklei, in vergelding, straf, saai wraak, ek sal jou kry vir hierdie, word uit te kry ,
(2) What words refer to revenge?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wraak?
revenge, reprisal, requital, retaliation, retribution, tit-for-tat, vendetta, vengeance,|wraak, vergelding, wraak, vergelding, straf, tit-for-tat, vendetta, wraak,
(3) What words refer to a person who gets revenge?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat wraak kry?
avenger, nemesis,|bloedwreker, nemesis,
(4) What words describe someone who wants to get revenge?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat wil om wraak te kry?

(5) What words refer to a situation in which both people have done something bad to each other?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n situasie waarin beide mense iets sleg aan mekaar gedoen het?
be even, be quits,|word selfs wees word gesluit,
(6) What words describe something done in revenge?|(6) Watter woorde iets gedoen in wraak te beskryf?
retributive,|vergelding,

Enemy|Vyand

War|Oorlog
Use this domain for words related to war--fighting between countries.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die oorlog - gevegte tussen lande.

war, warfare, fighting, civil war, conflict, armed conflict,|oorlog, oorlogvoering, veg, burgeroorlog, konflik, gewapende konflik,
(2) What words refer to fighting a war?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die stryd teen &#39;n oorlog?
fight a war, wage war, be at war, declare war, make war, go on the warpath, fight, clash,|veg &#39;n oorlog, voer oorlog wees by &#39;n oorlog, oorlog verklaar, maak oorlog, gaan op die oorlogspad, stryd, stryd,
(3) What words refer to a time when armies fight?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd wanneer leërs te veg?
war, battle, campaign, engagement, fight, contest, clash, skirmish|oorlog, stryd, veldtog, betrokkenheid, stryd, wedstryd, stryd, skermutseling
(4) What words refer to the place where a war is fought?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die plek waar &#39;n oorlog geveg?
battlefield, field of battle, theater of war, scene of the battle, front, front lines, flank, rear, war zone,|slagveld, slagveld, teater van die oorlog, toneel van die stryd, voor, voorste linies, flank, agter, oorlog zone,
(5) What words refer to strategy in war?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die strategie in die oorlog?
strategy, tactics, hunker down, keep up the pressure, overwhelm, concentrate your forces, form a line, hold the line, break the line, reform, rally, morale, maintain morale, military discipline, supply, supply lines, control the battle, battlefield control, reconnaissance, reconnoiter, intelligence, propaganda,|strategie, taktiek, ouderwets, hou die druk, oorweldig, konsentreer jou kragte, vorm &#39;n lyn, hou die lyn, die lyn breek, hervorming, rally, moraal, moraal, militêre dissipline, verskaffing, verskaffing lyne handhaaf, beheer oor die stryd , slagveld beheer, verkenning, navorsen, intelligensie, propaganda,
(6) What words refer to an army moving?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n leër te beweeg?
deploy, maneuver, outmaneuver, flank, outflank, advance, charge, overrun, retreat, withdraw|ontplooi, maneuver, slim, flank, beet, vooraf, lading, oorrompel, Retreat, onttrek
(7) What words refer to a person who fights on your side?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat aan jou kant veg?
ally|bondgenoot
(8) What words refer to a person who wants to fight a war?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat wil om &#39;n oorlog te veg?
warmonger, militarist, hawk,|oorlog soek, militaristiese, smous,
(9) What words describe a person or country that wants to fight a war?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon of land wat wil om &#39;n oorlog te veg?
warlike,|oorlogsugtige,
(10) What words describe countries that are at war?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf lande wat in oorlog?
warring|Warring
(11) What words refer to someone who is hurt or killed in a war?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat seermaak of dood in &#39;n oorlog?

Defeat|Nederlaag
Use this domain for words related to defeating someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verslaan iemand.
(1) What words refer to defeating an army or enemy in war?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verslaan &#39;n leër of vyand in die oorlog?
defeat, annihilate, beat, conquer, crush, humble, kayo, lick, master, nip, outmaneuver, overcome, overpower, overwhelm, prevail over, rebuff, reduce, rout, seize, subdue, subject, subjugate, thrash, trample, tread, triumph, vanquish, whip, bring someone to his knees, scatter, gain ground, give someone a beating,|nederlaag, vernietig, klop, te verower, geliefdes, nederige, kayo, lek, meester, nip, slim, te oorkom, oorweldig, oorweldig, oorwin, afjak, te verminder, rout, gryp, onderwerp, vak, onderwerp, thrash, vertrap, loopvlak , triomf, oorwin, sweep, bring iemand op sy knieë, strooi, kry grond, gee iemand &#39;n klop,
(2) What words refer to defeating someone in a game or other competition?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verslaan van iemand in &#39;n spel of ander kompetisie?
beat, defeat, outplay, be more than match for,|klop, nederlaag, langer vol, meer as opgewasse vir,
(3) What words refer to defeating someone easily?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verslaan van iemand maklik?
rout, thrash, skunk, smash, slaughter, clobber, hammer, lick, trounce,|rout, thrash, muishond, smash, slagting, afranselen, hamer, lek, afrossen,
(4) What words describe a complete victory?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n volledige oorwinning?
crushing, overwhelmingly,|verpletterende, oorweldigend,
(5) What words refer to defeating someone by using your intelligence?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die verslaan van iemand deur die gebruik van jou intelligensie?
outwit, outsmart, be too clever for|uitoorlê, uitoorlê, wees te slim vir
(6) What words refer to the defeat of an enemy?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die nederlaag van die vyand?
defeat (n), rout, beating, conquest, discomfiture, drubbing, subjection, triumph, victory,|nederlaag (n), rout, klop, verowering, die verwarring ransel, onderdanigheid, triomf, oorwinning,
(7) What words refer to the person who defeats the enemy?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die persoon wat die vyand verslaan?
conqueror, vanquisher, victor,|oorwinnaar overwinnaar, Victor,
(8) What words describe the person who defeats the enemy?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf die persoon wat die vyand verslaan?
conquering, victorious,|oorwinnaar seëvierende,
Win|Win
Use this domain for words related to winning a victory.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die wen van &#39;n oorwinning.
(1) What words refer to winning a fight or war?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die wen van &#39;n stryd of oorlog?

(2) What words refer to winning a game or other competition?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n wedstryd wen of ander kompetisie?
win, come first, come in first, finish first, get in, first place|wen, kom eerste, kom in die eerste, eerste klaar, kry in die eerste plek
(3) What words refer to winning easily?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na maklik te wen?
win easily, win hands down, sweep to victory, romp home, sweep the board|wen maklik, wen hande af, vee na &#39;n oorwinning, romp huis, vee die direksie
(4) What words refer to almost losing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na byna verloor?
win by a narrow margin, scrape home, scrape by, squeak by, be a close-run thing|wen deur &#39;n smal marge, skraap die huis, skraap deur piep deur &#39;n naby-hardloop ding
(5) What words refer to a victory?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n oorwinning?
victory, win, triumph, success, conquest|oorwinning, oorwinning, oorwinning, sukses, oorwinning
(6) What words refer to an easy victory?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n maklike oorwinning?
easy win, walkover, landslide,|maklike oorwinning, wedstryd sonder mededingers, grondverskuiwing,
(7) What words refer to a difficult victory?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n moeilike oorwinning?
narrow victory, close call, hard won,|naelskraapse oorwinning, close call, hard gewen het,
(8) What words refer to the person or group that wins?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die persoon of groep wat wen?
winner, winning side, victor, champion, victorious army, champ,|wenner, wenkant, Victor, kampioen, seëvierende leër kampioen,
(9) What words refer to something that you win?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat jy wen?
prize, winnings, jackpot, trophy, cup,|prys, wengeld, jackpot, trofee, beker,
(10) What words refer to a situation during a fight or game when it looks like you will win?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n situasie in &#39;n geveg of spel wanneer dit lyk asof jy sal wen?
be winning, lead, be ahead, be in the lead, be out in front,|wen, lood, wees wat voorlê, in die voortou, wees in die voorkant,
(11) What words refer to the person or group that people think will win?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die persoon of groep wat mense dink gaan wen?
frontrunner, strong contender, be the favorite, be in the running,|voorloper, &#39;n sterk aanspraakmaker wees die gunsteling, in die loop,
Lose a fight|Verloor &#39;n stryd

(2) What words refer to the defeat?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die nederlaag?
defeat, loss, fall,|nederlaag, verlies, val,

(1) What words refer to all of the soldiers of a country?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na al die soldate van &#39;n land?
the military, the armed forces,|die weermag, die gewapende magte,
(2) What words refer to a military organization?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n militêre organisasie?
military organization, branch of the military, the services,|militêre organisasie, tak van die militêre, die dienste,
(3) What words refer to a group of soldiers?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep soldate?
troops, force, unit,|troepe, krag, eenheid,
(4) What types of military units are there?|(4) Watter tipes militêre eenhede is daar?
battery, cavalry, cohort, detachment, detail, guard, host, legion, palace guard,|battery, perderuiters, cohort, losmaking, detail, wag, host, legioen paleis wag,
(5) What words describe something belonging to the military?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat aan die militêre beskryf?
military,|militêre,

wall, palisade, rampart,|muur, palisade, voorskans,

(7) What words refer to making a fort?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n fort?

(9) What types of spears are there?|(9) Watter tipes spiese is daar?
spear, dart, javelin, pike,|spies pyl, spies, snoek,

shaft, tip|steel, punt

warhead, fuse, fin|Warhead, lont, vin

feel convicted, recognize your sin, realize one has done wrong, regret|voel skuldig bevind is, jou sondes erken, besef een verkeerd gedoen het, spyt
(2) What words indicate that a person has decided to change his behavior?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n persoon het besluit om sy gedrag te verander?

(4) What words refer to an admission of wrong?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n erkenning van verkeerd?

(5) What words refer to a request for forgiveness?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n versoek om vergifnis?
apologize, apology, apologetic, ask forgiveness|verskoning, verskoning, verskonend, vra vergifnis
(6) What words refer to an effort to make up for doing wrong?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n poging om op te maak vir verkeerd doen?
make amends, make up for, set things right, make restitution, pay back what was taken, return stolen goods|goed maak, maak vir, stel dinge reg, restitusie, terug te betaal wat geneem is, terug te keer gesteelde goedere
(7) What do people say when they ask for forgiveness?|(7) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle vra vir vergifnis?
Sorry! Excuse me. I'm sorry. Forgive me.|Jammer! Verskoon my. Ek is jammer. Vergewe my.

Stop fighting|Stop veg

(1) What words refer to stopping fighting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na stop veg?

(2) What words refer to talking about stopping fighting?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na praat oor die stop veg?

(3) What words refer to an agreement to stop fighting?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ooreenkoms te hou veg?

Religion|Geloof
Use this domain for general words referring to religion and the supernatural.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na godsdiens en die bonatuurlike.
(1) What words refer to the system of belief and practice related to God?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die stelsel van geloof en praktyk met betrekking tot God?
religion, religious system, faith|godsdiens, godsdienstige stelsel, geloof
(2) What words refer to what is beyond our senses or ability?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat is buite ons sintuie of vermoë?
supernatural, magic, miracle, miraculous, paranormal|bonatuurlike, magie, wonderwerk, wonderbaarlike, paranormale
(3) What words describe something having to do with religion?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat te doen het met godsdiens te beskryf?
religious, sacred, spiritual|godsdienstige, heilige, geestelike
(4) What words refer to those areas of life outside of religion?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gebiede van die lewe buite godsdiens?
secular, profane|sekulêre, onheilige
(5) What words refer to the world of gods and spirits?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die wêreld van die gode en geeste?
spirit world, spiritual realm, the supernatural, the unseen|gees wêreld, geestelike realm, die bonatuurlike, die onsigbare
God|God
Use this domain for words related to God--the supreme being in the universe. Each theological system will have different beliefs concerning the existence and nature of God. Our purpose here is to collect and define the terms used to refer to the supreme deity. If there is no such person in the theological system, then use this domain for other terms for the pantheon of gods, ultimate reality, nirvana, and similar concepts. However most theological systems, even atheism, have the concept of a supreme God and use words to refer to him.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met God - die opperwese in die heelal. Elke teologiese stelsel sal verskillende oortuigings oor die bestaan ​​en aard van God. Ons doel hier is om te versamel en definieer die terme wat gebruik word om te verwys na die hoogste godheid. As daar nie so &#39;n persoon in die teologiese stelsel, gebruik dan hierdie domein vir ander terme vir die pantheon van gode uiteindelike werklikheid, nirvana, en soortgelyke konsepte. Maar die meeste teologiese stelsels, selfs ateïsme, het die konsep van &#39;n oppergod en gebruik woorde om te verwys na hom.
(1) What words refer to the supreme being in the universe?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die hoogste wese in die heelal?
God, the Lord, Yahweh, Elohim, Allah, Theos, Deus, Sky God, supreme being, supreme deity|God, die Here, die HERE, God, Allah, Theos, Deus, Sky God, opperwese, opperwese
(2) What words refer to what people believe about God?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat mense glo oor God?
theology, monotheism, polytheism, pantheism, atheism|teologie, monoteïsme, veelgodery, ateïsme
(3) What words describe something to do with God?|(3) Watter woorde iets te doen met God te beskryf?
divine,|Goddelike,
Supernatural being|Bonatuurlike wese
Use this domain for words referring to supernatural beings--gods, spirits, other types of beings, which normally cannot be seen and do not belong to this world. Some people accept the existence of certain supernatural beings and not others. Mythological beings are those that were believed in during previous times but that are no longer believed in. Fictional beings are those that no one has ever believed in. An indication of whether most people believe in the supernatural being should be put in the definition.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na bonatuurlike wesens - gode, geeste, ander vorme van wesens, wat normaalweg nie gesien kan word en behoort nie aan hierdie wêreld. Sommige mense aanvaar die bestaan ​​van sekere bonatuurlike wesens en ander nie. Mitologiese wesens is diegene wat geglo het in tydens &#39;n vorige keer, maar wat nie meer geglo het. Fiktiewe wesens is diegene wat niemand ooit geglo het. &#39;N aanduiding of die meeste mense glo in die bonatuurlike wese moet in die definisie word.
(1) What general words refer to supernatural beings?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na bonatuurlike wesens?
supernatural being, spirit|bonatuurlike wese, gees
(2) What words refer to lesser gods?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na mindere gode?
god, goddess, the gods, pantheon, deity,|god, die godin, die gode, pantheon, godheid,
(3) What types of good supernatural beings are there?|(3) Watter goeie bonatuurlike wesens is daar?
angel, angelic being, cherub, seraph, saint|engel, engele wese, gérub seraf, heilige
(4) What types of evil supernatural beings are there?|(4) Watter kwaad bonatuurlike wesens is daar?
demon, devil, Satan, the Devil, Beelzebub|demoon, duiwel, Satan, die duiwel, Beëlsebul
(5) What words refer to the spirit of a dead person?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die gees van &#39;n dooie persoon?
spirit, ghost, specter, apparition, phantom, shade, ghoul|gees, spook, spook, spook, spook, skakering, monster
(6) What words refer to supernatural beings that are considered to be mythological or fictional and not real?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na bonatuurlike wesens wat beskou word as mitologiese of fiktiewe en nie ware te wees?
Santa Claus, elf, fairy, giant, dwarf, sprite, genie, dragon, monster, Cyclops, vampire, alien|Santa Claus, elwe, fee, reuse, dwerg, sprite, genie, draak, monster, Cyclops, vampier, uitheemse
(7) What words describe something like or related to a supernatural being?|(7) Wat woorde iets soos of wat verband hou met &#39;n bonatuurlike wese te beskryf?
divine, angelic, demonic, Satanic, devilish, diabolical, ghost like, ghoulish, monstrous, alien,|Goddelike, engele, demoniese, sataniese, duiwels, diaboliese, spook soos, demonisch, monsteragtige, uitheemse,
Theology|Teologie
Use this domain for words related to theology--the study of God and what people believe about God.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die teologie - die studie van God en wat mense glo oor God.
(1) What words refer to the study of God and religion?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die studie van God en godsdiens?
theology,|teologie,
(2) What words refer to something you believe about God?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat jy glo oor God?
doctrine, tenet, dogma, belief,|leer, beginsel, dogma, geloof,
(3) What words refer to disagreement over doctrine?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na onenigheid oor leer?
heterodoxy, sect, denomination, dissent|heterodoxie, sekte, denominasie, verdeeldheid
(4) What words refer to foolish or ignorant beliefs about religion?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na dwase of onkundig oortuigings oor godsdiens?
superstition|bygeloof
Sacred writings|Heilige geskrifte
Use this domain for words related to sacred writings. Examples are only given for the Christian sacred writings. However you should include words referring to the holy books of all religions .|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die heilige geskrifte. Voorbeelde word slegs vir die Christelike heilige geskrifte. Maar moet jy woorde verwys na die heilige boeke van alle gelowe insluit.
(1) What words refer to sacred writings?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na heilige geskrifte?
sacred writings, Scripture, Bible, the Good Book, Gospel|heilige geskrifte, die Skrif, Bybel, die Goeie Boek, Evangelie
(2) What words refer to a part of the sacred writings?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van die heilige geskrifte?
chapter, verse, text, Old/New Testament, Law, Prophets, Gospels, Epistles, Apocalypse|hoofstuk, vers, teks, Ou / Nuwe Testament, Wet, Profete, Evangelies, Briewe, Apocalypse
(3) What words refer to God's role in producing sacred writings?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na God se rol in die vervaardiging van heilige geskrifte?
inspire, inspiration, revelation|INSPIRE, inspirasie, openbaring
(4) What words describe the sacred writings or a text from the sacred writings?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf die heilige geskrifte of &#39;n teks uit die heilige geskrifte?
inspired, holy, scriptural, biblical, sacred, prophetic, apostolic|geïnspireer, heilig, skriftuurlike, Bybelse, heilige, profetiese, apostoliese
(5) What words describe whether or not a book should be considered a part of the sacred writings?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf of &#39;n boek moet beskou word as &#39;n deel van die heilige geskrifte?
canon, canonical, apocryphal|kanon, kanoniese, apokriewe
(6) What words refer to a book that is revered but not considered part of the sacred writings?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n boek wat vereer, maar nie as deel van die heilige geskrifte?
Apocrypha|Apokriewe
(7) What words refer to the interpretation of sacred writings?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die interpretasie van heilige geskrifte?
interpretation, exegesis|interpretasie, eksegese
(8) What words refer to a book that interprets the sacred writings?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n boek wat die heilige geskrifte interpreteer?
commentary|kommentaar
Miracle, supernatural power|Miracle, bonatuurlike krag
Use this domain for words related to miracles--the use of supernatural power to do something good.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wonderwerke - die gebruik van bonatuurlike krag om iets goeds te doen nie.
(1) What words refer to supernatural power?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na bonatuurlike krag?
supernatural power, miraculous power, might, force, omnipotence, almighty, all-powerful,|bonatuurlike krag, wonderbaarlike krag, mag, krag, almag, almagtige, al-magtige,
(2) What words refer to performing a miracle?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die uitvoering van &#39;n wonderwerk?
perform a miracle, produce a miracle, do a miracle|voer &#39;n wonderwerk, produseer &#39;n wonderwerk, doen &#39;n wonderwerk
(3) What words refer to the event of a miracle?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die geval van &#39;n wonderwerk?
miracle, miraculous event, sign, wonder, magic|wonderwerk, wonderbaarlike gebeurtenis, teken, wonder, magie
(4) What words describe a miracle?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n wonderwerk?
miraculous,|wonderbaarlike,
(5) What words refer to a person who can perform miracles?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat wonderwerke kan verrig?
miracle worker, prophet|wonderwerk werker, profeet
Sorcery|Towery
Use this domain for words related to sorcery--the use of supernatural power to do something bad.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met towery - die gebruik van bonatuurlike krag om iets sleg te doen.
(1) What words refer to doing something using sorcery?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen met behulp van towery?
practice sorcery, do magic, work magic, cast a spell, put a spell on, put a curse on, bewitch, conjure, invoke, enchant, bedevil, entrance (v), mesmerize, wave a wand, jinx,|praktyk towery, doen magic, magic werk, gooi &#39;n spel, sit &#39;n spel op, sit &#39;n vloek op, betoveren, roep, roep, betower, beduiwel, ingang (v), biologeren, waai &#39;n muur, doem,
(2) What words refer to the practice of sorcery?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die praktyk van toordery?
sorcery, magic (n), witchcraft, black magic, voodoo, voodooism, witchery, wizardry, occult, necromancy,|towery, magic (n), towery, swart magie, voodoo, voodooism, towery, towery, okkulte, nekromante
(3) What words refer to something that someone does using sorcery?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat iemand nie die gebruik van towery?
spell, curse, hex, enchantment, charm, incantation,|spel nie, vloek, hex, betowering, sjarme, uitspreek,
(4) What is a person called who practices sorcery?|(4) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat towery beoefen?
sorcerer, magician, witch, wizard, shaman, witchdoctor, conjuror, necromancer, warlock, charmer, medicine man, alchemist, medium,|towenaar, towenaar, heks, towenaar, shaman, toordokter, towenaar, towenaar, towenaar, charmer, medisyne man, alchemis, medium,
(5) What words describe someone or something that can do magic?|(5) Watter woorde iets of iemand wat magic kan doen beskryf?
have magical powers, magic (adj), magical, supernatural, occult, mystic, weird,|het magiese kragte, magie (adj), magiese, bonatuurlike, okkulte, mistieke, vreemd,
(6) What words describe someone who has been bewitched?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat getoor?
charmed, bewitched, spellbound, haunted,|betower, betower, vasgenael, agtervolg,
(7) What words refer to protecting someone from sorcery?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die beskerming van iemand uit toordery?
ward off,|afweer,
(8) What things are used when performing sorcery?|(8) Watter dinge word gebruik wanneer die uitvoering van towery?
charm, amulet, evil eye, talisman, fetish, wand, rod, divining rod, magic ring, philosopher's stone, magic carpet, cauldron,|sjarme, amulet, afguns, talisman, fetish, muur, staaf, WICHELROEDES, magie ring, klip filosoof se magic carpet, ketel,
(9) What words are used when performing sorcery?|(9) Watter woorde word gebruik wanneer die uitvoering van towery?
abracadabra, open sesame,|abracadabra, open sesame,
(10) What words refer to malevolent supernatural power?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na kwaadwillig bonatuurlike krag?
malevolent power, evil force, Satanic force, demonic power, black magic|kwaadwillig krag, bose mag, sataniese krag, demoniese mag, swart magie
Demon possession|Duiwelbesetenheid
Use this domain for words referring to demon possession--when a demon or spirit influences or controls the behavior of a person. Use this domain for all words related to the relationship between spirits and people, including communication between people and spirits. Also use this domain for words referring to casting out demons--causing a demon to stop influencing or controlling a person.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na duiwelbesetenheid - wanneer &#39;n demoon of gees invloede of beheer die gedrag van &#39;n persoon. Gebruik hierdie domein vir alle woorde in verband met die verhouding tussen die geeste en mense, insluitend kommunikasie tussen mense en geeste. Gebruik ook hierdie domein woorde verwys na die duiwels uitdryf - veroorsaak dat &#39;n demoon om te stop beïnvloed of beheer van &#39;n persoon.
(1) What words refer to being influenced or controlled by a demon?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beïnvloed of beheer word deur &#39;n demoon?
be possessed, be demonized, go into a trance,|besit, word gedemoniseer, gaan in &#39;n beswyming,
(2) What words refer to what demons do to people?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat duiwels doen om mense?
possess, inhabit, demonize, torture, haunt, trouble|besit, bewoon, demoniseer, marteling, spook, die moeilikheid
(3) What words refer to casting out a demon?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n duiwel uitgedryf?
cast out a demon, exorcise, drive out, expel, deliver/free/release from demonic power/influence|gooi &#39;n duiwel uitgedryf, besweer, verdryf, te verdryf, te lewer / vrye / release van demoniese mag / invloed
(4) What words refer to a person who casts out demons?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat die duiwels uit?
Bless|Seën
Use this domain for words related to blessing someone--saying something that causes something good to happen, or requests God to do something good to someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die seën iemand - iets wat iets goeds gebeur veroorsaak, of versoek God iets goed vir iemand te doen sê.

(2) What words refer to what is said in blessing?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat gesê word in die seën?
blessing, benediction,|seën, seën,

Destiny|Destiny
Use this domain for words related to destiny--decisions and actions by God, spirits, or by impersonal forces that determine or influence what happens to a person.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die noodlot - besluite en optrede deur God, geeste, of deur onpersoonlike magte wat bepaal of invloed wat gebeur met &#39;n persoon.

(2) What words refer to an impersonal force that determines what happens to a person?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n onpersoonlike krag wat bepaal wat gebeur met &#39;n persoon?
destiny, fate, fortune, luck, chance, throw of the dice|lot, lot, geluk, geluk, kans, gooi van die dobbelsteen
(3) What words refer to something to which a person or thing is destined?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat &#39;n persoon of ding is bestem?
destiny, fate|lot, lot
Prophecy|Profesie
Use this domain for words referring to speaking for God, including foretelling the future through divine knowledge.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die woord vir God, insluitend voorspel die toekoms deur middel van Goddelike kennis.
(1) What words refer to being able to speak for God or deliver a message from God?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om te praat vir God of lewer &#39;n boodskap van God?

prophecy, prediction, prophetic utterance|profesie, voorspelling, profetiese woord
(3) What is a person called who speaks for God or foretells the future?|(3) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat praat vir God of voorspel die toekoms?
prophet, prophetess|profeet profetes
(4) What words describe something said in prophecy?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iets gesê in profesie?
prophetic|profetiese

divine, read the signs, foretell the future|Goddelike, lees die tekens, voorspel die toekoms
(3) What words refer to the practice of divining secrets?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die praktyk van waarsêery geheime?

(5) What words describe someone who can divine secrets?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat geheime kan voorspel beskryf?
clairvoyant,|helder,
(6) What words refer to something showing what will happen in the future?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wys wat sal gebeur in die toekoms?

(7) What words refer to something that shows or tells a secret?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat wys of vertel &#39;n geheim?
omen, sign, harbinger, portent, presage, foreshadowing, message from the beyond|teken, teken, voorloper, teken, vir gevoel, vooruitskouing, boodskap van die buite
(8) What methods are used to divine secrets?|(8) Watter metodes word gebruik om goddelike geheime?
interpret dreams, read palms, read tea leaves, read cards, read the stars, consult your horoscope, look into a crystal ball, play with a Ouija board, examine the entrails of an animal|interpreteer drome lees palms, lees tee blare, lees kaarte, lees die sterre, raadpleeg jou horoskoop, kyk in &#39;n kristal bal, speel met &#39;n Ouija bord, ondersoek die binnegoed van &#39;n dier
