Worship|Aanbidding
Use this domain for personal expressions of devotion to God, in whatever ways the religion defines and expresses it.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir persoonlike uitdrukking van toewyding aan God, in watter maniere waarop die godsdiens definieer en dit uitdruk.
(1) What words refer to relating to God or to the spirits?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na met betrekking tot God of die geeste?
(2) What words refer to acts of worship toward God?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na dade van aanbidding teenoor God?
worship, adore, revere, reverence, lift up your heart, pay homage|aanbidding, vereer, REVERE, eerbied, verhef jou hart, bring hulde
(3) What words refer to the act of worship?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die daad van aanbidding?
worship, adoration, devotion, homage, service, reverence, veneration, deification, idolization|aanbidding, verering, toewyding, hulde, diens, eerbied, verering, vergoddeliking, idolization
(4) What actions or postures symbolize worship?|(4) Wat optrede of houding simboliseer aanbidding?
bow, kneel, genuflect, prostrate oneself|buig, kniel, knielen, knieval
(5) What types of actions make up worship?|(5) Watter tipe optrede maak aanbidding?
prayer, singing hymns, praising God|gebed, sang liedere wat God prys

Offering, sacrifice|Offer, offer

(4) What words describe a sacrifice?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n offer?

Religious purification|Godsdienstige suiwering
Use this domain for words related to religious purification.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met godsdienstige suiwering.
(1) What words refer to purifying someone or something for religious purposes?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die suiwering iets vir godsdienstige doeleindes of iemand?
purify, purification, cleanse, cleansing, wash, washing, sprinkle, sprinkling, baptize, baptism,|reinig, suiwering, reinig, reiniging, was, wasgoed, sprinkel, sprinkel, doop, die doop,
(2) What words describe something that has been purified?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat gesuiwer beskryf?
be pure, undefiled, unpolluted, washed, sprinkled|suiwer, onbesmet, onbesoedelde, gewas, gesprinkel
(3) What words describe something that has not been purified?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie gesuiwer beskryf?
be impure, defiled, polluted, unwashed|wees onsuiwer, verontreinig die besoedelde, ongewaste
(4) What words refer to something that causes impurity?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat onreinheid veroorsaak?
impurity, defilement, pollution|onreinheid, besoedeling, besoedeling
Taboo|Taboe
Use this domain for words referring to things that are taboo--something to be avoided; a religious, social, or cultural restriction on behavior, as opposed to a government law.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na dinge wat taboe is - iets om te vermy; &#39;n godsdienstige, sosiale, kulturele of beperking op gedrag, eerder as om &#39;n regering die wet.
(1) What words refer to a cultural restriction on behavior?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kulturele beperking op gedrag?
taboo, prohibition|taboe, verbod
(2) What words refer to making something taboo?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets taboe?
make taboo, forbid, prohibit, ban|maak taboe, verbied, verbied, verbied
(3) What words describe something that is taboo?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat taboe beskryf?
taboo, forbidden, prohibited, untouchable, inviolable, banned, off-limits, avoided|taboe, verbode, verbied, onaantasbaar, onherroeplik, verban, buite perke, vermy
Salvation|Redding
Use this domain for the primary goal or goals of a religion, for instance in Christianity salvation from sin, death and Hell. Each religion has different beliefs about salvation. Our purpose here is not to preach or argue, but to list those words that people use to talk about this topic.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die primêre doel of doelwitte van &#39;n godsdiens, byvoorbeeld in die Christendom verlossing van sonde, dood en hel. Elke godsdiens het verskillende oortuigings oor verlossing. Ons doel hier is nie om te preek of redeneer nie, maar om &#39;n lys van die woorde wat mense gebruik om te praat oor hierdie onderwerp.
(1) What words refer to what God does to save a person?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat God doen om &#39;n persoon te red?
save, salvation, sanctify, redeem, justify, regenerate|red, verlossing, heilig, los, regverdig, regenereer
(2) What words refer to a person who saves another?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n ander slaan?
savior|Verlosser
(3) What words refer to what a person does to be saved?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat &#39;n mens doen om gered te word?
believe, repent, return (to God), receive, work, earn|glo, berou terugkeer (aan God), ontvang, werk, verdien
Dedicate to religious use|Wy aan godsdienstige gebruik
Use this domain for words related to dedicating someone or something to religious use.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met gebuik iets of iemand om godsdienstige gebruik.
(1) What words refer to dedicating something to religious use?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na gebuik iets om godsdienstige gebruik?
dedicate, consecrate, anoint, sanctify, devote, hallow, baptize, circumcise|wy, wy, salf, heilig, wy, heilig, doop, besny
(2) What words describe something that has been dedicated?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat toegewy is?
holy, consecrated, sanctified, sacred, devoted, baptized|heilige, heilige, geheilig heilige, gewy, gedoop
(3) What words describe something that has not been dedicated?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie toegewy beskryf?
unholy, common|onheilige, algemene
(4) What words refer to improperly using something that has been dedicated?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gebruik van iets wat onbehoorlik is toegewy?
desecrate|skend
Fasting|Vas
Use this domain for words related to fasting--to not eat for a period of time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vas - om nie te eet vir &#39;n tydperk van die tyd.
(1) What words refer to not eating for a period of time?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na nie eet vir &#39;n tydperk van die tyd?
fast, deny (oneself)|vinnig, ontken (jouself)
(2) What words refer to a person who denies himself for religious purposes?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat homself ontken vir godsdienstige doeleindes?
ascetic|asketiese
(3) What words refer to the general practice of denying oneself something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die algemene praktyk van ontken jouself iets?
asceticism|asketisme
(4) What words refer to a time when a person fasts or denies himself in some other way?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd wanneer &#39;n persoon vas of ontken homself in &#39;n ander manier?
fast, Lent, Ramadan|vinnig, Lydenstyd, Ramadan
Heaven, hell|Hemel, die hel
Use this domain for words related to heaven and hell--the place where people go after they die.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die hemel en die hel - die plek waar mense gaan na hulle sterf.
(1) What is the place or home of God called?|(1) Wat is die plek of huis van God genoem?
Heaven, the highest heaven, the abode of God, the throne of God|Die hemel, die hoogste hemel, die woonplek van God, die troon van God
(2) What is the place called where dead people are?|(2) Wat is die plek genoem waar dooie mense is?
Hades, Sheol, the place of the dead, the grave, the other side, the beyond, underworld, nether world,|Hades, die doderyk, die plek van die dood, die graf, die ander kant, die ander kant, onderwêreld, nether wêreld,
(3) What is the place called where believers (good people) go when they die?|(3) Wat is die plek genoem waar gelowiges (goeie mense) gaan wanneer hulle sterf?
heaven, paradise, your reward|hemel paradys, julle loon
(4) What is the place called where unbelievers (bad people) go when they die?|(4) Wat is die plek genoem waar ongelowiges (slegte mense) gaan wanneer hulle sterf?
hell, the pit, fire and brimstone, eternal damnation|hel, die put, vuur en swawel, die ewige verdoemenis
(5) What words refer to going to heaven or hell?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na gaan hemel of hel?
pass on, go to heaven, go to hell|slaag op, gaan na die hemel, hel toe gaan
(6) What words describe something belonging to heaven or hell?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat aan die hemel of die hel te beskryf?
celestial, heavenly, hellish|hemelse, hemelse, helse
Resurrection|Opstanding
Use this domain for words related to resurrection--life after death, or living again after dying.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die opstanding - die lewe na die dood, of weer na sterf woon.
(1) What words refer to coming back to life?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na terug te kom na die lewe?
come back to life, come back from the grave, come to life, resurrection|kom terug na die lewe, kom terug van die graf, tot lewe kom, opstanding
(2) What words refer to causing someone to come back to life?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na veroorsaak iemand om terug na die lewe kom?
resurrect, raise from the dead, bring back to life, bring back from the dead|wek, verhoog uit die dood, terug te bring na die lewe, terug te bring uit die dood
(3) What words refer to the condition or state of living forever?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand of staat vir ewig lewe?
live forever, (have) eternal life, life everlasting, immortality, life after death,|vir ewig lewe, (het) die ewige lewe, die ewige lewe, onsterflikheid, die lewe ná die dood,
(4) What words refer to reincarnation?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na reïnkarnasie?
reincarnation, reincarnated,|reïnkarnasie, gereinkarneer,
Religious organization|Godsdienstige organisasie
Use this domain for words referring to official religions, groups within a religion, and religious meetings. Each religion will have different names for its groups. Answer each question for each religion.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die amptelike godsdiens, groepe binne &#39;n godsdiens en godsdienstige byeenkomste. Elke godsdiens sal verskillende name vir sy groepe. Beantwoord elke vraag vir elke godsdiens.
(1) What general words refer to an official religion?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n amptelike godsdiens?
religion, faith|godsdiens, geloof
(2) What are the names of the official religions?|(2) Wat is die name van die amptelike godsdiens?
Christianity, Islam, Hinduism, Judaism, animism, paganism,|Christenskap, Islam, Hindoeïsme, Judaïsme, animisme, heidendom,
(3) What words refer to a group within a religion?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep binne &#39;n godsdiens?
sect, denomination, party,|sekte, denominasie, party,
(4) What are the names of the sects?|(4) Wat is die name van die sektes?
Catholic, Protestant, Baptist, Presbyterian, Methodist|Katolieke, Protestante Doper Presbyterian, Metodiste
(5) What words refer to a group of believers in a particular place?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van gelowiges in &#39;n spesifieke plek?
church, congregation, diocese, parish|kerk, gemeente, bisdom, gemeente
(6) What words refer to beginning to believe in a religion or changing from one religion to another?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na begin om te glo in &#39;n godsdiens of die verandering van een godsdiens na &#39;n ander?
convert, conversion|omskep, sukses
Religious person|Godsdienstige persoon
Use this domain for words referring to religious practitioners--people who practice a religion, who are members of the religion, believe in the religion, leaders of the religion, and followers of the religion. Each religion has its own terms for religious practitioners. List these terms separately for each religion. The examples given below are for the Christian religion.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na godsdienstige praktisyns - mense wat &#39;n godsdiens te beoefen, wat lede is van die godsdiens, glo in die godsdiens, die leiers van die godsdiens, en aanhangers van die godsdiens. Elke godsdiens het sy eie terme vir godsdienstige praktisyns. Lys hierdie terme afsonderlik vir elke godsdiens. Die voorbeelde hieronder gegee is vir die Christelike godsdiens.
(1) What is a person called who believes in a religion?|(1) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat in &#39;n godsdiens glo?
believer, member (of the faith), adherent, follower, practitioner|gelowige, lid (van die geloof), aanhanger, volgeling, praktisyn
(2) What is a person called who believes in the (Christian) religion?|(2) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat in die (Christelike) geloof glo?
Christian, brother, fellow believer, saint|Christian, broer, medegelowige, heilige
(3) What is a leader of the (Christian-Protestant) religion called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n leier van die (Christelike-Protestantse) godsdiens genoem?
pastor, minister, parson|pastoor, predikant, dominee
(4) What is a leader of the (Christian-Catholic) religion called?|(4) Wat is &#39;n leier van die (Christelike-Katolieke) godsdiens genoem?
priest, father, bishop, archbishop, Cardinal, pope, man of the cloth|priester, vader, biskop, aartsbiskop, kardinaal, pous, man van die lap
(5) What words refer to the profession of being a religious leader?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die beroep van &#39;n godsdienstige leier?
pastorate, priesthood, ministry|pastoraat, priesterdom, bediening
(6) What words refers to all religious leaders?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na alle godsdienstige leiers?
clergy|geestelikes
(7) What words refer to followers of a religion who are not leaders?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die volgelinge van &#39;n godsdiens wat nie leiers?
laity, layperson, flock|leke, leek, kudde
Christianity|Christenskap
Use this domain for words used in Christianity.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat in die Christendom.
(1) What words are used to talk about Christianity?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik om te praat oor die Christendom?
Christian, Christianity, Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary, the Trinity, the Father, the Son of God, the Holy Spirit, Lord, cross, crucify, crucifixion, resurrection, Bible, Biblical, Scripture, Old Testament, New Testament, Gospel, apostle, church, chapel, churchgoer, priest, vicar, minister, pastor, service, Communion, Mass, sacrament, baptize, baptism, christen, christening, Christian name, confession, Christmas, Good Friday, Easter, crucifix, make the sign of the cross, saint, patron saint, Roman Catholic, Catholic, Pope, papal, Orthodox Church, Reformation, Protestant Church, Protestant, Anglican, Baptist, Methodist, Lutheran, Presbyterian|Christelike, Christendom, Jesus Christus, die Maagd Maria, die Drie-eenheid, die Vader, die Seun van God, die Heilige Gees, Here, kruis, kruisig, kruisiging, opstanding, Bybel, Bybelse, Skrif, Ou Testament, Nuwe Testament, Gospel, apostel, kerk, die kapel, kerkganger, priester, pastoor, predikant, pastoor, diens, nagmaal, Mass, sakrament, doop, doop, doop, doop, Christian naam, belydenis, Kersfees, Goeie Vrydag, Paasfees, kruis, maak die teken van die kruis, heilige, beskermheilige, Rooms-Katolieke, Katolieke Pous, pouslike, Ortodokse Kerk, Hervorming, Protestantse Kerk, Protestantse, Anglikaanse, Baptiste, Metodiste, Lutherane, Presbyterian

Religious things|Godsdienstige dinge

Idol|Idol

Place of worship|Plek van aanbidding
Use this domain for words related to places of worship. Each religion has different types of places of worship. These questions must be answered according to the practices of each religion and for each separate type of place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met plekke van aanbidding. Elke godsdiens het verskillende tipes plekke van aanbidding. Hierdie vrae moet beantwoord word volgens die praktyke van elke godsdiens en vir elke afsonderlike tipe plek.
(1) What words refer to a place that is dedicated to God?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek wat is toegewy aan God?
house of God, church, temple, synagogue, mosque, shrine, god house, sanctuary, tabernacle,|huis van God, kerk, tempel, sinagoge, moskee, tempel, god huis heiligdom tent,
(2) What are the parts of a church?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n kerk?
pew, altar, pulpit, choir loft, baptismal font, stained glass window, steeple|bank, altaar, preekstoel, koor loft, doopvont, glas venster, toring
(3) What are the parts of a temple?|(3) Wat is die dele van &#39;n tempel?
courtyard, holy place, holy of holies, altar, laver, lamp stand|binnehof, heilige plek, allerheiligste, altaar waskom, staan ​​lamp
(4) Where are idols placed?|(4) Waar is afgode geplaas?
god shelf, shrine|god rak, heiligdom
(5) Where do religious leaders live?|(5) Waar die godsdienstige leiers leef?
monastery, convent, parsonage|klooster, klooster, pastorie
Irreligion|Irreligion
Use this domain for words related to thinking and acting against God or religion.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dink en optree teen God of godsdiens.
(1) What is a person called who does not believe in a religion?|(1) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat nie glo in &#39;n godsdiens?
unbeliever, pagan, gentile, heathen, atheist, agnostic, irreligious, godless|ongelowige, heidense, heiden, nasies ateïs, agnostikus, ongodsdienstig, goddelose
(2) What words refer to a religious group, which the official religion considers to be false?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n godsdienstige groep, wat die amptelike godsdiens van mening vals?
false religion, sect|valse godsdiens, sekte
(3) What words refer to a belief, which the official religion considers to be false?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n geloof, wat die amptelike godsdiens van mening vals?
heresy, heretical, heretic, false doctrine/teaching|kettery, dwaalleer, ketter, valse leer / onderrig
(4) What words refer to thinking against God?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na denke teen God?
disbelieve, unbelief, lack of faith, doubt, skepticism, agnosticism, atheism, paganism|ongelowiges, ongeloof, gebrek aan geloof, twyfel, skeptisisme, agnostisisme, ateïsme, heidendom
(5) What words refer to speaking against God?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na praat teen God?
blaspheme, scoff, profane, irreverent|laster, spot, onheilige, oneerbiedige
(6) What words refer to acting against God?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na optree teen God?
sin, impiety, ungodly, godlessness, desecrate, sacrilege|sonde, goddeloosheid, goddelose, goddeloosheid, skend, heiligskennis
(7) What words describe someone who is against God?|(7) Wat woorde iemand wat teen God te beskryf?
impious, irreligious, profane|oortreders, ongodsdienstig, onheilige
(8) What words refer to turning away from God?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die wegdraai van God?
apostasy, backsliding, reprobate|afvalligheid, terugval, onbetroubaar
(9) What words refer to pretending to be religious?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na voorgee om godsdienstig te wees?
hypocrisy, hypocrite|skynheiligheid, skynheilige
(10) What words refer to extreme beliefs that are evil?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na uiterste oortuigings wat kwaad is?
fanatic, fanaticism, bigot, bigotry|fanatikus, fanatisme, kwezelaar, dwepery
(11) What words refer to religious practices that are done in ignorance?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na godsdienstige praktyke wat gedoen in onkunde?
(12) What words refer to allowing other people to practice their religion?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na toelaat dat ander mense om hul godsdiens te beoefen?
tolerance, intolerance|verdraagsaamheid, onverdraagsaamheid

broom, dustpan, mop|besem, skoppie, mop

bucket, cistern, water barrel|emmer, put, water vat

bag, garbage pail, mirror|sak, vullis emmer, spieël

(1) What kinds of chairs are there?|(1) Watter soorte stoele is daar?
chair, armchair, highchair, seat, stool, couch, sofa, swing|stoel, leunstoel, stoel, stoel, stoel, bank, bank, swing
(2) What are the parts of a chair?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n stoel?
arm, back, chair leg, seat cushion, footrest|arm, rug, stoel been stoel kussing, voet
Bed|Bed
Use this domain for words related to a bed.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n bed.
(1) What kinds of beds are there?|(1) Watter soorte beddens is daar?
bed, double bed, twin bed, bunk bed, queen sized bed, king sized bed, mat, sleeping mat, mattress, cot, pallet, hideaway bed, hammock, berth, guest bed|bed, dubbel bed, twee bed, stapelbed, koningin grootte bed, die koning grootte bed, mat, slaap mat, matras, bed, pallet, wegkruipplek bed, hangmat, bed, gas bed
(2) What covers are put on a bed?|(2) Wat dek is op &#39;n bed?
sheet, blanket, covers, bedcovers, bedspread, bed curtains, pillow, mosquito net,|vel, kombers, dek, dekens, deken, bed gordyne, kussing, muskiet net,
(3) What do people do with beds?|(3) Wat doen mense met beddens?
make the bed, make up the bed, pull up the covers, throw off the covers, arrange the covers, sleep, lie down|maak die bed, maak die bed, trek die dek, gooi af die dek, rangskik die dek, slaap, lê
Cabinet|Kabinet
Use this domain for words related to a cabinet.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n kabinet.
(1) What kinds of cabinets are there?|(1) Wat soorte van kabinette is daar?
cabinet, dresser, chest of drawers, wardrobe, buffet, bookshelf, set of shelves, cupboard, drawer, shelf|kabinet, dresser, laaikas, klerekas, buffet, boekrak, stel rakke, kas, laai, rak
(2) What do people do with cabinets?|(2) Wat doen mense met kaste?
put things away, store, open a drawer, close a drawer, put things on a shelf|sit dinge weg, winkel, maak &#39;n trekker, sluit &#39;n laai, het dinge op &#39;n rak
Household decoration|Huishoudelike versiering
Use this domain for words related to household decorations.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met huishoudelike versierings.
(1) What things are used to decorate a house?|(1) Watter dinge is wat gebruik word om &#39;n huis te versier?
decoration, picture, frame, calendar, poster, knickknack, flower vase, doily|versiering, foto, raam, kalender, plakkaat, knickknack, blom vaas, doilie
Food|Food
Use this domain for general words referring to food.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na kos.
(1) What general words refer to food?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na kos?
food, sustenance, nourishment, intake, nutrition, nutritional, non-nutritional, diet|kos, voedsel, voeding, inname, voeding, voeding, nie-voeding, dieet
Food preparation|Voedselvoorbereiding
Use this domain for words related to food preparation.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die voorbereiding van voedsel.
(1) What words refer to preparing food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die voorbereiding van voedsel?
food preparation, cook, prepare food, fix (a meal, dish), make a dish|die voorbereiding van voedsel, kook, kos voor te berei, op te los (&#39;n maaltyd, gereg), maak &#39;n skottel
(2) What words refer to the person who prepares food and cooks?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die persoon wat kos en kokke berei?
the cook, chef, short order cook, cookie|die kok sjef, kort bestel kok, koekie
(3) What words refer to a person who prepares special types of food?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n spesiale tipes van kos voorberei?
baker (bread), butcher (meat), confectioner (candy), brewer (alcohol)|Baker (brood), slagter (vleis), banketbakker (lekkergoed), brouer (alkohol)
(4) What words refer to the thing that is cooked?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die ding wat gaar is?
food, meal, dish|kos, maaltyd, gereg
(5) What words refer to the place where food is prepared and cooked?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die plek waar voedsel voorberei en gekook?
kitchen, cookhouse, bakery, butchery, food processing plant, restaurant|kombuis, Cookhouse, bakkery, slaghuis, voedsel verwerking plant, restaurant
(6) What words describe how well a person cooks?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf hoe goed &#39;n persoon kokke?
good cook, bad cook, tremendous cook, fantastic cook|goeie kok, slegte kok geweldige kok, &#39;n fantastiese kok
(7) What words describe how thoroughly something has been cooked?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf hoe deeglik iets gekook?
raw, rare, medium, well done, under done, under cooked, over cooked, burnt, burned to a crisp, crispy, charred, just right|rou, skaars, medium, goed gedoen, onder gedaan, onder gaar, oor gaar verbrand, verbrand tot &#39;n skerp, crispy, verkool, net reg
(8) What words refer to a set of instructions for cooking something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n stel instruksies vir kook iets?
recipe, ingredients, instructions, measurements|resep, bestanddele, instruksies, metings
Cooking methods|Gaarmaakmetodes
Use this domain for words referring to various ways of cooking food. It is necessary to think through different kinds of food and how they are cooked. An example is given below for cooking eggs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na verskeie maniere om te kook kos. Dit is nodig om te dink deur middel van verskillende soorte kos en hoe hulle gaar is. &#39;N voorbeeld word hieronder gegee vir kook eiers.
(1) What words refer to various ways of cooking food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na verskeie maniere van kook kos?
cook, bake, baste, boil, boil over, braise, brew, broil, brown (v), fry, deep fat fry, grill, marinate, pan-fry, parboil, pickle, poach, roast, sauté, season, sift, simmer, steam, stew, stir fry,|kok, bak, bedruip, kook, kook oor, gestoofde vleis, brou, twis, bruin (v), braai, diep vet braai, braai, marineer, pan-braai, blanc heer, piekel, stroop, gebraai, braai, seisoen, sif, prut, stoom, bredie, roerbraai,
(2) What ways can you cook an egg?|(2) Wat maniere kan jy &#39;n eier te kook?
boil, fry, scramble, poach, bake|kook, braai, geskarrel, stroop, bak
(3) What words describe something that has been cooked?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat gekook beskryf?
cooked, boiled, braised, broiled, fried, grilled, marinated, parboiled, pickled, poached, sautéed, stewed,|gaar gekook, gesmoor, gebraaide, gebraai, gerooster, gemarineer, gekookte, gepekelde, gestroop, gesoteerde, gestoofde,
(4) What words describe something that is being cooked?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat gekook word beskryf?
sizzle,|sis,
Steps in food preparation|Stappe in die voorbereiding van voedsel
Use this domain for words related to the steps in food preparation. One way to find the words in this domain is to describe how each type of food is prepared.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die stappe in die voorbereiding van voedsel. Een manier om die woorde in hierdie domein te vind, is om te beskryf hoe elke tipe van voedsel voorberei word.
(1) What are the steps in preparing food?|(1) Wat is die stappe in die voorbereiding van voedsel?
gather ingredients, add ingredients, pour into dish, dilute, thicken, concentrated, dissolve, sweeten,|versamel bestanddele, voeg die bestanddele, gooi in bak, verdun, verdik, gekonsentreerde, ontbind, versoet,
(2) What words refer to cutting up ingredients?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na sny bestanddele?
shred, grate, slice, cut up, chop, dice, cube, quarter, halve, mince, grind,|flard, koper, sny, sny, kap, dobbelstene, kubus, kwartaal, halveer, maalvleis, slyp,
(3) What words refer to mixing ingredients?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die vermenging bestanddele?
mix, stir, knead, toss, tossed, whisk, beat,|meng, roer, knie, gooi, geteister, klits, klop,
(4) What words refer to allowing food to ripen?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na toelaat kos om ryp te word?
ripen, age (cheese), allow cream to rise, allow bread to rise,|ryp, ouderdom (kaas), laat die room te styg, laat brood om te styg,
Remove shell, skin|Verwyder dop, vel
Use this domain for words related to removing the shell or skin from food.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verwydering van die dop of vel van voedsel.
(1) What words refer to removing the shell or skin from food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verwydering van die dop of vel van voedsel?
shell, skin, pare, peel, husk|dop, vel, pare, skil, doppe
Pound in mortar and pestle|Pond in stamper en vysel
Use this domain for words related to pounding food in a mortar.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die dreun kos in &#39;n mortier.
(1) What words refer to pounding food in a mortar?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dreun kos in &#39;n mortier?
mortar, pestle, pound|mortier, stamper, pond
Grind flour|Grind meel
Use this domain for words related to grinding flour.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die maal meel.
(1) What words refer to grinding flour?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die maal meel?
grind, mill|slyp, meul
(2) What words refer to the grain before it is ground?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die graan voor dit die grond?
grain|graan
(3) What words refer to the flour after it is ground?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die meel nadat dit gemaal?
flour, wheat flour, corn flour, millet flour|meel, koring meel, mielieblom, giers meel
(4) What tools are used to grind flour?|(4) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om meel te maal?
mill, flourmill, grind stone, millstone, grinder, grinding mill, flour sack|meul, flourmill, slyp klip, meulsteen grinder, maal milj, meel sak
Cooking utensil|Kook werktuig
Use this domain for words related to cooking utensils.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kookgereedskap.
(1) What general words refer to cooking utensils?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na kookgerei?
utensil, tool, appliance|werktuig, instrument, apparaat
(2) What utensils are used to cut food?|(2) Wat eetgerei word gebruik om kos te sny?
knife, paring knife, bread knife, butcher knife, cleaver, grater, cutting board, chopping block|mes, paring mes, broodmes, slagtersmes, kapmes, rasper, sny raad, hakblok
(3) What utensils are used to break up and crush food?|(3) Wat eetgerei gebruik word om te breek en vermorsel kos?
mortar and pestle, meat tenderizer, grinder, meat grinder|stamper en vysel, vleis tenderizer, grinder, vleismeul
(4) What utensils are used to move, stir, mix and turn food?|(4) Wat eetgerei gebruik word om te beweeg, roer, meng en draai kos?
pancake turner, spatula, whisk, stirring spoon, wooden spoon, meat fork, spit, mixer, blender|pannekoek Turner, spatel, klits, roer lepel, houtlepel, vleis vurk, spit, mixer, blender
(5) What containers are used to mix food?|(5) Wat houers gebruik word om kos te meng?
mixing bowl|mengbak
(6) What utensils are used to measure ingredients?|(6) Wat eetgerei word gebruik om bestanddele te meet?
measuring cup, measuring spoon|maatkoppie, meetlepels
(7) What utensils are used to handle hot pans?|(7) Wat eetgerei word gebruik om warm panne hanteer?
hot pad, oven mitt|warm pad, oond Mitt
(8) What containers are used to cook food?|(8) Wat houers word gebruik om kos te kook?
pot, pan, frying pan, baking pan, casserole dish, cookie sheet, kettle|pot, pan, braai pan, bak pan, kasserolbak, koekie vel, ketel
(9) What appliances are used to cook food?|(9) Wat toestelle word gebruik om kos te kook?
oven, stove, grill, broiler, toaster, toaster oven, microwave oven, barbeque, fireplace|oond, stoof, braai, braaikuiken, rooster, rooster oond, mikrogolfoond, braai, kaggel
(10) What appliances are used to store food?|(10) Wat toestelle word gebruik om kos te stoor?
refrigerator, freezer, icebox, cupboard, pantry|yskas, vrieskas, icebox, kas, spens
(11) What are the parts of these utensils?|(11) Wat is die dele van hierdie voorwerpe?
handle (of a pot, knife), blade (of a knife), lid (of a pot, container), lip (of a bowl), door (of an oven, refrigerator, cupboard), shelf (of a refrigerator, cupboard), rack (of an oven, grill)|hanteer (van &#39;n pot, mes), lem (van &#39;n mes), deksel (van &#39;n pot, houer), lip (van &#39;n bak), deur (van &#39;n oond, yskas, kas), rak (van &#39;n yskas, kas ), rek (van &#39;n oond, rooster)
Food storage|Stoor kos
Use this domain for words referring to food preservation and storage.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na voedselpreservering en stoor.
(1) What words refer to preserving food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die behoud van voedsel?
preserve|bewaar
(2) What methods and materials are used to preserve food?|(2) Watter metodes en materiaal word gebruik om kos te bewaar?
dry, salt, preservative|droë, sout, preserveermiddel
(3) What words refer to storing food?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die stoor kos?
store, save, leftovers|winkel, te red, oorskiet
(4) What containers are used to store food?|(4) Wat houers word gebruik om kos te stoor?
container, jar, bottle, canister, spice rack, flour sack, bag, granary|houer, jar, bottel, houer, speserye rek, meel sak, sak, skuur
Serve food|Dien kos
Use this domain for words related to serving food.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die bediening van kos.
(1) What words refer to serving food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die bediening van kos?
serve, dish up, to ladle|dien, gereg up om uitscheppen
(2) Who serves food?|(2) Wie dien kos?
servant, waiter, waitress, butler|kneg, kelner, kelnerin, butler
(3) What is a piece of food called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n stuk van voedsel genoem?
portion, piece, last piece, slice, share|gedeelte, stuk, laaste stuk, stuk, deel
(4) What is the best piece called?|(4) Wat is die beste stuk genoem?
delicacy, best piece|lekkerny, die beste stuk
(5) What utensils are used to serve food?|(5) Wat eetgerei word gebruik om kos te dien?
serving dish, serving platter, serving spoon, ladle, tureen, soup bowl, salad bowl, pot, common dish|opdienbak, opdienbord, dien lepel, skeplepel, terrine, sop bak, slaaibak, pot, algemene gereg
(6) Where is food served?|(6) Waar is kos bedien?
dining room, restaurant, banquet hall, serving line, buffet, soup line|eetkamer, restaurant, banketsaal, die versorging van lyn, buffet, sop lyn
Eat|Eet
Use this domain for words related to eating.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met eet.
(1) What general words refer to eating food?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die eet van voedsel?
eat, consume, ingest, partake|eet, eet, inneem, deel te neem
(2) What words refer to licking with the tongue?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na lek met die tong?
lick|lek
(3) What words refer to swallowing?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na sluk?
swallow, gulp|sluk, sluk
(4) What words refer to difficulty in swallowing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na slukprobleme?
choke, gag|verstik, gag
(5) What words refer to feeding someone?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die voeding iemand?
feed (someone), force-feed|feed (iemand), krag-feed
Bite, chew|Byt, kou
Use this domain for words referring to biting and chewing with the teeth.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na byt en kou met die tande.
(1) What words refer to biting something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na byt iets?
bite, bite into, bite off, take a bite, chomp down on, champ, crunch,|byt, byt in, af te byt, neem &#39;n hap, chomp neer op, kampioen, crunch,
(2) What words refer to biting someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na byt iemand?
give someone a bite, sink your teeth into, snap at,|gee iemand &#39;n byt, sink jou tande in, snap op,
(3) What words refer to a wound caused by an animal biting you?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n wond veroorsaak deur &#39;n dier byt jou?
bite,|byt,
(4) What words refer to chewing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na kou?
chew, gnaw, masticate|kou, afknagen, kou
(5) What refer to grinding your teeth together?|(5) Wat verwys na die maal jou tande saam?
grind your teeth, gnash, clench your teeth,|slyp jou tande, kners, gryp jou tande,
(6) What words refer to swallowing?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na sluk?
swallow,|sluk,
Meal|Maaltyd
Use this domain for words related to a meal.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n ete.
(1) What general words refer to a time when people eat?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd wanneer mense eet?
meal, mealtime|ete, etenstyd
(2) What words refer to a meal eaten at a particular time of day?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n maaltyd geëet op &#39;n spesifieke tyd van die dag?
breakfast, lunch, supper, brunch, mid afternoon snack, midnight snack, tea, luncheon,|ontbyt, middagete, aandete, brunch, mid middag snack, middernag snack, tee, middagete,
(3) What words refer to the main meal of the day?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die belangrikste maaltyd van die dag?
dinner|aandete
(4) What words refer to a small meal?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n klein maaltyd?
snack, light breakfast, light meal|snack, ligte ontbyt, ligte ete
(5) What words refer to a meal eaten outside?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n maaltyd buite geëet?
picnic,|piekniek,
(6) What words refer to eating a meal?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ete?
dine, breakfast (v), lunch (v), snack (v)|eet, ontbyt (v), middagete (v), snack (v)
(7) What do people say at the beginning of a meal?|(7) Wat sê die mense aan die begin van &#39;n maaltyd?
Let's say grace. Let's thank the Lord for the food. Let's eat. Dig in.|Kom ons sê die genade. Kom ons dank die Here vir die kos. Kom ons eet. Grawe in.
(8) What do people say when they want something?|(8) Wat sê die mense as hulle iets wil hê?
(Please) pass (the salt). May I have (the salt, please).|(Let) slaag (die sout). Mag ek (die sout, asseblief).
(9) What do people say when they are done eating?|(9) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle klaar geëet?
Thank you. May I be excused.|Dankie. Mag ek verskoon.
Feast|Fees
Use this domain for words related to a feast.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n fees.
(1) What words refer to a large or important meal?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groot of belangrike maaltyd?
dinner, banquet, feast|aandete, maaltyd, fees
(2) What are the parts of a feast?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n fees?
first course, main course|eerste kursus, hoofgereg
(3) Who is the leader of a feast?|(3) Wie is die leier van &#39;n fees?
host, master of ceremonies|gasheer, seremoniemeester
(4) Who is invited to a feast?|(4) Wie word genooi om &#39;n fees?
guest, dinner guest, guest of honor|gas, aandete gaste, eregas
(5) What happens at a feast?|(5) Wat gebeur by &#39;n fees?
propose a toast|stel &#39;n heildronk
Manner of eating|Wyse van eet
Use this domain for words describing the manner in which a person eats.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf die wyse waarop &#39;n persoon eet.
(1) What words refer to eating before others?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die eet voordat ander?
eat before others, eat early|eet voor ander, eet vroeë
(2) What words refer to tasting a little food to see if it tastes good?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na smaak &#39;n bietjie voedsel om te sien of dit lekker smaak?
taste, test, sample|smaak, toets, monster
(3) What words refer to eating a little?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die eet van &#39;n bietjie?
eat a little, nibble, snack, go on a diet, to diet, diet (n)|eet &#39;n bietjie, peusel, snack, gaan op &#39;n dieet, dieet, dieet (n)
(4) What words refer to eating a lot?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die eet van &#39;n baie?
eat a lot, eat too much, be a glutton, gluttony, eat like a pig, pig out|eet &#39;n baie, eet te veel, &#39;n deurbringer gierigheid, eet soos &#39;n vark, vark uit
(5) What words refer to eating fast?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die eet van vas?
gobble, inhale, wolf down, devour, eat fast|vreet, inasem, verorber, eet, eet vinnig
(6) What words refer to eating more than your share?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die eet van meer as jou deel?
eat more than your share, be greedy|eet meer as jou deel wees gulsig
(7) What words refer to eating two things together?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die eet van twee dinge saam?
(no words in English, but some in North American Indian languages)|(Geen woorde in Engels, maar sommige in Noord-Amerikaanse Indiese tale)
Hungry, thirsty|Honger, dors
Use this domain for words related to being hungry or thirsty.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met honger of dors.
(1) What words refer to being hungry?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na honger?
hungry, hunger, famished, starved, ravenous,|honger, honger, honger, honger, verskeurende,
(2) What are the symptoms of hunger?|(2) Wat is die simptome van die honger?
hunger pains, stomach is growling|honger pyne, maag grom
(3) What words refer to being thirsty?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na synde dors?
thirsty, thirst, dying of thirst, parched|dors, dors, dood van die dors, gebraaide
(4) What words refer to how much you can eat or want to eat?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na hoeveel jy kan eet of wil om te eet?
appetite, big appetite, small appetite|eetlus, groot eetlus, klein eetlus
(5) What words refer to not wanting to eat?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die wat nie wil om te eet?
lack of appetite, no appetite, not hungry|gebrek aan eetlus, geen eetlus, nie honger
Satiated, full|Versadig, vol
Use this domain for words related to being full of food.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vol van kos.
(1) What words refer to being full of food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vol van kos?
be full, have had enough, couldn't eat another thing, bloated, stuffed, on a full stomach, satisfied, satiated, no more room,|vol wees, het genoeg gehad het, kon dit nie eet nog &#39;n ding, opgeblase, opgestopte, op &#39;n vol maag, tevrede, versadig, nie meer ruimte,
(2) What words describe food that makes you feel full?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf voedsel wat maak jy voel vol?
filling, heavy, stodgy,|vul, swaar, swaar,
Drink|Drink
Use this domain for words related to drinking.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met drink.
(1) What general words refer to drinking?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die drink?
drink, drunk, take a drink|drink, dronk, neem &#39;n drankie
(2) What words describe the manner in which a person can drink?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die wyse waarop &#39;n persoon kan drink?
guzzle, gulp, gulp down, swig, sip, suck, pour down your throat, inhale, to down (something)|vreet, sluk, sluk af, sluk, sluk, suig, gooi in jou keel, inasem om af (iets)
(3) What words refer to what is drunk?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat dronk is?
drink (n)|drink (n)
(4) What expressions are used to ask for a drink?|(4) Wat uitdrukkings word gebruik om te vra vir &#39;n drink?
(5) What expressions are used to offer a drink?|(5) Wat uitdrukkings word gebruik om &#39;n drankie aanbied?
Eating utensil|Eet werktuig
Use this domain for words related to eating utensils.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met eetgerei.
(1) What words refer to the utensils used to cut and move food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die eetgerei gebruik om te sny en voedsel te beweeg?
eating utensil, knife, butter knife, steak knife, fork, dessert fork, spoon, teaspoon, soup spoon, spatula, serving spoon, chopsticks,|eet werktuig, mes, botter mes, steak mes, vurk, nagereg vurk, lepel, teelepel, sop lepel, spatel, eetlepel, eetstokkies,
(2) What words refer to a dish for food?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n skottel vir kos?
plate, dinner plate, salad plate, bowl, cereal bowl|plaat, bord, slaai bord, bakkie, graan bak
(3) What words refer to a dish for drinking?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n skottel te drink?
cup, glass, mug, goblet|beker, glas, beker, beker
(4) What utensils are used for catching spilled food?|(4) Wat eetgerei word gebruik vir gemors kos te vang?
bib, napkin (serviette), placemat|bib, doek (servet), plekmatjie
(5) What words refer to the utensils used by one person?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die eetgerei gebruik word deur een persoon?
place setting|plek instelling
(6) What words refer to preparing the table for eating?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die voorbereiding van die tafel eet?
set the table|sit die tafel
Fast, not eat|Fast, nie eet
(1) What words refer fasting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys vas?
to fast, fast (n), not eat, go without food|vinnig, vinnig (n), nie eet, sonder kos
(2) What words refer to different kinds of fasts?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na verskillende vorme van vas?
neither eat nor drink, liquid diet, daytime fast, total fast|nie eet en drink nie, vloeibare dieet, bedags vinnig, totale vinnige
(3) What words refer to stopping a fast?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vinnige stop?
break a fast|breek &#39;n vinnige
Types of food|Voedselsoorte
Use this domain for words related to types of food.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met voedselsoorte.
(1) What words refer to major types of food?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die groot tipes van voedsel?
cereal, staple, meat, fruit, vegetable, salad, raw food, cooked food, condiment, main dish, side dish|graan, stapel, vleis, vrugte, groente, slaai, rou voedsel, gekookte kos, kruiderij, hoofgereg, bykos
(2) What words describe whether something can be eaten or not?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf of iets nie geëet kan word of?
(3) What words describe food?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf kos?
tender, tough, crisp, crispy, raw, stale, fresh|tender, taai, skerp, crispy, rou, verjaar, vars
Food from plants|Kos uit plante
Use this domain for words related to food from plants.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kos van plante.
(1) What words refer to plants that can be eaten?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na plante wat geëet kan word?
edible plants|eetbare plante
(2) What words refer to a person (or animal) who only eats plants?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon (of dier) wat net plante eet?
vegetarian|vegetariese
Food from seeds|Kos uit sade
Use this domain for words related to food from seeds.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kos uit sade.
(1) What general words refer to seeds that are eaten?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na saad wat geëet?
seed, grain, cereal, bean, legume, nut,|saad, graan, graan, boontjie, peulgewasse, neute,
(2) What types of grain are eaten?|(2) Watter graan geëet?
rice, wheat, corn, maize, barley, sesame, millet, sorghum, oat,|rys, koring, mielies, mielies, gars, sesam, giers, sorghum, haver,
(3) What types of nuts are eaten?|(3) Watter tipes neute geëet?
peanut, groundnut, cashew, walnut, almond, cola nut, palm nut, coconut, cocoa nut|grondboontjiebotter, grondbone, cashew, okkerneut, amandel, cola neut, palm neut, klapper, kakao moer
(4) What types of beans are eaten?|(4) Watter tipes bone geëet?
green bean, lima bean, kidney bean, pea, cowpea, soybean|groen boontjie, lima bone, nier boontjie, ertjie, akkerboon, sojaboon
(5) What other types of seeds are eaten?|(5) Wat ander vorme van sade geëet?
cottonseed, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds|katoensaad, pampoenpitte, sonneblomsaad
Food from fruit|Kos uit vrugte
Use this domain for words related to food from fruit.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kos uit vrugte.
(1) What types of fruit are eaten?|(1) Watter vrugte geëet?
apple, apricot, avocado, banana, berry, blueberry, breadfruit, carob, citrus, cranberry, date, fig, flaxseed, grape, grapefruit, hayseed, jackfruit, legume, lemon, lime, linseed, mango, olive, orange, papaya, passion fruit, pea, peach, pear, pineapple, plantain, plum, prune, raisin, raspberry, strawberry, tomato|appel, appelkoos, avokado, piesang, bessie, ys, breadfruit, karob, sitrus, cranberry, datum, Fig, lijnzaad, druiwe, pomelo, hooimold, jack fruit, peulgewasse, suurlemoen, lemmetjie, lynsaad, mango, olywe, oranje, papaya, passie vrugte, ertjie, perske, peer, pynappel, weegbree, pruim, snoei, rosyntjie, framboos, aarbei, tamatie
Food from vegetables|Kos uit groente
Use this domain for words related to food from vegetables.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kos uit groente.
(1) What types of vegetables are eaten?|(1) Watter groente geëet?
vegetable, tomato, leek, squash, carrot, beans, greens, spinach, cabbage, lettuce, eggplant, okra, pumpkin, cucumber, red pepper, green pepper, cassava leaf|groente, tamatie, prei, muurbal, wortel, bone, groen, spinasie, kool, blaarslaai, eiervrug, okra, pampoen, komkommer, soetrissie, soetrissie, maniok blaar
(2) What types of gourds are eaten?|(2) Watter kalbasse geëet?
gourd, pumpkin, squash, eggplant|wonderboom, pampoen, muurbal, eiervrug
Food from leaves|Kos uit die blare
Use this domain for words referring to food from leaves and stems.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na kos uit blare en stingels.
(1) What types of leaves are eaten?|(1) Watter blare geëet?
leafy vegetable, salad, lettuce, cabbage, spinach, pumpkin leaves, cowpea leaves|boomryke groente, slaai, blaarslaai, kool, spinasie, pampoen blare, blare akkerboon
(2) What types of stems are eaten?|(2) Watter tipes stingels geëet?
sugarcane, rhubarb, celery|suikerriet, rabarber, seldery
Food from roots|Kos uit wortels
Use this domain for words referring to food from roots.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na kos uit wortels.
(1) What types of roots are eaten?|(1) Watter tipes wortels geëet?
potato, sweet potato, carrot, onion, beet, cassava, yam, ginger|aartappel, soetpatat, wortel, uie, beet, maniok, yam, gemmer
Food from animals|Kos uit diere
Use this domain for words referring to eating meat and to types of animals that are eaten. Only include those animals that are commonly eaten, especially those that are domesticated.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die eet van vleis en tipes diere wat geëet word. Sluit slegs die diere wat algemeen geëet, veral diegene wat mak.
(1) What words refer to a person (or animal) who only eats meat?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon (of dier) wat net eet vleis?
carnivore, carnivorous, meat eating|karnivoor, vleisetende, vleis eet
(2) What types of animals are eaten?|(2) Watter tipes diere geëet word?
beef (cow), mutton (sheep), venison (deer)|beesvleis (koei), skaapvleis (skape), wildsvleis (takbok)
(3) What types of birds are eaten?|(3) Watter voëls geëet?
chicken, turkey|hoender, kalkoen
(4) What types of fish are eaten?|(4) Wat tipes vis geëet?
tuna, trout, sardines|tuna, forel, sardientjies
(5) What types of reptiles are eaten?|(5) Watter tipes reptiele geëet?
frog legs|kikker bene
(6) What types of insects can be eaten?|(6) Watter tipes insekte geëet kan word?
edible insects, white ant, termite, grub, locust|eetbare insekte, wit mier, termiet, grub, sprinkane
(7) What words refer to honey and other insect products that can be eaten?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na heuning en ander insekte produkte wat geëet kan word?
honey|heuning
(8) What types of small animals are eaten?|(8) Watter tipes van klein diere geëet word?
shrimp, lobster|garnale, kreef
(9) What words refer to eating human flesh?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die eet van menslike vlees?
cannibal|kannibaal
Meat|Vleis
Use this domain for words referring to meat and types of animals that are eaten. Only include those animals that are commonly eaten.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na vleis en tipes diere wat geëet word. Sluit slegs die diere wat algemeen geëet.
(1) What general words refer to meat?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na vleis?
meat|vleis
(2) What words refer to different types of meat?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na verskillende soorte vleis?
ground beef, steak|grond beesvleis, steak
(3) What words refer to fat?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vet?
fat, grease|vet, vet
(4) What words refer to cartilage and other hard parts that are not eaten?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na kraakbeen en ander harde dele wat nie geëet?
gristle|kraakbeen

milk, butter, cheese, cream, whey, milk solids, butterfat, yogurt, curd|melk, botter, kaas, room, wei, melk vastestowwe, bottervet, jogurt, vars
Egg dishes|Eiergeregte
Use this domain for words related to food made from eggs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kos gemaak van eiers.
(1) What words refer to egg dishes?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na eiergeregte?
boiled egg, fried egg, scrambled eggs, poached egg, omelet, baked eggs, quiche, caviar (fish eggs)|gekookte eier, gebraaide eier, roereiers, hardgekookte eier, omelet, gebakte eiers, quiche, kaviaar (vis eiers)
Cooking ingredients|Kook die bestanddele
Use this domain for general words referring to ingredients--the things that are added together when preparing food.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die bestanddele - die dinge wat bymekaar getel word wanneer die voorbereiding van voedsel.
(1) What general words refer to ingredients?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die bestanddele?
ingredient|bestanddeel
(2) What words refer to thickeners?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na verdikkers?
thickener, cornstarch, pectin, egg, gelatin, agar, wheat flour, corn flour, tapioca flour, cassava flour, sago flour, rice flour, glutinous rice flour,|verdikking, mielieblom, pektien, eier, gelatien, agar, koring meel, mielieblom, tapioca meel, maniok meel, sago meel, rys meel, rys meel lijmig,
Sugar|Sugar
Use this domain for words related to sugar.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met suiker.
(1) What words refer to sugar?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na suiker?
sugar, sweetener, granulated sugar, white sugar, brown sugar, sugar cube, grain of sugar,|suiker, versoeter, kristal suiker, wit suiker, bruin suiker, suiker kubus, graan van suiker,
(2) What words describe something that has sugar in it?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat suiker in dit beskryf?
sweet, sugary, sweetened,|soet, soet, soet,
(3) What words refer to putting sugar in food?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na om suiker in kos?
sweeten, sprinkle,|versoet, sprinkel,
(4) What containers are used for sugar?|(4) Wat houers word gebruik vir suiker?
spoonful of sugar, sugar bowl|lepel suiker, suiker bak

salt, salty, saline, to salt, grain of salt,|sout, sout, sout, sout, korrel sout,

Spice|Spice
Use this domain for spices--things that are added to food to make them taste better.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir speserye - dinge wat by voedsel gevoeg om hulle te laat beter smaak.
(1) What general words refer to spice?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na spesery?
spice, flavoring, seasoning|speserye, geurmiddels, speserye
(2) What types of spices are there?|(2) Watter tipes speserye is daar?
pepper, curry, oregano, thyme, cinnamon, bay leaf, parsley, nutmeg, mint, cumin|peper, kerrie, oregano, tiemie, kaneel, lourierblaar, pietersielie, neutmuskaat, kruisement, komyn
(3) What words refer to adding spice to food?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van speserye om kos?
spice, flavor, season|speserye, smaak, geur
(4) What words describe food to which spice has been added?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf kos wat speserye is bygevoeg?
spicy, flavorful, seasoned|pittige, smaakvol, gesoute
Leaven|Suurdeeg
Use this domain for leaven--things that are added to food to make them ferment.|Gebruik hierdie domein suurdeeg - dinge wat by voedsel gevoeg om hulle te laat gis.
(1) What words refer to leaven?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na suurdeeg?
leaven, yeast, baking powder (sodium bicarbonate), rising agent|suurdeeg, gis, bakpoeier (natriumbikarbonaat), stygende agent
(2) What words refer to adding leaven to food?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van suurdeeg kos?
leaven|suurdeeg
(3) What words refer to what happens to food when leaven is added?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat gebeur met kos wanneer suurdeeg bygevoeg word?
rise, ferment|styg, gis

Use this domain for words related to cooking oil.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kookolie.
(1) What words refer to oil used in cooking?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na olie wat gebruik word in die kombuis?
cooking oil, oil, margarine, shortening|kookolie, olie, margarien, smeer
(2) What seeds are used to make oil?|(2) Wat sade word gebruik om olie te maak?
olive, corn, canola, cottonseed,|olyf, koring, canola, katoensaad,
Prepared food|Voorbereide voedsel
Use this domain for words referring to prepared food. Cultures vary widely in the number and types of foods they prepare, and in how they classify them. For instance the English distinction between main dish and side dish is not found in the classification system of other languages. If your language has well-recognized subcategories, you can set up a separate subdomain for each. The questions below are based on the main ingredient in the dish.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na voorbereide voedsel. Kulture wissel in die aantal en tipes kos wat hulle voor te berei, en in hoe hulle dit te klassifiseer. Byvoorbeeld die Engelse onderskeid tussen hoofgereg en bykos is nie gevind in die klassifikasie stelsel van ander tale. As jou taal het goed erken subkategorië, kan jy die opstel van &#39;n aparte subdomein vir elkeen. Die onderstaande vrae is gebaseer op die hoof bestanddeel in die bakkie.
(1) What general words refer to prepared food?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na voorbereide voedsel?
cooked food, prepared food, dish, course|gekookte kos, kos voorberei, gereg, natuurlik
(2) What words refer to a major class of prepared food?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groot klas van voorbereide voedsel?
main dish, side dish, meat dish, casserole, vegetable, staple, bread, soup, salad, fruit, condiment, dessert, candy, cookie, sweets, savories, snack|hoofgereg, bykos, vleis gereg, kasserol, groente, stapel, brood, sop, slaai, vrugte, kruiderij, nagereg, lekkergoed, koekies, lekkers, savories, snack
(3) What general words refer to a food made primarily from meat?|(3) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n voedsel gemaak hoofsaaklik uit vleis?
meat dish, main dish, main course|vleisgereg, hoofgereg, hoofgereg
(4) What types of foods are made primarily from meat?|(4) Watter tipes voedsel is gemaak hoofsaaklik uit vleis?
roast beef, steak, fried chicken, fish and chips, hamburger, hotdog, pizza, spaghetti, casserole, lasagna, stew|rosbief, steak, gebraaide hoender, vis en chips, hamburger, hotdog, pizza, spaghetti, kasserol, lasagne, bredie
(5) What foods are made primarily from staple foods?|(5) Wat kos is hoofsaaklik gemaak van stapelvoedsel?
mashed potatoes and gravy, pasta, cooked rice, stuffing, oatmeal, porridge, cereal, mush|kapokaartappels en sous, pasta, gekookte rys, vulsel, hawermeel, pap, graan, sentimentaliteit
(6) What types of bread are there?|(6) Wat soorte brood is daar?
bread, pastry, brown bread, white bread, biscuit, muffin, roll, sweetbread, sandwich, tortilla, toast, loaf|brood, gebak, bruinbrood, witbrood, koekies, muffin, roll, zwezerik, sandwich, tortilla, roosterbrood, brood
(7) What foods are made primarily from fruit?|(7) Wat kos gemaak hoofsaaklik uit vrugte?
cranberry sauce, applesauce, fruit salad|cranberry sous, appelmoes, vrugte slaai
(8) What foods are made primarily from vegetables?|(8) Wat kos is hoofsaaklik gemaak van groente?
side dish, vegetable, carrot sticks, onion rings|bykos, groente, wortelstokkies, uieringe
(9) What foods are made primarily from leaves and stems?|(9) Wat kos is hoofsaaklik gemaak van blare en stingels?
salad, tossed salad, green salad, coleslaw|slaai, mengelslaai, groen slaai, koolslaai
(10) What words refer to foods that contain a lot of water and are boiled?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na voedsel wat &#39;n baie water bevat en gekook?
soup, tomato soup, split green pea soup, clam chowder, broth, stew, gravy|sop, tamatiesop, split groen ertjie sop, clam soep, sous, bredie, sous
(11) What types of condiments are there (foods that people only eat a little of, because they are expensive, strong tasting, or are added to other foods to flavor them)?|(11) Watter tipes speserye is daar (voedsel wat mense eet net &#39;n bietjie van nie, want hulle is duur, sterk proe, of om ander kos te geur bygevoeg hulle)?
condiment, garnish, pickle, olive, black olive, green olive, tomato sauce, catsup, mustard, mayonnaise, peanut butter, jam, jelly, preserves|kruiderij, garneer, piekel, olywe, swart olywe, groen olywe, tamatiesous, ketchup, mosterd, mayonnaise, grondboontjiebotter, konfyt, jellie, konfyt
(12) What words refer to sweet foods?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na soet kosse?
dessert, sweet (n), cake, ice cream, pie, cobbler, cookie, cinnamon roll, candy, chocolate, chocolate bar, pudding, lollipop, syrup, treacle,|nagereg, soet (n), koek, roomys, pie, skoenmaker, koekie, kaneel roll, lekkergoed, sjokolade, sjokolade, poeding, lollipop, stroop, stroop,
(13) What foods are eaten away from home (for instance on a journey or at work)?|(13) Wat kos weg geëet van die huis (byvoorbeeld op &#39;n reis of by die werk)?
sack lunch, picnic lunch, dried food, C-rations, fast food|sak middagete piekniek, gedroogde kos, C-rantsoene, kitskos
Prohibited food|Verbied kos
Use this domain for words that describe food that is prohibited by the culture or religion. Do not list the foods that are prohibited.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat voedsel te beskryf wat verbied word deur die kultuur of godsdiens. Moenie die lys van die kos wat verbode is.
(1) What words describe food that is prohibited?|(1) Watter woorde kos beskryf wat verbied?
prohibited food, taboo food, unclean|verbied kos, taboe kos, onrein
(2) What words describe food that is not prohibited?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf die voedsel wat nie verbied?
kosher|kosher
Beverage|Drank
Use this domain for words referring to things people drink.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na dinge wat mense drink.
(1) What general words refer to things people drink?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na dinge wat mense drink?
beverage, drink|drank, drink
(2) What types of drinks are there?|(2) Wat soorte drank is daar?
water, milk, juice, tea, coffee, soda, soda pop, coke, milkshake, malt, chocolate|water, melk, sap, tee, koffie, koeldrank, soda pop, coke, milkshake, mout, sjokolade
Alcoholic beverage|Alkoholiese drank
Use this domain for types of beverages containing alcohol.|Gebruik hierdie domein tipes drank wat alkohol bevat.
(1) What general words refer to alcoholic beverages?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na alkoholiese drank?
alcoholic beverage, alcohol, liquor|alkoholiese drank, alkohol, drank
(2) What types of alcoholic drinks are there?|(2) Watter tipes alkoholiese drankies is daar?
beer, wine, rice wine, sake, mead, whiskey, vodka, millet beer, banana beer,|bier, wyn, rys wyn, ter wille, heuning, whiskey, vodka, giers bier, piesang bier,
(3) What words refer to how much alcohol is in a beverage?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hoeveel alkohol is in &#39;n drank?
proof|bewys
Alcohol preparation|Alkohol voorbereiding
Use this domain for words related to making alcoholic beverages.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die maak van alkoholiese drank.
(1) What words refer to making alcoholic beverages?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van alkoholiese drank?
brew|brou
(2) What are the steps in brewing?|(2) Wat is die stappe in die brou?
ferment, distill, mellow, age, ripen|fermenteer, distilleer, mellow, ouderdom, ryp
(3) What foodstuffs are used to make alcohol?|(3) Wat voedsel gebruik word om alkohol te maak?
hops, yeast, millet, corn (maize), rice|hoep, gis, giers, mielies (mielies), rys
(4) What equipment and materials are used to brew alcohol?|(4) Watter toerusting en materiaal word gebruik om alkohol te brou?
distillery, brewery, still, filter|distilleerdery, brouery, nog steeds, filter
Drunk|Dronk
Use this domain for words related to drinking alcohol and the effect it has on a person.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die drink van alkohol en die uitwerking wat dit op &#39;n persoon.
(1) What words refer to drinking alcohol?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die drink van alkohol?
drink, imbibe|drink, indrinken
(2) What words refer to someone who drinks a lot of alcohol?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat &#39;n baie alkohol drink?
drunkard, drunk, wino, alcoholic|dronkaard, dronk, wino, alkoholiese
(3) What words refer to the effect alcohol has on a person?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die effek van alkohol op &#39;n persoon?
be drunk, be intoxicated, soused, had too many, under the influence, drink under the table|word dronk word dronk, soused, het te veel onder die invloed, drink onder die tafel
(4) What words refer to the aftereffects of being drunk?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die nagevolge van wat dronk?
hangover|babelas
(5) What words refer to a drinking establishment?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n drink vestiging?
bar, saloon, bartender|bar, salon, barman
Tobacco|Tobacco
Use this domain for words related to using tobacco.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gebruik van tabak.
(1) What words refer to tobacco?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na tabak?
tobacco, cigarette, pack of cigarettes, cigar, pipe, chewing tobacco|tabak, sigaret, pakkie sigarette, sigaar, pyp, pruimtabak
(2) What methods of using tobacco are there?|(2) Watter metodes van die gebruik van tabak is daar?
smoke, light up, light (a cigarette), chew|rook, lig, lig (&#39;n sigaret), kou
(3) What tools are used to smoke or chew tobacco?|(3) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om te rook of kou tabak?
filter, pipe cleaner, ashtray, spittoon|filter, pyp skoonmaker, asbak, spuugbakkie
(4) What words refer to a person who smokes tobacco?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat tabak rook?
smoker|roker
(5) What affect does tobacco have on a person?|(5) Watter invloed het tabak het op &#39;n persoon?
smokers cough, smokers hack, habit, addiction, lung cancer|rokers hoes, rokers hack, gewoonte, verslawing, longkanker
(6) What is produced by smoking tobacco?|(6) Wat is vervaardig deur die rook van tabak?
cigarette ash, cigarette smoke, cigarette butt|sigaretas, sigaretrook, sigaretstompie
(7) What does tobacco contain?|(7) Wat beteken tabak bevat?
nicotine, tar|nikotien, teer
Narcotic|Narkotiese
Use this domain for words related to narcotics and drugs that are not used as medicine but as stimulants. Narcotics are often addicting and harmful to a person's health.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dwelms en dwelms wat nie gebruik word as medisyne, maar as stimulante. Dwelms is dikwels verslavende en skadelik vir die gesondheid van die mens.
(1) What general words refer to narcotics?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na dwelms?
narcotic, drug,|narkotiese, dwelms,
(2) What types of narcotics are there?|(2) Watter tipes dwelms is daar?
marijuana, bhang, LSD, heroin, opium|dagga, bhang, LSD, heroïen, opium
(3) What words refer to taking drugs?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na dwelms?
take drugs, be on drugs|dwelms, op dwelms
(4) What tools are used to take drugs?|(4) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om dwelms te neem?
drug paraphernalia|dwelmbybehore
(5) What words refer to a person who takes drugs?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat dwelms neem?
addict, user, junkie,|verslaafde, gebruiker, junkie,
(6) What words refer to a dosage of drugs?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dosis van dwelms?
joint,|gesamentlike,
(7) What affect do drugs have on people?|(7) Wat beïnvloed nie dwelms op mense?
addiction, dependence, be high|verslawing, afhanklikheid, hoog
(8) What words refer to being addicted to drugs?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na wat verslaaf is aan dwelms?
be addicted, dependent, be hooked,|verslaaf, afhanklik, verslaaf,
(9) What words refer to the need for drugs?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die behoefte aan dwelms?
addiction, habit, dependence,|verslawing, gewoonte, afhanklikheid,
(10) What words describe a drug that makes people addicted?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n dwelm wat mense maak verslaaf?
addictive,|verslawend,
Stimulant|Stimulant
Use this domain for words related to stimulants--substances that are drunk, eaten, or chewed to make a person more alert or give him more energy.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met stimulante - stowwe wat dronk is, geëet, of gekou aan &#39;n persoon meer waaksaam te maak of gee hom meer energie.
(1) What general words refer to stimulants?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na stimulante?
stimulant|stimulant
(2) What types of stimulants are there?|(2) Watter tipes stimulante is daar?
coffee, tea, mate, hookah, chewing gum, beetle nut,|koffie, tee, mate, hookah, kougom, beetle moer,

clothing, clothes, dress|klere, klere, aantrek
(2) What words describe clothing?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf klere?
shabby,|shabby,

Clothes for special occasions|Klere vir spesiale geleenthede
Use this domain for words referring to special clothes worn on special occasions. It is necessary to think through all the various special occasions in the culture and think of any special clothes worn on those occasions. Two examples are given below for work and graduation, but there are many others.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na spesiale klere gedra op spesiale geleenthede. Dit is nodig om te dink deur middel van al die verskillende spesiale geleenthede in die kultuur en dink aan enige spesiale klere gedra op daardie geleenthede. Twee voorbeelde word hieronder vir werk en gradeplegtigheid gegee, maar daar is baie ander.
(1) What general words refer to clothes worn on a special occasion?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na klere gedra op &#39;n spesiale geleentheid?
sports clothes, work clothes, formal clothes, informal, office wear|sport klere, werk klere, formele klere, informele, kantoor dra
(2) What special clothes are worn for work?|(2) Watter spesiale klere gedra word vir werk?
work clothes, overalls, coveralls, apron, work gloves, hardhat, steel-toed shoes, boots, goggles|klere, oorpakke, overalls, voorskoot, werk handskoene, hardhat, staal gelyktonige skoene, stewels, brille werk
(3) What special clothes are worn for graduation?|(3) Watter spesiale klere gedra word vir die gradeplegtigheid?
cap and gown|cap en toga
Clothes for special people|Klere vir spesiale mense
Use this domain for special clothes worn by special people. It is necessary to think through all the various special types of people in the culture and think of any special clothes worn by them. Several examples are given below, but there are many others.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir spesiale klere gedra deur &#39;n spesiale mense. Dit is nodig om te dink deur middel van al die verskillende spesiale soorte mense in die kultuur en dink aan enige spesiale klere gedra deur hulle. Verskeie voorbeelde word hieronder gegee, maar daar is baie ander.
(1) What special clothes are worn by police or soldiers?|(1) Watter spesiale klere gedra word deur die polisie of soldate?
uniform, dress uniform, fatigues, camouflage, helmet, beret, cap, gasmask, braid,|uniform, rok uniform, vermoeiende, kamoeflering, helm, beret, pet, gasmask, braid,
(2) What kinds of uniforms are there?|(2) Watter soorte uniforms is daar?
police uniform, military uniform, nurse's uniform, band uniform|polisie-uniform, militêre uniform, uniform verpleegster se orkes uniform
(3) What special clothes are worn by religious people?|(3) Watter spesiale klere gedra word deur godsdienstige mense?
habit (nun), cowl (monk), robe|gewoonte (nun), Haan (monnik), klere
(4) What special clothes are worn by the king?|(4) Wat spesiale klere gedra word deur die koning?
purple cloth, crown, royal robes|pers doek, kroon, koninklike klere
(5) What special clothes are worn by doctors?|(5) Wat spesiale klere gedra word deur dokters?
greens, surgical suit, white coat, nurses cap|setperke, chirurgiese pak, wit rok, verpleegsters cap
Parts of clothing|Dele van klere
Use this domain for words related to parts of clothing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dele van klere.
(1) What words refer to parts of clothing?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dele van klere?
belt loop, bodice, collar, cowl, crease, cuff, fringe, hem, hood, lapel, leg, neck, neckband, neckline, placket, pocket, sash, seam, seat, shirttail, skirt, sleeve, slit, tassel, waist, waistband, waistline,|band lus, lyfie, kraag, haan, styging, cuff, byvoordele, soom, kap, lapel, been, nek, nekband, halslyn, placket, sak, serp, naat, sitplek, shirttail, romp, mou, spleet, kwas, middellyf , lyfband, taille,
(2) What words refer to parts of shoes?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na dele van skoene?
sole, shoelace, bootlace, eye, tongue, toe, heel, insole, strap, buckle, thong|tong, skoenveter, schoenveter, oog, tong, toe, hak, zool, band, gespe, riem
(3) What words refer to parts of hats?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na dele van hoede?
brim, peak, ribbon|rand, piek, lint
(4) What things are used to hold parts of clothes together?|(4) Watter dinge word gebruik om dele van klere bymekaar te hou?
belt buckle, button, buttonhole, clasp, cuff-link, lace, snap, zip, zipper,|gordel gespe, knoppie, knoopsgat, klamp, cuff-skakel, kant, snap, rits, rits,
Wear clothing|Dra klere
Use this domain for words related to wearing clothing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die dra van klere.
(1) What words refer to wearing clothing?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die dra van klere?
wear, have on, be clothed, clad, shod,|dra, het op, beklee, geklee, skoene,
(2) What words refer to putting clothing on?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na om klere aan?
to dress, get dressed, put on, clothe, get into, throw on, jump into, don, tuck in, button, zip, tie|om rok, trek, trek, beklee, kry in, gooi op, spring in, Don, snoepie in, die knoppie, rits, das
(3) What words refer to taking clothing off?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van klere af?
to undress, get undressed, take off, strip, rip off, get out of|om uit te trek, kry afsny, af te neem, strook, rip off, uit
(4) What words refer to not wearing a piece of clothing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na nie dra &#39;n stuk van klere?
barefoot, shoeless, shirtless, hatless, unshod, topless,|kaalvoet, Shoeless, Less, hatless, ongeschoeid, topless,
Naked|Naked
Use this domain for words related to being naked--not wearing any clothes, and for words referring to how a person feels about being naked. It is a part of universal human experience that people do not want to be naked. So there are words that refer to feeling bad if one does not have enough clothes on (shame). Other words refer to wanting to have enough clothes (modest). Other words refer to how people feel about other people who do not wear enough clothes|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met naak - enige klere dra nie, en vir woorde verwys na hoe &#39;n persoon voel oor die feit dat naak. Dit is &#39;n deel van &#39;n universele menslike ervaring wat mense wil nie naak te wees. So daar is woorde wat verwys na die gevoel sleg as &#39;n mens nie genoeg klere (shame) het. Ander woorde verwys na wil om genoeg klere (beskeie) het. Ander woorde verwys na hoe mense oor ander mense wat nie genoeg klere dra nie voel
(indecent).|(Onsedelike).
(1) What words refer to being naked?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na naak?
be naked, nakedness, nude, nudity, unclothed, nothing on, not have anything on, stripped, bare, expose (oneself)|naak, naaktheid, naak, naaktheid, naaktheid, niks op, nie iets op, het uitgetrek, kaal, bloot te stel (jouself)
(2) What words refer to not wearing enough clothes?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na nie genoeg klere dra?
dress immodestly, immodest, impropriety, indecent|rok onzedig, onwelvoeglike, onbehoorlikheid, onsedelike
(3) What words refer to not wanting to be naked?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die wat nie wil naak te wees?
modest, propriety, decent|beskeie, fatsoen, ordentlike
(4) What words refer to feeling bad if you are naked?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na slegte gevoel as jy naak is?
shame, embarrassed, blush|skande, skaam, bloos
Style of clothing|Styl van klere

style, stylish, in style, fashion, out of fashion, modern, traditional, old-fashioned|styl, aantreklike, in styl, mode, uit die mode, moderne, tradisionele, outydse

Ritual scar|Ritueel litteken
Use this domain for words related to ritual scarring.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met rituele littekens.
(1) What words refer to a scar or mark deliberately made to decorate the body?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n litteken of merk doelbewus gemaak om die liggaam te versier?
tribal scar, tattoo (n), mutilation|stam litteken, tattoo (n), verminking
(2) What words refer to making the scar?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van die litteken?
tattoo (v), get a tattoo|Een (v), kry &#39;n tattoo
(3) What instruments and materials are used?|(3) Watter instrumente en materiaal word gebruik?
pigment|pigment
(4) What words refer to filing the teeth?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die indiening van die tande?
file teeth|lêer tande
Circumcision|Besnydenis

circumcise, circumcision|besny besnydenis
(2) What part is cut off?|(2) Watter deel afgesny is?
foreskin|voorhuid
(3) What tools and materials are used?|(3) Wat gereedskap en materiaal word gebruik?
razor blade, bandage, anesthesia, antiseptic|lem, blinddoek, narkose, antiseptiese
(4) Who does the operation?|(4) wat die operasie?
surgeon|chirurg
