Care for the fingernails|Sorg vir die naels
Use this domain for words related to caring for the fingernails.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die versorging van die naels.
(1) What words are used to describe the process of caring for the nails?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om die proses van omgee vir die naels te beskryf?
manicure, clean, cut, clip, trim, shape, sharpen|manicure, skoon, sny, clip, trim, vorm, skerp
(2) What tools are used to care for the nails?|(2) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om te sorg vir die spykers?
clippers, scissors, file|tang, &#39;n skêr, lêer
(3) What is a piece of a cut off fingernail called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n stuk van &#39;n afgesny vingernael genoem?
fingernail clippings|vingernael uitknipsels
(4) What words describe when a nail grows into the finger or toe and causes a sore?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf wanneer &#39;n spyker groei in die vinger of toon en veroorsaak &#39;n seer?
ingrown nail|ingroei nael
(5) What do people do with their nails?|(5) Wat doen mense met hul naels?
to bite (your nails), scratch|om te byt (jou naels), kras
(6) What words are used of painting the nails?|(6) Watter woorde gebruik van die verf van die spykers?
paint, polish, nail polish|verf, polish, naellak
(7) What words are used to describe the condition of the nails?|(7) Watter woorde word gebruik om die toestand van die spykers beskryf?
long, clean, dirty, dirt under the nails, chipped, curved|lang, skoon, vuil, vuil onder die naels, afgebreek, geboë
Fire|Vuur
Use this domain for general words that refer to fire and for words referring to types of fire. These words may be specific for what is being burned (forest fire 'a fire burning a forest'), the size of the fire (inferno 'a very large hot fire'), or the place where the fire burns (hellfire 'the fire in hell').|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die brand en woorde wat verwys na tipes van vuur. Hierdie woorde kan spesifiek vir dit wat verbrand word (bosbrand &#39;n brand &#39;n bos &#39;), die grootte van die vuur (inferno &#39;n baie groot warm vuur&#39;), ​​of die plek waar die brand brandwonde (Hellfire &#39;die vuur in die hel).
(1) What general words refer to a fire?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n vuur?
fire, combustion,|vuur verbranding,
(2) What types of fire are there?|(2) Watter tipes van vuur is daar?
fireball, torch, firebrand, fireworks, firecracker, burn a field before planting,|vuurbal, fakkel, vuurvreter, vuurwerke, vurige, brand &#39;n veld voor plant,
(3) What words refer to what is being burned?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na dit wat verbrand?
house fire, forest fire, grass fire, wood fire, oil fire|huis brand, bos brand, gras vuur, hout vuur, olie brand
(4) What words refer to the size of the fire?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die grootte van die vuur?
spark, flame, flicker, finger, tongue, flare, blaze, conflagration, inferno, raging inferno|vonk, &#39;n vlam, flikker, vinger, tong, flare, brand, verwoestende brand, inferno, woed inferno
(5) What words refer to where the fire is?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na waar die brand is?
campfire, hellfire|kampvuur Hellfire
(6) What words refer to a fire started by accident?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n brand begin deur &#39;n ongeluk?
blaze, the flames,|brand, het die vlamme,
(7) What words refer to a fire started on purpose?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n brand begin met &#39;n doel?
cook fire, bonfire, controlled fire,|kok vuur, vreugdevuur, beheerde brand,
(8) What words refer to deliberately burning something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na doelbewus iets brand?
burn something, set something on fire, set fire to, torch (v),|iets, stel iets aan die brand gesteek, aan die brand gesteek, fakkel brand (v),
(9) What words refer to the crime of burning someone's house or field?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die misdaad van die brandende huis of in die veld iemand se?
arson, arsonist|brandstigting, brandstigter
(10) What words describe something that burns easily?|(10) Watter woorde iets wat maklik brand beskryf?
flammable, inflammable, combustible|vlambare, ontvlambare, brandbare
(11) What words describe something that will not burn?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat nie sal brand beskryf?
fireproof, unburnable, fire-resistant, unquenchable|vuurvaste, onbrandbaar, vuur-bestand, onblusbare
Light a fire|&#39;N vuur
Use this domain for words related to lighting a fire.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verligting van &#39;n brand.
(1) What words are used of a person starting a fire?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik van &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n vuur?
light a fire, build a fire, make a fire, start a fire, ignite, light a match, set on fire, set fire to something, blow into flames, kindle,|&#39;n vuur, die bou van &#39;n brand, maak &#39;n vuur begin &#39;n vuur, die brand, lig &#39;n wedstryd, aan die brand gesteek, aan die brand gesteek iets, blaas in vlamme, aansteek,
(2) What words refer to something beginning to burn?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets begin om te brand?
catch fire, start burning, burst into flames, spark, smolder|vuur vang, begin brand, in vlamme, vonk, smeul
(3) What things are used to start fires?|(3) Watter dinge gebruik word om brande te begin?
match, matchstick, matchbox, flint and steel, cigarette lighter, lighter fluid, tinderbox,|wedstryd, vuurhoutjie, vuurhoutjiedosie, flint en staal, sigaretaansteker, ligter vloeistof, Tonteldoos,
(4) What materials are used as kindling?|(4) Watter materiaal word gebruik as aansteek?
kindling, tinder, punk|aansteek, tonder, punk
Tend a fire|Geneig &#39;n vuur
Use this domain for words that refer to tending a fire--to keep a fire burning so that it burns well and does not go out.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na die neiging &#39;n vuur - &#39;n vuur aan die brand te hou sodat dit brand goed en gaan nie uit.
(1) What words refer to keeping a fire burning?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die behoud van &#39;n vuur brand?
tend a fire|geneig &#39;n vuur
(2) What words refer to adding fuel to a fire?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van brandstof &#39;n vuur?
feed a fire, stoke a fire, throw another log on the fire|voer &#39;n vuur stook &#39;n vuur, gooi &#39;n ander log op die vuur
(3) What words refer to blowing on a fire to make it bigger?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die blaas op &#39;n vuur om dit groter te maak?
fan a fire, fan into flames, blow on a fire, bellows, pump bellows|fan &#39;n vuur, fan in vlamme, blaas op &#39;n vuur, blaasbalk, pomp blaasbalk
(4) What words refer to making a fire bigger?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n brand groter?
build up a fire|bou &#39;n vuur
(5) What words refer to restarting a fire that has died down?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n vuur wat gesterf het af weer te begin?
rekindle|wakker
(6) What words refer to keeping a fire from going out, such as covering a fire with ashes to keep it from going out during the night?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die behoud van &#39;n vuur uit te gaan, soos wat &#39;n vuur met &#39;n verband om dit te hou uit te gaan in die nag?
bank a fire,|bank &#39;n vuur,
(7) What words refer to taking something out of a fire?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die neem van iets uit &#39;n vuur?
pull out of the fire, snatch from the flames,|trek uit die vuur, ruk uit die vlamme,
(8) What words refer to something taken out of a fire?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets geneem uit &#39;n vuur?
firebrand|vuurvreter
(9) What words refer to a person who is responsible to make sure the fire does not go out?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat verantwoordelik is om seker te maak die vuur gaan nie uit?
preserver of the fire,|Bewaarder van die brand,
(10) What words refer to sharing fire with a neighbor whose fire has gone out?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die vuur te deel met &#39;n buurman wat &#39;n vuur het uitgegaan?
(11) What things are used to carry fire?|(11) Watter dinge word gebruik om die vuur te dra?
fire pan, brazier|vuur pan, vuurpan
(12) What tools are used to tend a fire?|(12) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om &#39;n vuur is geneig?
poker, tongs, wick trimmer, snuffer,|poker, tang, pit trimmer, snuffer,
Extinguish a fire|&#39;N vuur te blus
Use this domain for all the ways a person can stop a fire.|Gebruik hierdie domein al die maniere waarop &#39;n mens kan &#39;n vuur te stop.
(1) What words refer to a fire stopping?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vuur stop?
die down, go out, burn itself out|sterf af, gaan uit, homself uitbrand
(2) What general words are used of a person stopping a fire?|(2) Wat is die algemene woorde word gebruik van &#39;n persoon stop &#39;n vuur?
extinguish, put out (a fire), fight (a fire), stub out (a cigarette),|blus, sit uit (&#39;n vuur), stryd (&#39;n vuur), stomp uit (&#39;n sigaret),
(3) What words are used of stopping a fire with water?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik stop &#39;n vuur met water?
douse (a fire), quench (a fire)|blus (&#39;n vuur), blus (&#39;n vuur)
(4) What words are used of stopping a fire by blowing on it?|(4) Watter woorde gebruik stop &#39;n vuur deur die blaas op dit?
blow out (a candle)|blaas (&#39;n kers)
(5) What words are used of stopping a fire by covering it?|(5) Watter woorde gebruik stop &#39;n vuur deur dit?
smother (a fire), snuff out (a flame)|smoor (&#39;n vuur), snuif uit (&#39;n vlam)
(6) What words refer to a person whose job is to stop fires?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wie se werk is om brande te stop?
fireman, firefighter|brandweerman, brandweerman
(7) What equipment is used to stop a fire?|(7) Wat toerusting word gebruik om &#39;n vuur te stop?
fire engine, fire truck, fire extinguisher|brandweerwa, brandweerwa, &#39;n brandblusser
Burn|Brand
Use this domain for verbs that are used of fire: "The fire is ____." In some languages there are verbs for what is happening to the thing that is burning: "The house is ____."|Gebruik hierdie domein werkwoorde wat gebruik word van vuur: &quot;Die vuur is ____.&quot; In sommige tale is daar werkwoorde vir wat gebeur met die ding wat brand: &quot;Die huis is ____.&quot;
(1) What words refer to a fire burning?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vuur brand?
burn|brand
(2) What words describe a fire that is burning well?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vuur wat goed is aan die brand?
blaze, ablaze, burn fiercely, burn brightly, burn hot|brand, brand, brand fel, brand helder, brand warm
(3) What words describe a fire that is not burning well?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vuur wat nie goed is aan die brand?
die down, smolder|sterf af, smeul
(4) What words describe a fire that starts to burn again after having died down?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n vuur wat weer begin nadat gesterf afbrand?
flare up, flame up|opvlam, &#39;n vlam up
(5) What words describe the appearance of fire?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf die voorkoms van &#39;n vuur?
flicker, dance, glow|flikker, dans, gloei
(6) What words refer to a fire burning something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n brand iets brand?
burn something,|iets brand,
(7) What words refer to something burning partly?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets brand deels?
blacken, scorch, singe,|verswart, skroei, Singe,
(8) What words refer to something burning completely?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iets heeltemal brand?
burn up, burn down, burn to the ground, consume, incinerate, destroy by fire, reduce to ashes,|verbrand, afbrand, brand tot op die grond, vernietig, verbrand, vernietig deur &#39;n brand, te verminder tot as,
(9) What words refer to a fire making something hot?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n brand om iets warm?
to heat something, to warm something|om iets te verhit, om iets warm
(10) What words refer to something burning?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets brand?
be burning, go up in flames, go up in smoke, be in flames,|wees brand, in vlamme opgaan, gaan in rook, in vlamme,
(11) What words describe something that has been burned?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat reeds verbrand?
burnt,|verbrand,
What fires produce|Wat vure te produseer
Use this domain for words related to the things that fires produce.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die dinge wat vure te produseer.
(1) What do fires produce?|(1) Wat doen vure te produseer?
flames, heat, light, smoke, fumes, exhaust, sparks, ash, soot|vlamme, hitte, lig, rook, dampe, uitlaat, vonke, as, roet
(2) What words refer to a fire giving off something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vuur afgee iets?
to smoke, give off sparks, send up sparks, give off heat, glow|om te rook, gee af vonke, stuur up vonke, gee hitte af, gloei
(3) What words refer to smoke?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na rook?
smoke, smoky, blue with smoke, haze, smog|rook, rook, blou rook, waas, rookmis
(4) What do sparks do?|(4) Wat doen vonke doen?
shoot up, fly out, land on things|skiet, vlieg, land op die dinge
(5) What sounds do fires make?|(5) Wat klanke nie vure te maak?
crackle, pop, hiss, roar of the flames|geknetter, pop, spot, brul van die vlamme
(6) What words refer to wood after it has been burning?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na hout nadat dit brand?
embers, coals, live coals|kole, kole, live kole
(7) What is left behind by a fire?|(7) Wat is agter gelaat deur &#39;n vuur?
ash, blackened wood, charred remains|as, swart hout, verkoolde oorskot
(8) What words refer to the material that is left on things near a fire?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die materiaal wat oorbly op die dinge naby &#39;n vuur?
soot|roet
(9) What words refer to an area of ground that has been burned?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebied van grond wat reeds verbrand?
burn (n), burned off area|brand (n), verbrand area
Fuel|Brandstof
Use this domain for types of fuel and for words used in making, collecting, storing, or using fuel. This domain includes the scenario of collecting firewood.|Gebruik hierdie domein soorte brandstof en woorde gebruik in die maak, versamel, stoor, of die gebruik van brandstof. Dit sluit in die domein van die scenario versamel brandhout.
(1) What words refer to the thing that is burned by a fire?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die ding wat verbrand deur &#39;n vuur?
fuel|brandstof
(2) What types of things are normally used as fuel?|(2) Watter dinge word gewoonlik gebruik as brandstof?
wood, coal, charcoal, oil, gas, candle wax, kindling|hout, steenkool, olie, gas, kerswas, aansteek
(3) What words refer to firewood?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vuurmaakhout?
firewood, bundle of firewood, piece of firewood, stack of firewood|vuurmaakhout, bondel vuurmaakhout, stuk vuurmaakhout, stapel hout
(4) What words refer to collecting fuel?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die invordering van brandstof?
collect, gather, pick up, chop firewood, split firewood|versamel, versamel, haal, kap hout, split vuurmaakhout
(5) What words refer to charcoal?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na houtskool?
charcoal|houtskool
(6) What words are used for making charcoal?|(6) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die maak van houtskool?
cook|kok
(7) What words refer to liquid fuel?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na vloeibare brandstof?
liquid fuel, gasoline (petrol), gas, kerosene (paraffin), diesel, candle wax, oil (lamp)|vloeibare brandstof, petrol (petrol), gas, paraffien (lampolie), diesel, kerswas, olie (lamp)
(8) What containers are used to hold liquid fuels?|(8) Wat houers word gebruik om vloeibare brandstof te hou?
gas can, jerry can|gas kan, jerrykan

Wipe, erase|Vee, vee
Use this domain for words related to wiping dirt off of things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vee vuil af van die dinge.
(1) What words refer to wiping dirt and dust off things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vee vuil en stof af dinge?
wipe, erase, to dust|vee, vee, tot stof
dust cloth, rag, eraser, rubber|stof lap, lap, uitveër, rubber
(3) What words refer to the dirt that is removed?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die vuil wat verwyder word?
dust|stof
Sleep|Slaap
Use this domain for words related to sleeping.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die slaap.
(1) What words are used of being asleep?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik om aan die slaap?
be asleep, sleep|wees aan die slaap, slaap
(2) What words are used of a good sleep?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik van &#39;n goeie slaap?
sleep well, sleep peacefully|slaap goed, rustig slaap
(3) What words are used of a bad sleep?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik van &#39;n slegte slaap?
sleep poorly, sleep badly, sleep fitfully|slaap sleg, slaap sleg, slaap onrustig
(4) What words are used of a light sleep?|(4) Watter woorde gebruik van &#39;n ligte slaap?
light sleep, doze, half asleep|lig slaap, sluimer, half aan die slaap
(5) What words are used of a deep sleep?|(5) Watter woorde gebruik van &#39;n diep slaap?
be in a deep sleep, be really out, sleep deeply, sleep soundly, sound asleep|wees in &#39;n diep slaap, regtig nie, slaap diep, slaap sag, klink slaap
(6) What words are used of sleeping during the day?|(6) Watter woorde gebruik van slaap gedurende die dag?
nap, take a nap, rest, take a rest|middagslapie, neem &#39;n middagslapie, rus, neem &#39;n res
(7) What words refer to sleeping someplace unusual, for instance in someone else's house, or outside?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die slaap iewers ongewone, byvoorbeeld in iemand anders se huis, of buite?
sleepover, sleep outside, sleep under the stars, camp, campout, bivouac|oorslaap, slaap buite, slaap onder die sterre, kamp, ​​campout, Bivak
(8) What words are used of urinating while asleep?|(8) Watter woorde gebruik van urineer terwyl aan die slaap?
wet the bed|nat die bed
(9) What words refer to talking in your sleep?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na praat in jou slaap?
talk in your sleep|praat in jou slaap
Go to sleep|Gaan slaap
Use this domain for words related to going to bed and going to sleep.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met bed toe gaan en gaan slaap.
(1) What words refer to getting ready for bed?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na gereed vir bed?
get ready for bed, go to bed, turn in,|gereed vir die bed, bed toe gaan, draai in,
(2) What words refer to getting into bed?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na om in die bed?
get into bed, crawl into bed, curl up in bed, get under the covers, crawl under the covers, fall into bed (exhausted), jump in bed|in die bed kry, kruip in die bed, krul in die bed kry onder die dek, kruip onder die dek, val in die bed (uitgeput), spring in die bed
(3) What words refer to going to sleep?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na gaan om te slaap?
go to sleep, fall asleep, drop off, sink into a deep sleep|gaan slaap, slaap, af te laai, te sink in &#39;n diep slaap
(4) What words refer to feeling like you want to sleep?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel soos jy wil slaap?
drowsiness, drowsy, sleepiness, sleepy, somnolence, somnolent, soporific,|lomerigheid, lomerig, slaperigheid, slaperig, slaperigheid, slaperig, slaapmiddel,
(5) What are the symptoms of beginning to go to sleep?|(5) Wat is die simptome van begin om te gaan slaap?
nod, yawn, stretch, eyelids droop|knik, gaap, strek, ooglede moedeloos
(6) What do you say when you are beginning to go to sleep?|(6) Wat sê jy wanneer jy begin om te gaan slaap?
(7) What words are used of someone causing someone to go to sleep?|(7) Watter woorde gebruik van iemand veroorsaak iemand om te gaan slaap?
put to sleep, put to bed|sit om te slaap, sit in die bed
(8) What words are used of the time when you go to sleep?|(8) Watter woorde gebruik van die tyd wanneer jy gaan slaap?
bedtime, nighttime, time to go to sleep,|slaaptyd, nag, tyd om te gaan slaap,
(9) What words refer to going to bed early or late?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na gaan slaap vroeg of laat?
early night, late night, stay up,|vroeë aand, laat nag, bly op,
(10) What does someone say to someone else who is going to sleep?|(10) Wat beteken iemand sê aan iemand anders wat gaan om te slaap?
(11) What special clothes are used when sleeping?|(11) Watter spesiale klere word gebruik wanneer die slaap?
pajamas, pj's, jammies, nightgown, nightie, nightclothes|pajamas, PJ se jammies, nagrok, nagrok, nagklere
(12) What words refer to staying awake and not going to sleep?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na wakker te bly en gaan nie om te slaap?
stay up (late), stay awake|bly up (laat), wakker bly
(13) What words refer to preventing someone from going to sleep?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die voorkoming van iemand uit te gaan om te slaap?
keep (someone) awake|hou (iemand) wakker
Dream|Droom
Use this domain for words related to dreaming.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met droom.
(1) What words refer to dreaming?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na drome?
to dream (v), a dream (n), have a dream|droom (v), &#39;n droom (n), het &#39;n droom
(2) What do people do while dreaming?|(2) Wat doen mense terwyl droom?
talk in your sleep, walk in your sleep|praat in jou slaap, loop in jou slaap
(3) What is a good dream called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n goeie droom genoem?
sweet dreams, pleasant dreams|soet drome, aangename drome
(4) What is a bad dream called?|(4) Wat is &#39;n slegte droom genoem?
nightmare, bad dream|nagmerrie, slegte droom
Wake up|Wakker
Use this domain for words related to waking up from sleep.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wakker uit die slaap.
(1) What words refer to waking up?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wakker?
wake up, come to, awaken, come out of a deep sleep, be startled out of sleep|wakker word, kom, wakker, kom uit &#39;n diep slaap, skrik uit die slaap
(2) What words refer to someone waking someone else up?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wakker iemand anders nie?
wake (someone) up, get (someone) up, rouse|nasleep (iemand) op, kry (iemand) op, reveille
(3) What do people do to wake someone up?|(3) Wat doen mense om iemand wakker word?
call, shake, dump water on him|noem, skud, stort water op hom
(4) What do people say to wake someone up?|(4) Wat sê die mense om iemand wakker word?
Time to get up. Rise and shine. Hey, sleepyhead.|Tyd om op te staan. Staan op en skyn. Hey, slaapkop.
(5) What means do people use to wake themselves up?|(5) Wat beteken mense gebruik om hulself te wakker?
alarm clock, wake up call, rooster|wekker, wakker roep, haan
(6) What do people do after they wake up?|(6) Wat doen mense nadat hulle wakker word?
get up, get out of bed|opstaan, uit die bed
(7) What words describe not being asleep?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf nie aan die slaap?
be awake|wakker wees
(8) What words are used of not being able to sleep?|(8) Watter woorde gebruik nie in staat is om te slaap?
toss and turn, couldn't sleep, lay awake, insomnia, insomniac, sleep disorder|gooi en draai, kon nie slaap nie, bly wakker lê, slapeloosheid, Insomniac, slaap wanorde
(9) What words are used of not wanting to sleep?|(9) Watter woorde gebruik van nie wil om te slaap?
stay awake, be alert, stay up|bly wakker, bedag wees, bly op

maid, butler, valet, domestic servant, house help, household staff|slavin butler, valet, huishulp, huis help, huishoudelike personeel

live, stay, be at home, dwell, reside, inhabit|leef, bly by die huis, woon, woon, woon
(2) What words refer to a person who lives in a house?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat in &#39;n huis?

camp, migrate|kamp, ​​migreer
(4) What words describe someone who likes to stay at home?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat daarvan hou om te bly by die huis?
homebody,|homebody,
Work and occupation|Werk en beroep

(1) What general words refer to work?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na werk?
work, labor, toil|werk, arbeid, moeite
Work|Werk
Use this domain for words related to working.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die werk.
(1) What general words refer to working?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die werk?
work, labor, operate|werk, arbeid, werk
Worker|Werker
Use this domain for words related to a worker.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n werker.
(1) What general words refer to a person who works?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat werk?
worker, laborer|werker, arbeider
(2) What words refer to a person who works in a particular place?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat in &#39;n spesifieke plek?
butler (house), field hand, farm hand (fields), ranch hand (ranch)|Butler (huis), veld hand, plaas hand (velde), ranch hand (ranch)
(3) What words refer to a person who works for someone else?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat werk vir iemand anders?
hired hand, employee, servant, hireling, slave,|huurling, werknemer, dienaar, huurling, slaaf,
(4) What words refer to a person who works for a day or a few days?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat werk vir &#39;n dag of &#39;n paar dae?
day laborer, temporary help, casual worker|dag arbeider, tydelike hulp, gemaklik werker
(5) What words refer to a person who works for only part of a day, or for the whole day?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat werk vir slegs &#39;n deel van &#39;n dag, of vir die hele dag?
part-time worker, full-time worker|deeltydse werker, voltydse werker
(6) What words refer to a person who works with a particular material or animal?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat werk met &#39;n spesifieke materiaal of dier?
carpenter (wood), blacksmith (iron, metal), cowboy (cattle), shepherd (sheep)|timmerman (hout), smid (yster, metaal), cowboy (beeste), skaapwagter (skape)
Expert|Expert
Use this domain for words related to being an expert--someone who can do something well.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n kenner - iemand wat iets goed kan doen.
(1) What words refer to an expert?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kenner?
expert, professional, master, craftsman, specialist, old hand, old-timer, the best we have, leader in his field, on the cutting edge, senior, graduate, doctor, consultant, trainer, teacher, is degreed, has a degree|deskundige, professionele, meester, vakman, spesialis, ou hand, ou-timer, die beste wat ons het, leier op sy gebied, op die voorpunt, senior, gegradueerde, dokter, konsultant, afrigter, onderwyser, is degreed, het &#39;n graad
(2) What words are used to refer to the knowledge or ability of an expert?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na die kennis of vermoë van &#39;n deskundige?
expertise, knowledge, expert knowledge, experience, ability, craftsmanship, training, understanding, proficiency|kundigheid, kennis, kundigheid, ervaring, vermoë, vakmanskap, opleiding, begrip, vaardigheid
(3) What words describe an expert?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n kenner?
the best we have, leader in his field, on the cutting edge, master (craftsman), expert (machinist), leading (scholar), degreed (scholar), foremost (expert), knowledgeable, experienced, able (seaman), well-trained, proficient, capable, clever, skilled, skillful,|die beste wat ons het, leier op sy gebied, op die voorpunt, meester (vakman), kundige (masjinis), wat lei (geleerde), degreed (geleerde), voorste (deskundige), kundige, ervare, kan (seeman), asook -trained, vaardig, in staat, slim, bekwame, ervare,
(4) What words are used to refer to someone who is not an expert?|(4) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na iemand wat nie &#39;n kenner?
student, apprentice, trainee, novice, jack-of-all-trades, greenhorn, beginner, new recruit, plebe, freshman|student, leerling, leerling, beginner, Jack-of-all-trades, groentjie, beginner, nuwe werf, plebe, eerstejaars
(5) What words describe someone who is not an expert?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat nie &#39;n kenner beskryf?
green, beginning (student), new, uninitiated, ignorant, untrained, inexperienced, unknowledgeable|groen, begin (student), &#39;n nuwe, oningewydes, onkundig, onopgeleide, onervare, unknowledgeable
Method|Metode

(1) What words refer to a method of doing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n metode om iets te doen?
method, methodology, approach, means, procedure, process, strategy, system, tactics, technique, way,|metode, metodologie, benadering, middel, prosedure, proses, strategie, stelsel, taktiek, tegniek, manier,
(2) What question words ask for the way in which something is done?|(2) Watter vraag woorde vra vir die manier waarop iets gedoen word?
how, however,|hoe egter
(3) What words indicate the way in which something is done?|(3) Watter woorde dui die manier waarop iets gedoen word?
how, however, somehow, somehow or other,|hoe egter een of ander manier, een of ander manier,
(4) What words describe a method of doing something?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n metode om iets te doen?
technical, strategic, tactical,|tegniese, strategiese, taktiese,
(5) What words refer to the way in which a person works?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die wyse waarop &#39;n persoon werk?
work style|werk styl
Try, attempt|Probeer, probeer
Use this domain for words indicating that someone is trying to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat iemand probeer om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to trying to do something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om iets te doen?
try, attempt, make an attempt, experiment, test, make a stab at it, give it a go, try it out, see if it works, make an effort, aim to do something, assay, endeavor, essay, seek to do something, strain, struggle, undertake, venture, give it a whirl, have a try, try and do something, see if you can do something,|probeer, poging, maak &#39;n poging, eksperiment, toets, maak &#39;n steek op dit, gee dit &#39;n go, probeer dit uit, kyk of dit werk, maak &#39;n poging, het ten doel om iets te doen, assay, strewe, essay doen, probeer om te doen iets, stam, stryd, onderneem, onderneming, gee dit &#39;n dwarreling, het &#39;n drie gedruk, probeer en iets te doen, kyk of jy iets kan doen,
(2) What words refer to trying hard to do something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na hard probeer om iets te doen?
do your best, try your best, put your mind to it, make an effort, be at pains to do something, strive, to the best of your ability, do the best you can, as best you can, give something your best,|doen jou beste, probeer jou bes, sit jou gedagtes om dit, maak &#39;n poging wees in pyn om iets te doen, streef na die beste van jou vermoë doen die beste wat jy kan, as die beste kan jy, iets te gee jou beste,
(3) What words refer to doing all you can when you are trying to do something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na alles wat jy kan doen wanneer jy probeer om iets te doen?
try for all your worth, do your utmost, do everything you can, do all you can, give your all, pull out all the stops, struggle to do something, go to great lengths to do something,|probeer om vir al jou moeite, doen jou bes, doen alles wat jy kan, doen alles wat jy kan, gee jou alles, trek alles uit die kas, sukkel om iets te doen, gaan na baie moeite om iets te doen,
(4) What words refer to trying to do something, even though you are unlikely to succeed?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na probeer om iets te doen, selfs al is jy onwaarskynlik om te slaag is?
have a go, have a stab at, give it a go, put up a good show,|&#39;n go, het &#39;n steek op, gee dit &#39;n go, sit &#39;n goeie show,
(5) What words refer to trying hard to get something that you really want?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na hard probeer om iets wat jy regtig wil te kry?
try for, go for, try out for, shoot for, make a bid for, struggle for, go all out, go after,|probeer om vir, gaan vir, probeer om vir, skiet vir, maak &#39;n bod vir, stryd vir, gaan almal uit, gaan na,
(6) What words refer to trying hard to do something for someone?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na hard probeer om iets vir iemand te doen?
bend over backwards to do something, go out of your way to do something, take the trouble to do something,|buig agteroor om iets te doen, gaan uit jou pad om iets te doen, doen die moeite om iets te doen,
(7) What words refer to doing something in order to try to do something else?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets te doen om te probeer om iets anders te doen?
try and do something, in an effort to do something, in an attempt to do something,|probeer om iets te doen, in &#39;n poging om iets te doen, in &#39;n poging om iets te doen,
(8) What words refer to an attempt to do something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n poging om iets te doen?
attempt (n), endeavor (n), try (n), campaign, drive,|poging (n), poging (n), probeer (n), veldtog, ry,
Use|Gebruik
Use this domain for words related to using something to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die gebruik van iets om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to using something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gebruik van iets?
use, employ (something), make use of, handle, manipulate, wield|gebruik, diens (iets), maak gebruik van, te hanteer, te manipuleer, swaai
(2) What words refer to something being used for some activity or purpose?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word vir &#39;n aktiwiteit of doel?
be used to, be used for, be for, for,|gebruik word om, gebruik word vir, vir, vir,
(3) What words refer to the activity that something is used for?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die aktiwiteit wat iets gebruik?
use (n),|gebruik (N),
(4) What words refer to using something in the wrong way?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gebruik van iets in die verkeerde manier?
abuse, misuse|mishandeling, misbruik
Useful|Nuttig
Use this domain for words related to being useful--words describing something that can be used to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met nuttig - woorde iets wat gebruik kan word om iets te doen beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is useful?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat nuttig is beskryf?
useful, be of use, handy, helpful, valuable, be good for, be worth, constructive, nifty,|nuttig, wees gebruik, handig, hulpvaardig, waardevolle, wees goed vir, die moeite werd wees, konstruktiewe, nifty,
(2) What words describe something that is very useful?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie nuttig beskryf?
invaluable, indispensable,|onskatbare waarde, onontbeerlik,
(3) What words refer to something being useful even though it doesn't seem to be?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets nuttig, selfs al is dit lyk nie te wees?
come in handy, come in useful, have its uses,|handig te pas kom, kom in nuttig, het sy gebruike,
(4) What words refer to the quality of being useful?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die nuttige?
usefulness, utility,|nut, nut,
Useless|Nutteloos
Use this domain for words related to being useless--words describing something that cannot be used to do anything.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat nutteloos - woorde iets wat nie gebruik kan word om iets te doen beskryf.

useless, be of no use, be no use, be no good, unhelpful, be of no help, be no help,|nutteloos wees van geen nut wees nie gebruik word nie goed nie, help nie, van geen hulp, geen hulp
(2) What words refer to something that is useless?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat nutteloos?
junk, garbage,|rommel, vullis,

careful, conscientious, painstaking, deliberate, deliberately|versigtig, pligsgetrou, deurdagte, doelbewuste, doelbewus
Work hard|Werk hard
Use this domain for words related to working hard.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met harde werk.
(1) What words refer to working hard?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na harde werk?
work hard, labor at, strive, try hard, give it your best, do your best, push hard, go all out, wear several hats, hard driving, make an effort|hard werk, arbeid op, streef, probeer hard, gee dit jou beste, doen jou beste, stoot hard, gaan almal uit, dra verskeie hoede, hard ry, maak &#39;n poging
(2) What words describe someone who works hard?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat hard werk beskryf?
industrious, hard working, busy, devoted, devotion, diligent, diligence,|vlytige, hard werk, besig, gewy, toewyding, ywerig, ywer,
(3) What words describe someone who works too hard?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat te hard werk beskryf?
overburdened, worn,|oorlaai, gedra,
Busy|Besig
Use this domain for words related to being busy.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met besig wees.

busy, have a lot to do, have your hands full, pressure, overburdened,|besig, het &#39;n baie om te doen, het jou hande vol, druk, oorlaaide,

Difficult, impossible|Moeilik, onmoontlik

difficult, hard, challenging, tough, not easy, arduous, demanding|moeilik, hard, uitdagende, taai, nie maklik nie, moeilike, veeleisende

be impossible, too hard, can't do it, not doable|word onmoontlik, te hard, kan dit nie doen nie, nie uitvoerbaar

difficulty|probleme

Advantage|Advantage
Use this domain for words related to having an advantage--something that helps you succeed that other people don't have.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met met &#39;n voordeel - iets wat help jy daarin slaag dat ander mense nie het nie.
(1) What words refer to an advantage?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n voordeel?
advantage, asset, privilege,|voordeel, bate, voorreg,
(2) What words refer to having an advantage over other people?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat &#39;n voordeel bo ander mense?
have an advantage, be at an advantage, have something on your side, the odds are stacked in your favor, have a head start, have everything going for you, hold all the cards, have the upper hand, be in a strong position, be in a position of strength,|het &#39;n voordeel wees by &#39;n voordeel, het iets aan jou kant, die kans is gestapel in jou guns, het &#39;n voorsprong, het alles gaan vir jou, hou al die kaarte, het die oorhand, word in &#39;n sterk posisie, wees in &#39;n posisie van krag,
(3) What words indicate that something gives one person an advantage over others?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gee een persoon &#39;n voordeel bo die ander?
give someone an advantage, give someone the edge, be to someone's advantage, be in someone's favor, favor (v),|gee iemand &#39;n voordeel gee iemand die rand, om iemand se voordeel wees in iemand se guns, genade (v),
(4) What words refer to a disadvantage?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n nadeel?
disadvantage, handicap, drawback, liability, limitations,|nadeel, gestremdheid, nadeel, aanspreeklikheid, beperkings,
(5) What words refer to having a disadvantage compared with other people?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n nadeel in vergelyking met ander mense?
have a disadvantage, be at a disadvantage, be handicapped, the odds are stacked against you, disadvantaged,|&#39;n nadeel wees op &#39;n nadeel, word gekortwiek, die kans is gestapel teen jou, benadeelde,
(6) What words indicate that something gives someone a disadvantage?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gee iemand &#39;n nadeel?
be to someone's disadvantage, be against,|wees om iemand se nadeel, teen,
(7) What words refer to the advantages and disadvantages of something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die voordele en nadele van iets?
advantages and disadvantages, pros and cons, pluses and minuses,|voordele en nadele, voor- en nadele, plus punte en minuses,

Growing crops|Groeiende gewasse
Use this domain for general words related to growing crops. If one crop is cultivated extensively and there are many words related to it, set up a separate domain for it.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met die groei van gewasse. As een gewas omvattend verbou en daar is baie woorde in verband met dit, die opstel van &#39;n aparte domein vir dit.
(1) What words refer to growing crops?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die groei van gewasse?
grow, cultivate, raise, farm (v), garden (v), produce,|groei, bewerk, te verhoog, plaas (v), tuin (v), produseer,
(2) What words refer to something that is grown?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gegroei?
crop, produce (n),|gewas, produseer (n),
Growing grain|Groeiende graan
Use this domain for general words related to growing grain crops such as barley, maize (corn), millet, oats, rice, rye, sesame, sorghum, and wheat. If one crop is cultivated extensively and there are many words related to it, set up a separate domain for it. This has already been done for rice, wheat, and maize, since they are so common around the world.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met die verbouing van graan gewasse soos gars, mielies (koring), giers, hawer, rys, rog, sesamsaad, sorghum en koring. As een gewas omvattend verbou en daar is baie woorde in verband met dit, die opstel van &#39;n aparte domein vir dit. Dit is reeds gedoen vir rys, koring en mielies, want hulle is so algemeen in die wêreld.
(1) What words refer to growing grain?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verbouing van graan?
grow grain, sheaf, winnow|groei koring gerf, wan

rice paddy, transplant seedling|rys rys, oorplanting saailinge

Dit is reeds gedoen vir aartappels en maniok, want hulle is so algemeen in die wêreld.

Growing vegetables|Die kweek van groente
Use this domain for words related to growing vegetables, such as asparagus, beans, broccoli, cabbage, celery, chard, cucumbers, eggplant, melons, peas, peppers, pumpkins, spinach, squash, tomatoes, and watermelons. If one type of vegetable is cultivated extensively and there are many words related to it, set up a separate domain for it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die kweek van groente, soos aspersies, bone, broccoli, kool, seldery, rolletjes, komkommer, eiervrug, spanspekke, ertjies, rissies, pampoene, spinasie, muurbal, tamaties, en waatlemoene. As een tipe groente op groot skaal verbou en daar is baie woorde in verband met dit, die opstel van &#39;n aparte domein vir dit.
(1) What words refer to growing vegetables?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die kweek van groente?
vegetable garden, hoe, pick|groentetuin, hoe, tel
Growing fruit|Groeiende vrugte
Use this domain for words related to growing fruit, such as berries, cranberries, grapes, raspberries, and strawberries. If one type of fruit is cultivated extensively and there are many words related to it, set up a separate domain for it. This has already been done for grapes and bananas, since they are so common around the world.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die kweek van vrugte, soos bessies, bosbessies, druiwe, frambose, en aarbeie. Dit is reeds gedoen vir druiwe en piesangs, want hulle is so algemeen in die wêreld.

pick, press, juice, fruit juice|pick, pers, sap, vrugtesap

grape, pick, vine, vineyard, prune, winepress, cluster, wine, grape juice|druiwe, pluk, wingerdstok, wingerd, snoei, parskuip cluster, wyn, druiwesap

Growing grass|Groeiende gras

Dit is reeds gedoen vir suikerriet en tabak, want hulle is so algemeen in die wêreld.

Growing flowers|Groeiende blomme
Use this domain for words related to growing flowers. If one type of flower is cultivated extensively and there are many words related to it, set up a separate domain for it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die groeiende blomme. As een soort blom omvattend verbou en daar is baie woorde in verband met dit, die opstel van &#39;n aparte domein vir dit.
(1) What words refer to growing flowers?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die groeiende blomme?
growing flowers, floriculture, flower, prune, pick flower, gardening, garden, flower garden, flowering plants|groeiende blomme, blombedryf, blom, snoei, pluk blomme, tuinmaak, tuin, blom tuin, blomplante
Growing trees|Groeiende bome
Use this domain for words related to growing trees. If one crop is cultivated extensively and there are many words related to it, set up a separate domain for it. This has already been done for coconuts and coffee, since they are so common around the world.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die groeiende bome. As een gewas omvattend verbou en daar is baie woorde in verband met dit, die opstel van &#39;n aparte domein vir dit. Dit is reeds gedoen vir kokosneute en koffie, want hulle is so algemeen in die wêreld.
(1) What words refer to growing trees?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die groeiende bome?
prune, seedling, graft|snoei, saailing, ent
Growing coconuts|Groeiende kokosneute
Use this domain for words related to growing coconuts.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die groeiende kokosneute.
(1) What words refer to growing coconuts?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die groeiende kokosneute?
coconut, husk, shell, copra, milk, dry|klapper, doppe, dop, kopra, melk, droë
Growing coffee|Groeiende koffie
Use this domain for words related to growing coffee.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die groeiende koffie.
(1) What words refer to growing coffee?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die groeiende koffie?
bean, dry, grind|boontjie, droë, slyp
Land preparation|Land voorbereiding
Use this domain for words related to preparing land for planting crops.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die voorbereiding van grond vir die aanplant van gewasse.
(1) What words refer to preparing a field?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die voorbereiding van &#39;veld?
prepare field, clear field|voor te berei veld duidelike veld
(2) What is a prepared field called?|(2) Wat is &#39;n voorbereide veld genoem?
Clear a field|Duidelik &#39;n veld
Use this domain for words related to clearing a field.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die skoonmaak van &#39;n gebied.
(1) What words refer to clearing a field?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die skoonmaak van &#39;n gebied?
clear a field, burn grass, slash and burn, uproot weeds, cut the grass|duidelik &#39;n veld, brand gras, streep en brand, ontwortel onkruid, sny die gras
Plow a field|Ploeg die veld
Use this domain for words related to plowing a field.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n ploeg in die veld.
(1) What words refer to plowing a field?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ploeg in die veld?
plow, cultivate, dig, hoe, harrow, make a row, plow a furrow, break up soil|ploeg, bewerk, te grawe, hoe, eg, maak &#39;n ry, ploeg &#39;n sloot, breek die grond
Fertilize a field|Bemes die veld
Use this domain for words related to fertilizing a field.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die bemesting n veld.
(1) What words refer to fertilizing a field?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die bemesting n veld?
fertilize, add fertilizer, fertilizer, fertile, manure|bemes, voeg kunsmis, kunsmis, vrugbare, mis
Plant a field|Plant &#39;n veld
Use this domain for words related to planting a field.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die aanplant van &#39;n veld.
(1) What words refer to planting seeds in a field?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die plant van sade in &#39;n veld?
cultivate, plant, seed (a field), sow seed,|kweek, plant, saad (&#39;n veld), saad saai,
(2) What words refer to planting plants?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die plant van plante?
plant, plant vines, plant cuttings, transplant,|plant, plant wingerde, plant steggies, oorplanting,
(3) What words refer to the things that are planted?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die dinge wat geplant?
seed, seedling, cutting|saad, saailinge, sny
Tend a field|Geneig n veld
Use this domain for words related to tending a field.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n neiging in die veld.
(1) What words refer to tending a field?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n neiging in die veld?
tend a field, cultivate, weed, hoe, pull weeds, support a banana stalk, spray, insecticide|geneig n veld te kweek, onkruid, hoe, trek onkruid, ondersteun &#39;n piesang steel, spuit, insekdoder
(2) What words refer to protecting a field from birds?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die beskerming van &#39;n veld van voëls?
scarecrow,|voëlverskrikker,
Cut grass|Sny gras
Use this domain for words related to cutting grass.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die sny van gras.
(1) What words refer to cutting grass?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sny van gras?
cut grass, mow, scythe, clip|gesnyde gras, sny, sens, clip
(2) What tools are used to cut grass?|(2) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om gras te sny?
machete, sickle, scythe, lawnmower, grass clippers|kapmes, sekel, sens, grassnyer, gras knippers
Uproot plants|Ontwortel plante
Use this domain for words related to uprooting plants.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die ontworteling plante.
(1) What words refer to uprooting plants?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na ontworteling plante?
uproot, pull, dig out (stump), root out|ontwortel, trek, uit te grawe (stomp), wortel uit
(2) What words refer to uprooting weeds?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na ontwortel onkruid?
weed (v), hoe weeds, weed killer, herbicide, rake weeds, weed carelessly|onkruid (v), hoe onkruid, onkruiddoder, onkruiddoder, hark onkruid, onkruid onverskillig
Irrigate|Besproei
Use this domain for words related to irrigating a field.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met besproeiing &#39;n veld.
(1) What words refer to adding water to plants and fields?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van water aan plante en velde?
to water, irrigate, irrigation|om water, besproei, besproeiing
(2) What tools and machines are used to water plants?|(2) Watter gereedskap en masjiene word gebruik om water plante?
irrigate, irrigation, irrigation canal, to water|besproei, besproeiing, besproeiingskanaal om water
Trim plants|Trim plante
Use this domain for words related to trimming plants.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die snoei plante.
(1) What words refer to trimming plants?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na snoei plante?
trim, prune, cut back, thin|snoei, snoei, sny, dun
(2) What tools are used to trim plants?|(2) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om plante te snoei?

Neglect plants|Verwaarlosing plante
Use this domain for words related to neglecting plants.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verwaarlosing van plante.
(1) What words refer to neglecting plants?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na verwaarloos plante?
neglect, allow to grow wild, become overgrown, let the weeds grow|verwaarlosing, toe te laat om wild groei, word oorgroei, laat die onkruid groei
Harvest|Harvest
Use this domain for words related to harvesting crops. If there is an important crop and there are a lot of words that refer to harvesting it, set up a special domain for it, such as 'Harvest rice' or 'Harvest coconuts'. If there is more than one such crop, set up a separate domain for each of them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die oes gewasse. As daar is &#39;n belangrike gewas en daar is &#39;n baie woorde wat verwys na dit oes, die opstel van &#39;n spesiale afdeling vir dit, soos &#39;Harvest rys &quot;of&quot; Harvest kokosneute. As daar meer as een sodanige gewas, die opstel van &#39;n aparte afdeling vir elkeen van hulle.
(1) What words refer to harvesting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die oes?
harvest, reap, gather in the harvest|oes, maai, versamel in die oes
(2) What special words are used for harvesting each crop?|(2) Watter spesiale woorde word gebruik vir die oes van elke gewas?
harvest maize, harvest rice, harvest yams, harvest beans, pick fruit, pluck an apple, dig potatoes, pull carrots, cut vegetables|mielie-oes, oes rys, oes garing, oes bone, pluk vrugte, ruk &#39;n appel, grawe aartappels, trek wortels, gesny groente
(3) What words refer to what is harvested?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat geoes?
crop, harvest, yield|gewas, oes, opbrengs
(4) What tools and machines are used to harvest crops?|(4) Wat gereedskap en masjiene word gebruik om gewasse te oes?
harvester|stroper
(5) What is done to a field after the crops are harvested?|(5) Wat word gedoen om &#39;n stuk grond na die gewasse geoes?
lie fallow, animals graze, plow under plants|braak, diere wei, ploeg onder plante
(6) What words describe a crop that is ready to harvest?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gewas wat gereed is om te oes?
ripe|ryp
(7) What words refer to the time of harvest?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die tyd van die oes nie?
harvest, harvest time|oes, oes
First fruits|Eerste vrugte
Use this domain for words referring to the first fruits or crops to be harvested.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die eerste vrugte of gewasse geoes.
(1) What words refer to the first fruits to be harvested?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die eerste vrugte word geoes?
first fruits, eat first of new crops|eerste vrugte, eet eerste van nuwe gewasse
Crop failure|Misoes
Use this domain for words related to crop failure.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met misoes.
(1) What words refer to crop failure?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na misoes?
crop failure, poor harvest|misoeste, swak oes
(2) What causes crop failure?|(2) Wat veroorsaak misoes?
drought, blight, disease, locusts, insect plague, storm, exhausted soil, bad seed|droogte, plae, siektes, sprinkane, insek plaag, storm, uitgeput grond, slegte saad
(3) What results from crop failure?|(3) Wat die resultate van misoeste?
famine, lean times|hongersnood, maer tye
Gather wild plants|Versamel wilde plante
Use this domain for words related to gathering wild plants. In a hunter-gatherer culture this domain might need to be extensively developed.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die insameling van wilde plante. In &#39;n jagter-versamelaar kultuur hierdie domein dalk nodig om breedvoerig ontwikkel word.
(1) What words refer to gathering wild plants?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die insameling van wilde plante?
gather, collect, pick (berries)|versamel, versamel, pluk (bessies)
Plant product|Plant produk
Use this domain for words referring to materials and substances that are taken from plants and used for various purposes. It is necessary to think through various types of plants to think of what materials are taken from each.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na materiaal en stowwe wat uit plante en gebruik word vir verskeie doeleindes. Dit is nodig om te dink deur middel van die verskillende tipes van plante om te dink aan watter materiaal is geneem uit elk.
(1) What plant products are used for building?|(1) Wat plant produkte word gebruik vir die bou van?
wood|hout
(2) What plant products are used for the roof of a building?|(2) Wat plant produkte word gebruik vir die dak van &#39;n gebou?
thatch, shingle|grasdak, naambord
(3) What plant products are used for fibers, thread, and rope?|(3) Wat plant produkte word gebruik vir vesel, draad, en tou?
hemp, cotton|hennep, katoen
(4) What plant products are used for chemicals?|(4) Wat plant produkte word gebruik vir chemikalieë?
sap, rubber|sap, rubber
(5) What plant products are used for burning?|(5) Wat plant produkte word gebruik vir die brand?
firewood|vuurmaakhout
Process harvest|Proses oes
Use this domain for words related to processing the harvest.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verwerking van die oes.
(1) What words refer to processing the harvest?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verwerking van die oes nie?
process harvest, shell groundnuts, shell beans, remove beans from pods, husk corn, remove leaves from maize cob, remove maize from the cob, dry, separate bad from good|proses oes, dop grondbone, dop bone, bone verwyder uit peule, doppe koring blare verwyder uit mieliekop, verwyder mielies uit die kop, droë, aparte slegte van die goeie

(2) What things are used to mill grain?|(2) Watter dinge word gebruik om meul koring?
mill (n),|meul (n),
(3) What crops are milled?|(3) Wat gewasse gemaal?
rice, wheat, maize|rys, koring, mielies

store the harvest, store food, put in sacks, tie together, heap of grain, haystack, sheaf of grain|stoor die oes, stoor kos, sit in sakke, das saam, hoop graan, hooiberg, gerf graan

to prune, to hoe, to plow, to pull a plow, to guide a plow, to use a shovel, to dig with a hoe|om te snoei, te skoffel, ploeg, om &#39;n ploeg trek, om &#39;n ploeg te lei, om &#39;n graaf te gebruik, te grawe met &#39;n hoe
(6) What are the parts of each tool?|(6) Wat is die dele van elke instrument?
tip, edge, handle, blade|tip, rand, te hanteer, lem

Animal husbandry|Veeteelt

Domesticated animal|Mak diere
Use this domain for words related to domesticated animals. Add extra domains for specific domesticated animals in your culture such as elephants in east Asia, camels in the Middle East, and llamas in South America.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met mak diere. Voeg ekstra domeine vir spesifieke mak diere in jou kultuur soos olifante in Oos-Asië, kamele in die Midde-Ooste, en llamas in Suid-Amerika.
(1) What words refer to a domesticated animal?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n mak dier?
domesticated animal, livestock, pet|mak diere, vee, troeteldier
(2) What words refer to domesticating an animal?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na domesticating &#39;n dier?
domesticate, tame, break (horse)|mak, mak, break (perd)
(3) What words describe an animal that has been domesticated?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n dier wat is mak?
domesticated, tamed, broken in|mak, getem, gebreek in
(4) What animals are commonly domesticated?|(4) Watter diere word algemeen mak?
cow, goat, sheep, horse, donkey, dog, cat, chicken, duck, goose, turkey|koei, bok, skaap, perd, donkie, hond, kat, hoender, eend, gans, kalkoen
Cattle|Beeste
Use this domain for words related to cattle and the care of cattle.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met beeste en die versorging van die diere.
(1) What words refer to cattle?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vee?
cattle, bovine|vee, bees
(2) What words refer to male or female cattle?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na manlike of vroulike beeste?
bull, cow|bul, koei
(3) What words refer to young cattle?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na jong beeste?
calf, bullock, heifer|kalf, bul, koei
(4) What words refer to a castrated bull?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gekastreer bul?
ox, steer|bees, stuur
(5) What types of cows are there?|(5) Watter koeie is daar?
Angus, aurochs, Brahma, Guernsey, Holstein, Jersey, longhorn, shorthorn|Angus, aurochs, Brahma, Guernsey, Holstein, Jersey, Longhorn, Shorthorn
(6) What are the parts of a cow?|(6) Wat is die dele van &#39;n koei?
udder|uier
(7) How do cattle eat?|(7) Hoe diere eet?
graze, chew the cud|wei, herkou
(8) What sounds do cows make?|(8) Wat klanke nie koeie te maak?
(9) Where are cows kept?|(9) Waar is koeie gehou word?
cow pasture, cattle range, cow barn, cowshed, stall|koei weiding, vee reeks, koei skuur, stal, stal
(10) What do cows produce?|(10) Wat doen koeie produseer?
milk, blood, meat|melk, bloed, vleis
(11) What is the meat of a cow called?|(11) Wat is die vleis van &#39;n koei genoem?
beef, steak, hamburger, minced meat, rump roast, fillet|beesvleis, steak, hamburger, maalvleis, kruis gebraai, fillet

Pig|Vark
Use this domain for words related to pigs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met varke.
(1) What words refer to pigs?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na varke?

(2) What words refer to male or female pigs?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na manlike of vroulike varke?
boar, sow|varke, saai
(3) What words refer to young pigs?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na jong varke?
piglet, suckling|varkie, suigling
(4) What do pigs eat?|(4) Wat doen varke eet?

(5) What do pigs do?|(5) Wat doen varke te doen?
wallow, root, feed|wentel, wortel, voer
(6) What sounds do pigs make?|(6) Wat klanke nie varke te maak?
grunt, squeal, snort|grunt, geknars, snuif
(7) What is the meat of a pig called?|(7) Wat is die vleis van &#39;n vark genoem?
pork, sausage, ham, pork chop, gammon steak, pork tenderloin|vark, wors, ham, vark kap, hamlap, vark ossenhaas
(8) Where are pigs kept?|(8) Waar is varke gehou?
pigsty, sty, pigpen, barn, shed, stall|varkhok, hok, varkhok, skuur, skuur, stal
Dog|Dog
Use this domain for words related to dogs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met honde.

dog, hound, canine, stray, cur, mangy|hond, hond, honde, verdwaalde, cur, brandsiek
(2) What words refer to male or female dogs?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na manlike of vroulike honde?

(3) What words refer to young dogs?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na jong honde?
puppy, pup, whelp|hondjie, pup, jong
(4) What types of dogs are there?|(4) Watter tipes honde is daar?
basset, beagle, bloodhound, boxer, bulldog, Chihuahua, collie, dachshund, Doberman, German shepherd, greyhound, husky, Pekinese, poodle, retriever, setter, spaniel, terrier|Basset, speurder, bloedhond, bokser, bulldog, Chihuahua, Collie, worshond, Doberman, Duitse herdershond, windhond, hees, Pekinese, poedel, retriever, setter, spaniel, terrier
(5) What sounds do dogs make?|(5) Wat klanke nie honde te maak?
bark, howl, yap, growl|bas, huil, Yap, grom
(6) Where are dogs kept?|(6) Waar is die honde gehou word?
doghouse, kennel|hondehok, kennel

Beast of burden|Lasdier
Use this domain for words related to animals that are used as a beast of burden--either to ride, to carry loads, or to pull vehicles. The questions refer to horses, but can be applied to any animal.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met diere wat gebruik word as &#39;n pakdier - óf om te ry, om te dra vragte, of om voertuie te trek. Die vrae verwys na perde, maar aangewend kan word om &#39;n dier.
(1) What types of beasts of burden are there?|(1) Watter tipes pakdiere is daar?
beast of burden, horse, equine, donkey, burro, ass, mule, camel, llama, elephant,|lasdier, perd, perde, donkies, burro, gat, muile, kamele, lama, olifante,
(2) What words refer to male or female horses?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na manlike of vroulike perde?
stallion, mare|hings, merrie
(3) What words refer to young horses?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na jong perde?
colt, foal, filly|vul vul, merrie
(4) What words refer to a castrated male horse?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gekastreer manlike perd?
gelding|reun
(5) What types of horses are there?|(5) Watter tipes perde is daar?
Arabian, pinto, pony, thoroughbred, racehorse|Arabiese, Pinto, ponie, volbloed, renpaard
(6) Where are horses kept?|(6) Waar perde gehou?
stable, pasture, range, barn, shed, stall|stabiele, weiding, omvang, skuur, skuur, stal
(7) What equipment is used to ride or harness a horse?|(7) Wat toerusting word gebruik om te ry of te span &#39;n perd?
saddle, bit, bridle, reins, harness, yoke|saal, bietjie, toom, niere, harnas, juk

tether, rope, prod (stick to direct cattle), cowbell|ketting, tou, prod (stok om direkte beeste), Harzer
(4) What words refer to a place where animals can eat grass?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar diere gras kan eet?
pasture, field, range|weiding, veld reeks

Castrate animal|Kastreer dier
Use this domain for words related to castrating animals. There are sometimes specific terms for castrated animals, such as 'steer--a male cow that has been castrated before maturity'.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kastrasie diere. Daar is soms spesifieke terme vir gekastreer diere, soos &#39;n jong os - &#39;n manlike koei wat gekastreer is voordat volwassenheid.
(1) What words refer to castrating an animal?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na kastrasie &#39;n dier?
castrate, spay, neutered|borgje, bespuiting, gesteriliseerd
(2) What words refer to a castrated animal?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gekastreer dier?
steer, ox (castrated bull), gelding|stuur, bees (gekastreer bul), reun
Hunt and fish|Hunt en vis

hunt, trap, fish|jag, vang, vis
Hunt|Hunt
Use this domain for words related to hunting wild animals.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wilde diere te jag.
(1) What words refer to hunting animals?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die jag van diere?
hunt (v), hunt (n), lay in wait, blind, decoy, animal call, bag an animal, strike to cause injury, strike hard, kill, flush an animal out of hiding, to suddenly come out of hiding, search, hide, capture, chase away, aim, miss target, shoot, hit target, nick|jag (v), jag (n), lê in die wag, blindes, lokmiddel, dier oproep, sak &#39;n dier, staking besering veroorsaak, staking hard, dood te maak, spoel &#39;n dier uit wegkruip, om skielik kom uit wegkruip, soek , verberg, vang, jaag weg, doel, mis die teiken, te skiet, druk teiken, Nick
(2) What weapons are used to hunt animals?|(2) Wat wapens word gebruik om diere te jag?
spear, hunting bow, arrow, poison for arrow, quiver, hunting net, club, gun|spies, jag boog, boog, gif vir pyl, pylkoker, jag net, klub, geweer
(3) How are the weapons cared for?|(3) Hoe word die wapens versorg?
sharpen|skerp
(4) Where do people hunt?|(4) Waar mense jag?
hunting grounds|jagvelde
(5) What words refer to hunting with dogs?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na jag met honde?
hunt with dog, hunting dog, hunting dog bell, take up the chase, catch the scent, follow the scent, corner an animal, tree an animal, bay (sound of a dog when following an animal)|jag met honde, jag hond, jag hond klok, neem die jaagtog, vang die reuk, volg die reuk, hoek &#39;n dier, boom &#39;n dier, baai (klank van &#39;n hond toe ná &#39;n dier)

Things done to animals|Dinge gedoen om diere

(2) What words refer to someone moving animals?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand bewegende diere?

(3) What words refer to catching (but not killing) animals?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vang (maar nie doodmaak) diere?

(4) What words refer to killing animals?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die moord op diere?
hunt, trap, snare, burn out,|jag, vang, strik, uitbrand,
(5) What words are used for killing birds?|(5) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die doodmaak voëls?

(6) What words are used for killing insects?|(6) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die doodmaak insekte?

(7) What words are used for killing fish?|(7) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die doodmaak vis?
fish, fish for, hook, net, spear, bait,|vis, vis, haak, net, spies, aas,
(8) What words are used of killing all animals?|(8) Watter woorde gebruik van die dood van al die diere?
exterminate, become extinct, extinction, wipe out|wis, uitsterf, uitwissing, uit te wis
(9) What words are used for processing dead animals?|(9) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die verwerking van dooie diere?
butcher, skin, pluck feathers, render,|slagter, vel, pluk vere, lewer,
(10) What words are used for taming animals?|(10) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die kreet van diere?
tame, domesticate, train, pet|mak, mak, trein, troeteldier
(11) What words refer to calling to an animal?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n beroep om &#39;n dier?

(12) What words are used for animals that perform a special task?|(12) Watter woorde word gebruik vir diere wat &#39;n spesiale taak te verrig?
watchdog, performing (animal), seeing eye dog, police dog, hunting dog|waghond, uitvoerende (dier), oog wat sien hond polisie hond, jag hond
(13) What special events feature animals?|(13) Watter spesiale gebeure funksie van diere?
circus, cockfight, bullfight|sirkus, hanen gevecht, stierengevecht
(14) What special places are reserved for animals?|(14) Watter spesiale plekke word gereserveer vir diere?

Working with buildings|Werk met geboue
Use this domain for words related to working with buildings.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die werk met geboue.

(2) What are the steps in building a building?|(2) Wat is die stappe in die bou van &#39;n gebou?

(3) What are the people called who build buildings?|(3) Wat is die mense genoem wat geboue te bou?

(5) What words refer to constructing a wall?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die bou van &#39;n muur?
frame, erect a wall, put up siding, plaster, mud and wattle|raam, rig &#39;n muur, sit spoor, gips, modder en wattel
(6) What words refer to constructing a roof?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die bou van &#39;n dak?
to roof, a roof, roofing material|tot dak, &#39;n dak, dakmateriaal
Building|Building

(1) What types of buildings are there?|(1) Watter soorte geboue is daar?
building, structure, construction, kitchen house, bathhouse, outhouse, latrine, outbuilding, bank, elevator, gallery, garage, gazebo, hospital, library, lighthouse, mausoleum, museum, outbuilding, observatory, pavilion, pyramid, rotunda, skyscraper, tabernacle, tower,|gebou, struktuur, konstruksie, kombuis huis badhuis, kleinhuisie, latrine, buitegebou, bank, hysbak, gallery, garage, gazebo, hospitaal, biblioteek, vuurtoring, mausoleum, museum, buitegebou, sterrewag, paviljoen, piramide, ronde, skyscraper, tent , toring,

barn, shed, hen house, coop, kennel, pound, doghouse, stable,|skuur, skuur, hen huis, hok, kennel, pond, hondehok, stabiele,
(3) What kinds of buildings are used for work and to make things?|(3) Watter soorte geboue word gebruik vir die werk en om dinge te maak?
office, factory, shop, laboratory, plant, greenhouse,|kantoor, fabriek, winkel, laboratorium, plant, kas,
(4) What kinds of buildings are used  to store things?|(4) Wat soorte geboue word gebruik om dinge te stoor?
barn, granary, grain silo, warehouse, storehouse, safe, shed, treasury,|skuur, skuur, graan silo, pakhuis, stoorkamer, veilige, skuur, tesourie,
(5) What kinds of buildings are used  to sell things?|(5) Wat soorte geboue word gebruik om dinge te verkoop?
store, shop, shopping center, mall, kiosk, supermarket,|winkel, winkel, winkelsentrum, mall, kiosk, &#39;n supermark,
(6) What kinds of buildings are used by the government?|(6) Watter soorte geboue gebruik word deur die regering?
courthouse, Parliament house, government headquarters, castle, palace,|hofgebou Parlement huis, hoofkwartier regering, kasteel, paleis,
(7) What kinds of buildings are used by the police?|(7) Wat soorte geboue word deur die polisie?
police station, jail, prison, jailhouse, cell,|polisiekantoor, tronk, gevangenis, Jailhouse, sel,
(8) What kinds of buildings are used by the military?|(8) Wat soorte geboue word gebruik deur die militêre?
military base, guardhouse, barracks, fort, blockhouse, bomb shelter, watchtower, lookout, bunker,|militêre basis, waghuis, barakke, fort, blokhuis, bom skuiling, tapyt, uitkyk, bunker,
(9) What kinds of buildings are used by travelers?|(9) Watter soorte geboue word deur reisigers?
station, railroad station, bus station, gas station, petrol station, rest area, parking lot|stasie stasie, bushalte, gas-stasie, vulstasie, rus area, parkeerterrein
(10) What kinds of buildings are used by travelers for sleeping?|(10) Watter soorte geboue word deur reisigers vir die slaap?
hotel, motel, inn, hostel, lodge,|hotel, motel, herberg, hostel, lodge,
(11) What kinds of buildings are used by travelers for eating?|(11) Watter soorte geboue word deur reisigers vir eet?
restaurant, bar, pub, tavern,|restaurant, bar, kroeg, kroeg,
(12) What kinds of buildings are found at airports?|(12) Watter soorte geboue word by lughawens?
hangar, control tower, terminal,|loods, beheertoring, terminale,
(13) What kinds of buildings are used for meetings?|(13) Watter soorte geboue word gebruik vir vergaderings?
assembly hall, auditorium, center, hall, community center,|vergadersaal, auditorium, sentrum, saal, gemeenskap sentrum,
(14) What kinds of buildings are used for watching games and shows?|(14) Watter soorte geboue word gebruik vir die dop speletjies en programme?
theater, cinema, stadium, amphitheater, arena, ballpark, bullring, coliseum, racetrack, hippodrome,|teater, teater, stadion, amfiteater, arena, ball, arena, Coliseum, renbaan, Renbaan,
(15) What kinds of buildings are used for schools?|(15) Watter soorte geboue word gebruik vir skole?
school, schoolhouse, university, library, dormitory, conservatory,|skool, skoolgebou, universiteit, biblioteek, koshuis, stoep,
(16) What kinds of buildings are used in religion?|(16) Watter soorte geboue gebruik word in godsdiens?
church, synagogue, mosque, temple, shrine, cathedral, monastery, convent, cloister, nunnery, abbey, chapel, parsonage, sanctuary, basilica, pagoda, tabernacle,|kerk, sinagoge, moskee, tempel, heiligdom, katedraal, klooster, klooster, klooster, klooster, abbey, kapel, pastorie, heiligdom, basiliek, pagoda, tent,
(17) What kinds of buildings are made to remind people of something or someone?|(17) Watter soorte geboue is gemaak om mense van iets of iemand te herinner?
monument, megalith, mound, obelisk, ziggurat,|monument, mega, heuwel, obelisk, ziggoerat,
(18) What words describe different kinds of buildings?|(18) Watter woorde beskryf verskillende soorte geboue?
enclosed, open, multi-story, high-rise,|ingeslote, oop, multi-storie, hoë,
House|Huis
Use this domain for general words referring to a house where people live.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na &#39;n huis waar mense woon.
(1) What general words refer to a house where people live?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n huis waar mense woon?
dwelling, house, home, abode, habitation, residence, homestead, settlement, compound, place|woning, huis, huis, woning, woning, verblyf, opstal, nedersetting, saamgestelde, plek
(2) What kinds of houses are there?|(2) Watter soort van huise is daar?
bungalow, mansion, duplex, apartment|bungalow, herehuis, duplex, &#39;n woonstel
(3) What words refer to a description of the location of a house?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n beskrywing van die plek van &#39;n huis?
address|adres
(4) What words refer to the inside of a house?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die binnekant van &#39;n huis?
inside, indoors, indoor, interior|binne, binnenshuis, binnenshuise, binneland
Types of houses|Tipes huise
Use this domain for words referring to types of houses.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na soorte huise.
(1) What types of houses are there?|(1) Watter tipes huise is daar?
rectangular, round, one story, two story, duplex, bungalow, apartment, apartment building, flat, duplex, ranch style, mansion, castle, man's house, wife's house,|vierkantige, ronde, &#39;n storie, twee storie, duplex, bungalow, &#39;n woonstel, &#39;n woonstel gebou, plat, duplex, ranch styl, herehuis, kasteel, man se huis, huis se vrou,
(2) What is a very good house called?|(2) Wat is &#39;n baie goeie huis genoem?
palace, mansion, sprawling (place)|paleis, herehuis, gespartel (plek)
(3) What is a very bad house called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n baie slegte huis genoem?
dump, run down place, shack, hut, log cabin|stort, loop af plek, shack, hut, teken kajuit
(4) What is a temporary house called?|(4) Wat is &#39;n tydelike huis genoem?
tent, shelter, hut, camp|tent, skuiling, hut, kamp
(5) What other buildings are associated with the house and built next to it?|(5) Wat ander geboue is wat verband hou met die huis en gebou langsaan?
outhouse, bunkhouse, garage, shed, barn|kleinhuisie, stapelbedden, garage, afdak, skuur
Land, property|Grond, eiendom
Use this domain for words related to land that a person owns or the land on which a house is built.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met grond wat &#39;n persoon besit of die grond waarop &#39;n huis gebou.

(2) What words refer to the boundary of a piece of property?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die grens van &#39;n stukkie van die eiendom?
property line, boundary marker|eiendom lyn, grens merker
(3) What words refer to going onto someone's property without permission?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na gaan op iemand se eiendom sonder toestemming?
trespass, trespasser|oortreding, oortreder
(4) What words refer to the person who owns the land?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die persoon wat die eienaar van die land?
landowner, landlord, owner|grondeienaar, verhuurder, eienaar
(5) What words refer to a person who sells land?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat grond verkoop?
real estate agent|Real Estate agent
(6) What words refer to the official document that shows who owns the land?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die amptelike dokument wat wys wie die land?
title, deed|titel, daad

open, close, swing close, slam, walk through, leave by, lock, unlock, bolt, block, hang, install|oop, naby, swaai naby, slam, loop deur, laat deur, slot, ontsluit, bout, blok, hang, installeer

mud, clay, cement, straw, mortar, sun-dried, burned, fired, kiln-dried|modder, klei, sement, strooi, klei, son-gedroogde, verbrand, afgedank, oond-gedroogde

paint, varnish, lacquer, whitewash|verf, vernis, lak, kalk
(5) What materials are used to make a roof?|(5) Watter materiaal word gebruik om &#39;n dak te maak?
roofing material, tile roof, tile, tin roof, tin sheet, shingle, wooden shingle, asphalt shingle, shake, thatched roof, thatch, grass roof, grass, straw, palm leaf, sod, canvas (tent)|dakmateriaal, teël dak, teël, tin dak, tin vel, naambord, hout naambord, asfalt naambord, skud, grasdak, grasdak, gras dak, gras, strooi, palm blaar, sooi, doek (tent)
(6) What materials are used to make a floor?|(6) Watter materiaal word gebruik om &#39;n vloer te maak?
flooring, wooden floor, linoleum, tile floor, dirt floor, cement floor, cow dung|vloer, hout vloer, linoleum, teël vloer, vuil vloer, sement vloer, beesmis
(7) What materials are used to make doors and windows?|(7) Wat materiaal word gebruik om die deure en vensters te maak?
wood, glass, screen|hout, glas, skerm
(8) What materials are used to make a foundation?|(8) Watter materiaal word gebruik om &#39;n grondslag te maak?
foundation stone, cornerstone|hoeksteen, hoeksteen

Infrastructure|Infrastruktuur
Use this domain for words related to infrastructure--the big things people make that many people use, such as roads, electric power lines, and water supply systems.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met infrastruktuur - die groot dinge wat mense maak dat baie mense gebruik, soos paaie, elektriese kraglyne, en watervoorsiening stelsels.
(1) What words refer to the things the government builds to provide for the needs of the public?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die dinge wat die regering bou om voorsiening te maak vir die behoeftes van die publiek?
infrastructure, public works, park|infrastruktuur, openbare werke, park
Road|Road
Use this domain for words related to a road.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n pad.
(1) What types of roads are there?|(1) Watter paaie is daar?
road, street, lane, path, footpath, way, avenue, boulevard, highway, freeway, thoroughfare, divided highway, paved road, dirt road, improved road, unimproved road|pad, straat, laan, pad, voetpad, manier, avenue, boulevard, snelweg, snelweg, deurgang, verdeel snelweg, teerpad, grondpad, verbeterde pad, onverbeterde pad
(2) What words are used to describe when two roads come together?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik om te beskryf wanneer twee paaie bymekaar kom?
corner, cross street, fork, intersection, juncture, pedestrian crossing, interchange, overpass, underpass, exit|hoek, kruis straat, vurk, kruising, stadium, voetoorgang, wisselaar, te bowe, onderdoorgang, afrit
(3) What words refer to a bridge?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n brug?
bridge,|brug,
(4) What words refer to a tunnel?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n tonnel?
tunnel|tonnel
(5) What are the parts of a road?|(5) Wat is die dele van &#39;n pad?
center line, shoulder, edge, median, lane, passing lane, bed, roadbed, surface, pavement, sidewalk, curb|middellyn, skouer, rand, mediaan, laan, verby laan, bed, roadbed, oppervlak, plaveisel, sypaadjie, randsteen
(6) What words are used for the signs and markers on a road?|(6) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die tekens en merkers op &#39;n pad?
sign, signpost, marker, line, speed bump, reflector|teken bordjie, merker, lyn, spoedwal, reflector
(7) What words are used for making a road?|(7) Watter woorde gebruik vir die maak van &#39;n pad?
build a road, lay a new road, build up the bed, pave|bou van &#39;n pad, lê &#39;n nuwe pad, die opbou van die bed, baan
(8) What words are used to describe a bad road?|(8) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n slegte pad te beskryf?
pothole, road gone to pot, rutted, washboard, dusty, rough, broken pavement, cracked pavement, worn pavement, full of holes, in need of repair|slaggat, pad gegaan om pot, bronstig, wasbord, stowwerige, ruwe, gebroke sypaadjie, gekraakte plaveisel, gedra sypaadjie, vol gate, in die behoefte van herstel
(9) What words are used of fixing a road?|(9) Watter woorde gebruik van die vasstelling van &#39;n pad?
road repairs, repaving, repairing, fixing, detour, fill holes, patching holes|pad herstelwerk, nuwe asfalt was gelê, herstel, bevestiging, ompad, vul gate lap gate
(10) What words refer to people and vehicles traveling on a road?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na mense en voertuie reis op &#39;n pad?
traffic|verkeer
