Working with metal|Werk met metaal
Use this domain for words related to working with metal. Answer each question below for each kind of smith.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die werk met metaal. Beantwoord onder elke vraag vir elke soort Smith.
(1) What is a person called who works with metal?|(1) Wat is &#39;n persoon genoem wat werk met metaal?
smith, blacksmith (iron), goldsmith, silversmith, tinsmith, tinker, jeweler, welder|Smith, smid (yster), goudsmid, silwersmid, tinnegieter, geknoei, juwelier, sweiser
(2) What does a blacksmith do?|(2) Wat doen &#39;n smid te doen?
work with (iron), forge, cast, shape, mold, heat, melt, weld, solder, hammer, work the bellows, hit with hammer, beat, plate|werk met (yster), bewerk, cast, vorm, vorm, hitte, smelt, sweis, soldeersel, hamer, werk die blaasbalk, tref met hamer, klop, plaat
(3) What raw materials does a blacksmith use?|(3) Wat grondstowwe nie &#39;n smid gebruik?
ore, iron, steel, metal, solder, scrap metal|erts, yster, staal, metaal, soldeersel, skrootmetaal
(4) What does a blacksmith make?|(4) Wat &#39;n smid te maak?
metal work, jewelry|metaal werk, juweliersware
(5) What tools does a blacksmith use?|(5) Watter gereedskap het &#39;n smid gebruik?
hammer, anvil, tongs, forge, furnace, bellows|hamer, aambeeld, tang, bewerk, oond, blaasbalk
(6) What words refer to a place where people work with metal?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar mense werk met metaal?
blacksmith shop, foundry, steelworks|smid winkel, gietery, staalwerke
(7) What words refer to a piece of metal?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n stuk metaal?
nugget, bar, rod, ingot, wire|nugget, bar, staaf, staaf, draad

saw (n), saw kerf, saw horse, plane (n), hammer (n), nail (n), chisel (n), mortise and tenon, screwdriver, screw (n), sawhorse|gesien (n), sien kerf, sien perd vliegtuig (n), hamer (n), spyker (n), beitel (n), tap en tap, skroewedraaier, skroef (n), sawhorse
(5) Where does a carpenter work?|(5) Waar kom &#39;n timmerman werk?
carpentry shop|skrynwerkery
Lumbering|Lomp

(2) What activities are involved in lumbering?|(2) Watter aktiwiteite betrokke is in lomp?
harvest lumber, cut down, chop down, to log, wood cutting, clear cut, fell a tree|oes hout, af te sny, kap, aan te meld, hout sny, duidelike sny, het &#39;n boom
(3) What words refer to a person involved in lumbering?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat betrokke is in Hakken?
lumberjack, woodcutter|houthakker, houtkapper

(5) What are the products of lumbering?|(5) Wat is die produkte van lomp?
timber, log|hout, log
(6) What tools are used in lumbering?|(6) Watter gereedskap word gebruik in lomp?
saw, ax, logging truck|saag, byl, meld vragmotor

Conveying water|Om water

(5) What words refer to canals used to convey water?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na kanale gebruik word om water?
canal, aqueduct, ditch|kanaal, akwaduk, sloot
(6) What means are used to raise water?|(6) Wat beteken word gebruik om water in te samel?
windmill, pump, pump house, pumping station, lock|windpomp, pomp, pomp huis, pomp stasie, slot
(7) What containers are used to hold water?|(7) Wat houers word gebruik om water te hou?
cistern, bucket, pitcher|put, emmer, kruik
(8) What words refer to making water flow through a pipe?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van water vloei deur &#39;n pyp?
pump, siphon, suck, suction|pomp, sifon, suig, suig

Tool|Tool
Use this domain for general words for tools and machines. The domains in this section should be used for general tools and machines that are used in a variety of tasks. Specialized tools and machines should be classified under the specific work or activity for which they are used.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir gereedskap en masjiene. Die domeine in hierdie afdeling moet gebruik word vir algemene gereedskap en masjiene wat gebruik word in &#39;n verskeidenheid van take. Gespesialiseerde gereedskap en masjiene geklassifiseer moet word onder die spesifieke werk of aktiwiteit waarvoor dit gebruik word.
(1) What general words refer to tools?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na gereedskap?
tool, implement, utensil, device, instrument, gadget, hardware, paraphernalia,|instrument, gereedskap, werktuig, apparaat, instrument, gadget, hardeware, paraphernalia,
(2) What words refer to a set of tools?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stel gereedskap?
kit, tool kit|kit, tool kit
(3) What words refer to a container for tools?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n houer vir gereedskap?
toolbox, tool cabinet|toolbox, gereedskap kas
(4) What tools are used for climbing?|(4) Watter gereedskap word gebruik om in te klim?
ladder, stepladder, rope ladder, rung, step,|leer, trapleer, tou leer, gelui, stap,
(5) What words refer to all the tools and other things you need to do a job?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na al die gereedskap en ander dinge wat jy nodig het om &#39;n werk te doen?
equipment, apparatus, gear, kit, things, stuff, tools,|toerusting, apparaat, rat, kit, dinge, dinge, gereedskap,

Holding tool|Hou instrument
Use this domain for words related to holding tools--tools used to grip and hold things so that they don't move, and tools used to hold things that you can't hold with your hand, such as very hot things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die hou van gereedskap - gereedskap wat gebruik word om greep en dinge hou sodat hulle nie beweeg nie, en gereedskap wat gebruik word om die dinge wat jy nie kan hou met jou hand, soos baie warm dinge te hou.
(1) What tools are used for holding things?|(1) Watter gereedskap word gebruik vir die hou van dinge?
clamp, vise, pliers, tongs, tweezers, hot pad,|klem, vise, tang, tang, tweezers, warm pad,
Container|Houer
Use this domain for words related to containers.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met houers.
(1) What words refer to a container?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n houer?
container, vessel, bowl, pot, receptacle, bottle, box, crate, barrel, bucket, can, case, suitcase, chest, chamber pot,|houer, vaartuig, bak, pot, houer, bottel, boks, krat, vat, emmer, kan, geval, tas, bors, kamer pot,
contain, hold, carry|bevat, hou, dra
(3) What words refer to what is in a container?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n houer?
contents|inhoud
(4) What words refer to the parts of a container?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n houer?
lid, lip, neck|deksel, lip, nek

Parts of tools|Dele van gereedskap
Use this domain for words referring to parts of tools and machines. You need to think of different tools and machines, and think of each part.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na dele van gereedskap en masjiene. Jy moet dink van verskillende gereedskap en masjiene, en dink van elke deel.
(1) What words refer to parts of tools?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dele van gereedskap?
shaft, head, gear, lever, fulcrum, switch, key, spring|skag, kop, rat, hefboom, steunpunt, skakel, sleutel, lente
(2) What are the parts of a knife?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n mes?
handle, hilt, guard, blade, edge, tip, back, flat|hanteer, hef, wag, lem, rand, tip, terug, plat
(3) What are the parts of a hammer?|(3) Wat is die dele van &#39;n hamer?
handle, neck, head, claw|handvatsel, nek, kop, klou
(4) What are the parts of a saw?|(4) Wat is die dele van &#39;n saag?
handle, blade, teeth|handvatsel, lem, tande
Machine|Masjien
Use this domain for words referring to machines.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na masjiene.
(1) What words refer to machines?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na masjiene?
machine, mechanics, machinery, apparatus, engine, motor|masjien, meganika, masjinerie, toerusting, enjin, motor
(2) What words refer to types of machines?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na tipes masjiene?
pump, generator, grinder, mill, computer,|pomp, kragopwekker, grinder, meul, rekenaar,
(3) What words refer to machines used in homes?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na masjiene wat in huise?
appliance, refrigerator, stove, oven|apparaat, yskas, stoof, oond
(4) What words refer to when a machine is working?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer &#39;n masjien werk?
be on, run, operate, work|op, hardloop, werk, werk
(5) What words refer to when a machine is not working?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer &#39;n masjien nie werk nie?
be off, break down, broken|word af, af te breek, gebroke
(6) What words refer to starting a machine?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die begin van &#39;n masjien?
start, turn on, switch on, ignition|begin, draai op, skakel, ontsteking
(7) What words refer to stopping a machine?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n masjien te stop?
stop, turn off, shut down|stop, draai af, gesluit

Rich|Rich
Use this domain for words related to being rich.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat ryk.
(1) What words refer to being rich?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat ryk?
be wealthy, be rich, rich person, the rich, the wealth, the upper class, live comfortable, be well-off, well-to-do|wees ryk, ryk, ryk persoon, die rykes, die rykdom, die boonste klas, woon gemaklik, goed-off, goed to-do
(2) What words describe someone who is rich?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat ryk is beskryf?
rich, wealthy, affluent, prosperous, well-off, privileged,|ryk, ryk, welvarende, welvarende, goed-off, bevoorregte,
(3) What words describe someone who is very rich?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat baie ryk beskryf?
fabulous wealth, filthy rich, millionaire, billionaire|fantastiese rykdom, vuil ryk, miljoenêr, miljardêr
(4) What words refer to someone who has enough but is not rich or poor?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat genoeg het, maar is nie ryk of arm?
middle class, bourgeois|middelklas, bourgeois
Poor|Swak
Use this domain for words related to being poor.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die armes.
(1) What words refer to being poor?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die armes?
be poor, be below the poverty line, hardship case|arm, wees onder die broodlyn, swaarkry geval
(2) What words describe someone who is poor?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat swak beskryf?
poor (person, man), destitute (person), needy, bankrupt, broke, needy, underprivileged, impoverished,|swak (persoon, man), behoeftige (persoon), behoeftige, bankrot, gebreek, behoeftige, minderbevoorregte, verarmde,
(3) What words are used for very bad poverty?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik vir baie slegte armoede?
destitute, abject poverty, owns nothing but the clothes on his back|behoeftige, volslae armoede, besit niks behalwe die klere op sy rug
(4) What words refer to the condition of being poor?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die toestand van die armes?
poverty,|armoede,
(5) What is a poor person called?|(5) Wat is &#39;n arm persoon genoem?
poor person, tramp, bum, hobo, beggar, homeless person|arm persoon, boemelaar, boud, hobo, bedelaar, hawelose persoon
(6) What are poor people called?|(6) Wat is die arm mense genoem?
the poor, the homeless, the destitute|die armes, die haweloses, die behoeftige

(3) What is stored wealth called?|(3) Wat word gestoor rykdom genoem?
wealth, savings, investments|rykdom, spaar, beleggings

Collect|Versamel
Use this domain for words related to collecting things you find interesting. In some cultures people collect rare or valuable things that they think are attractive or interesting, such as art, stamps, coins, books, or antiques.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die invordering van die dinge wat jy interessant vind. In sommige kulture mense versamel skaars of waardevolle dinge wat hulle dink is aantreklik of interessant, soos kuns, seëls, munte, boeke, of antiek.
(1) What words refer to collecting things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die versameling van dinge?
collect, acquire,|versamel, te verkry,
(2) What words refer to someone who collects things?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat dinge versamel?
collector,|versamelaar,
(3) What words refer to things that someone has collected?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na dinge wat iemand ingesamel?
collection, set,|versameling, stel,

(3) What words refer to earning enough to pay for what you need?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na verdien genoeg om te betaal vir wat jy nodig het?
earn a living, make a living, support yourself, earn your keep,|&#39;n inkomste verdien, maak &#39;n lewende, ondersteun jouself, verdien jou hou,
(4) What words refer to earning a lot of money?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na verdien &#39;n klomp geld?
make good money, be highly paid, be well paid, make a fortune, rake it in,|maak goeie geld, word hoogs betaalde, word goed betaal, maak &#39;n fortuin, hark dit in,
(5) What words refer to the money you earn?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die geld wat jy verdien?
pay, salary, wages, earnings, income, wage,|betaal, salaris, lone, verdienste, inkomste, loon,
(6) What words refer to someone who earns money?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat geld verdien?
the breadwinner, wage-earner, salaried, on a salary,|die broodwinner, loon-verdiener, salaristrekkers, op &#39;n salaris,

Give, donate|Gee, skenk
Use this domain for words referring to giving something to someone, in which there is a transference of ownership.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na om iets aan iemand, waarin daar &#39;n oordrag van eienaarskap.
(1) What words refer to giving something to someone?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om iets aan iemand?
give, give away, donate, let someone have, offer, spare,|gee, gee weg, skenk, laat iemand het, aanbod, spaar,
(2) What words refer to officially giving something to someone?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na amptelik iets vir iemand te gee?
allocate, allot, award, confer, grant, present,|toeken, toeken, toekenning, verleen, toe te staan, teenwoordig is,
(3) What words refer to giving something to poor people?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na om iets aan arm mense?
give, give away, donate, go to, make a donation, subscribe to,|gee, gee weg, skenk, gaan na, maak &#39;n skenking, onderskryf,
(4) What words refer to giving many things to someone?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gee van baie dinge om iemand?
be generous, lavish something on, shower,|wees vrygewig, uitbundige iets, stort,
(5) What words refer to someone who gives?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat gee?
giver, benefactor, donor, philanthropist,|gewer, weldoener, skenker, filantroop,
(6) What words refer to something that is given?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gegee word?
gift, present, prize, reward,|geskenk, teenwoordig is, prys, beloning,
(7) What words refer to something that is given to poor people?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat gegee word aan arm mense?
charity, donation, handout,|liefdadigheid, skenking, opdragstuk,

Hire, rent|Huur, huur
Use this domain for words related to hiring or renting something--to pay money so that you can use something that belongs to someone else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die huur of verhuur iets - om geld te betaal sodat jy iets wat aan iemand anders behoort kan gebruik.

Spend|Spandeer
Use this domain for words related to spending money.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die besteding van geld.
(1) What words refer to spending money?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die besteding van geld?
spend, pay, give|spandeer, betaal, gee
(2) What words refer to spending lots of money?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na spandeer baie geld?
spend a lot, go to great expense, spare no expense, shell out, go through, eat up|spandeer baie, gaan na groot koste, spaar geen koste, dop uit, gaan deur, eet
(3) What words refer to spending money carelessly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die besteding van geld roekeloos?
squander, blow, waste, scatter|vermorsing, blaas, afval, strooi
(4) What words describe someone who spends lots of money carelessly?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat baie geld roekeloos spandeer?
extravagant, spendthrift, big spender|buitensporig, spandabelrige, groot verkwister
(5) What words refer to not spending a lot of money?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na nie spandeer baie geld?
economize, scrimp and save, budget, tighten your belt, live on a shoestring|spaar, karig en red, begroting, toeneem jou gordel, woon op &#39;n spot
(6) What words describe someone who does not spend a lot of money?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat &#39;n klomp geld nie bestee?
thrifty, economical, frugal, careful with your money|voorspoedig, ekonomiese, sober, versigtig met jou geld
(7) What words describe how much you spend?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf hoeveel jy spandeer?
expenses, expenditure, spending, outlay, overhead, costs, budget|uitgawes, uitgawes, uitgawes, uitleg, oorhoofse, koste, begroting
Store, marketplace|Winkel, mark
Use this domain for words related to a store or marketplace where things are sold.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n winkel of mark waar dinge verkoop word.
(1) What words refer to a place where things are sold?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar dinge verkoop word?
marketplace, market (n), stall, booth, store, salesroom|mark, die mark (n), stalletjie, hokkie, winkel, verkope huis
(2) What words refer to a person who sells things?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat dinge verkoop?

(2) What words refer to stealing something that is not very valuable?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die steel van iets wat nie baie waardevol?

(5) What words refer to stealing money from your job?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die steel van geld uit jou werk?

(6) What words refer to stealing a vehicle?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die steel van &#39;n voertuig?

(7) What do robbers do in order to steal things?|(7) Wat doen rowers te doen om dinge te steel?
break in, break down the door, case a joint, crack a safe, pick a lock,|breek in, die deur afbreek, geval &#39;n gesamentlike, kraak &#39;n veilige, pluk &#39;n slot,
(8) What words refer to the crime of stealing?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die misdaad van diefstal?
stealing, burglary, larceny, robbery, shoplifting, theft,|steel, inbraak, diefstal, roof, diefstal, diefstal,
(9) What words refer to the act of stealing?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die daad van diefstal?
banditry, break-in, breaking and entering, embezzlement, hold-up, jewel heist, job, misappropriation, mugging, purse snatching, pick pocketing, pilferage, pilfering, racketeering, raid, robbery, snatch, stick-up, theft,|misdadigheid, breek in, inbraak en betreding, verduistering, hou-up, juweel heist, werk, wanbesteding, agressie, beursie ruk, pluk pocketing, diefstal, stelery, afpersing, aanval, roof, ruk, hou-up, diefstal,
(10) What words refer to a person who steals?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat steel?
bandit, burglar, cutpurse, embezzler, gangster, highwayman, hijacker, kleptomaniac, mugger, pickpocket, pilferer, pirate, plunderer, purse-snatcher, robber, bank robber, train robber, shoplifter, stealer, thief, jewel thief,|bandiet, diefwering, cutpurse, verduisteraar, gangster, struikrower, kaper, kleptomaan, luik, sakkeroller, gapper, seerower, plunderaar, beursie-Snatcher, rower bank rower, trein rower winkeldief, Stealer, dief, juweel dief,
(11) What words describe someone who steals?|(11) Watter woorde iemand wat steel beskryf?
light-fingered, thieving,|lig-vinger, diefstal,
(12) What words refer to something that is stolen?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gesteel?
loot, the goods, stolen goods, haul, hot items, tainted money|buit, die goedere, gesteelde goedere, afstand, warm items, besmette geld
(13) What words describe something that is stolen?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat gesteel?
hot, pirated, stolen,|warm, roof, diefstal,
(14) What do robbers do with the things they steal?|(14) Wat doen rowers doen met die dinge wat hulle steel?
fence stolen goods, launder money, bury treasure|heining gesteelde goedere, wit geld, begrawe skat
(15) What tools are used by robbers?|(15) Watter gereedskap word gebruik deur rowers?

Economics|Ekonomie
Use this domain for words related to economics--the study of the money, trade, and industry of a country.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die ekonomie - die studie van die geld, handel, en die bedryf van &#39;n land.
(1) What words refer to the study of money and wealth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die studie van geld en rykdom?

(2) What words refer to the economic system of a country?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die ekonomiese stelsel van &#39;n land?

(3) What words refer to a person who studies the economy?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat die ekonomie bestudeer?

(4) What words refer to different kinds of economic systems?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na verskillende vorme van ekonomiese stelsels?
capitalism, capitalist, socialism, socialist, communism, communist, free enterprise, private enterprise, free-market economy|kapitalisme, kapitalistiese, sosialisme, sosialistiese, kommunisme, kommunistiese, vrye onderneming, private onderneming, vryemark-ekonomie
(5) What words refer to how much money a country has?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na hoeveel geld &#39;n land?
gross national product|bruto nasionale produk
(6) What words describe a good economy?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n goeie ekonomie?
boom, prosper, prosperous, prosperity, bull market|boom, voorspoedig, welvarende, voorspoed, bulmark
(7) What words describe a bad economy?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n slegte ekonomie?
depression, recession, inflation, crash, slump, bear market|depressie, resessie, inflasie, crash, insinking, beermark

Physical actions|Fisiese aksies
Use this domain for general words for physical actions--moving yourself, moving things, and changing things.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir fisiese aksies - jouself beweeg, beweeg dinge, en dinge verander.
(1) What general words refer to physical actions?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na fisiese aksies?
act, action, active, activity, do, event, process|Wet, aksie, aktief, aktiwiteit, doen, gebeurtenis, proses
Posture|Postuur
Use this domain for general words indicating the posture or stance of a person's body. Use the domains in this section for specific words for postures and for moving parts of the body. Many of these words have two meanings. One meaning is stative, indicating that the body is in a particular posture, but not moving. The other meaning is active, indicating that the person is moving his body into a particular posture. Some of these words can be used of animals or even things, if the things are perceived as being similar in posture to that of a human body.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat die postuur of houding van die liggaam van die mens. Gebruik die domeine in hierdie afdeling vir spesifieke woorde vir posisies en bewegende dele van die liggaam. Baie van hierdie woorde het twee betekenisse. Een betekenis is statiewe, wat aandui dat die liggaam is in &#39;n bepaalde houding, maar nie beweeg nie. Die ander betekenis aktief is, wat aandui dat die persoon wat sy liggaam in &#39;n bepaalde houding. Sommige van hierdie woorde kan gebruik word van die diere of selfs dinge, indien die dinge beskou as soortgelyk in postuur aan dié van &#39;n menslike liggaam.
(1) What general words refer to a person's posture?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se houding?
posture, stance, pose, position|postuur, houding, inhou, posisie
(2) What general words refer to changing your posture?|(2) Wat is die algemene woorde verwys na die verandering van jou postuur?
change your posture/stance, pose, shift, squirm|verander jou postuur / houding, inhou, verskuiwing, wriemel
Stand|Staan
Use this domain for words related to standing. The words in this domain may include whether the person is standing on one foot or two, whether the person's feet are together or placed apart, whether something is between the person's feet, how fast the person stands up.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met staande. Die woorde in hierdie domein kan insluit of die persoon staan ​​op een voet of twee, of die voete van die persoon se saam of geplaas uitmekaar, of iets tussen die voete van die persoon se, hoe vinnig die persoon staan.
(1) What words refer to being in a standing position?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n staande posisie?
stand, be standing, be on your feet|staan, staan, op jou voete
(2) What words refer to standing up from a sitting or lying position?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na staan ​​van &#39;n sitting of lê posisie?
stand, stand up, rise (to your feet), get up, get to your feet, jump to your feet, leap up, leap out of the chair, pick yourself up|staan, staan ​​op, staan ​​(om jou voete), opstaan, kry om jou voete, spring na jou voete, spring, spring uit die stoel, haal jouself
(3) How do people stand?|(3) Hoe mense staan?
stand on one leg, straddle, stand on tiptoes|staan ​​op een been, Wydsbeen staan ​​op die tone
(4) What words refer to causing someone to stand?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om op te staan?
stand someone up, raise someone to their feet, help someone up|staan ​​iemand op iemand in te samel om hul voete te help om iemand te
(5) What words refer to standing near something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na staan ​​naby iets?
stand around, stand together|staan ​​rond, staan ​​saam
(6) How do you order someone to stand?|(6) Hoe kan jy iemand om op te staan ​​bestel?
on your feet|op jou voete
Sit|Sit
Use this domain for words referring to sitting and squatting.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die vergadering en hurk.
(1) What words refer to being in a sitting position?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n sittende posisie?
be sitting, be seated|sit, sit
(2) What words describe how a person is sitting?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf hoe &#39;n persoon sit?
sit with your legs crossed, sit cross-legged, sit back, settle back, sit up, sit up straight, sit forward, be on the edge of your seat, sit astride, straddle, sit still, sit around, curl up, perch|sit met jou bene gekruis sit kruisbeen sit terug, skik terug, sit, sit regop sit vorentoe, op die rand van jou stoel, sit wydsbeen, Wydsbeen sit nog steeds sit rond, krul, baars
(3) What words refer to sitting down from a standing position?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na sit uit &#39;n staande posisie?
sit, sit down, be seated, take your seat|sit, sit, sit, neem jou sitplek
(4) What words refer to sitting up from a lying position?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die vergadering uit &#39;n lêende posisie?
sit up|sit
(5) What words describe how a person sits down?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf hoe &#39;n persoon sit?
sit slowly, sink (down) into, ease into your chair, lower oneself, sit abruptly, flop down, plunk down, plop down|sit stadig, sink (af) in, gemak in jou stoel, jouself te verlaag, sit skielik, flop af, plof, plop af
(6) What words refer to causing someone to sit?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te sit?
seat someone, show someone to their seat|sitplek iemand wys iemand om hul sitplek
(7) What words refer to squatting?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na plakkery?
squat (down), sit on your haunches, sit back on your heels|hurk (af), sit op jou hurke, sit terug op jou hakke
(8) What words refer to sitting on something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die vergadering op iets?
sit on, mount|sit op, berg
(9) What words refer to the place where you sit?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die plek waar jy sit?
seat, perch, place|sitplek, baars, plek
(10) What do you say to someone when you want them to sit down?|(10) Wat sê jy vir iemand wanneer jy wil hê hulle moet sit?
sit down, take a seat, have a seat, please be seated|sit, neem &#39;n sitplek, het &#39;n sitplek, asseblief sit
Lie down|Lê

lie on your back/front/side, stretched out, spread-eagled, sprawled, flat out, reclining|Lê op jou rug / voor / kant uitgesteek, versprei-eagled, uitgestrek, plat uit, tafel

Kneel|Kniel

(1) What words refer to kneeling down?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na kniel?

be kneeling, be down on your knees|word kniel, wees op jou knieë
Bow|Boog
Use this domain for words referring to bowing to someone--to face someone and lower your head or bend at the waist so that your upper body is lowered. The words in this domain should all be symbolic acts, that is, the culture assigns a meaning and significance to the physical action. Some cultures define it as a greeting, as an act of respect, or as an act of submission. For instance in ancient middle eastern culture bowing was an act of submission done in the presence of the king. Failure to bow was an act of rebellion punishable by death. In far eastern culture it is a greeting. In African culture it is an act of respect or done to welcome a visitor. Cultures define how a person is to bow, for instance how they are to hold their hands. A person may bow while standing, or may kneel, or even prostrate himself flat on his face. Whether both people bow is also significant. The depth of the bow can have significance. In Japan the person of lower social rank must bow deeper. In European culture a performer bows to acknowledge applause.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iemand buig - om iemand in die gesig staar en laer jou kop of buig by die middellyf, sodat jou bolyf verlaag. Die woorde in hierdie domein almal moet simboliese handelinge, dit wil sê, die kultuur ken &#39;n betekenis aan die fisiese aksie. Sommige kulture definieer dit as &#39;n groet, as &#39;n daad van respek, of as &#39;n daad van die voorlegging. Byvoorbeeld in antieke Midde-Oosterse kultuur buig was &#39;n daad van die indiening in die teenwoordigheid van die koning. Versuim om te buig was &#39;n daad van rebellie strafbaar met die dood. In die Verre Oos-kultuur is dit &#39;n groet. In Afrika-kultuur is dit &#39;n daad van respek of gedoen word om &#39;n besoeker te verwelkom. Kulture definieer hoe &#39;n persoon is om te buig, byvoorbeeld hoe hulle hul hande te hou. &#39;N Persoon kan buig terwyl staan, of kan kniel, of selfs uitgestrek homself plat op sy gesig. Of beide mense buig is ook betekenisvol. Die diepte van die boog kan betekenis. In Japan moet die persoon van laer sosiale rang dieper buig. In die Europese kultuur buig &#39;n kunstenaar om applous te erken.
(1) What words refer to bowing?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na buig?
bow, bow down, bow to/before someone|buig, buig, buig voor / iemand
(2) What words describe how a person bows?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf hoe &#39;n persoon buig?
sweeping bow, bow low, deep bow, slight bow, bow your head, his head fell, incline your head, nod, curtsy, genuflect, kowtow, prostrate, grovel|vee boog, buig laag, diep boog, effense boog, boog jou kop, sy kop geval het, neig jou kop, knik, curtsyleer, knielen, verneder, gooi, kruip
(3) What words indicate the significance of the bow?|(3) Watter woorde dui die betekenis van die boog?
obeisance, worship, bow in submission/reverence/greeting|buig, aanbidding, boog in die voorlegging / eerbied / groet
Lean|Lean
Use this domain for words describing a person who is leaning.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat leun.
(1) What words refer to leaning against something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na leun teen iets?
lean, lean on, lean against, lean back, rest against, recline|maer, leun, maer teen, leun terug, rus teen, hellingshoek
(2) What words describe something that is leaning?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat leun beskryf?
leaning, lean forward, lean towards, lean over|leun, leun vorentoe, maer teenoor, leun oor
Straight posture|Reguit postuur
Use this domain for words referring to straight posture--holding your body straight, stiff, or erect, rather than relaxed.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na reguit postuur - hou jou liggaam reguit, styf, of oprig, eerder as ontspanne.

straight posture, stand at attention, stand/sit stiffly, erect|reguit postuur, staan ​​op aandag staan ​​/ sit styf, rig
(2) What words refer to changing your posture so that it is straight?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verandering van jou postuur sodat dit reguit?
straighten up, sit up straight, stand up straight|regop, regop sit, regop staan
Relaxed posture|Ontspanne postuur
Use this domain for words describing a relaxed posture.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n ontspanne postuur.
(1) What words refer to a relaxed posture?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ontspanne postuur?
relaxed (posture), (stand/be) at ease, be a slouch, slouch around, lounge, sprawl, droop, sag, loll|ontspanne (postuur), (stand / wees) op sy gemak, &#39;n slap, slap rondom, sitkamer, uitbreiding, hang, sag, lui hang
(2) What words refer to changing your posture so that it is relaxed?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verandering van jou postuur, sodat dit is ontspanne?
relax (your posture), slouch, lean back, slump|ontspan (jou postuur), slap, leun terug, insinking
Bend down|Buig neer
Use this domain for words referring to bending down--to bend your body so that it is closer to the ground (in order to see something, pick up something, or hide).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na buk - om jou liggaam te buig sodat dit nader aan die grond (om iets te sien, haal iets, of weg te steek).
(1) What words refer to bending down?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na buk?
bend, bend down, bend over, bob, bow, cower, crouch, double up, duck, get down, hunch, hunker down, lean over, scrunch, stoop,|buig, buig, buig oor, bob, boog, bewe, hurk, verdubbel, eend, kom neer, vermoede, ouderwets, leun oor, knauwen, buk,

bent, stooped, hunched over, humpback, crooked,|gebuig, buk, geboë oor, bultrug, krom,
(3) What words refer to straightening up?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na reguit up?
straighten up, rear up|regop, agter up
Move a part of the body|Skuif na &#39;n deel van die liggaam

(5) What words refer to moving your legs?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die beweging van jou bene?
kick, stamp, bend, shake, twist (ankle), cross (your legs), wiggle (toes)|skop, stamp, buig, skud, draai (enkel), kruis (jou bene), wikkel (tone)

(9) What words refer to moving suddenly?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing skielik?
jerk, twitch,|stoot, pyl,
Move|Skuif
Use this domain for intransitive verbs of movement referring to moving your whole body to a different location. There are many components of meaning involved in verbs of movement. They can include a source location (from), a goal location (to), a path (along), manner (walk, run), speed (race, crawl), direction|Gebruik hierdie domein onoorganklike werkwoorde van beweging verwys na die beweging van jou hele liggaam na &#39;n ander plek. Daar is baie komponente van betekenis betrokke in werkwoorde van beweging. Hulle kan ook &#39;n bron plek (uit), &#39;n doel plek (tot), &#39;n pad (saam), wyse (loop, hardloop), spoed (ras, kruip), rigting
(forward, back, side, up, down, toward, away from), shape of the path (straight, curve, circle, angle), relationship to some object or objects (on, hang, against, between, across, through, into, out of, onto, off of, around), proximity (near, far), multiple movements (back and forth, return, bounce), inclusion with other objects or parts of objects (join, leave, collect, disperse, unite, separate), volition (go versus drift), intransitive versus transitive (move versus move something). Some verbs of movement do not involve moving from one place to another, but express bodily movement.|(Vorentoe, terug, side, op, af, in die rigting van, weg van), die vorm van die pad (reguit, kurwe, sirkel, hoek), verhouding tot &#39;n voorwerp of voorwerpe (op, hang, teen tussen, oor, deur, in, uit, op, af van, rond), die nabyheid (naby, ver), verskeie bewegings (heen en weer, terugkeer, weiering), insluiting met ander voorwerpe of dele van voorwerpe (sluit, te verlaat, versamel, versprei, te verenig , aparte), wil (gaan versus drif), onoorganklike versus oorganklike (beweeg versus skuif iets). Sommige werkwoorde van beweging behels nie die beweging van een plek na die ander nie, maar spreek liggaamlike beweging.
(1) What general words refer to moving your body to a different location?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die beweging van jou liggaam na &#39;n ander plek?
move, movement, change position, maneuver, jockey for position, budge|beweeg, beweging, verandering posisie, maneuver, jokkie vir posisie, beweeg
(2) What words refer to beginning to move?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na begin om te beweeg?
stir, make a move|roer, maak &#39;n skuif
(3) What words describe something that is moving?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat beweeg?
moving, be in motion|beweeg, in beweging
Manner of movement|Wyse van beweging
Use this domain for general words referring to the way in which a person moves.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die wyse waarop &#39;n persoon beweeg.
(1) What general words refer to the way in which a person moves?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die wyse waarop &#39;n persoon beweeg?
gait|gang
Walk|Walk
Use this domain for words related to walking--moving slowly using your legs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die loop - beweeg stadig met jou bene.
(1) What general words refer to walking?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na loop?
walk|loop
(2) What words refer to traveling someplace on foot?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na reis iewers voet?
travel by foot, foot it, hoof it, leg it, tramp, strike off on foot|reis deur die voet, voet dit kloue dit been dit, boemelaar, slaan af te voet
(3) What words refer to walking quickly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vinnig loop?
speed walk, step out, stride, pace, rush|spoed loop, stap uit, stride, tempo, stormloop
(4) What words refer to walking slowly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na stadig loop?
walk slowly, stroll, amble, ramble, take a Sunday stroll, meander along, saunter, inch, lumber, plod, poke, slog, toddle, traipse, trudge|loop stadig, loop, Amble, loop, neem &#39;n wandeling Sondag, kronkel saam, slenter, duim, hout, gezwoeg, sak, kragtige slag, kuieren, slons, strompel
(5) What words refer to walking carefully?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na versigtig loop?
walk carefully, watch your step, tread, pick your way, edge|loop versigtig, kyk hoe jou stap, loopvlak, kies jou manier, rand
(6) What words refer to walking quietly or secretly?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na ongemerk loop?
steal along, walk stealthily, sneak, pad, stalk, creep|steel saam, loop sluip, sluip, pad, steel, kruip
(7) What words refer to walking on your toes?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die loop op jou tone?
tiptoe, walk on tiptoes|tone, loop op die tone
(8) What words refer to walking loudly?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na hard loop?

(9) What words refer to walking like a soldier?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na loop soos &#39;n soldaat?
march, parade, goose-step, in step|optog, parade, gans-stap in stap
(10) What words refer to walking in various manners?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na loop in verskeie maniere?
walk with a spring in your step, walk jauntily, swagger, flounce, mince, prance, saunter, strut|loop met &#39;n veer in jou stap, loop vermakerigheid, windmakerig, strook, maalvleis, steigeren, slenter, stut
(11) What words refer to stepping on something?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na versterking op iets?
step on, put foot on/in, tread on, stamp on, underfoot,|stap op, sit voet op / in, trap, stempel op, voete,
(12) What words refer to a single step?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n enkele stap?
step, footstep, pace,|stap, foot, tempo,
(13) What words refer to the length of your step?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die lengte van jou stap?

(14) What words refer to the way in which a person walks?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na die wyse waarop &#39;n persoon loop?
gait, funny gait|gang, snaaks gang
(15) What words refer to measuring the length of something by counting your steps?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na die lengte van iets deur jou treë tel?
pace off|tempo af
(16) What words refer to someone who walks?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat loop?
walker, hiker, tramp, pedestrian, passer-by|Walker, stapper, boemelaar, voetganger, verbyganger
(17) What words refer to a place where a person walks?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar &#39;n persoon loop?

(18) What words refer to a mark on the ground left by a person's foot?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n punt op die grond gelaat word deur &#39;n persoon se voet?
footprint|voetspoor
(19) What words refer to the effect of walking on something?|(19) Watter woorde verwys na die effek van die loop op iets?
trample, wear a path|vertrap, dra &#39;n pad
(20) What words refer to the sound of someone walking?|(20) Watter woorde verwys na die geluid van iemand loop?
footsteps|voetspore
(21) What words refer to walking through water?|(21) Watter woorde verwys na loop deur water?
wade, paddle, slosh|Wade, paddle, smeren
(22) What words refer to a time when people walk for fun?|(22) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd wanneer mense loop vir die pret?
go for a walk, take a walk, go for a stroll, parade, procession, stretch your legs, hike, go hiking, trek, walk around|gaan vir &#39;n loop, neem &#39;n loop, gaan vir &#39;n wandeling, parade, optog, rek jou bene, stap, gaan stap, trek, rond te loop
(23) What words refer to causing someone to walk?|(23) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te loop?
take someone for a walk, walk the dog|Neem iemand vir &#39;n loop, loop die hond
(24) What words refer to a walking stick?|(24) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kierie?
walking stick, cane, crutch|kierie, kierie, kruk
Run|Run
Use this domain for words referring to running--moving fast on your legs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na hardloop - beweeg vinnig op jou bene.
(1) What general words refer to running?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na hardloop?
run|run
(2) What words refer to running slowly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na stadig loop?
trot, canter, jog, lope|draf, galop, draf, lope
(3) What words refer to running quickly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vinnig hardloop?
race, gallop, dash, make a dash, tear (along), streak, double time, sprint, charge, dart, scurry, scuttle, scamper, scoot, stampede, bound, bolt|ras, galop, stamp nie, maak &#39;n bietjie, traan (saam), streep, dubbel tyd sprint, lading, pyl, skarrel, luikgat, galop, gejaag, stormloop, gebind, bolt
(4) What words refer to how fast you are running?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na hoe vinnig jy loop?
pace|tempo
(5) What words refer to beginning to run?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na begin om te hardloop?
break into a run, set off on a run|breek in &#39;n run, verreken op &#39;n lopie
(6) What words refer to running faster?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na hardloop vinniger?
speed up, put on a spurt, kick|bespoedig, sit op &#39;n gulp, skop
(7) What words refer to a race?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n wedloop?
race, dash, marathon, long/short distance race, racecourse|ras, stamp nie, marathon, lank / kort afstand ras, renbaan
(8) What words refer to being in pain because of running?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na wat in pyn as gevolg van die bestuur?
be out of breath, be winded, have a stitch (in your side)|wees uitasem wees asem, het &#39;n steek (in jou kant)
Crawl|Crawl
Use this domain for words referring to crawling--moving on your hands and knees or on your stomach.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na kruip - beweeg op jou hande en knieë of op jou maag.
(1) What words refer to crawling?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na kruip?
crawl, walk on your hand and knees, on all fours, scoot, drag, creep|crawl, loop op jou hand en knieë, handeviervoet, gejaag, sleep, kruip
Jump|Spring
Use this domain for words referring to jumping--moving your body off the ground by pushing hard with your legs.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na spring - die beweging van jou liggaam van die grond af deur hard te druk met jou bene.
(1) What words refer to jumping up and down in one place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na spring op en af ​​in een plek?
jump, jump up and down, bounce, leap, buck, bob, jump for joy|spring, spring op en af, weiering, spring, bok, bob, spring van vreugde
(2) What words refer to jumping from one place to another place?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na spring van een plek na &#39;n ander plek?
jump up/down/off of/onto/out of the way, bound, spring, pounce, dive, jump overboard, somersault|spring op / af / af van / op / uit die pad, gebind, lente, bespring, duik, spring oorboord, duikelen
(3) What words refer to jumping over something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na spring oor iets?
jump over, leap over, vault over, hurdle, clear, leapfrog|spring oor, spring oor, kluis oor, hindernis, duidelik, Leapfrog
(4) What words refer to jumping on one leg?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na spring op een been?
hop, hop on one leg, hop around, skip,|hop, hop op een been, hop rond, slaan,
(5) What games involve jumping?|(5) Wat behels speletjies spring?
hopscotch, leap frog, gymnastics, high jump, broad jump, pole vault, bungee jumping, sky diving, parachuting|eenbeentjie, sprong padda, gimnastiek, hoogspring, breë spring, paalspring, rekspring, lug duik, valskermspring
(6) What things are used to help people jump?|(6) Watter dinge gebruik word om mense te help spring?
skipping rope, trampoline, pogo stick, springboard, parachute|springtou, trampolien, pogo stick, springplank, valskerm
Move quickly|Vinnig beweeg
Use this domain for words referring to moving quickly or slowly.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na vinnig of stadig beweeg.
(1) What words refer to moving quickly?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vinnig beweeg?
move quickly, hurry, haste, hasten, rush, forge ahead, charge, barrel along, move like a bat out of hell, make a beeline for, boil, bolt, bustle, move along at a good clip, dart, double-time, fast, fire, flash, flat-out, fling, flit, fly, gallop, move like greased lightning, be really hopping, kick, lickety-split, plunge in, quick, race, rapid, rapidly, rapidity, run, rush, sail, scour, scud, shoot, move like sixty, skim, snappily, speed, stampede, streak, sweep, swift, swiftly, swing, tear, apace, tilt, vroom, whiz, wildfire, zip, zoom, at full speed, at top speed, express, make tracks, burn up the track|vinnig beweeg, maak gou, hardloop, gou, haastig, vooruit, lading, vat saam, beweeg soos &#39;n vlermuis uit die hel, maak &#39;n reguit lyn vir, kook, bout, druk, beweeg teen &#39;n goeie clip, pyl, dubbel-time , vinnig, vuur, flits, plat-out, ruk, vlieg, vlieg, galop, beweeg soos gesmeerde weerlig, word werklik hop, skop, lickety-split, duik in, vinnige, ras, vinnige, vinnig, spoed, hardloop, jaag , seil, skure, Scud, skiet, beweeg soos sestig, afgeroomde, snappily, spoed, stormloop, streep, sweep, vinnige, vinnig, swaai, traan, nader, kantel, vroom, gefluit, &#39;n veldbrand, rits, zoom, op volle spoed , op top spoed, uit te druk, maak spore, verbrand die baan
(2) What words refer to moving more quickly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na vinniger te beweeg?
hurry up, speed up, pick up speed, increase your speed, accelerate, acceleration, (its) speed rose, step on it, step it up, snap it up, pick up the pace, give it some gas, look lively, quicken|opskud, bespoedig, af te haal spoed, verhoog jou spoed, versnel, versnelling, (sy) spoed het, stap op dit, stap dit op, snap dit, haal die tempo, gee dit &#39;n gas, kyk lewendige, lewend
(3) What words refer to continuing to move without trying to speed up or slow down?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na voortgesette om te beweeg sonder om te probeer om te bespoedig of vertraag?
coast, glide, float|kus, gly, float
(4) What words refer to how fast something is moving?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na hoe vinnig iets beweeg?
speed, pace, rate|spoed, tempo, tempo
(5) What words refer to moving quickly for a short time?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na vinnig beweeg vir &#39;n kort tyd?
jerk, twitch, start, spasm, jump, snap, nip in, shoot, spurt, dash|stoot, pyl, begin, spasma, spring, snap, smoor in, skiet, gulp, streep
(6) What idiophones are used of moving quickly?|(6) Wat ideofone word vinnig beweeg?
zip, zoom, whiz, vroom, chop chop|rits, zoom, gefluit, vroom, kap kap
Move slowly|Stadig beweeg
Use this domain for words referring to moving slowly.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na stadig beweeg.
(1) What words refer to moving slowly?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na stadig beweeg?
crawl, move at a snail's pace, creep along, inch forward, poke along, slowpoke, drag, mosey along, slow motion, plod, dawdle|crawl, beweeg teen &#39;n slakkepas, kruip saam, duim vorentoe, steek saam, slowpokeleer, sleep, rond hang, slow motion, gezwoeg, talm
(2) What words refer to moving more slowly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na stadiger beweeg?
slow down, slow up, decelerate, coast to a stop, (its) speed fell, ease off, reduce your speed, decrease your speed, come to a stop|vertraag, stadig op, verlangsaam, kus na &#39;n stop, (sy) spoed het, gemak af, jou spoed te verminder, jou spoed te verminder, kom tot &#39;n stop
(3) What do you say to someone when you want him to slow down?|(3) Wat sê jy vir iemand wanneer jy wil hom om stadiger?
Slow down! Whoa! (horse) Wait, wait! Wait for me! Wait a minute! Can we slow down?|Stadiger! Whoa! (Perd) Wag, wag! Wag vir my! Wag &#39;n minuut! Kan ons stadiger?
(4) What idiophones are used of moving slowly?|(4) Wat idiofone gebruik van stadig beweeg?
chug|chug
Wander|Wander

Walk with difficulty|Loop met moeite
Use this domain for words referring to walking with some difficulty such as stumbling--to miss your step because of hitting an object such as a stone, hole, or mud; staggering--to walk unsteadily because of weakness, illness, or drunkenness; or limping--to walk unevenly or with difficulty because of injury to a foot.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na loop met &#39;n paar probleme soos struikeling - om jou stap as gevolg van &#39;n voorwerp tref soos &#39;n klip, &#39;n gat of modder mis; verbysterende - om te loop onvas gevolg van swakheid, siekte, of dronkenskap; of mank - om oneweredig of met moeite as gevolg van &#39;n besering aan &#39;n voet loop.
(1) What words refer to stumbling?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na struikeling?
stumble, trip, trip and fall, slip|struikel, reis, reis en val, glip
(2) What words refer to causing someone to stumble?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak struikel?
trip someone|trip iemand
(3) What words refer to staggering?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na verbysterende?
stagger, weave back and forth, reel, lurch|waggel, weef heen en weer, reel, steek
(4) What words refer to limping?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na mank?
limp, hobble, shamble, shuffle, walk haltingly, walk with a cane, use crutches, get around|slap, hink, geslof, shuffle, loop hortend, loop met &#39;n kierie gebruik krukke, kry om
(5) What words describe someone who cannot walk well?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie goed kan loop?
lame, disabled|lam, gestremdes
(6) What things do people use to help them walk?|(6) Wat dinge wat mense gebruik om hulle te help loop?
walker, cane, crutch, walking stick, wheelchair|Walker, rottang, kruk, kierie, rolstoel

slip, slide, glide, coast, skim, skate|wegsink gly, kus, afgeroomde, skate
(2) What words describe a surface that something can easily slip on?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n oppervlak wat iets kan maklik gly?
slippery,|gladde,
Steady, unsteady|Bestendige, onvas
Use this domain for words that refer to balancing yourself or something--when someone or something is able stand or move without falling.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na die balansering jouself of iets - wanneer iemand of iets in staat is om &#39;n staanplek of skuif sonder om te val.
(1) What words describe something that can move?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat kan beweeg beskryf?
movable, mobile, mobility, portable, loose, fluid, free,|roerende, selfoon, mobiliteit, draagbare, los, vloeistof, gratis,
(2) What words describe something that cannot move?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat nie kan beweeg beskryf?
fixed, immovable, stuck, jammed, stiff, won't budge, can't budge something, can't move, immobile, paralyzed, stranded, entangled, caught, bound, permanent, rooted, entrenched, established, settled, set,|vaste, onbeweeglik, vas, vasgesteek, styf, sal nie beweeg, kan nie iets beweeg, kan nie beweeg nie, onbeweeglik, verlam, gestrand, verstrengel, gevang, gebind, permanente, gewortel, verskans, gestig, vereffen, stel,
(3) What words describe something that is easy to move?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat maklik is om te beweeg beskryf?
unsteady, shaky, easily moved, unstable, unsettled, rickety, tottering, wobbly|wispelturig, wankelrige, maklik geskuif, onstabiele, onafgehandelde, lendelam, swik, wiebelend
(4) What words describe something that is difficult to move?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat moeilik is om te beweeg beskryf?
steady, firm, stable,|bestendige, ferm, stabiele,
Balance|Balans
(1) What words refer to balancing yourself?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die balansering jouself?
balance, keep your balance,|balanseer, hou jou balans,
(2) What words refer to balancing something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die balansering iets?
balance something, steady something,|balanseer iets, bestendige iets,
(3) What words refer to the ability to balance yourself?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die vermoë om jouself te balanseer?
balance (n),|balans (n),
(4) What words refer to losing your balance?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die verlies van jou balans?
lose your balance, totter,|verloor jou balans, waggeling,
(5) What words describe something that is balanced?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat gebalanseerde beskryf?
steady, poised,|bestendige, gereed,
(6) What words describe something that is not balanced?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat nie gebalanseer beskryf?
unsteady, unstable, precarious,|wispelturig, onstabiel, onseker,
(7) What words refer to feeling like you are going to fall?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel soos jy gaan om te val?
dizzy, giddy, vertigo, dizziness, someone's head is swimming,|duiselig, draaierig, vertigo, duiseligheid, iemand se kop is swem,
Move noisily|Beweeg luidrugtig

bang, buzz, chug, clack, clang, clank, clatter, click, clink, clump, clunk, crackle, crash, creak, crunch, fizz, gurgle, hiss, howl, patter, ping, purr, putter, roar, rumble, rustle, screech, splash, splutter, squelch, swish, thud, thump, thunder, wheeze, whine, whir, zing|bang, buzz, chug, gesnap, klang, Clank, gekletter, kliek, klink, bos, clunk, geknetter, crash, kraak, verlief, fizz, roggel, spot, huil, getrippel, ping, purr, putter, brul, rommel, geritsel, skree, splash, dispuut, smak, swish, slag, doef, donderweer, hijgen, geteem, gegons, Zing
Move in a direction|Beweeg in &#39;n rigting
Use the domains in this section for words referring to moving in a direction related to the orientation of the person's body (not in relation to the position of the destination).|Gebruik die domeine in hierdie artikel vir woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n rigting wat verband hou met die oriëntasie van die persoon se liggaam (nie in verhouding tot die posisie van die bestemming).
(1) What general words refer to moving in a direction?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n rigting?
head (in a direction), go (in a direction)|hoof (in &#39;n rigting), gaan (in &#39;n rigting)
(2) What words refer to the direction in which a person is moving?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die rigting waarin &#39;n persoon beweeg?
direction, heading, way, course|rigting, opskrif, manier, natuurlik
Move forward|Vorentoe beweeg
Use this domain for words referring to moving in a forward direction--in the same direction the person is facing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n voorwaartse rigting - in dieselfde rigting as die persoon in die gesig staar.
(1) What words refer to moving forward?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na vorentoe beweeg?
move forward, advance, move ahead, go ahead|vorentoe beweeg, te bevorder, te beweeg vooruit, gaan voort
Move back|Beweeg terug
Use this domain for words referring to moving in a backward direction--the person is facing one direction, but moving toward their back--to move in the opposite direction from the direction the person is facing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n agterlike rigting - die persoon in die gesig staar &#39;n rigting, maar beweeg na hul rug - om te beweeg in die teenoorgestelde rigting van die rigting waarin die persoon in die gesig staar.
(1) What words refer to moving backwards while still facing forward?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na terug beweeg, terwyl hy nog vorentoe?
move back, back up, move backwards, move in reverse|beweeg terug, terug, agteruit beweeg, beweeg in reverse
Move sideways|Beweeg sywaarts
Use this domain for words referring to moving in a sideways direction--the person is facing one direction, but moving toward their side.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n sywaartse rigting - die persoon in die gesig staar &#39;n rigting, maar beweeg na hul kant.
(1) What words refer to moving sideways?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sywaarts?
move sideways, make room for, move aside, move out of the way, get out of the way, move over, budge, shift|beweeg sywaarts, maak vir, eenkant skuif, uit te beweeg van die pad, kom uit die pad, skuif oor, beweeg, skuif
Move up|Beweeg
Use this domain for words referring to moving in an upward direction or to moving to a higher place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die verskuiwing in &#39;n opwaartse rigting of skuif na &#39;n hoër plek.
(1) What words refer to moving up?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing up?
move up, go up, arise, hop up, lift yourself up, pull yourself up, jump, surge, go higher, get higher, levitate,|beweeg, gaan, ontstaan, hop op, tel jouself, trek jouself, spring, oplewing, gaan hoër, kry hoër, zweven,
(2) What words refer to moving up through the air?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing up deur die lug?
rise, ascend, gain height,|styg, klim, kry hoogte,
(3) What words refer to moving up into the air quickly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing in die lug vinnig?
fly up, soar, shoot up,|vlieg, sweef, skiet,
(4) What words refer to climbing?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na klim?
climb, scale, clamber, shin up, shinny up,|klim, skaal, klouter, Shin up, rugby op,
(5) What words refer to moving onto something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die verskuiwing op iets?
climb onto, get on, mount, embark, hop onto, jump onto,|klim, kry, die berg, begin, hop op, spring op,
(6) What words refer to climbing over something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na klim oor iets?
climb over|klim oor
(7) What words refer to the sun or moon  moving up in the sky?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die son of die maan beweeg in die lug?
come up, rise,|kom, staan,
(8) What words refer to an airplane moving up?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n vliegtuig beweeg het nie?
leave the ground, take off, lift off, blast-off, launch,|laat die grond, neem af, af lig, ontploffing-off, launch,
(9) What words refer to the act of moving up?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die besluit van die beweging up?
rise (n), ascension, ascent,|styg (n), hemelvaart, trap,
(10) What words refer to someone who moves up?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat beweeg op?
climber, mountaineer, mountain climber, rock-climber,|klimmer, bergklimmer, bergklimmer, rock-klimmer,
(11) What words refer to the sport of climbing?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die sport klim?
climbing, mountaineering, go climbing, rock-climbing,|klim, klim, gaan klim, rotsklim,
Move down|Beweeg af
Use this domain for words referring to moving in a downward direction or to moving to a lower place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n afwaartse rigting of skuif na &#39;n laer plek.
(1) What words refer to moving down slowly or purposefully?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na stadig beweeg of doelbewus af?
move down, go down, lower oneself, climb down, jump down, descend, descent|beweeg af, trek af, jouself te verlaag, klim af, spring af, klim af, afkoms
Fall|Val
Use this domain for words referring to something falling--for something to move down under the influence of gravity.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets val - vir iets om te onder die invloed van swaartekrag af beweeg.
(1) What words refer to falling?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die val?
fall, drop, fall on,|val, val, val op,
(2) What words refer to accidentally falling from a high position?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na ongeluk val uit &#39;n hoë posisie?
fall off, take a fall, tumble, be thrown,|val af, neem &#39;n val, Klere, gegooi word,
(3) What words refer to falling from a very high position?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die val van &#39;n baie hoë posisie?
plunge, plummet,|duik, skietlood,
(4) What words refer to falling from a standing position?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die val van &#39;n staande posisie?
fall down, fall over, have a fall, fall flat on your face, collapse, topple over, keel over, go head over heels, fall headlong,|val, val, het &#39;n val, val plat op jou gesig, ineenstorting, omval, omkap, gaan kop oor hakke, die krans val,
(5) What words refer to almost falling?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na byna val?
trip, slip, stumble, lose your balance, lose your footing, keep your balance, stay up,|reis, glip, struikel, verloor jou balans, verloor jou voet, hou jou balans, bly op,
(6) What words refer to falling off of something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die val af van iets?
fall from, fall out, come off,|val uit, val uit, kom uit,
(7) What words refer to the act of falling?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die Wet van die val?
fall (n), avalanche,|val (n), stortvloed,
(8) What words refer to slowly falling?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na stadig val?
sink slowly, float down, drift down, settle,|sink stadig, dryf af, dryf af, op te los,
(9) What words refer to something like rain or leaves falling through the air?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets soos reën of blare val deur die lug?
fall, drop, come down, parachute,|val, drop, afkom, valskerm,
(10) What words refer to letting something fall?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die verhuring van iets val?
drop,|drop,
(11) What words refer to something falling onto its side?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat val op sy kant?
fall over, topple over, tip over,|val oor, omver te werp oor, omslaan,
(12) What words refer to a building falling?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebou val?
fall down, collapse, fall in, cave in,|val, val, val in, grot in,
(13) What words refer to causing someone to fall?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te val?
knock down, push over, trip, knock someone to the ground, bring down,|klop, stoot oor, reis, klop iemand aan die grond, bring,
(14) What words refer to causing something to fall?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat om te val?
knock over, upset, tip over, overturn,|klop oor, ontstel, omslaan, puinhoop
(15) What words refer to water falling?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na water val?
cascade, cataract, pour, precipitate, shower,|waterval, katarak, gooi, neerslag, stort,
(16) What words refer to falling into water?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na die val in die water?
sink, fall overboard, plunge into, fall into, plop, plunk,|wasbak, oorboord val, duik in, val in, plop, plof,
(17) What words refer to the force that causes things to fall?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na die krag wat dinge veroorsaak om te val?
gravity,|swaartekrag,
(18) What words refer to keeping something from falling?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na iets hou van die val?
hold up, prop up, brace,|hou, stut, stut,
Turn|Beurt
Use this domain for words referring to turning and changing the direction in which one is moving.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die draai en die verandering van die rigting waarin die een beweeg.
(1) What words refer to turning?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die draai?
turn, change direction/course, deviate, go off at an angle, swerve,|beurt, verander van rigting / kursus, wyk, gaan af teen &#39;n hoek, swenk,
(2) What words refer to turning around and moving in the opposite direction?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die draai rond en beweeg in die teenoorgestelde rigting?
turn around, reverse direction, retreat, go back, retire to the rear|draai, agteruit, Retreat, gaan terug, aftree aan die agterkant
Move in a circle|Beweeg in &#39;n sirkel
Use this domain for words referring to continually changing the direction you are facing in until you are once again facing in the same direction, e.g. moving in a circle, moving around something, or rotating.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na voortdurend verandering van die rigting wat jy in die gesig staar in totdat jy weer in die gesig staar in dieselfde rigting, bv beweeg in &#39;n sirkel, rond te beweeg iets, of draai.
(1) What words refer to moving around in a circle?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na rond te beweeg in &#39;n sirkel?
move in a circle, curve, circulate, turn around, swing, cycle|beweeg in &#39;n sirkel, kurwe, sirkuleer, draai om, swaai, siklus
(2) What words refer to moving around something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na rond te beweeg iets?
move around, surround, encircle, revolve, swivel, pivot|rond te beweeg, omsingel, draai, draai, draai
(3) What words refer to rotating?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na roterende?
rotate, spin, wheel, twirl, whirl, gyrate, roll, gyrate, revolve, swivel|draai, spin, wiel, rond draai, dwarreling, rond draai, rol, rond draai, draai, draai
(4) What words refer to rolling something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die rol iets?
roll, turn, rotate, spin|roll, op sy beurt, draai, spin
Move back and forth|Beweeg heen en weer
Use this domain for words related to moving back and forth.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met heen en weer beweeg.
(1) What words refer to moving back and forth?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na heen en weer beweeg?
move back and forth, rock, rock back and forth, wave, swing|beweeg heen en weer, rock, rock heen en weer, golf, swing
(2) What words refer to something moving back and forth quickly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets heen en weer beweeg vinnig?
flutter, shake, quiver, tremble|fladder, skud, pylkoker, bewe
(3) What words refer to shaking oneself?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na skud jouself?
shake, shiver, wiggle, wriggle, squirm, writhe|skud, bewe, wikkel, wikkel, wriemel, krul
Move straight without turning|Beweeg reguit sonder om
Use this domain for words referring to moving straight without changing direction.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die verskuiwing reguit sonder rigting verander.
(1) What words refer to moving straight?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing reguit?
go straight, in a straight line, direct, as the crow flies|gaan reguit, in &#39;n reguit lyn, direkte, soos die kraai vlieg
Move toward something|Beweeg na iets
Use this domain for words referring to moving toward, in the direction of, or near something or some place. The words in this domain should refer to moving in the direction of a place, but should not require that the person actually arrived. Some languages (such as German and Polish) distinguish 'go on foot' from 'go in a vehicle'.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na beweeg na, in die rigting van, of naby iets of &#39;n plek. Die woorde in hierdie domein moet verwys na beweeg in die rigting van &#39;n plek, maar moet nie vereis dat die persoon eintlik aangekom. Sommige tale (soos Duits en Pools) onderskei &quot;Gaan voet &#39;uit&#39; te gaan in &#39;n voertuig.
(1) What words refer to moving toward a place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg na &#39;n plek?
move toward, go toward, head toward, go in the (general) direction of|beweeg na, gaan na, kop na, gaan in die (algemene) rigting van
(2) What words refer to moving near something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van naby iets?
approach, move near, come near, move in on|benadering, beweeg nader kom nader beweeg op
(3) What words refer to two things moving toward each other?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na twee dinge beweeg na mekaar?
converge, be on a collision course|konvergeer, word op &#39;n botsing natuurlik
(4) What words refer to the place toward which a person is moving?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die plek waarheen &#39;n persoon beweeg?
destination, goal|bestemming, doel
Move away|Weg te beweeg
Use this domain for words referring to moving away from a place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na weg te beweeg van &#39;n plek.
(1) What words refer to moving away from something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na weg te beweeg van iets?
move from/away/away from, go away, get away, retreat, back off, run away, come from|beweeg van / weg / weg van, gaan weg, weg, Retreat, terug af, hardloop weg, kom uit
Go|Gaan
Use this domain for words referring to moving away from the speaker. In Australian languages many movement words are marked for direction toward or away from the speaker.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na weg te beweeg van die spreker. In Australiese tale baie beweging woorde gemerk vir rigting na of weg van die spreker.
(1) What words refer to moving away from the speaker?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na weg te beweeg van die spreker?
go (away), leave here/this place, get out of here|gaan (weg), laat hier / hierdie plek uit hier
(2) What do people say when they want someone to go away?|(2) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle wil iemand om weg te gaan?
Come|Kom
Use this domain for words referring to moving toward the speaker.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na beweeg na die spreker.
(1) What words refer to moving toward the speaker?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg na die spreker?
come, come here|kom, kom hier
(2) What do people say when they want someone to come?|(2) Wat sê die mense wanneer hulle wil iemand om te kom?
Leave|Verlaat
(1) What words refer to leaving a place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat &#39;n plek?
leave, depart, departure, go away, withdraw, take your leave, scram, skedaddle, beat it, set out, hit the road, quit (a place), absent yourself, slip away, vacate, make yourself scarce,|verlof, wyk, vertrek, gaan weg, trek, neem jou verlof, donder, skedaddle, klop dit, uiteengesit in die pad, op te hou (&#39;n plek), afwesig jouself, weg te glip, ontruim, maak jouself skaars,
Arrive|Kom
Use this domain for words referring to arriving at a place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die aankoms by &#39;n plek.
(1) What words refer to arriving at a place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aankoms by &#39;n plek?
arrive, arrival, reach, get to, come to, attain, land, landing, advent|kom, aankoms bereik, kry, kom, te bereik, land, landing, koms
Move in|Beweeg in
Use this domain for words related to moving into something, such as a house or an area.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verskuiwing in iets soos &#39;n huis of &#39;n gebied.
(1) What words refer to moving into an area or space?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg in &#39;n gebied of ruimte?
move in, go in, go into, enter|beweeg in, gaan in, gaan in, tik
(2) What words refer to moving toward the center of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg na die middel van iets?
move inwards,|binnegoed beweeg,
Move out|Beweeg uit
Use this domain for words related to moving out of something, such as a house or area.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verskuiwing van iets, soos &#39;n huis of omgewing.
(1) What words refer to moving out of an area or space?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van &#39;n gebied of ruimte?
move out, go out, come out, get out, emerge, exit, exodus, issue, leave,|beweeg uit, gaan uit, gaan uit, kom uit, kom, afrit, uittog, kwessie, verlof,
(2) What words refer to an opening where something can move out?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n opening waar iets uit kan beweeg?
exit, outlet, vent, mouth, opening, way out|uitgang, uitlaat, vent, mond, opening, pad uit
Move past, over, through|Beweeg verby, oor, deur
Use this domain for words referring to moving past, over, or through something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van die verlede, oor, of deur iets.
(1) What words refer to moving past something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van die verlede iets?
move past, move by, bypass, go around, go by, stop by, zoom by, zip by|beweeg verby, skuif deur bypass, gaan rond, gaan deur, stop by, vergroot deur, rits deur
(2) What words refer to passing someone or something, which is moving in the same direction?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na verbygaande iets of iemand, wat beweeg in dieselfde rigting?
pass|slaag
(3) What words refer to overtaking someone of something, which is moving in the same direction?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na verbygesteek iemand van iets wat beweeg in dieselfde rigting?
come up with, catch up with, overtake|kom met, inhaal, inhaal
(4) What words refer to moving over something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die verskuiwing oor iets?
move over, walk over, run over, overrun|beweeg oor, loop, loop oor, oorstroom
(5) What words refer to moving through something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na beweeg deur iets?
pass through|deur
(6) What words refer to moving across something, such as a river, road, mountain range, or some other dividing line?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na beweeg oor iets, soos &#39;n rivier, pad, bergreeks, of &#39;n ander skeidslyn?
move across, go across, cross, go to the other side|beweeg oor is, gaan oor, kruis, gaan na die ander kant
Return|Terug
Use this domain for words referring to returning to a place--to go back to a place you earlier left.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die terugkeer na &#39;n plek - om terug na &#39;n plek wat jy vroeër verlaat gaan.
(1) What words refer to returning to a place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die terugkeer na &#39;n plek?
return, come back, move back|terug, kom terug, beweeg terug
Travel|Travel
Use this domain for words referring to traveling--to move a long distance. The words in this domain may imply that the person has to sleep somewhere other than his home.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die reis - &#39;n lang afstand beweeg. Die woorde in hierdie domein kan impliseer dat die persoon moet iewers anders as sy huis te slaap.
(1) What words refer to going on a journey?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na gaan op &#39;n reis af nie?
go on a journey, journey, trip, passage, tour|gaan op &#39;n reis, reis, reis, gang, toer
(2) What words refer to moving from place to place?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van plek tot plek?
travel, move from place to place, move around, voyage|beweeg, van plek tot plek, rond te beweeg, reis
(3) What words refer to moving from place to place and then returning to the first place?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van plek tot plek en dan terug te keer na die eerste plek?
circulate, go on a circuit, circumnavigate|sirkuleer, gaan op &#39;n baan, vaar
(4) What words refer to going to an unknown place in order to discover what is there?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na gaan aan &#39;n onbekende plek in orde om te ontdek wat is daar?
explore|verken
(5) What words refer to going somewhere without intending to return?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iewers gaan sonder voorneme is om terug te keer?
move away, leave forever, emigrate, immigrate|weg te beweeg, laat vir ewig, emigreer, immigreer
(6) What words refer to traveling to another country?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die reis na &#39;n ander land?
go abroad, go overseas|gaan in die buiteland is, gaan oorsee
(7) What words refer to a person who is traveling?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat reis?
traveler, passenger, tourist|reisiger, passasier, toeriste
(8) What words describe someone who has traveled a lot?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat &#39;n baie gereis het?
well traveled, cosmopolitan,|goed gereis, kosmopolitiese,
(9) What words refer to a place where a traveler can stay or eat?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar &#39;n reisiger kan bly of eet?
hotel, motel, inn, campground, restaurant|hotel, motel, herberg, camping, restaurant
Travel by land|Reis deur die land
Use this domain for words related to traveling by land.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die reis deur die land.
(1) What words refer to moving by land?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van grond?
travel overland, overland,|reis oor land, land,
(2) What words refer to starting a vehicle?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die begin van &#39;n voertuig?
start, accelerate, pull out|begin, versnel, trek uit
(3) What words refer to stopping a vehicle?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n voertuig stop?
stop, brake, park|stop, rem, park
Vehicle|Voertuig
Use this domain for things used to move.|Gebruik hierdie domein dinge wat gebruik word om te beweeg.
(1) What kinds of vehicles are there?|(1) Watter soort van voertuie is daar?
vehicle, car, auto, truck, motorcycle, bicycle, cycle, bus, taxi|voertuig, motor, motor, vragmotor, motorfiets, fiets, fiets, bus, taxi
(2) What kinds of vehicles are used by children or for play?|(2) Watter soort van voertuie word gebruik deur kinders of vir speel?
tricycle, scooter, skateboard, roller-skates, roller blades, ice-skates|driewiel, scooter, skaatsplank, rolskaatse, rolskaatse, ys-skaats
(3) What kinds of vehicles are pulled by animals?|(3) Watter soort van voertuie getrek deur diere?
wagon, cart, chariot, carriage|wa, wa wa, wa
(4) What words refer to moving in a vehicle?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n voertuig?
drive, cycle, pedal, ride|ry, siklus, pedaal, rit
(5) What are the parts of a vehicle?|(5) Wat is die dele van &#39;n voertuig?
chassis, body, engine, brake, gas pedal, brakes, gear, steering wheel, windshield, windshield wiper, horn,|onderstel, liggaam, enjin, rem, gas pedaal, remme, rat, stuurwiel, voorruit, wisser, horing,
(6) What are the parts of a bicycle?|(6) Wat is die dele van &#39;n fiets?
handle bars, kick stand, bike bell, tire pump|hanteer bars, skop staan, fiets klok, band pomp
(7) What are the parts of a wheel?|(7) Wat is die dele van &#39;n wiel?
wheel, tire, rim, spokes, hub, axle,|wiel, band, rand, speke, hub, as,
Railroad|Railroad
Use this domain for words related to railroads.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met spoorweë.
