(2) What words refer to a train?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n trein?
train, railroad car, engine, caboose, freight train, passenger train, locomotive, freight car, trolley, streetcar|trein, spoorweg motor, enjin, kolewa, vrag trein, trein passasier, lokomotief, vrag motor, trollie, tram
(3) What words refer to the tracks?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die spore?
tracks, railroad tracks, rail, tie, bed|spore, treinspore spoor, das, bed
(4) What words refer to moving in a train?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wat in &#39;n trein?
ride, ride the rails, go on the train|ry, ry die relings, gaan op die trein
(5) What words refer to a person who operates a train?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n trein bedryf?
engineer, conductor, station master|ingenieur, dirigent, stasiemeester
Travel by water|Reis deur die water
Use this domain for words related to traveling by water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die reis deur water.
(1) What words refer to traveling on water?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na reis op water?
sail, ship (v), cross (the river, lake)|vaar, skip (v), kruis (die rivier, meer)
(2) What words refer to getting into a boat?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na om in &#39;n boot?
embark|begin
(3) What words refer to leaving in a boat?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verlaat in &#39;n boot?
set sail, sail off|stel vaar, vaar af
(4) What words refer to arriving in a boat?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na sy aankoms in &#39;n boot?
land, make land, landfall|land, maak land, wal
(5) What words refer to getting out of a boat?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na om uit &#39;n boot?
disembark|afklim
(6) What words refer to a ship hitting the land?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n skip slaan die land?
run aground, shipwreck, maroon|hardloop gestrand, skipbreuk, maroen
(7) What words refer to the places a ship can go?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die plekke van &#39;n skip kan gaan?
waterway, sea-lane|waterweg, see-baan
(8) What words refer to a place where a ship comes to land?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar &#39;n skip kom om te land?
harbor, port, landing, dock, wharf, water break|hawe, port, landing, dok, kaai, water breek
Boat|Boot
Use this domain for words related to a boat.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n boot.
(1) What types of boats are there?|(1) Watter tipes van bote is daar?
ship, boat, canoe, raft, life raft, lifeboat, ship's boat, surfboard, submarine,|skip, boot, kano, vlot, reddingsboot, reddingsboot, skip se boot, branderplank, duikboot,
(2) What are the parts of a boat?|(2) Wat is die dele van &#39;n boot?
bow, stern, starboard, port, deck, gunwale, below decks, mast, spar, crow's nest, figurehead, rudder, helm, superstructure,|buig, Stern, stuurboord, port, dek, verskansing, onder die dek, mas, Spar, kraai se nes, boegbeeld, roer, roer, bobou,

oar, paddle, sail, rigging, plank, compass, signal flag|roeispaan, paddle, seil, rigging, plank, kompas, sein vlag

row, paddle, sail, push a boat with a pole, pole a boat, bale out water|ry, roei, seil, druk &#39;n boot met &#39;n paal paal &#39;n boot, baal uit water
(5) What words refer to a person who uses a boat?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat &#39;n boot gebruik?
sailor, captain|matroos, kaptein
Swim|Swem

Dive|Duik
Use this domain for words referring to moving under the water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat onder die water.
(1) What words refer to diving into water?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die duik in die water?
dive, plunge, belly flop, jump in|duik, duik, maag flop, spring in
(2) What words refer to sinking under the water?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na sink onder die water?
sink, go down, go under, submerge|sink, gaan af, gaan onder, dompel
(3) What words refer to moving while underwater?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing terwyl onderwater?
run submerged, swim underwater|hardloop onder die water, swem onderwater
(4) What words refer to coming to the surface of the water?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na kom na die oppervlak van die water?
rise to the surface, surface (v), float to the surface|styg na die oppervlak, oppervlak (v), dryf na die oppervlak
(5) What words refer to drowning?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na verdrinking?
drown|verdrink
Fly|Vlieg
Use this domain for words related to traveling by air.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die reis deur die lug.

airport, runway, airstrip, landing field|lughawe, aanloopbaan, landingstrook, die veld landing
Travel in space|Reis in die ruimte
Use this domain for words related to traveling in space.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die reis in die ruimte.
(1) What words refer to traveling in space?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die reis in die ruimte?
space travel, voyage, orbit|ruimte reis, reis, wentelbaan
(2) What words refer to a vehicle that travels in space?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n voertuig wat reis in die ruimte?
spacecraft, spaceship, rocket, space shuttle, space station, satellite, flying saucer|ruimtetuig, ruimtetuig, vuurpyl, ruimtetuig, ruimte stasie, satelliet, vlieënde piering
(3) What words refer to a person who travels in space?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat reis in die ruimte?
astronaut, cosmonaut, spaceman|ruimtevaarder, ruimtevaarder, Spaceman
(4) What words refer to a rocket lifting off?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n vuurpyl die opheffing af?
lift off, lift-off, blast off, launch, launch pad, countdown, mission control|lig af, lift-off, blaas af, launch, launch pad, countdown, missie beheer
(5) What words refer to a spacecraft landing?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n ruimtetuig landing?
land, reenter, reentry|land, weer in te voer, terugkeer
Move to a new house|Skuif na &#39;n nuwe huis
Use this domain for words related to permanently leaving your home or country, and for words related to migrating--moving every year to the same places because of the weather and food supplies.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met permanent verlaat jou huis of land, en vir die woorde in verband met migrerende - beweeg elke jaar op dieselfde plekke as gevolg van die weer en voedselvoorrade.
(1) What words refer to moving to a new house?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing na &#39;n nuwe huis?
move, move in|beweeg, beweeg in
(2) What words refer to a celebration when moving into a new house?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n viering wanneer beweeg in &#39;n nuwe huis?

(3) What words refer to leaving home?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die huis verlaat?
leave, move out, leave home, run away, vacate|verlaat, beweeg uit, die huis verlaat, hardloop weg, ontruim
(4) What words refer to moving to a new country?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die verskuiwing na &#39;n nuwe land?
emigrate, immigrate|emigreer, immigreer
(5) What words refer to migrating?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na migreer?
migrate|migreer
Way, route|Way, roete
Use this domain for words related to the way or route that you take to go somewhere.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die roete manier of dat jy neem om iewers te gaan.
(1) What words refer to the way to go from one place to another?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die pad om te gaan van die een plek na die ander?
way, how to get, route, directions,|manier hoe om te kry, roete, aanwysings,
(2) What words refer to a short way of getting somewhere?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kort manier om iewers?
shortcut,|kortpad,
(3) What refer to telling someone the way?|(3) Wat verwys na die vertel iemand die pad?
tell someone the way, give someone directions, show someone the way, direct,|vertel iemand op die pad, gee iemand rigtings, wys iemand op die pad, direkte,
(4) What refer to asking someone the way?|(4) Wat verwys na vra iemand die pad?
ask someone the way, ask for directions,|vra iemand op die pad, vra vir aanwysings,
(5) What words refer to finding the way?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die vind van die manier?
find your way, navigate,|vind jou pad, navigeer,
(6) What do you say to someone when you want them to tell you the way?|(6) Wat sê jy vir iemand wanneer jy wil hê hulle moet jou vertel die pad?
can you tell me the way to, do you know the way to, how do I get to, can you direct me to, is this the way to,|kan jy my vertel die manier om, jy weet die pad na, hoe kry ek, kan jy direk my, dit is die manier om,
Lose your way|Verloor jou pad

Map|Kaart
Use this domain for words related to a map--a drawing of the world or part of the world.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n kaart - &#39;n tekening van die wêreld of &#39;n deel van die wêreld.
(1) What words refer to a map?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kaart?
map, chart, atlas|kaart, atlas
(2) What types of maps are there?|(2) Watter tipes kaarte is daar?
road map, street map, contour map, geographical map, political map|padkaart, straat kaart, kontoerkaart, geografiese kaart, politieke kaart
(3) What is a model of the earth called?|(3) Wat is &#39;n model van die aarde genoem?
globe|wêreld
(4) What words refer to making a map?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n kaart?
draw|trek
(5) What words refer to using a map?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die gebruik van &#39;n kaart?
read a map, look for something on the map, find something on the map, trace a route|lees &#39;n kaart, kyk vir iets op die kaart, iets op die kaart te vind, op te spoor &#39;n roete
(6) What words refer to the symbols on a map?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die simbole op &#39;n kaart?
symbol, legend, contour line, longitude line, latitude line, parallel|simbool, legende, kontoerlyn, lengte lyn, breedtegraad, parallel
(7) What words refer to the relationship between the size of the map and the size of the real land?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die verhouding tussen die grootte van die kaart en die grootte van die werklike land?
scale, large scale, small scale, projection|skaal, groot skaal, klein skaal, projeksie
(8) What other tools are used to find a place?|(8) Watter ander instrumente word gebruik om &#39;n plek te kry?
compass, sextant|kompas, sekstant

lag behind, fall behind, straggle,|agter, agter raak, verdwaald raak,
(8) What words refer to reaching someone that you are following?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die bereiking van iemand wat jy volg?
catch up with, overtake|inhaal, inhaal

handcuffs, shackles, restraint, cage, restraint,|boeie, boeie, selfbeheersing, hok, selfbeheersing,
(7) What words describe someone who is being prevented from moving?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat verhinder beweeg?
be under restraint, bound, captive, in confinement, held, limited, restricted,|onder selfbeheersing, gebind, gevange, in aanhouding, gehou, beperk, beperk,
Escape|Escape
Use this domain for words related to escaping from danger.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die ontsnapping uit gevaar.
(1) What words refer to escaping from a dangerous place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die ontsnapping van &#39;n gevaarlike plek?
escape, get out, flee, make your escape, get away, get clear, abandon ship, bail out, evacuate, fly the coop, get free, get loose, run away, scarper, break away, break free, break loose, sneak out,|ontsnap, kom uit, vlug, maak jou ontsnap, weg te kom, kry duidelik, laat vaar skip borgtog uit, ontruim, vlieg die hoenderhok, kry gratis, kry los, hardloop weg, weglopen, weg te breek, breek, breek los, sneak uit
(2) What words refer to escaping from prison?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die ontsnapping uit die tronk?
break out, make a break for it, bust out,|breek uit, maak &#39;n breek vir dit, breek uit
(3) What words refer to escaping from someone who is chasing you?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die ontsnapping van iemand wat jaag jy?
get away, give someone the slip, throw someone off the scent, slip through someone's fingers, shake off, make a clean getaway, elude, evade, avoid capture, dodge, sidestep, cover your trail/tracks,|weg te kom, gee iemand die strokie, gooi iemand af die reuk, glip deur vingers iemand se skud, maak &#39;n skoon wegbreek, ontwyk, ontduik, vermy vang, dodge, systap, bedek jou roete / spore,
(4) What words refer to running away from someone?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na hardloop weg van iemand?
run away, run off, bolt, run for it, make a run for it, take to your heels, scatter, run for your life,|hardloop weg, hardloop af, bout, hardloop vir dit, maak &#39;n draai vir dit, neem jou hakke, strooi, hardloop vir jou lewe,
(5) What words refer to escaping from a difficult situation?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na ontsnapping uit &#39;n moeilike situasie?
extricate yourself, talk your way out of,|bevry jouself, praat jou pad uit,
(6) What words refer to escaping with something you have stolen?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die ontsnapping met iets wat jy gesteel het?
get away with, make off with,|weg te kom met, maak weg met,
(7) What words refer to helping someone escape?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iemand help ontsnap?
get someone out, spring, liberate,|iemand kry uit die lente, bevry,
(8) What words refer to the act of escaping?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die Wet van ontsnapping?
escape (n), breakout, jailbreak, getaway, prison break, evasion, evacuation,|ontsnap (n), tempo, jailbreak, wegbreek, prison break, ontduiking, ontruiming,
(9) What words refer to someone who has escaped?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat ontsnap het?
runaway, fugitive, escapee, refugee,|weghol, vlugteling, escapee, vlugteling,
(10) What words describe someone who has escaped?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat ontsnap het?
escaped, be on the loose, be at large, be on the run, elusive, free,|ontsnap, wees op die los, by groot, op die vlug, ontwykende, gratis,
(11) What words describe something related to escaping?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat verband hou met die ontsnapping?
evasive (maneuvers), getaway (car),|ontwykende (maneuvers), wegbreek (motor),
(12) What words refer to being unable to escape?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na nie in staat is om te ontsnap?
can't escape, can't get out, trapped, be stuck, there is no escape, be imprisoned, be a prisoner,|kan nie ontsnap nie, kan dit nie kry nie, vasgevang is, vas, daar is geen ontsnapping, &#39;n gevangene, &#39;n gevangene,
Set free|Vry
Use this domain for words related to setting someone free.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die opstel van iemand vry.

free, at liberty, be out,|vry, vry, buite,
Not moving|Nie beweeg

stable|stabiele

Stay, remain|Bly bly
(1) What words refer to someone not moving?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat nie beweeg?
stay, stay behind, stay back, remain, remain behind, stay where you are, stay put, remain in place, hold your place, hold still, freeze, stationary, standstill, stand around, stand still, linger, tarry, abide|bly, bly agter, bly agter, bly agterbly, bly waar jy is, bly sit, bly in plek, hou jou plek, hou stil, vries, skryfbehoeftes, stilstand, staan ​​rond, staan ​​stil, Linger, wag, bly

Wait|Wag
Use this domain for words referring to waiting in a place, waiting to do something, or waiting for something to happen. The basic idea of waiting is for someone to not do anything for a period of time, because he expects something to happen that will cause him to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wag in &#39;n plek, en wag om iets te doen, of wag vir iets om te gebeur. Die basiese idee van wag vir iemand om nie iets te doen vir &#39;n tydperk van tyd, want hy verwag iets om te gebeur wat hom sal laat om iets te doen.
(1) What words refer to waiting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wag?
wait, wait for, wait up for, wait on, await, hang on, stand by, wait around, hang around, hold off, wait your turn, sit something out, cool your heels, bide your time, sit tight, sweat it out, hesitate, hesitation, wait and see, wait behind, lie in wait, waiting room, waiting list|wag, wag vir, wag vir, wag op, wag, wag, staan, wag rond, rond hang, hou, wag jou beurt, sit iets uit, koel jou hakke, albei jou tyd, Sit tight, sweet dit uit huiwer, huiwering, wag en sien, wag agter loer, wagkamer, waglys
(2) How do you tell someone to wait?|(2) Hoe kan jy sê iemand om te wag?
Wait! Wait up. Just a minute. Just a moment. I'll be right with you. Hold on. Hang on. Please hold.|Wag nie! Wag op. Net &#39;n minuut. Net &#39;n oomblik. Ek kom gou met jou te wees. Hou op. Hang. Asseblief hou.
(3) What words refer to waiting in a line of people?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wag in &#39;n lyn van mense?
line up, queue, stand in line, cut in line|line-up, ry, staan ​​in lyn, sny in lyn
(4) What words describe how a person feels when he must wait?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf hoe &#39;n persoon voel as hy moet wag?
look forward to, expectant, (I) can't wait, patient, impatient|sien uit daarna om, verwagtende, (I) kan nie wag, geduldig, ongeduldig
(5) What words refer to making someone wait?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iemand wag?
keep someone waiting, make someone wait, delay|hou iemand wag, maak iemand wag, vertraging
(6) What words refer to a period of time when you have to wait?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tydperk van die tyd wanneer jy moet wag?
wait (n), delay (n)|wag (n), vertraging (n)
(7) What words refer to refusing to wait patiently and going ahead of other people instead?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die weiering om geduldig te wag en gaan voor die ander mense in plaas?
cut in line, cut in front of someone, cut someone off, jump the queue, push in|verlaging in lyn, sny in die voorkant van iemand, sny iemand af, spring die tou, stoot in
Send someone|Stuur iemand
Use this domain for words related to causing someone to go somewhere.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met veroorsaak iemand om iewers te gaan.
(1) What words refer to sending someone somewhere?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die stuur van iemand iewers?
send, dismiss, transfer|stuur, ontslaan, dra
(2) What words refer to summoning someone to come to you?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die byeenroeping iemand om jou te kom?
summon|dagvaar
(3) What words refer to sending someone to do something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die stuur iemand om iets te doen?
send|stuur
Move something|Beweeg iets
Use this domain for general words referring to moving something or someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na iets of iemand beweeg.
(1) What words refer to moving something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets beweeg?
move, transfer, transport, shift, relocate, shunt, conduct, convey,|skuif, oordrag, vervoer, verskuiwing, verskuif, shunt, gedrag, dra,
(2) What words refer to moving something very quickly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets baie vinnig beweeg?
jerk|stoot
(3) What words refer to moving something through the air?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets beweeg deur die lug?
swing|swing
(4) What words refer to moving something that is difficult to move?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat moeilik is om te beweeg beweeg?
shift, free, release|verskuiwing, gratis, release
Carry|Dra
Use this domain for words referring to carrying something--to pick something up and hold it while moving oneself.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die uitvoering van iets - iets optel en hou dit, terwyl jouself te beweeg.
(1) What general words refer to carrying something?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die uitvoering van iets?
carry, bear, tote|dra, beer, totalisator
(2) What words refer to carrying something in a particular manner?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die uitvoering van iets in &#39;n bepaalde manier?
pack, carry in the arms, carry on the shoulders, shoulder (v), carry on a pole, cradle,|pak, dra in die arms, dra op die skouers, skouer (v), voer op &#39;n paal, wieg,
(3) What words refer to carrying something very heavy?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die uitvoering van iets baie swaar?
lug, haul, cart|sleep, afstand, wa
(4) What words refer to carrying many things?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die uitvoering van baie dinge?
be loaded (down) with, overloaded, be laden with, be weighed down with, under the weight of|gelaai word (af) met, oorlaai, wees gelaai met, af geweeg met, onder die gewig van
(5) What words refer to someone who carries things?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat dinge dra?
porter, bearer, carrier, courier,|Porter, draer, draer, koerier,
(6) What words refer to something that is carried?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gedra?
load, burden, armful,|las, las, armful,
(7) What words describe something that can be carried?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat gedoen kan word, beskryf?
portable|draagbare
(8) What words refer to something used to carry things?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word om dinge te dra?
pack, backpack, stretcher, carrying pole,|pak, rugsak, draagbaar, die uitvoering paal,
Throw|Gooi
Use this domain for words referring to throwing something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets gooi.
(1) What words refer to throwing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets gooi?
throw, cast,|gooi, gooi,
(2) What words refer to throwing something in a careless way?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets gooi in &#39;n sorgelose manier?
chuck, sling, toss, pitch, flick,|chuck, slinger, gooi, toonhoogte, spat,
(3) What words refer to throwing something with force?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets gooi met krag?
hurl, fling, heave, fire,|smijten, ruk, afgee, vuur,
(4) What words refer to throwing a ball when playing a game?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na gooi &#39;n bal by die speel &#39;n spel?
pass, pitch, bowl, peg,|slaag, toonhoogte, bak, pen,
(5) What words refer to throwing something high in the air?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets hoog in die lug te gooi?
lob, throw up in the air,|lob, gooi in die lug,
(6) What words refer to throwing something so that it turns over and over?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets gooi sodat dit blyk oor en oor?
toss, flip,|gooi, flip,
(7) What words refer to throwing things at someone?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na dinge gooi by iemand?
pelt, stone, bombard, shower,|pels, klip, bombardeer, stort,
(8) What words refer to something throwing something?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets iets gooi?
send something flying, catapult, propel, pitch, launch, sling,|stuur iets vlieg, kettie, dryf, toonhoogte, launch, slinger,
(9) What words refer to an act of throwing?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n besluit van die gooi?
throw (n),|gooi (n),
(10) What words refer to something hitting the ground after being thrown?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat die grond getref het nadat hy gegooi is?
land, hit, fall,|land, getref, val,
(11) What words refer to something used to throw things?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word om dinge te gooi?
sling, slingshot, throwing stick,|slinger, kettie, gooi stok,

Knock over|Klop oor

Put in front|Sit in die voorkant

Lift|Hysbak
Use this domain for words referring to putting something above you or above something else, putting something on top of something else, or moving something higher than it was.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na om iets bo jou of bo iets anders, om iets op die top van iets anders, of iets hoër as wat dit was beweeg.

put on top, superimpose|sit op die top, superimpose

lever, fulcrum, elevator, lift, jack, hoist, crane,|hefboom, steunpunt, lift, lift, jack, takel, kraan,

Lower something|Laer iets

(3) What words refer to letting something drop?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verhuring van iets drop?

Put in|Sit in
Use this domain for words referring to putting something inside something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na om iets binne iets anders.
(1) What words refer to putting something inside something else?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om iets binne iets anders?
put in, put inside, move in, insert, introduce, inject, implant, penetrate, pierce, inset, inlay, pack in, stuff in, load|sit in, binne sit, beweeg in, plaas, stel, spuit, inplanting, dring, steek, insetsel, inlegsel, pak in, dinge in, laai
(2) What words refer to pushing something into an opening or into something soft?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets in &#39;n opening of in iets sagte stoot?
stick, ram, drive, plunge, thrust|stok, ram, ry, duik, stoot
(3) What words refer to pushing something into a small space?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets in &#39;n klein ruimte stoot?
force, stuff, squeeze, jam, cram, pack, wedge in|krag, dinge, druk, konfyt, cram, pak, wig in
(4) What words refer to putting something into a hole or small space?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na om iets in &#39;n gat of klein ruimte?
put in/into/inside, slide something into, tuck in/into/under, insert|sit in / in / binne, gly iets in, snoepie in / in / onder, plaas
(5) What words refer to putting something into liquid?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na om iets in vloeibare?
immerse, submerge|verdiep, dompel
(6) What words refer to putting something into liquid for a short time?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na om iets in vloeistof vir &#39;n kort tyd?
dip, dunk|dip, dunk
Take something out of something|Neem iets uit iets
Use this domain for words referring to taking something out of something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die neem van iets uit iets anders.
(1) What words refer to taking something out of something else?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van iets uit iets anders?
take out, get something out, remove, extract, extricate, eliminate, bring out, clear something out, clean out, withdraw, fish out|neem, kry iets uit, verwyder, uittreksel, bevry, uit te skakel, bring, duidelik iets uit, skoon te maak, te onttrek, vis uit
(2) What words refer to taking something out of the ground?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van iets uit die grond?
root out, uproot, dig out, pull up, weed out, grub up, rake out|ontwortel, ontwortel, uit te grawe, trek, onkruid uit, grub up, hark uit

pour, dip out, wring out, wring from, squeeze out, suck out, pump, milk, soak up, absorb, absorbent|gooi, steek uit, uitdrink, wring uit, druk, suig, pomp, melk, suig, absorbeer, absorberende
(4) What words refer to turning a container so that its contents come out?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die draai &#39;n houer sodat die inhoud daarvan kom?
pour, dump, spill|gooi, stort, stort
(5) What words refer to pulling something out of something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets uit iets trek?
pull out, draw out, pluck, tear out|trek uit, trek uit, ruk, skeur
(6) What words refer to pushing something out of something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets uit iets stoot?
push out, eject, squeeze out, expel|stoot, te verwyder, druk, te verdryf
Pull|Trek
Use this domain for words related to pulling--causing something to move toward you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die trek - wat veroorsaak dat iets om te beweeg na jou.
(1) What words refer to pulling something so that it moves toward you?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets trek sodat dit beweeg in die rigting van jou?
pull, pull back, bring back, draw, tug|trek, trek terug, terug te bring, te teken, pluk
(2) What words refer to pulling something quickly or suddenly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets vinnig of skielik trek?
jerk, yank, tug|stoot, Yank, pluk
(3) What words refer to pulling something with a lot of force so that it comes away from the thing it is connected to?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets trek met &#39;n baie krag, sodat dit kom weg van die ding wat dit is gekoppel aan?
pull something away/from/out/apart, wrench something open/off/away, tear something out/from/away/down|trek iets weg / uit / uit / uitmekaar, wrench iets oop / af / weg, traan iets uit / van / weg / af
(4) What words refer to pulling something, but without making it come away from the thing it is connected to?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets trek, maar sonder om dit weg van die ding wat dit is gekoppel aan kom is?
pull at, pull on, give something a pull, tug at, give something a tug|trek op, trek op, gee iets wat &#39;n trek, rem op, gee iets wat &#39;n sleepboot
(5) What words refer to pulling something heavy?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets swaar trek?
heave, lug, haul|offergawe, sleep, afstand
(6) What words refer to pulling something along the ground?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets op die grond te trek?
drag|drag
(7) What words refer to pulling something with a rope or chain?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets trek met &#39;n tou of ketting?
(8) What words refer to pulling something in some direction?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets in sommige rigting trek?
pull down, pull up, pull across, pull out|trek, trek, trek oor, trek uit
(9) What words refer to pulling something onto you?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets op jou trek?
pull on, pull over, pull something over on top of you|trek, trek oor, trek iets oor op die top van jou
(10) What words refer to a vehicle or animal pulling something so that it moves along behind?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n voertuig of dier iets trek sodat dit agter beweeg saam?
pull, tow, take in tow, draw, trail something behind you|trek, trek, neem in tow, teken, roete iets agter jou
(11) What words refer to something being pulled along behind?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets getrek saam agter?
in tow, trailing, trailer|in tow, sleep, sleepwa
(12) What words refer to causing something to move towards you without touching it?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat om te beweeg in die rigting wat jy sonder om te raak nie?
attract, lure, draw|lok, lok, te trek
(13) What words refer to two or more people pulling on both ends of something?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na twee of meer mense trek op beide kante van iets?
tug of war|toutrek
Push|Push
Use this domain for when someone or something causes something to move away from him.|Gebruik hierdie domein wanneer iets of iemand iets van hom weg te beweeg veroorsaak.
(1) What words refer to pushing something so that it moves away you?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets stoot, sodat dit weg jy beweeg?
push something, push away, give something a push, move something forward, advance something, thrust, nudge, give impetus, impel|stoot iets weg te stoot, gee iets wat &#39;n stoot, iets om vorentoe te beweeg, iets, stoot bevorder, struikel, gee stukrag, voortdrĳven
(2) What words refer to pushing something quickly or suddenly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets vinnig of skielik stoot?
shove, give something a shove, jog, jolt|stoot, gee iets wat &#39;n stoot, draf, stoot
(3) What words refer to pushing someone roughly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand rofweg stoot?
shove, hustle, bundle, manhandle|stoot, druk, bondel, toetakelen
(4) What words refer to pushing people in a crowd?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na stoot mense in &#39;n skare?
push, shove, press, force your way, jostle, elbow, barge|stoot, stoot, druk, dwing jou pad, stoot, elmboog, vaar
(5) What words refer to pushing something, but without making it move?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets stoot, maar sonder om dit te skuif?
push on, press|stoot, druk
(6) What words refer to pushing something heavy?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets swaar stoot?
put your shoulder into it|sit jou skouer in dit
(7) What words refer to pushing something along the ground?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets op die grond te druk?
push|druk
(8) What words refer to pushing something with your finger or a stick?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets stoot met jou vinger of &#39;n stok?
poke, give something a poke, prod, jab, dig someone in the ribs|steek, gee iets wat &#39;n sak, prod, steek, grawe iemand in die ribbes
(9) What words refer to pushing something so that it falls over?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iets stoot, sodat dit val oor?
push over, topple|stoot oor, omver te werp
(10) What words refer to pushing something in some direction?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets in sommige rigting stoot?
push aside, push out of the way|stoot eenkant, stoot uit die pad
(11) What words refer to causing something to move away from you without touching it?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat om weg te beweeg jy sonder om te raak nie?
repel|stoot
(12) What words refer to pushing something from all directions?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na iets uit alle rigtings stoot?
squeeze, compress|druk, compress
(13) What words refer to pushing something into an opening or into something soft?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets in &#39;n opening of in iets sagte stoot?
stick something into something, ram, drive, plunge, thrust|iets vashou in iets, ram, ry, duik, stoot
(14) What words refer to pushing something into a small space?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na iets in &#39;n klein ruimte stoot?
push in, squeeze in, jam in, force, stuff|stoot in, druk in, konfyt in, krag, dinge
(15) What words refer to pushing yourself into a small space?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na jouself stoot in &#39;n klein ruimte?
squeeze into, squeeze through, squeeze in between|druk in, druk deur, druk tussen
(16) What words refer to how hard you push?|(16) Watter woorde verwys na hoe hard jy druk?
pressure, put pressure on|druk, druk op
(17) What words refer to pushing something with wheels?|(17) Watter woorde verwys na iets met wiele stoot?
wheel (v), push, roll, trundle|wiel (v), stoot, rol, rolwagen
Take somewhere|Neem iewers
Use this domain for words referring to taking something or someone somewhere.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die neem van iets of iemand iewers.
(1) What words refer to taking someone somewhere?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van iemand iewers?
take, bring, escort, whisk someone away,|neem, bring escort, klits iemand weg,
(2) What words refer to taking something somewhere?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van iets iewers?
take, bring, deliver, transport,|neem, bring lewer, vervoer,
(3) What words refer to taking someone somewhere?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van iemand iewers?
lead, guide|lood, gids
(4) What words refer to taking an animal somewhere?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die neem van &#39;n dier iewers?
lead, herd|lood, beeste
Take something from somewhere|Iets van iewers
Use this domain for words referring to taking something or someone from its place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die neem van iets of iemand uit sy plek.
(1) What words refer to taking something from somewhere?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat van iewers?
take, take away, remove, draw off, empty, evacuate, milk, strain,|neem, neem weg, verwyder, trek af, leeg, ontruim, melk, stam,
(2) What words refer to taking something quickly or suddenly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na vinnig of skielik neem van iets?
grab, snatch, whisk away, seize|gryp, gryp, klits weg, gryp
(3) What words refer to reaching for something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na bereik vir iets?
reach for, grab at/for, snatch at|bereik vir, gryp by / vir, ruk op
(4) What words refer to causing something to move from somewhere?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat om te beweeg van iewers?
displace, dislocate, dislodge|verplaas, verrekken, verdryf
Return something|Terug iets
Use this domain for words referring to moving something back to an original place or person. (Something is in a place, someone (or something) moves it, then someone moves it back to the first place.)|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die verskuiwing van iets terug om &#39;n oorspronklike plek of persoon. (Iets is in &#39;n plek, iemand (of iets) beweeg, dan iemand dit beweeg terug na die eerste plek.)
(1) What words refer to putting something back in its place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om iets terug in sy plek?
replace, put back, return (something), return to its place, restore to owner|vervang, sit terug, kom terug (iets), terug te keer na sy plek terug te eienaar
Send|Stuur
Use this domain for words related to sending something--to cause someone to take something somewhere.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets stuur - om te veroorsaak dat iemand iets iewers te neem.
(1) What words refer to sending something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets stuur?
send, sent with, have someone take, have something delivered|stuur, gestuur met, iemand neem, het iets afgelewer
Chase away|Wegjaag
Use this domain for words related to chasing or driving people and animals--to cause someone (or an animal) to move.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met jaag of ry mense en diere - iemand (of &#39;n dier) te beweeg veroorsaak.
(1) What words refer to causing someone to go away?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om weg te gaan?
chase away, send away, exile, expel, send out, dismiss|wegjaag, weg te stuur, ballingskap, verdryf, stuur, ontslaan
Drive along|Ry
Use this domain for words related to driving people and animals--to cause someone (or an animal) to move with you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die bestuur van mense en diere - iemand (of &#39;n dier) te beweeg met jou veroorsaak.
(1) What words refer to causing someone to move with you?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat om te beweeg met jou?
drive, force, goad, prod, propel, ride, spur|ry, krag, prikkels, prod, dryf, ry, ingewing
Handle something|Hanteer iets
Use this domain for general words for using the hands to move something.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde vir die gebruik van die hande om iets te beweeg.
(1) What general words refer to using the hands to do something to an object?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die gebruik van die hande iets om &#39;n voorwerp te doen?
handle, manipulate|te hanteer, te manipuleer
Touch|Raak
Use this domain for words referring to touching something with your hand without moving the thing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets met jou hand raak sonder die verskuiwing van die ding.
(1) What words refer to touching something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak?
touch, feel, run your hand over, brush, caress, contact, feel, finger, fondle, glance, graze, handle, handling, kiss, lick, massage, nuzzle, palm, palpate, paw, rub, scrape, sense, skim, stroke, sweep, thumb, tickle, tickling,|aanraking, voel, loop jou hand oor, borsel, vertroetel, kontak, voel, vinger, aaien, oogopslag, wei, te hanteer, hantering, soen, lek, massering, koester, palm, palpeer, klou, vryf, krap, sin, afgeroomde , beroerte, sweep, duim, kielie, kielie,

Put down|Sit neer

(2) What words refer to putting something to the side of something else?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na om iets aan die kant van iets anders?
put aside, put to the side, put beside, move aside, push aside|ter syde gestel, sit aan die kant, langs sit, eenkant skuif, stoot eenkant
(3) What words refer to putting something somewhere?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na om iets iewers?
put, place, position, post|put, plek, posisie, post
Hold|Hou
Use this domain for holding something in the hand.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die hou van iets in die hand.
(1) What words refer to holding something in the hand?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die hou van iets in die hand?
hold|hou
(2) What words refer to holding something tightly?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die hou van iets styf?
hold tightly, grip|hou styf, greep
(3) What words refer to holding something loosely?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die hou van iets losweg?
hold loosely|hou losweg
(4) What words refer to holding something with the hand open?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die hou van iets met die hand oop?
hold in the palm|hou in die palm
(5) What words refer to holding something with the hand closed?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die hou van iets met die hand gesluit?
hold in the fist|hou in die vuis
(6) What words refer to releasing something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die vrystelling van iets?
release, let go of,|vry te stel, laat gaan van,
Actions of the hand|Optrede van die hand
Use this domain for the functions and actions of the hand.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die funksies en optrede van die hand.
(1) What words refer to moving your hand over something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die beweging van jou hand oor iets?
scratch, scratch hard, itch, massage, rub|nuuts af, krap hard, jeuk, massering, vryf
(2) What words refer to trying to find something with your hand?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na probeer om iets met jou hand vind?
feel (for something), grope (in the dark)|voel (iets), tas (in die donker)
(3) What other actions are done with the hands?|(3) Watter ander aksies word gedoen met die hande?
tickle, pinch, crack a knuckle, hug, embrace|kielie, knippie, kraak &#39;n kneukel, drukkie, omhels
Support|Ondersteuning
Use this domain for words related to keeping something from falling.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets hou van struikeling.
(1) What words refer to keeping something from falling?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets hou van die val?
support, hold up|ondersteuning, hou
(2) What words refer to putting something under or against something to keep it from falling?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na om iets onder of teen iets om dit te hou van die val?
prop (up)|stut (up)

Turn something|Draai iets
Use this domain for turning something--to cause something to change direction, or to cause something to revolve or move in a circle.|Gebruik hierdie domein iets draai - om iets te laat rigting te verander, of om iets te draai of skuif in &#39;n sirkel veroorsaak.
(1) What words refer to causing something to change direction?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat om van rigting te verander?

(2) What words refer to causing something to move in a circle or curve?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat om te beweeg in &#39;n sirkel of kurwe?
(3) What words refer to causing something to revolve?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat wentel?
spin, revolve|spin, draai
(4) What words refer to turning something so the bottom side is up?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets draai so die onderkant is nie?
turn up side down, turn over, upturn, flip over|draai kant af, draai oor, opswaai, flip oor
(5) What words refer to turning something so the inside is out?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets draai so die binnekant is buite?
turn inside-out|draai binne-uit
(6) What words refer to stirring something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets roer?
stir|opskudding
(7) What words refer to winding something around another thing?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets om &#39;n ander ding likwidasie?
wind, coil, curl, loop, roll, spin, twirl, twist, whirl,|wind, spoel, krul, lus, roll, spin, rond draai, draai, dwarreling,

Limit|Limiet
Use this domain for words referring to a limit beyond which something may or should not go, and for words referring to imposing a limit.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n beperking buite wat iets kan of moet nie gaan nie, en vir woorde verwys na die instelling van &#39;n beperking.

limit, boundary, extent, (furthest) reach, barrier, restriction|limiet, grens, omvang, (verste) bereik, versperring, beperking
(3) What words refer to going beyond the limit?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na wat verder gaan as die limiet?
exceed, cross, trespass, overstep|oorskry, kruis, skuld, oorskry

Leave something|Laat iets
Use this domain for words referring to leaving something or someone in a place and going away.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets of iemand verlaat in &#39;n plek en gaan weg.

abandoned, forgotten, forsaken, marooned|verlate, vergete, verlaat marooned
(3) What commands are used to ask someone to leave something where it is?|(3) Wat opdragte word gebruik om iemand te vra om iets waar dit is te laat?
Leave it. Leave it where it is. Leave it behind. Leave it here. Don't move it. Forget it.|Laat dit. Laat dit waar dit is. Laat dit agter. Laat dit hier. Moet dit nie beweeg nie. Vergeet dit.
Throw away|Weggooi

litter, trash, garbage|rommel, vullis, vullis

Arrange|Reël
Use this domain for words referring to arranging things--to physically move a group of things or people and put them in a pattern.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die reël van die dinge - om fisies beweeg &#39;n groep van dinge of mense en hulle in &#39;n patroon.

arrange, align, array, dispose, lay out, line up, order, put in order, range, set out, concatenate,|reël, sluit, skikking, vervreem, uit te lê, line-up, orde, in orde, verskeidenheid, uiteengesit, koppel,

arrangement, alignment, array, formation, order, ordering, pattern, row, disposition, distribution, gradation, grouping, layout, concatenation,|reëling, belyning, skikking, vorming, orde, bestel, patroon, ry, ingesteldheid, verspreiding, gradering, groepering, uitleg, aaneenskakellling,
(3) What words refer to arranging things a second time, or arranging things after they have been mixed up?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die reël van dinge wat &#39;n tweede keer, of reël dinge nadat hulle deurmekaar?
rearrange, rearrangement, reorder, reordering, reform, reformation|herrangskik, herrangskikking, rangskik, herorganisering, hervorming, hervorming
(4) What words describe things that have been arranged?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat gereël?
arranged, ordered, well-ordered, be in order, regular,|gereël, bestel, geordende, in orde, gereelde,
(5) What words refer to when everything is arranged?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer alles gereël?
order,|orde,
Gather|Versamel
Use this domain for words referring to gathering things into a group. The basic idea of this domain involves a situation in which two or more things are not together, and someone moves them so that they are together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die insameling van dinge in &#39;n groep. Die basiese idee van hierdie domein behels &#39;n situasie waarin twee of meer dinge nie saam nie, en iemand hulle beweeg sodat hulle saam.
(1) What words refer to gathering things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die insameling dinge?
gather, accumulate, amass, assemble, bring together, bunch up, collect, compile, concentrate, consolidate, cumulate, group (v), heap, heap up, herd together, layer (v), mass together, pile, rally, round-up, stack, stack up, load,|versamel, ophoop, stig, vergader, byeen te bring, bondel, versamel, op te stel, te konsentreer, te konsolideer, ophopen, groep (v), hoop, ophoop, beeste saam laag (v), massa saam paal, rally, ronde -up, stapel, stapel, las,
(2) What words refer to things gathering?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na dinge te versamel?
gather, clump, cluster, collect, congregate, crowd together, flock, form, gang, horde, meet, pile up, swarm, throng,|samel, bos, cluster, versamel, vergader, skare saam kudde, vorm, bende, horde, ontmoet, stapel, wemel, skare,
(3) What words describe things that have been gathered?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat ingesamel is?
gathered, collected, concentrated, crowded, crowding, cumulative, massed together, massing, togetherness, heaped, loaded, piled,|versamel, versamel, gekonsentreerde, oorvol, verdring, kumulatiewe, tesame dik, Massing, samesyn, opgehoop, gelaai, opgestapel,
(4) What words refer to a group of  things that have been gathered together?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge wat saam vergader?
gathering, assemblage, bunch, collection, concentration, group, heap, huddle, mass, pile, stack,|insameling, samevoeging, klomp, versameling, konsentrasie, groep, hoop, warboel, massa, hoop, stapel,
Separate, scatter|Aparte, strooi
Use this domain for words referring to separating things into groups, and scattering things. The basic idea of this domain involves a situation in which two or more things are together, and someone moves them so that they are no longer together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die skeiding van dinge in groepe, en verstrooiing dinge. Die basiese idee van hierdie domein behels &#39;n situasie waarin twee of meer dinge saam, en iemand hulle beweeg sodat hulle nie meer saam.
(1) What words refer to separating or scattering things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die skeiding of verstrooiing dinge?
separate, separation, scatter, disperse, dispersion, dispersal, spread out, spray, move apart, move away from each other, put space between, to space (things), space out, place at intervals, divide, division, blow apart, distribute, sow, strew, sift|aparte, skeiding, strooi, versprei, dispersie, verspreiding, versprei, spuit, uitmekaar beweeg, weg te beweeg van mekaar, sit ruimte tussen ruimte (dinge), ruimte uit, plek met tussenposes, verdeel, afdeling, blaas uitmekaar, versprei, saai, strooi, sif
(2) What words are used of separating people?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik van die skeiding van mense?
separate fighting people, disperse troops|afsonderlike gevegte mense, versprei troepe
(3) What words describe the condition of things when they are separated?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf die toestand van dinge wanneer hulle geskei?
separation, dispersion, dispersal, the spread of, division|skeiding, dispersie, verspreiding, die verspreiding van, afdeling
(4) What words refer to a group of things that have been separated?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge wat geskei?
a scattering (of something), Diaspora|&#39;n verstrooiing (van iets), Diaspora
(5) What words describe things that have been scattered?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat verstrooi is?
be scattered, thrown apart, resettled, thinly spread, spread out, far flung, flung, dispersed|verstrooi, uitmekaar gegooi, hervestig, dun versprei, versprei, verafgeleë, uitgestrekte, versprei
(6) What words refer to taking something away and putting it aside, separate from the others?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van iets weg en sit dit eenkant, apart van die ander?
set aside, put aside, separate from the others, keep separate, keep special, reserve, pull out|tersyde gestel, opsy gesit, skei van die ander, apart te hou, hou spesiale, reservaat, trek uit
Include|Sluit
Use this domain for words related to including something in a group.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met inbegrip iets in &#39;n groep.
(1) What words refer to including something in a group?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na insluitend iets in &#39;n groep?
include, incorporate, involve, integrate|sluit, neem, behels, te integreer
(2) What words refer to excluding something from a group?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na uitgesluit iets uit &#39;n groep?
exclude, segregate|sluit, skei
Special|Spesiale
Use this domain for words that describe a member of a group that is different or special.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat &#39;n lid van &#39;n groep wat verskillende of spesiale beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is special?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat spesiale beskryf?
special, different, unique|spesiale, anders, uniek
Join, attach|Sluit, heg
Use this domain for words related to joining two or more things together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die aansluiting by twee of meer dinge saam.
(1) What words refer to joining two or more things together?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aansluiting by twee of meer dinge saam?
join, join together, agglutinate, assemble, bolt, cement, chain, clip, combine, connect, couple, crimp, fasten, fetter, fuse, glue, grapple, handcuff, hitch, hook together, knit, latch, link, manacle, merge, paste, pin, plaster, put together, put up, rivet, secure, sew, shackle, solder, staple, stick, stick together, tape (up), unite, unify, weld,|sluit, kom saam, lĳmen, vergader, bout, sement, ketting, clip, kombineer, sluit, paartjie, krimp, vas, boei, lont, gom, worstel, boei, haakplek, haak bymekaar, gebreide, grendel, skakel, hand boei, saam te smelt, plak, pen, gips, saam te stel, sit, klink, veilige, naaldwerk, boei, soldeersel, stapel, stok, stok saam, band (up), verenig, te verenig, sweis,
(2) What words refer to joining one thing to another?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die aansluiting by een ding na die ander?
affix, anchor, annex, attach, batten, engraft, fix to, graft, moor, nail, screw, secure, stick to, tack,|aanbring, anker, aanhangsel, heg, Batten, inenten, los te, ent, moor, spyker, skroef, veilige, vashou aan, ryg,
(3) What words refer to things joining together?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na dinge samevoeging?
adhere, bind, cleave, cling, cohere, combine, fuse, merge, stick together, unite,|voldoen, bind, aanhang klou, saamhang, kombineer, lont, saam te smelt, saamstaan, verenig,
(4) What words refer to something joining itself to something?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets by hom tot iets?
attach to, bind to, fasten to, stick to, take hold of|heg aan, bind, vas te, vashou aan, gryp
(5) What words refer to the act of joining things together?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die daad van mekaar by dinge?
joining, attachment, bonding, combination, fusion, unification, union, welding,|aansluit, skakel, binding, kombinasie, fusion, eenwording, unie, sweiswerk,
(6) What words describe things that have been joined?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat aangesluit?
joined, affixed, anchored, assembled, attached, bolted, cemented, chained, connected, fastened, fixed to, fused, glued, handcuffed, manacled, nailed, pasted, pinned, plastered, riveted, sewn, shackled, stapled, stick, stuck, taped, united, unified, welded|aangesluit het, aangebring, geanker, vergader, aangeheg, vasgebout, gevestig, vasgeketting, verbind, vasgemaak, vas aan, saamgesmelt, vasgeplak, geboei, geboei, vasgespyker, geplak, vasgepen, gepleister, vasgenael, toegewerk, geboei, vasgekram, stok, vas , op band opgeneem, verenig, verenigde, gesweis
(7) What words refer to something made by joining things together?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat deur saam by dinge?
union, unity, assembly, assemblage, bundle, ensemble, merger, trinity, triumvirate, partnership, compound, couple, coupling, conglomerate, combination, construct (n),|unie, eenheid, vergadering, assemblage, bondel, ensemble, samesmelting, drie-eenheid, driemanskap, vennootskap, verbinding, paar, skakel, konglomeraat, kombinasie, bou (n),
(8) What words refer to something that is joined to something else?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat is gekoppel aan iets anders?
attachment,|beslaglegging,
(9) What words refer to the place where two things are joined together?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die plek waar twee dinge met mekaar verbind?
join (n), joint, junction, connection, contact point, intersection, seam,|sluit (n), gesamentlike, aansluiting, verband, kontak punt, kruising, naat,
(10) What words refer to how well things are joined together?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na hoe goed dinge saamgevoeg?
bond, coherent, fast, secure, stay, strong (joint/bond), weak (joint/bond), stuck,|band, samehangend, vinnige, veilige, bly sterk (gesamentlike / verband), swak (gesamentlike / verband), vas,
(11) What words refer to reuniting things that have come apart?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na hereniging dinge wat uitmekaar kom?
reunite, reassemble, rejoin, re-glue, reattach, refasten, put back together|herenig, weer aanmekaar, eindig, re-gom, aanheg, refasten, sit saam terug
Link, connect|Link, verbind
Use this domain for words related to a linking or connecting things together--to put something like a road, pipe, or wire between things so that people or things can move between them.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n skakel of die koppeling van die dinge - iets soos &#39;n pad, pyp, of draad tussen dinge, sodat mense of dinge kan beweeg tussen hulle.
(1) What words refer to linking things together?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na mekaar verbind dinge?
link, link up, connect, join, network,|skakel, skakel, konnekteer, verbind, netwerk,
(2) What words refer to something linking two things?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets koppel twee dinge?
link, connect,|skakel, maak,
(3) What words refer to two things being linked?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na twee dinge wat gekoppel?
be joined (together), be connected,|word by (saam), verbind word,
(4) What words refer to the thing that links two things?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die ding wat twee dinge skakels?
link, connection, coupling, hookup, network, passageway,|skakel, verband, skakel, vereniging, netwerk, gang,
(5) What words refer to two things (such as wires, roads, rivers) joining together?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na twee dinge (soos drade, paaie, riviere) samevoeging?
join, meet, converge, merge,|aan te sluit, te ontmoet, konvergeer, saam te smelt,
(6) What words refer to the place where two things (such as wires, roads, rivers) join together?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die plek waar twee dinge (soos drade, paaie, riviere) kom saam?
joint, connection, junction, intersection,|gesamentlike, verbinding, kruising, kruising,
(7) What words describe something that links two things?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat twee dinge skakels beskryf?
connecting,|verbind,
Stick together|Saamstaan
Use this domain for words referring to two or more things cohering or sticking together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na twee of meer dinge cohering of saam te steek.
(1) What words refer to joining two things together using glue or a sticky substance?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aansluiting by twee dinge saam met behulp van gom of &#39;n taai stof?
stick, stick down, stick together, glue,|hou, hou af, hou saam, gom,
(2) What words refer to two or more things sticking together?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na twee of meer dinge saam te steek?
stick, stick together, adhere, cake, cling, cohere, grip, lump,|hou, hou saam, voldoen, koek, klou, saamhang, greep, knop,
(3) What words describe something that sticks to other things?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat stokke na ander dinge te beskryf?
sticky, adhesive, gummy, magnetic, tacky,|taai, gom, Gummy, magnetiese, onhandig,
Add to something|Voeg iets
Use this domain for words related to adding something to another thing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets toe te voeg tot &#39;n ander ding.
(1) What words refer to adding a new part or piece to something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van &#39;n nuwe deel of &#39;n stuk iets?
add, add on, put on, append, superimpose,|voeg, voeg op, sit op, voeg, superimpose,
(2) What words refer to adding something to something you are cooking?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets om iets wat jy kook te voeg?
add, put in,|voeg, sit in,
(3) What words refer to adding more to an amount of something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na meer toe te voeg tot &#39;n bedrag van iets?
supplement, build on,|vul, bou op,
(4) What words refer to adding a quality to something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die toevoeging van &#39;n kwaliteit iets?
give, lend,|gee, leen,
(5) What words refer to adding to what has been said?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na toe te voeg tot wat gesê?
tack on,|ryg op,
(6) What words refer to something that has been added?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat bygevoeg word?
addition, additive, supplement, extra, adjunct, annex,|Daarbenewens toevoeging, aan te vul, ekstra, toevoegsel, aanhangsel,
(7) What words describe something that is added?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat bygevoeg word?
extra, supplemental, supplementary,|ekstra, aanvullende, aanvullende,
Remove, take apart|Te verwyder, uitmekaar
Use this domain for words related to removing part of something, taking something apart, and things coming apart.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verwydering van deel van iets, neem iets van mekaar af, en dinge kom uitmekaar.
(1) What words refer to removing a part of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verwydering van &#39;n deel van iets?
remove, removal, take off, detach, tear off, break off, cut off, cut away|verwyder, verwydering, neem af, los, skeur, breek, afgesny, sny weg
(2) What words refer to removing a part from inside something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verwydering van &#39;n deel van die binnekant van iets?
take out, remove, extract, extraction, cut out, get out, excision, withdraw,|neem, te verwyder, uittreksel, onttrekking, sny uit, kom uit, eksisie, onttrek,
(3) What words refer to removing a part from the surface of something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die verwydering van &#39;n deel van die oppervlak van iets?
take off, remove, wipe off, peel off, scrape off, scratch off, rub off|af te neem, te verwyder, vee af, skil af, skraap, krap af, vryf af
(4) What words refer to removing words from a book, or music from a tape?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die verwydering van die woorde van &#39;n boek, of musiek uit &#39;n band?
erase, delete, cross out, rub out|vee, te verwyder, kruis uit, vryf uit
(5) What words refer to the act of removing something?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die Wet van iets verwydering?
removal, extraction,|verwydering, onttrekking,
(6) What words describe something that can be removed?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat verwyder kan word te beskryf?
removable, temporary (ink), non-permanent,|verwissel, tydelike (ink), nie-permanente,
(7) What words describe something that cannot be removed?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat nie verwyder kan word te beskryf?
permanent,|permanente,
(8) What words refer to a tool or substance used to remove something?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n instrument of stof wat gebruik word om iets te verwyder?
eraser, remover, paint remover,|uitveër, verwyderaar, verf verwyderaar,
(9) What words refer to taking something apart?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die neem van iets uitmekaar?
take apart, detach, disunite, disassemble, disjoin, uncouple, unhook, unfasten, pull apart, break up, dismantle, take something to pieces|uitmekaar, los, onenig, demontage, losmaken, los te koppel, afhaak, losmaken, trek uitmekaar, breek, breek, neem iets om stukke
(10) What words describe something after it has been taken apart?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf iets nadat dit uitmekaar geneem is?
apart, detached, disassembled, dismembered, be in pieces,|uitmekaar, losstaande, uitmekaar gehaal, verbrokkel, in stukke,
(11) What words describe something that can be taken apart?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat uitmekaar gehaal kan word, beskryf?
detachable,|afneem,
(12) What words refer to things coming apart?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na dinge uitmekaar te kom?
come apart, come free, come loose, come off, come undone, come unglued, come unhooked, come unstuck, break up, disintegrate, fall apart, fall off, fall to pieces, peel off, pop off, separate, unravel, unroll, work free, work loose,|kom uitmekaar, kom vry, kom los, kom af, kom ongedaan gemaak, kom unglued, kom haak, kom unstuck, breek, disintegreer, uitmekaar val, val af, te pletter val, skil af, pop af, skei, ontrafel, rolle , werk vry, werk los,
Mix|Meng
Use this domain for words related to mixing things together--to put two or more different kinds of substances, like liquids or cooking ingredients,  together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vermenging van dinge saam - om twee of meer verskillende soorte saam van stowwe, soos vloeistowwe of kook bestanddele.
(1) What words refer to someone mixing things together?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iemand saam te meng dinge?
mix, mix something with something, mix things together, add something to something, amalgamate, bring together, coalesce, combine, commingle, dilute, fuse, imbue, interlard, intermingle, intermix, join, jumble, lump, meld, merge, mingle, scramble, unification, unify, unite,|meng, meng iets met iets, meng goed saam, iets toe te voeg tot iets amalgameer, saam te bring, verenig, kombineer, commingle, verdun, lont, dring, interlard, meng, intermix, aan te sluit, mengelmoes, knop, smelt, smelt, meng , geskarrel, eenwording, te verenig, te verenig,
(2) What words refer to things mixing together?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na dinge saam te meng?
amalgamate, blend, combine, commingle, fuse, intermix, meld, merge, merger, unite|amalgameer, versnit, kombineer, commingle, lont, intermix, smelt, smelt, samesmelting, verenig
(3) What words refer to something being a mixture of other things?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat &#39;n mengsel van ander dinge?
be a mixture of, combine, blend,|&#39;n mengsel van, kombineer, meng,
(4) What words refer to stirring something so that it is mixed well?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na roer iets so dat dit goed gemeng?
stir, stir up, stir together, beat, blend, knead, whisk,|roer, roer up, roer saam, klop, versnit, knie, klits,
(5) What words refer to something made by mixing things together?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat deur saam te meng dinge?
mix (n), mixture, admixture, amalgam, assortment, blend (n), brew (n), combination, composite, compound, conglomerate, conglomeration, fusion, hodgepodge, intermixture, jumble, mess, miscellany, mishmash, patchwork, odds and ends, solution, a cross between,|meng (n), mengsel, vermenging, amalgaam, verskeidenheid, versnit (n), brou (n), kombinasie, saamgestelde, verbinding, konglomeraat, opeenhoping, fusion, hutspot, vermenging, mengelmoes, gemors, trivia, mengelmoes, patchwork, kans en eindig, oplossing, &#39;n kruising tussen,
(6) What words describe something made by mixing things together?|(6) Watter woorde iets gemaak deur saam te meng dinge beskryf?
mixed, mixed up, amalgamated, assorted, blended, combined, composite, compounded, conglomerated, diluted, half-and-half, heterogeneous, intermixed, jumbled, mingled, miscellaneous, motley, scrambled, tangled, together, varied, variegated,|gemengde, deurmekaar, saamgesmelt, verskillende, gemengde, gekombineer, saamgestelde, saamgestel, conglomerated, verdun, half-en-half, heterogene, vermeng, deurmekaar, gemeng, diverse, mengelmoes, warboel, verstrengel, saam, gevarieerde, bont,
(7) What tools and machines are used to mix things?|(7) Wat gereedskap en masjiene word gebruik om dinge te meng?
mixer, blender, food processor, eggbeater,|mixer, blender, voedsel verwerker, klitser,
(8) What words refer to different things that do not mix well with each other?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na verskillende dinge wat nie goed meng met mekaar?
do not mix, incompatible, do not go well together,|meng nie, onversoenbare, nie goed saam te gaan,
Pure, unmixed|Suiwer, ongemeng
Use this domain for words related to being pure--words describing something (like water, food, or air) that does not have anything bad in it; or unmixed--words describing something that is only one thing and has not been mixed with something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat suiwer - woorde iets (soos water, kos, of lug) beskryf wat nie iets sleg in dit het nie; of ongemeng - woorde iets wat net een ding en nie gemeng met iets anders beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is pure?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat suiwer beskryf?
pure, pristine, sheer, solid, unadulterated, unblended, uncombined, uncompounded, undiluted, unmixed, unpolluted, untainted, 100%,|suiwer, ongerepte, pure, soliede, suiwer, puur, uncombined, uncompounded, onverdunde, ongemeng, onbesoedelde, ongerepte, 100%,
(2) What words refer to something that is pure?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat suiwer?
element|element
(3) What words describe something that is not pure?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat nie suiwer is nie, beskryf?
impure, adulterated, mixed, polluted, tainted, diluted|onsuiwer, vervalste, gemeng, besoedelde, vuil, verwaterde
(4) What words refer to making something pure by removing other things from it?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets suiwer deur die verwydering van ander dinge daaruit?
purify, distill, refine,|reinig, distilleer, te verfyn,
(5) What words refer to making something impure by adding something bad to it?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets onsuiwer deur iets sleg om dit toe te voeg?
adulterate, contaminate, pollute,|vertroebel, besoedel, besoedel,
(6) What words refer to something bad that has been adding to something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets sleg wat reeds die toevoeging van iets?
impurity, contaminant, pollutant, pollution,|onreinheid, kontaminant, besoedelende, besoedeling,
Tie|Tie
Use this domain for words related to tying things together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met mekaar vasmaak dinge.
(1) What words refer to tying things together?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na mekaar vasmaak dinge?
tie, tie together, tie up, bind, cinch, gird, hitch, lash, moor, rope together, tether, truss, wind,|tie, das saam, saamvat, bind, cinch, omgord haakplek, slag, moor, tou saam ketting, stut, wind,
(2) What words refer to tying a knot?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n knoop vasmaak?
tie a knot, knot a rope, braid,|n knoop, knoop &#39;n tou, braid,
(3) What words refer to tying up a person?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na vasmaak &#39;n persoon?
tie up, bind hand and foot, shackle,|saamvat, bind hand en voet, boei,
(4) What words refer to a knot or a particular kind of knot?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n knoop of &#39;n bepaalde soort knoop?
knot, braid, lashing, hitch, square knot, slip knot, two half hitches|knoop, braid, lashing, haakplek, vierkantige knoop, glip knoop, twee halwe haakplekke
(5) What words refer to a group of things that have been tied up?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge wat vasgebind?
bundle, package, packet, parcel|bundel, pakket, pak, pakket
(6) What words describe things that have been tied?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat vasgemaak?
tied, bound, lashed, moored, tethered,|vasgebind, gebind, geslaan, vasgemeer, vasgemaak,
(7) What words refer to tying something tightly?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na vasmaak iets styf?
bind tightly, cinch up, tighten, truss up|bind styf, cinch up, trek, kap up
(8) What words describe something that has been tied tightly?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat styf vasgebind beskryf?
taut, tight, tightly, strain, stretched,|styf, styf, styf, stam, gestrek,
(9) What words describe something that has been tied loosely?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat losweg vasgemaak beskryf?
loose, loosely, slack, give it some slack,|los, los, slap, gee dit &#39;n slap,
(10) What words refer to untying something?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na donkie iets?
untie, be untied, take off the rope, undo|los te maak, word nie losgemaak af die tou, ongedaan te maak
(11) What words refer to something becoming untied by accident?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets besig losgemaak deur &#39;n ongeluk?
come untied, come loose,|kom losgemaak, kom los,
(12) What words refer to tying something a second time after it has come untied?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na vasmaak iets wat &#39;n tweede keer nadat dit losgemaak het gekom?
retie|Retie
Rope, string|Tou, string
Use this domain for words referring to rope, string, and other things used to tie things together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na tou, tou, en ander dinge wat gebruik word om dinge saam te bind.
(1) What types of rope and string are there?|(1) Watter tipes tou en string is daar?
rope, string, band, bindings, bonds, cable, chain, cord, lace, lashing, line, ribbon, rubber band, shoelace, shoestring, strap, thong, twine, binder twine, wire,|tou, tou, band, bindings, effekte, kabel, ketting, koord, kant, lashing, lyn, lint, rubber band, skoenveter, spot, band, riem, tou, band tou, draad,
Tangle|Warboel
Use this domain for words related to becoming tangled--when something long and thin, such as rope, string, thread, hair, grass, or vines, becomes disorganized, twisted, or knotted, so that it is hard to separate it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met raak verstrengel - wanneer iets lank en dun, soos tou, tou, draad, hare, gras, of wingerde, ongeorganiseerd raak, gedraai, of geknoop, sodat dit is moeilik om dit te skei.
(1) What words refer to things becoming tangled?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dinge raak verstrengel?
tangle, entangle, become tangled, get all tangled up, snarl,|warboel, verstrik word, word verstrengel, kry al verstrengel, warboel,
(2) What words described something that is tangled?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat verstrengel beskryf?
tangled, matted, raveled, snarled, all mixed up,|verstrengel, matte, raveled, toegesnou, alles deurmekaar,
(3) What words refer to untangling something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die oplos van iets?
untangle, unravel, comb out, straighten out,|ontknoop, ontrafel, kam uit, reguit uit
(4) What words refer to something that has become tangled?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat het geword verstrengel?
tangle (n), tangled mess, jumble, mix-up, rat's nest, snarl,|warboel (n), verstrengelde gemors, mengelmoes, meng-up, rat se nes, warboel,
Organize|Organiseer
Use this domain for words referring to organizing things, people, events, and ideas--to think about and decide on the pattern a group of things should be arranged in, and then doing whatever is necessary to arrange them so that they can be used for some purpose. This domain is like the domain 'Arrange' except that 'Arrange' emphasizes physically moving the things, and the domain 'Organize' emphasizes the logical system. 'Organize' does not require that the things be moved, only that the logical pattern is specified.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die organisering van dinge, mense, gebeure en idees - om te dink oor en besluit op die patroon &#39;n groep van die dinge moet gereël word in, en dan doen wat nodig is om dit te reël sodat dit gebruik kan word vir &#39;n doel. Dit domein is soos die domein &#39;Reël&#39; behalwe dat &#39;Reël&#39; beklemtoon fisies die verskuiwing van die dinge, en die domein &#39;Organiseer&#39; beklemtoon die logiese stelsel. &#39;Organiseer&#39; nie vereis dat die dinge geskuif nie, net dat die logiese patroon is gespesifiseer nie.
(1) What words refer to organizing things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die organisering van dinge?
organize, dispose, structure, get together, get it together, get your act together, chart, marshal, put in a chart, put in a table, put in a matrix, sort, sort out, systematize, tabulate,|organiseer, vervreem, struktuur, bymekaar te kry, kry dit saam, kry jou sake agtermekaar, grafiek, beampte, sit in &#39;n grafiek, sit in &#39;n tabel, sit in &#39;n matriks, sorteer, uit te sorteer, te sistematiseer, tabuleer,
(2) What words refer to the pattern in which things are organized?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die patroon waarop dinge georganiseer?
organization, ad hoc, alignment, apparatus, cycle, framework, hierarchy, mechanism, network, order, ordering, pattern, row, sequence, set-up, structure, system,|organisasie, ad hoc, belyning, apparaat, siklus, raamwerk, hiërargie, meganisme, netwerk, orde, bestel, patroon, ry, ry, set-up, struktuur, stelsel,
(3) What tools and methods are used for organizing things?|(3) Wat gereedskap en metodes word gebruik vir die organisering van die dinge?
table, matrix, chart, organizational chart, flow chart, grid, cubby hole, pigeon hole, in basket, out basket,|tafel, matriks, grafiek, organisatoriese grafiek, vloeikaart, rooster, paneelkissie, duif gat, in mandjie uit mandjie
(4) What words refer to organizing things a second time, or organizing things after they have been disorganized?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die organisering van dinge wat &#39;n tweede keer, of organisering dinge nadat hulle ongeorganiseerd?
reorganize, reorganization, adjust, reform, reorder, reordering,|herorganiseer, herorganisasie, pas, hervorming, rangskik, herorganisering,
(5) What words describe things that have been organized?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat georganiseer?
organized, ordered, well-ordered, orderly, in order, harmonious, shipshape, structured, systematic, tidy, everything in its place,|georganiseer, bestel, geordende, ordelike, in orde, harmonie, in orde, gestruktureerde, sistematiese, netjies, alles in sy plek,
(6) What words describe a person who organizes things well?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat dinge goed organiseer?
organized, methodical, neat, together,|georganiseer, metodies, netjies, saam,
(7) What words refer to when everything is organized?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na wanneer alles is georganiseer?
Disorganized|Ongeorganiseerd
Use this domain for words related to things becoming disorganized.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die dinge besig ongeorganiseerd.
(1) What words describe things that are disorganized?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat ongeorganiseerd is?
disorganized, arbitrary, chaotic, confused, in disarray, haphazard, helter-skelter, jumbled, messed up, messy,  nonsystematic, random, unarranged, unsorted, unmethodical, unordered, unorganized, unsystematic,|ongeorganiseerd, arbitrêre, chaotiese, verward, in wanorde, lukraak, holderstebolder, deurmekaar, deurmekaar, slordig, nonsystematic, random, unarranged, ongesorteerde, metodisch, ongeordende, ongeorganiseerd, onsistematies,
(2) What words refer to disorganizing things?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na disorganizing dinge?
disorganize, disarrange, shuffle, mess up, randomize,|desorganiseren, war bring, shuffle, gemors, randomize,
(3) What words refer to the state of things being disorganized?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die stand van sake word ongeorganiseerd?
disorganization, ambient state, chaos, disorder,|disorganisasie, omringende staat, chaos, wanorde,
Substitute|Plaasvervanger
Use this domain for words referring to substituting something for something else--to move something and put something else in its place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die vervanging van iets vir iets anders - iets beweeg en sit iets anders in die plek daarvan.
(1) What words refer to putting something in the place of something else?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om iets in die plek van iets anders?
substitute, supplant, replace|plaasvervanger, onderkruiper, te vervang
(2) What words refer to putting each of two things in the place of the other?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na om elk van twee dinge in die plek van die ander?
exchange, switch (places)|ruil, skakel (plekke)
Multiple things moving|Verskeie dinge beweeg
Use this domain for words referring to multiple things moving.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na verskeie dinge beweeg.
(1) What words refer to more than one thing moving in the same direction?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na meer as een ding beweeg in dieselfde rigting?
move together, move parallel|beweeg saam, parallel beweeg
(2) What words refer to more than one thing moving away from each other?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na meer as een ding om weg te beweeg van mekaar?
disperse, thin out, melt away, break up, spread out, diverge, permeate,|versprei, dun uit, smelt weg, breek, versprei, divergeer, deurdring,
(3) What words refer to more than one thing moving toward each other?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na meer as een ding beweeg na mekaar?
gather, collect, form, mass, congregate, converge, close (v), close in on, concentrate, crowd in,|versamel, versamel, vorm, massa, vergader, konvergeer, naby (v), sluit in op, konsentreer, skare in,
(4) What words refer to more than one thing meeting?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na meer as een ding vergadering?
meet, come together, unite, crash, collide,|ontmoet, kom saam, verenig, crash, bots,
(5) What words refer to the place where things come together?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die plek waar dinge bymekaar kom?
meeting point, focal point, focus, confluence|vergadering punt, fokuspunt, fokus, samevloeiing
(6) What words refer to more than one thing moving around in a place?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na meer as een ding rond te beweeg in &#39;n plek?
crowd, fill, mill around, swarm,|skare, vul, meul rondom, wemel,
Simple, complicated|Eenvoudige, gekompliseerde
Use this domain for words related to being simple or complicated--words describing the organization of a group of things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat eenvoudig of ingewikkeld - woorde beskryf die organisasie van &#39;n groep van die dinge.
(1) What words describe something that is simple?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat eenvoudig beskryf?
simple, basic, crude, elemental, elementary, neat, plain, primitive, rudimentary, single, uniform, unsophisticated, low-tech,|eenvoudige, basiese, ru, basiese, elementêre, netjies, plain, primitief, basiese, enkel, uniform, ongesofistikeerde, lae-tegnologie,
(2) What words describe something that is complicated?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat ingewikkeld beskryf?
complicated, complex, intricate, elaborate, convoluted, sophisticated, tortuous, variable,|ingewikkelde, komplekse, ingewikkelde, ingewikkelde, ingewikkelde, gesofistikeerd, kronkelende, veranderlike,
