(3) What words refer to making something simpler?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets eenvoudiger?
simplify|vereenvoudig
(4) What words refer to making something more complicated?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets meer ingewikkeld?
complicate|bemoeilik
(5) What words describe a simple connection between two things?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n eenvoudige verband tussen twee dinge?
simple, one to one,|eenvoudige, 1-1,
(6) What words describe a complex connection between two things?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n komplekse verband tussen twee dinge?
complex, complicated, one to many,|kompleks, ingewikkeld, een vir baie,
Put|Sit
Use this domain for words related to putting something somewhere.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met om iets iewers.
(1) What words refer to putting something somewhere?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om iets iewers?
put, install, lodge, mount, place (v), position (v), set, situate, sling, stash, stow,|sit, installeer, lodge, die berg, plek (v), posisie (v), stel, geleë is, slinger, stash, Stow,
Load, pile|Las, hoop
Use this domain for words related to putting lots of things on something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met om baie van die dinge wat op iets.
(1) What words refer to putting lots of things on something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na om baie van die dinge wat op iets?
cram, crowd, drape, dust, hang, heap, jam, load, mound, pack, pile, scatter, settle, sew, shower, spread, stack, stick, stock, strew, string, stuff, wrap|cram, skare, drapeer, stof, hang, hoop, konfyt, vrag, heuwel, pak, paal, strooi, vereffen, naaldwerk, stort, versprei, stapel, stok, voorraad, strooi, string, stuff, wrap
Fill, cover|Vul, dekking
Use this domain for words related to filling a container or covering an area with something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vul &#39;n houer of &#39;n gebied met iets.
(1) What words refer to filling something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die invul iets?
fill, choke, clog, deluge, drench, flood, inundate, plug, saturate, soak,|vul, verstik, verstop, vloed, deurdrenking, vloed, oorstroom, plug, versadig, week,
(2) What words refer to covering something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na wat iets?
cover, coat, blanket, coat, encrust, mask, pave, plate, robe, shroud, smother, swathe,|cover, rok, kombers, rok, incrusteren, masker, baan, plate, klere, bos versmoor, strook,
Hide|Verberg
Use this domain for words related to hiding things so that they cannot be seen or found, and for hiding oneself.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dinge wegsteek sodat hulle nie gesien kan word of gevind, en vir jouself wegsteek.
(1) What words refer to hiding something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets wegsteek?
hide, conceal, concealment, bury, secrecy|wegsteek, verberg, verberging, begrawe, geheimhouding
hidden, secret|verborge, geheime
(3) What words refer to the place where something is hidden?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die plek waar iets weggesteek?
hiding place, hideout, refuge,|wegkruip plek, skuilplek, toevlug,
(4) What words refer to hiding yourself?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na jouself wegsteek?
hide, take refuge, go into hiding, disappear,|wegsteek, skuil, gaan wegkruip, verdwyn,
(5) What words refer to coming out from hiding?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na kom uit wegkruip?
come out (from hiding), surface|kom uit (van wegkruip), oppervlak
Search|Soek
Use this domain for words related to searching for something that has been hidden or lost.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die soek vir iets wat verborge was of verlore raak.
(1) What words refer to searching for something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die soek na iets?
search, look, look for, seek, hunt for, dig, explore, root, sniff, spy, track, be on the lookout for,|soek, kyk, kyk, soek, jag vir, te grawe, te verken, wortel, snuif, spioen, spoor, wees op die uitkyk vir,
(2) What words refer to the act of searching for something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die Wet van die soek na iets?
search (n), quest,|soek (n), soeke,
spot, locate, descry, detect, discern, distinguish, espy, catch a glimpse of, spy, sight something|spot, vind, laat bespied, op te spoor, te onderskei, te onderskei, Espy, vang &#39;n glimp van, spioen, sig iets
(4) What words refer to looking for something and not seeing it?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets soek en sien dit nie?
overlook,|vergeet,
Find|Vind
Use this domain for words related to finding something that has been hidden or lost.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die vind iets wat verborge was of verlore raak.
(1) What words refer to finding something that has been hidden?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vind iets wat verborge was?
find, discover, discovery, uncover, eureka, locate,|vind, ontdek, ontdekking, ontbloot, Eureka, op te spoor,
(2) What words refer to learning the location of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die leer van die ligging van iets?
come upon, discover, discovery, ferret out, find, learn, learn the whereabouts, strike,|oorval, ontdek, ontdekking, krimpvarkie uit, vind, te leer, te leer oor waar, staking,
Lose, misplace|Verloor, misplaatsen
Use this domain for words referring to putting something in a place and not being able to find it again, or for when someone else moves something without your knowledge so that you cannot find it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na om iets in &#39;n plek en nie in staat is om dit weer te vind, of vir wanneer iemand anders iets beweeg sonder jou kennis, sodat jy nie kan vind nie.
(1) What words refer to losing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets verloor?
lose, loss, misplace|verloor, verlies, misplaatsen
Physical impact|Fisiese impak
Use this domain for general words referring to making a physical impact on  something, including the words for the action itself and the result of the  action.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na &#39;n fisiese impak op iets, insluitende die woorde vir die aksie self en die resultaat van die aksie.
(1) What general words refer to making an impact on something?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n impak op iets?
impact (v), affect, change (v), impinge|impak (v), beïnvloed, verandering (v), inbreuk maak
(2) What words refer to the effect on the object?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die effek op die voorwerp?
impact (n), effect, change (n), impression|impak (n), effek, verandering (n), indruk
Hit|Getref
Use this domain for words related to hitting something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets slaan.
(1) What words refer to one thing hitting another?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na een ding slaan &#39;n ander?
hit, strike, bang into, smack, bump (into), crash into|getref het, staking, bang in, smack, stamp (in), crash in
(2) What words refer to a person hitting something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon iets slaan?
hit, strike|treffer, staking
(3) What words refer to hitting another person?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na slaan &#39;n ander persoon?
box, beat up, punch, hit out at, strike out at|boks, slaan, pons, getref uit by, slaan uit by
(4) What words refer to hitting something with your fist or hand?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets met jou vuis of hand slaan?
hit, slap, smack|getref het, klap, klap
(5) What words refer to hitting something with a tool?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets slaan met &#39;n instrument?
hammer, pound, club, whip|hamer, pond, klub, sweep
(6) What words refer to hitting two things together?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na slaan twee dinge saam?
(7) What words refer to striking someone in order to cause injury?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na treffende iemand om besering te veroorsaak?
(8) What words refer to striking something repeatedly?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets treffend herhaaldelik?
hit over and over, beat|getref oor en oor, klop
(9) What words refer to each time something is hit?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na elke keer iets getref?
stroke, blow, beat, punch,|beroerte, blaas, beat, pons,
(10) What words refer to the speed or force with which something is hit?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die spoed of krag waarmee iets getref?
force, impact|krag, impak
(11) What words describe hitting something with not much force?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf slaan iets nie veel krag?
light hit, tap, knock|lig treffer, tap, klop
(12) What words describe hitting something with a lot of force?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf slaan iets met &#39;n klomp van krag?
hit hard, whack, smash into, wallop, cream|hard, veeg, smash in, opstopper, room
(13) What words refer to two things moving so that they hit each other?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na twee dinge beweeg sodat hulle mekaar slaan?
collide, hit each other, run into each other|bots, druk mekaar, loop in mekaar
(14) What words refer to something hitting and then bouncing?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na iets slaan en dan weerkaats?
bounce, rebound, glance off, ricochet, recoil,|weiering, rebound loer af, ricochet, recoil,
Aim at a target|Streef na &#39;n teiken
Use this domain for words referring to aiming at a target, and for hitting or missing the target.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die oog op &#39;n teiken, en vir die slaan of mis die teiken.
(1) What words refer to aiming at a target?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die oog op &#39;n teiken?
aim, point, direct, line up on, set your sights on, sight along, focus on|doel, punt, direkte, lyn op, stel jou visier op, oë saam, fokus op
(2) What words refer to hitting a target?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n teiken slaan?
hit, on target|getref het, op die teiken
(3) What words refer to missing a target?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n teiken ontbreek?
miss, fall short, overshoot, off center, wild shot|mis, te kort skiet, oorskiet, off sentrum, wilde skoot
(4) What words refer to the target?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die teiken?
target, goal|teiken, doel
(5) What words refer to the center of a target?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die sentrum van &#39;n teiken?
bull's-eye, dead center|kol, dood sentrum
(6) What words refer to a person who is good at hitting a target?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat goed op te slaan &#39;n teiken?
sharpshooter, marksman, good aim, good eye|skerpskutter, skut, goeie doel, goeie oog
Kick|Kick
Use this domain for words referring to kicking--to hit something with your foot. The words in this domain may be distinguished by the way in which the foot moves, either in a swinging motion, or by first bending the leg and then quickly straightening it. They may also be distinguished by whether the foot moves horizontally or vertically, whether the effect is to move something or damage it, or how hard the person kicks.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na skop - iets met jou voet getref. Die woorde in hierdie domein kan onderskei deur die manier waarop die voet beweeg, hetsy in &#39;n swaaiende beweging, of deur die eerste buiging die been en dan vinnig reguit nie. Hulle kan ook onderskei word deur of die voet beweeg horisontaal of vertikaal, of die effek is om iets te beweeg of beskadig nie, of hoe hard die persoon skop.
(1) What words refer to kicking something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na skop iets?
kick, give something a kick, kick in (a door), boot, punt, stamp, stomp on, stub your toe on something|skop, gee iets wat &#39;n skop, skop in (&#39;n deur), boot, punt, stempel, trap op, stomp jou toe op iets
Press|Press
Use this domain for words referring to pressing something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets druk.
(1) What words refer to pressing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets druk?
press, push on, apply pressure|pers, druk op, pas druk
Rub|Vryf
Use this domain for words referring to rubbing--to move something smooth against something else, in order to make it smooth or clean.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na vryf - iets glad teen iets anders beweeg, ten einde te maak dit glad of skoon te maak.
(1) What words refer to rubbing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets vryf?
rub, chafe, rasp,|vryf, skaaf, rasper,
(2) What words refer to rubbing something to make it clean?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets om te maak dit skoon te vryf?
wipe|vee
(3) What words refer to rubbing something to make it smooth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets om te maak dit glad te vryf?
polish|polish
(4) What tools and materials are used to rub something?|(4) Wat gereedskap en materiaal gebruik om iets te vryf?
Grind|Grind
Use this domain for words referring to grinding--to rub something rough against something else, while applying force, in order to break it or remove its surface.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die maal - iets grof teen iets anders vryf, terwyl die toepassing van krag is, ten einde dit te breek of te verwyder die oppervlak.
(1) What words refer to grinding something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die maal iets?
grind, grate, scrape, scratch|slyp, koper, skraap, kras
Mark|Mark
Use this domain for words related to making a mark on something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die maak van &#39;n merk op iets.
(1) What words refer to making a mark on something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n merk op iets?
mark, stain|merk, vlek
(2) What words refer to a mark on something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n punt op iets?
mark, stain, spot, smudge, fingerprint|merk, vlek, spot, smet, vingerafdruk
Divide into pieces|Verdeel in stukke
Use this domain for words referring to dividing something into parts or pieces, perhaps with the added idea of using care, or into a certain number of parts.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets in dele of stukke verdeel, miskien met die bykomende idee van die gebruik sorg, of in &#39;n sekere aantal van die dele.
(1) What words are used of dividing something into parts?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik van iets in dele verdeel?
divide (up), divide into pieces, division, split (up), halve, quarter (v), apportion, take apart|verdeel (up), verdeel in stukke, afdeling, split (up), halveer, kwartaal (v), toedeel, uitmekaar
Break|Breek
Use this domain for words referring breaking something into pieces, perhaps with the added idea of doing it accidentally or without being careful.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys breek iets in stukke, miskien met die bykomende idee van doen dit per ongeluk of sonder versigtig.
(1) What words refer to something breaking?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets breek?
(2) What words refer to breaking something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets breek?
break, bust, fracture|breek, bors, fraktuur
(3) What words refer to breaking something into many small pieces?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets in baie klein stukkies breek?
break into pieces, smash, crush, pulverize, atomize|breek in stukke, smash, vermorsel, vermorsel, verstuiven
(4) What words describe something that has been broken?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat gebreek is, beskryf?
broken, smashed, crushed, pulverized, (be) in pieces, busted|gebreek, verpletter, gekneus, fyngemaak, (wees) in stukke, Busted
(5) What words refer to breaking through a barrier?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die breek deur &#39;n versperring?
break through, breakout|deurbreek, tempo
(6) What words refer to a container like a bag, bottle, or bubble breaking because there was too much inside?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n houer soos &#39;n sak, bottel of borrel breek, want daar was te veel binnekant?
burst, break open|bars, oop te breek
(7) What sounds do things make when they break?|(7) wat klink nie dinge te maak wanneer hulle breek?
snap, crack, pop, boom, crash|snap, crack, pop, boom, crash
(8) What words describe something that is easily broken?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat maklik is gebreek beskryf?
breakable, brittle, delicate, fragile, flimsy,|breekbare, bros, delikate, broos, swak,
(9) What words describe something that is not easily broken?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat nie maklik gebreek word beskryf?
strong, tough, hard, unbreakable, durable,|sterk, taai, harde, onbreekbaar, duursame,
Crack|Kraak
Use this domain for words referring to a crack--a partial break in something that does not entirely divide it in pieces.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n kraak - &#39;n gedeeltelike onderbreking in iets wat nie heeltemal nie verdeel dit in stukke.
(1) What words refer to a crack?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kraak?
crack, split, fissure, crevasse|kraak, verdeel, groef, skeur
Cut|Sny
Use this domain for words related to cutting something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die sny van iets.
(1) What general words refer to cutting something?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die sny iets?
cut,|sny,
(2) What words refer to cutting something with one slice?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets sny met een sny?
slice, cut once, cut in one movement,|sny, een keer gesny, sny in een beweging,
(3) What words refer to cutting something with many slices?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die sny iets met baie snye?
hack, cut repeatedly|hack, herhaaldelik sny
(4) What words refer to cutting something into many pieces?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die sny iets in baie stukke?
cut up, cut into pieces, dice, grate, shred, cube, quarter, halve, mince, grind,|sny, sny in stukke, dobbelstene, koper, flard, kubus, kwartaal, halveer, maalvleis, slyp,
(5) What words refer to cutting something with a swinging motion?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets sny met &#39;n swaaiende beweging?
chop|kap
(6) What words refer to cutting something with a particular tool?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets sny met &#39;n besondere instrument?
knife, ax|mes, byl
(7) What words refer to a cut?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n sny?
cut, incision|sny, insnyding
Tear, rip|Traan, rip
Use this domain for words related to tearing or ripping something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met skeur of rip iets.
(1) What words refer to tearing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na skeur iets?
tear, rip, shred|traan, rip, flard
Make hole, opening|Maak gat, opening
Use this domain for words related to making a hole or opening in something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die maak van &#39;n gat of opening in iets.
(1) What words refer to making a hole in something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gat in iets?
make a hole, make an opening, pierce, put a hole in, bore, drill, stab, broach|maak &#39;n gat, maak &#39;n opening, steek, het &#39;n gat in, gebaar het, boor, steek, benader
(2) What words refer to an opening?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n opening?
opening, hole, aperture|opening, gat, diafragma
Dig|Dig
Use this domain for words related to digging in the ground.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die grawe in die grond.
(1) What words refer to digging?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die grawe?
dig, mine, excavate, tunnel, burrow, unearth, undermine, cave in, bulldoze, shovel out, scoop, scratch out, scrape, drill, dredge, sink (a hole)|dig, myne, uitgrawe, tonnel, grawe, opschommelen, te ondermyn, grot in, bulldoze, skop uit, skep, uitkrap, skraap, boor, bagger, sink (&#39;n gat)
(2) What words refer to a hole dug in the ground?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gat in die grond gegrawe?
hole, pit, mine, excavation, tunnel, burrow, trench, ditch, shaft, foxhole, crater, cave, cavern, grotto|gat, put, myne, uitgrawing, tonnel, grawe, sloot, voor, steel, Foxhole, krater, grot grot, grot
(3) What tools and machines are used to dig?|(3) Wat gereedskap en masjiene word gebruik om te grawe?
shovel, spade, hoe, pickaxe, steam shovel, bulldozer, backhoe|graaf, graaf, hoe, pik, graaf stoom, stootskraper, graaf
(4) What words describe the size of a hole in the ground?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf die grootte van &#39;n gat in die grond?
deep, shallow, narrow, wide|diep, vlak, smal, wye
(5) What words refer to putting something in a hole and covering it up?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na om iets in &#39;n gat en bedek dit?
bury|begrawe
Break, wear out|Breek, dra uit
Use this domain for words related to something breaking or wearing out, especially for things that people make and use.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets breek of dra uit, veral vir dinge wat mense maak en te gebruik.
break, bust, give out,|breek, bors, gee uit,
(2) What words describe something that has broken?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat gebreek het, beskryf?
broken, broken down, busted|gebreek, afgebreek, Busted
(3) What words refer to something wearing out?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets dra uit?
wear, wear out, deteriorate,|dra, dra nie, verswak,
(4) What words describe something that is worn?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat gedra beskryf?
used, well used, worn, well worn, is past its prime, second hand|gebruik, goed gebruik, gedra, goed gedra, is verby sy eerste, tweede hand
(5) What words describe something that has been used so much that it is no longer useful?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat so baie dat dit nie meer nuttig gebruik te beskryf?
worn out, has had it, is past it,|uitgeput, het dit gehad het, is verlede,
Damage|Skade
Use this domain for words referring to damaging something--to do something bad to something, but not completely ruin it so that it can't be used any more.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets beskadig - om iets sleg te doen om iets, maar nie heeltemal vernietig sodat dit nie meer gebruik kan word.
(1) What words refer to damaging something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets beskadig?
damage, do damage, cause damage, break, bust, chip, corrode, corrupt, deface, dent, erode, harm, do harm, hurt, impair, injure, maltreat, mar, mess up, nick, sabotage, score, scratch, spoil, vandalize,|skade, doen skade, skade veroorsaak, breek, bors, chip, korrodeer, korrupte, skend, duik, erodeer, skade, doen skade, beseer, benadeel, beseer, uitskel, mar, gemors, Nick, sabotasie, telling, kras, buit, vandaliseer,
(2) What words refer to deliberately damaging something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na doelbewus iets beskadig?
vandalize, vandal, smash up, sabotage, tamper with, deface, desecrate,|vandaliseer, vandalisme, smash up, sabotasie, peuter met, skend, skend,
(3) What words refer to something being damaged over a long period of time?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat beskadig oor &#39;n lang tydperk van die tyd?
wear away, corrode, erode,|dra weg, korrodeer, erodeer,
(4) What words refer to using something for a long time until it is damaged?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die gebruik van iets vir &#39;n lang tyd totdat dit beskadig?
wear away, wear out,|dra weg, dra nie,
(5) What words refer to the act of damaging something?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die Wet van iets beskadig?
corrosion, detriment, erosion, maltreatment, mischief, vandalism,|roes, nadeel, erosie, mishandeling, kwaad, vandalisme,
(6) What words refer to the damage done to something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die skade aan iets?
damage (n), scar, wear (n), wear and tear,|skade (n), litteken, dra (n), slytasie,
(7) What words refer to a person who damages things?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat skade dinge?
vandal, saboteur, bull in a china shop,|vandalisme, saboteur, bul in &#39;n china shop,
(8) What words refer to something that damages things?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat skade dinge?
blight,|roes,
(9) What words describe something that damages things?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat skade dinge?
harmful, toxic, toxicity, unwholesome, dangerous,|skadelike, giftige, toksisiteit, ongesonde, gevaarlike,
(10) What words refer to something that has been damaged?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat beskadig is?
breakages, damaged goods,|breek, beskadig goedere,
(11) What words describe something that has been damaged?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat beskadig is?
spoiled, broken, busted, messed up, damaged, crumbling, moth-eaten,|bederf, gebreek, stukkend, deurmekaar, beskadig, verkrummel, mot-geëet,
(12) What words describe something that can be damaged easily?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat maklik beskadig kan word, beskryf?
vulnerable,|kwesbaar,
Tear down|Afbreek
Use this domain for words referring to tearing down buildings and other structures.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die afbreek van geboue en ander strukture.
(1) What words refer to tearing something down?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na skeur iets neer?
tear down, demolish, dismantle, take apart, take down|afbreek, sloop, af te breek, uitmekaar, neem af
Destroy|Vernietig
Use this domain for words referring to destroying something--to damage something so that it is beyond repair and cannot be used.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets vernietig - iets beskadig sodat dit onherstelbaar en kan nie gebruik word nie.
(1) What words refer to destroying something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets vernietig?
destroy, blow up, hose (v), ruin, total (v), wreck, blow up, burn down,|vernietig, blaas, slang (v), ondergang, totale (v), wrak, blaas, afbrand,
(2) What words refer to something being destroyed?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat vernietig?
fall down, collapse, be blown down,|val, val, word omgewaai,
(3) What words refer to the act or process of destroying something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die handeling of proses van iets te vernietig?
destruction, ruin,|vernietiging,
(4) What words refer to someone or something that destroys things?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat dinge vernietig of iemand?
destroyer,|verwoester,
(5) What words describe someone of something that destroys things?|(5) Watter woorde iemand van iets wat dinge vernietig beskryf?
destructive,|vernietigende,
(6) What words refer to something that has been destroyed?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat vernietig is?
ruin, wreck, wreckage, shipwreck,|ondergang, wrak, wrak, skeepswrak
(7) What words describe something that has been destroyed?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat vernietig is, beskryf?
destroyed, ruined, wrecked, be in ruins,|vernietig, verwoes, skipbreuk gely, in puin,
Repair|Herstel
Use this domain for words related to repairing something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die herstel van iets.
(1) What words refer to repairing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die herstel van iets?
repair, fix, mend, restore, restoration, undo, correct, rebuild, right, put to rights|herstel, herstel, herstel, herstel, herstel, ongedaan te maak, korrek is, te bou, reg te maak aan die regte
States|State
Use this domain for general words refer to the state or condition of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na die staat of toestand van iets.
(1) What general words refer to the state or condition of something?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die staat of toestand van iets?
state, condition, shape, position,|staat, toestand, vorm, posisie,
(2) What words indicate the state that something is in?|(2) Watter woorde dui die staat wat iets in?
be, fare, stand,|wees, prys, staan,
Quantity|Hoeveelheid
Use this domain for general words referring to the amount or quantity of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde wat verwys na die bedrag of hoeveelheid van iets.
(1) What words refer to the amount of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die hoeveelheid van iets?
amount, quantity, level, volume, percentage, proportion, sum, how much, ($100) worth,|bedrag, hoeveelheid, vlak, volume, persentasie, verhouding, eweredigheid, hoeveel, ($ 100) werd is,
(2) What words refer to the amount of something that can be counted?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die hoeveelheid van iets wat getel kan word?
number, how many, numbers, ratio,|nommer, hoeveel, getalle, verhouding,
(3) What words refer to the amount of food that someone is given?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die hoeveelheid voedsel wat iemand gegee?
portion, helping, serving, intake, ration, measure,|gedeelte, help, te dien, inname, rantsoen, meet,
(4) What words refer to a measured amount of something?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gemete hoeveelheid van iets?
quota, load,|kwota, las,
(5) What words refer to the amount of something, such as fuel, that is available to be used?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die bedrag van iets, soos brandstof, wat beskikbaar is om gebruik te word is?
pool, stock, reserves,|swembad, voorraad, reserwes,
(6) What words refer to the amount of medicine that a sick person needs?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die bedrag van die medisyne wat &#39;n siek persoon moet?
dose, dosage,|dosis, dosis,
(7) What words refer to the amount of a problem such as crime or damage?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die bedrag van &#39;n probleem soos misdaad of skade?
extent, incidence, level, rate,|mate, insidensie, vlak, tempo,
Number|Nommer
Use this domain for words related to numbers. Every language has a word for 'one', and a word for 'two'. These two numbers often have special words. So we have included a separate domain for 'one' and 'two'. In addition the numbers form a series (one, two, three...). Most languages have more than one series of numbers (first, second, third...).  So we have also included a domain for each series of numbers that most languages have. Your language may have other series of numbers. Put them in the domain 'Number series'.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met getalle. Elke taal het &#39;n woord vir &quot;een&quot;, en &#39;n woord vir &quot;twee&quot;. Hierdie twee getalle het dikwels spesiale woorde. So het ons &#39;n aparte afdeling vir &quot;een&quot; en &quot;twee&quot; ingesluit. Daarbenewens vorm die getalle &#39;n reeks (een, twee, drie ...). Die meeste tale het meer as een reeks van getalle (eerste, tweede, derde ...). So het ons ook &#39;n afdeling vir elke reeks getalle wat die meeste tale het. Jou taal kan hê ander reeks van getalle. Sit hulle in die domein &quot;Nommer reeks.
(1) What words refer to a written number?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n skriftelike nommer?
number, figure, digit, numeral,|nommer, figuur, syfer, getal,
(2) What words refer to a number of people or things?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n aantal mense of dinge?
toll, statistics,|tol, statistieke,
(3) What words describe different kinds of numbers?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf verskillende soorte getalle?
even, odd, positive, negative, infinite, cardinal, ordinal, whole, fraction, decimal,|selfs, vreemd, positief, negatief, oneindig, kardinale, ordinale, heel, breuk, desimale,
(4) What words refer to writing numbers on a series of things?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na getalle neer te skryf op &#39;n reeks van die dinge?
number (v), numbered,|nommer (v), getel,
(5) What words indicate that there are a particular number of something?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar &#39;n bepaalde aantal iets?
number (v),|nommer (v),
Cardinal numbers|Kardinale getalle
Use this domain for words related to the cardinal numbers (one, two, three)--the numbers used to count.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die kardinale getalle (een, twee, drie) - die getalle wat gebruik word om te tel.
(1) What are the cardinal numbers? (the numbers you use when you count)|(1) Wat is die kardinale getalle? (Die nommers wat jy gebruik wanneer jy tel)
zero, one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven, twelve, thirteen...|nul, een, twee, drie, vier, vyf, ses, sewe, agt, nege, tien, elf, twaalf, dertien ...
(2) multiples of ten|(2) veelvoude van tien
ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, sixty, seventy, eighty, ninety|tien, twintig, dertig, veertig, vyftig en sestig, sewentig, tagtig, negentig
(3) multiples of one hundred|(3) veelvoude van honderd
one hundred, two hundred|honderd, twee honderd
(4) multiples of one thousand|(4) veelvoude van &#39;n duisend
one thousand, two thousand|&#39;n duisend, twee duisend
(5) numbers larger than one thousand|(5) getalle groter as &#39;n duisend
million, billion, trillion, quadrillion|miljoen miljard, triljoen, quadriljoen
(6) What words are used to refer to the numbers of a certain decimal place?|(6) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na die nommers van &#39;n sekere desimale plek?
the digits, the tens, hundreds, thousands, millions, billions, trillions|die syfers, die tiene, honderde, duisende, miljoene, biljoene, triljoene
(7) What words are used to refer to groups of a certain decimal place?|(7) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na groepe van &#39;n sekere desimale plek?
tens, hundreds, thousands, tens of thousands, millions, billions, trillions|tiene, honderde, duisende, duisende, miljoene, biljoene, triljoene
(8) What words refer to a very large number?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n baie groot aantal?
huge number, myriad, zillion, jillion, umpteen, googolplex,|groot aantal, magdom, zillion, jillion, umpteen, googolplex,
(9) What words refer to an unlimited number?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n onbeperkte aantal?
infinity, infinite, boundless, endless, limitless,|oneindig, oneindige, oneindige, eindelose, oneindig,
One|Een
Use this domain for words related to the number one. It appears that every language has a word for 'one' and 'two', but not every language has a word for the numbers higher than two. Many languages have several words that mean 'one'.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die nommer een. Dit blyk dat elke taal het &#39;n woord vir &quot;een&quot; en &quot;twee&quot;, maar nie elke taal het &#39;n woord vir die getalle hoër as twee. Baie tale het &#39;n paar woorde wat &quot;een&quot; beteken.
(1) What words refer to one?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na een?
one, first, individual, single, only, the one, one apiece, one each,|een, eerste, individuele, enkel, alleen die een, een elk, een elk,
(2) What words refer to being by yourself?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na synde deur jouself?
alone, by yourself, sole,|alleen, deur jouself, tong,
(3) What words refer to doing something by yourself?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen deur jouself?
alone, on your own, solo, solely,|alleen, op jou eie, solo, uitsluitlik,
(4) What words refer to people doing something one by one?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na mense iets een vir een te doen?
one by one, singly, individually,|een vir een, enkel, individueel,
(5) What words indicate that something happens or is done one time?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur of &#39;n tyd gedoen?
once, one time, single time, one-off,|een keer, een keer, enkele tyd, een-off,
Two|Twee
Use this domain for words related to the number two.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die nommer twee.
(1) What words refer to two?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na twee?
two, second, two times, two-fold, double (v), twins, brace, dichotomy, deuce, dual, dyad, twain, yoke, in pairs, in twos, two by two, by twos, two at a time, two apiece, two each, both, either, neither,|twee, tweede, twee keer, twee-vou, dubbel (v) &#39;n tweeling, stut, digotomie, drommel, dubbele, dyad, twee, juk, in pare, in twees, twee-twee, twee aan twee, twee op &#39;n tyd, twee elk, twee elk, albei, óf nie,
(2) What words refer to two people who do things together?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na twee mense wat saam dinge te doen?
couple, pair, duo, twosome, duet,|paartjie, paar, duo, duo, duet,
(3) What words refer to two things that are used together?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na twee dinge wat saam gebruik word?
pair, twin,|paar, tweeling,
(4) What words refer to something used by two people?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word deur twee mense?
for two, double, two-man,|Want die twee, dubbel, twee-man,
(5) What words refer to something with two parts?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets met twee dele?
double (adj), couplet, duplex,|dubbel (adj), koeplet, duplex,
(6) What words refer to something used for two things?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat vir twee dinge?
dual, twofold,|dubbele, tweeledig,
(7) What words indicate that something is two times the amount of something else?|(7) Wat woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is twee keer die bedrag van iets anders?
twice, double, twice as much (as), two times as much (as), two times what, double what,|twee keer, dubbel, twee keer soveel (as), twee keer soveel (as), twee keer wat, dubbel wat,
(8) What words indicate that something happens or is done two times?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur of twee keer gedoen?
twice, twice over, two-time,|twee keer, twee keer meer as twee keer,
Ordinal numbers|Ordinale getalle
Use this domain for words related to the ordinal numbers (first, second, third)--the numbers used to indicate the order of something in a series, such as "the first child".|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die ordinale getalle (eerste, tweede, derde) - die getalle wat gebruik word om die volgorde van iets in &#39;n reeks aandui, soos &quot;die eerste kind&quot;.
(1) What are the ordinal numbers?|(1) Wat is die ordinale getalle?
first, second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seven, eighth, ninth, tenth, eleventh, twelfth, thirteenth, hundredth, thousandth,|eerste, tweede, derde, vierde, vyfde, sesde, sewe, die agtste, negende, tiende, elfde twaalfde, dertiende, honderdste, duisendste,
Number of times|Aantal kere
Use this domain for numbers that refer to the number of times something happens or is done. These numbers may be adverbs as in English (twice) or in some languages they may be verbs (to do something two times).|Gebruik hierdie domein getalle wat verwys na die aantal kere iets gebeur of gedoen word. Hierdie getalle kan wees bywoorde soos in Engels (twee keer), of in sommige tale hulle mag wees werkwoorde (iets twee keer te doen).
(1) What words indicate the number of times something has happened? ("He fell down three times.")|(1) Watter woorde dui die aantal kere iets gebeur? (&quot;Hy het neergeval drie keer.&quot;)
once, one time, single time, twice, two times, three times, thrice, four times, many times|een keer, een keer, enkele keer, twee keer, twee keer, drie keer, ja, drie vier keer, baie keer
(2) What words describe something that has happened a particular number of times?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n bepaalde aantal kere gebeur het, beskryf?
two-time, three-time,|twee-time, drie keer,
(3) What words refer to doing something a particular number of times (to do something once/twice/etc.)?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen &#39;n bepaalde aantal kere (iets een keer twee keer te doen / / ens.)?
Multiples|Veelvoude
Use this domain for words related to multiples of something (single, double, triple).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met veelvoude van iets (enkel, dubbel, trippel).
(1) What words describe something that is two or three times the amount of something else?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat twee of drie keer die bedrag van iets anders beskryf?
single (portion, scoop), double (adj), triple, quadruple, quintuple, two-fold, three-fold, four-fold,|enkele (gedeelte, skep), dubbel (adj), drie, vier keer, vyf voudig, tweeledig, drie-vou, vier-vou,
(2) What words indicate that something is two or three times the amount of something else?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is twee of drie keer die bedrag van iets anders?
twice as much (as), two times as much (as), two times what, double what,|twee keer soveel (as), twee keer soveel (as), twee keer wat, dubbel wat,
(3) What words refer to something becoming two or three times as much?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak twee of drie keer soveel?
double (vi), triple, quadruple,|dubbel (vi), drie, vier keer,
(4) What words refer to making something become two or three times as much?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets geword twee of drie keer soveel?
double (vt), triple, treble, quadruple,|dubbel (vt), drie, sopraan, quadruple,
Numbered group|Genommer groep
Use this domain for words related to a group of a particular number of things or people (solo, duo, trio; alone, in threes).|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n groep van &#39;n bepaalde aantal van die dinge of mense (solo, duo, trio, alleen, in drieë).
(1) What words refer to a group of a particular number?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van &#39;n bepaalde getal?
single, duo, duet, trio, quartet, quintet, sextet, twins, triplets, quadruplets, quintuplets, sextuplets, twosome, threesome, foursome, fortnight, decade, century, millennium, dozen, score, gross,|enkele, duo, duet, trio, kwartet, kwintet, sekstet, tweeling, drieling, vier vir, vyfling, sesling, duo, trio, viertal, twee weke, dekade, eeu, millennium, dosyn, telling, bruto,
(2) What words indicate that only one person does something?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat slegs een persoon doen iets?
alone (adv), solo,|alleen (adv), solo,
(3) What words refer to a group of two?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van twee?
pair, couple, couplet, brace, dichotomy, deuce, dual, dyad, twain, yoke,|paar, paar, koeplet, stut, digotomie, drommel, dubbele, dyad, twee, juk,
(4) What words refer to a group of three?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van drie?
trilogy, trinity, triple, triumvirate, triune,|trilogie, drie-eenheid, drie, driemanskap, drie-enige,
(5) What words indicate that something is done in groups of a certain number?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedoen word in groepe van &#39;n sekere aantal?
singly, one by one, two by two, three by three, by ones, by twos, by threes, in pairs, in threes, one at a time, two at a time, three at a time,|enkel, een vir een, twee-twee, drie deur drie, deur kinders, twee aan twee, deur drieë, in pare, in groepe van drie, een op &#39;n tyd, twee op &#39;n tyd, drie op &#39;n tyd,
(6) What words indicate that everyone is to get a certain number of something?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat almal is om &#39;n sekere aantal van iets te kry?
one apiece, two apiece, three apiece, one each, two each, three each,|een stuk, twee elk, drie elk, een elk, twee elk, drie elk,
Fraction|Breuk
Use this domain for the numbers that refer to a fraction of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die getalle wat verwys na &#39;n fraksie van iets.
(1) What general words refer to a fraction of something?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n fraksie van iets?
fraction, proportion, percentage, decimal, decimal point,|breuk, persentasie, persentasie, desimale, desimale punt
(2) What words refer to a particular fraction of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n spesifieke fraksie van iets?
half, one half, third, one third, two thirds, quarter, fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh, eighth, ninth, tenth|helfte, die een helfte, derde, &#39;n derde, twee-derdes, kwartaal, vierde, vyfde, sesde, sewende, agtste, negende, tiende
(3) What words refer to dividing something into a fraction of the whole?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets verdeel in &#39;n fraksie van die geheel?
halve, quarter (v), bisect, trisect, (divide/cut/fold) in half, in two,|helfte, kwart (v), halv, trisect, (kloof / knip / vou) in die helfte, in twee
Number series|Nommer reeks
Use this domain for other series of numbers that are different from those in the previous domains.|Gebruik hierdie domein ander reeks getalle wat verskil van dié in die vorige domeine is.
(1) What words refer to something made up of a certain number of parts?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets bestaan ​​uit &#39;n sekere aantal van die dele?
duplex, tandem, tripartite,|duplex, tandem, drieledige,
Count|Tel
Use this domain for words related to counting--to say the numbers in order, or to use numbers to find an amount.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met tel - om die getalle te sê in orde is, of om getalle te gebruik om &#39;n bedrag te vind.
(1) What words refer to saying the numbers in order?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na sê die getalle in orde?
count, countdown, say your numbers|tel, countdown, sê jou nommers
(2) What words refer to counting the number of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die tel van die aantal iets?
count, count up, at the last count, keep count, keep track, keep a tally of, enumerate, enumeration,|tel, tel tot by die laaste telling, hou telling, hou, hou &#39;n oorsig van, opsom, opsomming,
(3) What words refer to determining the amount of something without being exact?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die bepaling van die bedrag van iets sonder om presiese?
estimate, assess, reckon,|skat, te evalueer, reken,
(4) What words refer to determining the quantity of something a second time?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die bepaling van die hoeveelheid van iets &#39;n tweede keer?
recount, renumber|vertelling, hernommer
(5) What words refer to making a mistake when you count?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n fout maak wanneer jy tel?
miscalculate, miscount, lose count,|misrekenen, verkeerde telling verloor tel,
(6) What words refer to the number or amount of something that is counted?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die aantal of hoeveelheid van iets wat getel?
calculation, sum, estimate, estimation, count (n),|berekening som, skat, skatting, tel (n),
(7) What words refer to assigning a number to each thing in a series?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die toeken van &#39;n aantal aan elke ding in &#39;n reeks?
number, assign a number, count off|nommer, wys &#39;n nommer, tel af
(8) What words describe an amount that cannot be counted?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n bedrag wat nie getel kan word?
innumerable, unnumbered, uncountable, uncounted, countless,|ontelbare, ontelbare, ontelbare, ontelbare, ontelbare,
Mathematics|Wiskunde
Use this domain for words related to mathematics and arithmetic--the study of numbers.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wiskunde en rekenkundige - die studie van getalle.
(1) What words refer to mathematics?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wiskunde?
mathematics, math, arithmetic, geometry, algebra, calculus, trigonometry, statistics,|wiskunde, wiskunde, rekenkunde, meetkunde, algebra, analise, trigonometrie, statistiek,
(2) What words refer to determining the amount of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die bepaling van die bedrag van iets?
calculate, work out, figure out, make, figure, compute, solve,|bereken, uit te werk, uit te vind, maak, figuur, bereken, los op,
(3) What words indicate the answer in an equation?|(3) Watter woorde dui die antwoord in &#39;n vergelyking?
is, equals, get,|is, is gelyk aan, kry,
(4) What words refer to the answer to a mathematical problem?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die antwoord op &#39;n wiskundige probleem?
answer, solution,|antwoord, oplossing,
(5) What words are used to talk about mathematics?|(5) Watter woorde gebruik om te praat oor wiskunde?
problem, equation, square root, squared, graph, axis,|probleem, vergelyking, vierkantswortel, vierkantig, grafiek, as,
(6) What words refer to a person who studies mathematics?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat wiskunde bestudeer?
mathematician, statistician,|wiskundige, statistikus,
(7) What instruments are used to do mathematics?|(7) Wat instrumente word gebruik om wiskunde te doen?
calculator, computer, abacus, slide rule,|sakrekenaar, rekenaar, abakus, skuifliniaal,
Add numbers|Getalle te voeg
Use this domain for words related to adding two numbers together.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die toevoeging van twee getalle bymekaar.
(1) What words refer to adding two numbers together?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van twee getalle bymekaar?
add, addition,|voeg, benewens,
(2) What words refer to adding a series of numbers?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die toevoeging van &#39;n reeks van getalle?
add up, tally (v), total (v),|voeg, kerfstok (v), totale (v),
(3) What words are used for addition equations?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik vir toevoeging vergelykings?
plus, and, added to,|plus, en bygevoeg,
(4) What words indicate the answer in an equation?|(4) Watter woorde dui die antwoord in &#39;n vergelyking?
makes,|maak,
(5) What words refer to the total?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die totale?
total (n), total (adj), sum, tally (n), grand total, subtotal, gross, aggregate, amount,|totale (n), totale (adj), som, kerfstok (n), groottotaal, subtotaal, bruto, totaal, bedrag,
(6) What words indicate that a particular number is the total?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n bepaalde getal is die totale?
altogether, in total, in all, all told,|geheel en al, in totaal, in alles, al vertel het,
(7) What words indicate that the number of a group of things reaches a particular total?|(7) Wat woorde aan te dui dat die aantal van &#39;n groep van die dinge wat &#39;n bepaalde totale bereik?
come to, amount to, total (v), reach, add up to, make, bring the number to, bring the total to, number (v),|kom, bedrag, totale (v), te bereik, voeg tot, maak, bring die getal, bring die totaal op, nommer (v),
Subtract numbers|Trek getalle
Use this domain for words related to subtracting one number from another.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die aftrekking van &#39;n nommer van &#39;n ander.
(1) What words refer to subtracting one number from another number?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na aftrek van &#39;n aantal van &#39;n ander getal?
subtract, take, take away, deduct, subtraction,|aftrek, neem, neem weg, aftrek, aftrek,
(2) What words are used for subtraction equations?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik vir aftrek vergelykings?
minus, subtracted from, from, less,|minus, afgetrek van, van, minder,
(3) What words indicate the answer?|(3) Watter woorde dui die antwoord?
leave, be left with,|verlaat, gelaat word met,
(4) What words refer to the answer?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die antwoord?
remainder, difference,|restant, verskil,
Multiply numbers|Vermenigvuldig getalle
Use this domain for words related to multiplying one number times another.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n nommer keer &#39;n ander te vermenigvuldig.
(1) What words refer to multiplying one number times another?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n nommer keer &#39;n ander te vermenigvuldig?
multiply, multiplication, multiples of (a number),|vermeerder, vermenigvuldiging, veelvoude van (&#39;n getal),
(2) What words are used for multiplication equations?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik vir vermenigvuldiging vergelykings?
multiplied by, times,|deur vermenigvuldig, tye,
product,|produk,
Divide numbers|Verdeel getalle
Use this domain for words related to dividing one number by another number.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verdeling van een getal deur &#39;n ander nommer.
(1) What words are used of dividing one number by another number?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik verdeel een getal deur &#39;n ander getal?
divide, division,|verdeel, afdeling,
(2) What words are used for division equations?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik vir afdeling vergelykings?
divided by, into, go into,|gedeel deur, in, gaan in,
times,|tye,
quotient,|kwosiënt,
Plural|Meervoud
Use this domain for words and affixes that indicate that there is more than one of something. Some languages, such as Indo-European languages,  indicate plural with an affix. Other languages, such as Austronesian languages, use a separate word. Some languages also have words or affixes that indicate that there are two of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde en affixes wat daarop dui dat daar meer as een van iets. Sommige tale, soos Indo-Europese tale, dui meervoud met &#39;n bring. Ander tale, soos Austronesische tale, gebruik &#39;n aparte woord. Sommige tale het ook woorde of affixes wat daarop dui dat daar twee van iets.
(1) What words indicate that there is more than one of something?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar meer as een van iets?
-s|s
(2) What words indicate that there are two of something?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar twee van iets?
pair of|denim
Many, much|Baie, baie
Use this domain for words indicating that there are many things or people, or that there is much of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar is baie dinge of mense, of dat daar &#39;n groot deel van iets.
(1) What words indicate that there is a large amount of something?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar &#39;n groot hoeveelheid van iets?
a lot of, lots of, a great deal of, a good deal of, a fair bit of, a fair amount of, much, loads of, tons of, masses of, scads of, piles of, heaps of, stacks of, a mountain of, extensive, widespread, big amount, lots and lots,|&#39;n baie, baie, &#39;n groot deel van die, &#39;n goeie deel van die, &#39;n billike bietjie van &#39;n billike bedrag van, baie, baie, ton van, massas, heleboel van, hope, hope, stapels, &#39;n berg van, uitgebreide, wydverspreide, groot bedrag, baie, baie,
(2) What words indicate that there are a large number of things or people?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar &#39;n groot aantal van die dinge of mense?
a lot of, lots of, many, many of, a large number of, large numbers of, plenty of, loads of, tons of, masses of, scads of, a bunch of, dozens of, numerous, a host of, quite a few, a wide range of, a raft of, multi-, multiple, a multitude of, considerable, goodly number, plethora, profuse, oodles, scores of,|&#39;n baie, baie, baie, baie van &#39;n groot aantal van groot getalle, baie, baie, ton van, massas, heleboel van &#39;n klomp van die dosyne, talle, &#39;n gasheer van, heel &#39;n paar, &#39;n wye verskeidenheid van &#39;n reeks van, multi-, meervoudige, &#39;n menigte van, groot, mooi nommer, oorvloed, oorvloedige, stapels, tellings van,
(3) What words indicate that there are a very large number of things or people?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar &#39;n baie groot aantal van die dinge of mense?
hundreds of, thousands of, millions of, a great many, countless, innumerable, overwhelming, myriad,|honderde duisende, miljoene, &#39;n groot aantal, ontelbare, ontelbare, oorweldigend, magdom,
(4) What words indicate that many things are happening?|(4) Watter woorde dui daarop dat baie dinge gebeur?
flood of, wave of, deluge of, avalanche of, stream, torrent,|vloed van, golf van, stortvloed van, stortvloed van, stroom, spruit,
(5) What words indicate that many bad things are happening?|(5) Watter woorde dui daarop dat baie slegte dinge gebeur?
spate of, epidemic, rash of, wave, be a hotbed of,|vlaag, epidemie, uitslag van, golf, &#39;n broeikas van,
(6) What words indicate that many people are doing something?|(6) Watter woorde dui daarop dat baie mense iets doen?
in large numbers, in droves, in force, in strength, thick and fast, be dying like flies, be dropping like flies,|in groot getalle, in hordes, krag, krag, dik en vas, sterf soos vlieë, word die val soos vlieë,
(7) What words describe something that many people are doing?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat baie mense doen beskryf?
common, popular, widespread, widely,|algemene, populêre, wydverspreide, wyd,
(8) What words indicate that someone does something a lot?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iemand iets baie doen?
a lot, a good deal, a great deal, quite a bit, plenty, heavy,|&#39;n baie, &#39;n goeie deal, &#39;n groot deal, nogal &#39;n bietjie, baie swaar,
(9) What words describe something that contains a lot of a particular substance?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n baie van &#39;n bepaalde stof bevat beskryf?
high in, rich in,|hoog in, ryk in,
(10) What words describe someone who makes many things?|(10) Watter woorde iemand wat baie dinge maak beskryf?
productive, prolific,|produktiewe, produktiewe,
(11) What words refer to using or giving a lot of something?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die gebruik van of gee &#39;n baie van iets?
generous, liberal,|vrygewig, liberale,
(12) What words describe a large number or amount?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groot aantal of hoeveelheid?
large, big, high, sizable, considerable, substantial, significant, generous, handsome, hefty,|groot, groot, hoë, aansienlike, aansienlike, aansienlike, groot, ruim, mooi, stewige,
(13) What words describe a very large number or amount?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n baie groot aantal of hoeveelheid?
huge, enormous, vast, massive, colossal, goodly, immense, whopping,|groot, enorme, groot, massiewe, kolossale, mooi, groot, yslike,
Few, little|Min, min
Use this domain for words related there being few or little of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde daar verwant om min of bietjie van iets.
