Group of things|Groep van die dinge
Use this domain for words that refer to a group of things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge.
(1) What words refer to a group of things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge?
group, collection, lot, cluster, clump, assortment, accumulation, aggregate, bits-and-pieces, nuts-and-bolts, odds-and-ends, stockpile, system, volley, wares|groep, versameling, baie, cluster, bos, verskeidenheid, opeenhoping, totale, stukkies-en-stukke, neute-en-boute, kans-en-eindig, voorraad, stelsel, volley, ware
(2) What words refer to a group of things that belong together?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge wat saam hoort?
set, batch, suit,|stel, joernaal, pak,
(3) What words refer to a group of things that are tied or joined together?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge wat vasgemaak is of saamgevoeg?
bundle, bunch, sheaf, pack, package, packet, string of,|bundel, klomp, gerf, pak, pakket, pak, string,
(4) What words refer to a group of things that are put on top of each other?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge wat op die top van mekaar skei?
pile, stack, heap,|paal, stapel, hoop,
(5) What words refer to a group of things that are moved together?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge wat saam beweeg?
cargo, contents, freight, goods, lading, load,|vrag, inhoud, vrag, goedere, lading, las,
(6) What words indicate that something is a member of a group?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is &#39;n lid van &#39;n groep?
member, one of, part of, belong to, go with,|lid, een van &#39;n deel van, behoort aan, gaan saam met,
More|Meer
Use this domain for words related to there being more of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met daar meer van iets.
(1) What words refer to more of something in addition to what is already there?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na meer van iets bykomend tot dit wat reeds daar?
more, extra, another, added, additional, further, supplementary, spare,|meer ekstra, &#39;n ander, bygevoeg, addisionele, verder, aanvullende, spaar,
(2) What words indicate an amount that is more than an amount already mentioned?|(2) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n bedrag wat meer as &#39;n bedrag wat reeds genoem?
more than, over and above, as well as, plus, in addition to, on top of,|meer as bo en behalwe, asook plus, in byvoeging tot, op die top van,
(3) What words describe something that is more than another thing in number or amount?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat meer as &#39;n ander ding in getal of hoeveelheid?
more, greater, higher, to a greater extent, to a greater degree,|meer groter, hoër, tot &#39;n mindere mate, tot &#39;n mindere mate,
(4) What words indicate that the actual number is more than a particular number?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat die werklike getal is meer as &#39;n bepaalde getal?
more, over, above, beyond, greater than, in excess of, upwards of, plus, at least,|meer oor bo, buite, groter as, meer as, opwaarts van, plus, ten minste,
(5) What words refer to something being more than a particular number or amount?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat meer as &#39;n bepaalde getal of hoeveelheid?
be more than, be greater than, exceed, outnumber, be up on, pass, go past, surpass,|meer as, groter as, oorskry, tref, wees op, slaag, gaan verby, oortref,
(6) What words indicate that there are many more of something?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar baie meer van iets?
many more, much more, far more, far beyond, way beyond, a lot more,|vele meer, veel meer veel meer, ver buite, ver verby, &#39;n baie meer,
Less|Minder
Use this domain for words that indicate that the number or amount of something is less than the number or amount of another thing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat daarop dui dat die aantal of hoeveelheid van iets is minder as die aantal of hoeveelheid van &#39;n ander ding.
(1) What words describe something that is less than another thing in number or amount?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat minder as &#39;n ander ding in getal of hoeveelheid?
less, fewer, not as much, not so much, not as many, not so many, lower, to a lesser degree, to a lesser extent, be in the minority, fewer and fewer, less and less, not more than, at the most,|minder, minder, nie so veel nie, nie so veel nie, nie so baie nie so baie, laer, tot &#39;n mindere mate, tot &#39;n mindere mate, in die minderheid, minder en minder, minder en minder, nie meer as op die meeste,
(2) What words indicate that something is less than a particular number or amount?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets minder as &#39;n bepaalde aantal of bedrag is?
less than, under, below, lower, within, minus,|minder as, onder, onder, laer, binne, minus,
(3) What words indicate that there is much less of something?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar is veel minder van iets?
much less, far less, far fewer, way below,|veel minder, baie minder, baie minder, ver onder,
(4) What words indicate that something is less in some quality than another thing?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets minder in &#39;n paar kwaliteit as &#39;n ander ding is?
less, not as, not so,|minder nie as, nie so nie,
(5) What words indicate that something happens less or is done less?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets minder gebeur of minder gedoen?
not as much, not so much,|nie soveel, nie so veel nie,
Increase|Verhoog
Use this domain for words related to something increasing in number or amount--to be more than before.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets aan die toeneem in getal of hoeveelheid - om meer as voorheen.
(1) What words refer to something increasing in number or amount?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets toenemende in getal of hoeveelheid?
increase, go up, rise, grow, climb, gain, escalate, pick up, improve, widen, augment, expand,|verhoog, gaan op, styg, groei, klim, wins, eskaleer, haal, te verbeter, uit te brei, brei, brei,
(2) What words describe something that is increasing in number or amount?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat aan die toeneem in getal of hoeveelheid beskryf?
increasing, rising, growing, mounting, escalating, expanding, more and more, cumulative,|toeneem, styg, groei, toenemende, stygende, uit te brei, meer en meer, kumulatiewe,
(3) What words refer to increasing a lot?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die toenemende &#39;n baie?
multiply, double, treble, quadruple, proliferate, snowball,|vermeerder, dubbel, sopraan, quadruple, vermenigvuldig, snowball,
(4) What words refer to increasing very quickly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na baie vinnig toenemende?
shoot up, soar, rocket, go through the roof, spiral, take off, jump,|skiet, styg, vuurpyl, gaan deur die dak, spiraal, neem af, spring,
(5) What words refer to increasing slowly?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na stadig toenemende?
accumulate, build up, pile up, collect, gather, mount up,|versamel, op te bou, stapel, versamel, versamel, klim,
(6) What words refer to causing something to increase?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat om te verhoog?
increase (vt), raise, put up, push up, drive up, force up, boost, maximize,|verhoog (vt), in te samel, sit, stoot, ry, krag up, hupstoot, maksimeer,
(7) What words refer to increasing something by adding to it?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na toenemende iets by te voeg om dit?
add to, strengthen, swell, augment, supplement,|voeg by, versterk, swel, aan te vul, aan te vul,
(8) What words refer to increasing what a machine is doing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na toenemende wat &#39;n masjien doen?
turn up,|draai,
(9) What words refer to an increase in number or amount?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n toename in die getal of hoeveelheid?
increase (n), growth, rise, raise, build-up, upturn, hike, increment, proliferation, addition, supplement,|verhoog (n), groei, styg, te verhoog, opbou, opswaai, stap, inkrement, verspreiding, benewens, aan te vul,
(10) What words refer to a large increase?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groot toename?
leap, surge, explosion, boom, jump,|sprong, oplewing, ontploffing, boom, spring,
(11) What words indicate that something happens or someone does something more than before?|(11) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur of iemand iets meer as voorheen nie?
increasingly, gain ground, get more and more, become more and more, grow in, gain in,|toenemend veld wen, kry meer en meer, meer en meer, groei in, kry in,
(12) What words describe something that someone is doing or feeling more than before?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat iemand doen of meer as voorheen gevoel beskryf?
increased, heightened, greater, higher,|toegeneem het, verhoogde, groter, hoër,
Decrease|Afname
Use this domain for words related to something decreasing in number or amount--to be less than before.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets afneem in getal of hoeveelheid - minder as voorheen.
(1) What words refer to something decreasing in number or amount?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets afneem in getal of hoeveelheid?
decrease, fall, go down, come down, slide, diminish, contract, shrink, lessen, reduce, reduction, depreciate, lose, narrow, slow down, abate, peter out, tail off, waste away,|afname, val, gaan af, kom af, skuif, te verminder, kontrak, krimp, te verminder, verminder, verminder, depresieer, verloor, smal, stadiger, bedaar, peter out, stert af, wegkwyn,
(2) What words describe something that is decreasing in number or amount?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat afneem in getal of hoeveelheid beskryf?
decreasing, declining, falling, lowering, shrinking, less and less, fewer and fewer,|afneem, daal, daal, die verlaging, krimp, minder en minder, minder en minder,
(3) What words refer to decreasing very quickly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na baie vinnig dalende?
drop, plummet, plunge, nosedive, slump, collapse, go through the floor,|drop, skietlood, duik, duik, insinking, ineenstorting, gaan deur die vloer,
(4) What words refer to decreasing slowly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na stadig afneem?
dwindle, decline, be on the decline, taper off, drop off, die down, ease off,|agteruit gaan, agteruitgang, op die agteruitgang, afplat, af te laai, gaan lê, gemak af,
(5) What words refer to a decrease in number or amount?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n afname in die getal of hoeveelheid?
decrease (n), reduction, drop, fall, decline, downturn, loss, cut, slump, collapse,|afname (n), vermindering, drop, val, verval, afswaai, verlies, sny, insinking, ineenstorting,
(6) What words refer to a quality becoming less?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kwaliteit besig om minder?
lessen, subside, wane, ebb, recede,|verminder, bedaar, kwyn, eb, verdwyn,
(7) What words indicate that something happens or someone does something less than before?|(7) Wat woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur of iemand iets minder as voorheen nie?
decreasingly, lose ground, become less and less, get less and less,|decreasingly, verloor grond, minder en minder, kry minder en minder,
(8) What words describe something that someone is doing or feeling less than before?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat iemand doen of minder as voorheen gevoel beskryf?
decreased, lowered, lower,|afgeneem het, verlaag, laer,
(9) What words refer to causing something to decrease?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na veroorsaak iets om te daal?
reduce, lower, decrease, cut, slash, roll back, knock down, halve, minimize, abbreviate, abridge, curtail, dilate, drain,|verminder, laer, afname, sny, sny, rol terug, klop, halveer, verminder, afkort, besnoeien, beperk, verwyd, dreineer,
(10) What words refer to reducing the amount of something you use or how much you do?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die vermindering van die bedrag van iets wat jy gebruik of hoeveel jy doen?
reduce, cut down on, scale down, scale back, cut back, trim, pare down, downsize, scrimp,|verminder, kap op, afskaal, skaal terug, kap terug, snoei, knip af, af te skaal, karig,
(11) What words refer to reducing pain or a bad feeling?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die vermindering van pyn of &#39;n slegte gevoel?
reduce, lessen, relieve, ease, alleviate, deaden, dull, take the edge off, allay, mitigate,|verminder, verminder, verlig, verlig, verlig, verdoof, dof, neem die rand af, besweer, te verminder,
(12) What words refer to decreasing what a machine is doing?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die vermindering van wat &#39;n masjien doen?
reduce, lower, turn down,|verminder, laer, draai af,
(13) What words refer to something slowly reducing the number or amount of something?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets stadig die aantal of hoeveelheid van iets vermindering?
erode, eat into, deplete, whittle away,|erodeer, eet in, afbrekende, Whittle weg,
All|Alle
Use this domain for words related to all.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwant aan almal.
(1) What words refer to all of a group of things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na al van &#39;n groep van die dinge?
all, everything, the lot, every, each, without exception, altogether, total, a hundred percent, whatsoever, whichever,|alles, alles, die lot, elke, elke, sonder uitsondering, geheel en al, totaal, &#39;n honderd persent, wat ook al, wat ook al,
(2) What words refer to all of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na al iets?
all, whole, entire, the lot, every bit of, every inch of, every drop of, in its entirety, from start to finish, the whole of, totality,|al, heel, hele, die lot, elke bietjie, elke duim van elke druppel, in sy geheel, van begin tot einde, die hele, totaliteit,
(3) What words refer to all of what you want?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na al wat jy wil hê?
whatever, anything, everything but the kitchen sink, you name it,|wat ook al, niks, alles behalwe die kombuis wasbak, jy noem dit,
(4) What words describe something that affects or includes everything?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat beïnvloed of sluit alles beskryf?
total, blanket, overall, global, all-embracing, universal, all-pervading, complete, comprehensive, exhaustive, full, general, indiscriminate, sweeping, thorough, thoroughgoing, unmitigated, unqualified, utter, widespread, worldwide|totaal, kombers, algehele, globale, allesomvattend, universeel, alle overheersende, volledig, omvattende, omvattende, vol, algemene, onoordeelkundige, vee, deeglike, flink, ondeurdagte, ongekwalifiseerde, volslae, wydverspreide, wêreldwyd
(5) What words refer to all people?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na alle mense?
everyone, everybody, anybody, whoever, whomever, whomsoever, whosoever,|almal, almal, almal, elkeen, wie, wie, wie,
(6) What words refer to all times?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na alle tye?
always, every time, any time, everyday,|altyd, elke keer, enige tyd, elke dag,
(7) What words refer to all places?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na alle plekke?
everywhere,|oral,
(8) What words refer to all ways?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na alle weë?
every way, all-out,|elke opsig, all-out,
Some|Sommige
Use this domain for words related to some--a number or amount of things or people when the number is not stated; an indefinite number or amount.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n paar - &#39;n getal of hoeveelheid dinge of mense wanneer die getal nie vermeld; &#39;n onbepaalde aantal of hoeveelheid.
(1) What words indicate some of a group of things or people?|(1) Watter woorde dui sommige van &#39;n groep van dinge of mense?
some, any, several, a number of,|sommige, enige, verskeie, &#39;n aantal,
(2) What words indicate some of an amount of something?|(2) Watter woorde dui sommige van &#39;n bedrag van iets?
some, any, a certain amount of, a measure of,|sommige, enige, &#39;n sekere bedrag van &#39;n mate van,
None, nothing|Geen, niks
Use this domain for words that nothing, no one, never, and nowhere.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat niks, niemand, nooit, en nêrens.
(1) What words refer to no thing?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na geen ding?
none, not any, no, nothing, not anything, be nil, bugger all,|geen, geen, geen, niks, niks, nul is, bokkerol,
(2) What words refer to not any of a number of things?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na nie enige van &#39;n aantal van die dinge?
none, not any, no, not one, not a, nothing,|geen, geen, nie een nie, nie &#39;n niks,
(3) What words refer to no person?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na geen persoon?
no one, nobody,|niemand, niemand,
(4) What words refer to no time?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na geen tyd?
never, no time,|nooit, geen tyd,
(5) What words refer to no place?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na geen plek?
nowhere, no place,|nêrens, geen plek,
(6) What words refer to the number zero?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die getal nul?
zero, nil, naught, o,|nul, nil, nul, o,
Both|Beide
Use this domain for words referring to both of two things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na beide van twee dinge.
(1) What words refer to both of two things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na beide van twee dinge?
both, the two of, the pair of, each, mutual, share, either, neither,|albei, die twee van die denim, elk, wedersydse, te deel, óf nie,
Most, almost all|Die meeste, byna al
Use this domain for words related to most--more than half and less than all of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die meeste - meer as die helfte en minder as al iets.
(1) What words refer to most of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die meeste van iets?
most, almost all, nearly all, the majority, the bulk of, the better part of, the best part of, the lion's share, the biggest slice of the cake,|die meeste, byna al, byna al die meerderheid, die grootste deel van die beter deel van, die beste deel van, die leeue-aandeel, die grootste deel van die koek,
(2) What words describe something that is done by most people?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat gedoen word deur die meeste mense beskryf?
generally, broad,|algemeen, breë,
(3) What words indicate that most of a group is of one kind.|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat die meeste van &#39;n groep is van een soort.
mostly, mainly, largely, predominantly, predominate, be in the majority, a preponderance,|meestal, hoofsaaklik, grootliks, oorwegend, oorheers, in die meerderheid is, &#39;n oorwig,
(4) What words indicate that something happens or someone does something more than anything else?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur of iemand iets meer as enigiets anders doen?
mostly, mainly, in most cases, most of the time,|meestal, hoofsaaklik in die meeste gevalle, die meeste van die tyd,
(5) What words refer to less than half of something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na minder as die helfte van iets?
minority,|minderheid,
Most, least|Die meeste, minste
Use this domain for words related to the most--the largest number or amount; or the least--the smallest number or amount. Most/least may refer to the largest/smallest number possible or needed. If there are several groups being counted, most/least may refer to the largest/smallest group.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die mees - die grootste getal of hoeveelheid; of die minste nie - die kleinste getal of hoeveelheid. Die meeste / minste kan verwys na die grootste / kleinste getal moontlik of nodig is. As daar is verskeie groepe getel, het die meeste / minste kan verwys na die grootste / kleinste groep.
(1) What words refer to the largest amount of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die grootste hoeveelheid van iets?
maximum, most,|maksimum, die meeste,
(2) What words refer to the smallest amount of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die kleinste bedrag van iets?
the least, minimum, the fewest, the lowest,|die minste, minimum, die minste, die laagste,
(3) What words refer to the largest group?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die grootste groep?
the most,|die meeste,
(4) What words refer to the smallest group?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die kleinste groep?
the least,|die minste nie,
(5) What words refer to an amount being the largest it has ever been?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n bedrag wat die grootste wat dit ooit was?
an all-time high, record high, high water mark,|&#39;n all-time hoog, rekord hoog, hoogwatermerk,
(6) What words refer to an amount being the smallest it has ever been?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n bedrag as die kleinste wat dit ooit was?
an all-time low, record low, lowest ebb,|&#39;n all-time low, rekord lae, laagste eb,
Almost|Byna
Use this domain for words related to a number or amount that is almost the same as another number.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n aantal of bedrag wat is byna dieselfde as &#39;n ander nommer.
(1) What words indicate that something is almost a particular number or amount?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is byna &#39;n bepaalde aantal of hoeveelheid?
almost, nearly, close to, close on, approaching, nearing, not quite, be pushing, pretty well,|byna, byna, naby, sluit op, nader, Nearing, nie heeltemal, stoot, baie goed,
(2) What words indicate that someone has almost reached a place?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iemand byna &#39;n plek bereik het?
almost, nearly, just about,|byna, byna, net oor,
(3) What words indicate that something has almost reached a particular state?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets byna bereik het &#39;n bepaalde staat?
almost, nearly, very nearly, just about, practically, virtually, all but, as good as, to all intents and purposes, nearing, approaching, near to, close to, verging on, bordering on, more or less, pretty much, not quite,|byna, byna, byna, net oor, prakties, feitlik al, maar so goed soos om alle praktiese doeleindes, Nearing, nader, naby, naby, grense aan, aangrensend aan, min of meer, pretty much, nie heeltemal,
(4) What words indicate that something is almost finished?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets byna klaar is?
almost, nearly, just about, practically, as good as, more or less, not quite,|byna, byna, net oor, prakties, so goed soos, min of meer, nie heeltemal,
(5) What words indicate that someone almost does something?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iemand nie byna iets?
almost, nearly, very nearly, come close to, be on the verge of, come within an inch of,|byna, byna, byna, kom naby aan, wees op die rand van, kom binne &#39;n duim van,
(6) What words indicate that something almost happens?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur byna?
almost, be near to, be on the brink of, come within an inch of,|byna, wees naby, wees op die rand van, kom binne &#39;n duim van,
(7) What words indicate that something is almost the best or worst example of some quality?|(7) Wat woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is byna die beste of ergste voorbeeld van &#39;n paar kwaliteit?
almost, nearly, practically, virtually, just about, verging on, bordering on,|byna, byna, byna, byna, net oor, grense aan, aangrensend aan,
(8) What words indicate that something is so similar to something that it is almost the same thing?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is so soortgelyk aan iets wat dit is byna dieselfde ding?
almost, practically, virtually,|byna, byna, byna,
(9) What words indicate that something is almost some quality (such as some color or shape)?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is byna &#39;n paar kwaliteit (soos &#39;n bietjie kleur of vorm)?
almost, more or less, practically, virtually, not quite,|byna, min of meer, prakties, feitlik, nie heeltemal,
(10) What words indicate that something is true of or has happened to almost all of something?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets waar is of gebeur het byna al iets?
almost, nearly, practically, virtually, pretty well, more or less, just about,|byna, byna, byna, byna, baie goed, min of meer, net oor,
Only|Slegs
Use this domain for words referring to only a particular number or amount of people or things--no more than one, or no more than a particular number or amount.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na slegs &#39;n bepaalde aantal of hoeveelheid mense of dinge - nie meer as een of nie meer as &#39;n bepaalde getal of hoeveelheid.
(1) What words describe the only person or thing?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf die enigste persoon of ding?
only, sole, the one, lone, solitary, alone, one and only, single,|slegs tong, die een eensaam, eensaam, alleen, een en enigste, enkele,
(2) What words indicate that there is only a particular number or amount of something?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar slegs &#39;n bepaalde aantal of hoeveelheid van iets?
only, just, no more than, all,|net, net, nie meer as, al,
(3)  What words indicate something is true of only one thing or one group of things, and not true of others?|(3) Watter woorde dui iets is waar van net een ding of &#39;n groep van dinge, en nie waar van die ander?
only, just, exclusively, nothing but, nothing else, be limited to, be restricted to, be confined to, be unique to, be peculiar to, exclusive,|net, net, uitsluitlik, niks nie, maar niks anders nie, word beperk tot, beperk word tot, beperk word tot, wees uniek aan, wees wat eie is aan, eksklusiewe,
(4) What words indicate that something is only what you say it is, and not something more?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is net wat jy sê dit is, en nie iets meer?
only, just, purely, merely, mere, nothing but,|net, net, suiwer, bloot, blote niks, maar
Exact|Presiese
Use this domain for words that indicate whether a number or amount is exact--not more and not less.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui of &#39;n getal of bedrag is presies - nie meer en nie minder nie.
(1) What words describe a number or amount that is exact?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n aantal of bedrag wat presies?
exact, precise,|presiese, akkurate,
(2) What words indicate that a number or amount is exact?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n getal of bedrag is presies?
exactly, precisely,|presies, presies,
(3) What words indicate that something happens at an exact time?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur op &#39;n presiese tyd?
exactly, precisely, on the dot, sharp,|presies, presies, op die dot, skerp,
(4) What words indicate that something happens at an exact place?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur op &#39;n presiese plek?
right, bang, smack, plumb,|reg, bang, smack, lood,
(5) What words describe something that is exactly the same as another thing?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat presies dieselfde as &#39;n ander ding te beskryf?
exact, accurate, faithful, strict, literal, word for word, just|presiese, akkurate, getroue, streng, letterlike, woord vir woord, net
(6) What words indicate that something is done in exactly the right way?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedoen word in presies die regte manier?
exactly, strictly, religiously, to the letter,|presies, streng godsdienstig, tot op die letter,
Approximate|Geskatte
Use this domain for words that indicate whether a number or amount is approximate.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui of &#39;n getal of bedrag is ongeveer.
(1) What words describe a number or amount that is approximate?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n aantal of bedrag wat ongeveer?
approximate, rough,|geskatte, ruwe,
(2) What words describe something that is not exact?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat nie aanmaan beskryf?
inexact, inaccurate, sort of, kind of,|onjuiste, onakkurate, soort van, soort van,
(3) What words indicate that a particular number or amount is approximate?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n bepaalde getal of bedrag is ongeveer?
about, approximately, roughly, give or take, at a guess, somewhere in the region of, an estimated, some, something like, in round numbers, close to,|oor, ongeveer, rofweg, gee of neem op &#39;n raaiskoot, iewers in die omgewing van &#39;n geraamde, sommige, iets soos, in die tweede ronde getalle, naby,
(4) What words indicate an approximate number when the actual number is possibly more?|(4) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n geskatte aantal wanneer die werklike getal is moontlik meer?
or so, odd, or more, at least, and maybe more, barely, hardly, little more than, scarcely,|of so, vreemd, of meer, ten minste, en miskien meer, skaars, skaars, bietjie meer as, skaars,
(5) What words indicate an approximate number when the actual number is possibly less?|(5) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n geskatte aantal wanneer die werklike getal is moontlik minder?
at most, as much as, short of,|op die meeste, soveel as, kort,
(6) What words refer to determining the approximate number of amount of something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die bepaling van die benaderde aantal bedrag van iets?
approximate (v), estimate (v), overestimate, underestimate,|benaderde (v), skat (v), oorskat, onderskat,
(7) What words refer to estimating a number to the nearest ten, hundred, thousand, etc?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die skatte van &#39;n aantal tot die naaste tien, honderd, duisend, ens?
rounded to the nearest ten/hundred/thousand, round up, round down,|afgerond tot die naaste tien / honderd / duisend rond, rond af,
(8) What words refer to a number that is approximate?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n getal wat ongeveer?
estimate (n), approximation, ballpark figure, round figure,|skatting (n), die aanpassing, ball figuur, ronde figuur,
(9) What words indicate that something happens at an approximate time?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur op &#39;n Geskatte?
about, around, approximately, round about, or thereabouts, circa, some time,|oor, rond, ongeveer rondom, of daar, circa, &#39;n geruime tyd,
(10) What words indicate that something happens at an approximate place?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur op &#39;n geskatte plek?
about, around, in the vicinity of, near, close to,|oor, rond, in die omgewing van naby, naby,
(11) What words describe something that is approximately the same as another thing?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat ongeveer dieselfde as &#39;n ander ding te beskryf?
narrowly, rather,|eng, eerder,
(12) What words indicate that something is done in approximately the right way?|(12) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedoen word in ongeveer die regte manier?
roughly, more or less, somewhat,|rofweg, min of meer, &#39;n bietjie,
(13) What words describe something that is approximately the same as another thing?|(13) Watter woorde iets wat ongeveer dieselfde as &#39;n ander ding te beskryf?
loose, vague, hazy, impressionistic, broad,|los, vaag, wasige, impressionistiese, breë,
Average|Gemiddeld
Use this domain for words related to an average number.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n gemiddelde aantal.
(1) What words refer to an average number?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gemiddelde getal?
average (n), mean, medium, median,|gemiddelde (n), gemiddelde, medium, mediaan,
(2) What words describe an average number?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gemiddelde getal?
average (adj), mean (adj), medium (adj),  medial, on average,|Gemiddeld (adj), gemiddelde (adj), medium (adj), mediale gemiddeld
(3) What words refer to calculating the average?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die berekening van die gemiddelde?
average (v), average out,|gemiddelde (v), die gemiddelde uit,
Whole, complete|Geheel, volledige
Use this domain for words describing a whole thing--all of something with no parts missing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n hele ding - al iets met geen dele ontbreek.
(1) What words indicate that something is whole?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is geheel?
complete, full, whole, in full, in its entirety, be all there, all of, entire, intact, undivided, united,|volledige, vol, geheel, ten volle, in sy geheel, wees almal daar, al, die hele, ongeskonde, onverdeelde, verenig,
(2) What words refer to making something complete?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets volledig?
complete, make up, assemble,|volledige, maak, vergader,
(3) What words indicate that something is not whole?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets nie geheel?
incomplete, partial,  missing something,|onvolledige, gedeeltelike, mis iets,
Part|Deel
Many things have parts. Use this domain for words referring to a part of something, and for words that express the idea that something has parts, that something is a part of something, or that link the whole with a part.|Baie dinge het dele. Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van iets, en vir woorde dat die idee dat iets dele uit te druk, dat daar iets is &#39;n deel van iets, of skakel die geheel met &#39;n deel.
(1) What words refer to a part of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van iets?
part, bit, portion, section, segment, sample, cross-section, member,|deel, bietjie, gedeelte, deel, segment, monster, kruis-afdeling, lid,
(2) What words refer to the parts that something is made from?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die dele wat iets is gemaak van?
component, element, piece, ingredient, constituent|komponent, element, stuk, bestanddeel, samestellende
(3) What words refer to the parts of a process?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n proses?
stage, phase, round,|stadium, fase, ronde,
(4) What words refer to the parts of an organization?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n organisasie?
branch, department, division, section, sector, wing, end, subdivision,|tak, departement, afdeling, afdeling, sektor, vleuel, end, onderverdeling,
(5) What words refer to the parts of a story?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n storie?
episode, installment, chapter, scene, part, extract, excerpt, clip,|episode, paaiement, hoofstuk, toneel, deel, uittreksel, uittreksel, clip,
(6) What words refer to the parts of a situation?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die dele van &#39;n situasie?
aspect, side, dimension, facet, factor, feature, detail,|aspek, side, dimensie, faset, faktor, funksie, detail,
(7) What words refer to being a part of something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van iets?
be part of, form a part of, inherent,|deel wees van, vorm &#39;n deel van, inherent,
(8) What words indicate that something has parts?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets dele?
have, of, -'s, consist of, be made of, be made up of, be composed of, comprise, be divided into, include|het, van, &amp; &#39;s, bestaan ​​uit, word gemaak van, word gemaak van, word saamgestel uit, bestaan, word verdeel in, sluit
Piece|Stukkie
Use this domain for words referring to a part of something that has been broken or cut off.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van iets wat gebreek is of afgesny.
(1) What words refer to a piece of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stukkie van iets?
piece, bit,|stuk, bietjie,
(2) What words refer to a piece that has flat sides?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stuk wat plat kante het?
block, cube, slab, bar,|blok, kubus, plaat, bar,
(3) What words refer to a piece that is irregular in shape?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n stuk wat &#39;n onreëlmatige vorm?
chunk, hunk, lump, dollop,|stuk, homp, knop, skeppie,
(4) What words refer to a thin piece?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n dun stukkie?
sheet, slip, pane, slice,|vel, glip, paneel, sny,
(5) What words refer to a very small piece?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n baie klein stukkie?
grain, flake, speck, fleck, crumb, morsel, tidbit, dot, mote,|graan, vlok, spikkel, Fleck, krummel, stukkie, versnapering, dot, splinter,
(6) What words refer to a small piece that is left after something has been broken?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n klein stukkie wat oorbly nadat iets is gebreek?
fragment, scrap, splinter, chip, shard,|fragment, afval, splinter, chip, skerf,
(7) What words refer to a part of something that has been made by dividing it in some way?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van iets wat gemaak is deur dit in een of ander manier?
pinch (of salt), cut (of meat), slice (of bread), bite (of cake)|knippie (sout), sny (vleis), sny (brood), byt (koek)
Enough|Genoeg
Use this domain for words related to being or having enough--to have as much of something or as many of something as you need or want.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met word of genoeg - om soveel van iets of soveel van iets as jy nodig het of wil hê.
(1) What words describe something that you have enough of?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat jy genoeg van het beskryf?
enough, sufficient, adequate, satisfactory, enough to go round,|genoeg, genoeg, voldoende, bevredigende, genoeg om deur te gaan,
(2) What words indicate that there is enough of something for what you need?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar genoeg van iets vir wat jy nodig het?
be enough, do, suffice, cover, last, meet someone's needs, get by, afford to,|genoeg wees, doen, genoeg, cover, laaste, behoeftes voldoen iemand se te kry deur, bekostig om,
(3) What words indicate that someone is strong enough or old enough to do something?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iemand sterk genoeg is of oud genoeg is om iets te doen?
enough, sufficiently|genoeg, genoeg
(4) What words describe a situation in which someone does enough or something happens enough?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n situasie waarin iemand genoeg doen of iets genoeg gebeur?
do enough, sufficiently, adequacy, adequately, satisfactorily, sufficiency,|doen genoeg, genoeg, toereikendheid, voldoende, bevredigende, genoegsaamheid,
(5) What words refer to having enough of something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na genoeg van iets?
have enough, be OK for, be all right for, be well off for, have sufficient,|genoeg wees OK vir, alles reg vir, goed af vir, voldoende,
(6) What words refer to having enough of something to do what you want?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na genoeg van iets te doen wat jy wil hê?
have the time/money, can afford, can spare, run to,|die tyd / geld, kan bekostig nie, kan spaar, hardloop na,
(7) What words refer to having more than enough, but not too much?|(7) Wat woorde te veel verwys na die feit dat meer as genoeg, maar nie?
more than enough, plenty, ample,|meer as genoeg, genoeg, genoeg,
(8) What words refer to not having enough?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na nie genoeg om?
not enough, insufficient, too little, too few, scarce, inadequate, inadequacy, shortage, lack of, be in short supply, be short,|nie genoeg nie, onvoldoende is, te min, te min, skaars, onvoldoende, ontoereikendheid, tekort, gebrek aan, in &#39;n tekort wees kort,
(9) What words indicate that there is not enough of something for what you need?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar nie genoeg van iets vir wat jy nodig het?
not be enough, be running short, not last, won't last,|nie genoeg nie, loop kort, nie die laaste wees nie, sal nie hou nie,
(10) What words indicate that someone is not strong enough or old enough to do something?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iemand nie sterk genoeg is of oud genoeg is om iets te doen?
not (strong) enough, not sufficiently,|nie (sterk) genoeg is, nie voldoende,
(11) What words describe a situation in which someone does not do enough or something does not happens enough?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n situasie waarin iemand nie genoeg doen of iets nie gebeur genoeg?
not...enough, too little,|nie ... genoeg, te min,
(12) What words refer to not having enough of something?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na nie genoeg van iets?
not have enough, be short of, be short on, go short, be running short of, deficient, be starved of, be lacking in,|genoeg nie, wees kort, word kort op, gaan kort, loop kort, gebrekkige, uitgehonger van, ontbreek in,
(13) What words refer to not having enough of something to do what you want?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na nie genoeg van iets te doen wat jy wil hê?
not have enough, can't afford, be strapped for cash,|genoeg nie, kan dit nie bekostig, gegord vir kontant,
Extra|Ekstra
Use this domain for words related to having extra--to have more than enough or more than what you need.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met wat ekstra - meer as genoeg of meer as wat jy nodig het.
(1) What words refer to having extra?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na wat ekstra?
have extra,|ekstra,
(2) What words indicate that there is more than enough of something?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar meer as genoeg van iets?
plenty of, more than enough, bags of, in large quantities, plentiful, ample, abundant, an abundance of, in abundance, copious, galore, to spare,|baie, meer as genoeg, sakke, in groot hoeveelhede, volop, ruim, groot, &#39;n oorvloed van, in oorvloed, oorvloedige, oorvloed, te spaar,
(3) What words refer to the amount that is extra?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die bedrag wat ekstra?
extra (n), surplus, excess, leftover, overflow,|ekstra (n), surplus, oormaat, oorskiet, oorloop,
(4) What words describe something that is extra?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat ekstra beskryf?
extra (adj), spare, superfluous,|ekstra (adj), spaar, oorbodig,
(5) What words refer to having too much?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na wat te veel?
too much, too many, excessive,|te veel, te veel, oormatige,
Lack|Gebrek
Use this domain for words related to having insufficient--to not have enough.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met met onvoldoende - om nie genoeg nie.
(1) What words refer to not having enough?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na nie genoeg om?
lack, suffer lack, be lacking in, have insufficient, be insufficient, don't have enough, ill-furnished, ill-provided, deficient,|gebrek ly gebrek, ontbreek in, het onvoldoende is, onvoldoende, nie genoeg nie, swak verstrek, swak voorsien, gebrekkige,
(2) What words describe something that you lack?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat jy kortkom beskryf?
inadequate, insufficient, meager, needed, poor, scant, scanty, scarce, short,|onvoldoende is, onvoldoende is, karige, nodig, swak, min, gering, skaars, kort,
(3) What words refer to something that you lack?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat jy kortgekom?
lack (n), want (n), deficiency, scarcity, shortage,|gebrek (n), want (n), tekort, skaarsheid, tekort,
(4) What words refer to not having enough food or money to live?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na nie genoeg kos of geld om te lewe?
destitute, can't make ends meet, starve,|gebrek gely, kan nie maak eindig ontmoet, honger,
Need|Moet
Use this domain for words related to needing something for some purpose.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets behoefte vir &#39;n paar doel.
(1) What words refer to needing something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets behoefte?
need, be in need of, require, be a need for, could do with, have a need, be in a pinch, be in want,|nodig het, word in die behoefte van, vereis word, &#39;n behoefte aan, kan doen met, &#39;n behoefte, word in &#39;n knippie, gebrek,
(2) What words refer to needing something very much?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets behoefte baie?
be desperate for, be crying out for, can't do without, be dependent on, depend on, rely on, be reliant on, badly need,|wees desperaat vir, uitroep vir, kan dit nie doen sonder, afhanklik wees van, afhang, staatmaak op, wees afhanklik, erg nodig het,
(3) What words refer to something that is needed?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat nodig is?
someone's needs, necessity, requirement, need (n),|iemand se behoeftes, noodsaaklikheid, vereiste, behoefte (n),
(4) What words describe something that is needed?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat nodig is te beskryf?
necessary, essential, vital, indispensable, be a necessity, be a must, requisite, prerequisite, required,|nodig, noodsaaklik, noodsaaklik, onontbeerlik, word &#39;n noodsaaklikheid, &#39;n moet, vereiste, voorvereiste, vereis word,
(5) What words refer to a situation in which someone needs something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n situasie waar iemand iets nodig?
need (n), time of need, dependence, reliance,|nodig (n), die tyd van nood, afhanklikheid, afhanklikheid,
(6) What words describe someone who needs something?|(6) Watter woorde iemand wat iets nodig beskryf?
needy, dependent,|behoeftige, afhanklik,
(7) What words refer to something needing something done to it?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets nodig om iets gedoen te dit?
need, be in need of, could do with,|nodig het, word in die behoefte van, kan doen met,
(8) What words indicate that something makes it necessary to do something?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets wat dit nodig maak om iets te doen?
make it necessary, necessitate, call for, entail, take, need, require,|maak dit nodig, noodsaak, bel vir, behels, te neem, moet vereis,
(9) What words refer to providing something that is needed?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die verskaffing van iets wat nodig is?
meet a need, satisfy a need, fulfill requirements, meet requirements, meet the demand, fill a need,|&#39;n behoefte, &#39;n behoefte te bevredig, te vervul vereistes voldoen, voldoen aan die vraag, vul &#39;n behoefte,
(10) What words refer to not needing something?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na nie iets nodig?
don't need, can do without, can manage without, have no need of, have no use for, can dispense with,|nodig het nie, kan doen sonder, kan bestuur sonder, het julle nie nodig, het geen nut vir, kan wegdoen met,
(11) What words describe something that is not needed?|(11) Watter woorde iets wat nie nodig is nie, beskryf?
unnecessary, needless, gratuitous, dispensable, luxury,|onnodige, onnodig, gratuite, onmisbaar, luukse,
(12) What words describe someone who does not need anything?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie iets nodig?
independent,|onafhanklike,
Remain, remainder|Bly restant
Use this domain for words related to the remainder of something--the part or amount of something that remains behind after the other parts have been taken away. Something can be left because everything else has been used or eaten, or everything else has been destroyed or burned.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die res van iets - die deel of bedrag van iets wat agter na die ander dele weggeneem is bly. Iets gelaat kan word omdat alles anders is gebruik of geëet, of alles is vernietig of verbrand.
(1) What words refer to something remaining?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets oorblywende?
left, remain, be left over, survive, be still standing, to spare, to go, in hand,|links, bly oor gelaat, oorleef, word nog steeds staan, te spaar, om te gaan, in die hand,
(2) What words refer to the remainder?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die res?
the remains, remnants, leftovers, ruins, what is left of, what remains of, the rest, the remainder, the last of, residue,|die oorblyfsels, oorblyfsels, oorskiet, ruïnes, wat oorgebly het van wat oorbly van die res, die res, die laaste van, oorskot,
(3) What words refer to the bad part that remains after the good part has been taken?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die slegte deel wat oorbly nadat die goeie deel geneem?
butt, dregs, leavings, offscourings, rags, scraps, sweepings,|boude, afsaksel, rommel, uitvaagsel, lappe, stukkies, veegsels,
(4) What words refer to a very small part that remains?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n baie klein deel wat oorbly?
fragment, shadow, trace, vestige|fragment, skaduwee, spoor, oorblyfsel
(5) What words describe something that remains?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat bly beskryf?
remaining, last, outstanding, spare, leftover, residual, surplus, surviving,|oorblywende verlede, uitstaande, spaar, oorskiet, residuele, surplus, oorlewende,
Full|Full
Use this domain for words referring to a container being full of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n houer vol van iets.
(1) What words describe something that is full?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat vol beskryf?
full, full up, bulging, be full to the brim, be bursting at the seams, be full to capacity, be chock-a-block, be packed out, be up to the brim, brimful, brimming, bursting, charged, chock-full, chockablock, jam-packed, jammed, loaded, replete, saturated, soaked, stuffed, supercharged,|vol, vol up, bult, vol aan die rand, wees by die nate bars, vol wees om kapasiteit, word met &#39;n skat &#39;n blok, word uitgepak, word tot die rand, propvol, vol, bars, aangekla word, tjok Volle, chockablock, propvol, vasgesteek, gelaai, vol, versadig, geweek, opgestopte, aangejaagde,
(2) What words refer to something being full of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets was vol van iets?
be full of, be filled with, be crammed with, be stuffed with, be packed with, be packed full of, be crammed full of,|vol wees van, gevul word, word vol, word gestop met, verpak word met vol verpak word, vol te vol,
(3) What words describe a place that is full of people?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek wat vol mense?
crowded, packed, crammed with, be packed out, booked up, fully booked, congested, dense, occupied, throng, thronged, thronging,|stampvol, verpak, propvol, word uitgepak, bespreek word, volbespreek, dig, digte, beset, skare, verdring, verdring,
(4) What words refer to something become full?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets geword vol?
fill, fill up,|vul, vul,
(5) What words refer to making something full?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets vol?
fill, fill up, cram, pack, stuff, crowd, load, load up, fill to the brim, flood, inject, jam, pump something full, suffuse,|vul, vul, cram, pak, stuff, skare, vrag, laai, vul, tot die rand, vloed, spuit, konfyt, pomp iets vol, oor giet,
(6) What words describe something that has been made full?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat vol gemaak beskryf?
filled,|gevul,
(7) What words refer to filling something again after it has been emptied?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die invul iets weer nadat dit leeggemaak?
refill, replenish, top up, top off,|hervul, vul, top up, top af,
(8) What words refer to a place being full of animals or insects?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n plek vol van diere of insekte?
swarm, teem, be teeming with, be swarming with, be crawling with,|wemel, wemel, word wemel, word uitzwerming met, wemel van,
(9) What words refer to being fuller than another thing?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na synde voller as &#39;n ander ding?
fuller, fullest,|voller, volste,
(10) What words refer to the state of being full?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van volle?
fullness,|volheid,
(11) What words indicate how full something is?|(11) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe vol iets?
how full, be (half) full,|hoe vol wees (half) vol,
(12) What words describe something that is almost full?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat amper vol te beskryf?
almost full, not quite full|amper vol, nie heeltemal vol
(13) What words refer to something being partly full?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na iets om gedeeltelik vol?
half full,|half vol,
(14) What words describe something that is full and overflowing?|(14) Watter woorde iets wat vol is en oorstromende beskryf?
overflow, overflowing, run over, running over, brimming over, full and running over, overcrowded, overfilled,|oorloop, oorloop, loop oor en oorlopend is, vol oor, vol en oorlopend is, oorvol, oorvol,
Empty|Leë
Use this domain for words referring to being empty.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na synde leeg.
(1) What words describe something that is empty?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat leeg is, beskryf?
empty, blank, devoid, hollow, clear, cleaned out, barren, drained, dry,|leeg, leeg, sonder, hol, helder, skoon uit, onvrugbare, gedreineer, droë,
(2) What words describe a place that has no people in it?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek wat nie mense in dit?
empty, bare, deserted, desolate, ghost town, wasteland, uninhabited, lonely, vacant, free, unoccupied,|leeg, kaal, verlate, verlate, spookdorp, kankers, onbewoon, eensaam, vakante, gratis, onbewoon,
(3) What words indicate that no one is in a place?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat niemand in &#39;n plek?
nobody present, no one here, no one there, not a soul, nary a one,|niemand teenwoordig is, niemand hier, niemand daar nie &#39;n siel, weef &#39;n een,
(4) What words refer to something that is empty?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat leeg is?
empties, blank (n), space, vacuum, the void, vacancy,|empties, leeg (n), ruimte, vakuum, die leemte, vakature,
(5) What words refer to something becoming empty?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak leeg?
empty (v), drain,|leë (v), dreineer,
(6) What words refer to making something empty?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets leeg?
empty (v), drain, turn out, clear (v), dump out, clean out,|leë (v), dreineer, draai uit, duidelik (v), stort uit, skoon te maak,
(7) What words describe something that has been made empty?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat leë gemaak beskryf?
emptied, depleted,|leeggemaak, uitgeput,
(8) What words refer to the state of being empty?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die toestand van leë?
emptiness,|leegheid,
(9) What words describe something that is almost empty?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat amper leeg beskryf?
almost empty, not quite empty,|byna leeg, nie heeltemal leeg,
(10) What words refer to something being partly empty?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na iets om gedeeltelik leeg?
half empty,|half leeg,
Big|Big
Use this domain for words describing something that is big.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat groot beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is big?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat groot beskryf?
big, large, biggish, bulky, fair-sized, be a fair size, good-sized, be a good size, bulky, grand, imposing, sizable, substantial,|groot, groot, groterige, lywige, billike-grootte, &#39;n billike grootte, goeie-grootte, &#39;n goeie grootte, lywige, grand, instelling, aansienlike, aansienlike,
(2) What words describe something that is very big?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie groot beskryf?
huge, enormous, massive, colossal, great, giant, gigantic, great big, be a whopper, be quite a size, astronomical, elephantine, mammoth, monstrous, monumental, prodigious, stupendous, tremendous, vast,|groot, enorme, massiewe, kolossale groot, reuse, reuse, groot groot, &#39;n knaap, nogal &#39;n grote, astronomiese, Elephantine, reuse, monsteragtige, monumentale, ontsaglike, asemrowende, geweldige, groot,
(3) What words refer to something that is big?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat groot?
mass, giant,|massa, reuse,
(4) What words refer to something becoming big?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak groot?
get bigger, expand, grow, swell up, stretch, inflate, increase in size, swell, mushroom,|groter, uit te brei, te groei, swel, rek, opblaas, vergroot, swel, sampioen,
(5) What words refer to part of something becoming big?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na deel van iets raak groot?
branch, excrescence,|tak, uitwas,
(6) What words refer to making something big?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets groot?
extend, stretch, enlarge, blow up, magnify, expand, inflate, augment,|brei, rek, vergroot, blaas, vergroot, uit te brei, opblaas, brei,
(7) What words refer to the process of becoming big?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die proses om groot?
enlargement, expansion, extension, growth, inflation, increase (n), magnification,|uitbreiding uitbreiding, uitbreiding, groei, inflasie, verhoging (n), vergroting,
(8) What words describe something that has been made big?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat groot gemaak beskryf?
enlarged, swollen, inflated,|vergroot, geswel, opgeblase,
(9) What words refer to being bigger than another thing?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na synde groter as &#39;n ander ding?
bigger, biggest, larger, largest, greater, greatest,|groter, grootste, groter, grootste, grootste, grootste,
(10) What words describe something that is much bigger than other things of the same type?|(10) Watter woorde iets wat baie groter as die ander dinge van dieselfde soort te beskryf?
outsized, giant, extra large,|buitenmaatse, reuse, ekstra groot,
(11) What words refer to how big something is?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na hoe groot iets?
size, dimensions, magnitude,|grootte, dimensies, omvang,
(12) What words indicate how big something is?|(12) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe groot iets?
how big, measure (10 meters), be 10 meters long/wide/high,|hoe groot, maat (10 meter), 10 meter lank / wye / hoog,
(13) What words refer to measuring how big something is?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die meting van hoe groot iets?
measure,|meet,
(14) What words refer to a unit of size?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n eenheid van grootte?
cubic (inch, foot, yard),|kubieke (duim, voet, werf),
(15) What instruments are used to measure the size of something?|(15) Watter instrumente word gebruik om die grootte van iets te meet?
ruler, tape measure|liniaal, maatband
(16) What words describe a system of measures?|(16) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n stelsel van maatreëls?
metric|metrieke
(17) What words describe something that is not big or small?|(17) Watter woorde iets wat nie groot of klein beskryf?
medium, average, medium-sized, average-sized, in between,|medium, gemiddelde, medium-grootte, gemiddelde grootte, tussen,
(18) What words refer to something being big on one side or end?|(18) Watter woorde verwys na iets om groot op die een kant of eindig?
flare, spread, lopsided, fan out,|flare, verspreiding, skewe, fan uit,
(19) What words describe something that is too big?|(19) Watter woorde iets wat te groot is, beskryf?
gross, outsized, overgrown, oversized, unwieldy,|bruto, buitenmaatse, toegegroei, groot, lomp,
Small|Klein
Use this domain for words referring to being small.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat klein.
(1) What words describe something that is small?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat klein beskryf?
small, little, dainty, miniature, compact,|klein, klein, fyn, miniatuur, kompakte,

tiny, minute, miniscule, microscopic, infinitesimal, wee, diminutive,|klein, minuut, minuscule, mikroskopiese, infinitesimale, wee, klein,

dwarf, midget,|dwerg, midget,
(4) What words refer to something becoming small?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak klein?
get smaller, shrink, shrivel, shrivel up, contract, decrease in size, reduce, wither,|kleiner, krimp, inkrimp nie, verskroei, kontrak, te verminder in grootte, te verminder, verwelk,
(5) What words refer to making something small?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets klein?
shrink, stunt,|krimp, stunt,
(6) What words refer to the process of becoming small?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die proses om klein?
reduction, contraction, decrease (n),|vermindering, inkrimping, afname (n),
(7) What words describe something that has been made small?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat klein gemaak beskryf?
shrunken,|verkrimp,
(8) What words refer to being smaller than another thing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na kleiner is as &#39;n ander ding?
smaller, smallest, littler, littlest,|kleiner, kleinste, Littler, kleinste,
(9) What words describe something that is much smaller than other things of the same type?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat baie kleiner as ander dinge van dieselfde soort te beskryf?
undersized, dwarf, midget, extra small,|ondermaatse, dwerg, midget, ekstra klein,
(10) What words refer to how small something is?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na hoe klein iets?
