(11) What words indicate how small something is?|(11) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe klein iets?
how small,|hoe klein,
(12) What words describe something that is made small enough to carry?|(12) Watter woorde iets wat klein genoeg is om uit te voer is gemaak beskryf?
compact, pocket, miniature|kompakte, sak, miniatuur
Long|Long
Use this domain for words related to being long. In many languages there is more than one system of measuring length. These systems may be used for different purposes or in different jobs. For instance measuring the length of an object may use different words than measuring the distance a person travels.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat lank. In baie tale is daar meer as een stelsel vir die meet van lengte. Hierdie stelsels kan gebruik word vir verskillende doeleindes of in verskillende bane. Byvoorbeeld die lengte van &#39;n voorwerp kan verskillende woorde gebruik as die meting van die afstand wat &#39;n persoon beweeg.
(1) What words describe something that is long?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat lank beskryf?
long, lengthy, extensive,|lang, lang, uitgebreide,
(2) What words describe a long distance?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n lang afstand?
long, huge, vast,|lang, groot, groot,
(3) What words refer to something that is long?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat lank?
a length of,|&#39;n lengte van,
(4) What words refer to something becoming long?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak lank?
get longer, lengthen, stretch,|kry meer, verleng, rek,
(5) What words refer to making something long?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets wat lank?
make something longer, lengthen, extend, stretch,|iets te maak langer, verleng, uit te brei, strek,
(6) What words describe something that has been made long?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat lank gemaak beskryf?
lengthened, elongated, extended, stretched, outstretched,|verleng, verlengde, uitgebrei, strek, uitgestrek,
(7) What words refer to being longer than another thing?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na langer as &#39;n ander ding?
longer, longest,|langer, langste,
(8) What words refer to how long something is?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na hoe lank iets?
length, distance, how long, span,|lengte, afstand, hoe lank, span,
(9) What words indicate how long something is?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe lank iets?
is, measure (v), long, in length, how long, be (two inches) (too) long,|is, meet (v), &#39;n lang, in die lengte, hoe lank, wees (twee duim) (ook) &#39;n lang,
(10) What words refer to measuring how long something is?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die meting van hoe lank iets?
measure, pace off, step off,|meet, tempo af, stap af,
(11) What words refer to a unit of length?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n eenheid van lengte?
inch, foot, yard, mile, light year, millimeter, centimeter, meter, kilometer, day's journey,|duim, voet, werf, myl, lig jaar millimeter, sentimeter, meter, kilometer, dagreis,
(12) What instruments are used to measure the length of something?|(12) Watter instrumente word gebruik om die lengte van iets te meet?
caliper, chain, line, micrometer, rod, rule, ruler, tape measure, measuring tape, tapeline, yardstick,|caliper, ketting, lyn, mikrometer, staaf, reël, liniaal, maatband, maatband, rolmaat, maatstaf,
(13) What words describe a system of lengths?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n stelsel van lengtes?
metric,|metrieke,
Short, not long|Kortom, nie lank
Use this domain for words related to being short in length.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat kort lengte.
(1) What words describe something that is short?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat kort beskryf?
short, compact, dumpy, dwarfed, pug, runty, shrimpy, skimpy, stubby, stumpy,|kort, kompakte, bonkige, verdwerg, pug, runty, shrimpy, skraps, stomp, stomp,
(2) What words refer to something becoming short?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets besig kort?
get shorter, shrink, contract,|kry korter, krimp, kontrak,
(3) What words refer to making something short?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets kort?
shorten, make something shorter, cut down, condense|verkort, iets maak korter, afgekap, kondenseer
(4) What words describe something that has been made short?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat kort gemaak beskryf?
shortened, abbreviated, abridged, compressed, condensed, contracted, shriveled, shrunk, shrunken,|verkort, verkort, verkorte, saamgeperste, gekondenseer, gekontrakteer is, verskrompel, gekrimp, verkrimp,
(5) What words refer to being shorter than another thing?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na synde korter as &#39;n ander ding?
shorter, shortest,|korter, kortste,
(6) What words refer to how short something is?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na hoe kort iets?
shortness,|kort,
(7) What words indicate how short something is?|(7) Wat woorde aan te dui hoe kort iets?
how short, be (two inches) (too) short,|hoe kort, wees (twee duim) (te) kort,
Tall|Tall
Use this domain for words related to being tall--a word describing something that is big from the top to the bottom.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat lank - &#39;n woord wat iets wat groot van die top na die bodem.
(1) What words describe something that is tall?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat hoog beskryf?
tall, high,|hoog, hoog,
(2) What words describe something that is very tall?|(2) Watter woorde iets is wat baie hoog beskryf?
soaring, towering,|stygende, toring,
(3) What words describe a tall person?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n lang persoon?
tall, lanky, gangling, leggy, hulking, gangly, strapping,|lang, lenige, slungelig, langbenig, plomp, gangly, strapping,
(4) What words refer to a tall person?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lang persoon?
giant,|reus,
(5) What words refer to becoming tall?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na besig lank?
get taller, grow, sprout, shoot up, put on height|kry langer, groei, spruit, skiet, op hoogte
(6) What words refer to making something tall?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets lank?
raise, heighten,|samel, Verhoog,
(7) What words describe something that has been made tall?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat hoog gemaak beskryf?
raised, heightened,|opgewek, verhoogde,
(8) What words refer to being taller than another thing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na synde langer as &#39;n ander ding?
taller, tallest, tower over, tower above, dwarf (v), dominate,|langer, langste, toring oor, toring bo dwerg (v), oorheers,
(9) What words refer to how tall something is?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na hoe lank iets?
height, stature,|hoogte, statuur,
(10) What words indicate how tall something is?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe lank iets?
how tall, be (six feet) tall, be (ten meters) high, be (six feet) in height,|Hoe lank, wees (ses voet) lank wees (tien meter) hoog, wees (ses voet) hoog,
Short, not tall|Kort, nie hoog
Use this domain for words related to being short in height.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat kort in hoogte.
short, dumpy, dwarfed, low, runty, shrimpy, squat, squatty, stumpy, low,|Kortom, bonkige, verdwerg, lae, runty, shrimpy, hurk, gedrongen, stomp, lae,
(2) What words describe someone who is short?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat kort beskryf?
short, not very tall, small, little, petite, squat,|kort, nie baie groot, klein, klein, petite, hurk,
(3) What words describe someone who is very short?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat baie kort beskryf?
tiny, diminutive, puny,|klein, klein, nietige,
(4) What words refer to a short person?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kort persoon?
midget, squirt, dwarf, runt, shrimp,|midget, spuit, dwerg, runt, garnale,
(5) What words refer to becoming short?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na besig kort?
shrink,|krimp,
(6) What words refer to making something shorter?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets korter?
shorten, shrink something,|verkort, krimp iets,
(7) What words describe something that has been made short?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat kort gemaak beskryf?
shortened, shrunken,|verkort, verkrimp,
(8) What words refer to how short something is?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na hoe kort iets?
shortness, how short,|kort, hoe kort nie,
(9) What words indicate how short something is?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe kort iets?
be (two inches) (too) short,|wees (twee duim) (te) kort,
Thick|Dik
Use this domain for words referring to being thick.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na synde dik.
(1) What words describe something that is thick?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat dik beskryf?
thick, chunky, fat,|dik, dik, vet,
(2) What words describe something like a branch or rope that is thick?|(2) Watter woorde iets soos &#39;n tak of tou wat dik beskryf?
thick, stout,|dik, stout,
(3) What words describe something like cloth or paper that is thick?|(3) Watter woorde iets soos lap of papier wat is dik beskryf?
thick, heavy,|dik, swaar,
(4) What words refer to something becoming thick?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak dik?
thicken, get thick,|verdik, kry dik,
(5) What words refer to making something thick?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets dik?
thicken,|verdik,
(6) What words refer to being thicker than another thing?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na synde dikker as die ander dinge?
thicker, thickest,|dikker, dikste,
(7) What words refer to how thick something is?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na hoe dik iets?
thickness,|dikte,
(8) What words indicate how thick something is?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe dik iets?
how thick, be ten centimeters thick,|hoe dik, tien sentimeter dik,
(9) What words describe a part of something that is thick?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n deel van iets wat is dik?
thickening,|verdikking,
Thin thing|Dun ding
Use this domain for words describing something that is thin.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat dun beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is thin?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat dun beskryf?
thin, slender, slight, stringy,|dun, skraal, ligte, draderig,
(2) What words describe something like a branch or rope that is thin?|(2) Watter woorde iets soos &#39;n tak of tou wat is dun beskryf?
thin, spindly,|dun, wankele,
(3) What words describe something like thread that is thin?|(3) Watter woorde iets soos draad wat is dun beskryf?
fine, fibrous, fine-spun,|fyn, veselagtige, fyn gespin,
(4) What words describe something that is thin and flat?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat dun en plat beskryf?
thin, paper-thin, wafer-thin, slim,|dun, papier-dun, wafer-dun, skraal,
(5) What words describe something like cloth or paper that is thin?|(5) Watter woorde iets soos lap of papier wat is dun beskryf?
thin, fine, light, lightweight,|dun, fyn, lig, lig,
(6) What words describe something that is thin and weak?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat maer en swak beskryf?
flimsy, tenuous,|swak, vaag,
(7) What words refer to something becoming thin?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets raak dun?
get thinner, grow thinner,|kry dunner, groei dunner,
(8) What words refer to making something thin?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets dun?
taper,|taps,
(9) What words refer to being thinner than another thing?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na synde dunner as &#39;n ander ding?
thinner, thinnest,|dunner, dunste,
(10) What words describe something that is thin on one side or end?|(10) Watter woorde iets wat dun aan die een kant of eindig beskryf?
tapering,|gepunt,
Fat person|Vet persoon
Use this domain for words describing a person or animal who is fat.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon of dier wat vet.
(1) What words describe someone who is fat?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat vet beskryf?
fat, overweight, big, large, portly, hefty, thickset, corpulent, fleshly, heavy, paunchy, ponderous, roly-poly, rotund, heavy-set,|vet, oorgewig, groot, groot, deftig, stewige, dik, gesette, vleeslike, swaar, boepens, swaar, Roly-poly, ronde, swaar-stel,
(2) What words describe someone who is very fat?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat baie vet beskryf?
obese, obesity, gross,|vetsugtig, vetsug, bruto,
(3) What words describe someone who is fat and short?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat vet en kort beskryf?
dumpy, tubby, stout, stocky, squat, stubby,|bonkige, Tubby, stout, bonkige, hurk, stomp,
(4) What words describe someone who is fat and attractive?|(4) Watter woorde iemand wat vet en mooi beskryf?
plump, chubby,|Mollige,
(5) What words describe someone who is fat and strong?|(5) Watter woorde iemand wat vet en sterk te beskryf?
brawny, burly,|gespierd, fris,
(6) What words refer to someone who is fat?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat vet?
tub, porker,|bad, vleisvark,
(7) What words refer to someone becoming fat?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iemand besig vet?
put on weight, gain weight, fill out, get fat,|sit op die gewig, gewig op te tel, vul, vet,
(8) What words refer to making someone fat?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iemand vet?
fatten,|vet,
(9) What words describe food that makes someone fat?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf kos wat iemand vet maak?
fattening,|mis,
(10) What words describe someone who has been made fat?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat vet gemaak?
fattened,|vetgemaakte,
(11) What words refer to being fatter than another person?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na synde vetter as &#39;n ander persoon?
fatter, fattest,|vetter, vetste,
(12) What words refer to how fat someone is?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na hoe vet iemand?
weight, bulk,|gewig, massa,
(13) What words describe a part of the body that is fat?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n deel van die liggaam wat vet?
pudgy, flabby, full, thick, ample, podgy,|kort en dik, pap, vol, dik, ruim, bolle,
(14) What words refer to a fat stomach?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vet maag?
paunch, pot belly, beer gut, spare tire, middle-age spread, paunchy,|grootpens, pot belly, bier derm, spaarwiel, middel-jarige ouderdom verspreiding, boepens,
Thin person|Dun persoon
Use this domain for words describing a person or animal who is thin.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon of dier wat dun.
(1) What words describe someone who is thin?|(1) Watter woorde iemand wat dun beskryf?
thin, slight,|dun, ligte,
(2) What words describe someone who is very thin?|(2) Watter woorde iemand wat baie dun beskryf?
emaciated, skeletal, be skin and bones, underweight, gaunt,|uitgeteer, skelet, wees vel en bene, ondergewig, maer,
(3) What words describe someone who is thin and tall?|(3) Watter woorde iemand wat dun en lank beskryf?
lanky, spindly, rangy,|lenige, wankele, rangy,
(4) What words describe someone who is thin and attractive?|(4) Watter woorde iemand wat is dun en aantreklik te beskryf?
slim, slender, trim, willowy, keep your figure, dapper, svelte,|skraal, skraal, snoei, lenige, hou jou figuur, dapper, svelte,
(5) What words describe someone who is thin and not attractive?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat dun en nie aantreklik?
skinny, bony, scrawny, scraggy, angular,|skinny, benerige, maer, schriel, hoek,
(6) What words describe someone who is thin and strong?|(6) Watter woorde iemand wat is dun en sterk te beskryf?
lean, wiry,|maer, seningrige,
(7) What words refer to someone who is thin?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat is dun?
scarecrow, skeleton, bag of bones,|voëlverskrikker, skelet, sak bene,
(8) What words refer to someone becoming thin?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na iemand besig dun?
lose weight, slim, shed (ten) pounds, waste away, get thin,|gewig, skraal, werp (tien) pond te verloor, wegkwyn, kry dun,
(9) What words refer to being thinner than another person?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na synde dunner as &#39;n ander persoon?
(10) What words describe a face that is thin?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gesig wat is dun?
pinched, drawn, gaunt, hollow cheeks,|knyp, getrek, maer, hol wange,
(11) What words refer to a thin stomach?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dun maag?
flat stomach,|plat maag,
(12) What words refer to trying to become thin?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na probeer dun geword?
try to lose weight, watch your weight, watch your figure, diet, be on a diet, go on a diet, slim (v),|probeer om gewig te verloor, kyk hoe jou gewig, kyk hoe jou figuur, dieet, op &#39;n dieet, gaan op &#39;n dieet, slim (v),
Wide|Wye
Use this domain for words related to being wide--a word describing something like a road or river that is far from one side to the other side.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat wyd - &#39;n woord iets soos &#39;n pad of rivier wat ver van die een kant na die ander kant beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is wide?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat wyd beskryf?
wide, broad, widespread,|breë, wydverspreide,
(2) What words refer to a place where something is wide?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar iets is wyd?
widening, wide spot,|verbreding, wye spot,
(3) What words refer to something becoming wide?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak wye?
widen, get wider, broaden out,|verbreed, kry wyer, wyer,
(4) What words refer to making something wide?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wye maak van iets?
make something wider, widen, broaden,|iets maak wyer, verbreed, uitbrei,
(5) What words refer to the process of becoming wide?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die proses om wye?
widening, broadening,|verbreding, verbreding,
(6) What words describe something that has been made wide?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat wyd gemaak beskryf?
widened, broadened,|verbreed, verbreed,
(7) What words refer to being wider than another thing?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na synde wyer as &#39;n ander ding?
wider, widest, broader, broadest,|wyer, wydste, wyer, breedste,
(8) What words refer to how wide something is?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na hoe wyd iets?
width, breadth,|breedte, breedte,
(9) What words refer to how wide a circle or hole is?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na hoe wyd &#39;n sirkel of gat?
bore, caliber, diameter,|gebaar, kaliber, deursnee,
(10) What words indicate how wide something is?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe wyd iets?
how wide, be (ten feet) wide, be (ten feet) across,|hoe wyd, (tien voet) breed, (tien voet) oor,
Narrow|Smal
Use this domain for words related to being narrow.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat smal.
(1) What words describe something that is narrow?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat nou beskryf?
narrow, thin,|smal, dun,
(2) What words describe something that is very narrow?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie smal beskryf?
tight squeeze,|stywe druk,
(3) What words refer to a place where something is narrow?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar iets is smal?
narrows, narrowing, waist, neck,|Narrows, vernouing, middellyf, nek,
(4) What words refer to something becoming narrow?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak nou?
narrow (v), get narrower, taper, thin (v),|smal (v) kry smaller, taps, dun (v),
(5) What words refer to making something narrow?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets smal?
narrow (v), taper, thin (v), constrict,|smal (v), taps, dun (v), vernou,
(6) What words refer to the process of becoming narrow?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die proses om smal?
constriction, restriction,|vernouing, beperking,
(7) What words describe something that has been made narrow?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat nou gemaak beskryf?
tapered, thinned, constricted, restricted,|tapse, uitgedun, vernoude, beperk,
(8) What words refer to being narrower than another thing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na synde smaller as &#39;n ander ding?
narrower, narrowest, thinner, thinnest,|smaller, nouste, dunner, dunste,
(9) What words indicate how narrow something is?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe smal iets?
how narrow, be only (one inch) wide, be (two inches) (too) narrow,|hoe smal, net (een duim) wyd, wees (twee duim) (ook) smal,
Big area|Big area
Use this domain for words describing a big area.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n groot gebied.
(1) What words describe a big area?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groot area?
big, large, extensive, fair-sized, be a fair size, broad, expansive, wide, wide open,|groot, groot, uitgebreide, billike-grootte, &#39;n billike grootte, breë, omvattende, wye, oop,
(2) What words describe a very big area?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n baie groot area?
huge, immense, vast, enormous,|groot, groot, groot, groot,
(3) What words describe a big room?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groot kamer?
spacious, roomy, cavernous, be big inside,|ruim, ruim, kaverneuse, wees groot binne,
(4) What words refer to an area that is big?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n gebied wat groot?
expanse,|uitspansel,
(5) What words refer to an area becoming big?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n gebied besig groot?
expand, spread,|uit te brei, te versprei,
(6) What words refer to making an area big?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n gebied groot?
expand,|uit te brei,
(7) What words describe an area that has been made big?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n gebied wat reeds groot gemaak?
expanded,|uitgebrei,
(8) What words refer to being bigger in area than another thing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na synde groter gebied as in &#39;n ander ding?
bigger, biggest, roomier,|groter, grootste, ruimere,
(9) What words refer to how big an area is?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na hoe groot &#39;n gebied is?
area, acreage, size, square footage, extent,|area, oppervlakte, grootte, vierkante beeldmateriaal, omvang,
(10) What words indicate how big an area is?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe groot &#39;n gebied is?
how big, be (ten acres) in size, cover, extend over,|hoe groot, (tien hektaar) in grootte, cover, strek oor,
(11) What words refer to measuring an area?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die meting van &#39;n gebied?
survey,|opname,
(12) What words refer to a unit of measure of area?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n eenheid van meting van area?
acre, hectare, square (inch, foot, yard, mile, meter, kilometer)|akker, hektaar, vierkante (duim, voet, werf, myl, meter, kilometer)
(13) What instruments are used to measure an area?|(13) Watter instrumente word gebruik om &#39;n gebied te meet?
rod,|staaf,
(14) What words describe a small area?|(14) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n klein area?
small, narrow (plot of ground), cramped, poky,|klein, smal (stuk grond), beknopte, armoedige,
(15) What words refer to how big around an area is?|(15) Watter woorde verwys na hoe groot om &#39;n gebied is?
circumference, around,|omtrek, rond,
Big container, volume|Big houer, volume
Use this domain for words referring to the volume of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die volume van iets.
(1) What words describe a big container?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n groot houer?
big, large, capacious, voluminous,|groot, groot, ruim, lywige,
(2) What words describe a very big container?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n baie groot houer?
huge, enormous,|groot, enorme,
(3) What words refer to a container that is big?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n houer wat groot?
tank, tub,|tenk, bad,
(4) What words refer to a container becoming big?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n houer raak groot?
expand, inflate,|uit te brei, opblaas,
(5) What words refer to making a container big?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n houer groot?
expand, enlarge,|uit te brei, te vergroot,
(6) What words describe a container that has been made big?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n houer wat reeds groot gemaak?
(7) What words refer to a container being bigger than another container?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n houer om groter as &#39;n ander houer?
bigger, biggest,|groter, grootste,
(8) What words refer to how big a container is?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na hoe groot &#39;n houer is?
volume, capacity, size, dimensions,|volume, kapasiteit, grootte, dimensies,
(9) What words indicate how big a container is?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe &#39;n groot houer is?
how big, be (ten liters) in volume, hold, be (ten) cubic inches, be two meters long two meters wide and two meters high, be two by two by two,|hoe groot, (tien liter) in volume, hou, (tien) kubieke duim, twee meter lank twee meter breed en twee meter hoog, twee by twee-twee
(10) What words refer to measuring the volume of a something?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die meting van die volume van &#39;n iets?
measure, find the volume,|meet, vind die volume,
(11) What words refer to a unit of volume?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n eenheid van volume?
cubic (inch, foot, yard), milliliter, centiliter, deciliter, liter, decaliter, kiloliter, hectoliter, cup, pint, quart, gallon, fluid ounce, dry ounce, peck, bushel, measure, batch,|kubieke (duim, voet, werf), milliliter, centiliter, deciliter, liter, decaliter, kiloliter, hectoliter, beker, glas, kwart, liter, vloeistofons, droë ounce, pik, maatemmer, meet, joernaal,
(12) What instruments are used to measure volume?|(12) Watter instrumente word gebruik om volume te meet?
measuring cup, measuring spoon,|meet beker, meetlepels,
(13) What words describe a system of measures?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n stelsel van maatreëls?
metric, imperial,|metriese, Britse,
(14) What words refer to an amount of something that has been measured by a particular container?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n bedrag van iets wat gemeet word deur &#39;n spesifieke houer?
bag, bagful, barrel, boatload, bottle, bowl, box, boxful, bucketful, busload, can, carload, glass, handful, jug, mug, pack, packet, planeload, platter, roomful, sackful, scoop, scoopful, spoon, spoonful, tablespoon, tankful, teaspoon, teaspoonful, trainload, tray, truckload|sak, bagful, vat, boatload, bottel, bak, boks, boxful, emmer, busload, kan motor vol, glas, handvol, beker, beker, pak, pakkie, planeload, skottel, volle kamer, sackful, skep, scoopful, lepel, lepel, eetlepel, tankful, teelepel, teelepel, trainload, skinkbord, vrag
(15) What words describe a small container?|(15) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n klein houer?
small,|klein,
Distance|Afstand
Use this domain for words referring to the distance between two things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die afstand tussen twee dinge.
(1) What words refer to the distance between two things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die afstand tussen twee dinge?
distance, how far, span, as the crow flies,|afstand, hoe ver, span, soos die kraai vlieg,
(2) What words indicate the distance between two places?|(2) Watter woorde dui die afstand tussen twee plekke?
from, away, off, apart, away from|uit, weg, weg, uitmekaar, weg van
(3) What words refer to the distance something can move?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die afstand iets kan beweeg?
range, reach (n), extent,|reeks, bereik (n), omvang,
(4) What words indicate that something (like an area or road) continues for some distance?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets (soos &#39;n gebied of pad) vir &#39;n afstand bly?
extend, stretch, go on, continue, spread|brei, strek, gaan op, bly, verspreiding
(5) What question words ask for the distance between two things?|(5) Watter vraag woorde vra vir die afstand tussen twee dinge?
Far|Ver
Use this domain for words indicating that something is far from something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is ver van iets anders.
(1) What words indicate that something is far from something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is ver van iets anders?
far, far away, far off, afar, far afield, far and wide, a far cry from, far apart, far removed, distant, be distant, a long distance, in the distance, some distance, a good distance, a ways, way off, a long way (off), a long ways away, a fair way, quite a ways, nowhere near, miles (away), yonder, wide of, clear off, all over, asunder, at arm's length, on the horizon, the ends of the earth, uttermost parts of the earth|ver, ver weg, ver ver ver, ver en wyd, &#39;n ver van ver uitmekaar, ver, ver, ver wees, &#39;n lang afstand, in die verte, &#39;n afstand, &#39;n goeie afstand, &#39;n manier , weg, &#39;n lang pad (af), &#39;n lang maniere weg, &#39;n regverdige manier, nogal &#39;n manier, nêrens naby myl (weg), daar, wyd van duidelike af, regoor, verbreek, om op &#39;n armlengte op die horison, in die uithoeke van die aarde, uithoeke van die aarde
(2) What words describe something that is far?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat ver beskryf?
distant, remote, faraway, out of the way, long-distance, far-flung|ver, ver, ver, uit die weg, &#39;n lang-afstand, afgeleë
(3) What words refer to how far something is?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hoe ver iets?
distance, how far|afstand, hoe ver
(4) What words indicate that something is far enough so that you cannot do something?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is ver genoeg sodat jy nie iets kan doen?
too far, out of sight, out of range, beyond reach, out of reach, out of hearing|te ver, buite sig, buite bereik, buite bereik, buite bereik, uit verhoor
(5) What words refer to moving away from someone or something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na weg te beweeg van iets of iemand?
go away, recede|gaan weg, verdwyn
(6) What words refer to moving away from a person or vehicle behind you?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na weg te beweeg van &#39;n persoon of voertuig agter jou?
leave behind, leave in the dust|agterlaat, laat in die stof
(7) What words refer to staying far from something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na ver bly van iets?
not go near, not come near, stay away from, keep away from, keep your distance, keep off, stay back, keep back, remain at a distance, stand off, stand aloof, steer clear of, stand clear of|nie naby gaan nie nader kom, bly weg van, weg te hou van, hou jou afstand, af te hou, bly terug, hou terug, bly op &#39;n afstand staan ​​af, staan ​​opsy, wegbly van, staan ​​weg van
(8) What words refer to a long distance?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lang afstand?
long distance, long haul, long range, a fur piece|lang afstand, langtermyn, lang reeks, &#39;n bont stuk
(9) What words describe a place that is far away from where most people go?|(9) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek wat ver weg van waar die meeste mense gaan?
remote, isolated, out of the way, off the beaten track, secluded, miles from anywhere, in the middle of nowhere, way out, backwater, backcountry, boondocks, boonies, hicks, out in the sticks|afgeleë, geïsoleerde, uit die pad, off the beaten track, afgesonderde, myl van oral, in die middel van nêrens, weg uit, dood water, binneland, Boon Docks, boonies, Hicks, in die stokke
(10) What words indicate that something is farther than something else?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is verder as iets anders?
farther, further, beyond, past, on the other side of, farthest, furthest, extreme, in the offing, background|verder, verder, verder, verby, aan die ander kant van, verste, verste, ekstreme, in die vooruitsig, agtergrond
Near|Naby
Use this domain for words indicating that something is near something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is naby iets anders.
(1) What words indicate that something is near something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is naby iets anders?
near, nearby, close, close to, close by, not far, practically on top of, a short distance, locally, in the vicinity, nigh, around, a stone's throw, in the neighborhood|naby, naby, naby, naby, naby, nie ver prakties op die top van &#39;n kort afstand, plaaslik, in die omgewing, naby, rond, &#39;n klipgooi, in die buurt
(2) What words describe something that is near?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat naby is, beskryf?
nearby, nearest, the next, neighboring, local, surrounding|in die buurt, naaste, die volgende, aangrensende, plaaslike omliggende
(3) What words refer to how near something is?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na hoe naby iets?
nearness, closeness, proximity|nabyheid, nabyheid, die nabyheid
(4) What words indicate that something is near enough so that you can do something?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is naby genoeg sodat jy iets kan doen?
near enough, close enough, within walking distance, within reach, within range, convenient, handy, be close at hand, around the corner, close up, up close, at close quarters, at close range, right under your nose|naby genoeg is, naby genoeg, binne loopafstand, binne bereik, binne die omvang, gerieflike, handig, naby aan die hand, om die draai, sluit, naby, van naby, op kort afstand, reg onder jou neus
(5) What words refer to moving nearer to someone or something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die verskuiwing nader aan iets of iemand?
approach, get near, get nearer, near (v), draw near, get close, get closer, close in on, get as close as possible|benadering, kry naby, kry nader, naby (v), nader, kry naby, nader, sluit in op, kry so na as moontlik
(6) What words refer to moving nearer to a person or vehicle in front of you?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing nader aan &#39;n persoon of voertuig in die voorkant van jou?
catch up, be gaining on, be closing on|haal, wees besig op, word sluit op
(7) What words refer to staying near something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n verblyf naby iets?
stay close, keep close, hug, cling to|bly naby, hou nou, drukkie, vashou aan
(8) What words indicate that something is nearer than something else?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is nader as iets anders?
nearer, closer, before, on this side of, nearest, closest|nader, nader, voor, aan hierdie kant van, naaste, naaste
High|Hoë
Use this domain for words that express the idea that something is high.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat die idee dat daar iets is hoog te spreek.
(1) What words describe something that is high?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat hoog beskryf?
high, lofty, upper, alpine, topmost,|hoog, verhewe, boonste, berg, boonste,
(2) What words describe something that is very high?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie hoog is, beskryf?
soaring,|stygende,
(3) What words indicate that something is high in the air?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is hoog in die lug?
be high up, high above, far above, way up there, sky-high, up in the air, be aloft,|wees hoog, hoog bo, ver bo, weg daar, hemelhoë, in die lug, wees omhoog,
(4) What words refer to becoming high?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na besig hoog?
rise, soar,|styg, styg,
(5) What words refer to making something high?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets hoog?
heighten, raise,|verhoog, verhoog,
(6) What words describe something that has been made high?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat hoë gemaak beskryf?
heightened, raised,|verhoogde, opgewek,
(7) What words describe a surface that is higher than the area around it?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n oppervlak wat hoër is as die area rondom dit?
raised, elevated,|opgewek, verhoogde,
(8) What words refer to being higher than another thing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na hoër is as &#39;n ander ding?
higher, highest,|hoër, hoogste,
(9) What words refer to how high something is?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na hoe hoog iets?
height, altitude, level, elevation,|hoogte, hoogte, vlak, opstand,
(10) What words indicate how high something is?|(10) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe &#39;n hoë iets?
(100 meters) high, be (100 meters) in height,|(100 meter) hoog, wees (100 meter) in die hoogte,
(11) What words refer to being afraid of being in a high place?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na bang om in &#39;n hoë plek?
fear of heights, vertigo,|vrees vir hoogtes, vertigo,
Low|Lae
Use this domain for words indicating that something is low--in the air but not high above the ground.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde aandui dat daar iets is laag - in die lug, maar nie hoog bo die grond.
(1) What words describe something that is low?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat lae beskryf?
low,|lae,
(2) What words describe something that is very low?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie laag is, beskryf?
hugging the ground, down low, way down,|drukkies die grond, laag, pad af,
(3) What words indicate that something is low?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is laag?
be low, down,|lae, af,
(4) What words refer to becoming low?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na besig laag?
fall,|val,
(5) What words refer to making something low?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets laag?
lower,|laer,
(6) What words describe something that has been made low?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat lae gemaak beskryf?
lowered,|verlaag,
(7) What words describe a surface that is lower than the area around it?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n oppervlak wat laer is as die area rondom dit?
low-lying, depressed, depression,|laagliggende, depressief, depressie,
(8) What words refer to being lower than another thing?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na laer is as &#39;n ander ding?
lower, lowest,|laer, laagste,
Deep, shallow|Diep, vlak
Use this domain for words related to being deep or shallow--how far something such as a hole extends below the ground or other surface, or how far something is below the surface of the water.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat diep of vlak - hoe ver iets soos &#39;n gat strek onder die grond of ander oppervlak of hoe ver iets onder die oppervlak van die water.
(1) What words describe something that is deep?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat diep beskryf?
deep, deeply, deep-seated, in the depths, deep down,|diep, diep, diep gewortelde, in die dieptes, diep,
(2) What words describe something that is very deep?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat baie diep beskryf?
bottomless,|bodemlose,
(3) What words describe how deep something is for a person?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf hoe diep iets vir &#39;n persoon?
knee-deep, waist-deep, over your head, out of your depth,|kniediep, middellyf-diep, oor jou kop, uit jou diepte,
(4) What words refer to a deep place?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n diep plek?
the depths, channel, trench, gulf, abyss,|die dieptes, kanaal, sloot, kloof, afgrond,
(5) What words refer to something becoming deep?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak diep?
deepen, get deeper,|verdiep, dieper,
(6) What words refer to making something deep?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets diep?
deepen, dredge, dig out,|verdiep, bagger, grawe,
(7) What words refer to being deeper than another thing?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na synde dieper as &#39;n ander ding?
deeper, deepest,|dieper, diepste,
(8) What words refer to how deep something is?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na hoe diep iets?
depth,|diepte,
(9) What words indicate how deep something is?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui hoe diep iets?
how deep, be (ten feet) deep, (ten feet) in depth, at a depth of (ten feet), plunge (ten feet),|hoe diep, (tien voet) diep, (tien voet) in diepte, op &#39;n diepte van (tien voet), duik (tien voet),
(10) What words refer to measuring how deep something is?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die meting van hoe diep iets?
take a sounding, plumb,|neem &#39;n klinkende, lood,
(11) What instruments are used to measure how deep something is?|(11) Watter instrumente word gebruik om te meet hoe diep iets?
plumb line,|skietlood,
(12) What words refer to a unit of depth?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n eenheid van die diepte?
fathom,|peil,
(13) What words describe something that is shallow?|(13) Watter woorde iets wat vlak te beskryf?
shallow, not deep, skin-deep, superficial, surface,|vlak, nie diep, vel-diep, oppervlakkige, oppervlak,
(14) What words refer to a shallow place?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n vlak plek?

size, fit (n),|grootte, pas (n),

measure, take a measurement, assay, assess, balance, calibrate, determine, fathom, gauge, grade, mete, meter, pace, plumb, quantify, rank, reach, read, take a reading, record, rule, sound, span, step off, stretch, stride, survey, tape, test, time,|meet, neem &#39;n meting, assay, evalueer, balans, kalibreer, bepaal, te peil, meter, graad, meet, meter, tempo, lood, kwantifiseer, rang, te bereik, te lees, neem &#39;n lesing, rekord, reël, klank, span, stap af, rek, stride, opname, band, toets, tyd,

measurement, reading,|meting, lees,
(5) What general words refer to a unit of measure?|(5) Wat algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n eenheid van meet?
unit, measure, standard, scale, benchmark,|eenheid, meet, standaard, skaal, maatstaf,
(6) What words indicate that something is a particular size or amount?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is &#39;n bepaalde grootte of hoeveelheid?
is, measure (v), weigh, how big, of|is, meet (v), weeg, hoe groot, van

(8) What words refer to an amount that cannot be measured?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n bedrag wat nie gemeet kan word?
immeasurable, measureless, incalculable, unfathomable, unmeasured, untold,|onmeetbare, onmetelijk, onberekenbare, ondeurgrondelike, onmeetlike, ongekende,

Horizontal|Horisontale
Use this domain for words describing a horizontal orientation in relation to the ground or something that is level--a flat surface that does not rise in any direction. A person is horizontal when he is sleeping. A field is level when it is not on a hill and it has no uneven areas in it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n horisontale oriëntasie met betrekking tot die grond of iets wat vlak - &#39;n plat oppervlak wat nie opstaan ​​in enige rigting. &#39;N Persoon is horisontale as hy slaap. A veld is vlak wanneer dit nie op &#39;n heuwel en dit het geen ongelyke gebiede in.
(1) What words describe something in a horizontal position?|(1) Watter woorde iets in &#39;n horisontale posisie te beskryf?
horizontal, prone, prostrate, longwise, flat on the ground, on its side, lie, prone, flush, on an even keel, on the level, parallel to the ground|horisontale, geneig, gooi, in die lengte, plat op die grond, op sy kant lê, geneig, Krag, op &#39;n gelyke keel, op die vlak, parallel met die grond
(2) What words refer to becoming horizontal?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na besig horisontale?
fall on your face, fall prone, prostrate oneself, get horizontal, fall flat, hit the dirt, lay flat|val op jou gesig, val geneig, knieval, kry horisontale, val plat, druk die vuil, lê plat
(3) What words refer to causing something to be horizontal?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat horisontale te wees?
lay something flat, lay something down, align|lê iets plat, lê iets neer, sluit
(4) What words describe a surface that is level?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n oppervlak wat is vlak?
level (adj), even (adj), flat|vlak (adj), selfs (adj), plat
(5) What words refer to making something level?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets vlak?
make level, level (v),|maak gelyk, vlak (v),
Vertical|Vertikale
Use this domain for words describing a vertical orientation in relation to the ground. A person is vertical when he is standing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n vertikale oriëntasie met betrekking tot die grond. &#39;N Persoon is vertikale toe hy staan.

Leaning, sloping|Leun, skuins
Use this domain for words describing a leaning orientation in relation to the ground, or a surface that is sloping.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf &#39;n leun oriëntasie met betrekking tot die grond, of &#39;n oppervlak wat skuins.

(5) What words refer to a surface that is sloping?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n oppervlak wat skuins?

(6) What words refer to how much something is leaning or sloping?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na hoeveel iets leun of skuins?
angle, slope (n), inclination, pitch, grade, gradient, steep, precipitous, gradual (rise)|hoek, helling (n), neiging, toonhoogte, graad, helling, steil, steil, geleidelike (styging)
(7) What words describe a surface that is not level?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n oppervlak wat nie vlak?
uneven, rough, hilly, wavy, lumpy, broken (ground), rugged|ongelyke, rowwe, heuwelagtige, golwende, klonterig, gebreek (grond), ruwe
Bend|Buig
Use this domain for words referring to bending something and for words that describe something that is bent or curved.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets buig en vir woorde wat iets wat gebuig of geboë beskryf.
(1) What words refer to bending something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets buig?
bend, bow, flex, curve, put a kink in,|buig, boog, flex, kurwe, sit &#39;n kinkel in,
(2) What words refer to something bending?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets buig?
bend, buckle, curl, sag, warp,|buig, buig, krul, sag, warp,
(3) What words describe something that is bent?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat gebuig beskryf?
bent, arched, bowed, crinkled, curved, curving, curled, devious, gnarled, gnarly, hooked, indirect, jagged, kinked, knotted, knotty, knurled, knurly, turning, twirled, twisted,|gebuig, geboë, het gebuig geriffel, geboë, buig, krul, onderduims, knoestige, toeters, krom, indirekte, kronkelende, geknak, geknoopte, knorrige, gekartel, knurly, draai, draai &#39;, gedraai,
(4) What words describe something that should be straight but is bent?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat reguit moet wees nie, maar is gebuig beskryf?
akimbo, askew, awry, bandy, catawampus, contorted, crooked, deviating, distorted, skewed, tortuous, warped,|uitgesprei, skeef, skeef, krom, catawampus, krul, krom, afwyk, verdraai, skeef, kronkelende, warped,
(5) What words refer to a bend in something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n draai in iets?
bend, bow, curve, kink, loop, angle, joint,|buig, boog, kurwe, kinkel, lus, hoek, gesamentlike,
(6) What words refer to making many bends in something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van baie draaie in iets?
corrugate,|onduleren,
(7) What words describe something that has many bends?|(7) Wat woorde iets wat baie draaie het beskryf?
circuitous, coiled, convoluted, corrugated, curly, curvy, kinky, meandering, pretzel, serpentine, serrated, sinuous, snaky, spiral, tortuous, twisting, undulating, waved, waving, wavy, wind, winding, zigzag,|omslachtige, opgerolde, ingewikkelde, geriffelde, krullerige, bochtig, kinky, kronkel, krakeling, serpentijn, getande, kronkelende, slang achtig, spiraal, kronkelende, draai, golwende, waai, waai, golwende, wind, likwidasie, zigzag,
(8) What words refer to a line or road that is bent?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n lyn of pad wat gebuig?
bend, curve, twist,|buig, kurwe, draai,
(9) What words describe something that can be bent?|(9) Watter woorde iets wat gebuig kan word, beskryf?
bendable, flexible, flexibility, jointed, pliable, plastic, supple,|buigbare, buigbare, buigsaamheid, gelede, soepel, plastiek, soepel,
(10) What words describe something that cannot be bent?|(10) Watter woorde beskryf iets wat nie kan gebuig?
unbending, inflexible, inflexibility, rigid, rigidity,|onbuigbare, onbuigsaam, onbuigsaamheid, stewige, rigiditeit,

Concave|Konkawe
Use this domain for words describing something that is concave--extending inward in shape away from the viewer. The inside of a bowl is concave in shape.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat konkaaf beskryf - innerlike uitbreiding in die vorm weg van die kyker. Die binnekant van &#39;n bak konkaaf in die vorm.

nook|hoek

(6) What words are used to describe light?|(6) Watter woorde word gebruik om lig te beskryf?
candlepower, frequency, lumen, radiant, radiation, refract, short-wave, spectrum,|lichtkracht, frekwensie, lumen, stralende, bestraling, breek, kort golf, spektrum,

candlestick, wick, wax, candelabra, holder,|kandelaar pit, was, kandelare, houer,
(5) What words refer to the lights being on in a place?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die ligte om op &#39;n plek?
the lights are on, be lit up, ablaze,|die ligte op, word verlig, brand,
(6) What words refer to a light starting to work?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n ligte begin om te werk?

(7) What words refer to making a light start working?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n ligte begin werk?

(8) What words refer to a light stopping?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n ligte stop?
go out, go down, dim,|gaan uit, gaan af, dowwe,
(9) What words refer to making a light stop working?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van &#39;n ligte stop werk?
turn out, put out, turn down, switch off,|draai uit, sit uit, draai af, afskakel,
(10) What words refer to not turning off the lights?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na nie draai af die ligte?
leave the lights on,|laat die ligte op,
Bright|Bright

(2) What words describe a light that is very bright?|(2) Watter woorde &#39;n lig wat baie helder te beskryf?

(4) What words describe a place where there is lots of light?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek waar daar baie van die lig?
bright, light, well lit, ablaze with light,|helder, lig, goed verlig, aan die brand met die lig,
(5) What words refer to the light becoming brighter?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die lig raak helderder?
get light, brighten, lighten, the light grows,|kry lig, op te kikker, verlig, die lig groei,
Dark|Donker
Use this domain for words describing something that is dark--a place where there is little or no light.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat donker beskryf - &#39;n plek waar daar min of geen lig.
(1) What words describe a place where there is no light?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek waar daar geen lig?
dark, dismal, shadowed, shaded, pitch-dark,|donker, somber, skaduwee, skadu, pikdonker,
(2) What words describe a place where there is little light?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek waar daar min lig?

(3) What words describe a place where there is very little light?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek waar daar baie min lig?
unlit, dimly-lit, darkened, the half-light,|unlit, skemeragtige, verduister word, die half-lig,
(4) What words describe a place that is dark and makes you feel bad or afraid?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n plek wat donker en maak jou slegte of bang voel?
gloomy, dingy, the shadows,|somber, goor, die skadu,
(5) What words refer to a place becoming dark?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n plek besig om donker?
get dark, darken, the light fades, dim (v), fall, go dark, be plunged into darkness,|kry donker, donkerder, die lig vervaag, dowwe (v), val, gaan donker, word in die duisternis gedompel,
(6) What words refer to darkness?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die duisternis?
darkness, the dark, gloom,|duisternis, die donker, donkerte,
Shadow|Skaduwee
Use this domain for words related to a shadow--the area on the ground where the light does not shine because something is in the way. For instance if the sun|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n skaduwee - die gebied op die grond waar die lig nie skyn nie, want iets is in die pad. Byvoorbeeld, as die son
(or another light) is shining on an object, the area behind the object is in shadow (dark).|(Of &#39;n ander lig) skyn op &#39;n voorwerp, die gebied agter die voorwerp in die skaduwee (donker).
(1) What words refer to a shadow?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n skaduwee deurbring?
shadow|skaduwee
(2) What words refer to something blocking the light from shining on something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat die lig blokkeer uit skyn op iets?
shade, cast a shadow, block the light, eclipse, overshadowing,|skaduwee, gooi &#39;n skaduwee, blok die lig, verduistering, oorskadu,
(3) What words describe something in the shadow of something else?|(3) Watter woorde iets in die skaduwee van iets anders beskryf?
in the shade, shaded, shady, shadowy,|in die skaduwee, skadu, skaduwee, skaduagtige,
Color|Kleur
Use this domain for words related to color.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met kleur.
(1) What words refer to color?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die kleur?
color, shade, tint, hue, coloring, pigment, tincture, cast, palette, coloration, complexion, chroma, chromatic, tone,|kleur, tint, kleur, kleur, pigment, tinktuur, cast, palet, kleur, gelaat, chroma, chromatiese, toon,
(2) What words indicate that something is a particular color?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets &#39;n spesifieke kleur?
be red/green, be a red/reddish color, colored, tinted,|rooi / groen, &#39;n rooi / rooierige kleur, gekleurde, getint,
(3) What words describe something that is a dark color?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n donker kleur te beskryf?
dark, deep, rich,|donker, diep, ryk,
(4) What words describe something that is a light color?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n ligte kleur te beskryf?
light (adj), pale, pastel, faint, livid, lurid, pallid, pallor, pale-faced, neutral tint,|lig (adj), bleek, pastel, moeg, woedend, guur, bleek, bleek, bleek, neutrale kleur,
(5) What words describe something that is a bright color?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n helder kleur te beskryf?
bright, brightly colored, brilliant, pure, gaudy, garish, vivid, flashy, fresh, intense, strong, hot,|helder, helderkleurige, briljant, suiwer, bont, bont, helder, flashy, vars, intense, sterk, warm,
(6) What words describe something that is a dull color?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n dowwe kleur beskryf?
dull, faded, washed out, drab, dingy, flushed, clouded, grayish, somber,|vaal, vervaag, uitgespoel, vaal, goor, gespoel, vertroebel, grys, somber,
(7) What words describe something, such as a photograph, that has been made with color?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf iets soos &#39;n foto, wat gemaak is met die kleur?
color (photograph), in color,|kleur (foto), in kleur,
(8) What words describe something that has no color or is black and white?|(8) Watter woorde iets wat geen kleur het of swart en wit beskryf?
colorless, black and white, uncolored, monochrome, achromatic, ghostly, glassy, lackluster, undyed,|kleurlose, swart en wit, ongekleurd, monochroom, achromatiese, spookagtige, glasagtige, lustelose, undyed,
(9) What words refer to the intensity of a color?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die intensiteit van &#39;n kleur?
value, intensity, saturation,|waarde, intensiteit, volop,
(10) What words refer to pure or mixed colors?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na suiwer of gemengde kleure?
pure, mixed, tinge, primary color, secondary color, tertiary color,|suiwer, gemengde, skynsel, primêre kleur, sekondêre kleur, tersiêre kleur,
(11) What words describe colors that look good together?|(11) Watter woorde beskryf kleure wat saam goed lyk?
go together, go with, suit you, color scheme, complimentary,|gaan saam, gaan met, pas jy, kleurskema, komplimentêre,
(12) What words describe colors that do not look good together?|(12) Watter woorde beskryf kleure wat nie goed saam nie sien?
clash,|botsing,
(13) What words describe someone who cannot see color?|(13) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat nie kan sien nie kleur?
color-blind|kleurblind
(14) What words refer to a color or pattern of colors used by a group of people to identify themselves?|(14) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kleur of patroon van die kleure wat gebruik word deur &#39;n groep mense om hulself te identifiseer?
livery, tartan, team colors,|livrei, tartan, span die kleure,

Change color|Verander van kleur

(2) What words are used of something changing color?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik van iets van kleur verander?
change color, lose its color, blush, turn pale, pale, blanch,|verander kleur, sy kleur verloor, bloos, bleek, bleek, blansjeer,
(3) What words refer to dye being washed out of cloth?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na kleur uit lap gewas?
wash out, run,|was uit, hardloop,
(4) What words refer to the sun changing the color of something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die son die verandering van die kleur van iets?
fade, bleach,|vervaag, bleikmiddel,
(5) What words describe something whose color has changed?|(5) Watter woorde iets waarvan die kleur verander beskryf?
colored, discolored, bleached, dyed, faded, mantled, painted, shaded, stained, tinged, tinted,|bruin, verkleur, gebleik, gekleur, vaal, kleed, geverf, skadu, lood, gekleur, getint,
(6) What words refer to things used to change the color of something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na dinge wat gebruik word om die kleur van iets te verander?
paint (n), dye (n), bleach (n), food coloring, stain (n),|verf (n), verf (n), bleikmiddel (n), voedselkleursel, die dorp (n),
(7) What words describe a color that does not change?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n kleur wat nie verander nie?
fast,|vinnig,

Hot|Warm
Use this domain for words describing something that is hot.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat warm beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is hot?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat warm beskryf?
hot, heat, red hot, boiling, burning hot, molten, ardent, baking, blazing, brisk, broiling, burning, calorific, fervent, fervid, fevered, fiery, glowing, heat, hot, igneous, incandescent, reeking, scorching, sizzling, smoking, torrid, white-hot,|warm, hitte, rooi warm, kook, brandende warm, gesmelte, vurige, bak, brandende, lewendige, snik heet, brand, kalorie, vurige, gloeiend, koors, vurige, gloeiend, warm, stollings-, gloeilamp, reeking, versengende, warm, rook, brandende, wit-warm,
(2) What words describe food that is hot?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf voedsel wat warm?
hot, piping hot, scalding,|warm, kokend warm, kokend,
(3) What words describe something that is warm?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat warm beskryf?
be warm, lukewarm, tepid,|wees warm, lou, lou,
(4) What words describe a time or place that is hot?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd of plek wat warm?
hot, boiling, be a scorcher, sultry, sunny, sweltering, sweltry, tropical, heat wave,|warm, kook, &#39;n Scorcher, soel, sonnige, smoor, sweltry, tropiese, hitte golf,
(5) What words describe a time or place that is warm?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd of plek wat warm?
warm, the warmth, balmy, mild, temperate,|warm, die warmte, soel, ligte, gematigde,
(6) What words describe a time or place that is so hot that you are uncomfortable?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd of plek wat so warm dat jy ongemaklik is?
stifling, muggy, humid, oppressive,|versmorende, bedompige, klam, onderdrukkende,
(7) What words refer to feeling hot?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na warm voel?
hot, warm, boiling,|warm, warm, kook,
(8) What words refer to feeling hot because you are sick?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na warm gevoel omdat jy siek is?
have a temperature, feverish,|het &#39;n temperatuur, koorsig,
(9) What words refer to how hot something is?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na hoe warm iets?
temperature, heat, degree, Celsius, Centigrade, Fahrenheit, level of heat, warmth,|temperatuur, hitte, graad, Celsius, Celsius, Fahrenheit, vlak van hitte, warmte,
(10) What things do people use to measure how hot something is?|(10) Watter dinge doen mense gebruik om te meet hoe warm iets?
thermometer,|termometer,
(11) What words refer to something becoming hot?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak warm?
warm up, get hot, thaw, melt, temperature is rising,|opwarm, warm, ontdooi, smelt, is die temperatuur styg,
(12) What words refer to making something hot?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets warm?
heat something, warm something, thaw something, melt something, take the chill off, heat up, reheat, warm up,|hitte iets, warm iets ontdooi iets, smelt iets, neem die koue af, verhit, verhit, warm,
(13) What happens to things and people when they get hot?|(13) Wat gebeur met dinge en mense as dit warm?
boil, melt, burn, warp, sweat,|kook, smelt, brand, warp, sweet,
(14) What words describe clothes that make you feel warm?|(14) Watter woorde beskryf klere wat jou warm voel?
warm, thermal,|warm, warm,
(15) What things do people use to stay warm when it is cold?|(15) Watter dinge doen mense gebruik om warm te bly wanneer dit koud is?
fire, heater, furnace, central heating, radiator, hot-water bottle, electric blanket,|vuur, verwarmer, oond, sentrale verwarming, radiator, bottel warm water, elektriese kombers,
(16) What words describe something that is neither hot nor cold?|(16) Watter woorde iets wat nie warm of koud beskryf?
room temperature, ambient temperature,|kamertemperatuur, kamertemperatuur,
Cold|Koue
Use this domain for words describing something that is cold.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat koud beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is cold?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat koud beskryf?
cold, frozen, icy, glacial, hibernal, hiemal, hyperborean, marmoreal, unthawed,|koue, bevrore, ysige, glacial, hibernal, hiemal, die hoë noorde, as &#39;n beeld, unthawed,
(2) What words describe food that is cold?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf kos wat koud is?
cold, cool, chilled, ice-cold, stone-cold,|koue, koel, koel, yskoue, klip-koue,
(3) What words describe something that is cool?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat koel beskryf?
cool, crisp, refresh, unfrozen,|koel, helder, verfris, onbevrore,
(4) What words describe a time or place that is cold?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd of plek wat koud?
cold, the cold, frosty, wintry, cold spell, cold snap, frigid, bleak,|koue, die koue, ysige, winter, koue, koue snap, ysige, somber,
(5) What words describe a time or place that is cool?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd of plek wat koel?
cool, chilly, drafty, nippy, fresh, crisp, bracing, chill,|Modern, koue, drafty, ratse, vars, helder, verspanning, chill,
(6) What words describe a time or place that is very cold?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n tyd of plek wat baie koud is?
freezing, bitterly cold, arctic, subzero temperatures,|vries, bitter koud, Arktiese, subzero temperature,
(7) What words describe a wind that is cold?|(7) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n wind wat koud is?
freezing, bitter, biting, cutting, raw,|vries, bitter, byt, sny, rou,
(8) What words refer to feeling cold?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die gevoel koue?
be cold, feel cold, look cold, freezing, frozen, feel the cold,|koud, koud, kyk koue, ysige, bevrore, voel die koue,
(9) What words refer to feeling cold because you are sick?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na die gevoel koue omdat jy siek is?
get the chills, ague,|kry die kouekoors, koors,
(10) What words refer to how cold something is?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na hoe koud iets is?
temperature, coldness, coolness,|temperatuur, koue, koelte,
(11) What words refer to something becoming cold?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na iets raak koud?
get cold, turn cold, drop, fall, cool down, cool, cool off, freeze, lose heat|koud, draai koue, drop, val, af te koel, koel, koel af, vries, hitte verloor
(12) What words refer to making something cold?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van iets koud?
cool something, chill, refrigerate, freeze something,|koel iets chill, yskas, vries iets,
(13) What happens to things when they get cold?|(13) Wat gebeur met dinge wanneer hulle koud?
freeze, harden, brittle, frost-bound,|vries, verhard, bros, ryp-gebonde,
(14) What happens to people when they get cold?|(14) Wat gebeur met mense as hulle koud?
shiver, be blue with cold, goose pimples, goosebumps, gooseflesh, someone's teeth are chattering, frostbite, frostbitten, freeze to death, die of cold,|bewe, wees blou met koue, hoendervleis, hoendervleis, hoendervleis, tande iemand se trillings, bevroren, bevriezingen, vries tot die dood, doodgaan van koue,
(15) What words describe clothes that make you feel cool?|(15) Watter woorde beskryf klere wat jou koel voel?
cool,|Modern,
(16) What things do people use to stay cool when it is hot?|(16) Watter dinge doen mense gebruik om koel te bly wanneer dit warm is?
fan, cooler, air-conditioning, air-conditioner, air-conditioned, refrigeration,|fan, koeler, air-conditioning, lugversorger, lug-conditioning, verkoeling,
Type, kind|Tipe, soort
Use this domain for words related to something being a type of thing, or that something belongs to a class of things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets wat &#39;n tipe van ding, of dat iets behoort aan &#39;n klas van dinge.
(1) What words indicate that something belongs to a class of things?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets behoort aan &#39;n klas van dinge?
be, be a kind of, be a type of, be a member of, include|wees, word &#39;n soort van, &#39;n tipe, &#39;n lid van, sluit
(2) What words refer to the class to which something belongs?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die klas waarin iets behoort?
type, kind, class, group, variety,|tipe, soort, klas, groep, verskeidenheid,
(3) What words refer to a member of a class?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n lid van &#39;n klas?
kind (of), type (of), member (of), example (of), sort (of), such|kind (van), tipe (van), &#39;n lid (van), byvoorbeeld (van), sorteer (van), soos
(4) What words refer to assigning something to a class?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets toeken aan &#39;n klas?
classify (with, as), classification, class, assign to a class, categorize, grade, group, sort,|klassifiseer (met, as), klassifikasie, klas, toewys aan &#39;n klas, kategoriseer, graad, groep, sorteer,
Nature, character|Natuur, karakter
Use this domain for words related to the nature of character of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die aard van karakter van iets.
(1) What words refer to the nature or character of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die aard of karakter van iets?
nature, character, such|natuur, karakter, soos
Compare|Vergelyk
Use this domain for words related to comparing something or someone with another thing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets of iemand te vergelyk met &#39;n ander ding.
(1) What words refer to comparing one thing with another?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vergelyking een ding met &#39;n ander?
compare, comparison, contrast, than, comparable|vergelyk, vergelyking, kontras, as vergelykbaar
Same|Dieselfde
Use this domain for words describing something that is the same thing as you just mentioned, or describing two things that are exactly the same.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat dieselfde ding as jy net genoem het, of beskryf twee dinge wat presies dieselfde is beskryf.
(1) What words refer to the same person or thing, not a different one?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na dieselfde persoon of ding, nie &#39;n ander een?
the same, the very same, the self-same, one and the same, common,|dieselfde, dieselfde, die selfde, een en dieselfde, algemene,
(2) What words describe two things that are the same?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf twee dinge wat dieselfde is?
same, identical, indistinguishable, can't tell the difference, can't tell them apart, be no different from, match, be a carbon copy, word for word, be synonymous with, be no better than, be nothing more than,|dieselfde, identiese, ononderskeibaar, kan die verskil vertel nie, kan hulle nie uit mekaar te vertel, wees nie anders, wedstryd, &#39;n afskrif, woord vir woord, wees sinoniem met, geen beter as, wees niks meer as,
(3) What words indicate that two numbers or amounts are the same?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat twee getalle of bedrae is dieselfde?
the same, equal, equivalent, even, level,|dieselfde, gelyke, ekwivalent, selfs, vlak,
(4) What words describe someone or something that is the same as before?|(4) Watter woorde iets of iemand wat dieselfde as voorheen beskryf?
be the same, unchanged, hasn't changed a bit, hasn't changed at all, unaffected,|word dieselfde, onveranderd, het nie verander nie &#39;n bietjie, het glad nie verander het, onaangeraak,
(5) What words describe someone or something that never changes?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat nooit verander of iemand beskryf?
the same, consistent, unchanging, constant,|dieselfde, konsekwent, onveranderlike, konstante,
(6) What words describe something that is the same in all its parts?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat dieselfde in al sy dele beskryf?
uniform, homogeneous,|uniform, homogene,
(7) What words refer to making all the things in a group the same?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van al die dinge wat in &#39;n groep dieselfde?
standardize, bring something into line,|standaardiseer, bring iets in lyn,
(8) What words indicate that two things that people said are the same?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat twee dinge wat mense sê dieselfde is?
correspond, be consistent with, agree, tally, coincide, match up,|ooreenstem wees in ooreenstemming met, stem saam, kerfstok, saamval, ooreenstem,
(9) What words indicate that something in one group is the same in some way as something in another group?|(9) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets in een groep is dieselfde in een of ander manier as iets in &#39;n ander groep?
corresponding, equivalent, counterpart, opposite number,|ooreenstemmende, ekwivalent, eweknie, eweknie,
(10) What words refer to thinking the same as someone else?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na te dink dieselfde as iemand anders?
like-minded, be on the same wavelength, be in tune with, be in harmony,|eensgesinde, op dieselfde golflengte, in harmonie met, in harmonie,
(11) What words indicate that a part of one thing is the same as part of something else?|(11) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n deel van een ding is dieselfde as deel van iets anders?
overlap,|oorvleuel,
(12) What words indicate that two things are the same in some way?|(12) Watter woorde aan te dui dat twee dinge is dieselfde in een of ander manier?
equally, of equal, equal in, just as, as...as, every bit as, even, evenly,|ewe, van gelyke, gelyk in, net soos, as ... as, elke bietjie as selfs, eweredig,
(13) What words refer to saying that two things are the same in some way?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na sê dat twee dinge is dieselfde in een of ander manier?
equate,|gelyk,
Like, similar|Soos soortgelyke
Use this domain for words describing two things or people that are similar, but not the same.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf twee dinge of mense wat soortgelyk is, maar nie dieselfde nie.
(1) What words describe two things that are similar?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf twee dinge wat dieselfde is?
like, similar, alike, much the same, comparable, parallel,|soos, soortgelyk, gelyk, baie dieselfde, vergelykbaar, parallel,
(2) What words refer to something being like another thing?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets om soos &#39;n ander ding?
resemble, bear a resemblance to, akin to, have an affinity with, the same sort of,|lyk, dra &#39;n ooreenkoms met, soortgelyk aan, het &#39;n affiniteit met die dieselfde soort van,
(3) What words describe two things that are very similar?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf twee dinge wat baie soortgelyk?
be two of a kind, have a lot in common, tantamount,|twee van &#39;n soort, het &#39;n baie in gemeen het, neerkom,
(4) What words describe two things that are a little similar?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf twee dinge wat &#39;n bietjie soortgelyk?
kind of like, vaguely resemble|soort van soos, vaagweg lyk
(5) What words indicate that something happens or is done in a similar way?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur of gedoen word in &#39;n soortgelyke manier?
similarly, like, such as, as,|Net so, soos, soos as,
(6) What words refer to something being like another thing in some way?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iets om soos &#39;n ander ding in een of ander manier?
have something in common, share something, correspond,|het iets in gemeen, deel iets ooreenstem,
(7) What words refer to something looking like another thing?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na iets wat lyk soos &#39;n ander ding?
look like, resemble, the image of,|lyk, lyk, die beeld van,
(8) What words refer to something looking very much like another thing?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat baie soos &#39;n ander ding?
be just like, look just like, be the image of, be the spitting image of, be the living image of, could pass for, could be mistaken for, be a dead ringer for, be the picture of,|word net soos, kyk net wil, is die beeld van, wees ewebeeld, wees die lewende beeld van kon slaag om, verwar kan wees, word &#39;n dooie klokke vir, wees die beeld van,
(9) What words refer to someone who looks like another person?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat lyk soos &#39;n ander persoon?
look-alike, double,|look-alike, dubbel,
(10) What words refer to being like your mother or father?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na om soos jou ma of pa?
be like, take after, be a chip off the old block,|wees, nadat, word &#39;n chip uit die ou blok,
(11) What words indicate that someone or something makes you think of another person or thing because they are similar?|(11) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets of iemand laat dink aan &#39;n ander persoon of ding, want hulle is soortgelyk?
remind someone of, be reminiscent of, echo,|herinner iemand van, wees wat herinner aan, eggo,
(12) What words refer to the quality of being similar?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die soortgelyke?
similarity, likeness, resemblance,|ooreenkoms, gelykenis, gelykenis,
(13) What words refer to the way in which two things are similar?|(13) Watter woorde verwys na die manier waarop twee dinge is soortgelyk?
similarity, parallel,|ooreenkoms, parallel,
Different|Verskillende

(1) What words describe two things that are different?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf twee dinge wat verskillend is?

Other|Ander

Strong, brittle|Sterk, bros

Hard, firm|Hard, ferm
