Better|Beter
Use this domain for words describing something that is better than something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat beter is as iets anders beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is better than something else?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat beter is as iets anders te beskryf?
better, best, surpass, superior|beter, beste, oortref, &#39;n beter
Worse|Erger
Use this domain for words describing something that is worse than something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat erger is as iets anders beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is worse than something else?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat erger is as iets anders te beskryf?
worse, lesser, inferior|erger, mindere,
(2) What words refer to something getting worse in condition?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets erger in toestand?
degenerate, deteriorate|ontaard, versleg
Perfect|Perfect
Use this domain for words describing something that is perfect.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat perfek beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is perfect?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat perfek beskryf?
perfect, flawless|volmaak foutloos
(2) What words describe something that is not perfect?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat nie is perfek beskryf?
imperfect, flawed|onvolmaakte, gebrekkige
Mediocre|Middelmatige
Use this domain for words describing something that is mediocre.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat middelmatige beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is neither good nor bad?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat nie goed of sleg beskryf?
mediocre, average, undistinguished|middelmatig, gemiddelde, deur niks
Important|Belangrik
Use this domain for words describing something that is important.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat belangrik is beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is important?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat belangrik is te beskryf?
important, main (thing), grand, great, urgent, worthy|belangrik, hoof (ding), grand, groot, dringende, waardig
Basic|Basiese
Use this domain for words describing something that is basic.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat basiese beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is basic?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat basiese beskryf?
basic, fundamental, essential, central|basiese, fundamentele, noodsaaklik, sentrale
Improve|Verbeter
Use this domain for words related to improving something--to make something better.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die verbetering van iets - iets beter te maak.
(1) What words refer to improving something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verbetering van iets?
improve, improvement, ameliorate, correct, develop, reform, remedy, renovate, renovation, upgrade,|verbeter, verbetering, versag, korrek, te ontwikkel, hervorming, middel, knap, opknap, op te gradeer,
(2) What words describe something that has been improved?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat verbeter beskryf?
improved, corrected,|verbeter, reggemaak word,
Right, proper|Right, behoorlike
Use this domain for words describing something, such as a tool or way of doing something, that is proper for a particular time, place, purpose, or job. The words in this domain involve a comparison between two things, an item and a setting. An evaluation is made as to how good the item is in the setting. The words may be used only of certain types of items, certain types of settings, or certain types of usefulness.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets beskryf, soos &#39;n instrument of manier om iets te doen, dit is goed vir &#39;n sekere tyd, plek, doel, of werk. Die woorde in hierdie domein behels &#39;n vergelyking tussen twee dinge, &#39;n item en &#39;n omgewing. &#39;N evaluering gemaak oor hoe goed die item in die omgewing. Die woorde mag slegs gebruik word van sekere items, sekere tipes instellings, of sekere vorme van nut.
(1) What words describe something that is proper?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat behoorlike beskryf?
right, proper, applicable, apposite, apropos, becoming, befitting, correspond, correspondent, corresponding, decent, due, expected, felicitous, germane, meet, opportune, pertinent, pleasing, principled, properly, right-minded, rightful, smart, suitable, suited, timely, well, well-timed,|reg, behoorlike toepassing, passend, a propos, wat oorslaan, betaamlik is, ooreenstem, korrespondent, wat ooreenstem, ordentlike, as gevolg, verwag, gelukkige, related, ontmoet, sinvol, pertinent, aangenaam, beginselvaste, behoorlik, regdenkende, regmatige, smart, geskik, geskik, tydige, goed, goed snel,
(2) What words describe something that is right for a particular job?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat reg is vir &#39;n spesifieke werk te beskryf?
right, proper, accepted, approved, appropriate, correct,|reg, behoorlike, aanvaar word, goedgekeur is, gepas, korrek is,
(3) What words refer to something being right for a particular job?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat reg vir &#39;n spesifieke werk?
suit, lends itself to, be suited to, be cut out for, be made for, fit the bill, fit in, be right for, be the right person for, make a good/ideal,|pak, leen hom tot, geskik wees vir, word uit te sny vir, gemaak word vir, pas die wetsontwerp, pas, reg vir, wees die regte persoon vir, maak &#39;n goeie / ideale,
(4) What words refer to something someone does that is right for a particular situation?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iets of iemand nie wat reg is vir &#39;n bepaalde situasie?
right, proper, acceptable, appropriate, apt, correct, fitting, suitable, be the done thing, be the way it's done, in keeping with,|reg, behoorlike, aanvaarbare, toepaslike, bekwaam, korrek, gepas, geskik, is die ding gedoen, is die manier waarop dit gedoen is, in ooreenstemming met,
(5) What words refer to doing something in the right way?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iets te doen op die regte manier?
right, properly, correctly, by the book,|reg, behoorlik, korrek, volgens die boek,
(6) What words refer to the quality of being proper?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die behoorlike?
suitability, suitableness, fit (n),|geskiktheid, suitableness, fiks (n),
Wrong, unsuitable|Verkeerd is, ongeskik
Use this domain for words describing something, such as a tool or way of doing something, that is unsuitable for a particular time, place, purpose, or job.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets beskryf, soos &#39;n instrument of manier om iets te doen, dit is nie geskik vir &#39;n spesifieke tyd, plek, doel, of werk.
(1) What words describe something that is unsuitable?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat ongeskik beskryf?
improper, ill-suited, ill-timed, inadmissible, inapt, incongruous, incorrect, indecent, indelicate, malapropos, presumptuous, unacceptable, unapt, unbecoming, unbefitting, undue, unfit, unfitting, unsuited to, untimely, untoward,|onbehoorlike, onvanpas, swak tydgebonde, ontoelaatbaar, onbekwaam, onvanpas, verkeerd, onsedelike, onkies, inopportuun, aanmatigend, onaanvaarbaar, ongeschikt, onbetaamlike, onvanpas, onbehoorlike, ongeskik, onvanpas, nie geskik vir die, ontydige, verkeerde,
(2) What words refer to something being unsuitable for a particular purpose or situation?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets om ongeskik vir &#39;n spesifieke doel of situasie?
wrong, unsuitable, not suitable, unsuited to, not suited to, inappropriate, not appropriate, hardly the time/place/person,|verkeerd is, ongeskik, nie geskik, geskik om, nie geskik vir, onvanpas, nie van toepassing, skaars die tyd / plek / persoon,
(3) What words refer to someone being unsuitable for a job?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat nie geskik is vir &#39;n werk?
unsuitable, not suitable, not be cut out for, wrong, ill-suited to, not suited to,|ongeskik, nie geskik nie, nie uit te sny vir, verkeerd is, nie geskik om, nie geskik om,
(4) What words refer to something being unsuitable because it isn't good enough?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets om ongeskik, want dit is nie goed genoeg nie?
unfit, not fit,|ongeskik, pas nie,
(5) What words refer to something being unsuitable for a particular place?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets om ongeskik vir &#39;n spesifieke plek?
be out of place, be out of keeping, not be in keeping, incongruous,|word uit plek wees uit die behoud, nie in te hou, onvanpas,
(6) What words refer to someone being unsuitable for a particular place?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na iemand wat nie geskik is vir &#39;n spesifieke plek?
be out of place, misfit,|uit plek, verarmde,
Convenient|Gerieflike
Use this domain for words describing something that is convenient--a good time to do something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat gerieflik beskryf - &#39;n goeie tyd om iets te doen.
(1) What words describe something that is convenient?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat gerieflik beskryf?
convenient, handy, suit, fit in with, be good for, a good time, no trouble, no problem|gerieflike, handig, pak, in pas met, wees goed vir &#39;n goeie tyd, geen probleme, geen probleem
(2) What words describe something that is not convenient?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat nie maklik beskryf?
inconvenient, not convenient, be bad for, a bad time|ongerieflik, nie gerieflik wees sleg vir &#39;n slegte tyd
Compatible|Versoenbaar
Use this domain for words related to being compatible--words that describe two things or people that can be together or work together without problems or conflict.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met verenigbaar - woorde wat twee dinge of mense wat saam kan wees of saam te werk sonder probleme of konflik te beskryf.
(1) What words describe things that are compatible?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf dinge wat versoenbaar is?
compatible, congruent, congruous, consistent, consonant, suitable, proper, fitting, presentable|versoenbaar, kongruent, congruous, konsekwent, konsonant, geskik, behoorlike, toebehore, aanbieding
(2) What words refer to things being compatible?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na dinge versoenbaar?
accord, agree, clash, cohere, complement, comport, dovetail, go together, go with, harmonize, jibe, rhyme, square|beweging, stem, botsing, saamhang, vul, Comport, swaelstert, gaan saam, gaan met, harmoniseer, gijpen, rym, vierkante
(3) What words describe people that are compatible?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf mense wat versoenbaar is?
compatible,|versoenbaar,
(4) What words refer to people being compatible?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na mense wat versoenbaar?
work well together, be well-suited, be well-matched, be made for each other, be a perfect match, be a perfect pair, be ideally suited, be right for,|werk goed saam, wees goed geskik, word goed ooreenstem, word vir mekaar, &#39;n perfekte match, &#39;n perfekte paar, wees ideaal, reg vir,
(5) What words refer to the quality of being compatible?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die gehalte van verenigbaar?
compatibility, harmony,|verenigbaarheid, harmonie,
(6) What words describe things or people that are incompatible?|(6) Watter woorde beskryf dinge of mense wat in stryd is?
incompatible, ill-matched,|onversoenbare, swak ooreenstem,
(7) What words refer to people being incompatible?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na mense wat in stryd is?
not be suited, be wrong for, not be right for, not be someone's type,|nie geskik wees verkeerd, nie reg wees vir iemand se tipe nie,
(8) What words refer to the quality of being incompatible?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na die kwaliteit van die stryd?
incompatibility,|onverenigbaarheid,
Decay|Verval
Use this domain for words related to something decaying--when a living thing dies and becomes bad, or when a part of a living thing becomes bad.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met iets vervalle - wanneer &#39;n lewende ding sterf en word sleg, of wanneer &#39;n deel van &#39;n lewende ding raak sleg.
(1) What words refer to something decaying?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets vervalle?
decay, rot, decompose, perish, fester, mildew, molder, putrefy,|verval, verrotting, ontbind, vergaan, sweer, heuningdou, gieter, verrot,
(2) What words describe something that is decaying?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat verrottende beskryf?
rotten, decayed, moldy, mildewed, putrid, rotted, carious,|vrot, verval, muwwe, mildewed, voos, verrotte, karieuse,
(3) What words refer to food decaying?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na kos vervalle?
go bad, go off, go stale, go sour, spoil, taint,|gaan sleg, afgaan, gaan verjaar, gaan suur, bederf, bederf,
(4) What words describe food that is decaying?|(4) Watter woorde kos beskryf wat verval?
rotten, bad, stale, moldy, sour, rancid, off, tainted,|vrot, sleg, verjaar, muwwe, suur, galsterige, off, besmet,
(5) What words refer to making something decay?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die maak van iets verval?
rot,|verrotting,
(6) What words refer to the process of decay?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van verval?
decay (n), corruption, decomposition, putrefaction,|verval (n), korrupsie, ontbinding, verrotting,
(7) What words refer to a place on something where it is decaying?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n plek op iets waar dit verval?
decay (n), rot (n), canker, caries, carrion, dry rot,|verval (n), vrot (n), kanker, karies, aas, verrotting,
(8) What words refer to something being eaten by insects?|(8) Watter woorde verwys na iets geëet word deur insekte?
eaten by insects, infested with termites, moth-eaten|geëet deur insekte, besmet met termiete, mot-geëet
Rust|Rust
Use this domain for words related to metal rusting--when metal becomes bad.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met metaal roes - wanneer metaal word sleg.
(1) What words refer to metal rusting?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die metaal roes?
rust, corrode, oxidize, tarnish, rust away,|roes, roes, oksideer, ontluistering, roes weg,
(2) What words describe metal that has rusted?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf metaal wat geroes?
rusty, corroded, tarnished, rusted, eaten away, eaten through,|rusty, verweerde, verkleur, geroes, weg geëet geëet deur,
(3) What words refer to making metal rust?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die maak van metaal roes?
corrode, eat away, eat through,|korrodeer, eet weg, eet deur,
(4) What words refer to the process of rusting?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die proses van roes?
corrosion, oxidation,|roes, oksidasie,
(5) What words refer to rust?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na roes?
rust, tarnish,|roes, ontluistering,
(6) What words describe something that makes metal rust?|(6) Watter woorde iets wat metaal roes maak beskryf?
corrosive,|bytende,
Blemish|Gebrek
Use this domain for words related to a blemish--something small and bad on the skin of a person or the surface of something, but not something serious, especially something wrong that does not affect how something works.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n gebrek - iets klein en sleg op die vel van &#39;n persoon of die oppervlak van iets, maar nie iets ernstig, veral iets verkeerd wat nie invloed op hoe iets werk.
(1) What words refer to a blemish in something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebrek aan iets?
blemish,  blot, dapple, excrescence, freckle, mole, pimple, speck, speckle, small fault,|gebrek klad, spikkel, uitwas, sproet, mol, puisie, spikkel, spikkel, klein fout,
(2) What words describe something that has a blemish on it?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n gebrek het op dit te beskryf?
blemished, defaced, marred,|gevlekte, ontsier, beskadig,
Garbage|Vullis
Use this domain for words related to garbage--something that is no longer wanted.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met vullis - iets wat nie meer wou hê.
(1) What words refer to garbage?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die vullis?
garbage, rubbish, trash, litter, refuse, junk, waste, wastepaper, scrap,|vullis, rommel, vullis, rommel, vullis, rommel, afval, misdruk, afval,
(2) What do people do to garbage?|(2) Wat doen mense om vullis?
take out, throw away, discard, burn, chuck, dispose of, disposal, haul away, bury, dump, litter, pile up, collect|uit, weggooi, gooi, brand, chuck, raak ontslae van, beskikking, weg te sleep, te begrawe, stort, rommel, stapel, versamel
(3) What words refer to a container where people put garbage?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n houer waar mense sit vullis?
garbage can, trashcan, waste-basket, wastepaper basket, bin, dustbin, wastebin, garbage bag,|vullis kan, vullisblik, afval-mandjie, snippermandjie, bin, vullisdrom, wastebin, vullis sak,
(4) What words refer to a place where people put garbage?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek waar mense sit vullis?
garbage pit, rubbish heap, garbage dump, rubbish tip, compost pile, incinerator,|vullis put vullishoop, vullishoop, rommel tip, kompos hoop, verbrandingsoond,
(5) What words refer to a person who removes garbage?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat vullis verwyder?
garbage man, dustman|vullis man, dustman
(6) What words refer to a vehicle used to remove garbage?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n voertuig wat gebruik word om die vullis te verwyder?
garbage truck, dustcart,|vullis vragmotor, dustcart,
(7) What words refer to a person who leaves garbage in a public place?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat vullis blare in &#39;n openbare plek?
litterbug,|Gemorsjors,
(8) What words describe something made to be used once and then thrown away?|(8) Watter woorde beskryf iets gemaak om een ​​keer gebruik word en dan weggegooi?
disposable,|besteebare,
(9) What words refer to bad things that people allow to go into water or air?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na slegte dinge wat mense laat in water of in die lug om te gaan?
pollution, pollute, pollutant, smog, acid rain|besoedeling, besoedel, besoedelende, rookmis, suurreën
Preserve|Bewaar
Use this domain for words related to preserving the condition of something from decay.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die behoud van die toestand van iets van verval.
(1) What words refer to preserving something from decay?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die behoud van iets van verval?
preserve, put up, treat, conserve, maintain, keep up, sustain, take care of,|bewaar, sit, te behandel, te bewaar, te behou, hou, volhou, sorg,
(2) What words refer to a method of preserving something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n metode van die behoud van iets?
bottle, can, cure, dry, embalm, freeze, mummify, pickle, refrigerate, salt, smoke, tan,|bottel, kan, genesing, droë, balsem, vries, mummificeren, piekel, yskas, sout, rook, bruin,
(3) What words describe something that has been preserved?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat bewaar beskryf?
preserved, well-preserved, unspoiled,|bewaar, goed bewaar, ongerepte,
(4) What words refer to something continuing to be in a good condition?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets voort te wees in &#39;n goeie toestand?
stay fresh, keep well, retain its flavor/appearance,|bly vars, goed te hou, behou sy geur / voorkoms,
(5) What words refer to something used to preserve something?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word om iets te bewaar?
preservative, salt, formaldehyde, embalming fluid, canning jar,|preserveermiddel, sout, formaldehied, balseming vloeistof, inmaak jar,
(6) What words refer to the process of preserving something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die proses van die behoud van iets?
preservation, embalming, mummification,|bewaring, balseming, mummifikasie,
Value|Waarde
Use this domain for words related to the value of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die waarde van iets.
(1) What words refer to the value of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die waarde van iets?
value, price, worth|waarde, prys, ter waarde van
(2) What words refer to evaluating the value of something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die evaluering van die waarde van iets?
evaluate, evaluation, value (v),|evalueer, evaluering, waarde (v),
(3) What words describe something that is valued as good?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat gewaardeer as goeie beskryf?
good, valuable, worthy, advantageous, important, useful, dear|goed, waardevol, waardig, voordelig, belangrik, nuttig, liewe
(4) What words describe something that is valued as bad?|(4) Watter woorde iets wat gewaardeer as slegte beskryf?
bad, worthless, unworthy, unimportant, useless|sleg, waardeloos, onwaardig, onbelangrik, nutteloos
(5) What words refer to increasing the value of something?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die verhoging van die waarde van iets?
increase in value, inflate, inflation, appreciate|in waarde toeneem, verhoog, inflasie, waardeer
(6) What words refer to decreasing the value of something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na die vermindering van die waarde van iets?
decrease in value, debase, degrade, deflate, deflation, depreciate|afname in waarde, verneder, verneder, blaas, deflasie, verswak
Decorated|Versier
Use this domain for words describing something that is decorated.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat versier beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is decorated?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat versier beskryf?
decorated, adorned, bedecked, bejewelled, decked, embellished, festooned, hung, ornamented, studded,|versier, versier, oortrek, Bejeweled, versier, versier, festooned, hang, versier, gesaai,
(2) What words refer to decorating something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na versier iets?
decorate, adorn, bedeck, deck, embellish, festoon, ornament, gild,|versier, versier, tooien, dek, versier, slinger, ornament, vergulde,
(3) What words refer to something used to decorate something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat gebruik word om iets te versier?
decoration, adornment, embellishment, ornament,|versiering, versiering, versiering, ornament,
Simple, plain|Eenvoudige, plain
Use this domain for words describing something that is simple or plain.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat eenvoudig of plain beskryf.
(1) What words describe something that is simple and does not have a lot of decorations?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat is eenvoudig en het nie &#39;n baie versierings te beskryf?
simple, plain, bare|eenvoudige, plain, kaal
Glory|Heerlikheid
Use this domain for words describing the appearance of something that has pleasing aspects or inspires awe and wonder in the viewer. For instance, the palace of a king, the home of a rich man, or a temple may be elaborately decorated and be described as glorious or magnificent. Or something in nature such as a sunset or flower may inspire awe and wonder.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde beskryf die voorkoms van iets wat aangenaam aspekte het of inspireer ontsag en wonder in die kyker. Byvoorbeeld, kan die paleis van die koning, die tuiste van &#39;n ryk man, of &#39;n tempel fraai versier en word beskryf as heerlike of pragtige. Of iets in die natuur soos &#39;n sonsondergang of blom mag verwondering inspireer.
(1) What words describe something that is pleasing and awe inspiring in appearance?|(1) Watter woorde iets wat aangenaam en ontsagwekkende in voorkoms beskryf?
glory, glorious, magnificent, splendor, resplendent, awe inspiring, wonderful, grand, great|heerlikheid, heerlike, wonderlike, prag, pompeus, ontsagwekkende, wonderlike, groot, groot
Time|Tyd
Use this domain for general words related to time, and for words indicating the temporal location of an event.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde in verband met tyd, en vir woorde wat die tydelike plek van &#39;n gebeurtenis.
(1) What general words refer to time?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die tyd?
time, temporal|tyd, tydelike
(2) What words indicate that something is happening at some time?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gebeur op &#39;n sekere tyd?
when, upon, thereupon, then, at, be at, be on, -'s, time|toe op, daarop, dan, op, wees op, wees op, &amp; &#39;s, tyd
Period of time|Tydperk van die tyd
Use this domain for words referring to a period of time.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n tydperk van die tyd.
(1) What general words refer to a period of time?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n tydperk van die tyd?
period, span, while, length of time,|tydperk, span, terwyl, die lengte van die tyd,
(2) What words refer to a period of time?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tydperk van die tyd?
instant, second, minute, hour, hourly, day, week, fortnight, month, season, year, decade, century, turn of the century, lifetime, millennium|oomblik, sekonde, minuut, uur, elke uur, dag, week, twee weke, maand, seisoen, jaar, dekade, eeu draai van die eeu, leeftyd, millennium
(3) What words refer to a point in time?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n punt in die tyd?
point, moment,|punt, oomblik,
Calendar|Kalender
Use this domain for words related to the calendar.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die kalender.
(1) What words are used for printed displays of the year?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik vir gedrukte vertonings van die jaar?
calendar, pocket calendar, wall calendar, daily planner, schedule|kalender, sak kalender, muur kalender, daaglikse beplanner, skedule
(2) What words are used to refer to a particular day?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na &#39;n spesifieke dag?
date, January 1, 2000, 1-1-00, the first of January 2000|datum, 1 Januarie, 2000, 1-1-00, die eerste van Januarie 2000
(3) What words are used of the system of numbering the years?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik van die stelsel van numering van die jaar?
calendar, Gregorian calendar, Julian calendar, BC (before Christ), AD (ad Domino), Christian era|kalender, Gregoriaanse kalender, Julian kalender, BC (voor Christus), AD (ad Domino), Christian era
Day|Dag
Use this domain for words referring to a day.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n dag.
(1) What words refer to a day?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dag?
day, whole day, day and night, a day and a night, 24 hour day, 'morning, noon and night'|dag, die hele dag, dag en nag, &#39;n dag en &#39;n nag, 24 uur dag, &#39;oggend, middag en aand&#39;
(2) What words are used to indicate that something happens every day?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur elke dag?
daily, every day, each day|daagliks, elke dag, elke dag
(3) What words refer to an indefinite day?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n onbepaalde dag?
someday, one day, a certain day, the other day, some day in the future, one day long ago|eendag, een dag, &#39;n sekere dag, die ander dag, &#39;n dag in die toekoms, &#39;n dag lank gelede
(4) What words indicate that something happens during the whole day?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedurende die hele dag gebeur?
all day long, the whole day long, the whole day through,|die hele dag lank, die hele dag lank, die hele dag deur,
(5) What words are used for the period of time when the sun is shining?|(5) Watter woorde word gebruik vir die tydperk van die tyd wanneer die son skyn?
day (as opposed to night), during the day, daytime, daylight, daylight hours|dag (in teenstelling met die nag), gedurende die dag, die dag, daglig, daglig ure
Night|Nag
Use this domain for words referring to night.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die nag.
(1) What words refer to night?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die nag?
night, nighttime,|nag, nag,
(2) What words refer to this night?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na hierdie nag?
tonight, this night,|vanaand, in hierdie nag,
(3) What words refer to the night before this one?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die aand voor hierdie een?
last night,|gisteraand,
(4) What words refer to two nights ago?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na twee nagte gelede?
two nights ago, the night before last,|twee nagte gelede het die aand voor die laaste,
(5) What words refer to the night after this one?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die nag na hierdie een?
tomorrow night,|môreaand,
(6) What words indicate that something happens during the night?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets in die nag gebeur?
at night, during the night, in the night, by night,|in die nag, in die nag, in die nag, die nag,
(7) What words are used to indicate that something happens every night?|(7) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur elke nag?
nightly, every night, each night,|nag, elke aand, elke nag,
(8) What words indicate that something happens during the whole night?|(8) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedurende die hele nag gebeur?
all night long, the whole night long,|die hele nag lank, die hele nag lank
Yesterday, today, tomorrow|Gister, vandag, môre
Use this domain for words referring to days relative to each other.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na dae relatief tot mekaar.
(1) What words refer to one day in relation to the days before and after it?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n dag in verhouding tot die dae voor en na dit?
today, yesterday, the day before yesterday, three days ago, tomorrow, the day after tomorrow, three days from now, the day before, the day after|vandag, gister, die dag voor gister, drie dae gelede, môre, die dag na môre, drie dae van nou af, die dag voor die dag na
Time of the day|Tyd van die dag
Use this domain for words referring to a time of the day.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd van die dag.
(1) What words refer to a time of the day?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n tyd van die dag?
time, hour, watch,|tyd, uur, kyk,
(2) What words refer to dawn?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na dagbreek?
dawn, sunrise, daybreak, aurora, cockcrow, dawning, sunup,|dagbreek, sonsopkoms, dagbreek, Aurora, Hanekraai, dagbreek, sonop,
(3) What words refer to the time between dawn and noon?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd tussen dagbreek en die middag?
morning, midmorning, am, antemeridian, ante meridiem, forenoon, matins, morn, early morning|oggend, Jahn, uur, teenmeridiaan, ante middags, voormiddag, Metten, môre, vroeg in die oggend
(4) What words refer to noon?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die middag?
noon, midday, meridian, midpoint, noonday, noontide, noontime,|middag, middag, meridiaan, middelpunt, middag, bloei, middag,
(5) What words refer to the time between noon and sunset?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd tussen die middag en sonsondergang?
afternoon, mid afternoon, pm, postmeridian, post meridiem,|middag, mid middag pm, postmeridian, S middags,
(6) What words refer to sunset?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na sononder?
sunset, sundown, twilight, dusk, nightfall, it gets dark, gloaming,|sononder, sononder, skemerword, aand, raak dit donker, somber,
(7) What words refer to the time between sunset and when you go to sleep?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die tydperk tussen sonsondergang en wanneer jy gaan slaap?
evening, early evening, late in the evening, tonight, eventide, vesper, late night,|aand, vroeg aand, laat in die aand, vanaand, aand, vesper, laat nag,
(8) What words refer to the time when you go to sleep?|(8) Wat woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer jy gaan slaap?
bedtime, time to go to sleep,|slaaptyd, tyd om te gaan slaap,
(9) What words refer to midnight?|(9) Watter woorde verwys na middernag?
midnight, the middle of the night, pumpkin hour|middernag die middel van die nag, pampoen uur
(10) What words refer to the time between midnight and dawn?|(10) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd tussen middernag en dagbreek?
late at night, the early hours of the morning (2-4), the small hours, the wee hours of the morning, the first watch, the second watch|laat in die nag, die vroeë ure van die oggend (2-4), die klein ure van die vroeë ure van die oggend, die eerste horlosie, die tweede horlosie
(11) What words refer to the time just before dawn?|(11) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd net voor dagbreek?
just before dawn, hours before dawn, predawn hours, it gets light, foredawn,|net voor dagbreek, ure voor dagbreek, vroeë oggendure, raak dit lig, foredawn,
(12) What words refer to the time when you wake up?|(12) Watter woorde verwys na die tyd wanneer jy wakker word?
time to get up,|tyd om op te staan,
Week|Week
Use this domain for words related to a week.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n week.
(1) What words refer to a week?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n week?
week, this week, last week, next week, the weeks to come|week, hierdie week, het verlede week, volgende week, die komende weke
(2) What words are used to indicate that something happens every week?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat daar iets gebeur elke week?
weekly, every week, each week|weekliks, elke week, elke week
Days of the week|Dae van die week
Use this domain for words referring to the days of the week.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die dae van die week.
(1) What are the names of the days of the week?|(1) Wat is die name van die dae van die week?
Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday|Sondag, Maandag, Dinsdag, Woensdag, Donderdag, Vrydag, Saterdag
(2) What other terms are used for the days of the week?|(2) Watter ander terme word gebruik vir die dae van die week?
first day of the week (Sunday), second day of the week (Monday), midweek (Wednesday), Sabbath (Saturday), the Lord's day (Sunday)|eerste dag van die week (Sondag), tweede dag van die week (Maandag), midweek (Woensdag), Sabbat (Saterdag), die Here se dag (Sondag)
(3) What words are used to refer to all the days of the week together?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na al die dae van die week saam?
days of the week|dae van die week
Month|Maand

full moon, half moon, new moon,|volmaan, halfmaan, nuwe maan,
