(2) What words are used to indicate the speed of something?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik om die spoed van iets aan te dui?
Quick|Quick
Use this domain for words referring to doing something at a quick speed or something happening quickly.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets doen teen &#39;n vinnige spoed of iets vinnig gebeur.
(1) What words describe an action that is done quickly?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n aksie wat vinnig gedoen?
fast, quick, quickly, quickness, speedy, speeding, speedily, speed, hasty, hastily, haste, rapid, rapidly, rapidity, hurry, hurried, hurriedly, in a hurry, swift, swiftly, swiftness, rush, rush into, rush through, in a rush, express|vinnig, vinnig, vinnig, spoed, vinnige, spoed, vinnig, spoed, haastige, haastig, haastig, vinnige, vinnig, spoed, maak gou, haastig, haastig, haastig, vinnige, vinnig, horings, jaag, jaag in, jaag deur, in &#39;n stormloop, spreek
(2) What words describe an action that is done extremely quickly?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n aksie wat baie vinnig gedoen word?
at light speed, faster than a speeding bullet, just a blur|op die spoed van lig, vinniger as &#39;n spoed bullet, net &#39;n vervaag
(3) What words describe something that happens quickly?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat vinnig gebeur beskryf?
happen so fast, in the twinkling of an eye, came and went so quickly, it was all over in a minute|gebeur so vinnig, in die &#39;n oogwink, het gekom en gegaan so vinnig, dit was alles oor in &#39;n minuut
(4) What words refer to doing something quickly?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets vinnig doen?
to speed, move fast, hurry, hasten, be brief|spoed, beweeg vinnig, gou, gou, wees kort
(5) What words refer to causing someone to do something quickly?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat iets vinnig te doen?
hurry (someone), rush (someone)|haas (iemand), jaag (iemand)
(6) What do you say to someone when you want him to hurry?|(6) Wat sê jy vir iemand wanneer jy wil hom om gou?
Hurry up! Move it! Let's go, let's go! Quick! Faster! Speed it up! Get a move on! Giddy up! (horse)|Hurry up! Beweeg dit! Kom ons gaan, laat ons gaan! Vinnige! Vinniger! Spoed it up! Kry &#39;n skuif op! Giddy up! (Perd)
Slow|Slow
Use this domain for words referring to doing something at a slow speed.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na iets doen teen &#39;n stadige spoed.
(1) What words describe an action that is done slowly?|(1) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n aksie wat stadig gedoen word?
slow, slowly, leisurely|stadig, stadig, rustig
(2) What words describe an action that is done extremely slowly?|(2) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n aksie wat uiters stadig gedoen word?
excruciatingly slow, move at a snail's pace, gradual, gradually, little by little, bit-by-bit, glacial|tergend stadig, beweeg teen &#39;n slakkepas, geleidelike, geleidelik, bietjie vir bietjie, bietjie-vir-bietjie, glacial
(3) What words refer to doing something slowly?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets doen stadig?
go slow, slowness, take your time (over)|gaan stadig, traagheid, neem jou tyd (oor)
(4) What words refer to causing someone to do something slowly?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na iemand wat veroorsaak dat iets stadig doen?
slow (someone) down, hold back, restrain, delay, hold up|stadig (iemand) af, terug te hou, in toom te hou, vertraging, hou
(5) What do you say to someone when you want him to do something slowly?|(5) Wat sê jy vir iemand wanneer jy wil hom om iets stadig doen?
Slow down! Take it easy! Take your time! Whoa! (horse)|Stadiger! Neem dit maklik! Neem jou tyd! Whoa! (Perd)
Sudden|Skielike
Use this domain for words referring to a sudden event--something happens that I don't expect.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n skielike gebeurtenis - iets gebeur wat ek nie verwag nie.
(1) What words refer to moving suddenly?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die verskuiwing skielik?
move suddenly, sudden movement|beweeg skielik skielike beweging
(2) What words are used to indicate that an event is sudden?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat &#39;n gebeurtenis is skielike?
sudden (warning), all of a sudden, abrupt|skielike (waarskuwing), almal van &#39;n skielike, skielike
(3) What words are used to indicate that something happened suddenly?|(3) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat iets skielik gebeur?
suddenly, abruptly, without warning, without notice|skielik, skielik, sonder waarskuwing, sonder kennisgewing
(4) What words refer to the suddenness of something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die skielike iets?
suddenness|skielike
Location|Plek
Use this domain for words that refer to the place where something is located and for words indicating the location of something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na die plek waar iets is geleë en woorde wat die ligging van iets.
(1) What words refer to the location of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die plek van iets?
location, position, place, venue, at, spot|plek, posisie, plek, plek, op, spot
(2) What words indicate that something is located somewhere?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets iewers is geleë?
be at, at, be, be located, location|wees, by, word, geleë wees, die plek
Here, there|Hier is daar
Use this domain for words that refer to a place in relation to the speaker or listener.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na &#39;n plek in verhouding tot die spreker of luisteraar.
(1) What words refer to a place near the speaker?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek naby die spreker?
here, hereabouts, hither, in this place, on this very spot, around here|hier, dié geweste, hierheen, in hierdie plek, oor hierdie baie plek, hier rond
(2) What words refer to a place near the listener?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek naby die luisteraar?
there, thereabouts, thither,|daar buurt, daarheen
(3) What words refer to a place that is not near the speaker or the listener?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n plek wat nie naby die spreker of die luisteraar?
over there, elsewhere, yon, yonder|daar, elders, yon, daar
In front of|In die voorkant van
Use this domain for words referring to being in front of you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na wat in die voorkant van jou.
(1) What words indicate that something is in front of something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is in die voorkant van iets anders?
front, in front, in the front, up front, forward, in the foreground, be in front, out in front, before, ahead of,|front, voor, aan die voorkant, aan die voorkant, vorentoe, in die voorgrond, in die voorkant, in die voorkant, voor, voor,
(2) What words refer to the front of a line of people or vehicles?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die voorkant van &#39;n lyn van mense of voertuie?
the front,|die front,
(3) What words refer to being at the front of a line?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na om by die voorkant van &#39;n lyn?
at the front, at the head of, leading,|aan die voorkant, aan die hoof van, leiding,
(4) What words indicate that something is in front of you?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is in die voorkant van jou?
in front, ahead, up ahead,|voor, voor, tot voor,
(5) What words indicate that two people are in front of each other?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat twee mense is in die voorkant van mekaar?
face to face, facing each other|aangesig tot aangesig teenoor mekaar
Behind|Agter
Use this domain for words indicating that something is behind you.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is agter jou.
(1) What words indicate that something is in back of something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is in die agterkant van iets anders?
behind, in back, way back, in the rear, background|agter in die rug, die pad terug, in die agterste, agtergrond
Beside|Behalwe
Use this domain for words that indicate that something is to the side of someone.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat daarop dui dat daar iets is aan die kant van iemand.
(1) What words indicate that something is beside something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is langs iets anders?
be beside, alongside, along, next to, at your side, be way over to the side, be on the right, be on the left|wees langs, langsaan, saam, langs, aan jou kant, wees manier aan die kant, op die regte, op die links
Around|Rondom
Use this domain for words indicating that something is around something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is om iets anders.
(1) What words indicate that something is around something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is om iets anders?
be around, surrounding|rondom omring
Between|Tussen
Use this domain for words indicating that something is between two other things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is tussen twee ander dinge.
(1) What words indicate that something is between two other things?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is tussen twee ander dinge?
between, amid, amidships, amidst, among, amongst, betwixt, center, central, equidistant, half-way, mean, medial, median, medium, mid, middle, middlemost, midst, midway, therein, throughout, within,|tussen, te midde van, midscheeps, te midde van, onder, onder, tussen, in die middel, sentrale, ewe ver, halfpad, gemiddelde, mediaal, mediaan, medium, mid, middel, middelstes, midde, halfpad, daarin, regdeur, binne,
On|Op
Use this domain for words indicating that something is on another thing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is op &#39;n ander ding.
(1) What words indicate that something is on something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets op iets anders?
be on, be on top of, topside, upon,|op, wees op die top van, binneboud, op,
Above|Bo
Use this domain for words that express the idea that something is above another thing. The concept 'above' is inherently relational, expressing the relative positions of two things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat die idee dat daar iets is bo &#39;n ander ding uit te druk. Die konsep &#39;bo&#39; is inherent relasionele, die uitdrukking van die relatiewe posisies van twee dinge.
(1) What words indicate that something is above something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets bo iets anders?
above, higher than, over, overhang, up above, super-, supra-, on high,|bo, hoër as oor, oorhang, bo, super-, supra, op &#39;n hoë,
(2) What words describe something that is above something else?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat bo iets anders beskryf?
aloft, overhanging, overhead, upper,|omhoog, oorhangende, oorhoofse, boonste,
Under, below|Onder hieronder
Use this domain for words that express the idea that something is under another thing. The concept 'under' is inherently relational, expressing the relative positions of two things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat die idee dat daar iets is onder &#39;n ander ding uit te druk. Die konsep &#39;onder&#39; inherent relasionele, die uitdrukking van die relatiewe posisies van twee dinge.
(1) What words indicate that something is under something that is directly above it?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is onder iets wat direk bo dit?
under, underneath, beneath, under-, sub-|onder, onder, onder, onder-, sub-
(2) What words indicate that something is in a lower position or on a lower level?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is in &#39;n laer posisie of op &#39;n laer vlak?
below, beneath, sunken, lower|hieronder, onder, gesink, verlaag
(3) What words indicate that something is under a covering (such as clothes, skin, or paint)?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is onder &#39;n bedekking (soos klere, vel, of verf)?
under, underneath, beneath|onder, onder, onder
(4) What words refer to being under something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na wat onder iets?
underlay, underlie,|onderlaag, onderliggend,
(5) What words describe something that is under another thing?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat onder &#39;n ander ding te beskryf?
underlying, nether,|onderliggende, onderste,
Inside|Binne
Use this domain for words indicating that something is outside something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is buite iets anders.
(1) What words indicate that something is in something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is in iets anders?
be in, inside, inner, within|in, binne, innerlike, binne
Out, outside|Out, buite
Use this domain for words indicating that something is outside of another thing.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is buite van &#39;n ander ding.
(1) What words indicate that something is outside of something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets buite iets anders?
be out, outside, outer|buite, buite, buitenste
Touching, contact|Raak, kontak
Use this domain for words indicating that two things are touching or in contact with each other.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat twee dinge is te raak of in kontak met mekaar.
(1) What words refer to two things touching each other?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na twee dinge aan mekaar te raak?
contact, be in contact, touch, rest against, up against, together, end to end|kontak, in kontak, kontak, rus teen, teen, saam einde aan die einde
(2) What words refer to two things moving until they touch each other?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na twee dinge beweeg totdat hulle mekaar raak?
come into contact, make contact, touch, bump into, come together, brush, skim, graze, meet, connect, butt up against, come to rest against|in aanraking kom, maak kontak, kontak, stamp in, kom saam, borsel, afgeroomde, wei, ontmoet, maak, boude teen, kom tot rus teen
(3) What words describe something that is touching another?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat &#39;n ander raak te beskryf?
abutting, adjoining, contiguous|aangrensend, aangrensende, aangrensende
Next to|Langs
Use this domain for words indicating that something is next to something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is langs iets anders.
(1) What words indicate that something is next to another?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is langs &#39;n ander?
next to, right next to, right up next to, by, beside, neighbor, juxtaposed, nearest|langs, reg langs, reg langs, deur, bo, buurman, naas, naaste
(2) What words indicate that something is next to something long such as a road?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is langs iets wat lank soos &#39;n pad?
along, alongside, by the side of, at the side of|saam, saam, deur die kant van, aan die kant van
(3) What words indicate that something such as a building or country is next to another?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets soos &#39;n gebou of land is langs &#39;n ander?
next door, adjoin, border (v)|langsaan, belenden, grens (v)
(4) What words indicate that two things are next to each other and facing in the same direction?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat twee dinge is langs mekaar en kyk in dieselfde rigting?
side by side, abreast|langs mekaar, op die hoogte
(5) What words describe something that is next to another?|(5) Watter woorde iets wat langs &#39;n ander beskryf?
the next, adjacent, adjoining, bordering, neighboring|die volgende, aangrensende, aangrensende, aangrensende, naburige
Across|Oor
Use this domain for words that refer to a place on another side of something from the reference point. 'Across' involves three things--the object, the reference point, and something else in between the two.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na &#39;n plek op &#39;n ander kant van iets uit die verwysingspunt. &quot;Regoor &#39;behels drie dinge - die voorwerp, die verwysingspunt, en iets anders in tussen die twee.
(1) What words indicate that something is across from something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is oorkant iets anders?
across, across from, on the other side of, on the opposite side of, beyond, offshore from|oor, oorkant, aan die ander kant van, aan die teenoorgestelde kant van die anderkant, offshore uit
Indefinite location|Onbepaalde plek
Use this domain for words indicating that something is at an indefinite location.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat aandui dat daar iets is by &#39;n onbepaalde plek.
(1) What words refer to an indefinite location?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n onbepaalde plek?
somewhere, anywhere, someplace, anyplace, where, here, there, over there, any old place, wherever, who knows where, could be anywhere, undisclosed location, location unknown, here and there, whereabouts, hereabouts, thereabouts|iewers, enige plek, êrens, oral en altyd, waar, hier, daar, daar, enige ou plek, waar, wie weet waar, kan enige plek wees, onbekende plek, plek onbekend, hier en daar, en late, dié geweste, buurt
Direction|Rigting
Use this domain for general words referring to a direction.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n rigting.
(1) What words refer to a direction?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n rigting?
direction, orientation, course, way, bearing|rigting, oriëntering, natuurlik, manier, dra
(2) What words refer to facing in some direction?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die gesig staar in sommige rigting?
face (v), point, orient|gesig (v), punt, oriënteer
(3) What words refer to a person's ability to know what direction he is going in?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon se vermoë om te weet watter rigting hy gaan in?
sense of direction|sin van rigting
(4) What words indicate that two things are going in the same direction?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat twee dinge gaan in dieselfde rigting?
with|met
(5) What words indicate that two things are going in different directions?|(5) Watter woorde aan te dui dat twee dinge gaan in verskillende rigtings?
against|teen
Forward|Vorentoe
Use this domain for words indicating a forward direction.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dui op &#39;n voorwaartse rigting.
(1) What words indicate the direction forward?|(1) Watter woorde vorentoe dui die rigting?
forward, ahead,|vorentoe, voor,
Backward|Agteruit
Use this domain for words indicating a backward direction.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dui op &#39;n agterlike rigting.
(1) What words indicate the direction backward?|(1) Watter woorde agtertoe dui die rigting?
back, backward, behind, reverse,|rug, agtertoe, agter, omgekeerde,
Right, left|Regs, links
Use this domain for words referring to right and left.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na links en regs.
(1) What words refer to the right side?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die regterkant?
(2) What words refer to the left side?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die linkerkant?
left|verlaat
(3) What words describe a person who usually uses his right hand?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat gewoonlik gebruik sy regterhand nie?
right-handed|regs-handed
(4) What words describe a person who usually uses his left hand?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat gewoonlik gebruik sy linkerhand?
left-handed|links-handed
Up|Up
Use this domain for words referring to the direction up.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die rigting aan.
(1) What words refer to the direction up?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die rigting up?
up, upwards, upward, uphill, upstairs, higher and higher, up and down,|up, opwaarts, daarbo, opdraande, bo, hoër en hoër, op en af,
(2) What words describe something that is facing or pointing upwards?|(2) Watter woorde iets wat in die gesig staar of opwaarts te beskryf?
face-up,|gesig-up,
(3) What words indicate that a path or road goes upward?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n pad of pad gaan opwaartse?
go up, climb, rise,|optrek, klim, styg,
Down|Down
Use this domain for words referring to the direction down.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die rigting af.
(1) What words refer to the direction down?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die rigting af?
down, downwards, downhill|af, afwaarts, afdraande
Away from|Weg van
Use this domain for words indicating a direction away from something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dui op &#39;n rigting weg van iets.
(1) What words indicate that something is moving away from something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets weg te beweeg van iets anders?
toward, towards, away from, inward, inwards, outward, outwards|teenoor die rigting, weg van, innerlike, binnegoed uiterlike, buite
(2) What words indicate that something moves from one place (to another place)?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets beweeg van een plek (na &#39;n ander plek)?
from,|uit,
Towards|Teenoor
Use this domain for words indicating a direction toward something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dui op &#39;n rigting na iets.
(1) What words indicate that something is moving toward something else?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets is beweeg na iets anders?
(2) What words indicate that something moves (from one place) to another place?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets beweeg (van een plek) na &#39;n ander plek?
to,|om,
North, south, east, west|Noord, suid, oos, wes
Use this domain for words referring to the directions of the compass.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die voorskrifte van die kompas.
(1) What general words refer to a direction of the compass?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n rigting van die kompas?
direction, heading, point of the compass, degree, bearing, cardinal points|rigting, opskrif, punt van die kompas, graad, dra, kardinale punte
(2) What words refer to a direction of the compass?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n rigting van die kompas?
north, south, east, west, northeast, northwest, southeast, southwest, northward, southward, eastward, westward, northerly, southerly, westerly, easterly, up north, down south, sunrise, sunset|noord, suid, oos, wes, noord, noordwes, suidooste, suidwes, noorde en suide, na die ooste, weste, was noordelike, suidelike, westelike, oostelike, noord, na die suide, sonsopkoms, sonsondergang
(3) What words describe something that is toward one of the directions of the compass?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat na een van die voorskrifte van die kompas te beskryf?
northern, southern, eastern, western, boreal, austral, oriental, occidental, Midwestern, Fareast|noordelike, suidelike, oostelike, westelike, noordelike, suidelike, Oosterse, westerse, Midwestern, FAREAST
(4) What words describe something going in one of the directions?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iets gaan in een van die rigtings?
northbound, southbound, eastbound, westbound|noordwaartse, suide, oostwaarts, westwaarts
(5) What words describe a person who is from a part of the country that is north, south, east, or west?|(5) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n persoon wat van &#39;n deel van die land wat noord, suid, oos of weste?
northerner, southerner, easterner, westerner|noord, Suidelike, easterner, Westerling
(6) What words refer to a compass?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n kompas?
compass, needle|kompas, naald
Be at a place|Wees op &#39;n plek
Use this domain for words related to being at a place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met dat op &#39;n plek.
(1) What words indicate that something or someone is in a particular place?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets of iemand in &#39;n spesifieke plek?
be at a place/location, be in a place/location, be located, be situated, be localized, attendance, be present, presence, sit, lie, laid, occupy, be resting|wees op &#39;n plek / ligging, in &#39;n plek / ligging, geleë wees, geleë wees, gelokaliseer, bywoning, teenwoordig wees, die teenwoordigheid, sit, lê, gelê, beset, rus
(2) What words indicate that something or someone is in the correct or expected place?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets of iemand is in die korrekte of verwagte plek?
in place, in the proper place, in your place, out of place|in plek is, in die regte plek, in jou plek, uit plek
Absent|Afwesig
Use this domain for words related to being absent--to not be in a particular place, or not be in the correct or expected place.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met afwesig - om nie in &#39;n spesifieke plek, of nie in die korrekte of verwagte plek.
(1) What words indicate that something or someone is not in a particular place?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets of iemand is nie in &#39;n spesifieke plek?
be absent, not be here, not be around, be out, not be in, be away, missing, be off, not be at, not be there, absence, be gone, not present, be away, nowhere to be found, out of sight, truant, absent without leave, AWOL, missing in action, not show up, make yourself scarce, minus someone, be lacking, lose, elsewhere, somewhere else,|afwesig is, nie hier wees nie, om nie te wees, word uit nie in nie, wees weg, ontbreek, word af, nie op nie daar wees, afwesigheid, weg, nie teenwoordig is, word weg, nêrens te vinde nie, buite sig, stokkies, sonder verlof afwesig, AWOL, ontbreek in aksie, nie opdaag nie, maak jouself skaars, minus iemand wees ontbreek, verloor, elders, iewers anders,
(2) What words refer to a person who is absent?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n persoon wat afwesig is?
absentee, truant, missing person, no-show,|afwesige, stokkies, vermiste persoon, no-show,
Area|Gebied
Use this domain for words referring to an area.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n gebied.
(1) What words refer to an area?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n gebied?
area, region, district, expanse (of land)|area, streek, distrik, uitspansel (grond)
Vicinity|Omgewing
Use this domain for words related to a vicinity--an area around something else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n omgewing - &#39;n gebied rondom iets anders.
(1) What words refer to the area around something else?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gebied rondom iets anders?
area, vicinity, environs, neighborhood, surroundings, community, district, region, context|area, omgewing, omgewing, omgewing, omgewing, gemeenskap, distrik, streek, konteks
Occupy an area|Beset &#39;n gebied
Use this domain for words related to occupying an area.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met die besetting van &#39;n gebied.
(1) What words refer to occupying an area?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die besetting van &#39;n gebied?
occupy, occupy an area, take up space, cover an area, fill|beset, bewoon &#39;n gebied, neem ruimte, dek &#39;n gebied, vul
Space, room|Ruimte, kamer
Use this domain for words referring to the amount of empty space that is available to be used.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na die bedrag van die leë ruimte wat beskikbaar is om gebruik te word is.
(1) What words refer to the amount of empty space that is available to be used?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die bedrag van die leë ruimte wat beskikbaar is om gebruik te word is?
space, room, clearance, floor space, elbow room,|ruimte, kamer, opruiming, vloerruimte, elmboog kamer,
(2) What words refer to providing space for someone or something?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die verskaffing van ruimte vir iets of iemand?
make room, clear a space, make way, get out of the way,|plek te maak, &#39;n ruimte skoon te maak weg te kry uit die pad,
(3) What words describe a situation where there is just enough room?|(3) Watter woorde beskryf &#39;n situasie waar daar net genoeg ruimte?
a tight squeeze, barely enough room, close fit,|&#39;n stywe druk, skaars genoeg plek, naby pas,
Interval, space|Interval, ruimte
Use this domain for words related to an interval or space between things.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde in verband met &#39;n interval of ruimte tussen dinge.
(1) What words refer to the area between things?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die gebied tussen dinge?
space, gap, opening, break, interval, separation, hole,|ruimte, gaping, die opening, breek, interval, skeiding, gat,
(2) What words refer to arranging things with spaces between them?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die reël van die dinge wat met ruimtes tussen hulle?
space out,|ruimte uit,
(3) What words indicate that things have spaces between them?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat dinge ruimtes tussen hulle?
spaced, apart, be spaced out,|gespasieer, uitmekaar, gespasieer uit,
(4) What words indicate that things are arranged with regular spaces in between?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat dinge gereël met gereelde spasies tussen?
at regular intervals, every meter, evenly spaced,|op &#39;n gereelde tussenposes, elke meter, eweredig,
Spatial relations|Ruimtelike verhoudings
Use this domain for words that indicate a spatial relation between situations.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat &#39;n ruimtelike verhouding tussen situasies aan te dui.
(1) What words indicate that a situation happened at the same place as another situation?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n situasie gebeur op dieselfde plek as &#39;n ander situasie?
where, in the same place as, at the same place as|waar in die dieselfde plek as, op dieselfde plek as
(2) What words indicate that a situation happened at a different place as another situation?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n situasie gebeur het by &#39;n ander plek as &#39;n ander situasie?
somewhere else, elsewhere,|iewers anders, elders,
Contain|Bevat
Use this domain for words that express the idea that something contains something.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde dat die idee dat iets iets bevat spreek.
(1) What words indicate that something contains something?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets iets bevat?
have, of, -'s, contain, hold|het, van, &amp; &#39;s, bevat, hou
(2) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a clause using the verb 'contain' with the 'Container' in the subject position and the 'Content' in the object position.|(2) In Engels &#39;Container&#39; kan deur &#39;n klousule met behulp van die werkwoord &#39;bevat&#39; met die &#39;houer&#39; in die vak posisie en die &#39;inhoud&#39; in die posisie voorwerp uitgedruk.
(3) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a clause using the verb with the 'Container' in the subject position, the 'Content' in the object position, and the 'Container' in a preposition phrase marked by 'in'.|(3) In Engels &#39;Container&#39; kan deur &#39;n klousule met behulp van die werkwoord met die &quot;Container&quot; in die onderwerpveld posisie, die &#39;inhoud&#39; in die posisie voorwerp, en die &#39;houer &#39;n voorsetsel frase gekenmerk deur&#39; in &#39;uitgedruk word .
(4) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a noun phrase with the 'Container' as the head and the 'Content' marked by 'of'.|(4) In Engels &#39;Container&#39; kan deur &#39;n naamwoord frase met die &quot;Container &#39;as die kop en die&#39; inhoud &#39;gekenmerk deur&#39; van &#39;uitgedruk word.
(5) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a noun phrase with the word 'container' as the head and the 'Content' marked by 'of'.|(5) In Engels &#39;Container&#39; kan deur &#39;n naamwoord frase met die woord &quot;houer&quot;, soos die kop en die &#39;inhoud&#39; gekenmerk deur &#39;van&#39; uitgedruk word.
(6) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a noun phrase with the word 'contents' as the head and the 'Container' marked by 'of'.|(6) In Engels &#39;Container&#39; kan deur &#39;n naamwoord frase met die woord &quot;inhoud&quot;, soos die kop en die &#39;houer&#39; gekenmerk deur &#39;van&#39; uitgedruk word.
(7) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a possession phrase with the 'Container' in the first position and the word 'contents' in the second position.|(7) In Engels &#39;Container&#39; kan deur &#39;n besitting frase met die &quot;Container &#39;in die eerste posisie en die woord&#39; inhoud &#39;in die tweede posisie uitgedruk.
Parts of things|Dele van die dinge
Use this domain for words that refer to a part of something. These words are often based on the parts of a person's body.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat verwys na &#39;n deel van iets. Hierdie woorde word dikwels gebaseer op die dele van die liggaam van die mens.
(1) What general words refer to a part of something?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van iets?
part, piece, section, component, portion, bit|deel, stuk, artikel, komponent, gedeelte, bietjie
(2) If something has two sides, what words refer to the other side?|(2) As iets het twee kante, wat woorde verwys na die ander kant?
the back, the reverse, the other side, the flip side,|die rug, die omgekeerde, die ander kant, die ander kant,
(3) What words refer to the part of something used to hold it?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die deel van iets wat gebruik word om dit te hou?
handle, grip|hanteer, greep
(4) What words refer to the main part of something?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die belangrikste deel van iets?
body, chassis|liggaam, onderstel
(5) What words refer to something added to the main part?|(5) Watter woorde verwys na iets bygevoeg word om die grootste deel?
appendage, appurtenance, adjunct, accessory, addition, attachment|aanhangsel, toebehore, toevoegsel, accessory, benewens, skakel
(6) What words refer to a layer of something?|(6) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n laag van iets?
layer, level, stratum, stratified, story, floor, sandwich|laag, vlak, stratum, gestratifiseerde, storie, vloer, sandwich
(7) What other words refer to a part of something?|(7) Wat ander woorde verwys na &#39;n deel van iets?
flap, detail, bar, blade, hook, lid, neck, nose, shelf, wheel, longitudinal, projection,|flap, detail, bar, lem, haak, deksel, nek, neus, rak, wiel, longitudinale, projeksie,

front (adj), frontal, anterior|front (adj), frontale, anterior

Edge|Edge

hem, fringe,|soom, byvoordele,

(7) What words refer to the corner of something?|(7) Wat woorde verwys na die hoek van iets?
corner (n),|hoek (n),

Grammar|Grammatika
Use this domain for technical linguistic terms that refer to grammatical words and constructions. Most languages have few if any words in this domain.|Gebruik hierdie domein tegniese taalkundige terme wat verwys na grammatikale woorde en konstruksies. Die meeste tale het min indien enige woorde in hierdie gebied.
(1) What words refer to the study of grammar?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die studie van grammatika?
grammar, syntax, morphology|grammatika, sintaksis, morfologie
(2) What words refer to types of grammatical words?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na soorte grammatikale woorde?
noun, verb, adjective, adverb, conjunction, preposition, particle, article, word, participle, infinitive, part of speech, compound, derivative|naamwoord, werkwoord, adjektief, bywoord, samewerking, voorsetsel, deeltjie, artikel, woord, deelwoord, infinitief, woordsoort, saamgestelde, afgeleide
(3) What words refer to types of grammatical constructions?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na soorte grammatikale konstruksies?
phrase, clause, sentence, paragraph|frase, sin, paragraaf
(4) What words refer to parts of words?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na dele van woorde?
root, stem, affix, prefix, suffix, ending, morpheme,|wortel, stam, aanbring, voorvoegsel, agtervoegsel, eindig, morfeem,
(5) What words are used to talk about grammar?|(5) Watter woorde gebruik om te praat oor grammatika?
inflect, inflection, case, decline, declension, conjugate, conjugation, parse, paradigm, rule, singular, plural|verbuig, infleksie, geval, agteruitgang, verbuiging, toegevoegde, vervoeging, ontleed, paradigma, reël, enkelvoud, meervoud
(6) What words are used to talk about the sounds of a language?|(6) Watter woorde gebruik om te praat oor die klanke van &#39;n taal?
letter, consonant, vowel, syllable|brief, konsonant, vokaal, lettergreep
General words|Algemene woorde
Use the following section for words that don't belong in any other domain because they are so general in meaning that you can use them to talk about any topic. Use this domain for general and indefinite words that can be used in the place of any word. Some languages have a general word that can replace a noun or a verb. For instance some Philippine languages use the word 'kwan' in this way. Colloquial German can use the word 'dings' as a noun or verb. Often these words are used when you can't remember the particular word you are trying to think of. In English we use the word 'blank' when we don't want to say a word, for instance when we are testing someone and want them to say the word.|Gebruik die volgende afdeling vir woorde wat behoort nie in enige ander domein, omdat hulle so algemeen in wat beteken dat jy dit kan gebruik om te praat oor enige onderwerp. Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene en onbepaalde woorde wat gebruik kan word in die plek van &#39;n woord. Sommige tale het &#39;n algemene woord wat &#39;n selfstandige naamwoord of &#39;n werkwoord kan vervang. Byvoorbeeld &#39;n Filippynse tale gebruik die woord &#39;Kwan&#39; in hierdie manier. Volksmond Duitse kan die woord &#39;dings&#39; as &#39;n selfstandige naamwoord of werkwoord gebruik. Dikwels word hierdie woorde gebruik word wanneer jy nie kan onthou die spesifieke woord wat jy probeer om te dink. In Engels gebruik ons ​​die woord &quot;leeg&quot; wanneer ons wil nie &#39;n woord sê, byvoorbeeld wanneer ons iemand te toets en wil hê hulle moet die woord sê.
(1) What words can be used in the place of any word?|(1) Watter woorde gebruik kan word in die plek van &#39;n woord?
blank, ... (ellipsis), you know what I mean|leeg ... (ellips), jy weet wat ek bedoel
Be|Wees
Many languages have general words that indicate some kind of state. These general words may be used with a wide variety of specific meanings. For instance in English the word 'be' may be used to identify something, describe something, and many other ideas.|Baie tale het algemene woorde wat &#39;n soort van die staat aan te dui. Hierdie algemene woorde kan gebruik word met &#39;n wye verskeidenheid van spesifieke betekenis. Byvoorbeeld in Engels die woord &#39;word&#39; gebruik kan word om iets te identifiseer, beskryf iets, en baie ander idees.
(1) What words refer to something being something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na iets om iets?
be, represent, amount to, form, make, constitute|wees, verteenwoordig, bedrag, vorm, maak, vorm
(2) What words indicate that something is being identified?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets geïdentifiseer?
is|is
(3) What words indicate that a group of things is something?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n groep van die dinge is iets?
make up, form, constitute, add up to,|maak, vorm, vorm, voeg tot,
Exist|Bestaan
Use this domain for words indicating that something exists.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde aandui dat daar iets bestaan.
(1) What words are used to indicate that something exists?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat daar iets bestaan?
exist, existence, there is, there exists, there lives, be, be found, occur, be in existence, be in operation, real,|bestaan ​​nie, bestaan, is daar, is daar, is daar lewe wees, gevind word nie, voorkom, word in die bestaan, in werking, real,
(2) What words refer to something starting to exist?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na iets begin om te bestaan?
appear, arise, coalesce, come into being, come into existence, come to be, develop, emerge, form, materialize, spring up, take shape|verskyn, staan, verenig, tot stand gekom, tot stand kom, kom om te wees, te ontwikkel, kom, vorm, realiseer, lente up, vorm aanneem
(3) What words refer to continuing to exist?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na voortgesette bestaan?
remain, persist, persistence, survive, survival, survivor,|bly, bly, volharding, oorleef, oorleef, oorleef,
(4) What words refer to something ceasing to exist?|(4) Watter woorde verwys na iets ophou om te bestaan?
become extinct, extinction, die out, disappear, vanish, cease to exist, disappearance, disintegrate, disintegration, fade, loss,|uitgesterf, uitwissing, sterf uit, verdwyn, verdwyn, ophou om te bestaan, verdwyning, disintegreer, disintegrasie, vervaag, verlies,
(5) What words refer to not existing?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na nie bestaande?
non-existent, extinct, there's no, there's no such thing,|nie bestaan ​​nie, uitgesterf, is daar geen, daar is geen sodanige ding,
Become, change state|Geword staat verander
Many languages have general words that indicate some kind of change of state. These general words may be used with a wide variety of specific meanings. For instance in English the word 'become' may be used to a change in identity, a change in characteristic, a change in nature, and many other ideas.|Baie tale het algemene woorde wat &#39;n soort van verandering van die staat aan te dui. Hierdie algemene woorde kan gebruik word met &#39;n wye verskeidenheid van spesifieke betekenis. Byvoorbeeld in Engels die woord &#39;geword&#39; gebruik kan word om &#39;n verandering in identiteit, &#39;n verandering in kenmerkende, &#39;n verandering in die natuur, en baie ander idees.
(1) What words are used to indicate a change of state?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n verandering van die staat aan?
become (characteristic), change, come to be, turn, get, develop, grow into, turn into, change into, become different, evolve|geword (eienskap), verandering, kom om te wees, draai, te kry, te ontwikkel, groei in, draai in, verander in, geword anders, ontwikkel
(2) What words are used of causing or producing a state?|(2) Watter woorde gebruik veroorsaak of die vervaardiging van &#39;n toestand?
produce, cause to be, make to be, make, make into, result in, bring upon, bring about|produseer, laat maak om te wees, maak, te maak in, gevolg, bring oor, bring
(3) What words are used of attaining a state?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik vir die bereiking van &#39;n toestand?
come to be, attain, achieve, reach|kom om te wees, te bereik, te bereik, te bereik
Have, of|Het, van
Many languages have several general words that are used to indicate a variety of relationships between two things. There are three such words in English:|Baie tale het &#39;n paar algemene woorde wat gebruik word om &#39;n verskeidenheid van verhoudings tussen twee dinge aan te dui. Daar is drie sulke woorde in Engels:
"have," "of," and the possessive suffix "-'s." The basic meaning of these words in English is 'to own', but they can mean many other things too. For instance they can mean that I am related to someone (I have a brother), something has a part (birds have wings), and many other ideas. There is also a set of pronouns in English that are like nouns ending in -'s (my/mine, your/yours, his, her/hers, its, our/ours, their/theirs, whose). Use this domain for these general words.|&quot;Het&quot;, &quot;van&quot; en die besitlike agtervoegsel &quot;&amp; &#39;s.&quot; Die basiese betekenis van hierdie woorde in Engels is &#39;om te besit, maar hulle kan baie ander dinge te beteken. Byvoorbeeld kan dit beteken dat ek met betrekking tot iemand (Ek het &#39;n broer), iets wat &#39;n deel (voëls het vlerke), en baie ander idees. Daar is ook &#39;n stel van voornaamwoorde in Engels wat soos Woorde wat eindig in &amp; &#39;s (my / my, jou / julle, sy, sy / haar, sy, ons / ons, hul / hulle, wie). Gebruik hierdie domein hierdie algemene woorde.
(1) What general words relate two nouns?|(1) Watter algemene woorde in verband twee naamwoorde?
have, of, -'s|het, van, &amp; &#39;s
Attribution|Erkenning
Attributes often belong to a class of attributes (shape = straight, curved) or to a scale (length = long, short). The class or scale can sometimes be included in the expression, but does not mark the proposition itself. (The towel <feels> damp. The box <weighs> five kilos.)|Eienskappe dikwels behoort aan &#39;n klas van eienskappe (vorm = reguit, geboë) of &#39;n skaal (lengte = lank, kort). Die klas of skaal kan soms ingesluit in die uitdrukking, maar nie die stelling self te merk. (Die handdoek <feels> klam. Die boks <weighs> vyf kilogram.)
(1) What words are used to indicate an attribute of something?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n kenmerk van iets aan te dui?
found to be, discover to be, turn out to be, be in many ways|gevind word, ontdek te wees, draai uit te wees, in baie maniere
(2) What words indicate a point on a scale?|(2) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n punt op &#39;n skaal?
(3) What words indicate an evaluation of something?|(3) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n evaluering van iets?
Do|Doen
Use this domain for general verbs with a volitional subject (agent).|Gebruik hierdie domein vir algemene werkwoorde met &#39;n wils kragtig vak (agent).
(1) What general words refer to someone doing something?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na iemand om iets te doen?
do, act, actuate, behave, accomplish, achieve, attain, conduct, effectuate, engage in, execute, exercise, exert, function, give, go about, dabble in, implement, manage, perform, practice, progress, undertake, up to, use, utilize, work, operate, be involved in|doen, op te tree, te beklemtoon, optree, te bereik, te bereik, te bereik, gedrag, te bewerkstellig, betrokke te raak in, uit te voer, oefening, oefen, funksie, gee, gaan, ploeteraars in, te implementeer, te bestuur, te voer, praktyk, vooruitgang, onderneem, tot tot, gebruik, benut, werk, werk, betrokke te wees in
(2) What words refer to the thing that is done?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die ding wat gedoen word?
deed, thing to do, something to do, what you do, act (n), action, activity, event, behavior, accomplishment, achievement, attainment, execution, exercise, function (n), job, implementation, measure, performance, practice (n), task, undertaking, work (n), workmanship, feat, exploits, operation|daad, ding om te doen, om iets te doen, wat jy doen, op te tree (n), aksie, aktiwiteit, gebeurtenis, gedrag, prestasie, prestasie, bereiking, uitvoering, oefening, funksie (n), werk, implementering, meet, prestasie, praktyk (n), taak, onderneming, werk (n), vakmanskap, ding, wedervaringe, bedryf
(3) What words refer to the person doing something?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na die persoon om iets te doen?
achiever, actor, doer, performer, agent|presteerder, akteur, dader nie, performer, agent
(4) What words describe someone who is doing something?|(4) Watter woorde beskryf iemand wat iets te doen?
active, in action|aktiewe, in aksie
(5) How do you ask someone what he is doing?|(5) Hoe kan jy iemand wat hy doen vra?
What are you doing? What are you up to? What do you think you are doing?|Wat doen jy? Wat is jy aan? Wat dink jy doen?

Event propositions|Event stellings
Use this domain for words that indicate event propositions. Event propositions are similar in that they are normally expressed by a subject and a verb, possibly including an object, indirect object, or complement clause. However there are multiple ways in which a language can express an event, such as a passive construction, noun phrase, or subordinate clause. In addition each event type is different in its primary cases, and in the ways those cases are marked. Each event type has subtypes, such as intransitive, transitive, and bitransitive verbs. A great deal of research is needed in order to identify all the variations. Ultimately every verb must be investigated to determine how it behaves in each syntactic construction and how its case relations are marked. No two verbs are entirely alike.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat geval stellings aan te dui. Event stellings is soortgelyk in dat hulle gewoonlik uitgedruk deur &#39;n onderwerp en &#39;n werkwoord, moontlik insluitend &#39;n voorwerp, indirekte voorwerp, of vul klousule. Daar is egter verskeie maniere waarop &#39;n taal &#39;n gebeurtenis kan uitdruk, soos &#39;n passiewe konstruksie, nominale constituent of bysin. Daarbenewens elke tipe gebeurtenis is anders in sy primêre gevalle, en in die weë van die gevalle is gemerk. Elke tipe gebeurtenis het subtipes, soos onoorganklike, oorganklike en bitransitive werkwoorde. &#39;N Groot deel van die navorsing is nodig om al die variasies te identifiseer. Uiteindelik elke werkwoord moet ondersoek word om te bepaal hoe dit optree in elke sintaktiese konstruksie en hoe sy saak verhoudings gemerk is. Geen twee werkwoorde is heeltemal gelyk.
(1) What words indicate an event?|(1) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n gebeurtenis?
-ing, -'s...-ing,  -ing...of, to,|-ing, &amp; &#39;s ...- ing, -ing ... van, om,
Thing|Ding

(1) What general words refer to a thing?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na &#39;n ding?
thing, something, article, artifact, entity, item, object, wares,|ding, iets, artikel, juweel, entiteit, item, voorwerp, ware,
(2) What words refer to a group of things of different types?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groep van die dinge van die verskillende tipes?
things, oddments, paraphernalia, stuff, odds and ends, bits and pieces, knick-knacks,|dinge, snuisterye, paraphernalia, stuff, kans en eindig, stukkies, snuisterye,
(3) What words are used to refer to something when you can't remember what it is called?|(3) Watter woorde gebruik om te verwys na iets wanneer jy nie kan onthou hoe dit genoem word?
what's its name, thingy, thingamajig, whatchamacallit, whatsit, such and such|Wat is sy naam, thingy, dinges, dinges, wat&#39;s, so en so
(4) What words are used to end a list of things to indicate that there are more things in the list?|(4) Watter woorde word gebruik om &#39;n lys van die dinge wat eindig om aan te dui dat daar meer dinge in die lys?
et cetera, etc., and what not, and so forth, and the like, and on and on, ... [ellipsis]|ensovoorts, ensovoorts, en wat nie, en so meer, en dies meer, en op en op ... [beletselteken]
Physical, non-physical|Fisiese, nie-fisiese
Use this domain for words describing something that is physical--that you can touch and see, and for words describing something that is non-physical--that you cannot touch or see.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde iets wat fisiese beskrywing - wat jy kan raak en sien nie, en vir woorde iets wat nie-fisiese beskrywing - wat jy nie kan raak of sien nie.

spirit|gees
Situation|Situasie
Use this domain for words referring to a situation--a particular time and place, and the things that are true about it.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n situasie - &#39;n bepaalde tyd en plek, en die dinge wat waar is oor dit is.
(1) What words refer to the general situation that exists in a place?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die algemene situasie wat bestaan ​​in &#39;n plek?
situation, things, conditions, state of affairs, set-up, context,|situasie, dinge, voorwaardes, stand van sake, set-up, konteks,
(2) What words refer to a situation that affects what can happen or what people can do?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n situasie wat beïnvloed wat kan gebeur of wat mense kan doen?
situation, circumstances, environment, climate, conditions, the lay of the land, which way the wind blows, scenario,|situasie, omstandighede, omgewing, klimaat, voorwaardes, die uitleg van die land, watter rigting die wind waai, scenario,
(3) What words refer to a situation that exists at some time during a larger event or process?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n situasie wat bestaan ​​op &#39;n sekere tyd gedurende &#39;n groter gebeurtenis of proses?
situation, position, state of play,|situasie, posisie, stand van sake,
(4) What words refer to the true situation rather than the situation that people think exists?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na die ware situasie eerder as die situasie wat mense dink bestaan?
the picture, the score, what's going on,|die prentjie, die telling, wat gaan aan,
(5) What words refer to the situation a person is in?|(5) Wat woorde verwys na die situasie &#39;n persoon is in?
situation, circumstances, position, case, plight,|situasie, omstandighede, posisie, geval, lot,
(6) What words indicate that something must happen or cannot happen because of the situation?|(6) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets moet gebeur of kan nie gebeur as gevolg van die situasie?
under the circumstances, in the circumstances, given the circumstances, given the situation, as it is, as things stand, force of circumstances, the way things are,|onder die omstandighede, in die omstandighede, gegewe die omstandighede, gegewe die situasie, soos dit is, soos dinge nou, die krag van omstandighede, die manier waarop dinge is,
General adjectives|Algemene adjektiewe

such, that kind of, that sort of,|sodanig dat die soort van, dat die soort van,
(2) What question words ask for an adjective in the answer?|(2) Watter vraag woorde vra vir &#39;n adjektief in die antwoord?
what kind of, what sort of,|watter soort, watter soort van,
(3) What question words ask for an ad-adjective in the answer?|(3) Watter vraag woorde vra vir &#39;n advertensie-adjektief in die antwoord?
how,|hoe,
General adverbs|Algemene bywoorde

(1) What general words can replace an adverb?|(1) Watter algemene woorde &#39;n bywoord kan vervang?
thus, thusly, so, how, like this, this way, in that way, in this manner|Dus, thusly, so, hoe soos hierdie, op hierdie manier, in die pad, op hierdie wyse
Part of speech|Deel van spraak
This domain is for organization purposes and should not be used for any words. Use the domains in this section for words that belong to a particular part of speech. It is best not to use these domains, since they are based on grammar and not meaning. But if you have a small group of words that belong to a part of speech and you want to list them all, you can use these domains. You can also classify words in this section if you don't know what they mean yet.|Dit domein is vir organisasie doeleindes en moet nie gebruik word vir enige woorde. Gebruik die domeine in hierdie artikel vir woorde wat behoort aan &#39;n spesifieke deel van spraak. Dit is die beste hierdie domeine te gebruik nie, aangesien dit gebaseer is op grammatika en nie beteken. Maar as jy &#39;n klein groepie van die woorde wat behoort aan &#39;n deel van spraak en jy wil &#39;n lys van hulle almal, kan jy hierdie domeine gebruik. Jy kan ook van die woorde in hierdie afdeling te klassifiseer as jy nie weet wat hulle nog beteken.
Adjectives|Adjektiewe
Use this domain to list all adjectives. If there are many adjectives in your language, you should not try to list them all here. If you want to find all the adjectives, most dictionary programs can sort your dictionary by part of speech. However if your language only has a few adjectives, you can list them all in this domain. In the book, "Where Have All the Adjectives Gone?" R. M. W. Dixon [Dixon, R. M. W. 1982. Where have all the adjectives gone? Berlin: Mouton.] identifies seven universal semantic types that are often expressed by adjectives. They are: Age (new, young, old), Dimension (big, little, long, short, wide, narrow, thick, fat, thin), Value (good, bad, proper, perfect, excellent, fine, delicious, atrocious, poor), Color (black, white, red), Human propensity (jealous, happy, kind, clever, generous, cruel, rude, proud, wicked), Physical property (hard, soft, heavy, light, rough, smooth, hot, cold, sweet, sour), Speed (fast, slow). Words in the Human propensity class may be nouns. Words in the Physical property and Speed classes may be verbs.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al adjektiewe. As daar is baie adjektiewe in jou taal, moet jy nie probeer om hier te lys hulle almal. As jy wil al die adjektiewe te vind, kan die meeste woordeboek programme jou woordeboek sorteer deur deel van spraak. Maar as jou taal het slegs &#39;n paar byvoeglike naamwoorde, kan jy hulle almal te lys in hierdie gebied. In die boek, &quot;Waar is al die Adjectives weg?&quot; RMW Dixon [Dixon, RMW 1982 Waar is al die adjektiewe gegaan? Berlin:. Mouton] identifiseer sewe universele semantiese tipes wat dikwels deur adjektiewe uitgedruk. Hulle is: Ouderdom (nuwe, jong, oud), Dimension (groot, klein, lank, kort, breed, smal, dik, vet, maer), Waarde (goeie, slegte, behoorlike, perfekte, &#39;n uitstekende, fyn, heerlike, gruwelike , swak), kleur (swart, wit, rooi), Human geneigdheid (jaloers, gelukkige, soort, slim, vrygewig, wrede, onbeskofte, trots, goddelose), Fisiese eiendom (hard, sag, swaar, lig, ruwe, gladde, warm, koue, soet, suur), Speed ​​(vinnig, stadig). Woorde in die Human geneigdheid klas mag wees naamwoorde. Woorde in die Fisiese eiendom en Speed ​​klasse kan wees werkwoorde.
(1) What are the adjectives in your language?|(1) Wat is die adjektiewe in jou taal?
young, big, good, black, kind, hot, fast,|jong, groot, goeie, swart, soort, warm, vinnig,
Adverbs|Bywoorde
Use this domain to list all adverbs. If there are many adverbs in your language, it is probably not worth the trouble to list them here. The Shoebox program (and other dictionary programs) can sort your dictionary by part of speech.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al bywoorde. As daar is baie bywoorde in jou taal, is dit waarskynlik nie die moeite werd om hier te lys. Die skoenboks program (en ander programme woordeboek) kan jou woordeboek sorteer deur deel van spraak.
(1) What adverbs are in your language?|(1) Wat bywoorde is in jou taal?
quickly|vinnig
Pronouns|Voornaamwoorde
Use this domain for the personal pronouns, including independent, subject, object, and possessive pronouns. It is best to collect all the pronouns in a chart. This way you are more certain of collecting them all and seeing how they are related to each other. A language may have more sets and more distinctions than English does, or it may have less. For instance some languages have a pronoun 'we' which includes the hearer, and another pronoun 'we' which excludes the hearer. Other languages have an indefinite pronoun that means something like the English word 'someone'. Many languages do not have the masculine (he), feminine (she), and neuter (it) distinctions that English has. It is necessary to determine the sets and functions of the pronouns for each language.|Gebruik hierdie domein vir die persoonlike voornaamwoorde, insluitende onafhanklike, onderwerp, voorwerp, en besitlike voornaamwoorde. Dit is die beste om al die voornaamwoorde in &#39;n grafiek te samel. Hierdie manier waarop jy is meer seker van die invordering van hulle almal en sien hoe hulle met mekaar verband hou. &#39;N Taal kan meer stelle en meer onderskeidings het as Engels nie, of dit kan minder het. Byvoorbeeld sommige tale het &#39;n voornaamwoord &quot;ons&quot; wat die hoorder sluit, en &#39;n ander voornaamwoord &quot;ons&quot; wat die hoorder uitsluit. Ander tale het &#39;n onbepaalde voornaamwoord dat daar iets soos die Engelse woord &#39;iemand&#39; beteken. Baie tale het nie die manlike (hy), vroulike (sy), en onsydig (it) onderskeidings wat Engels het. Dit is nodig om die stelle en funksies van die voornaamwoorde vir elke taal te bepaal.
(1) What general words refer to the class of pronouns?|(1) Watter algemene woorde verwys na die klas van voornaamwoorde?
pronoun|voornaamwoord
(2) What pronouns refer to the speaker?|(2) Wat voornaamwoorde verwys na die spreker?
I, me, my, mine|Ek, my, my, myne
(3) What pronouns refer to the speaker and those associated with the speaker?|(3) Wat voornaamwoorde verwys na die spreker en die wat verband hou met die spreker?
we, us, our, ours|Ons, ons, ons, ons s&#39;n
(4) What pronouns refer to the audience?|(4) Wat voornaamwoorde verwys na die gehoor?
you, your, yours|jy en jou, joune
(5) What pronouns refer to the people or things being spoken about?|(5) Wat voornaamwoorde verwys na die mense of dinge gepraat oor?
he, him, his, she, her, hers, it, its, they, them, their, theirs|hy hom, sy, sy, haar, hare, is dit, die, hulle, hulle eie, hulle s&#39;n
(6) What pronouns are used for the subject of a sentence?|(6) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word vir die onderwerp van &#39;n sin?
I, you, he, she, it, we, you, they|Ek, jy, hy, sy, dit, ons, julle, hulle
(7) What pronouns are used for the object of a sentence?|(7) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word vir die doel van &#39;n sin?
me, you, him, her, it, us, you, them|My, julle, hom, haar, dit, ons, julle, hulle
(8) What pronouns are used in a possessive phrase?|(8) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word in &#39;n besitlike frase?
my, your, his, her, its, our, your, their|my, jou, sy, haar, sy, ons, jou, hul
(9) What pronouns are used in a possessive clause?|(9) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word in &#39;n besitlike klousule?
mine, yours, his, hers, its, ours, yours, theirs|myne, joune, sy, haar, sy, ons, die uwe, hulle s&#39;n
(10) What pronouns are used to emphasize the people or things being spoken about, especially when you are emphasizing that one person does something and not someone else?|(10) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word om te beklemtoon die mense of dinge gepraat oor, veral wanneer jy beklemtoon dat een persoon doen iets en nie iemand anders?
as for me (I), as for you (you), as for him (he), as for us (we), as for them (they)|Wat my (I), as vir jou (jy), soos vir hom (hy), soos vir ons (ons), soos vir hulle (hulle)
Reflexive pronouns|Refleksiewe voornaamwoorde
Use this domain for pronouns that refer back to the subject of the sentence. These pronouns should be added to the chart of personal pronouns.|Gebruik hierdie domein voornaamwoorde wat terugverwys na die onderwerp van die sin. Hierdie voornaamwoorde moet bygevoeg word om die grafiek van persoonlike voornaamwoorde.
(1) What pronouns express reflexive reference?|(1) Wat voornaamwoorde druk refleksiewe verwysing?
self, myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, yourselves, themselves, oneself|self, myself, jouself, homself, haarself, onsself, julle, hulle, jouself
(2) What pronouns express reciprocal reference?|(2) Wat voornaamwoorde druk wedersydse verwysing?
each other, one another|mekaar, mekaar
Indefinite pronouns|Onbepaalde voornaamwoorde
Use this domain for pronouns that do not refer to a definite person or thing, but can refer to anyone or anything. Some languages will not have all the sets of pronouns described below. Add each set you find in your language to the pronoun chart.|Gebruik hierdie domein voornaamwoorde wat nie verwys na &#39;n definitiewe persoon of ding, maar kan verwys na iemand of iets nie. Sommige tale sal nie al die stelle voornaamwoorde hieronder beskryf. Voeg elke stel wat jy in jou taal van die voornaamwoord grafiek.
(1) What pronouns express indefinite reference of a person?|(1) Wat voornaamwoorde druk onbepaalde verwysing van &#39;n persoon?
person, who, someone, anyone, everyone, no one, each one, whoever|persoon wat, iemand, enigiemand, almal, niemand, elkeen, wie
(2) What pronouns express indefinite reference of a thing?|(2) Wat voornaamwoorde druk onbepaalde verwysing van &#39;n ding?
thing, what, something, anything, everything, nothing, each thing, whatever, whichever|ding, wat, iets, enigiets, alles, niks, elke ding, wat ook al, wat ook al
(3) What pronouns express indefinite reference of a time?|(3) Wat voornaamwoorde druk onbepaalde verwysing van &#39;n tyd?
time, period, when, sometime, anytime, every time, never, at no time, each time, whenever, sometimes|tyd, tydperk, wanneer, iewers, enige tyd, elke keer, nooit, op geen tyd, elke keer, wanneer, soms
(4) What pronouns express indefinite reference of a place?|(4) Wat voornaamwoorde druk onbepaalde verwysing van &#39;n plek?
place, where, somewhere, anywhere, everywhere, nowhere, each place, wherever, which way|plek waar, iewers, enige plek, oral, nêrens, elke plek, waar, in watter rigting
(5) What pronouns express indefinite reference of a reason?|(5) Wat voornaamwoorde druk onbepaalde verwysing van &#39;n rede?
reason, why, for what reason, for some reason, for any reason, for each and every reason, for no reason, why ever|rede waarom, om watter rede, vir een of ander rede, vir enige rede, vir elke rede vir geen rede, waarom ooit
(6) What pronouns express indefinite reference of a manner?|(6) Wat voornaamwoorde druk onbepaalde verwysing van &#39;n wyse?
manner, means, how, somehow, anyhow, every way, no way, each way, however|wyse beteken, hoe, een of ander manier, in elk geval, op allerlei wyse, geen manier, elke manier, maar
(7) What pronouns express indefinite reference of an amount?|(7) Wat voornaamwoorde druk onbepaalde verwysing van &#39;n bedrag?
amount, how much, however many, however much, plenty|bedrag, hoeveel egter baie, maar baie, baie
Relative pronouns|Relatiewe voornaamwoorde
Use this domain for pronouns used in relative clauses.|Gebruik hierdie domein voornaamwoorde gebruik word in relatiewe klousules.
(1) What pronouns are used in relative clauses?|(1) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word in relatiewe klousules?
who, whom, that, which, why|wat wie, wat, wat, waarom
Question words|Vraag woorde
Use this domain for pronouns used in questions.|Gebruik hierdie domein voornaamwoorde gebruik word in vrae.
(1) What pronouns are used in questions?|(1) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word in vrae?
who, what, when, where, how, why|wie, wat, wanneer, waar, hoe, hoekom
Demonstrative pronouns|Voornaamwoorde
Use this domain for demonstrative pronouns.|Gebruik hierdie domein voornaamwoorde.
(1) What pronouns are used to indicate a particular referent?|(1) Wat voornaamwoorde gebruik word om &#39;n bepaalde referent aan?
a, an, the, this, these, that, those, specific,|a, &#39;n, die, hierdie, hierdie, dat diegene, spesifieke,
Personally|Persoonlik
Use this domain for words that indicate that someone does something himself, rather than through someone else.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat daarop dui dat iemand iets homself, eerder as deur iemand anders.
(1) What words are used to indicate that you do something yourself, rather than through someone else?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat jy iets self te doen, eerder as deur iemand anders?
personally, in person, direct|persoonlik, in die persoon, direkte
(2) What words are used to indicate that you make something yourself rather than using a machine?|(2) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat jy self iets eerder as die gebruik van &#39;n masjien te maak?
by hand|met die hand
Prepositions, postpositions|Voorsetsels, postpositions
Use this domain to list all prepositions and postpositions.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al voorsetsels en postpositions.
(1) What prepositions are in your language?|(1) Wat voorsetsels in jou taal?
in, on, at, from, to, away, toward, about,|in, op, op, van, om weg, teenoor sowat,
Conjunctions|Voegwoorde
Use this domain to list all conjunctions.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al voegwoorde.
(1) What conjunctions are in your language?|(1) Wat voegwoorde is in jou taal?
and, or, but,|en, of, maar,
Phrase conjunctions|Woorde voegwoorde
Use this domain to list all phrase level conjunctions--conjunctions that join two words within a phrase.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al frase vlak voegwoorde - voegwoorde dat twee woorde saam in &#39;n frase.
(1) What conjunctions join two words within a phrase?|(1) Wat voegwoorde sluit twee woorde binne &#39;n frase?
and, both...and, or, either...or, neither...nor, but,|en beide ... en, of, of ... of nie ... nie, maar,
Clause conjunctions|Klousule voegwoorde
Use this domain to list all clause level conjunctions--conjunctions that join two clauses.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al klousule vlak voegwoorde - voegwoorde dat twee klousules aan te sluit.
(1) What conjunctions join two clauses?|(1) Wat voegwoorde sluit twee klousules?
and, or, while, then, if, because,|en, of, terwyl, dan, as, want,
Sentence conjunctions|Vonnis voegwoorde
Use this domain to list all sentence level conjunctions--conjunctions that join two sentences.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al sinsvlak voegwoorde - voegwoorde dat twee sinne te verbind.
(1) What conjunctions join two sentences?|(1) Wat voegwoorde sluit twee sinne?
then, so,|dan, so,
Particles|Deeltjies
Use this domain to list all particles.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al die deeltjies.
(1) What particles are in your language?|(1) Wat deeltjies in jou taal?
He lives <just> across the street.|Hy woon <just> oorkant die straat.
Classifiers|Klassifiseerders
Use this domain to list all classifiers.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al klassifiseerders.
(1) What words indicate the class of something?|(1) Watter woorde dui die klas van iets?
(Japanese) -hon (long objects), -mai (flat objects), -ban (order in a series), -nin (people), -fun (minutes), -dai (large vehicles)|(Japanese) -hon (lang voorwerpe), -mai (plat voorwerpe), -ban (orde in &#39;n reeks), -nin (mense), -fun (minute), -dai (groot voertuie)
Interjections|Tussenwerpsels

(1) What interjections are in your language?|(1) Wat tussenwerpsels is in jou taal?
Wow! Hold on! Good grief!|Wow! Hou op! Goeie verdriet!
Idiophones|Ideofone
Use this domain to list all idiophones. If there are many idiophones in your language, it is probably not worth the trouble to list them here. The Shoebox program|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al ideofone. As daar is baie ideofone in jou taal, is dit waarskynlik nie die moeite werd om hier te lys. Die skoenboks program
(and other dictionary programs) can sort your dictionary by part of speech.|(En ander programme woordeboek) kan jou woordeboek sorteer deur deel van spraak.
(1) What idiophones are in your language?|(1) Wat ideofone is in jou taal?
knick-knack, flimflam|beuzelarij, onzin
Affixes|Affixes
Use this domain to list all affixes that do not fit in any of the subdomains under it. This section should be filled out by a linguist.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al affixes wat nie pas in enige van die subdomeine onder dit. Hierdie afdeling moet deur &#39;n taalkundige gevul.
(1) What affixes are in your language?|(1) Wat affixes is in jou taal?
-s, -ed, -ing|s, ed, -ing

Noun affixes|Noun affixes

-s, -en|s, -en
Derivational affixes|Afgeleide affixes
Use this domain to list all derivational affixes. A derivational affix is joined to a root and changes it into a different word. Derivational affixes often change the root into a different part of speech. Adding a derivational affix usually changes the meaning of the root in a significant way.|Gebruik hierdie domein lys van al afgeleide affixes. A afgeleide aanbring is gekoppel aan &#39;n wortel en verander dit in &#39;n ander woord. Afgeleide affixes dikwels verander die wortel in &#39;n ander deel van spraak. Voeg &#39;n afgeleide aanbring verander gewoonlik die betekenis van die wortel in &#39;n beduidende manier.
(1) What derivational affixes are there?|(1) Wat afgeleide affixes is daar?
un-, a-, self-, super-, -ment, -hood, -ous, -ly, -fy|VN-, a-, self-, super-, -ment, -hood, -ous, -ly, -fy
Very|Baie
Use this domain for words that intensify an attribute.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat &#39;n kenmerk verskerp.
(1) What words intensify an attribute?|(1) Watter woorde &#39;n kenmerk verskerp?
very, really, highly, deeply, real, so, mighty, one, quite, ever so, bloody, decidedly, too, proper, true, extremely, such|baie, baie, baie, baie, real, so, dapper, een, heel, ooit so, bloedige, beslis ook behoorlike, ware, uiters, soos
(2) What words intensify an attribute to an extreme degree?|(2) Watter woorde &#39;n kenmerk van &#39;n uiterste graad verskerp?
extremely, terribly, dreadfully, incredibly, unbelievably, ridiculously, absurdly, remarkably, exceptionally, extraordinarily, terrifically, enormously, hugely, exceedingly,|uiters, verskriklik, verskriklik, ongelooflik, ongelooflik, belaglik, absurd, merkwaardig, buitengewoon, buitengewoon, geweldig, geweldig, uiters, uiters,
(3) What words indicate that an attribute is not intense?|(3) Watter woorde aan te dui dat &#39;n kenmerk is nie intense?
not very, hardly, barely, a little, fairly|nie baie, skaars, skaars, &#39;n bietjie, redelik
Degree|Graad
Use this domain for words that indicate a degree on a scale.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde wat &#39;n graad op &#39;n skaal aan te dui.
(1) What words refer to the degree of something?|(1) Watter woorde verwys na die graad van iets?
degree, extent, level, thus|graad, omvang, vlak, dus
(2) What words indicate a degree on a scale?|(2) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n graad op &#39;n skaal?
high, low, greater, lesser, first, primary, secondary,|hoog, laag, groter, kleiner, eerste, primêre, sekondêre,
(3) What words refer to a marked extent?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n merkbare mate?
up to, as much as, to the degree that|tot soveel as, tot die mate dat
(4) What words refer to a change in degree?|(4) Wat woorde verwys na &#39;n verandering in graad?
fluctuate, fluctuation, move, vary,|wissel, fluktuasie, te beweeg, wissel,
(5) What words express a comparative degree?|(5) Watter woorde uit te druk &#39;n vergelykende graad?
more, -er|meer -er
(6) What words express a superlative degree?|(6) Watter woorde uit te druk &#39;n oortreffende trap?
most, -est|die meeste, -est
To a large degree|&#39;N groot mate
Use this domain for words referring to a large degree.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n groot mate.
(1) What words indicate a large degree?|(1) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n groot mate?
large, great, major, considerable, large scale, huge, enormous, immense, tremendous, high, advanced, rich,|groot, groot, groot, groot, groot skaal, groot, enorme, enorme, geweldige, hoog, gevorderde, ryk,
(2) What words refer to a large degree?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na &#39;n groot mate?
size, magnitude,|grootte, omvang,
To a small degree|Om &#39;n klein mate
Use this domain for words referring to a small degree.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n klein mate.
(1) What words indicate a small degree?|(1) Watter woorde dui op &#39;n klein mate?
deficient, inappreciably, inconsequentially, insignificantly, lacking, lightly, limited, little, low, merely, moderately, negligibly, piddling, possible, puny, reasonably, relatively, slightly, somewhat, sparingly, temperately, trivial, trivially,|gebrekkig, inappreciably, inconsequentially, onbetekenend, ontbreek, liggies, beperkte, klein, lae, net, matig, weglaatbaar, onbenullig, moontlik, nietige, redelik, relatief, effens, ietwat, spaarsaam, ingetoë triviale, trivially,
To a larger degree|Om &#39;n groter mate
Use this domain for words referring to a larger degree.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n groter mate.
(1) What words indicate that something is becoming larger in degree?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets steeds groter in graad?
advance, double, explode, gain, grow, increase, jump, rise, rocket, soar, triple,|vooraf, dubbel, ontplof, kry, te groei, verhoog, spring, styg, vuurpyl, styg, drie,
(2) What words refer to the amount by which something became larger?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die bedrag wat iets groter geword?
growth, explosion, hike, increase, rise,|groei, ontploffing, stap, verhoog, styg,
(3) What words refer to causing something to become larger in degree?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat groter in graad word?
increase, raise, swell|verhoog, verhoog, swel
(4) What words indicate that something is larger than another thing in degree?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets groter as &#39;n ander ding in graad?
more than,|meer as,
To a smaller degree|Om &#39;n kleiner mate
Use this domain for words referring to a smaller degree.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n kleiner graad.
(1) What words indicate that something is becoming smaller in degree?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets steeds kleiner in graad?
decline, decrease, diminish, drop, dwindle, fall, plummet, slide, tumble,|agteruitgang, afname, verminder, drop, agteruit gaan, val, skietlood, skuif, tuimel,
(2) What words refer to the amount by which something became smaller?|(2) Watter woorde verwys na die bedrag wat iets kleiner geword?
decline (n), decrease, fall, reduction, tumble|afname (n), afname, val, vermindering, tuimel
(3) What words refer to causing something to become smaller in degree?|(3) Watter woorde verwys na iets wat veroorsaak dat kleiner in graad word?
decrease, lower, reduce,|afname, laer, verminder,
(4) What words indicate that something is smaller than another thing in degree?|(4) Watter woorde aan te dui dat daar iets is kleiner as &#39;n ander ding in graad?
less than, lower,|minder as, laer,
Completely|Heeltemal
Use this domain for words referring to a complete degree--when something is done, happens, is thought, is felt, etc completely and in every way.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde verwys na &#39;n volledige graad - wanneer iets gedoen word, gebeur, is vermoedelik, gevoel, ens heeltemal en in elke opsig.
(1) What words indicate that something is done to a complete degree?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedoen word om &#39;n volledige graad?
completely, fully, totally, entirely, wholly, absolutely, utterly, positively, in every way, in every respect, in every sense, through and through, whole-heartedly, altogether, out-and-out, outright, perfect, perfectly, roundly, solid, solidly, thoroughly, unmitigated, unqualified, utter,|heeltemal, heeltemal, heeltemal, heeltemal, geheel, absoluut, heeltemal positief, in elke opsig, in alle opsigte, in elke sin, deur en deur, heelhartig, geheel en al, uit-en-uit, blatante, volmaak, perfek, kragtig, soliede, stewig, deeglik, ondeurdagte, ongekwalifiseerde, volslae,
(2) What general words refer to all of something's attributes or manners?|(2) Wat is die algemene woorde verwys na al die eienskappe of maniere iets se?
completely, in every way,|heeltemal, in elke opsig,
(3) What words describe something that is done completely?|(3) Watter woorde iets wat heeltemal gedoen beskryf?
complete, thorough, full, comprehensive, exhaustive, entire,|volledige, deeglike, volledige, omvattende, omvattende, die hele,
Partly|Gedeeltelik
(1) What words indicate that something is done partly?|(1) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets gedeeltelik gedoen?
partly, partially, to some extent, to a certain extent, to a degree, to some degree, up to a point, in part, sort of,|gedeeltelik gedeeltelik, tot &#39;n mate, tot &#39;n sekere mate, tot &#39;n mate, tot &#39;n mate, tot &#39;n punt, in die deel, soort van,
(2) What words indicate that something is done one part at a time?|(2) Watter woorde aan te dui dat iets &#39;n deel gedoen op &#39;n tyd?
gradually, in stages, step by step, one step at a time, in increments, incrementally, piecemeal, by degrees, little by little,|geleidelik, in fases, stap vir stap, een stap op &#39;n tyd, in inkremente, inkrementeel, sporadies, deur grade, bietjie vir bietjie,
Do intensely|Doen intens
Use this domain for words indicating intensity of an action.|Gebruik hierdie domein woorde aandui intensiteit van &#39;n aksie.
(1) What words are used to indicate that something is being done intensely?|(1) Watter woorde word gebruik om aan te dui dat daar iets intens gedoen?
intense, intensely, extensively|intense, intens, omvattend
Attribution of an attribute|Erkenning van &#39;n kenmerk
